name: Cottage! BonPaul + Sharky's Hostel
description: West Asheville Cottage within walking distance of shops,  pubs, bakery, cafes, music, and breweries

name: Tranquil Room & Private Bath
description: This is a comfy, peaceful and clean room with off street parking for one car. The guest room has wood floors, a large window, a small desk, chair, and a queen-size bed with extra pillows and blankets. The closet has shelves and hangers for storage, and there is a luggage rack to use. 1st floor access with no steps. Linens and towels provided. High speed Wi-Fi is ATT fiber 300mbs.

name: Terrace Cottage
description: Located in one of Asheville's oldest historic districts, walkable to UNC-Asheville, the Omni Grove Park Inn, restaurants, wine shops, markets, greenways, parks and more! Downtown is walkable on well-lit sidewalks (under 2 miles), a 5-min drive away.

name: Asheville Dreamer's Cabin
description:
Hi there,
I am usually here half of each month cause I travel for my business. Please ask if need those dates. The cabin is very cozy but also provides privacy and separate baths.
Safe and close to downtown Asheville!
Annie

name: Asheville Urban Farmhouse Entire Home 4.6 mi to DT
description: Farmhouse in the city is OPEN! This charming 1940’s stone farmhouse has all the old world ambiance w/modern amenities set in a peaceful, relaxed setting perfect for connecting with family & friends.

name: Luxurious Mountain Guest Suite Apartment
description: Escape to our beautifully furnished luxurious apartment Guest Suite ideally located in a private gated community in Keswick Hills, in south Asheville, NC for the most discriminating travelers.

name: 8 min Walk to DT AVL! Hip, Chic % Sparkling CLEAN
description: Historic neighborhood--walking distance to downtown, Wholefoodsand Trader Joe’s! Come enjoy our beautiful apartment and see what great things Asheville has to offer.

name: Romantic, Moroccan-Influenced Cottage
description:
One of a kind artist owned and designed cottage in heart of East-West Asheville. Walkable to restaurants/shops, 2 miles from downtown and 5 minutes to Biltmore Estate. TWO beds total.

The cottage has a Moroccan vibe and includes handmade pottery, art, and textiles. Walls are clay plaster and all bedding is cotton. Eco friendly cleaning supplies used.

Try the outdoor tub for hot bath also!

Parking is on Bradley street in front of the cottage or main house.

name: Frida Inspired Home
description: Mexico (specifically) Frida Kahlo inspired home was designed by artist and owner. This vibrant blue stucco home is walking distance to West Asheville's best restaurants, and two miles from downtown. 5 star restaurant, The Admiral and Leo’s are a three- five minute drive. Walk to Owl Bakery, Hole, and Taco Billy. The house has been written up in multiple well known magazines/ blogs. Truly an urban retreat. 2 miles from downtown. Clawfoot bathtub with hot water to enjoy.

name: The Birdhouse Sweet suite! Downtown Roof top deck!
description: Sweet loft apartment just north of downtown. Walkable. Roof top deck and gardens. Custom tile work, earthen clay plasters and beautiful lighting. Near yoga studio, cafes and grocery stores. Private oasis in downtown Asheville. Blackout curtains on all windows. New bamboo foam charcoal bed!

name: Cozy Asheville Retreat
description: Welcome to our charming and cozy Airbnb nestled in a tranquil neighborhood, just 1.5 miles away from the vibrant heart of downtown Asheville. With a king-size bed, infrared sauna, a private driveway, and your very own entrance, this inviting space is perfect for up to four adults, offering you the ideal blend of comfort and convenience.

name: Lovely mountain home with a view!
description: Linens and towels provided. You will have access to entire house. Nice, safe residential neighborhood. Secluded yet close to downtown. Located halfway between downtown and the parkway in beautiful Haw Creek valley. 3 beautiful acres with stream.

name: #2 Blue Ridge Room at Oakland Cottage B&B
description: Oakland Cottage is an Asheville historic home, circa 1910, perfect for your Vacation-In-Asheville. The 5,000 sq-ft "cottage" has been naturally separated into 7 guest rooms, each with private bath. The open & shared common areas, available to all guests, create a warm and spacious feel.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Lovely cottage 10 minutes north, quiet.
description:
Charming cottage in a quiet neighborhood with a ½ acre yard bordered by creek.

Great Location- just 10 minutes to downtown Asheville or the Blue Ridge parkway. The cottage is about 2 miles to Merrimon Ave where you will find grocery stores, shops, banks, several restaurants and the Beaver Lake Trail and Bird Sanctuary.

name: ❤VIEWS! Luxury home near DOWNTOWN close 2 Biltmore
description: Less than 1 mile to the heart of Downtown Asheville, at the end of a quiet dead-end city street and perched on a hillside with an opening that offers endless west facing views, sits this tastefully decorated, newly remodeled, 2 bedroom, 2 bath modern house. The house also has a bonus room that is used as a media room. High-Speed Internet and Roku TVs.

name: Town and Mountain Peaceful Retreat
description:
* SUPERHOST STATUS FOR OVER 12 YEARS! *
High speed WIFI !!
And central A/C !!
Welcome to our peaceful retreat tucked under the Blue Ridge Parkway!
Our location offers the best of both worlds! With convenient access to the mountains and the town. We are located approximately 5.5 miles from the center of downtown Asheville (the review with a response saying 8 miles is wrong, but Airbnb will not let me change it). One of the most affordable accommodations in the Asheville area!

name: Asheville artist  bungalow. 3 minutes to downtown
description: 1 queen bed with private bath in small shared 1920s Bungalow . Woodstove, organic garden, Large yard filled with large scale sculpture. Quiet neighborhood.  5 minutes to the beautiful scenic blue ridge parkway, 5 min drive to downtown Asheville.

name: West A'ville sanctuary in the trees
description: Beautiful, cozy and quiet.

name: "ZenShe" ... Very Clean, Quiet and Convenient
description:
Very Clean,
Very Private
Very Affordable
And Very Zen

name: Asheville Historic Cottage, Walk To Town
description: My romantic  house is warm,comfortable & beautiful, filled with antiques& local art,stocked kitchen, in quite tranquil setting,has a large privacy fenced yard with majestic Oaks, wood burning fireplace in the family room, front porch with swing and outdoor dining area on patio.

name: Urban Peace 5 ml from Downtown AVL
description:
Private and romantic, for special occasions or just get away, enjoy the calm.
Easy access to downtown with a quiet place to slumber.
Blue Ridge Parkway less than a mile away!
Park your car steps away from your door...secure and easily accessible!
Neighborhood is on a quiet private road, dead end street with no cut through traffic, great for a stroll.

name: The Cottage In Asheville
description: Corporate/temporary/vacation rental in North Asheville. Our clean, contemporary cottage is perfect for exploring Asheville! Relax in a calming environment, isolated from, yet close to the city. The place is your own. Unwind. [AVAILABLE BY THE MONTH]

name: The Cottage on Parkway Loop
description: The Cottage is a cozy, light, fully self contained (small) home.  It has all the amenities of a larger home, but with the comfortable convenience of a smaller space. It's just the right distance from Downtown, with the peace and privacy of a small neighborhood.

name: Lucky W Cottage- #1 Host in US
description:
More 5★ reviews than anyone in the US! We are known for our hospitality, cleanliness and comfortable accommodations. Easy access to town (no mountain roads!) and in a rural setting on our farm.
Just 5 miles from Downtown and 15 minutes to Biltmore Estate. Uber and Lyft frequently used by guests and the cottage is easy to find. Lucky W Cottage has an inviting and homey feel. Take a swim in the pool and a walk around the farm or sit by the fire and gaze at the mountains.

name: W Asheville Modern Meets Zen (No Cleaning Fees)
description:
Looking to R&R with easy access to everything? My home is a hybrid of modern & traditional, Asian & Western, modern & cozy. Walking distance to many local favorites in W. Asheville, the feel & tone of my home is quiet, spiritual, contemplative, & refreshing. Birds & butterflies abound the garden & yard. A meditative space. NOT suitable if you are in Asheville to party or to drink! A private sauna is available - ask for per use pricing.

I #HostwithPride.

name: Lovely, peaceful mountain retreat
description: Cozy Mother-in-law apt with kitchenette and private bathroom and entrance. Has a queen size bed.

name: Mid Century Modern Basement Apt..
description: Quiet delight surrounded by gardens. Near shopping, restaurants, downtown Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, and public transportation.

name: Sweet Studio - Walk West Asheville
description: Keyless entry with a door code, so you can check-in without host's help!  Full kitchen, queen bed, living area and private outdoor patio - all within a 10 minute walk to the best of West Asheville. Just a 5 min drive to downtown, 10 minute drive to the Biltmore. Basement apt.

name: Explorers Retreat 2mi from Downtown Lots of Plants
description:
1920's Craftsman's Bungalow with lots of character, plants, spacious yard, spacious balcony with rocking chairs, grill, river & sunset views! Perfect for travelers looking for a casual space to retreat to.

-3 Beds, Fiber Internet & work desk + rooms with TV's
-2 miles from Downtown Asheville
-Easy access to interstate & surrounding areas
-2 breweries + BBQ less than 1 mile from the home
-Less than 1 mile from new greenways & river put-ins
-Generously equipped kitchen with 6-8 person dining area

name: HUGE SUITE (king bed) & huge bath-PRIVATE ACCESS
description: Suite!-Huge king size bedroom & large bathroom has PRIVATE ACCESS from covered garage. Keurig coffee maker, mini refrigerator, microwave, toaster, table to eat or workstation, access to washer/dryer. 50"  tv/cable in bedroom-king bed. Opens to a sitting room for a quiet place to read in recliner or futon. Walk around access to huge back deck & use of firepit. COFFEE/TEA Continental Breakfast INCLUDED. 20 minutes from downtown Asheville, 10 minutes to Blue Ridge Pkwy & 5 minutes to WNC Ag Center

name: Garden studio next to downtown Asheville
description:
Our home is an official, permitted airbnb so your reservation is safe!
We are located on the south side of downtown between Biltmore Village and downtown Asheville. It is a five minute drive to downtown, and 2 minutes to Biltmore Village and the entrance to Biltmore Estate. City bus stop close by too.

name: Comfy,  chic spotless.  Your home in Asheville
description: Private home. 3rd BR is a designated work space.  Large yard.  Also, renters are welcome to enjoy the park-like meadow, fire pit, pavilion, corn hole, boccie ball, creek - across the street where we live.  5 mi from DT.  Short drive to the parkway for mountain vistas and hikes or to the River Arts District, music venues... wonderful restaurants, grocery stores, lake and bird sanctuary for perfect size daily walks.

name: Charming cottage bordered by stream
description: 1917 cottage with a private backyard and meandering stream.Relaxing environment in quiet neighborhood setting.The host is an artist well known for her regional landscapes.Amenities include a natural setting 1o minutes from downtown Asheville, nearby tennis courts, restaurants,microbreweries.and close proximity to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Perfectly Located Studio Apartment In Asheville
description:
2025 renovations are complete, come visit Asheville!!

Comfy studio apartment located just up the road from Biltmore Village. Be in the heart of it all with easy access to the Biltmore House and only minutes from Downtown. We are one of the few truly detached, standalone spaces for rent in such a prime location!

name: #7 Rose Room - Oakland Cottage B&B
description: Queen bedroom at Oakland Cottage, full private bath, cable TV, shampoo and local soaps, WIFI, full hot breakfast each morning, off street parking.  Charming and convenient!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Hidden treasure near Downtown, UNCA
description: Guest room with deck and private entrance. Only a 15 minute walk to downtown for fabulous restaurants, bars, boutiques, art galleries and more!  Our property boarders the University of North Carolina Asheville campus.  Also close to Asheville Botanical Gardens, North Asheville Tailgate Market, Trader Joes, and Whole Foods. Queen bed and bath with large walk in shower.  Small area with fridge/freezer, coffee maker, teakettle.  We also stock coffee with accompaniments and selection of tea.

name: 10 Minutes to Downtown  Epic Views!
description: Ten minutes to downtown, this clean and contemporary farmhouse still has a rural feel. It is  on the edge of a 40-acre farm. There is ample outdoor space for relaxing, a walking path and picnic area.  The inside is light, airy and open.

name: Peace and Quiet in town Pets welcome
description: Peaceful home on the edge of downtown. Easy walk to grocery stores, the greenway and UNCA botanical gardens nearby. Wonderful neighbors all around in a quiet friendly area. Pets welcome…has a fenced  yard, big front porch and back deck. Monthly rental includes utilities, fast wifi, natural fiber linens and a well appointed kitchen. Cleaning and pet fee not added in advance. Leave it reasonably clean and that’s good. Pet fees are added later. Please let me know in advance how many pets and breeds

name: Furnished Apartment Walk to Downtown
description:
King bed, Living room, stocked kitchen with stove/oven and microwave.
Air Condition, baseboard heat, and Wifi.
Very convenient location, just one mile to the center of downtown. 10/15 min walk.
This listing is not a good fit for children under 12, or infants under 2 years old.
There is no TV.
No Pets.

name: Guest suite - private entrance, hot tub, walkable
description:
Private guest suite in an artfully redone bungalow overlooking downtown Asheville. We are a 10-minute walk to Pack Square & 20 minutes to the far side of downtown.

Perfect for couples, the cozy 2-room suite has a bedroom with queen bed, a sunroom and a private 3/4 bath.

There is off-street parking, a private entrance and a door separating the suite from the main house, giving guests plenty of privacy.

Guests may enjoy a soak in our backyard hot tub.

**Please read the Dec 2023 update below**

name: West Asheville - Canie Creek Getaway
description: Located in one of the oldest neighborhoods in West Asheville. Sidewalks, friendly people, and the Canie Creek Greenway runs adjacent to  the backyard. Indie shops, great restaurants, small breweries, and bars are just a mile or 2 away.  It's a quick 5 mile drive to downtown Asheville, and about 20 minutes from some great views and hikes in almost every direction.

name: The Tree House Studio, Mins to Dwntwn. Pets!
description:
• 2 miles N. of downtown, super central!
• Private 600 sq. ft. full-sun downstairs studio
• Private entry, lots of light, CLEAN!
• Bay window area for workspace/dining.
• Wi-Fi
• Your own AC/Heat
• Hardwood floors
• Fireplace-we supply firewood
• Bathroom/shower
• Kitchen
• King bed
• Futon (queen)
• Full size fridge
• Washer/Dryer
• Patio
• We live upstairs. (We work to keep quiet, but you may still hear us at times)
• $60 pet fee, add them as 'pet' to your reservation. Dogs ok, no cats

name: The Mimosa Room/private entrance/private bath.
description:
Enjoy a lovely 1920's Bungalow home in eclectic West Asheville! An amazing stay 3 minutes from the French Broad River. Enjoy French Broad River trails or Asheville's best eateries! The South slope breweries, less than 10 minutes to downtown and Biltmore Estate. Comfy Queen bed, on-site massage therapy provided. Complete kitchenette, and a shared kitchen, private entrance,
private bath clawfoot tub, and handheld shower. See Asheville and come back to your private, cozy sanctuary!

name: Victorian Cottage Downtown - "Green Room Aerie”
description: A beautiful 115+ year old  historic home in the Montford neighborhood. This historic neighborhood is peaceful, yet only a short walk to all the great activities downtown.  We are a 3 block walk from Harrah’s Center and  a 5 minute drive to UNCA, the River Arts District, Salvation Station  and much more. The Biltmore Estate and Village, as well as  Grove Park Inn,  are less than a 10 minute drive.  Easy access to the Blue Ridge parkway, NC Arboretum, Folk Art Center and much more!

name: Downtown Artist Loft
description: If you're looking for a secluded mountain getaway this is not the place but if you are looking to be in the heart of downtown festivities then our loft is the perfect place for you! We are right in the center of all the downtown action. You are literally steps away from incredible craft beers, award-winning food and regional music. Downtown is lively especially at night where you can hang out and see a local band or the drum circle then sleep late then head downstairs for a massage.

name: Victorian Cottage Downtown - "Blue Room"
description: A beautiful one-hundred year old Richard Sharp Smith historic home in Montford neighborhood. 3 blocks from the center of town, 5-15 minute walk to everything.   High speed wi-fi and cable tv,  mini fridge, coffee and tea station in each room, private en-suite bathroom, outdoor spaces for relaxation.

name: The Hideaway, W. Asheville.  2 BR Perfect Location
description: Read our reviews!  2 bedroom house upper level, centrally located in the middle of the bustling Haywood Rd. corridor, on a quiet side street.  Park your car in a driveway and forget about it!  Everything you could possibly need is a short walk away.   Breweries, award winning restaurants, you name it! Enjoy a beer at one of 8 walkable breweries and then come back and chill on the gigantic covered porch. The Hideaway is inspected by the City of Asheville as a LEGAL short term rental.

name: Modern Cottage on Chicken Hill, near downtown
description: Welcome to my stylish and comfy River Arts Cottage… the perfect home base for your adventures in Asheville! This 2 BR, 1.5 BA single-family home is right in the heart of Asheville with all of its restaurants, shops, galleries, and general awesomeness! This modern yet cozy home is fully furnished, including all linens, towels, soaps, etc. Also included are ALL utilities, even the lightning-fast AT&T fiber Internet, which is perfect for working from home.

name: Downtown Asheville 2 bed/2bath unit for rent
description: 2 bedroom/2 bath condo. This 1100 sq ft unit includes full kitchen with granite counter tops. Bamboo wood floors throughout. A private balcony with city view. Spacious master bath with granite counter tops, and tile shower. Spacious master closet.

name: Unique 1-bdrm apt big yard-near Downtown-pets ok
description: This large, private apt has a kitchen, bathrm, den/office with a sofa bed (double), a large bdrm with  queen bed and seating area, private drive, off-street parking (no steps to door). The huge patio has hot tub (4/15-11/15) overlooks wooded backyard (pups love it) & a fairway (city golf course). The central location (pet-friendly neighborhd) is 5-min. drive ($7 Uber) to dwntwn with near/easy access to anywhere-B.R. Pkwy, Biltmore, breweries,hospitals +worlds away for spacious, quiet privacy.

name: Private Suite Walk to Downtown
description:
Queen bed, kitchenette with hot plate, pots/pans, Dorm size fridge, and a microwave.
Air Condition, baseboard heat, and Wifi.
Very convenient location, just one mile to the center of downtown. 10/15 min walk.
This listing is not a good fit for children under 12, or infants under 2 years old
There is no TV.
No Pets.

name: Asheville Modern Tree Top Bungalow w/ fire table!
description:
New and expanded deck added 9/1/2023. Enjoy sitting in the treetops!
Unique romantic round house overlooking mountains with panoramic views from inside and out. All rooms new and modernized including l two person heated jacuzzi tub in bathroom, high quality furniture, bedding, linens and kitchen. Located on beautiful Town Mountain, just 2.5 miles from downtown Asheville and 4 miles from a Blue Ridge Parkway entrance. Please do not use Instant Book for one night reservations.

name: Guest Room: Mountainside Private Room & Pvt. Bath
description:
Comfortable guest bedroom in our mountain home sleeps two in a queen bed. We have lowest cleaning fee in town, and private, not shared bathroom. This room in our house is the Blue Ridge Room. Private bathroom not shared with anyone, porch view, close to Biltmore & downtown Asheville. Room also has mini-fridge, TV with Roku, & electric kettle!
Our check in time of 5pm and check out at 11 am are firm to allowing cleaning staff to do their jobs and keep cleaning fees low.

name: Little forest 5 mins from airport
description:
Good value! A simple place with everything you need, extremely good location. 5 mins to airport, 10 mins to blue ridge parkway entrance, 15 - 20 minutes to downtown straight shot. Walking distance to, super market, bus stop and restuarants,
Private little forest.
You have your own private bedroom, bathroom, your own fridge and living room with separate entrance. Kitchen is mostly for you we cook upstairs. Overall it feels like a floor to your own.

name: Basement: Mountainside Private Room & Private Bath
description:
Don’t pay ridiculously high cleaning fees elsewhere! We keep fees low! Private entry, key code lock, your own private bathroom not shared with anyone & private porch. Finished (but basic) basement sleeps 3 with Queen bed and couch. Not fancy, just clean and comfortable.

Basement includes queen bed, couch, mini-fridge, microwave, desk, dresser, electric kettle and large living area. Only minutes from Biltmore & downtown Asheville, only 3 miles from Blue Ridge Parkway.
We are NOT 420 friendly.

name: Nana's Place is minutes from everything!
description: We look forward to seeing you soon! 5 minutes to Biltmore Estate.  5 minutes to downtown.  5 minutes to restaurants/ breweries. This is a centrally located two bedroom/two bath house. You will be able to enjoy city and mountain views from your private deck.

name: The Cabin In Grove Park
description: Kick back, relax, and unwind at this peaceful creek side log cabin nestled in Asheville’s historic Grove Park neighborhood.  Truly convenient to downtown, this rustic lodging is thoughtfully set up for a comfortable & relaxing extended 30+ day stay.

name: Bungalow in Downtown Asheville
description: Home away from home! Beautiful downtown home with awesome views of downtown Asheville and Mountains from huge double deck. Covered front porch with swing. 2BR, 1B, hardwood and tile floors, all brand new furniture and updates, 2 cable tvs, W&D in basement. Friendly and Safe family neighborhood. Walk to downtown and to nearby parks. Enjoy large Koi fish pond and waterfall in backyard below deck.

name: Quiet Luxurious Studio-Guest House (Monthly)
description: Our quiet, studio guest bungalow is conveniently located walking distance from downtown West Asheville, and features a luxurious bathroom, spacious full kitchen, comfortable queen bed, work space with wireless internet, and off-street parking. We are fully open and operational post-Helene, including an amazing new whole house water filter for extra-clean water.

name: Walk to Downtown, Mid-Century Modern
description: Newly renovated space with all the comforts you need!  High ceilings and large windows create a light and airy space. Set in the peaceful Montford neighborhood just 15 minutes walk to downtown Asheville. Level 2 charger for Electric Vehicle.

name: Cheerful Home In Historic Downtown Asheville
description:
***Newly upgraded bathroom shower and AC*** Jan.2024

This City of Asheville HomeStay approved apartment is situated on a pleasant wooded lot in a beautiful historic Asheville neighborhood conveniently located near downtown shops and eateries.

Great apartment for families, friends, or couples alike. Best suited for 4 guests or less, but up to 6 guests can be accommodated with the addition of air beds.

name: Convenient Log Home: View, Hot Tub, Water Feature!
description: Relax in a peaceful log cabin just 4 miles from downtown Asheville. Enjoy nearby hiking, rafting, disc golf, breweries, shopping, and restaurants. West Asheville is only 8 minutes away, and the River Arts District just 5 minutes. Visit the Biltmore Estate in 15–20 minutes. This cozy retreat offers the perfect balance of mountain serenity and easy access to Asheville’s vibrant culture and outdoor adventures.

name: The Henhouse
description: A spacious contemporary home. Walkable to breweries within 5-15 min. In between the River Arts district and downtown Asheville.  Private entrance through gardens. Dog lovers welcome, $20 per pet/night, plus a one time $20 cleaning fee. Pet fees will be requested via Airbnb Resolution Center. Wifi and AC.

name: Cozy & Private Cottage- 2 miles N. of downtown
description:
This cozy cottage is on a quiet hillside, 2 miles N. of downtown. Enjoy the privacy of your own space: bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom, entrance, deck & parking. Walk to hiking trails, downtown, gardens, UNCA, bars, restaurants & a breathtaking sunset/mountain views.
Our whole house water filter system provides glorious chlorine free water for drinking & showering. It's quiet here. A great place to relax. Enjoy a private deck for dining, star gazing or just enjoying the stellar view.

name: Sweet private suite in W. Asheville
description: Sweet private suite in W. Asheville bungalow.   Private deck, entrance and bath.  Walkable to all the great shops and restaurants of the West side village!  Quiet, dead end street and off street parking. Just a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville. Please note in the pictures that you must climb several steps to your deck and entrance.

name: Everything Zen Asheville
description: A charming & simple "Zen like" Japanese 2 bedroom bungalow with two queen beds and the best of both worlds; 4 miles from downtown Asheville while surrounded by rural nature. 1/2 mile from the French Broad River in the Woodfin neighborhood, just 4 miles North of downtown. Excellent WIFI!

name: Forest Hill Bungalow
description: Our home is located in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood located minutes from downtown and Biltmore Village.  The upstairs space available for rent is a two bedroom, one bath spacious apartment located in the upstairs portion of our 1917 bungalow.  The space is a perfect size for two adults with or without children. Occupancy is limited to four adults.  The apartment has a private separate entrance from the rest of the home.

name: Cozy Charm Home only 5 mins to Biltmore & Parkway
description: Welcome, y’all! This entire home is cozy and private and just 5 minutes to Biltmore Estate & the Blue Ridge Parkway and 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. With 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath, the house sleeps up to 6 guests. Come enjoy!

name: Sweet Suite
description:
We have a one bedroom, 1 bath suite in a quiet neighborhood conveniently located about 4 miles from downtown Asheville and from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy a private entrance and off street parking. The suite includes an efficiency kitchen. Licensed Home Stay Permit 15-16167.
Please note that AT&T phone service will not work in our neighborhood.

name: Private & Cozy Mini Suite - 2 miles N. of downtown
description:
Our beautiful home is on a quiet hillside, 2 miles N. of downtown. Enjoy the privacy of your own suite with a large bedroom, a private bathroom, entrance & mini kitchen. Walk to downtown, hiking trails, botanical gardens, UNCA, a local Saturday farmers market, brewery, eateries & a breathtaking sunset/mtn view.
Our whole house water filter system provides glorious chlorine free water for drinking & showering. It's a 20 min walk to town, find hikes right out our door.

name: Views of Downtown and Mountains
description: 2br,1b, bugalow in Downtown Asheville. Enjoy the beautiful mountains views and stunning views of downtown Asheville from the huge double deck with koi fish pond below.  Everything recently updated.  New beds and Serta mattress. Secured by ADT security.  30 night minimum. No pets

name: Urbane Retreat Cabin In town Asheville 90 DAYS
description:
CHANGE YOUR VIEW FOR WORK or RETIREMENT!

We welcome you with a tradition of Southern hospitality, modern conveniences and an unmatched setting amidst the beauty of Asheville. This urbane retreat where city folks could tap into their inner adventurer.

Lovers of log cabins experience our ongoing commitment to providing an unforgettable experience for our guests who have recognized us with their ★★★★★ Five-Star reviews.

Let our cabin be your home base to explore Asheville today.

name: Stylish house near downtown
description: Stylish, bright, and peaceful retreat, 7 mins from downtown Asheville and close to Mission Hospital. The location is very quiet yet close to grocery stores, etc. Private parking, off-street driveway. Fully equipped kitchen. Lovely covered deck and patio for relaxing outside.

name: Chalet at Winghaven, Sunny Log Home
description: The Chalet at Winghaven is a new, spacious, sunny log home. Close to Asheville and all its attractions, the chalet is surrounded by 38 acres of picturesque hardwood forest. Amazingly this private oasis is very close to shopping & restaurants! The Chalet is family friendly, dog friendly and also perfect for a private couple's retreat.

name: Beautiful Kenilworth Jewel
description:
After over 1,500 guests, we are still in the top 5% of AirBnB's listings, nearly all five star reviews; a highest level of guest satisfaction.

This private 825 sq.ft. one-bedroom, one-bath apartment is on the lower level of our beautiful three-story home in a gorgeous neighborhood. Your own private entrance and fantastic deck. Guests love the king-sized bed. You’re on a hillside overlooking the woods but minutes away from many popular spots.
And we have a Tesla level 2 charger available.

name: Amazing Asheville Location VIEWS!
description: Cool A-frame with amazing long-range views just a few miles from downtown Asheville. Enjoy views from the deck or relax by the wood stove.  A peaceful and funky setting for your vacation. One of the best spots in Asheville! Cabin is rustic- and what makes it so cool- but if you're style is new and glam this is not the house for you. WE NOW HAVE AC!!!

name: Stay in the  heart of  West Asheville
description: Located in the heart of West Asheville !  Three Queen beds and relaxing front porch.

name: Convenient to Everything! Private
description: This house is an even newer version or our other one.  Both houses are immaculate, have gorgeous views and are extremely convenient to downtown and Biltmore.  The houses have open floor plans and are modern with huge covered porches and three bedrooms.

name: Mountain Home - Spectacular Views & Near Downtown
description:
Gorgeous brand new mountain home! Have the best of both worlds with these wonderful mountain views while truly being only 3 minutes from downtown Asheville.

This old world home boasts salvage beams in an open floor plan... cozy yet spacious with great flow.

Put on your hiking boots and go for miles, or just 20 minutes. Many beautiful hikes and scenic views are just down the road on the Blue Ridge Parkway. That's right, all this AND you're only 7 minutes off the Blue Ridge Parkway!

name: Mtn.View in City | Private  Entrance| Sunset Suite
description:
*Separate entrance

*Full-size bed

*Futon sofa - can convert to a bed 1 adult or 2 children

*Private bath

*Eco-friendly No chemical, Recycle- Reuse Used Furniture

*Do not use mainstream chemical pesticides

*Central air and heat

*Private/ Quiet

*Wet clothing drying rack

*No Pets

*No Smoking of any kind or burning of any kind

*No Drugs or illegal activities

* No visitors or unregistered guests.

name: Griffin's Lair  Biltmore Village, NC 28803
description:
An upstairs luxury apartment just steps away from The Biltmore Estate entrance in Asheville, NC. Created in an original George Vanderbilt cottage. Located in Historic Biltmore Village, with an upper terrace backing up to the 8,000 acre Biltmore Estate. Views overlooking Biltmore Village & The Cathedral of All Souls.
30 All Souls Crescent ste 200 Asheville, N.C. 28803

name: Peaceful Mountainside Living
description: Reside on historic hunting grounds of the Vanderbilt's. Located just 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. With generous acreage and scenic splendor, the solitude will revive you from the bustle of our creative community, yet you'll be within comfortable distance from all attractions. The space is tastefully decorated with private entrance, private bath, and your own deck to kick back and enjoy the view!  Tell us what you like to do and we'll offer recommendations to help make your stay memorable!

name: Artsy/Zen Bungalow in W. Asheville!
description:
Beautiful, newly renovated 2 BR/1 BA, in the heart of West Asheville. Come experience all the charm and quirkiness of downtown but on a smaller, more walkable scale. There are coffee shops, local restaurants, bars, bakeries, a farmers market, holistic health shop and a park all within a 2 minute walk. 5-8 mins drive to downtown, kid friendly, sunny back deck, covered front porch.

***House is split level with a basement apartment below -separate entrance- well soundproofed

name: Bungalow by Biltmore House
description: Cute house a few blocks from the boutiques, breweries, antiques, and restaurants of Biltmore Village. Biltmore Estate 1 mile. 2.5 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Downtown Asheville 3 miles. Good for couples, friends, kids. Room to entertain friends. Have fun here. Skip the uptight listings.

name: Asheville's Famous "Pink House" Studio Apartment.
description: Asheville's Famous "Pink House" Apartment offers no cleaning fee and is located across from the Grove Park Inn and 5 minutes to Asheville. Hundreds of guests have enjoyed their stay at the "Pink House" where Tim & Lori Rice (Hosts) will provide you a "Legendary Guest Experience".  Private and keyless entry.

name: West Asheville walk-out apartment
description:
Superhost apartment (for three years pre-pandemic) back on the market with significant improvements and renovations!

Recently renovated 2 room apartment in a quiet neighborhood, just steps from the Hominy Creek Greenway (connects to the river arts district) and a walkable mile from the shops and restaurants on Haywood Road. Easy access to all highways and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Perfect for traveling nurses, retirees visiting the area, or traveling teleworkers!

name: Hidden getaway close to downtown!
description: The perfect mix of wooded privacy and accessibility to all that downtown Asheville has to offer, this little house has it all. Enjoy all the comforts of home in this unique, clean (and affordable!) spot and be minutes away from the heart of downtown.

name: Cozy and Convenient Hub*Walk to Haywood Road*
description:
Private 1 bed 1 bath all to yourself with a patio for relaxing!
Walking distance to some of the best restaurants, shops and breweries Asheville has to offer!

name: Hilltop House
description: Comfortable 3bd/2bath home 20 minutes from Asheville and 15 minutes from Black Mountain. Quiet, peaceful location with a beautiful view, sun deck, and spacious yard.

name: Explore the Woods from a Quiet Apartment near Sierra Nevada
description: Lie back on the blue chairs in the covered deck area and gaze out at the trees at the rear of the property. This inviting garage apartment has recently been renovated and has a cool open design. The living room has a nook with built-in bunk beds.

name: Steps to Downtown AVL Cozy 1BR in vintage building
description:
This bright and airy one bedroom condo is just blocks north of downtown on Broadway Street. On the cusp of the Historic Montford neighborhood. Its a one story walk up in a renovated historic bldg, just steps from Downtown Asheville.
Cozy, 1 queen bed, WiFi, TV, hardwood floors, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances. Located one block from the classic 5 Points diner, High Five Coffee, and 3 blocks from Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, and Harris Teeter. Above neighborhood bar with live music

name: The Rad Pad—Quiet Modern Nest 2 Blocks off Haywood
description: Howdy! Our space and neighborhood were not damaged from Helene. So, come on, pecan! The Pad is a bright, cheery and quiet spacedesigned for two. The studio is  600 square feet, with 11 foot ceilings. Guests will enjoy a private entrance and a outdoor dining area. We are right there if you need anything, but we are prepared for you to..... Relax under a rain-head shower in the luxurious bathroom. Heat up leftovers in the the kitchenette. Slow down, enjoy the good vibes of Asheville & the RAD PAD.

name: Mountain Beauty/City Convenience
description: Would you like a beautiful mountain setting, but with the convenience of downtown Asheville only a few minutes drive away?  Our tastefully-appointed apartment is situated at 3400' elevation, between downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Dog-friendly Downton Annie #4
description: Live like a local in this spotless, comfortable home, complete with brand-new appliances and plush furnishings. Admire the tasteful artwork, daydream on the sun-drenched sofa and sink into the softest beds in this chic, classically decorated space.

name: Groove Stone Getaway
description:
Located only 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, the Biltmore House and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway in a serene Blue Ridge Mountains bedroom community.

Fully furnished with all utilities included, Groove Stone is a perfect place for remote workers or traveling medical professionals.

Space tailored to maximize relaxing comfort for 2-4 Guests.

Great monthly rental close to all that WNC has to offer.

name: West Side Loft Cozy, Clean and Comfortable
description:
**NOTE: 10% of all proceeds will go to Hurricane Relief efforts. **

This loft apartment located in historic West Asheville is the perfect place to stay for a couple or solo travel. It has a private entrance with your own bedroom, bathroom, sitting/dining area, and efficiency kitchen. You'll have all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. You'll be minutes away from downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estates, breweries, and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Nestled Garden Oasis with Mountain Views Downtown!
description: Every corner of this home is individually adorned with an eclectic bouquet of antique furnishings and inspiring artwork. Gather around a fire pit in a yard offering mountain views. Recline on a warm sofa in a living room with a charming stone wall.

name: Welcome to "Cozy Oak Cottage"
description: Built in 1915, this one hundred+ year old cottage will be a wonderful place to call home when visiting the area.  Being just one mile from Biltmore Village & the entrance to Biltmore Estate makes it a great location.  Downtown is just 3.8 miles north.

name: Stay in historic downtown suburb
description:
-Self Isolate in a lovely, sunny apartment overlooking a garden on your large, private deck.
-We are located on a tree lined street in the historic neighborhood known as Grove Park.
-Located at the foot of Town Mountain, gateway to the National Park
-Nearby hikes and trails
-Walking distance to restaurants, bars and hiking trails
-We are following all CDC guidelines for cleanliness and disinfecting.
We have a strong wifi signal and a desk if you need to work from home.


-

name: The Barn At Mountain Meadows
description:
Luxurious,Magical,Serene,Modern,Organic,Circa 1895

We are proud to offer the Barn at Mountain Meadows for your stay in Asheville.
This luxuriously appointed cabin is located 5 miles from downtown and less than 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway.
Breathtaking eastern views and sunrises at 3500 ft. elevation. Borders Pisgah National Forest.

name: Serene, spacious, cozy and clean!
description: Welcome to still strong and building back better Asheville where mountains, music and charm await you. Arts and Crafts bungalow just two blocks from vibrant downtown West Asheville breakfast joints, gastro-pubs, performance halls, boutiques and artists. Beautifully tended, inside and out. Spacious bedroom has a modern desk and chair. Room is conveniently next to shared bathroom. Enjoy the front porch swing. Come on over!

name: Hip Downtown Hideaway
description: Come relax in our cozy downtown hideaway! This is a private and spacious 2-bedroom, 1.5 bath apartment on the first floor of a 2-story building. 3 BLOCKS FROM DOWNTOWN ASHEVILLE with stylish furnishings, queen beds, free laundry, central heating and A/C, full kitchen with dishwasher, stove, fridge, and microwave, lots of free street parking right out front, and TVs in the living room and both bedrooms! :)

name: Hosting volunteers and tourists - your visit helps
description:
Nestled in a tranquil neighborhood in east Asheville, this spacious vacation rental offers a serene mountain retreat conveniently located near the best of Western North Carolina: 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, 5 to the Blue Ridge Parkway, 15 to Biltmore, and 30 minutes to Lake Lure.

This fully-equipped home is ready for your memorable mountain escape. Unwind and rejuvenate a stone's throw away from thousands of acres of national forests and neighboring towns like Hendersonville and Brevard.

name: Bright, urban chic apt convenient to Avl & Hndvl
description: Ideal for traveling medical professionals or students at Advent, Pardee or Mission Hospitals.**Former 7 yr SuperHosts**Creative, serene, clean space. Stylishly furnished, "carriage door" apt in historic home. Industrial/modern/shabby-chic decor. Private patio with shared driveway. Fully equipped kitchen. Off street prkg/private entry. Utilities/WiFi included. Laundry access. Convenient location, midway between Hendersonville and Asheville. Experienced landlords providing a home away from home.

name: Female Dorm at Sharky's Youth Hostel
description:
Dorm bunks at Bon Paul and Sharky's Hostel. We have a co-ed dorm, as well as female only dorm. This is the female/women only dorm. Please check our other listings should you need different accommodations. We have off street parking behind the hostel and are located in a very safe neighborhood. Our front porch is awesome, with a porch swing.

Self check-in starts at 3pm. Instructions will be sent on the day of your arrival.

We provide linens and towels.

name: Private Room "Hitchcock" BPS Hostel
description:
We are located in Historic West Asheville, walking distance to amazing restaurants, cafes and pubs, grocery, and Asheville's River Art's District.

Private Rooms at Bon Paul and Sharky's Hostel. Each Private room has a full size bed that sleeps two adults.

We allow one dog for a $25 pet fee. The dog must stay with you at all times and cannot be left alone on the property.

Two and a half private bathrooms are shared throughout the hostel.

name: cozy bedroom in the heart of west asheville
description: Have your own private sleeping quarters just a stone's throw from everything West Asheville has to offer! You can surprisingly enjoy a quiet walk down my street; however at the end of the street is Haywood-home to numerous cafes, bars, & restaurants! Additionally, you are just over 2 miles from downtown and 10 min from the BlueRidge Prkwy. In 'TheSpace'  click on 'more' & read EVERYTHING under Guest Access, & if you have questions or need details, please message me via AirBnB prior to booking.

name: Private Cozy Suite - East AVL - Near BRP
description: Secret little gem in East AVL offers private space all to yourself! Private guest suite is located above our detached carriage house -- tranquil, cozy & clean - ideal for a couple's getaway or a solo retreat. Convenient access (5 miles) to downtown Asheville, 4 miles to the Biltmore Estate and about 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway in a small, quiet neighborhood. Please note: Small coffee/breakfast nook, but no kitchen or cooking appliances.

name: Sparrow Cottage
description: This bright, cheerful, and clean cottage is a little home away from home!  Walking distance to Downtown Asheville, local shopping, restaurants and night life and easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway and surrounding attractions.

name: Spacious Biltmore Getaway near downtown
description: Very comfortable and open lower level 2 bedroom apartment.  1 Large King bedroom and 1 Queen bedroom with office desk. Private full bath and family room with gas fireplace. Apartment is very spacious. Large yard with plenty of room, off street parking. We are close( 1 mile )to the Biltmore Estate entrance. Biltmore Village is a 10-12 min walk from our home. We are very close to many restaurants and 9 breweries.  Downtown Asheville is an 8 min Uber ride.

name: Wren's Nest Studio near River Arts
description: Cozy, artistic, private one-room studio attached to our home (but with a private entrance) in a rustic wooded setting less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville.   Have breakfast on your own private  covered patio.  Perfect for hikers, outdoor enthusiasts, kayakers, musicians & artists.

name: Private Basement Suite in Walkable West Asheville
description: Enjoy a private guest suite, separate entrance, full sized antique sleigh bed, full private bathroom, and tv area with couch in finished, above ground basement. Keurig Coffee maker, mini fridge, and bottled water provided. A great neighborhood within walking distance to pubs, restaurants and shops of hip West Asheville and a short drive to downtown or Biltmore.

name: Cozy, Mountaintop Log Cabin w/Epic Views*Hot Tub
description:
Minimum age to rent is 27. Up to two dogs max for add’l $75 fee.

Awe-inspiring views afforded by being near the top of the mountain. Minutes from shopping/dining in convenient South Asheville, less than 20 minutes from downtown Asheville & 15 minutes to Biltmore Village and Estate. Hot tub!
For hiking and nature enthusiasts, a 300 acre nature preserve with walking paths is steps away from the cabin. The great room has gas fireplace, leather furniture, rustic tables and a 50” TV w/ Netflix.

name: Private-Jacuzzi tub-Peaceful-Explore!
description:
Welcome!
You will love our newly decorated daylight basement apartment that is both private and charming. 300 sq ft. with separate entrance. The jacuzzi tub is amazing! Fenced in yard that backs up to woods. Neighborhood is quiet and walkable, with a pond.
12 minutes to Downtown Asheville.
2.5 miles to Biltmore Village.
2 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: "Studio C" Downtown Spacious with Private parking!
description: *Please refer to neighborhood highlights section about hurricane impact information before you continue to book.*

name: Hickory Street Home
description:
This home is a unique, quiet, nature filled retreat.
My house is only two miles to city center where you can visit world class restaurants, bars and nightlife! There is a lush yard with a running creek and lots of privacy. Listen to the gold fish pond below your bed room window. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, or a couple of friends. I offer one cozy double bed and lots of space to relax. those folks who want to experience the feel of the old Asheville environment.

name: Historic home, walk downtown, porch, deck, dogs ok
description:
Small house built in 1901 in one of Asheville's oldest neighborhoods. Quirky. Great for dogs and working from home.

Walk downtown in 10 mins. Pack Square is 1 mile away. Private backyard with deck. Blocks from great coffee shop Highfive, Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, Harris Teeter and downtown. Parking for two cars on street, in front of house.

We live in the house and rent it when away on vacation. We manage it. If you want a house that's as clean as a hotel room is NOT the place.

name: Sunny Modern Country Apartment with Spa and Sauna
description:
Come wake up to the sound of birds and nature with a cup of coffee on the big porch. Watch the stars from the hot tub with friends. A fun 9-mile drive from downtown Asheville, you can experience the peaceful beauty of the woods and the nightlife easily with a quick drive.

A sun-lovers sanctuary with an expansive front yard, book today for a one of a kind Asheville experience!

name: West Asheville Strip, quick walk to everywhere
description: Visit but live like a native. 1/2 a block walk to iconic Haywood Rd. Amazingly close to everything but also amazingly private, with private entrance and driveway. Welcoming, clean walk out basement apt with comfort and perks.  Kitchen with fridge, toaster oven, microwave, hot plate, pantry, no oven. Laundry room, bathroom (shower only). King bed and pull out sofa in living room. Both beds are super comfortable.

name: Lovely cottage in W.Asheville. Hot tub!
description:
*Pool opens on the 23rd of May & Pool closes 9/30

Welcome to Asheville! Our cedar ranch style home is conveniently located in W Asheville close to all major throughways & interstates. Our home is 1500sqft,3BR,2B,3Q, hardwood, ceramic tile bathrooms, deck, pool,hot tub. Wifi, Pet Fee of $70. No pets are allowed in the pool area at anytime. Pets are to be crated inside the house when away.

NO SMOKING IN THE HOUSE

⭐️with weekend rentals I require that you book both Friday and Saturday together

name: Studio at Green Oaks Community
description: The Studio is a convenient haven to stay at while exploring A'ville area. Downtown is 10 min. away by Riverside or Xway. Yummy dining, dancing, Arts District, clubs, cultural events, hiking, tubing & more are all super close to our secure 5 1/2 ac.

name: Charming Bungalow Apartment - Biltmore Area
description: Newly renovated, cozy and comfortable basement apartment a half mile from Biltmore House and minutes from downtown. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood a few blocks from local breweries, restaurants and shopping. This space has its own private entrance, plenty of light and loads of charm. Great location with easy access to everything you could want. Hosted by a hard-working friendly musician who's been at it for years. Check-out RahmSquad on streaming platforms/socials (spotify, instagram, etc..)

name: Romantic & Bohemian Private Studio
description: This one bedroom, one bath studio is located in the back of my 1920s bungalow in downtown Asheville.

name: Clean, Comfortable, Modern Apartment - 60 day min
description:
2100/month
Clean
Sunlit rooms
Conveniently located between the Biltmore and Downtown
Spacious
Original Art
Newly remodeled
Brand new central air/heat system
Beautiful neighborhood for urban hiking
Comfortable
Off-Street parking
Fully Equipped Kitchen with new appliances
Washer/Dryer
1200 square feet of living space

name: Mountain Modern ‘Home away from Home’
description:
Lovingly renovated, this 1,000 square foot cheerful, bright home is located in a quiet, walkable golf course neighborhood with a park like setting. This artsy local gem has many modern updates and still keeps the integrity of its historic charm.
Newly remodeled kitchen, vaulted ceilings, skylights, new bathroom with steam shower are just a few of the upgrades in this home.
Outdoor space features screened, furnished patio & large backyard with fire pit

name: Montford Manor-Home Away From Home / Near downtown
description: This beautiful arts & crafts, green-certified home is located on a quiet dead-end street and conveniently located to the vibrant downtown Asheville area. Montford Manor has all the comforts of home and much more. NOTE: The AirBnB map of our property may be misleading. Montford Manor is NOT located downtown, but a short 25 min walk or a 5 minute drive to Pack Square in the heart of downtown Asheville.

name: Cozy AVL Suite Near Everything
description:
Sweet private sanctuary only 7 min. to the heart of downtown. Private entrance, fully-loaded kitchenette, super comfy queen memory foam bed and mattress topper.

Recently renovated with full private bathroom, separate living area with couch, A/C & dine-in table.

Fully fenced back yard and hot tub access under large trees. Dog friendly w/ access to disc golf putting & badminton.

Private driveway w/ off-street parking. 5 min to Blue Ridge Parkway, and 5-10 min drive to almost anywhere in town

name: Cabin in Asheville HOT TUB VIEWS nr Biltmore.
description:
Beautiful A frame cabin in Asheville near Biltmore
Wonderful quiet location yet close to many restaurants and area attractions. 7 miles to the Biltmore.


Luxury hot tub with sunset views
King bed in master
2 full bathrooms
Cable TV & high speed internet for streaming Netflix



Asheville is open & waiting for you

name: 1925 Bungalow in the Heart of West
description: A charming bungalow built in 1925 in the heart of West Asheville. Two blocks from Haywood Road, 3 miles from downtown. Private bath, wifi, and storage for your bicycles.

name: 5 Star Near Downtown & Biltmore
description:
Beautiful 1900 sq. ft. town home in the highly sought after Asheville Area. We are within the city limits. Just bring your clothes. This home provides you everything you will need to relax and enjoy this amazingly perfect location! You will feel right at home. Enjoy being tucked away in this tiny, quiet, very safe neighborhood that is very close to everything in Asheville. Super Convenient
~~The home is only a short 6 Miles to the Biltmore Estate and 5 miles to Downtown~~

name: 5 Minutes to Downtown/ 2 Minutes to Biltmore
description: Hello, we are Robbie and Alisa! Our 1927 renovated home is in a peaceful, historic neighborhood in Asheville.  Our home is in a prime Asheville location;  a 5 minute drive, or 20 minute walk to downtown and a 2 minute drive to Biltmore Village and the Biltmore Estate.  You will be in the center of art, music, delicious eats and gorgeous mountains during your stay!

name: Studio apartment in tranquil setting
description:
Private cozy room with 1 queen, full bathroom and kitchenette.
No smoking or pets allowed

name: Private floor, stroll to W. AVL
description: I'm happy to offer a full private floor in my green-built home, just a 5 minute walk to the best of W. Avl dining and nightlife.  Queen bed, full bathroom, living room with queen sleeper sofa, creek views from the breakfast nook, full size deck, mini fridge.  I prefer Friday and Saturday nights booked together.  My space is not well-suited for babies or toddlers.

name: Walk to Downtown! Dogs Stay Free! “The Cottage”
description: Welcome to The Flamingo! This historic, dog-friendly cottage is just a short walk to downtown Asheville. Nestled beside a 100-year-old Appalachian home, it offers a peaceful retreat with modern comfort. Dogs stay free, and you’ll love the easy access to shops, dining, and mountain adventures. Perfect for couples or solo travelers looking to explore Asheville with charm and convenience.

name: Cabin 400 sq all for  you.
description: Queen bed in private room; living room with queen sleeper sofa; a fun loft for people 5 feet and under, large eat-in kitchen with stove and microwave; full bath, large deck; picnic table; fire ring; flat screen color TV/DVD w/ cable; A/C and heat. This cabin requires a 2 night minimum booking.

name: Modern Downtown Loft
description: This elegant downtown loft blends modernization and restoration seamlessly. The central location provides the ultimate home base for enjoying Asheville. Park once and walk to restaurants, local breweries, and shopping. Walkscore: 92.

name: * VERY Comfortable Montford Apt. — Walk Downtown
description:
Asheville welcomes you back after surviving Hurricane Helene. Our doors and arms are open wide. Come play!

BRAND NEW, spacious & beautifully remodeled this apartment has tons of natural light, its own private entrance & deck.

Super clean, VERY comfortable, stylish and well-appointed — look no further, you have found the ideal spot from which to explore and experience Asheville!

I look forward to hosting you

name: Two Block Walk from Apt to Downtown
description: Located less than 1 mile from downtown Asheville's center, Pack Square, our Montford neighborhood home was completed in June of 2015.  Solar Powered & Green Certified we offer a one bedroom 650 square foot apartment with private entrance, large windows, & safe off street parking.  Well behaved dogs are very welcome, but please let us know if any are joining you on your stay with us.

name: Lake view, Children-Friendly Cabins
description: Excellent location to tourist attractions. Fully furnished & equipped kitchen, 2 Beds & 2 Bath rooms with 1 pullout couch bed (sleep up to 6people), covered screen porch, hot tub, stone fire place, wireless internet & cable TV, laundry facilities.

name: Apartment 1 mile from  Downtown Asheville
description: Welcome to our sanctuary on the hill just a mile from downtown Asheville. This is a sweetly remodeled 1 bedroom basement apartment with its own private entrance. We have all utilities and luxuries restored after hurricane Helene and look forward to hosting you! This is a pet friendly space in a quiet beautiful neighborhood. We do live on a hill and parking is on street but it is low traffic and a short walk to several restaurants and cafes.

name: Bluebirds Nest—10 min to town—hot tub—cont bkfst
description:
Bluebirds Nest is in a great location in the country yet only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, the Biltmore House, UNCA, Business District, West Asheville, breweries, hiking, rafting, and biking.

Park right outside your own private entrance to this charming place. This spacious and bright space is furnished in French country chic and includes many amenities and a delicious continental breakfast. People from all backgrounds are welcome in Bluebirds Nest.

name: Short walk to WAVL.
description: My cozy 2 bedroom sleeps 4 lucky folks. Just a couple of minutes walk to trendy West Asheville and a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville, your vacation will be filled with activities before you know it!

name: Happy Haven w/ hottub, Gym, & hammocks in West AVL
description:
Venture only 1/2 mile to Haywood Rd, West Asheville for world renowned food, funky pubs, and unique shopping. Then soak in the hot tub or take an outside shower to rejuvenate. Under 10 minutes to Downtown Asheville, River Arts District, French Broad River trails, Outlet Malls, and the Biltmore Estate.
Come live the Asheville Dream!

Cat lovers only. Cat lives in house and comes and goes as he pleases through a cat door.

name: Log Cabin Near Downtown Asheville
description: Town and country – best of both worlds. Romantic! Semi-secluded, 5 minutes from town, near Blue Ridge Parkway. Close mountain views from the wrap-around deck. Hot tub for 6. Fire pit in quarter-acre yard, chiminea on deck, gas log fireplace inside. Yard completely fenced & gated with playground. Cable TV, high-speed wireless internet.  1- and 2-night stays are available only if they are hemmed in by other bookings. Please email request for information about shorter stays. Dogs may be acceptable.

name: Walk to town, Views, Fenced for dogs, & Hot Tub
description:
Welcome to Asheville & your home-away-from-home! Views of town AND walk to town, designer furnishings, luxury everywhere! Cozy and elegant, fully-equipped gourmet kitchen, quiet wooded cul-de-sac street, and lots of outdoor space to enjoy the mountain scenery, and inclusive of a gated fence surrounding the house for your dog(s).

Two outdoor seating areas and two separate fire pits, scent-free home.

name: Sheriff's Station - Historic House, West Asheville
description: This historic stone house was originally built by the sheriff of Buncombe County in 1926.   It is an easy walk to cool coffee shops, bakery, restaurants, breweries, and bars in the East-West Asheville neighborhood.  The house is 1 mile from the River Arts District and 2 miles from downtown.  A private entrance, private terrace, mountain views, and large yard make for a great experience.

name: The Serenity Yurt
description: Come try something new and adventurous and stay at our yurt and enjoy the best of both worlds. You can feel a closeness to nature while not skimping on amenities as our yurt is outfitted with everything you need to have wonderful retreat. Although secluded in the beautiful woods of the blue ridge mountains, you are only 15-20 min from Asheville's lively downtown.

name: Downtown Asheville Cottage
description:
Fully Furnished Monthly Rental.
30-Day Minimum.
This is a cute stand-alone house.
1 bedroom/1 bathroom.
A perfect fit for 2 people.
Great views and centrally located.
Walk to shops, eateries, and breweries.
Fully furnished. Deck with mountain and city views!
2 people maximum.
Absolutely no parties allowed.

name: Mountain Views, Private Retreat, 15 min frm dwntwn
description:
Relax, Restore, Rejuvenate.
Our listing is not just a spare bedroom but a spacious, full-sized lower-level suite, located just a few minutes from downtown Asheville. We have a secluded, peaceful home on a paved, state-maintained road. You can enjoy 6.5 acres of private outdoor space, along with a steam sauna, hot tub & outdoor shower. We also provide easy access to a large deck offering spectacular views from almost 3000 feet - similar those as seen from the Grove Park Inn - only higher up!

name: Corner Cottage
description: In a quiet old neighborhood a short walk from downtown, this beautifully renovated bungalow is a perfect base for exploring Asheville. There's a porch with a rocker, a private deck with table and grill, and a nearby cafe. Ask about pets. Come stay!

name: Apartment with a View
description: Comfortable one bedroom basement apartment with private patio, mountain views and separate entry (owners live upstairs).  The apartment is stylishly appointed, with a full kitchen and bathroom and off street parking in a quiet cul-de-sac.  Close to downtown and within walking distance of Beaver Lake.

name: Asheville Cottages. Romantic, Luxurious and CLEAN
description:
----------------------NOT THE NORMAL AIRBNB!---------------------

Family Owned and Operated by the Manche Family!

My wife and I have one goal and that is to provide you with the BEST vacation rental vacation you have EVER experienced.

We own 14 romantic and luxurious cottages on our 15 acre resort property.

Each of our cottages has luxurious amenities that you will not find anywhere else.
A few of our amenities:
-Hot tub and gas grill
-Fireplace
-heated tile floors
-Large TVs in all rooms

name: Perfectly cozy location 1/2 mile to downtown.
description:
1st floor bedroom with a very comfortable queen bed with en-suite bathroom in a wonderful location, only 1/2 mile walk to downtown Asheville. 1/2 a block from Trader Joe's on Merrimon Ave, Harris Teeter and right Behind Whole Foods.
Come enjoy the great food, music and outdoor activities that Asheville is known for. Free street parking beside or in front of front door across the street.

name: Luxury Modern Loft in Historic Central Downtown Building
description:
A brand new, chic, modern loft in a beautiful historic building in the middle of downtown. The best of the original features, like beautiful antique wooden floors and old brick work, combined with the comfort of contemporary luxury. High end appliances, European design, comfort and style. Elevator, secure electronic street entrance.

The loft is perfectly comfortable for 2 guests, whether they are a couple, friends or relatives. We can make up the king bed as two twins when needed. For parents traveling with their children we can set up a pull out bed (or two).

I live nearby and am available to answer any questions in person, by phone or by text

Walk just steps to all of the great culinary treats, restaurants, cafes, bars, breweries, boutiques, salons, galleries, an independent movie theater, music venues, artists' studios, and all of the downtown liveliness that makes Asheville so unique.

There is plenty, secure and covered parking across fro

name: Private Suite near River Arts District & Biltmore
description:
Walk to River Arts District & popular Breweries.
2 miles to downtown Asheville, Uber ride downtown is minimum charge.
Close to the Biltmore Estate.
Within 1/2 mile of Mission Hospital & AB Tech College.
Famous South Slope Restaurants and Breweries only 1 mile away.
Centrally located to all parts of Asheville, yet secluded in a peaceful wooded area.
Your Suite is generously sized, with walk-in shower, TV, refrigerator, coffee maker, and many other amenities.

name: lovely room - 3 miles from downtown
description: Peaceful, luxurious, private room in newer home. Zip-covered bedding.  Close to local breweries,  Blue Ridge Pkwy, Biltmore  Est, highways. Wooded lot, rocking chair porch with hammock.  Massages and petsitting available as addition.

name: Walk to AVLs TOP cafes, pubs, restaurants, rafting
description: Beautiful and inviting! Painstakingly restored Victorian Home with the latest modern amenities, located in a great and highly popular walking area. Only steps to AVL,s TOP restaurants, breweries and cafés. Yet also close to rafting zip lining waterfalls etc. Luxurious bedding. Three gorgeous  bathrooms Professional style kitchen. Six fireplaces. Wi-Fi,  Cable with every channel available. Whole home audio. Absolutely gorgeous!

name: The Little Moose Cabin (Secluded yet Convenient)
description: Our proximity to the Blue Ridge Parkway and downtown Asheville, makes us the ideal place to stay when you visit Western North Carolina. Our remote mountain setting is perfect for relaxation, or if you are more adventurous we are just minutes from many area attractions.

name: A Cottage At Willow Pond
description: A comfortable cozy brick cottage tucked in a beautiful valley on a private owned 17 acre horse farm.  Enjoy the pastoral view while relaxing and be close to town.

name: Little House Simple Studio
description:
Converted studio 350 sq ft tiny home 3 miles to Downtown Avl, Wicked Weed, & River Arts District, 2m from West Avl. & New Belgium Brewery. Queen bed, elec htr, A/C unit, small kitchen, free Wifi & Netflix.

*Dog policy: under 45lbs only, max 2 dogs, up to date shots, friendly, on a leash at all times if outside the property or private fenced backyard.

Strictly short term vacation rental.
No local boarding.
Cancellation policy is moderate and through Airbnb.
See policies before booking.

name: Airstream On The River
description: Located within walking distance to Carrier Park, Asheville food park, and the climbing gym. You will be in the middle of it all! West Asheville, the River Arts District, and less than 5 miles from downtown. It sits on the French Broad River AND the Greenway with private river access. Ride your bike to New Belgium on the Greenway! Asheville Outdoor Center is right next door with tube rentals and shuttles, volleyball, ping pong, and a pub!

name: Private, secluded cabin-wood/fireplace/New Hot Tub
description:
Private and secluded cabin with a traditional wood burning fire place/private log cabin. Surrounded by peaceful whispering pines and other natural surroundings. Asheville is only 15 minute easy car drive, easy routes to hiking Blue Ridge Pkwy, waterfalls, sight seeing and many local artisan crafts/antiques/breweries. New Feb 2025 Perfect HOT TUB

Smart TV with WIFI for streaming only.

name: Hazels Hideaway - Walk downtown - Sunny 1B/1B
description: Sunny, 1 bedroom apartment in beautiful Historic Montford.  A 15 minute walk to downtown, 10 minute drive to the Biltmore Estate and downtown West Asheville.  Grocery Stores such as Harris Teeter, Trader Joe's and Wholefoods are just a few minutes drive away. Amenities include a smart TV is stocked with Netflix, Prime, & Hulu, and a desk for remote work. Enjoy clean drinking & shower water with our whole-house activated carbon water filter.

name: Mountain Retreat with Hot Tub
description: Ideal location, walking distance to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains-to-Sea Trail. Ten minutes from Biltmore House and downtown Asheville. Private spacious bedroom, queen bed, couch, ensuite bath, coffee station, mini fridge, microwave, hot tub, deck, and patio. For everyone's health safety, we are asking that our guests be fully vaccinated for COVID. Thank you.

name: Spacious, Chic Grove Park Studio - 5 Min Dwntwn
description: Set in a quiet, walkable residential neighborhood, you're only a 5-minute drive or Uber ride from our lively downtown (1.4 mi.) a short walk from the Omni Grove Park Inn, & close to UNC@Asheville (1.4 mi). Enjoy a light-filled sitting area, dining area & breakfast bar, and a comfortable, well-appointed bedroom, plus full bath, and off-street parking. Only 13 minutes to Biltmore estate; 16 to Blue Ridge Parkway. Also convenient for business travelers attending events at the GP Inn/UNCA/downtown.

name: 3/2.5 Renovated House - Monthly Rates Available
description: 3 bedroom/2.5 bath vacation rental property on 1 acre tucked away in a quiet peaceful setting while centrally located within a 15 minute drive of Downtown Asheville.  The house has a wonderful covered and screened outdoor deck to sit out back and enjoy the view of the trees. Weekly and monthly discounts available.

name: Stylish N. Avl apt w King bed.
description: Enjoy the peace and beauty of the smoky mountains at our mountain retreat. Easy access all that Asheville has to offer - we are minutes from downtown, the botanical gardens, walking and running trails around the nearby lake, and plenty of delicious places to eat.  We would love to host you and help make your visit to our beloved city memorable.

name: Lily Pad Cottage over a Mountain Stream and Pond
description: This secluded cottage is located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate.  A mountain stream runs under the cottage and empties into a natural filled pond. The Lily Pad Cottage offers everything for a peaceful getaway.

name: 2BR suite near Biltmore, Downtown & Mission Hosp.
description: About a mile from Asheville's vibrant Downtown and Biltmore House, and close to breweries, hikes, and the Blue Ridge Parkway, Keebler House is your home base to explore our beautiful mountains and vibrant city. This two level suite consists of two bedrooms, full bathroom, a spacious tv/living room with sofa bed and kitchenette. A locked door in the upper hallway leads to the host's residence ensuring your privacy.  Plenty of room to spread out, get comfortable and relax. Free off street parking.

name: Historic Grove Park - Apt #2
description:
Historic apartment in the Grove Park area of Asheville. Convenient to downtown Asheville, Charlotte Street eateries and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Classically decorated, this unit has a full kitchen, dining room, living room, sunroom, queen size bed and full bath.

name: Walk to downtown, River Arts & South Slope!
description:
We are a 10-15 minute walk to all downtown Asheville restaurants, all River Arts district studios and all South Slope breweries! You can't beat the location!

Your fridge will be stocked with a complimentary selection of local craft beers and Brita filtered water. We love taking care of our guests!

This apartment is 400 sq feet and is best for a couple on the go - but is also very suitable for a group of 3 adults if you don't mind being close.

name: Cottage McIntyre Near Downtown! Weddings!
description:
The house has been in my family for 4 generations. Built by my great grandfather. Very conveniently located, only minutes from downtown, West Asheville, and River Arts. Lots of room in the house and on the property to spread out and get comfy.

We are now hosting affordable weddings on the spacious property. Reach out to Erin at silverfernevents.com for wedding information at Cottage McIntyre.

name: Historic Grove Park - Apt #1
description:
Historic apartment in the Grove Park area of Asheville. Convenient to downtown and Charlotte Street eateries.

Classically decorated, this unit has a full kitchen, dining room, living room, sunroom, queen size bed and full bath.

We do allow pets, but ask that they are well-behaved and you clea up after them.

name: Mtn Sunset View, 4 miles to Downtown AVL, King Bed
description: Although this newly-renovated mid-century home feels eons away from the real world -- as it is perched atop a beautiful mountain with breathtaking sunset views -- it is only about 4 mi/15 minutes away from Downtown Asheville! New mattresses plus quality furniture and fireplace fill the space, and we have fully-stocked the kitchen. The best feature is the deck. We can host up to 8 guests, with 3 beds/bedrooms and 1 sleeper sofa; 2 full baths. We have 2 family rooms — one upstairs and one down.

name: West AVL Urban Retreat (Monthly)
description: This West Asheville home privately located on a quiet residential street, right next to Carrier Park and Asheville Food Park! Haywood Rd (West Asheville's most happening street) and the River Arts District are both a short walk.

name: 2 King en suites, walk to town
description: We have recently remodeled the first floor of our home to provide you with comfort and privacy. A delightful mid-century home that has been updated to reflect the needs of a modern guest provding comfort and privacy.  You will be in a wonderful neighborhood with tantalizing downtown and mountain views.  And best of all, you'll be only minutes from the heart of downtown.  There are 3 private decks for enjoying many hours taking in the views of the city and the Blue Ridge Mountains or bear.

name: Mixed Dorm Bunk at Sharky's Youth Hostel
description:
Six bed mixed dorm in hostel. Easy walk to restaurants, cafes, bakery, organic market, pubs, music, and shopping.

Self check-in starts at 3pm. Instructions will be sent on the morning of your arrival.

We provide linens and towels.

*Please note this is a co-ed dorm - we have another listing for female only

name: Haywood House Asheville (West Asheville)
description: Haywood House: West Asheville's Newly Restored And Most Walkable Rental!  Fully Restored And Updated Craftsman Home With 3 Bedrooms And 2 Full Baths.

name: Long Weekend Getaway Minutes from Downtown AVL
description: This mountain home, in a country setting, is just 5 minutes from downtown. Sip coffee in complete relaxation on the deck with the bustle of downtown right at your fingertips. This eclectic mountain home has everything for a perfect long weekend in Asheville.

name: Quaint & Quirky Paris of the South
description: Sure, those fancy perfectly restored classic Bungalows are nice. But, if you're looking for the real-deal eclectic West Asheville vibe, this is the place for you! Walk to the hippest joints in town and return to a creative one-of-a-kind urban oasis.

name: The Guesthouse at Deer Crossing
description:
Our home is a custom built unique farm house which used materials off the property for much of its structure. We call it our “ barn house.” It is located down a private drive surrounded by beautiful horses and other animals. We are close to I-26 and the airport. Restaurants and theaters are 5 minutes away.
**Due to the beginning of a housing construction project in the acreage behind us, there could be possible noise from Monday thru Friday. Be aware of this before you book.

name: 10 Minutes to Downtown & Biltmore, Next to Parkway
description:
Pets are welcome with $75 per pet fee!
This private family-friendly residence is tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area just a few minutes south of Asheville. Our peaceful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is ready for your next great family adventure. We’ve made a peaceful place for you to relax! Our home offers all of the amenities you'd expect from a great vacation getaway without the hassles of crowds and hotels. Come and see why Asheville is the best!

name: Historic Grove Park - Apt #4
description:
Historic apartment in the Grove Park area of Asheville. Convenient to downtown and Charlotte Street eateries.

Classically decorated, this unit has a full kitchen, dining room, living room, sunroom, king size bed and full bath.

This rental has a minimum 30-day rental.

name: Mountain View’s  with Hot Tub & Firepit
description: Escape to our cozy mountain cottage, just a half-mile from Pisgah National Forest's trails. Enjoy an open floor plan perfect for gatherings, stunning views from the deck, and a relaxing soak in the hot tub. This 3-bedroom retreat, complete with "Fixer Upper" style finishes, is only 15 minutes from Asheville and offers multiple outdoor spaces, including a fire pit and shuffleboard. Pet-friendly with easy check-in, it's your perfect blend of comfort and adventure.

name: Cheryl's W. Asheville Chalet
description: Close to Haywood Rd. (the high street of West Asheville), 15 mins. from downtown Asheville,  near the airport, the AT, French Broad River, New Belgium & Sierra Nevada Breweries, and River Arts District. You’ll love the brand new space with a private entrance and deck; it's in the heart of W. Asheville but on a quiet street with back yard; the bed and bath are spacious with all the info. you'll need for your stay in Asheville,  and wifi; good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Asheville-Mountain Views-Full Kitchen- 1 1/2 baths
description: Hikers Hideaway Airbnb in South Asheville is a peaceful, private slice of heaven overlooking beautiful mountains.  Located only 15 - 20 minutes from Biltmore Estate and Downtown Asheville, we are close to the Blue Ridge Parkway, hiking trails, waterfalls, mountain biking, tubing and other adventures.  Enjoy local breweries, food and music as our location is central to many venues.   The Airbnb is best suited for couples, small families or friends looking to get away.

name: Clean & Private Bungalow in W. AVL with Hot Tub
description: Welcome to our private apartment in hip West Asheville. Please note that detailed cleaning and precautions are taken seriously for your and our safety. This peaceful retreat is in walking distance to historic West Asheville.  Downtown Asheville, breweries and the River Arts District are a short drive or bike ride away.  The Blue Ridge Parkway and hiking trails are only 20 minutes for the adventurous explorers.  Come experience the beauty of Western North Carolina & our home.

name: Quaint Home-20 min downtown AVL and Biltmore House
description: Arts & Crafts style home in quiet neighborhood with 2 bedrooms, 2 baths plus an office which will accommodate my queen-size air bed.  After sight-seeing, come home to a welcoming 9' x 30' porch with rockers, a home with hardwood floors, gas fireplace, fire pit, granite countertops, ceramic tile and all the amenities. Be on the Blue Ridge Parkway in 15 minutes, downtown and the Biltmore House in 20 minutes. 10 minutes from the airport. Pet friendly!

name: Clean and Cozy Country Garden Getaway with Hot Tub
description:
Welcome to the Country Garden Getaway! The perfect nature lovers escape to Asheville. Sit on the porch and enjoy a cup of coffee while listening to the bird songs and an idyllic view of the mountains or enjoy the private hot tub.

Located just 10 miles from downtown, you can experience the tranquility of WNC while being in a convenient location, or go all out nature on this trip with being 5 mins from the famous Blue Ridge Parkway.

We have New Co-Host Management, which up's the game here!

name: Clean & Spacious Apartment w/Full Kitchen & W/D
description:
