This beautifully renovated apartment is 5 minutes to the heart of trendy West Asheville's shops, pubs & restaurants, and is only 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. This quiet, spacious & private apartment has an open floor plan, a full kitchen & a private bathroom. Fully furnished, supplied and equipped for a great stay!
The apartment is totally independent and self-sufficient. Guests also have access to an outdoor sitting area.

name: Female Dorm Bunk at BPS Youth Hostel
description:
This is for one bed in the female/women's dorm Bon Paul and Sharky's Hostel. The dorm can sleep up to five people. We also have a co-ed dorm. This is the female only dorm. Please check our other listings should you need different accommodations.

We have off street parking behind the hostel.

We provide linens and towels.

name: Heart of Downtown with Parking - Bright, Historic
description: Fabulous, sunny, 660 square foot 1 bedroom apartment in a 1920's historic home. Epicenter of the restaurant and brewery scene, everything is steps away. Private parking. Second floor with large windows and hardwood floors. Same building as our other listings. Bedroom has a comfy queen bed, with full trundle. Living room has a luxurious couch and ottoman which can also serve as a sleeper when combined. Claw foot tub with shower. Full size equipped kitchen. Roku TV with Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, Etc.

name: Sam's Cottage
description: Cozy cottage perfect for two or a serene retreat for one!  Ideally located in the popular North Asheville area.  Truly 10 minutes to downtown, but seems a world away in the woods.  Choose to enjoy coffee or cocktails on the open deck or the shaded porch while listening to the sound of the petite waterfall and stream next to the cottage.  The cottage is located on 50 privately held acres and guests are invited to explore the woods and stream behind the house.

name: Bluebird Sanctuary. Mt view, walk downtown, W Ashe
description: Location!  Enjoy your deck at beautiful Bluebird Sanctuary, on a hill overlooking the French Broad River, New Belgium Brewery, River Arts District, and mountains in the background.  Park your car and relax in fun West Asheville. Walk 1.8 miles to downtown or hop the bus to avoid parking hassles.  The spacious rooms are filled with antiques, original art, and library.  Kick off your shoes for an acupressure massage on the river rock floors in the luxurious bathroom.  Seasonal nesting bluebirds!

name: Downtown Loft with Balcony
description:
If you're looking for a secluded mountain getaway this is not the place but if you are looking to be in the heart of downtown festivities then our loft is the perfect place for you! Our loft has local art, a small balcony, high ceilings and exposed brick. We are right in the center of all the downtown action. You are literally steps away from incredible craft beers, award-winning food and regional music. Downtown is lively especially at night where you can hang out and see a local funk band or head down to the drum circle then sleep late then head downstairs for a massage.

Luxury downtown loft on second floor of historic brick building. Sitting balcony overlooks College St.

Completely equipped kitchen
Coffee maker
Coffee & Tea provided
HDTV with Sling TV and Netflix and local channels
Wireless speaker
Pullout couch with Sealy Posturepedic mattress
Queen size bed with memory foam mattress and pillows
Washer and Dryer

name: Mama Dee's Hide Away
description:
Come stay in this inviting, immaculate, peaceful apartment located in the lower level of her house in cool green Asheville. Let Mama Dee pamper you with pound cake and other goodies on your arrival!

-10 minutes from NC Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway Biltmore Park (movies and urban village), & AVL airport
-20 minutes to the Biltmore House or Downtown Hendersonville
-25 minutes to Downtown Asheville
-30 minutes to Brevard
-5 minutes to WNC Agricultural Center
-5 minutes to Sierra Nevada brewery

name: Spacious, Garden Suite w/ Private Porch
description: Come and stay at this clean and spacious studio-sized apartment in a quieter part of West Asheville. You're only a 5-minute drive to Haywood Road, West Asheville's main drag, and only 7 minutes to downtown and the River Arts District! The Biltmore Estate is also only 12 minutes aways! You'll have your own entrance, washer and dryer and screened in porch with a great view of the blooming backyard.

name: Charming Asheville Cottage at Beaver Lake
description: This beautiful North Asheville cottage is 3.1 miles from downtown & a 2 minute walk to the lake. You'll love the indoor &  outdoor space. Whether you're here to explore funky Asheville, music, the arts, shop till you drop or explore the outdoors & nature, this private lower level English Walkout cottage is perfect for relaxation & serenity. Long stays available; we’ve only blocked dates to deep clean between guests - message us. (URL HIDDEN)City of Asheville Permit Number: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).

name: Dog-friendly Downton Annie #3
description: Browse art galleries downtown, then admire this light-filled apartment's collection of pieces inspired by the surrounding mountains and local graffiti. Pull up a floral and perspex dining chair and people-watch from the bay window over lunch.

name: Asheville Studio w/ Sleeping Loft - Walk Downtown!
description: Our private Sleeping Loft Studio is attached to our historic home, a 10 minute walk from Downtown Asheville in the Montford Neighborhood. Easy access to local cafes, coffee shops, bars, the Greenway, and UNCA. Set on 1/2 acre with expansive lawn and garden, the space itself is well-lit with an eco/tiny house vibe! Ideal for solo adventurers, couples that love unique, tiny spaces & business travelers. We invite kid, puppy, and LGBTQ friendly folks to be our guests (no additional pets, please).

name: Asheville Cottage With All the Comforts of Home
description: My place is close to the airport and family-friendly activities. Walking distance to great restaurants. 10 minutes to Biltmore House, 15 to downtown Asheville. Super comfy, excellent location. Privacy and convenience for your awesome vacation. Two bedrooms upstairs (spiral stairs) as well as the large full bath. 1/2 bath located on main level with laundry. If you have a need for more space, the house next door may be available.

name: Dog-friendly Downton Annie #2
description: Recline on a hip sofa within an uncluttered living room boasting mid-century furnishings bathed in daylight from bay windows. Funky abstract artworks, rich hardwood floors, and modern accents unite for an air of buoyancy within this colorful home.

name: Dog-friendly Downton Annie #1
description: Make breakfast in a renovated kitchen with upgraded appliances and sit in multicolored chairs in a sunny bay window. Lively red accents are found throughout the apartment, from patterned bedroom cushions to a pair of family size laundry machines.

name: West Asheville corridor. Walk everywhere!
description: Easy and comfortable as it gets. Conveniently located less than one block off Haywood road. Private drive. Private entrance. Private bathroom. Kitchenette. Large room with vaulted ceilings. Roku. Super clean and cozy. You can't beat this location. Bakery, pubs, restaurants, coffee shops, game rooms, salons, breweries, all 2 min walk away yet astoundingly private!

name: Lovely Space//Private Entrance and Bath
description:
Close to Biltmore, Downtown, and the Parkway! This lovely light filled room has a private entrance and bath, queen sized bed, wardrobe, mini-fridge, and a sweet porch to boot! Located just south of the Biltmore House, 10 minutes to downtown, less than 10 minutes to Mission Hospital, and right down the road from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Come explore Asheville and stay in a clean, modern, comfortable space!


For longer stays I may open up my kitchen, but require some agreements. Let's message.

name: Private flat w/ Kitchenette & bathroom, Monthly
description:
My place is walking distance to bars, restaurants, greenways and the West Asheville Farmer's market. The home is 2 miles from the River Art's District where you can experience local artists, music and family-friendly activities. I am happy to help you coordinate hiking and river trips while you are in town.

I live upstairs and work full time. I am up early 6am and may work late. If you are a light sleeper, or using the space as a vacation hide away, this may not be the place for you.

name: THE SWEET SPOT- serene hilltop, close to downtown
description:
Serene hilltop residence with panoramic view of the Blue Ridge mountains and a remarkable view of the Biltmore estate. Well stocked kitchen for entertaining or celebrating a special life event or a perfect place for quiet reflection in a romantic setting.
*Drive 10 minutes or < to -
Downtown shopping, theater
Art district
Biltmore
NC Arboretum
Zen Tubing - French Broad River
Lake Powhatan - swimming
Blue Ridge Parkway
Fly fishing
*No children between the ages of 5 mos. and 7 yrs. No pets.

name: West Asheville Dream Bungalow Apartment
description: As artists and builders, we created this unique space for ourselves. This space is part of a remodeled Arts and Crafts bungalow with a separate entrance, plus a cooking area. We love calling this home, where we easily walk to "downtown" West Asheville. We are right off of Haywood Rd. This hip part of town has much to offer: nightlife, music, public transportation, restaurants, coffee shops, brewpubs, a teahouse, and much more. Plus, downtown Asheville is only a 10 minute drive!

name: Historic Grove Stone Cottage, EW Grove
description: Convenient comfortable oasis for relaxation and rest after exploring AVL.  Easy access to downtown, Biltmore , Grove Park Inn, breweries and hiking. Bustling area of East AVL, walking distance to good food.  Dog friendly with large fenced yard.  Fire pit (firewood provided) and grill for your enjoyment.  Host onsite in private apt.

name: Cottage at Green Oaks Community
description:
The heart of downtown Asheville is less than 10 min. away! All the areas hotspots are super close to our 5 acres. Be it live music, breweries on the river, tubing, zip lining, fab restaurants, hiking, the Blue Ridge Parkway, spas, hot springs or what have you...the Cottage will be your perfect getaway.
Great for adventurers, lovers, writers, artists & tree huggers.

name: Liberty Cottage
description:
The cottage is close to everything Asheville has to offer. Walk or bike to Biltmore Village or The Biltmore Estate or take a quick drive downtown or to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Close to library and park with tennis courts and playground.
Family friendly neighborhood with sidewalks.
Owners are professionals and live in main house with two young children.
Bedrooms have full beds. Common area has twin daybed.
Parking for one car.
*Recently upgraded internet for better work from home experience.

name: Downtown Furnished Studio!! Close to Everything!!!
description: Near Downtown Asheville and Mission Hospital. Call today to reserve this immaculate and chic-furnished efficiency-only 3 walking blocks to the Center of Downtown Asheville. This adorable turn key rental provides everything you need. Monthly rental or up to 6 month rental contracts available today. Utilities included, high speed internet, Netflix,  A/C / heating, kitchenette, refrigerator, stove, Keurig, dishwasher, Queen bed, full bath, washer/dryer. Parking . Privacy w/ downtown convenience!

name: "B Flat" Downtown! Private parking!
description: This adorable throwback flat is located IN downtown. Private parking, walk everywhere downtown. Epicenter of the south slope, walk to all breweries within minutes. Orange Peel & Asheville Yards (former Rabbit Rabbit) venues just a 3 minute walk...we are right in the middle, get in early and you can hear warm up from Asheville Yards. Second floor, 440 SQ FT apartment in historic house. 1 bedroom, living room with sectional/sofa bed, roku TV, full kitchen and bathroom with claw foot tub & shower.

name: The Lavender Room
description: My place is close to public transport, parks, and art and culture. You’ll love my place because it's in walking distance to all of West Asheville's must-see spots, and a short drive to great hikes and waterfalls.

name: Viewy West Side Garden Apartment
description: This basement level suite is a clean, new-built space with lots of natural light, privacy and views of our urban homestead and the mountains beyond. It is the perfect spot from which to explore Asheville and the surrounding area. Located just 2 miles from downtown, it is an easy walk to the French Broad River as well as the many restaurants and shops of West Asheville. This space is great for couples, families, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Le Petit Bleu
description: Le Petit Bleu is a warm, color-filled, cozy artisan cottage. The home is pet friendly w bamboo floors and tile. We offer a coffee/espresso machine, fully stocked kitchen, plush comfy bathrobes, aromatherapy vaporizer w essential oils, Sealy Posturepedic pillow-top king sized beds in both bedrooms each w four pillows, a large covered deck w privacy curtains, twinkle lights, a bistro set, and a fenced back yard.  We are 5 minutes by car  from downtown Asheville and its wonderful art and culture.

name: Spacious bedroom in the heart of West Asheville
description: Have your own private sleeping quarters just a stone's throw from everything West Asheville has to offer! You can surprisingly enjoy a quiet walk down my street; however at the end of the street is Haywood-home to numerous cafes, bars, & restaurants! Additionally, you are 2miles from downtown & 10 minutes from the Blueridge Prkwy.  Under 'The Space' click on 'more' & read EVERYTHING under Guest Access, & if you have questions or need more details, please message me via AirBnB prior to booking.

name: Cozy, private suite.  Centrally located.
description:
Our home is located in a beautiful, safe neighborhood of single family homes on the municipal golf course in east Asheville. We are located two miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway, four miles to downtown or to the Biltmore House, seven miles to the River Arts District. Easy access to the interstate makes our home convenient to all area attractions.
Honoring diversity is one of our highest values and we welcome all to our airbnb space.

name: CozyCottageWalk MuscYga
description: Welcome-the heart of town. Help Aville recover. Visit NOW. NO hidden/clean fees. Walk-Food&Music. Cozy home yoga/meditation, outdoor/art/music explorers;  WORKSHOPS - contact to stay extra days. Arboretum,  GrovePkInn views, Hike Mntns to Sea trail, drive  blue ridge pkway.( some limits)  Contact 4 longer yoga stay. Please leave SMOKE/VAPE/DRUGS at home. Natural Older, clean home with character. WholeHome waterfilter. Small room, full comfy orgmattress.  FringeFest3-16

name: Cozy Cottage with Fenced Yard Close to Downtown!
description:
Enjoy mountain views while 4-legged friends run free in the fenced backyard. Restored in 2015, this charming 1960s ranch features two queen bedrooms, a queen sleeper sofa, local art, and fun pieces such as a safe repurposed as a table. Situated on a large lot in a quiet neighborhood, this property affords total privacy. Only a mile from stores & restaurants. Convenient to The Blue Ridge Parkway, Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, and Lake Lure.
($60 pet fee for up to 3 dogs)

name: Bear's Den in Historic Montford
description:
Hello! Our amazing community is rebuilding following Hurricane Helene & we are once again offering our lovely space in Historic Montford, just a short walk to downtown Asheville! The cozy, bright space is well-appointed with a private entrance & two decks overlooking a beautiful ravine of foliage. The space is very private but if you need anything at all (including a local’s insider tips!) just be in touch.
As your hosts, your comfort is #1 for us!
See you soon,
Ashley & Jeff

name: The Space Between Downtown Asheville & RAD
description:
Located in the space between Downtown AVL and the River Arts District, the sidewalk in front of the apartment's cozy screened in porch will take you to both areas. Enjoy the excitement of the city and the ease of living like a local during your stay.

Infant friendly (6 months and under) and no pets policy strictly enforced.

Curate, Harrah's, Orange Peel, Burial, Wicked Weed = 1 - 1.1 miles
The Grey Eagle = 0.4 miles
Asheville Yards, New Belgium, Wedge = 0.5 miles
Biltmore = 2.8 miles

name: Spacious Basement Apt—2 Quiet Acres near Airport
description: Our 1BD, 1 BA huge basement apartment is loaded with comfort, convenience, natural light, privacy and modern touches. Sleeps up to 6 (we recommend 4 adults but have had 6 comfortably per many guest’s feedback). Feel like you are in the country with mountain views from the driveway, yet we are 5 mins from Biltmore Park, 10 mins—Sierra Nevada, 15–Avl Outlets and 18-20 mins—Downtown Asheville. Kids love our play set and swing! We are an active family, with young kids who live above...welcome!!

name: Nanny's Place! HOT TUB and 2 fire pits!
description: Clean, safe, peaceful 1970's ranch style home located just 2.5 miles to shops & dining in Biltmore Village and Biltmore Estate main gate, 2 miles to Blue Ridge parkway,  5 miles to downtown and The River Arts District; grocery, restaurants and delicious coffee less than 3 miles away. Well appointed kitchen, lots of space, 3BR/2BA, super comfy beds. TWO FIREPITS and HOT TUB! Great for couples  / business travelers / friends getaway / family reconnect-time or SOLO retreats.

name: City Serenity
description:
Private terrace level suite in my partially renovated home. Two bedrooms, one bath, living room, kitchen/dining room, computer work stations. Quiet neighborhood convenient to downtown, interstate and much more. Owner space upstairs in this urban duplex.
Private entrance, living room with large window view of woods. Off street parking. Welcome pitcher cold filtered water. One mile hilly walk or quick uber ride to center of downtown, restaurants, music venues. Supercharger 3 miles.

name: Downtown Area | Walk to Restaurants & Breweries
description:
Quaint modern two bedroom, one bath apartment close to everything downtown as well as grocery stores and breweries.

We are walking distance to the center of downtown, Trader Joes, Whole Foods and numerous restaurants, coffee shops and breweries.

name: DOWNTOWN! Seconds from it all!
description: This beautiful, downtown hideaway is perfect for a couple, or a few friends that want to enjoy the perfect stay in Asheville. Fully equipped kitchen, coffee maker, wifi, clean and spacious,  and a few steps from all the shops, bars, and restaurants! Our new cleaning staff is amazing!!!

name: Modern Mountain Getaway
description:
Cozy modern apartment with a walk out patio view of our forested back yard. Comfortably simple to suit a traveler's needs.

Located in a safe, quiet, wooded neighborhood that is perfect for walking. Hiking trails on property with occasional visits from foxes, bears, and turkeys.

Public transit access & less than 2 miles from Downtown Asheville and Biltmore Village. Uber & Lyft are both available, quick and affordable.

name: A Step Back in Time - 1901 Estate Guest Cottage
description: Take a step back in time in our charming, Historic Estate's Guest Cottage. Our cottage is approx 500 SF, 100 years old, w/ a cabin-like charm & peaceful surroundings. FREE PARKING & FREE WASH AND FOLD LAUNDRY SERVICE. We are in close proximity to major attractions like The Biltmore House & Downtown Asheville. We have an Extremely comfortable queen bed, a fully-equipped kitchenette, closet space. Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC #1-King
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away.  We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

name: Historic West Asheville Personal Retreat and Spa
description: Historic West Asheville. Walking distance of coffee shops, breweries, restaurants, music venues; 2-min drive to downtown Asheville. Private apt: king bed suite, bath, partial kitchen/dining with coffee/tea, fridge, toaster, small cooktop. Pamper yourself:  steam shower, sauna, hot tub, terrycloth robes . Screened in porch, private entrance.

name: D&D's Dog-friendly West Asheville AirBnb
description:
Private floor with a separate entrance in prime West Asheville. One bedroom, roomy suite plus living room and kitchenette. Just a 4 minute stroll to Haywood Rd with plenty of shops, restaurants, bars, and cafes. Only an 8 min drive to downtown! The space is dog and kid friendly.

Details:
-1 BR with queen bed
-Couch in large living room converts to king size bed
-Kitchenette w/fridge, sink, cooking tools, etc
-Private fenced backyard
-On+off-street parking

name: Cabin-Wood Fireplace-Hot Tub-Pool-Pet Friendly
description: Our Cabin is close to hiking, shopping, grocery, golfing, restaurants, basically everything.  You will  love Deer Haven because of it's beauty nestlled in a quiet neighborhood surrounded by national forest. Enjoy a fire in the wood fireplace, eat popcorn and enjoy a movie or a game of checkers or sit in the hot tub and study the universe. Go snow skiing or feel lucky and go to the caniso.  It’s not unusual to see deer looking for a handout.

name: Quiet Haven Tiny House-Hottub-Pets- Asheville Mtns
description: Our Tiny House  is located a short 15 minute drive from downtown Asheville but yet it has a countryside setting.  Asheville attractions/restaurants will fill your day with excitement.  Come home, grill a juicy steak, build a bonfire, enjoy the hot tub or settle down in a nice comfy bed to a Netflix movie.  It’s your choice, we try to make your visit as relaxing as possible.  Thank you and we hope you will choose our Quiet Haven Tiny Home.  C u soon.

name: Mountain Views/Family Retreat
description:
Everywhere you want to visit in Asheville is open and waiting for you! (1/1/2025)

Our home is in a country-like setting w/mountain views. We are 6 miles from downtown Asheville, 3 miles to Warren Wilson College, 1 mile from hiking, 4 mi. to B. R. Parkway and the Folk Art Center. Restaurants, shopping, music, art, golfing, tennis, and river rafting nearby.

Fully equipped kitchen. 2 fireplaces, 2 bedrooms w/ 1 king & 1 queen w/shades on windows. 1 convertible chaise lounge & 2 full baths.

name: Asheville Garden Cottage ~ One Night Stays Welcome
description: The Cottage is perfectly located! Only 3.8mi center of Asheville, 2.5mi to the Blue Ridge Pkwy, 4mi to Biltmore Estate, and 5mi to the River Arts District! Escape it all or go to town for dinner, before retreating back home to your oasis! I have kept a simple clutter-free layout to promote comfort and coziness, with a touch of local art, filled with natural light and the sounds of local birds. The cottage is for anyone seeking privacy, nature, and easy access to all that Asheville has to offer!

name: Happy Hippie House: Walk to Restaurants/Shops/Bars
description:
Totally groovy!

Great, West Asheville location that is walkable to shops, restaurants, and bars! A 7-minute drive to downtown.

name: City Sanctuary
description: My place is close to the city center, restaurants, dining, great views, art, culture, and parks in a quiet neighborhood. You’ll love my place because  your accommodation is within a 10 minute walk to College St and City County Plaza in the heart of Asheville. On your walk to town you will view the city  set in the beauty  of the mountains. After a day of touring, hiking or river activities, you can sit in an outside grotto and relax before an evening on the town or a relaxing nights rest.

name: Country Log Cabin-15 min to Asheville
description:
Cozy Custom Built Log Cabin..
There's a Handmade Maple Breakfast Bar to start your day and a Handmade Black Walnut Hi-Top to enjoy a drink and while away the night! Our custom built 9 ft. "Cave" Shower is not to be missed. Located just minutes from downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Pkwy, experience a wonderful rural retreat while being just a few miles from all the area has to offer! We hope you'll enjoy "The Little Dog" as much as we do!

name: Comfortable Home near to Asheville Airport.
description:
My place is close to (Halfway between Asheville and Hendersonville) 1/2 mile from Asheville airport.
Downtown Asheville, 20 minutes from house, is an extremely popular tourist destination. Lots of great food, beverages, street musicians, antique stores.

BILTMORE ESTATE and Winery
Premier destination for most visitors. Where the largest mansion in North America resides--tours daily.

HENDERSONVILLE
Is known for its apple orchards, picking and festival. Sliding Rock, water falls, etc.

name: Downtown Retreat in the heart of Asheville
description: Serene and private fully-furnished guest house in the heart of downtown Asheville. Quiet space in the middle of all the action. 2 bedroom with King size master.  Walk to all the best restaurants, shops, art galleries, music and pop up markets. Biltmore, Grove Park and the Blue Ridge Parkway are just a short drive away.

name: Downtown hideaway! Walk everywhere!
description:
Comfy surroundings, private entry, off street parking, walk to all downtown shops, restaurants, and bars! I love living here, and I wouldn't trade it for anything! I cannot wait to share its magic with you!!!
***our new cleaning staff is amazing!!! I’m at your service during your stay!***

name: Wooded Sanctuary | 5 Mins to Downtown Asheville
description:
Your Asheville adventure begins here! Relax in a peaceful wooded retreat just minutes from downtown’s best restaurants, cafes, and nightlife, and only a short drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Ideal for couples, solo travelers, and business guests looking for a serene, central home base after days full of discovery.

While our area experienced Helene's impact, we’re grateful that this peaceful space remains safe, welcoming, and ready for your stay.

name: Apt Close to Everything in Asheville- $1600/mo!!
description:
Located in convenient West Asheville, this unique 650 square foot apartment rests atop a private home overlooking the River Arts District.
Our neighborhood is quiet but eclectic with a short walk to lively Haywood Rd with its many eateries & bars.
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. It is not suitable for children or pets.

name: The Snook Nook ~ A Mountain Retreat In Asheville
description:
The Snook Nook is perfectly located just 3 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 8 miles from downtown Asheville. Just hop on the Parkway and have an Appalachian adventure or visit the hottest town the South has to offer as it slowly opens its doors.

One important thing to note - we live above the Snook Nook with our two kiddos and two pups. We do our best to keep the noise level down when guests are here, but you will probably hear some footsteps above.

name: Namaste Yurt, best of both worlds
description: Our first yurt was such a success we had to do another one.  This is a unique property that allows you to be close to nature and not skimp on amenities.  Though you will feel you are remote, you will be only 15-20 minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore, Black Mountain, multiple breweries and restaurants.   The Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains to Sea Trail will be literally right out the door.

name: New Monthly Guest House - great Asheville Retreat!
description: Totally Furnished - enjoy our warm, cozy guest house.  Located in "trendy" West Asheville. Walk to the village market, coffee cafes, restaurants, craft breweries, and more. Experience the “Asheville Vibe”. This “getaway” was architecturally designed and professionally decorated giving you the feeling of being in a cabin retreat! This is our personal getaway when we visit Asheville. Your experience will be magical! All Utilities Included! This is a monthly rental (beginning to the end of month).

name: Cozy Upper-Level Apartment! Walk To Attractions!
description:
PMI Blue Ridge invites you to The West Nest!
Located on Haywood Road in the heart of West Asheville, this cozy yet bright efficiency apartment is walkable/bikeable to restaurants, clubs, music, the River Arts District, breweries and downtown Asheville. Our place is recently renovated and professionally furnished by Village Antiques, with a great patio that offers city and mountain views. The West Nest is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Private studio near downtown, Biltmore & breweries
description:
Clean and comfy, bright and cozy studio with gorgeous bamboo floors just 7 minutes to downtown, walking distance to Biltmore Village, 5 minutes from 8 major breweries and the Biltmore Estate! Check out all my awesome reviews, this is the real deal, I'm a Super Host for a reason! Full size memory foam bed. TV/DVD with a Roku and 300 DVD's and wifi.

Private/separate unit with private entrance and parking, quiet neighborhood. Great for couples or solo travelers, can fit a small family.

name: The RAD Haus: Central, Lively, Comfortable
description:
★ "The location was incredible for hikes in the morning, brewery hopping in the afternoon, and great dining options in the evening. Super cozy and inviting space!"

✴ Fully equipped kitchen
✴ Snacks provided (granola bars, coffee)
✴ King bedroom with blackout curtains
✴ Private parking (2 cars)
✴ Walk, bike or drive >2 miles to downtown
✴ 500 mbps internet connection
✴ Early check-in & late check-out available

name: Cozy, quiet retreat near Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 bed
description:
Cozy, quiet retreat near Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 bed, 1 bath,close to town!
Our place is close to parks, great views, art and culture, restaurants and dining, and breweries. From our house you are moments away from the Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, French Broad River. Downtown is 15 minutes away by car. The new Asheville Outlet Mall is 5 minutes away.You’ll love our place because of it’s convenient location. Accommodates 4 or less guests. Must be 21 years of age. No heavy traffic allowed.

name: Windsor Forest Inn(Sierra Nevada 3 miles away!)
description:
Sparkling clean! Between Asheville and charming Hendersonville Near I26, WNC AG Center, restaurants, Outlet mall and Biltmore House, Blue Ridge Mtns,the BEST hiking trails. 1 mile from AVL regional airport . A kitchenette in lounging room with microwave, toaster, small fridge, sink, coffee maker, french roast coffee, cream , condiments, plasticware & plates,bottled water in fridge.
You’ll love our quiet, neat neighborhood, welcoming, deep comfort permeating the Windsor Forest Inn.

name: The Treehouse Below - Private Apartment / Entrance
description:
Cosy apartment downstairs at the Treehouse. Private access, bedroom, bathroom, living area and kitchenette.

Private deck with woodland view with access to Kitchenette and living area.

Shower bathroom with washing machine and dryer.

name: Historic Church Suite in The River Arts District
description: The Ora Street Church of God, located between The River Arts District, The South Slope Brewery District, and only 1 mile from Biltmore Estate was built in the 1920s and thrived for over 80 years before being converted into our home. Enjoy a short walk to restaurants, breweries, art galleries  greenways and music. This space was formerly the pastor's study and is now your personal master suite.  We invite you to stay in our church house, one of the most unique and charming Airbnbs in Asheville.

name: Cozy Bungalow - Heart of West Asheville!
description:
Centrally located, renovated bungalow retaining some original 1920's charm. Relax outdoors on the deck or in a hammock by the community garden, or cozy firepit.

Just minutes from all the best coffee shops, restaurants, and Downtown.

name: Clouding Around - Asheville’s Panoramic View
description: Beautiful 1600 sq ft 3BR main floor accommodations with private entrance and huge private deck on the upper level of our mountain home. 3 miles high where lake, forest, mountains, valley and city lights all come together in a 180 degree spectacular panoramic view. Located 10 minutes (3 miles) from Asheville’s City life, yet private and tranquil.  Surrounded by beautiful landscaping and mountain forests. Guest’s privacy and comfort is our main goal.

name: Vibrant NEW Montford apartment- walk to downtown
description: Come enjoy our charming and consciously renovated apartment that is just a few blocks from downtown! The space is nestled in Asheville's most charming neighborhood.  A pleasant 10 minute walk through the Historic Montford district will land you in the heart of downtown Asheville, where endless eateries, music venues,  and art galleries abound.  Our dwelling is across the street from a park, and  at the end of the Reed Creek Greenway. Perfect for a couple or small family.

name: Roomy downtown condo w king bed and view!!!
description: This is the perfect romantic space for a couple or solo traveler that doesn’t need the glitz and glam of a 5 star hotel. It’s clean, cozy, the location is ideal, strong WiFi, a kitchen equipped for cooking basic meals, a great living room w tv and streaming services and more! Our new cleaning staff is amazing !!!!

name: Cozy Tiny House Cabin Near Downtown and Blue Ridge
description: Cozy, spacious, and beautifully designed tiny cottage in the trees!  Wake to windows full of sky and songbirds.  Enjoy your morning coffee on the back deck for a chance to see mama bear with cubs foraging in the ravine.  It's located behind my personal residence in a sweet little neighborhood only 4 minutes from downtown...(Uber is available).  Quiet and close to everything! Adults only...no pets. Monthly stays welcome through the spring and summer. Thank you!

name: Urban Hippie West Asheville Sanctuary
description: My guest suite is a cozy sanctuary in west Asheville. Private entrance and perfect for nature lovers who wants to retreat but not sacrifice convenience. Here you'll have room to stretch out & slow down. Relax on your own private porch with 2 bikes for use. My yard has winter views of Pisgah mountain. In the summer the gardens are full of unique flowers & honey bees from my hives!

name: Garden Wheel House Retreat
description:
Escape to this 1928 two-bedroom cottage filled with artistic and antique charm. This is truly a unique space that has been lovingly remodeled with heart and handmade custom furnishings. Cook a delicious meal in or order out.

Wander through the gardens and enjoy the artistic flare this property has to offer, including an outdoor dining room, patio, porch and shipping container lounge.

It is nestled in a peaceful nook, only 4 miles to Asheville and less than 10 minutes from Weaverville.

name: Sandy's Place
description: Sandy’s Place is conveniently located in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood of Asheville, less than 5 minutes from downtown, the Biltmore Estate, and the River Arts District.  Asheville is known for its award winning restaurants, coffee shops, art galleries, music venues, theatre, craft breweries and abundant outdoor recreational opportunities. Our space is the perfect home base for couples, families, and business travelers looking to explore all that Asheville has to offer.

name: Retro Asheville Ranch - 3 bedrooms, lots of room!
description: Minutes from Sierra Nevada, Biltmore, Bent Creek, Downtown and airport! Spacious, bright, private, and comfortable for up to six people. Carport, fast wifi, washer/dryer, and tons of cable alternatives (Netflix, HBO, Amazon Prime, etc). Large backyard is great for kids, and walking distance to nearby trail system. Enjoy coffee in the sun room or cocktails in the gazebo. Next to 12 Bones BBQ South and Rocky's Hot Chicken!

name: Comfortable bedroom/bathroom 10 mins from downtown
description:
Comfortable bedroom/bathroom
for 2 that is walking distance to historic West Asheville where one can experience fine dining and exotic nightlife, while being just 10 mins from downtown. There is also access to shared kitchen and living room with owner

name: Urban Nest - Best Location, Comfort and Modern
description:
Our condo, right in the heart of downtown Asheville, is the perfect getaway for digital nomads. You literally can’t beat our fantastic location. Great bars, coffee shops, breweries, dozens of terrific restaurants, The Asheville Art Museum, Pack Square, Spa Theology (a real treat for the weary!) - all are within a short walk from the Urban Nest. If you're too tired to go out after a long day on the laptop, just ride down the elevator that opens into the popular Lobster Trap. If you're out hiking or taking in the sights, come home to a cozy, stylish, comfortable landing pad, with elegant granite

What is just outside our door? The ever popular Lobster Trap is in the first floor of our building - people line up here nightly to get some of their freshly flown in seafood. Out the other entrance you'll see Table Restaurant, Imperial Life Bar, the Vault and the old time Mediterranean Diner. Tops Shoes has been drawing shoppers to Asheville for years - it is across the street. One bl

name: Private Suite: Walk to Biltmore and Breweries
description: Post-Helene Update: If you are visiting Asheville and all that our beautiful city and WNC have to offer, we look forward to having you. Our local economy (ourselves included) is excited to have you back as we rebuild.

name: Live in a Work of Art!
description:
Live in a Work of Art! Enjoy eclectic period decor, with all the modern amenities. A beautiful 10 minute walk to downtown, restaurants, grocery stores, bike and walking trails, and all the vibrant culture that Asheville has to offer.
Feel free to contact with any questions about dates, or anything else, before booking!

name: Comfy Asheville Cottage with Private Fenced Yard
description: This is a clean modern cottage in a quiet natural setting, good for couples, families or small reunions. Built in 2017, this comfy house has fast wifi with dog-friendly, fully-fenced lot. Located 6 min. to downtown West Asheville, 12 min. to downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate. Close to Bob Lewis Sports Park, NC Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway, Tanger outlets, Buncombe County Sports Park, WNC Farmers Market, I-40 and I-26. Full kitchen, washer/dryer, a/c, sleeps up to 6.

name: West Asheville Carriage House
description: Tastefully decorated & furnished West Asheville rental. The apartment is located on the ground floor. Ample parking. Two Bedrooms and one bath. One Queen sized bed, one King sized bed. Luxury linens provided. Professionally cleaned between stays. 1 flat screen tv with cable and internet. Kitchen is stocked for your cooking needs. Close to Haywood Road, Malvern Hills park, and a very short drive to downtown Asheville.

name: Modern Loft in Heart of Downtown
description: This uniquely renovated, loft style condominium is located in the heart of downtown Asheville. The loft is walking distance to locally owned shops, restaurants, art galleries, theaters, music venues, breweries, and grocers. Downtown Asheville is a happening place, but if you're looking to get out for the day, its only a 15 minute drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway to find breath-taking views and hikes.

name: South Asheville private entry apartment w garage
description: Private apartment close to the airport, hiking, and breweries. Private entrance with garage in a nice neighborhood. Living room with futon couch and a smart tv. Queen bedroom with bathroom, large closet, desk, and full kitchen.  Washer/dryer in unit. The garage is the only shared space as I use it for storage. Located approximately 5 minutes to Biltmore Park, about 15 minutes to downtown Asheville. Well behaved pets welcome for a fee. No smoking on the property please.

name: Spacious and Walkable West Asheville Home
description: This beautiful and comfortable four bedroom and three bath family home is adjacent to the woods on two sides yet a short walk to all the action West Asheville has to offer and three miles to Downtown Asheville.Enjoy excellent restaurants, craft breweries, galleries, music venues, and fantastic hiking and winter sports activities from a spacious, bright, and cheerful home. Minimum 30 day rental.

name: Cozy Room
description: This is one bedroom in a 3 bedroom house in West Asheville.  I run a local tour company called Cedar Rock Adventures that offers brewery tours by raft and canoe.  Come enjoy me for an adventure.  I enjoy hosting and can recommend great hikes, dining experiences, and the local brews. I can also just provide you with a place to crash.  I am 1 mile from heart of West Asheville and 3 miles to downtown.

name: Asheville Central and River Arts Adjacent
description: Hi! Please READ ALL before you book :) This is a private master bedroom INSIDE THE BACK PART OF OUR HOME with its own private keypad entrance/bathroom/off-street parking. We’re very conscientious about guests' privacy but we’re a large active family, so guests may see us/hear us at times. We are centrally located in Asheville in a dense old urban neighborhood. It’s a 3 min drive to River Arts/5 min to downtown/7 min to Biltmore Estate gate. *Best fit for guests who spend more time out than in!*

name: Downtown Oasis on Forsythe (NO Cleaning fee)
description: Our quiet, comfortable, basement apartment is walkable to downtown Asheville, Montford, UNCA, nightlife, public transit, city center, Harrah’s Cherokee Center and parks. Grove Park Inn is a mile and a half if you're up for the walk or it is an easy drive.  You’ll love the neighborhood and ease of access to downtown, breweries, Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn, hiking, biking, and all things outdoors.  Great rental for couples, families (with kids), or solo adventurers. Come see for yourself!

name: Oasis in the City
description:
Newly constructed, contemporary Craftsman style house in the heart of West Asheville. Situated on a half acre organic homestead with edible landscaping, fruit trees, bees and chickens. Incredible views of downtown and the mountains. Walk to eclectic restaurants, breweries and coffee shops. Located in a quiet neighborhood just a short 5 minute walk to New Belgium Brewery and all that West Asheville has to offer plus downtown minutes away.
****Brand new high quality memory foam mattress****

name: Charming Cottage Located Near Downtown Asheville
description: Right on the doorstep of downtown Asheville! This Asheville cottage mountain retreat, nestled within Chunns Cove, in the spectacular Blue Ridge Mountains, offers a relaxing and invigorating escape.

name: Newly Built 3BR Home in Asheville
description: Experience the ultimate in luxury at our newly constructed 3-bedroom retreat in Asheville. Upstream Cottage offers breathtaking views of the French Broad River and is just minutes away from downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, and an array of dining and shopping options. This private home is a haven for outdoor enthusiasts. It is close to the River Arts District, Climbmax climbing gym, and river access for kayaking, tubing, and paddle boarding.

name: Cedar Cabin | Screened in Deck | Quiet | Downtown
description: Modern cedar cabin just 2 miles from downtown Asheville. Floor-to-ceiling windows bring the forest indoors while vaulted wood ceilings, rustic charm, and thoughtful design create a warm, open feel. Relax by the fireplace, on the screened porch, or dine outside under the trees. Quiet, private, and well-stocked for a restorative stay.

name: Clean, Comfy and Convenient S. Asheville Condo
description: Located just between the Airport and the Biltmore Estate, we are just 11 miles (and 4 million trees) from downtown Asheville.  Our place is no stranger to nature, but we're just a stone's throw away from a variety of popular shopping and dining choices. Traveling with friends, for business or with family? All are welcome here.

name: Downtown Escape!
description: This is not a 5 star hotel, but this centrally located gem cannot be beat for the price! Comfy, quant, stocked for cooking basic meals, queen bed and a great shower! Come and stay with us. I’m at your service.

name: Garden Oasis with Serene Mountain View Downtown!
description: Beautiful custom built space!! Tastefully decorated, first class accommodations on the mountain overlooking Asheville. WE CLEAN COVID CLEAN, leaving the space feeling fresh and inviting for each guest! Exposed rock wall opposite original outside wall; just a couple of the details that give this listing a unique and comfortable feel. Beautiful mountain views above with city lights below. This charming space is a short five minutes and $5 Uber ride from downtown Asheville yet feels worlds away.

name: Explore AVL from this Stylish, Cozy Apartment
description: This fabulous apartment is located three blocks north of downtown, in the bustling Chestnut Hills neighborhood. Our lovely home was built in 1909 and completely renovated in 2017. Due to the spectacular location and massive size of the home, we decided to retain half of the first floor as a vacation rental. We invite you to kick back, relax, and spend a few days in one of the best Airbnbs in Asheville.

name: Tiny House - Giant Views
description: Airbnb PLUS approved - Minutes from downtown Asheville, with privacy and massive views. Easy access to Blue Ridge Parkway. Biltmore Estate, breweries, and hiking all nearby.

name: Skye Haven - Views! Romantic getaway 3 mi. to town
description: Stunning year-round mountain VIEWS 3 mi. to downtown, 4 mi. to Blue Ridge Parkway for a romantic getaway, honeymoon or anniversary. Nestled in nature at the top of the mtn, our home has large windows, gas fireplace, and smart TVs in living room & bedroom.   Central AC/heat, huge shower, heated bathroom floor, and NO steps! Book online or directly with owner for more savings. Inquire about SPECIALS or DISCOUNTS. Like us on FB at Skye Haven Asheville.

name: Contemporary home five minutes from downtown
description: Luxury Home Within 1.5 Miles of Downtown Asheville, Stunning Views, 100+ Windows.  My place is good for families, big groups and business groups.

name: Charming Red Roof Home In Tiny Farms
description: We welcome you to enjoy relaxing walks in our garden, fresh air, and the sound of songbirds singing through your window — all just 15 minutes from downtown!  You will love our cheerful, Two bedroom  private suite; perfect for guests looking to enjoy the best our lovely mountain town can offer.

name: ADVENTURE LAUNCH PAD
description: Wonderful hillside home with an entertainers dream backyard, and a large open floor plan.  This 3 bed 3 bath has an 80 gallon hot water heater and 2 fridges. Free frisbee golf course in neighborhood,  1.5 miles to river adventures,  2 miles to Downtown, the River Arts District or UNCA.  7 miles to the Biltmore Estate and Village, 8 miles to the Outlet Mall, 9 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway entrance.  Or stay in with all our comfortable amenities.

name: Front Porch Charm
description: Less than 4 miles to downtown Asheville in a quiet, walkable neighborhood with comfortable, shady front porch and fenced yard.  Large, fenced yard. Charming,  1920s bungalow with large kitchen and primary bath. Primary bathroom and kitchen recently updated. Original hardwood floors. Great place for large groups, all within striking distance of downtown, River Arts, French Broad River and all the breweries. Up to two dogs allowed with additional pet fee of $50.

name: Garden Apt in Historic Neighborhood of Asheville
description:
Lovely apartment located in downtown Asheville
on a tree lined street.

We are walking distance to many restaurants, bars, coffee shops, Harris Teeters and the best bakeries in town.
Minutes from walking trails, tennis courts and hiking trails.
Located at the foot of Town Mountain, the gateway to the National Park.
We are a quite couple living in a huge house. You will have private entrance and of surrey parking.

name: Family Friendly Apartment in Beautiful North Asheville
description:
*** COMPLETELY RENOVATED DECEMBER 2021!!! ***
Brand new luxury bathroom. New everything. Updates also made to room including new paint, new flooring, new linens & window treatments!

Explore Asheville from this apartment close to the Asheville Country Club. Featuring a comfortable, queen-sized bed, hand-crafted, built-in bunk beds, backyard swings, and a fire pit. This home is perfect for a family vacation.

Hand-crafted, built in bunk beds in addition to queen size bed enhance sleeping capacity to accommodate up to four guests. Private bathroom. Back door entry. BeautyCounter products complimentary for guests to use!

Guests will have access to their private room, bathroom, and the backyard.

We will greet guests upon arrival, or if not at home, there will be the key left in the lockbox at the back door. We respect the privacy of our guests but will be available throughout the stay with any questions or concerns.

Located in the

name: Historic Home Near Downtown Asheville Pvt Bed/Bath
description: Spacious light filled private room with private bath across the hall in my home, a 1912 Arts and Crafts house, in the historic Grove Park neighborhood. Within walking distance (30 minute walk), an easy drive or quick Uber to the heart of Downtown. Also very close by is the Grove Park Inn, UNC-A, Asheville Yoga Center,  2 parks, several neighborhood restaurants, a beer & wine store, and great local ice cream shop. Three grocery stores within a mile. Two blocks from public transit.

name: Mountain Chalet close to Biltmore
description: This home is so convenient to the Biltmore House you can walk about 100 feet and actually see it.  The Blue Ridge Parkway is approximately 3 miles away, Outlets for the shoppers, hiking & biking  for adventurers, Breweries for the beer lovers, Downtown Asheville is just 7 minutes, a shared pool is located on/near the grounds. So many options. Great for families and friends! We are so excited to share with our tenants this home! We also offer a whole house standby generator!

name: One Bedroom Guest Suite, Warm Relaxed Home in West Asheville
description: IDEAL LOCATION! Just a short walk to the Village Market, restaurants, cafes, breweries, music venues and shopping (Jargon, Biscuit Head, Sunny Point Café, Westville Pub). A 10-minute Uber ride to Downtown. CLEAN, BRIGHT, and lots of NATURAL LIGHT! Relax in your private guest suite with private entrance and off-street, covered parking. Use the mini kitchenette which includes micro, fridge and coffee bar to start your morning. Unwind in the afternoon on your shaded garden patio.

name: True Asheville B&B- Wall Street Room- 2nd Floor
description:
Enjoy Asheville at the Chestnut Street Inn, a true B&B just a 10 min walk to downtown Asheville, 10 min drive to the Biltmore Estate and 15 min drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway.
Featured in Food & Wine Magazine, enjoy one of our 8 exquisite bedrooms (all with private baths), delicious homemade breakfast every morning, private en-suite spa treatments, freshly baked cookies in the afternoon, local beer on tap and a rotating house port wine to sip on our incredible porches.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Private Bungalow Ten Minute Walk to Downtown Asheville
description:
Your private, spacious bungalow is located just a 10-minute walk to downtown Asheville and everything downtown has to offer. This two room suite has a lovely sitting area, dining table, Queen sized bed and Jacuzzi tub.

This bungalow is part of the adjacent Chestnut Street Inn and has received a 100% Sanitation Rating from the Department of Health & Human Services of Asheville.

This lovely apartment, located on the second floor of the cottage behind the main house, is a perfect romantic hideaway, girlfriend getaway and family-friendly escape.

Contact us if you would like any add-ons! We have a spa coordinator that can help you create custom spa treatments en-suite, we can "stock the fridge," or help get some of our local beers ready for your arrival!

Hardwood floors highlight this recently remodeled one-bedroom suite with a living room, gas "wood-burning" stove, small kitchenette complete with granite countertops, hammered nickel sink, microwa

name: Private Luxury Apartment-Asheville
description: Cozy luxury studio apartment, walk to West Asheville, ten minute drive from downtown. Relax or check out the large array of things to do in and around colorful Asheville, including visiting world class breweries, galleries, concert venues, and wilderness areas. Everyone loves Asheville. You will too.

name: Hike Bike Eat Drink Stay 3/2 Bent Creek, hot tub
description: Private 3/2 with plenty of parking, fast wifi.  Your home base for all of your Asheville Adventures.  In Bent Creek neighborhood with tons of trail access for hiking and biking.  Close to the French broad for tubing and paddle boarding.  2.5 miles from Blue Ridge parkway and minutes from outlets for shopping. Only 10 miles to downtown.  Tons of amazing restaurants and breweries to explore. Come back and relax in the 6-7 person hot tub at the end of your day.

name: Beer City Room - Heart of West Asheville
description: Heart of West Asheville, the beer city room is a 650 sqft craft beer inspired flat, using original AVL reclaimed  wood. Keyless entry, two gel-infused memory foam mattresses, walk-in closet, full bathroom with walk in shower, kitchen and spacious living room with Sleeper couch, Roku TV and High-speed WIFI. Private balcony. 5 minute walk to best food/coffee/beer in West Asheville, 5 minute Uber to River Arts District and 4 minute to downtown.

name: Charland Chalet - Family Friendly Guesthouse
description:
Please read the entire listing to ensure you enjoy your stay :)

*No Pets Currently (previously pet friendly)*

This listing is our stylish, family friendly apartment with separate entrance in the bottom half of our home. The apartment sleeps 2 people comfortably and there is room to sleep up to 6 close friends. We are 2 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway entrance that takes you to many hikes and waterfalls and no more than 10 minutes to the Biltmore and all that Asheville has to offer!

name: Magical large apartment downtown!
description: This downtown one bedroom apt location cannot be beat! Cozy, clean, queen bed, strong wifi, a kitchen equipped for cooking basic meals, a tv w. Streaming services, and all shops, breweries, music and more a short walk away

name: Unique Private Spot - Historic Home & Neighborhood
description: Welcome! Antiques + International + Funky AVL + Art + Comfort + Local tips = Your Spot to explore Asheville from historic Montford in a 120-year-old home. Private, sunny, 650 square-foot space. Relax and experience local living. Walking distance to downtown, the botanical garden and greenway. Filled with charm.  Off-street parking and private deck. Enjoy a drink, meal or good book indoors or out. Relax, play, work or plan your next adventure. Celebrate something special. Rest well.

name: Hipsters Hideaway - 2 miles to downtown
description:
FULLY ONLINE WITH POWER, WATER & INTERNET. Fenced yard. Fully equipped for homestays. What you’ll love about this space:
- 2 miles from the heart of downtown AVL
- Walking distance to three breweries
- Sunny, large living space with river valley views
- Thoughtfully equipped kitchen & laundry setup
- Excellent Wi-Fi & HVAC
- Fenced yard
-Sports fans rejoice: ESPN+, NBC Sports, Paramount+

This house has everything you need for a great visit to Asheville - you can't beat the location

name: Retreat on Town Mountain
description: You living space is an entire lower floor apartment, located on desirable Town Mountain, sitting directly above downtown, which your deck overlooks.  Our location, three minutes from downtown, is ideal for being part of everything Asheville has to offer while still being "away from it all" during your downtime.  The 1,400 sq. foot space includes a fireplace, large windows, flat screen TV, full bath, kitchenette and a 700 sq. foot walk out deck to enjoy your morning coffee or to watch the sunset.

name: Higher Above Asheville
description: BEST OF BOTH WORLDS: SUNSET VIEWS OF CITY AND MOUNTAINS,  EASY WALK TO DOWNTOWN. Modern, Two bedroom, one bath, spectacular views, one mile to downtown. Nestled on a mountain overlooking downtown Asheville and the Smoky Mountains, this renovated 1930's bungalow house offers spectacular views year-round, contemporary design and great location – only one mile from downtown. Gourmet restaurants and unique shopping are accessible by foot or a short drive. Enjoy intimate, relaxing evenings and dinner

name: The West Asheville Loft
description: Sunny loft apartment in West Asheville, tucked behind our office. This little 1937 gem has just been completely renovated and is as crisp and clean as they come! Lush linens, a fully stocked kitchen and a divine shower make this little get away a great place if you are looking for a private place to stay in while adventuring through Asheville. Just a 3 mile drive to downtown, the river arts district or the south slope. Only 5 miles to the Biltmore House.

name: River Arts District Comfy Getaway
description: River Arts District with Sunny Backyard and Fast Wifi to work from home easily!  Walkable to restaurants, breweries, and art!  Minutes away from the new Asheville Greenway where you can bike, run, or skate along the river.  Enjoy yourself in our friendly, beautiful, and comfortable home.  Open to longer term stays or min 28 day stays - inquire via messaging.

name: Gashes Fluss Haus
description:
Walk back past tall trees, over a small wooden bridge with built-in love seats. Massage tired feet on a polished river-rock shower floor. This rustic 2-story cottage, dating back over 100 years, has whitewashed stone walls and a wood-burning stove. This is an old farm hand house and it shares the same property with the main house.

Gashes Fluss Haus is a 117 year old coach house. The first floor is made of stone.

Please park along side the house, under the flower box.

If there's anything you need, please message me.

Surrounded by nature, the home is a short drive to downtown, West Asheville, and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Getting downtown is a 7 minute drive. Uber is around 9 dollars.

The cottage is on the same property as the hosts house.

name: Private Room at Zen Home
description:
Terrific place, located close to everything on a quiet street, is located in the up and coming River Art District and 2 miles to Pack Square and Biltmore Estates. Enjoy sitting on the front porch or up your feet up on the hammock. The house was fully redone while maintaining its historic charm. There are two rooms rented independently. Each bedroom has a King size bed.There is an outdoor/indoor cat at the house .You are renting 1 room and access to house.Jacuzzi
Homestay permit

name: Luxury Suite with Blissful Comforts
description: The private Luxury Suite/Guest House is perfect for couples, families and singles, an oasis a little over a mile from downtown with all the amenities to make your stay luxuriantly relaxing. Exceptionally comfortable king bed, extra large bathroom, walk-in closet, kitchen with breakfast nook and study nook, an outdoor patio area and a washer/dryer. Two car off-street parking. Heated floors in the bathroom and kitchen. Dedicated HVAC system, a whole house water filter.

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC #2-King
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away. We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC #4-King
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away. We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

name: Private Country Bungalow 10-12 minutes to town
description: Private country bungalow, 10-12 minutes to downtown Asheville, 5 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Clean & comfy home with flowers, turkeys, & bunnies in the yard. (Maybe even a bear!) Perfect for families or mature adults. All religions, ethnicities, LBGT welcome. Screened porch, comfy & well-designed interior, very clean, fully equipped kitchen. Memory foam beds with cotton, super-soft sheets and quilts.

name: Cozy Mountain Cottage
description:
Welcome to Asheville and to our Home! We're happy to have you as our guest and hope that you will love this area as much as we do.

We're 10 minutes to Downtown Asheville, less than 9 minutes to The Biltmore House, and 4 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

You'll be secluded enough to feel like you're out of the hustle-and-bustle of the city, but just a short drive to the life and excitement of Downtown Asheville, and many other area attractions.

Great for pet owners!

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC  #7-King
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away. We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

name: Charming Arts & Crafts home in West Asheville
description:
Asheville is resilient and so is my inviting home.
I happily welcome guests and support our community

This charming 1917 Arts and Crafts home is conveniently located at the heart of it all.
The house is situated in a historical neighborhood with views of an organic garden and mountains. It's also just a very short 5 minute walk to Downtown West Asheville for breweries, restaurants and shops.

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC #8-Double
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away. We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC #10-Double
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away. We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

name: The Red Rooster Bungalow
description: Super comfy house lots of space, close to everything Asheville has to offer. West Ashville, the river arts district, Biltmore Est. Mountains water falls are just minutes away. Walk , bike or drive to restaurants and parks like Malvern hills with a tennis courts and a play scape for kids  Walk the green belts starting at Hominy Creek and to the French broad parks and check out The River Arts district with studio tours brewery's New Belgium Brewing Company and great Barbeque. Check out 12 Bones.

name: West Asheville Bamboo Bungalow near French Broad River
description:
Welcome to the Bamboo Bungalow!

If you're looking for that little gem that is only minutes from the main hub of West Asheville and even closer to parks and the French Broad River, you found it! Located on a quiet street, this home sleeps 6 and is stocked with everything you need to feel right at home. Comfy beds, plenty of seating both indoor and outdoor on the covered porches, plus some extra treats to make your stay special. We are so happy to host you!

name: Budget Basement Bunker ~ great for groups & pets!
description: Super pet-friendly spot less than 3 miles from downtown and the River Arts District, perfect for after the breweries or a concert. You’ll have a queen bed, 2 bunks, a futon, and a queen air mattress (upon request, for 8+ people). No stove, but there's a fridge and microwave for snacks or leftovers. It’s an easy place to crash with your friends (and pets) after a day of exploring Asheville. Close to everything, comfy, and ready for your group to just hang out and relax!

name: Convenient + modern spot:  central North Asheville
description: Accommodations are suitable for a single person or couple visiting Asheville for vacationing pleasure, business or both.  Located in a quiet neighborhood less than 4 miles from downtown and there is access to the Blue Ridge Parkway without a single traffic light.  Private and secure entry is separate from main home.  Spacious living room with fireplace and streaming TV for lounging.  Kitchenette with self serve coffee, microwave and minifridge.  Parking is easy and only steps away from the door.

name: COZY WALKABLE WEST ASHEVILLE MODERN SUITE
description:
Lower level modern suite with off street parking, a lighted private entrance and outside patio. Relax in this modern space with private bath, QUEEN size temperpedic bed, kitchenette , a dining or work table, WiFi , You Tube TV and streaming with your credentials .
Walk to great restaurants in W Avl, the River Arts District, downtown and craft breweries. Feels like a cozy, private nook with modern comforts.

name: MTN views-Private-10min to dtwn-LookoutTower Cabin
description:
MESSAGE ME FOR MILITARY DISCOUNTS!

- You will be staying just 10 min from downtown Asheville while enjoying 8 secluded acres with MTN views for miles in a Fire Tower Lookout Cabin.
- You will enjoy being next to the Blue Ridge Parkway and can hike the Mountains to the Sea trail which is a 5 minute walk from the Fire Tower and runs next to the Parkway.
- You will appreciate the indoor fireplace and outdoor fire pit.
- You will be happy to know the Biltmore Estate is only a short 15 min drive.

name: The Acorn Guesthouse
description: Welcome to The Acorn Guesthouse at Cozy Oak!  Think of this tiny house as a hotel room with added benefits.  You have about 180 square feet under roof that includes a private bathroom along with additional covered outdoor living space for relaxing.  The fire pit area is a shared space for all guests to enjoy.  There is a small refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster over, & microwave in the Acorn as well as dishes, etc. so you are able to prepare some meals.  Smart TV for Netflix & a few channels.

name: Location : 2 mi to downtown & Biltmore Estate
description: Spacious 1800 sf. house. ****LONG TERM DISCOUNT*** Deck not available- under repair. It includes master suite with king size bed, full bathroom with jetted tub, large shower and walk in closet.  Room #2 has 2 twin size beds. Bathroom #2  has a tub/shower. There are two large sofas, 1 queen/2 twin airbeds. Guests have access to their own private  driveway for up to 6 small cars. (Hosts live in lower-level).

name: North Liberty House
description:
Enjoy a private ensuite with queen-size bed, private bath with tub, and sitting area in a beautiful 1920's light-filled home in an historic neighborhood in North Asheville - just a quick walk to downtown, and just one block to Asheville Yoga Center, Liberty House Coffee and Cafe.

Street parking on side and back of house - no parking in front

name: Downtown love, downtown life.
description: This quaint, comfy apartment has everything a busy tourist will need. You are steps away from everything downtown; including breweries, music venues, restaurants, shops, etc! This  pet friendly gem also offers off street parking, strong WiFi, tv w streamingstreaming services services, and a kitchen equipped for cooking basic meals.

name: North Liberty House 2
description:
Enjoy your comfy room with queen-size bed, private bath (in hallway) and sitting area in the bedroom. There is also a shared large living room with smart TV (and limited streaming channels,) area to do light food prep and dining area. This beautiful 1920's light-filled home is in an historic neighborhood in North Asheville - just a quick walk to downtown, and just one block to Asheville Yoga Center, Liberty House Coffee and Cafe.

Street parking on side and back of house

name: Asheville Getaway...Fenced in Backyard!
description: Ten minutes away from West Asheville and fifteen minutes away from downtown Asheville. Your privacy is valued here with your own entrance. This is an all inclusive basement suite which is equipped with all the comforts necessary to support an extended or overnight stay. You will be able to take breaks in between your adventures without having to drive a long distance. You will rarely see me as I will leave you to have your very own Asheville experience. Please check out the pet rules :-)

name: Azalea Cabin
description: Escape to our Azalea or Wisteria Cabin, part of OM Sanctuary's holistic retreat center. Disconnect from the fast pace, embrace a healthy lifestyle, and find your inner sanctuary. While our main campus undergoes renovations, reserve one or both of our cabins on Airbnb. Just over the French Broad River, 2 miles from downtown Asheville, we offer a retreat near outdoor adventures, healthy activities, Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and River Arts District. Yoga mats available to stretch and rejuvenate!

name: Off the Beat Inn Path
description: Cozy 3 bedroom 1 bath cottage in a quiet neighborhood nestled in the Blue Ridge mountains of Western North Carolina. Asheville and the surrounding area abounds with outdoor activities including but not limited to hiking, fishing, water sports, historical sites, concerts and festivals throughout the year. A relaxing and enjoyable place to visit anytime of the year.

name: Minutes to Downtown Asheville! New sunroom!
description: 9 miles to the heart of ASHEVILLE!    ROCK FIRE PIT AREA!   This peaceful mountain house is the perfect escape. Spacious open floor plan is great for families or friends. 6 BEDS available. Watch the sunrise over the mountains from the wrap around porch. Only 5 miles to the Blue Ridge Pkwy and 8 miles to the Biltmore House. Trails, rivers, breweries, the arts and crazy good food. It's all here!

name: Chestnut House
description: Private, spacious apartment two minute walk from Haywood Road in West Asheville. You'll have a full kitchen with  toaster oven, microwave, coffee maker, hotplate, fridge and dishwasher. There's coffee and tea in the cupboard  and half and half in the fridge. There's Wifi as well as cable / smart tv in the living room. Enjoy your own shady deck under the Chinese Chestnut. Our beautiful backyard has a 300 year old oak tree and an apple orchard you can hang out in.

name: West Asheville Yellow Bungalow on Haywood
description: The Yellow Bungalow is in the heart of West Asheville’s vibrant nightlife, great restaurants, breweries and bars.  This updated Victorian bungalow is the perfect home base for exploring Asheville.  Built in 1915, this funky little house has character, charm and comfort.

name: Entire Asheville Home - Walkable, Monthly Rental!
description: Great place in the heart of West Asheville - less than a half mile (0.4 mile) walk to Haywood Road shops and restaurants, including Westville Pub, West End Bakery, Universal Joint, Isis Restaurant and Music Hall (bands from all genres), Biscuit Head, etc. Also close to West Asheville Park with playground and ball field. Huge backyard and creek for kids. Great deck for grilling. Peaceful, quiet setting at end of street. Monthly rental (up to 3 months at a time - additional months negotiable).

name: Bear Retreat
description:
Just a short walk to Haywood Road, the heart of West Asheville: local eateries, breweries, coffee houses, pubs, live music and more.....minutes by car to downtown, River Arts District, the Biltmore Estate or just relax on the spacious front porch!

Please note: pets are not allowed. I am sorry, exceptions will not be considered and cannot be made.

name: The In-Between:Private small house between N&W Avl
description: Convenient rental in Northwest Asheville (in-between North and West Asheville).  Close to river, downtown, West Asheville, River Arts District, Richmond Hill Park, Biltmore, UNCA.  Easy access to all the area's best restaurants, breweries, tours, nature, and attractions.  Studio-style, 640 sq. ft,  2 story, 1 bed upstairs, 1 bath upstairs, and  2 air mattresses available on request. Small kitchenette. Fantastic back porch for relaxing.  Private driveway and private feel. Mountain views.

name: Just Beyond Utopia
description: Just Beyond Utopia is a charming cottage located on a 12 acre wooded estate just three miles from the heart of downtown Asheville. The estate has gardens, forests, and a Swiss Family Robinson style tree-houses with a fire pit to relax and socialize with friends and family. The cottage has a queen bed, bathroom with a shower, full kitchen, and a ladder to climb to a cozy loft, perfect for younger family members with 2 twin beds. It is truly the perfect location for families or romantic getaways!

name: Mountain Modern River Home, Close to Downtown
description: Gorgeous Brand New River Home! Contemporary Mountain Modern Décor with Large Balconies with Mountain and River Views. Walk across the street and float to breweries and parks. Red Oak hardwood floors with beautiful granite countertops.  Spa bath tub and shower in Master with fireplace.   This home is only 1.7 miles to downtown Asheville and 1 mile to West Asheville.  Perfect location to explore all the hiking, biking, kayaking, restaurants and breweries in the area.

name: Asheville Red Cottage - cheerful cozy city home.
description:
Tucked away on the side of a hill on a lovely, quiet tree-filled dead-end street in West Asheville, our cheerful and cozy home away from home awaits you.


The Red Cottage features a fully equipped kitchen, a brand new ceramic tiled bathroom, hardwood and bamboo floors, two air-conditioned bedrooms. Enjoy a barbecue out on the deck, or just relax and enjoy the views.

name: Quiet Living Space Close to Downtown - West AVL
description: My space is ideal for solo travelers, traveling nurses, business travelers, and couples. Guests here have their own wing with 3 rooms to themselves, a bedroom, a private bathroom, and a sitting room. Both rooms have ceiling fans and the bedroom has a TV for streaming movies. The sitting room has all of the comforts of home and is a place to relax between your outings.

name: Apartment in the Heart of West Asheville
description: This updated 1915 Victorian bungalow apartment is in the heart of West Asheville.  A short walk to breweries, coffee shops, great restaurants and charming shops. Complete with a small back patio and off street parking (for up to two cars), this apartment is the perfect place to call home while staying in Asheville.

name: Walk to Downtown! Dogs Stay Free! “The Peacock”
description: Experience Asheville in Style! Stay in this chic, dog-friendly cottage just steps from downtown. Enjoy modern comforts, a private patio, and easy access to local shops and eateries. Perfect for couples or solo travelers seeking a blend of relaxation and adventure.

name: Spacious 1/1 near UNCA•2 mi to Downtown•Mtn Views
description:
Spacious apartment with private entrance, off street parking, and full kitchen on the bottom level of a custom home. Comfortable sleeping arrangements provided with a plush king bedroom.

Enjoy mountain views, walk to UNCA, explore nearby hiking trails, and visit restaurants located a 1/2 mile away on Merrimon Ave. We are just 2 miles to downtown Asheville.

Easy check-in. We live on the main level of the home and are available to answer questions.

name: West Asheville Epicenter
description:
Perfect for your next stay in West Asheville NC!

Located in the heart of West Asheville and just minutes from downtown and a greenway connecting it all. West Asheville has become the most popular place for locals to live, and offers some of the best dining and late night options in town. A short walk to Carrier Park and the French Broad River, plus breweries, recreation on every side. Handmade organic bath products included.

Please include pets in request, fee charged, no dogs >50lbs

name: Private Suite, private entry.
description:
Water is now safe. Please visit and help rebuild AVL!

Comfy couch, new linens and fluffy towels.

Close to the breweries, restaurants, entertainment, and minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway. 8- 10 minute Uber to downtown.

You'll have a private entrance to the lower level of this north Asheville home. 2.9 miles to downtown, 0.4 miles to beautiful Beaver Lake, 1 mile to Grove Park Inn. Several excellent restaurants within 1 mile.

You’ll have privacy and quiet, & off street parking.

name: Downtown Artist Dream, Walk everywhere!
description: This comfy hideaway is a very unique space. I like to consider it an art lovers creative space. Tucked in the middle of downtown Asheville, this unit provides maximum comfort, front and back yards for your fur babies, a short walk to all things downtown AVL, a short drive to all the best hiking, and a community of wonderful souls that are always happy to point you in the right direction. You will love staying here!

name: Location Location Location!   Downtown Asheville
description:
Welcome to central Asheville. We are convenient to everything. About 10 minute walk to Pack Square and the Thomas Wolf house, and the Grove Park Arcade. Be sure to visit the Biltmore Estate and Grove Park Inn, and we have a long list of wonderful restaurants to enjoy.

The apartment, exclusively yours offered for rental - is a charming efficiency with kitchen space, full bath, and large bedroom-sitting-area.

name: Private living in the city
description:
Live privately and yet so close to the fun of Asheville. A few minutes drive to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Village/House and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Open, spacious living and eating areas with a private deck looking into the woods. Comfortable furnishings, two bedrooms with closets, full kitchen, full bathroom and complete laundry onsite. All amenities are for your private use. WiFi, free EV charging and off street parking.
Our apartment is the perfect getaway to enjoy vacation or work.
