name: Montford  Charmer Walk to Downtown Asheville
description: Historic Montford Neighborhood Vintage Gem: charming private 2BR apt w/ private entrance. 10-15 min walk downtown! 2 televisions have basic cable package through spectrum app as well as Hulu and Netflix.  Super easy to add your own streaming app as well.

name: Private Simple Guest Suite close to Downtown
description: We have a  simple guest suite in East Asheville. Amenities include a queen size bed and a full-size futon, fridge, microwave, Kuerig coffee maker , full bathroom with large tiled shower, desk and table.  The space comes with private entrance, parking and fenced in yard available for pets (dogs) if needed. Quite/tranquil, but close to town!! Only five minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and a short drive to downtown.

name: Asheville: A Stamp of Approval
description:
Private room w/ private bath.
My home is in an ideal location for reaching everything Asheville has to offer. Just minutes away from downtown, shopping, restaurants, music, nature outings & more.
Charming two story cape cod. The upstairs of my home is your private retreat featuring a large bedroom with queen bed, in room sitting area, private full bathroom. Natural light abounds. Clean & bright. Covered porches. Large yard w/ mature trees. My AirBnB Experience: Asheville rooftop bars & history

name: Charming 1920s Craftsman Bungalow close to Local Breweries
description:
2 blocks from Malvern Hills Park- public pool, walking track, and playground.

The house is in a West Asheville neighborhood with a mixture of old and newer homes. It's a family-friendly, quiet, and safe area. Walk to restaurants, breweries, coffee shops, and unique boutiques.

There is off street parking offered to guests staying here. Walking or biking distance to West Asheville. Quick, easy Uber/Lyft ride to downtown!

name: Beautiful Heavens Little Haven Two
description: New and updated Million Dollar Arts and Crafts style home with *NEW HOT TUB* sits on almost 2 landscaped acres in the country, yet is positioned only 5 miles from downtown Asheville, challenges you with deciding whether to spend more time indoors or out. A 5000 sq ft house offering a kick-back and take it all in environment, or a lets-play-all-day to keep you busy and entertained if desired.  The 'resort' is broken into different living/entertainment areas.

name: Hideaway Cabin in the City!
description: Welcome to Malvern Hills Station, a hideaway cabin in the city! Brand new central AC! Your own peaceful getaway in the heart of West Asheville. Located in the family friendly Malvern Hills neighborhood of West Asheville, this charming country cabin is in the center of it all and in a very walkable neighborhood. Malvern Hills Station is the perfect spot to have your own little private home in the city. Its so easy at Malvern Hills Station. This is convenience and charm at its best!

name: Spacious Family Farmhouse - 1.5 mi to Downtown
description: Get the best of all worlds - in town with space for family and friends - in this urban updated farmhouse! Space for family and friends to stay together, relax, and unwind, while being in town and 1.5 miles from downtown.  The house sleeps up to 6-8 in beds. Message us for more details and options. Beautifully landscaped mountainside location and green space, offering a peaceful repose. Be advised: hurricane recovery ongoing in the neighborhood.

name: Walkable Mountain Gem in the Heart of West Asheville
description:
Featuring polished concrete floors, trendy furnishings, and raw wood accents, this home combines rustic and modern elements for a warm atmosphere. Drink coffee from a NESPRESSO and read in the morning light from the comfort of an Adirondack chair on the patio. The suite provides a private room with queen bed and sofa bed to accommodate 2 additional guests. Smart TV in the living room is Roku-enabled. The suite is on the walkout basement level of the Hosts' home, therefore some noise from upstairs will transfer.

Short walk from restaurants, shops, breweries, galleries, and parks & greenway.

Our guest suite is great for business travelers, families, and anyone in between! You’ll find that it’s very cozy and comfortable and in the best part of town.

In the private guest suite you have a bedroom, bathroom, living room, and outdoor patio to yourself. There is a mini fridge, microwave, kitchen table, shelves for food, dinnerware for 4, and an electric kettle

name: 7 Mi to The Biltmore: 'Le Canard' Cottage w/ Porch
description:
Private Backyard | Chiminea Fire Pit | Pet Friendly w/ Fee

Live the dream in this French country home: nicknamed 'Le Canard,' this 2-bedroom, 1-bath Arden vacation rental ensures a heavenly escape to the Smoky Mountains. Sit on the sun porch, grill a meal on the patio, or simply revel in the wooded views. When you're ready, head up to Asheville, where you can see sites like the famous Biltmore Estate and several museums. Afterward, return to the cottage to cuddle up by the fireplace.

name: White Fawn
description: White Fawn is a furnished executive monthly rental in the Windswept Condo Community conveniently located within minutes of both downtown Asheville and Memorial Mission Hospital. Renters will enjoy the modern updates and a serene environment. The turn-key experience includes all linens, towels, a fully appointed kitchen, a Bluetooth speaker, a 50" 4K TV, additional pillows, and extra blankets. Both bedrooms offer generous closet space.

name: Asheville Cottage-Have power, internet and water
description:
Escape to our homey cottage. This is not your average BNB – it's a home away from home experience in Asheville.
Priority given to essential workers. Fully equipped kitchen.
Nestled in a serene family neighborhood, our cottage provides the perfect central location . The Biltmore Estate, located a mere 2.5 miles away.
Downtown Asheville-5-minute drive, Blue Ridge Parkway-5 miles. Highland Brewery- 2 miles away. Book your stay today and let the magic begin

name: Dog Friendly + Fenced in yard + Fire Pit + King +
description: Pet-friendly retreat just 9 minutes from downtown Asheville with a fully fenced backyard, fire pit, and outdoor seating for 10. Inside, enjoy a clean, comfortable space with modern updates and a warm, rustic feel. Ideal for families, couples, or small groups. An additional unit is available on the property for larger parties. Quiet neighborhood with easy access to shops, hikes, and breweries.

name: Private Studio By UNCA, Greenway & Downtown
description:
Asheville welcomes you back after Hurricane Helene!

Our spacious Studio is next to UNCA and one block from the Reedy Creek Greenway. The Studio is in a safe, quiet neighborhood less than two miles from the heart of Downtown.

We are are centrally located for a variety of music
and outdoor activities.

With its own entrance and dedicated parking, our Studio is great for couples, UNCA alumni / parents, runners/cyclists, solo adventurers, music lovers and business travelers.

name: Montford Oasis, 1 mile from Downtown Grove Arcade!
description: Welcome to the Montford Oasis! This cozy lower level duplex is in the Montford Neighborhood and 1 mile from Downtown Asheville and River Arts District. We offer a clean and colorful space for you to relax and unwind. Separate entrance with your own bedroom, kitchen, keurig coffee maker, microwave, toaster oven, full refrigerator, newly renovated bathroom/shower, desk, and lounge room. Parking on premise. This space accommodates 2 guests only, no exceptions. Absolutely no pets or service animals.

name: Our serene cabin in the woods
description: Our private cabin in the woods is in a secluded, quiet mountain community.  It shares over an acre of land with our primary residence, wild turkeys, and an occasional bear. Just 20 minutes from downtown Asheville, the famous Biltmore Estate, and craft breweries galore! The Blue Ridge Parkway is 7 minutes away, offering beautiful scenery, waterfalls, and wildlife.  Lots of hiking,  jogging, and biking trails.  Warren Wilson College is 5 minutes away.  Perfect location any time of the year!

name: Historic Rose Cottage in Downtown Asheville!
description:
Helene Update: Downtown and Biltmore Estate are fully open! Our area relies heavily on tourism, so we’d love to have you!

Boasting a prime location for walkability to downtown, Rose Cottage is a local landmark that comfortably sleeps four guests - a queen bed & out sofa in the private flex room that closes off creating a second bedroom.

Artistic touches abound-from beamed ceilings to the Glasgow rose tile adorning the exterior make this a Landmark

name: The Charming Chalet with Gorgeous Mountain Views
description:
Climb steps to a huge deck that wraps around a striking blue timber house. Marvel at calming mountain views on over an acre of woods. Inside, cross gleaming hardwood floors in an open-plan living space to prepare meals in a gourmet chef's kitchen.

Looking for a smaller place for two just down the road from here? Check out our new sister property at https://airbnb.com/h/cozy-cottage-asheville

You will love the secluded and private feel of our home that sits on over an acre of wooded property while only being minutes away from all modern conveniences. Truly enjoy the best of both worlds. 10 minutes to the Blue Ridge parkway and just 20 minutes to downtown. This mountain home has it all!

I will be available by phone to help answer any questions.

The house is a 20-minute drive to Downtown Asheville and 10 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Grocery stores, gas stations, and restaurants are a short drive away. Our home sits on over an acre of wood

name: Eclectic and Stylish Simplicity in a Rustic Setting
description:
Sun Bird is available to book beginning the first week in May 2025. `
Wake up to bird song in a cozy and eclectic space, with simple finishes, a soaring ceiling and windows that create a peaceful balance with nature, unique furnishings, an open-concept layout and a deck. Formerly an artist's studio, Sun Bird has the charm of uncomplicated things. The photo of the patio shows the cabin (a family member stays there) that shares the 1.5 acre lot. A very quiet spot but not completely isolated.

name: Lucky W Ranch House-#1 Host in US!
description:
More 5★ reviews than any in the US! We are known for our hospitality, cleanliness and comfortable accommodations. Easy access to town (no mountain roads!) and in a rural setting next to our farm.
The house is just 10 minutes (5 miles) from Downtown and 15 minutes to Biltmore Estate. And just 7 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway.
Uber and Lyft drivers frequently used by guests and the house is easy to find.

name: West AVL Bohemian Bungalow, walk to Haywood Rd
description: Laid-back, artfully decorated Bungalow perfectly located in the heart of West Asheville.

name: Entire top floor suite- clean and health conscious
description: Enjoy an entire upstairs apartment. Fresh and bright.  We use natural products and can be fragrance free.  The home is maintained for health for clean - natural light tubes that cast indoor rainbows, soothing colors, delightfully clean, two bedrooms that are well separated by a quaint living room and apartment kitchen.  10 mins drive to Asheville hot spots, one exit to Blue Ridge, nature center, home on a midsized lot with trees.  Basketball hoop, dog run, rocking chair porch, fire pit.

name: The Family Funhouse • HUGE Playground • Views
description: Charming, super kid-friendly home with lots of great features: well stocked with books, games & toys, foosball table, huge built-in playground, trampoline, fire pit, beautiful mountain and valley views, 12 minute drive to downtown, tons of birds, stars galore and decorated with a colorful but natural touch.

name: Riverview Home in Asheville
description: NOTICE ABOUT THE FLOOD IMPACT:   All of Asheville has potable water now AND NEEDS YOU.  My house suffered no damage at all, has well water, power, internet.  The Biltmore, Orange Peel, Grey Eagle and many other music venues are open.  Grove Park Inn is open, significant parts of the Blue Ridge Parkway (including the folk art center), Pisgah, Bent Creek, the Arboretum and DuPont are all open. What’s difficult is the River Arts District, 80% destroyed.  CONT IN OTHER DETAILS TO NOTE

name: EZ Access 2 the Heart of AVL & Blue Ridge Pkwy.
description: Your private suite has: 1) a private bedroom /a queen-sized bed; 2) a private bath /a walk-in-shower; 3) a kitchenette with a Keurig Coffee maker, a microwave, a small sink plus an under-the-counter refrigerator with a separate freezer; 4) a locked private entry into a multi-purpose room that has a loveseat, TV, a drop-leaf table with 2 chairs. The suite has a new independent "HVAC air & vent system", totally separate from our HVAC system, so our Guests have complete temperature control.

name: Craftsman Historic Home in River Arts District
description:
Upper floor of 1907 Historic Craftsman home located in the Chicken Hill area of the River Arts District. Rotating art exhibitions on display featuring local artists make this listing unique. Soak in an original claw-foot tub, walk along the river or to many local restaurants, art galleries, and breweries. Lots of character in this old home with modern amenities. Each room has a shower and bathroom attached, and there is a kitchenette with microwave, mini fridge, and coffee maker. A great location to enjoy everything this small mountain town has to offer.

This is a beautiful historic home that was completely renovated in 2004, while still maintaining the unique craftsman features of the time. Dark wood, picture frame molding, a beautiful staircase, and original claw-foot tub are just some of the features that make this home an Asheville treasure. Each room has a decorative fireplace and private ensuite bathroom. Once a guest house for local artists, the tile work around the o

name: West AVL Garden Apartment
description: This separate apartment with private entry is located in a quiet neighborhood and is minutes from Downtown (<10), River Arts District (<10), Biltmore Estate (20ish), and Blue Ridge Parkway (20-30).  Shopping, eating, hiking, camping, zip-lining, river sports at your fingertips!  Have mobile massage therapist and extra room ready for your relaxation.  This a perfect spot for travel nurses and your three month contract or you and a friend coming to explore Asheville. Come enjoy!

name: PRIVATE & Cozy Guest House-Easy Access to Downtown
description: Our detached, private, guest house is located on the SE side of Asheville! Easy/Quick access to all of the action and fun Asheville has to offer. We are located near I-40 with an approximate 10 minute/3 mile drive to the Biltmore Estate main entrance or the Blue Ridge Parkway (2.7 miles) and about 13 minute drive to downtown Asheville.  Please be aware you will need to climb one flight of stairs to access the unit.

name: HayLo in Hip West Asheville: Walk, Bike, Ride!
description: New construction, furnished with modern sensibilities and accented by local makers.  This private guest suite is attached to main home and for your convenience is accessible through a private exterior entrance.  Adjacent suite available for folks traveling “together but separate” and can be found on Air BnB as The New Hitop Studio In Hip West Asheville.

name: Re-Visit Asheville - Near Downtown & Parkway
description: Welcome to our home, lovingly known as Lilly's Place.  Available for your use is a bright, clean, 1 BR, 750 sq ft studio apartment located in the lower level of our home.  It is conveniently located just 6 miles from downtown Asheville and 1.5  miles from the entrance of the spectacular Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy all the mountain scenery and hiking trails you could want!  Located in a lovely subdivision of 14 homes, this studio is designed as its own living space with its own separate entrance.

name: Healing & Yoga Home 10min from Dtwn Asheville #I
description:
Welcome home!
We offer a peaceful & comfy space for those who travel and want to stay somewhere that is private, convenient and extraordinarily clean. The master bedroom has bright windows, a small desk, chair and a very comfortable queen size bed. The large closet has shelves and hangers, extra blankets, pillows and luggage rack to use. Linens and towels are provided.

If this room is not available check the other private room #2: https://airbnb.com/rooms/26454939

Excited to be your host :)

name: Stunning Long Range Mountain Views - 4 BR & 3 BA!
description:
Come enjoy the mountains! Located in a location that allows you to truly soak in the mountains without leaving the property.

Comfortably furnished mountain home with 20-mile mountain range views from each room. The main floor is an open concept so that you can hang out in the kitchen.

Four miles to Blue Ridge Parkway, 15 minutes to the Biltmore Estate and 14 minutes to Downtown Asheville. Situated on a private three-acre tract of the forest so you will feel like you're a part of nature.

name: Modern Asheville Greenway Residence w/ 2 Decks!
description: Discover the thriving art scene and breathtaking scenery of Asheville from 'Intown Riverside Oasis,' a 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath vacation rental situated on the banks of the French Broad River. This family-oriented retreat features a multi-level deck overlooking the water as well as an updated interior. The property also boasts an unbeatable location along the Asheville Greenway, within walking distance from the New Belgium Brewery and 3 parks, along with various coffee shops, restaurants, and bars.

name: Private lower level suite
description: Private Lower level Suite with its own private entrance, driveway and parking . A short distance to Biltmore Village, breweries, restaurants and shopping. 5 minutes by car to downtown. The lower level has its own bathroom with shower. The lower level also has its own mini-split heating and A/C unit (brand new), microwave, mini-fridge and smart tv.

name: Perfect Friends/Family Bungalow in North Asheville
description: Entire Private Home.  Feel at home in our cozy one-story bungalow with the best of both worlds--a quiet country setting that is conveniently located 5 miles to downtown, 6 miles to River Arts District, 7 miles to west Asheville and 9 miles to the Biltmore Estate.  Wake up and relax in a bright kitchen stocked with local eggs, fresh bread and coffee.  Perfect for families or groups of friends, our house has a great front porch swing, pool table, back yard with fire pit, grill and room to play.

name: Enjoy pet friendly Serenity Knoll!
description: Best of both worlds.  Beautiful, modern studio apartment secluded on private mountain road.  Just 5 minutes from interstates 26 and 40, 10 minutes from the heart of downtown or the Biltmore Estate, 5 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway and NC Arboretum, 2 miles from the WNC Farmer’s Market and 1 ½ miles from  Asheville Outlets.  Perfect location to access the area's best restaurants, breweries, hikes and attractions.   Pet Friendly with a $25 pet fee per stay collected from Airbnb prior to check in.

name: Gorgeous Home on BlueRidge near Downtown Asheville
description: This gorgeous home sits on the Blue Ridge Parkway and is less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy the city and retreat home to your own private wooded acre. Hike right out the front door onto the Mountains to Sea trail. Over 2000 square feet with fine finishes. Enjoy a round of bumper pool or choose from the many games on the game shelf. Cook in the fully stocked kitchen and enjoy a real retreat. Please maintain the peace and quiet of this tranquil neighborhood.

name: Grove Park Guest Suite - Walk to Omni Grove Park
description:
Come stay in beautiful Grove Park. Enjoy this tree lined, walkable neighborhood, only steps away from the Omni Grove Park Inn property yet 2.5 miles to downtown, 5 miles to the Biltmore Estate and 8 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Easily accessible by Lyft or Uber.

My husband and I have lived here for 30 years so we've got you covered on where to eat, drink and sightsee. I've complied a list of over 50 favorite restaurants, 18 best breweries and our top 20 things to do in this lovely town.

name: City Home With Country Feel
description:
Ranch house with privacy, but conveniently located to Asheville's attractions. Within ten minutes are Bent Creek for mountain biking or hiking, the Blue Ridge Parkway, the NC Arboretum, downtown Asheville or West Asheville. The Biltmore Estate is about 15 minutes away. Walking distance to Asheville (Tanger)Outlets and a large modern grocery store.
I want to emphasize that this is not a party house!!

name: North Asheville Cottage Retreat
description:
Enjoy morning coffee on the balcony, and wine + cheese on the porch at sunset. Relax in a light-filled cottage with everything you'll need for a peaceful visit. The studio cottage is in a lovely neighborhood, only a 5-minute drive to lively downtown Asheville.

This well-equipped studio has high-speed wifi, a smart TV w/several streaming services, full kitchen, very comfortable queen bed with high-quality linens. There's a separate entrance, off-street parking, and your own washer + dryer.

name: Relaxing Studio Close to Trails and Town
description:
Beautiful and cozy, attached studio full of natural light, queen size bed, full kitchen, full bath. Enjoy the privacy of your separate entrance, sitting porch, and self check-in.

We're close to it all, so hike the scenic Blue Ridge mountains, mountain bike the Bent Creek trails, or tube relaxing French Broad River before taking in vibrant downtown, funky West Asheville, and the breweries and galleries of the River Arts District. Very close to Asheville Outlets and easy access to airport.

name: The New HiTop Studio In Hip West Asheville
description:
Kick back in West Asheville in this newly constructed addition. The Hi-Top is situated a few blocks away from West Asheville's Haywood Rd business district.
The bedroom suite includes a roof top deck, coffee bar, 48" TV complete with Apple TV and NetFlix, and mini-fridge. Indoor bicycle storage is also available upon request. Adjacent suite available for folks traveling “together but separate” and can be found on Air BnB as HayLo in Hip West Asheville: Walk, Bike, Ride!

Yes, there is a microwave.
Please note there is no smoking on the property.

Stay in stylish comfort just steps away from West Asheville's hip & chill Haywood Road.

2 blocks from award winning restaurants & coffee houses, local shops, breweries and music venues.

River Arts District and Downtown Asheville are minutes away by bicycle or car. Green belts and Riverbank parks are right down the hill. Easy access from the Highway & simple direct route from Asheville Regio

name: Tranquil Stay for Solo Traveler
description:
I'm an avid solo traveler who values a bargain and diversity, so I’m happy to offer both!
If you are a solo traveler looking for an affordable & peaceful respite next to downtown (1 mile) this is a good place for you. And historic Montford ! ... our neighborhood is truly the best. At All Day Darling- grab a cup or have a bite. We have great eats, pball, and a greenway! Homewood and Dao Inst. 2-3 min walk! Ayurvedic Inst. (2.5), UNCA (1.5), Mission (3.0). Ally of LGBTQIA2S+

name: Walk to downtown Asheville, private studio suite
description: You’ll love staying in our cozy above-garage studio during your stay in Asheville! Can only except reservations for 2 ppl. We are less than a mile from downtown and only blocks away from coffee shops (Owl Bakery, City Bakery, Liberty House & Starbucks), plenty of restaurants (Jettie Rae’s Oyster House, Taco Temple, Bone & Broth), ice cream (Ultimate) and exercise studios (Asheville Yoga Center &SOR).  We are also only a few miles from the iconic Grove Park Inn. Uber downtown approx. $9 per ride.

name: *Asheville Hub* AppalachianAbode
description: Charming and cozy in hip East/West Asheville. This brand new chic apartment retains character of the bungalow style home it is in. You will have a private entrance and patio which leads to a 1 bed/1 bath with a kitchen that you have all to yourself. Sleeps up to 4 comfortably. The bathroom has a tiled shower with rain head and bench. You will be walking distance to some amazing restaurants, bars, shops and breweries in West Asheville. It's a quick, easy drive to the heart of downtown Asheville.

name: Cozy Downtown Asheville Apartment -WALKABLE
description: This private rental is located in a newly renovated home within a 5-10 minute walk of everything that downtown Asheville has to offer!  Leave your car in the driveway and walk to the all the best restaurants, shops, and breweries in the area.  A few blocks in the other direction takes you to the funky River Arts District, the French Broad River, and West Asheville.

name: Cute Cottage w/ Mtn View, Walk to Biltmore Village
description:
Early 1900's cottage in the Oakley neighborhood, conveniently located within walking distance to Biltmore Village. Downtown is just 3 miles away and easily accessible by Uber or bus. My place is perfect for individual travelers, remote workers, self-carers, hunker-downers, nature lovers, etc.

This is an 'old-new' house with lots of character. The space is bright and airy with charming details, modern amenities, great outdoor spaces and beautiful mountain views. A unique find in the city!

name: Cozy downtown walkable retreat.
description: This cozy, downtown hideout is the perfect place to escape reality and take in everything Asheville has to offer. Steps from all of the breweries, bars, restaurant's, shops, etc. You can find outdoor adventures galore in a short drive, or take a $5 uber to historic west asheville. Our eclectic neighborhood will make you fall in live with Asheville at first site. We look forward to hosting you! ***Our new cleaning staff rocks! 🤘

name: views, pool, pets welcome, fenced backyard
description: Our historic home (1895) is adjacent to the Grove Park golf course. We have beautiful long-range views of the Blue Ridge Mountains, a swimming pool, and are close to downtown. You can walk to restaurants, coffee shops, stores, and the Grove Park Inn.  Our private downstairs suite has its own path and entrance with a lockbox. It includes a bedroom, living room, and bathroom (see details in "the space"). Come relax,  explore, and enjoy the views,  patios, and sunsets. Pet friendly.

name: Your AVL Home Away From Home!
description:
(Exclusively available for 30+ nights - no exceptions.)

Welcome to your home away from home in Asheville! We welcome guests looking to settle in and stay a while (30 nights or more) in our comfortable, well-appointed three-bedroom condo.

- You'll get quiet neighborhood living in Montford, with great walkability and downtown Asheville just around the corner.

- Quick, easy access to all the roads that lead to the region's endless bounty of hiking, biking, and paddling adventures.

name: Views, Sunsets, Privacy - Next to Grove Park Inn!
description: This lovely AirBnB apartment boasts 900+ square feet of space and is located just steps away from the Grove Park Inn. Only 2 miles from downtown Asheville, it sits on a private lot, in a quiet neighborhood. Enjoy beautiful mountain views and sunsets through wall of windows in living area, or relaxing on your patio. Large ensuite bedroom, full kitchen, expansive family room with additional sleeping options - designed and accessorized to meet your needs. All are welcome!

name: Stay in a Charming Suite in an Asheville Bungalow
description:
Sleep tight in a private Queen Bedroom with adjacent, private bath in an owner occupied home, situated in a tranquil neighborhood in East Asheville.
Shared, common spaces have a relaxing, laid back vibe.
The house is in the charming neighborhood of Oakley, minutes from Biltmore Village and Biltmore Estate, and within 10 minutes of downtown Asheville. The area is a quiet enclave, close to hiking, breweries, downtown shopping, and amazing dining.
We are located 20 minutes from the airport.

name: King Bed Private Bathroom
description:
PLEASE READ ENTIRE LISTING BEFORE BOOKING.
Peaceful, clean, comfortable room with King size bed. TV with Roku (Netflix, Hulu, HBO) Private Bathroom (not shared) down the hall. 5-10 min drive to Haywood Road in West Asheville, 10-15 min drive to downtown Asheville.

NO DRUGS (INCLUDING MARIJUANA) OR EXCESSIVE ALCOHOL. YOU WILL BE ASKED TO LEAVE IF YOU BREAK THIS RULE

Last minute bookings welcome!
TWO GUESTS MAX NO EXCEPTIONS. NO PETS.
INPUT CORRECT # OF GUESTS WHEN INQUIRING OR BOOKING

name: Garden Cottage 2.5 miles to downtown
description: This mountain cottage is conveniently located 2.5 miles from downtown Asheville and 4 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway offering guests the best of both worlds...a  retreat in the heart of the mountains  yet convenient to all that Asheville has to offer. This well loved and maintained cottage is beautifully furnished and offers two bedrooms with queen sized beds; two full bathrooms; twin sized pull out sofa; and an open living dining area with a wood stove; central heat and AC and ceiling fans.

name: Spacious Apartment in Beaver Dam Lake Community
description:
Our one-bedroom apartment is ideal for your visit to Asheville. Enjoy private patio with stunning view of our backyard Oasis. King size bedroom, spacious living room with fold out futon couch & futon chair.

Enjoy a morning walk or jog around breathtaking Beaver Dam Lake 2 blocks away.

2.8 miles from downtown (or 3.8 miles W. Asheville the fun and funky locals part of town.)

Strict Non-smoking kid friendly property. You may here our occasional footsteps from above, but has separate entrances.

name: Charming, Early 1900's Cottage
description: This beautiful and charming cottage sits at the foot of our 16-acre pasture and is quintessential to everything Asheville and the surrounding area have to offer. The cottage is close to everything, yet gives the feel of being away from it all. Built in the early 1900's, this house maintains it's history along with modern upgrades. The house over looks a pasture with cattle, where you can find deer grazing and turkey's passing by. To the left of the house is a pond that we do allow fishing on.

name: The Little Red Porch
description: The Little Red Porch - A private retreat in the beautiful mountains of peaceful East Asheville. We welcome people from all backgrounds, cultures and  beliefs to our home, hoping to share Asheville, NC-- a wonderful, magical place--with as many as folks as possible. And we LOVE having KIDS stay with us! Please take a look at our bright, cozy apartment and see if we look right for you.

name: Private Asheville Home with Hot Tub and Game Room!
description:
Meadow Run Falls......you have found what you have been looking for, so come enjoy ASHEVILLE! Hot tub, Game Rm, 3-bed/3-bath bungalow just waiting for you; AND just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville.
Does this sound like the Asheville mountain luxury destination experience for you?

name: Peaceful 2 King Beds/ 2 Bathrooms West Asheville
description:
PLEASE READ THE WHOLE LISTING AS WELL AS THE HOUSE RULES BELOW BEFORE BOOKING!
Beautiful, welcoming, peaceful 2 bedroom/2 bathroom house in West Asheville. 10-15 min from Downtown Asheville. 5-10 minutes from Haywood Road in West Asheville.

PLEASE NOTE: I live in a small separate garage apartment downstairs with its own private entrance, we do not share the yard nor any living space.

Last minute bookings welcome!

NO DRUGS, EXCESSIVE DRINKING, OR PARTIES

name: The Snookmore ~ Front Porch Views w/ Hot Tub
description:
The Snookmore is perfectly located just 3 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 8 miles from downtown Asheville. Just hop on the Parkway and have the Appalachian wilderness at your beck and call or mosey on down to the hottest town the South has to offer.

Its only neighbors are ourselves and our other rental house, the Snookery.

Note on Helene: we were very luck in Snookville with a lot of downed trees, but nothing structural. There are still outages, but the generators keep the power on.

name: Walk to Everything in West Asheville!
description: Come enjoy the best of everything West Asheville has to offer! We are located two blocks off of Haywood Rd, so from your door it is an easy walk to popular destinations like Sunny Point Cafe,  etc. And only a 7 min drive/uber to downtown.  Our basement in-law suite has a private bedroom and bath, as well as its own private entrance. You will have everything you need, including a fridge, toaster oven and microwave. We live upstairs, so if you have any questions we are available!

name: The Shanty~Hot Tub~8 Miles to City of Asheville NC
description: This 1BR/1BA abuts a creek and wooded setting 8 miles south of Asheville within about 4 miles of BR parkway.  Now has an old, slightly stained Claw Foot Soak Rub for that relaxing evening.  Close to shopping, dining, hiking,  biking fishing. A bohemian shanty garage conversion of reclaimed materials from  vintage shops.   covered parking, screened porch with chiminea and grill,  microwave, mini fridge, Keurig Coffee  and blue tooth tunes.   Its cozy, organic and a bit different.  Enjoy!

name: The Birdhouse: Close to Biltmore, Downtown. SOLAR!
description: Beautiful 100% SOLAR POWERED! 400 sq. ft. studio. Private entrance. Safe street parking. Lots of natural light & amenities. Allison's local beech wood accent this modern studio with local artwork and beautiful gardens. Private patio space. 1 mi. to Biltmore, breweries & Blue Ridge Pkwy! 3 miles to downtown. Short walk to public bus stop! Just off I-240 and I-40 in east Asheville.

name: Adorable Bungalow in Trendy West Asheville
description: Live like a local! This charming West Asheville bungalow is on a quiet street yet a short walk to cute, trendy Haywood Road. Stay in the heart of the coolest neighborhood in Asheville. Walk two blocks to restaurants, coffee shops and bars along hot Haywood Road. Or head to the River Arts District, downtown Asheville, or the South Slope in minutes. Enjoy the West Elm furniture, original hardwood floors, well-lit workplace nook, and modern, updated, subway-tiled kitchen in this private home.

name: The Snookery ~ Refuge a Mountain w/ Hot Tub
description:
The Snookery is a true refuge. Perched on the mountainside, its back deck has views from the hot tub, making it the perfect place for a safe, memorable gathering.

Its only neighbors are us and another rental (The Snookmore), and we all have plenty of space to call our own. Do not hesitate to reach out with further questions!

Note on Helene: we were very luck in Snookville with a lot of downed trees, but nothing structural. There are still outages, but the generators keep the power on.

name: Woodsy Spot in the City
description: Cozy, woodsy home 1 mile from downtown Asheville! This one bedroom apartment is the perfect spot for your Asheville getaway. It sits in a quiet, private neighborhood and has a private entrance. Located near UNCA, less than a block from the Greenway where you can walk to the Botanical Garden or ride your bike to downtown, and the Saturday Farmer's Market where you can find organic in-season fruits and vegetables, local coffee and baked goods. It is perfect solos, couples and business travelers.

name: Minimum 21 day rental in lovely Grove Park
description: Spacious light filled upstairs bedroom with a hall bathroom.  Private 1912 Arts and Crafts house in North Asheville close to Grove Park Inn and downtown.  Kitchen and porch  also open to guest.   21 day minimum stay available.

name: Town & Tree: Modern Hideaway walk to Downtown
description: Cozy+Natural+Light+Modern. Walk to downtown. Private space with separate entrance, private deck with outdoor eating area. One bedroom: Queen size memory foam bed. Living room: open to bedroom with smart TV. Full bathroom: large rain shower. Kitchenette: mini-fridge, microwave, filtered water, coffee/tea. Extras: ceiling fans, AC/Heat, free street parking in front of the house. No access to the rest of the house - just this space. Quiet Historic Montford neighborhood - 10 minute walk to downtown!

name: Wild Canary Mountainside Retreat/Hidden Nest
description: The Hidden Nest is an almost new apartment, very quiet, with fabulous view, 1 mi. from city limits, 7 mi from downtown. Living room has a pull-out double & single sofa bed (modern mattresses - no torture bar) and TV;  gas logs fireplace; kitchen w/snacks; cozy, dark bedroom includes Q-bed, 50" TV w/cable; bathroom w/fluffy towels, washer & dryer.  Record player w/mostly folk from 60s/70s. Small patio; convenient to downtown, Biltmore House, West Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, outlet malls.

name: Haven Under the Oaks in Arden, NC
description: Haven Under the Oaks offers a cozy, inviting space to relax while you are visiting the Asheville area.  Located in South Asheville,  you are 13 miles from the heart of downtown and The Biltmore Estate. It is less than five miles from the Asheville Airport and The Blue Ridge Parkway.  Easy access to Brevard and Hendersonville.  The Tryon Equestrian Center is an easy 35 mile drive via I-26.  Dedicated work space with high speed wifi. Bright, open living space with plenty of room to enjoy.

name: The Nature Nook near Asheville NC
description: The Nature Nook is a 1BR studio with kitchenette in a park like setting with 2.5 acres, some of which is partially wooded.  A serene wooded setting but only 8 miles close to downtown Asheville NC.  This space is only 5 minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway and conveniently located near the  Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn, French Broad River, arboretum, hiking trails, mountain biking trails and hot springs, airport etc.   Its close to everything Asheville. Enjoy!

name: 20-Acre Cabin w/ Pond: 6 Mi to River Arts District
description: Nestled in the lush green forests of North Carolina sits this charming Asheville vacation rental. Nature and art lovers alike will adore this 3-bedroom, 2-bath cabin with its spacious layout and 6-mile proximity to 'The Paris of the South'. Families, groups, and couples traveling together can experience the sights and sounds of the River Arts District, the peaceful scenery of Blue Ridge Parkway, or the rich history behind the famed Biltmore Estate. Come on in and enjoy your home-away-from-home!

name: Cozy & convenient in Asheville, Grove park area
description:
Private guest suite, fully equipped with a private entrance, Grove Park area - 30 day rentals (or longer) only
- private kitchenette with small fridge
- Living area with a queen bed or sofa breakfast table and seating.
- New LCD TV connected to your favorite streaming service & local channels
- separate private bedroom with a memory foam queen sized bed (medium / firm)
- private bathroom with a bathtub / shower.

Close to downtown Asheville and a short walk to grocery, restaurants and more!

name: 2 Bedroom Retreat w/ Fireplace in a Prime Location
description: Wake up on the low platform bed w/ a Tuft & Needle mattress before opening the 12-foot sliding barn doors into the bright living space. This is remodeled lower level unit where co-hosts live on upper level for your convenience blends a rustic flair of Asheville Pine flooring with modern decor. We offer several complimentary amenities. This apartment is also wheelchair accessible entryways & shower. Just walking distance to restaurants, shops, & the River Arts District.

name: Budget Pet Friendly GuestSuite, 10 min to DT AVL
description:
Welcome to our cozy Pet Friendly North Asheville guest suite, steps from Beaver Lake! Enjoy a comfortable bedroom with a queen bed, full bathroom, laundry, and kitchenette. Have extra guest? We have a queen size blow-up mattress. Relax by the fire pit under the stars. Smart TVs in the living room and bedroom add entertainment options. Experience comfort and convenience in Asheville's Northside!

THIS IS LOCATED IN A BASEMENT WITH THE HOST IN THE ABOVE UNIT.

name: Relaxing River Oasis with Pool and Hot Tub
description: Come enjoy our river front home with a relaxing farmhouse vibe!  We have 4 acres with a pool and hot tub   and access to the French Broad River and the Paddle Trail.  Be at the Asheville airport in 7 minutes, Brevard in 20 minutes, and downtown Asheville in 25 minutes.  Visit the numerous local breweries, hike or mountain bike in Pisgah NF or Dupont SP, and enjoy the local shopping scene.  Relax with family and friends in the spacious living room and large kitchen after a full day of adventures.

name: Charming Getaway in Historic Downtown Asheville
description: Charming couple's getaway in a beautiful historic Asheville neighborhood conveniently located near downtown shops and eateries. The apartment features a tiled bathroom with restored claw foot tub and a large back deck with wooded view just outside the bedroom door. Central air conditioning/heating system is dedicated solely to this apartment- you control preferred temperature. *Please note this apartment is not suitable for guests who plan to keep late night hours and party in the apartment.

name: Gilbert's Getaway
description:
Come home to your own cozy apartment with private parking, deck and (keyless) entrance. Sleep in a queen bed with a memory foam mattress.

Enjoy the new tiled bathroom, with floor heating and a modern Toto toilet. The kitchen area is equipped with all new appliances. Use the counter-height table for meals or as your laptop-ready desk.

The HD TV offers Netflix and Amazon Video. Connect to lightning fast wireless internet. Just ask Alexa to play your favorite music!

name: West Asheville Get-Away
description: Enjoy newer construction, vaulted ceilings and a bright open floor plan that is walkable to local shops and restaurants and minutes from hiking, biking and rafting destinations. This 1 bedroom apartment is beautifully furnished with lots of light, ample off-street parking, spacious private deck, and fenced-in yard!  Open floor plan with private bedroom/bathroom. All utilities included. Great high speed internet. Close to city bus line

name: Montford Urban Treehouse
description: Recently constructed 650 SF detached garage apartment in charming, historic Montford neighborhood. Short lovely walk to several cafes and a 20-min walk to downtown Asheville. Home has vaulted ceilings, hardwood floors and a fully-equipped kitchen that opens to a comfortable living room. Bedroom has a comfy queen bed, quality cotton linens, and a large closet. The spacious spotless bathroom adjoins a linen closet. A shady, private deck with grill and off-street parking spot serves the apartment.

name: Asheville 2 Bedroom Condo - Blocks From Downtown
description: 2 Bedroom Condo - 5 Blocks to downtown Asheville. Sun filled open layout with 2 queen beds, wifi, TV, hardwoods, granite counters, stainless appliances, open dining area-living room-kitchen, located in the 5-Points/ Montford area above the bar "Little Jumbo" (delicious cocktails and live music Sunday Monday Tuesday and Saturday). One block from High-5 coffee shop and 5-Points Diner. 3 blocks to Whole Foods and Trader Joe’s. Located on 2nd floor of 2-Story walk up building.

name: Pet Friendly - Upper Berne Chalet in Asheville!
description:
The Upper Berne is a unique getaway located only 2 miles from Downtown Asheville nestled up on a mountain surrounded by trees!
The Upper Berne sleeps 4 and includes 1 king & 1 queen bed, 1 bath, living room, dining area, with a well-appointed kitchen. Enjoy the mountain views as you grill on the covered, comfortably furnished front porch. This vacation home has many amenities with generous seating and plenty of natural light that help make your stay as relaxing and comfortable as possible.

name: The Cottage at Winghaven—A Stunning Woodland Paradise
description:
The Cottage at Winghaven is a light filled story book log cabin located less than 20 minutes to Asheville. The Cottage is privately located on 38 acres of forest but with easy access to shopping and restaurants.
Relax in front of the wood burning stove, soak up the sun on the south facing deck or have a drink and watch the wild turkeys from the covered porch. The Cottage is perfect for a romantic getaway or for families!

name: Houz Zen: A Pet Friendly Private Suite
description:
Enjoy everything that the Asheville area has to offer! Our private ground floor suite boasts a separate entrance and offers a comfortable space to unwind. The peaceful fenced in backyard is perfect for you and your pet. Guests tell us how ZEN our indoor and outdoor space feels. What's more, we are super pet friendly! We have NO pet fees for up to 2 pets however we hope you will ensure your pets are not destructive.

We look forward to having you as our guest!

name: Asheville Suite. Fast WiFi.  Minutes to downtown
description:
This hidden gem is a lower-level flat located just 1.4 miles from downtown. Close to everything in a quiet part of the city with mature trees, shared parking, and backyard. The apartment has a full kitchen and everything you need for a pleasant stay.

Enjoy a mountain escape within a few minute's drive of downtown, the River Arts District, West Asheville, and the Biltmore Estate.

You will likely hear noise from guests in the unit above.

name: Cozy studio in hot West Asheville.
description: Our apartment is located in a safe, friendly neighborhood a short walk from all there is to enjoy in West Asheville, and only a short drive from downtown.

name: Our Little Getaway
description:
Come enjoy our fully furnished little getaway in E. Asheville just 4 miles from Downtown, minutes away from the Blue
Ridge Parkway and many breweries. Our place is also convenient to lots shopping areas.

name: Top Floor Condo in the Heart of Downtown
description: To check availability for tonight, please send an inquiry.

name: Quiet Bright Bedroom Close to Downtown
description: Quiet bedroom nestled in the hemlocks in an adorable bright and sunny bungalow in North Asheville, 1.7 miles from downtown (40 minute walk via the greenway, or a 5 minute Lyft). Walking distance from the North Asheville Farmers Market, hiking trails and the Botanical Gardens, UNC Asheville, breweries and restaurants. Enjoy a fire in the firepit on cool evenings!

name: Comfortable downtown Studio. Walk everywhere.
description: This old building is full of charm! Is it 5 Star hotel, no, but it’s clean, cozy and perfectly located in the heart of Asheville. It’s ideal for 2 travelers. Queen bed. Tv w streaming services. Solid WiFi. Good shower, and walk everywhere! with a new cleaning team we are ready to rock and roll!🤘

name: QUIET, COMFY & CLEAN ~ Near Downtown & UNCA!
description:
Two spacious, clean, quiet and private rooms available on the second floor. Private bathroom, living room and entrance. Mini fridge, microwave and coffee essentials provided. No kitchen access currently.

Large front porch complete with rocking chairs. Enjoy the garden, fruit trees and large quiet yard! Located 1.3 miles from Downtown, I-240 and I-26.

name: Super-Host, 10 minutes to Downtown and Biltmore!
description:
Relax in 4 Bedroom, 3 bath home with a fenced yard. We are excited to announce that we are fully restored with water, power, and internet and ready to host! The home has a entire home water filter system.

This home is 10 minutes away from everything and easy to drive to. The yard is fenced for your children and fur babies and the Buncombe County Sports park is located only minutes away from the home. #Ashevilleairbandb

name: Hot Tub & Mountain View Gameroom Sleeps 9
description:
The house was built in 1927 and was originally located on the Biltmore Estate Dairy Farm property. It was moved to this location in the 1950's. It is a cool quirky place with lovely mountain views from the bedrooms, back deck and yard. Interior décor is in "Fixer Upper Farmhouse style". House includes a Hot tub, fire pit and screened porch for our guest to enjoy.

Need more space? Rent together with our tiny house or with our Blue Bird Cottage.

name: Cozy Basement Suite: 5 minutes to town or mountain
description:
Private basement suite, ideal for couples or solo traveler looking for a cozy nest located 5 miles to downtown and 3 miles to BRP, trails and mountains.

Private entrance through garage. Bedroom with queen bed, full bath, living room with couch, recliner, dresser, Apple TV, Netflix.

Uber/lyft ranging from 10-15 dollars to/from town.

We are a young family of four that lives in the house above suite. We will offer the utmost privacy to guests. Available for questions/suggestions.

name: Whole House Sublet 30+ Night Stay 10 Mins to AVL
description: This listing is for a monthly sublet. We have a minimum stay requirement of 30 days. Come relax in our cozy suburban home with spacious open split floor plan. Comfortably furnished, jacuzzi bath tub, gas fire place, back deck with grill and patio seating/dining, front porch with rocking chairs, one car garage and driveway parking, wi-fi. Less than 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Asheville Cottage in Historic Montford 30 Day Min
description:
Welcome to my entire cottage in the Historic district of Asheville known as Montford. Enjoy the comfort of your own place for your vacation while exploring the many adventures that the area offers.
You can easily walk to the vibrant and exciting downtown Asheville to people watch or attend live theater, visit art galleries, shop in the many eclectic stores, or dine at one of the over 65 restaurants! Known as the 'Paris of the South'.

name: Tiny Home in Asheville - new hot tub and back deck
description: The tiny home is located in the scenic neighborhood of Haw Creek, tucked away in nature but only a 5-minute drive to downtown.  The house is walking distance to Penny Cup Coffee and Creekside Taphouse, two local favorites. Large trees and wildlife abound in the backyard and can be viewed through the bedroom windows or from the brand new back porch.  Inside, the tiny home has a modern yet rustic feel. You will find everything you need, and your host lives on the property and is just a text away.

name: AVL Sunshine Daydream House 6 Miles from Downtown
description:
This eclectic and charming 1950's bungalow has just been lovingly remodeled for your enjoyment.

It sits on the West side in a quiet neighborhood just on the outskirts of town. Convenient to I40, just 17 minutes from the airport, 13 minutes (6 miles) to downtown, 15 minutes to Biltmore, 15 minutes to UNCA and 10 minutes to happening Haywood Rd.

Clean, comfortable and stylishly funky with lots of windows to let in that sunshine!

Great for families, small groups, and four legged friends!

name: We're OPEN: Serenity Cottage w/HOT TUB & Courtyard
description:
We're open: all utilities & amenities available/restored!
Quiet, Cozy, Private!!! Hot tub, full kitchen for 4, outdoor courtyard, TV with Roku, and wifi. Located 1 mile from NC Arboretum, Bent Creek River Park, & Blue Ridge Parkway. Just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate. This stand-alone house is located in a quiet, safe, & rural neighborhood. The space has modern furnishings and is decorated with an outdoorsy National Park theme.

name: Cozy Convenience: King Beds, 3 miles to Biltmore
description: 2 Bedroom/1 Bath home apartment in a quiet, convenient neighborhood just 5-10 mins from Biltmore, Downtown, and the Blue Ridge Parkway! With features including King Beds, key-less entrance, cozy living room w/ smart TV, kitchenette (microwave, cook-top, toaster oven, coffee maker, fridge/freezer), board games, and plenty of off-street parking. You should have all you need to feel at home here in Asheville.

name: Stunning 1902 Cottage! Walk to downtown Asheville!
description: Enjoy a completely remodeled beauty in Historic Montford! Home is located on a quiet one way street filled with beautiful mature trees. Walk downtown to dine at one of the 60 restaurants, see a concert at The Orange Peel, or visit one of the multiple craft breweries, voted Beer City USA! So much natural light with vaulted ceilings and 2 skylights. The kitchen opens directly into living area with cozy gas fireplace! Gorgeous soapstone countertops, stainless appliances, and peaceful back deck.

name: Newly Renovated Private Lower Lvl Suite in Oakley
description: Newly renovated apartment less than a mile to Biltmore Estate, Village and numerous restaurants and breweries.

name: Best Location in Asheville Close to Live Music
description: Modern home with ground level guest suite located in charming Chicken Hill. Chicken Hill is a quiet residential neighborhood located between vibrant downtown Asheville and the River Arts District. PRIME LOCATION if you want to be within a mile of just about everything Asheville has to offer including restaurants, breweries, art galleries, the French Broad River Greenway and live music venues.  Please note there is not a full kitchen.  We provide a mini-fridge, microwave, and Nespresso machine.

name: Pet Friendly West Avl Tiny Home ~ 3mi to Downtown
description:
Enjoy this tiny home with a loft bedroom featuring a king bed. Drink your coffee on the porch, roast marshmallows on the bonfire, & unwind!

Conveniently located just minutes to Downtown in West Asheville.

The tiny home is located behind the main house, and does require you to walk down a somewhat steep pathway. It's just a warm up before you hit the Blue Ridge Parkway to enjoy spectacular views of the mountains.

This house is little, but your adventures will be grand!

name: Family Getaway/Minutes to Downtown
description:
Asheville is opening back up and preparing for the holiday season! Many downtown restaurants are open and eager to welcome guests.
Plenty of room for a family getaway. Enjoy dinner on the deck, or a cup of coffee in the morning as the birds are singing. There is a large yard, perfect for football games or you can shoot some hoops!

name: Private apt, Easy walk to town, No cleaning fee.
description: Private, modern in-law apartment walking distance to both the vibrant River Arts District (0.1 mi) and downtown Asheville (1 mi). You will love the airy bedroom that feels like a vacation in itself. Enjoy sitting on the back deck, taking in the beautiful mountain air. There is room to park one car at the end of a quiet ally. Close to many galleries, breweries, restaurants, and river walk. Kitchenette is plenty to meet basic cooking needs for a week.

name: 6BR Mountain Home w/ Game RM, BBQ, Deck, Fireplace
description: Perfect for large groups and work teams! Two living rooms, full kitchen and game room. Six bedrooms and 4 full bathrooms offer privacy and convenience. Super convenient location. Perfect home base for your stay in Asheville! Near AVL Airport, WNC Ag Center & Hwy 26.

name: Lovely guesthouse.  Walk to downtown, lots of sun
description: South facing and full of light, second-story, 500 sq feet above a garage. Wood floors, tile shower, heated marble bathroom floor. Architectural details: skylights in kitchen and living room, antique stained glass windows in bedroom and bathroom, milk-glass light fixtures, bulls eye trim, 11 foot vaulted ceilings. Kitchen includes granite counters, stainless steel appliances, washer dryer, ice maker, dishwasher.

name: Solo Traveler's Dream
description: Perfect for the solo traveler in need of a place to crash while they hike/bike the trails, then hit the breweries. One mile from hip Haywood Road and the best of West Asheville. Enjoy a very small but comfortable room with private bath.  Coffee and mini fridge in room. Guests may use the microwave/toaster, no heavy cooking. The room is off the kitchen (some AM noise), but feels private. The room has a single bed for one guest only, no infants or fur babies.

name: North Asheville Urban Forest
description: A 1926 Craftsman Home that is two miles from the city center. The UNCA Botanical Garden is within walking distance.  Both hosts have been vaccinated and boosted for COVID-19 so it's safe to greet you without wearing a mask. If you'd feel more comfortable with us wearing one, let us know. Your room is on the second floor (17 steps), and the bathroom is directly across the hall. No smoking.

name: Cozy Little Farmette Minutes to Downtown Asheville
description:
Enjoy the peace and quiet of the country! This cozy little farmette, situated in the valley off the Blue Ridge Mountains, is a slice of heaven within minutes of downtown Asheville.
Outside, you’ll feel an instant sense of peace and tranquility surrounded by horses, happy, free ranging chickens, abundant woods, gardens, ponds, open lawns and patios for your restful getaway. Inside, the house is joyfully animated by the presence of a sweet cat and a joyful pup.

name: The Flint Street House downtown Historic Montford
description: Historic Montford home. 3 blocks from the civic center and downtown. This is an old home in a wonderful neighborhood. The space has 2 bedrooms and 1 bath with a common hallway area where you’ll find a small fridge, coffee and snacks. The larger room has a king and an air mattress is available. The space has character, very comfortable, very clean, and very convenient to all that asheville has to offer. It’s short walk to downtown, coffee shops, restaurants, bars and breweries.

name: Ultimate Asheville Airbnb #location
description:
I LOVE HOSTING! Experience Asheville like a local, make your reservation today! Looking forward to your stay. PETS (ask). I adapt the space to any need. NO nightly minimum.

King Bedroom and queen bedroom. Twin floor mattress option if needed. We hope our guests get the most out of Asheville.

You have a separate entrance. Hallway to a full bath where another private bedroom is located!

name: City Casita Downtown - FREE Parking!
description:
Thanks for your interest in City Casita! Please read the entire listing so there are no surprises. 😊
Downtown condo, right behind the Harrah's Cherokee Center and Thomas Wolfe Auditorium. Safe, keypad-locked building & elevator access. Top floor = nobody above you. Easy walking distance to downtown. Coffee shops, restaurants, breweries, bars, retail shops, grocery stores, and more within blocks. Biltmore Estate / access to the Blue Ridge Parkway hiking trails within a 15 minute drive.

name: Convenient king suite---walk to downtown!
description: Convenient Five Points king suite within walking distance of downtown Asheville. The suite provides a private entrance, kitchenette, and a bathroom with a shower. There is usually plenty of parking on a safe street around the property. The walk to downtown is about 10 minutes.

name: Clean and Cozy Cottage- pup friendly!
description: This cozy, light-filled, guesthouse cottage--just minutes away from everything Asheville has to offer--is all yours during your mountain getaway in Asheville. Less than five minutes to downtown, the Biltmore, and the Blue Ridge Parkway, it's convenient and quiet. Whoever you are, you are welcome here!

name: Asheville East Retreat
description:
Our private guest suite is located within our home but has a separate, secure front entrance. We do not share this space, our suite is entirely for our Airbnb guests.
The area outside the entrance is for guest use and has seating to enjoy the mountain views.
We would love to host you when you visit Asheville!

name: Charming Cottage- Overlooking&Walk DT AVL- Hot Tub
description: Boutique-designed Loft and Cozy-styled large in-law studio apt. (1,100 sqft) Overlooking  Downtown! WALK to the HEART of DOWNTOWN in 5-10min! PVT HOT TUB! FULL KITCHEN! Large PORCH in Garden Nook/Lounge! New Washer/Drier & Mud Rm! PVT Entrance. Nestled amongst large trees in the Heart of Beautiful Asheville. Iconic Pack Square, South Slope, French Broad Chocolate Lounge among all DT AVL Breweries, Restaurants n Coffee Houses 5-10 min walk. EASY PARKING. Modern Open Apt. Cozy. Relaxing. Romantic.

name: Tiny House [Fenced in yard, 10mins to Downtown]
description: Our guests come from all walks of life - and we do too. Our tiny home is a safe space for folks from all minority and marginalized groups and we hope it reflects our deep appreciation and respect for the differences among us. Whatever your age, race, gender, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation, sexual identity, education, or national origin, we invite you to "Come on up to the house!"

name: Spacious & Cozy Oasis in West Asheville
description:
Sweet little oasis of a newer home that is about less than a mile to shopping, restaurants, bars and music, (5 NYC city blocks). You will have your own floor of this home with private entrance, deck, 1 bedroom/ 1 full bathroom, wifi internet and 1 dedicated parking space with additional street parking available.

Late night check-ins are always welcomed given the self check in functionality!

name: Asheville Monthly Rental, Furnished & utilities
description:
HURRICANE HELENE DISPLACED FAMILIES GIVEN PRIORITY WITH DISCOUNTED MONTHLY RATE SO PLEASE ASK!

Enjoy our charming updated 2 bedroom, 2 bath house centrally located in Asheville.

Downtown Asheville - 5 miles
Mission Hospital - 3 miles
Veteran's Hospital - 3 miles
Advent Health Hospital - 13 miles

name: Central Downtown Luxury Contemporary Residence 201
description:
Queen Bed / 1 Bath / 720 Sq Ft / Sleeps Two

Residence 201 is a modern appointed home that sleeps two. For added convenience and safety, private parking in the building is available.

The residence is furnished in a contemporary style with a kitchen and bath fully-equipped for your personal and entertainment needs.

Feel secure with audio and keyless controlled street access, private basement parking, keyless residence access, and access point security cameras.

name: Central Downtown Luxury Contemporary Residence 202
description:
MASTER KING BED & KING PULL-OUT / 1 AND 1/2 BATH / 877 SQUARE FEET / SLEEPS 4

Residence 202 is a modern appointed home that sleeps four and allows you to comfortably engage the urban excitement Asheville offers. For added convenience and safety, private parking in the building is available.

The residence is furnished in a contemporary style with a kitchen and bath fully-equipped for your personal and entertainment needs.

name: Central Downtown Luxury Contemporary Residence 301
description:
MASTER KING BED AND GUEST QUEEN BED / 2 AND 1/2 BATH / PRIVATE OPEN AIR GARDEN PATIO / 2066 SQUARE FEET

A modern luxury appointed home that sleeps four.

Enter this residence through the second-floor main entrance and ascend to the living area via a contemporary staircase or enter from your private elevator that opens to a stunning view of the large open-air garden patio. The residence is furnished in a contemporary style.

name: Downtown Asheville @ Your Doorstep- Clean & Cozy!
description: Walking distance to downtown Asheville makes this property a rarity. Separate and private entrance. This 2-bedroom private guest suite is ideal for one or two couples, families, and friend groups of 4. Large rooms with space for lounging and sunset watching after a day on the town.  Full kitchen! On-site parking. Wifi and smart TV. Visitor Center and trolley located next door! Short walk to Grove Arcade, US Cellular Center, and River Arts District.

name: Waffle Bar, Goats, Close to AVL, No Chore List
description:
•No Chore List
•Waffle & Oatmeal Bar
•Pets ok
•15 minutes from West Asheville
•Private entrance with deck
•100% Giza Cotton Dream Sheets
•Fire Table on the deck
•Fire Pit (shared space, RSVP, provide own wood & supplies)
•Fully equipped kitchen
•Washer & dryer, iron w/board
•High speed WiFi (100+ mbps)
•55” HD Smart TV & Roku Ultra
•HBO Max, Amazon Prime, Disney+, Hulu
•Bed side charging stations
•Picnic basket with blanket
•Insulated hiking backpack
•Webber BBQ Grill (bring charcoal/matches)

name: Spacious Asheville Studio - A Dream for Couples!
description:
We can’t wait for you to enjoy our private guest suite! Located in a quiet neighborhood just north of Asheville, you can enjoy a private wooded setting and still be just minutes from The Grove Park inn, Downtown, The Biltmore, and many excellent restaurants and breweries.

Spend your mornings enjoying sunshine and coffee by the French Broad River. Enjoy walks around Beaver Lake or sunsets on the Blue Ridge Parkway. Get ready to take advantage of everything western North Carolina has to offer!

name: Central AVL location & 1/2 mile to Biltmore Estate
description: Experience the perfect blend of comfort and style at our Urban Farmhouse.   Looking for an extended stay for work or pleasure, building a home and need a temporary place to live or escaping a warmer climate for the mountain air,  our home will comfortably suit your needs.  Located only 2.5 miles to AVL’s medical community.  Nestled in a prime location, our home is just a stones throw to the iconic Biltmore Estate main gate!  Come and enjoy the charm and elegance of a truly exceptional stay!

name: Private Cottage with Yard,  Great Location
description:
Comfortable studio cottage with private patio and yard. This cottage is part of a larger 1922 estate in the historic Saint Dunstans District. The cottage is furnished with a queen-size Murphy bed, gas fireplace, full kitchen, dishwasher, new refrigerator and oven, spacious bath with towel warmer, freestanding modern tub and separate glass shower. Laundry.
1 mile to downtown, half mile to the Biltmore shopping village, the entrance of the Biltmore Estate, short walk to breweries and restaurants.

name: West Asheville Hideaway
description: Private, cozy, garage apartment, located on the west side of Asheville.  The space has one bedroom, living room, full kitchen, and private uncovered deck.  Enjoy your morning coffee on the secluded deck overlooking meadows and mountains. Convenient location, just 7 miles from downtown Asheville, 3 miles from west Asheville restaurants and breweries and 2 miles from I-40.  Easy access parking located just steps from the door.  This is a perfect space for a dog because of the large outdoor area.

name: Pet Friendly - Lower Berne Chalet
description:
The Lower Berne is a unique getaway located only 2 miles from all the excitement of Downtown Asheville, yet nestled up on Beaucatcher mountain in a community surrounded by trees & nature, close to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Our pet friendly Lower Berne Chalet offers a king bedroom with a desk, one full bath, living room, and a well-appointed kitchen including all the convenience of home. Enjoy the sunrise from the screened in, furnished porch with an adjacent private, fenced in dog yard.

name: Lake View House 2.8 Miles to Downtown
description:
Beautiful private and spacious 1000 square foot apartment on the top floor of our home overlooking Beaver Lake and only minutes to downtown.

This two-bedroom, one bath apartment includes a family room, a covered and screened porch, two Smart TV's, as well as access to a full-sized washer and dryer.

name: Spacious Garden Level Suite! Walkable to the Best!
description:
Great 900 sq ft space to enjoy Asheville with the ability to relax in a large space with an 82” TV and Queen size Tempurpedic bed.

Ever wanted to enjoy the mountains and be within walking distance of the coolest spots? It offers plenty of natural light, great views of the backyard with creek, separate parking and entrance. This is a garden level walk-in with separate step free entrance.

name: Treetops cozy hilltop loft Mtn views
description:
★ Sleek modern quiet loft that's sunny spacious and comfortable with mountain views!

★ Completely private!

★ One block off Haywood Road in the heart of West Asheville.

★ Walk or bike to restaurants, coffee shops, pubs, live music, and local brewery's like
New Belgium, Archetype, One World, Wedge, Upcountry, Oyster House, & All Sevens's !

★ Just 1 mile to Carrier Park, French Broad River Greenway and River Arts

★ 2.4 mi to Downtown

★ Off-street parking

★ Fire Pit

★ Sorry no pets

name: Lodges at beaver lake unit 302
description:
Located five minutes from downtown, easy access to everything Asheville has to offer. The lodge is within walking distance of a YMCA, several restaurants, and Beaver Lake. The Blue Ridge parkway and many other hiking destinations are ten minutes or less drive from our site.
Our lodges have private entrances with key-less entry, fully equipped kitchens, comfortable furnishings and a memory foam air mattress with extra pillows and linens if needed. we have a 30$ pet fee per stay for pets

name: Asheville - Blue Ridge Parkway Getaway
description: Located just ten minutes from downtown Asheville, the River Arts district and 20 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and Biltmore Estate entrance. We offer a nice one bedroom full apartment ( full size kitchen, full bath, bedroom and living room) with a pullout queen sofa bed. We live  in a quite neighborhood. The apartment is part of a duplex. Also It is a good rental for visiting business professionals. We offer free WiFi and TV with Fire Stick, Hulu Live, Netflix and some local stations.

name: New 3 BR Get-Away just off Haywood Rd W Asheville
description: West Asheville charming executive home with lovely hardwoods, granite, Smart TV's, hot tub and Walking Distance (1 block) to Haywood St - West Asheville, 5 minutes from downtown, 7 minutes to the Biltmore House, 8 minutes to the Grove Park Inn, multiple golf courses, close to many water falls & special experiences that the Asheville area has to offer.  Fenced back yard, 3 BR 2.5 BA upstairs, GREAT neighborhood - quick walk or quick drive to about anywhere - in the Heart of Asheville, close to 26

name: Hot Tub… Relaxing Retreat
description: Sunny, stylish home just blocks from restaurants & breweries! Walk to almost anything DT in 10-20 min. 6-PERSON HOT TUB. Indoor fireplace! Beautiful chef's kitchen w/ wall oven & 5 burner gas stove. High efficiency heat & A/C. Fast WiFi + Cable & Apple TV. Covered front porch w/ seating. Big back deck w/ Adirondack chairs & dining. Backyard sunsets w/ fire-pit & grill. Laundry room w/ storage. Comfortable furniture & beds. Free/off-street parking

name: TheRedHenCottage*HotTub*Asheville*withEVcharger!
description: The Red Hen Cottage invites you! With amenities like hot tub and EV charging station. 2 miles to downtown Asheville, 6 miles to Biltmore, and skiing (30min). Tucked into the local environment of Breweries/Local business/Industrial/Art Studios/Tubing/Music and more! You will find Asheville's influence with food and art in mind, new kitchen appliances and handcrafted counters and bar stools. Check out our latest video: You tube search: The Red Hen Cottage Asheville NC

name: 80 LEX 201 Exquisite Downtown Apt
description:
This is it.

In a city all about it's micro-neighborhoods, N. Lexington Avenue is The Neighborhood. This is the historic and cultural center of downtown Asheville, once home to farmers and growers and today the heart of all things trendy, artsy and quintessential.

And on hip Lexington Ave., Apartment 201 at 80 LEX – a building once the town's feed and seed warehouse, now its hottest address – is THE place: a 1-bedroom, 1-bath apartment + one free parking space, that breathes Asheville chic.

name: La Maison du Bonheur: The Peaceful Room
description:
Welcome to my peaceful home on a quiet street located only 7.7 miles from the Asheville Airport (AVL), 2.5 miles to the entrance of The Biltmore Estate, and 5 miles from downtown Asheville. Access to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail is within walking distance with the Blue Ridge Parkway only five minutes away. With Interstate 40 Exit 51 only 1.5 miles away, you will have convenient access to the best of Asheville.
The closest food accommodations are about 1 mile. Car recommended.

name: Vintage Charm Right Where You Want to Be
description:
A comfortable, quiet space right between West Asheville and the River Arts District. Walk to everything both popular neighborhoods have to offer...hand-made doughnuts, dive bars, tubing, breweries, coffee, glass blowing, live music, and new restaurants. The apartment is also walk-able to downtown for the ambitious, otherwise it's a short ride.
When you're not exploring the city relax in the cozy living room or in the hammock on the back porch.

name: AVL Bungalow - 5 mins to DT
description:
ENTIRE HOME W/ FENCED YARD. Fully equipped for home stays
What you’ll love about this space:
- Walking distance to two breweries
- 2 miles from downtown bars & restaurants
- Sunny living space with large windows
- Beautiful trails and greenways nearby
- Thoughtfully equipped kitchen
- Excellent HVAC
- Fenced yard

This house has everything you need for a great visit to Asheville & it’s DOG FRIENDLY.

name: Spacious 2 bedroom apartment near Biltmore Estate
description: Come enjoy a private mountain apartment, near Biltmore Estate, AVL airport, and Blue Ridge Parkway. We are nestled in a lovely rural, wooded neighborhood that feels remote, but is only a few miles from convenience. Our rental is a PRIVATE basement apartment in our home with a separate entrance about 1500 sq ft. We live upstairs with our 2 children and dog, guests will occasionally hear us. If you’re looking for a clean, spacious place to stay near Asheville, we have the perfect space for you. :)

name: Country Chic House with a Hot Tub Near Downtown Asheville
description: We are OPEN post hurricane! We have power, water, hot tub and internet. Roads are clear and safe to the house.

name: The Lodges at Beaver lake unit 303
description:
Located five minutes from downtown, easy access to everything Asheville has to offer. The lodge is within walking distance of a YMCA, several restaurants, and Beaver Lake. The Blue Ridge Parkway and many other hiking options are a ten minute or less drive from our site.
Our lodges have private entrances with key-less entry, fully equipped kitchens, comfortable furnishings and a memory foam air mattress with extra pillows and linens if needed.This unit is closest to the rd and has a pet fee$ 30

name: 2 FULL Baths. 2 BRs. Right Downtown. Quiet.
description: 2 FULL Bathrooms.  2 Master-Bedrooms with hotel-quality bedding. w/ amenities (fluffy white towels, shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer.) Breakfast, coffee, tea, other beverages provided. Kitchen. Beautiful, sparkling clean, quiet, comfortable condo has everything you need for a wonderful stay in Asheville. Ideal for 2 couples, friends, or families. Includes 1 dedicated parking spot. Walk to everything. The best restaurants, music and more are just outside your door.

name: Bailey Ridge
description: This home is very convenient to I 26, Asheville Outlets, Biltmore Park, Blue Ridge Parkway, downtown Asheville and the NC Arboretum. Less than 10 miles to the Biltmore Estate, the Ag Center and Sierra Nevada. There is full service grocery store within a mile. There are several private owned restaurants within a mile. Parties and events are not allowed.

name: Brookstone Lodge Asheville Biltmore Village Area
description: Enhance your experience with all that Asheville NC has to offer.  Scenic hikes, breathtaking views, and historic downtown Asheville offer an abundance of adventures.  Explore the live music, fine dining, and vibrant arts scene sure to appeal to all.  ,  Brookstone Lodge is located in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. 1.5 miles from Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village offering many popular social gathering places.

name: Mountain Views, Minutes to Work
description: Main floor of a two-story home. Open floor plan with plenty of light. Two sliding glass doors onto a deck with mountain views (Craggy's Pinnacle).  Large bedroom with office space. Kitchen and living areas are open and tastefully finished (we think.) Kitchen and bath are both recently refinished. Plenty of off-street parking. Quiet dead-end street. Bird viewing from kitchen windows. Minutes to Biltmore village, downtown and the Blue Ridge. 30-day minimum stay.

name: Enchanting Cottage near Downtown Asheville
description: Be immersed in the placid charm of this sun-soaked cottage, with its double height ceiling and back country atmosphere, yet 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate. Thankfully our property was spared from Hurricane Helene. Sleeps 8 with 2 Queen beds and 4 singles in loft. To address COVID19 concerns, professionally cleaned by a retired nurse using Airbnb's cleaning and disinfecting protocols. We have set up the rental calendar to have at least two days between guests.

name: PirateshipAVL - majestic enclave in River Arts
description:
Cozy studio -Newly remodeled bed + bath (now entirely separate from the main house / private entrance). Same brilliant location nestled between River Arts & West Asheville. There are many cute shops up the hill in West Asheville and a good bar/restaurant scene nearby - Anoche is my favorite!

5-minute walk to New Belgium, Hole Donuts, Grey Eagle, Cooperative Coffee, etc.
10-minute walk to Owl Bakery.
5-minute drive, bus, and Uber downtown or a 30-minute walk.

name: Imaginarium
description:
Come, dreamers. Rest from your journey at this luxurious castle in the sky. Slumber beneath the stars... inhabit ethereal beauty apart from the mundane world.

Imaginarium, woven into the fabric of reality by Ashevillian craftspeople inspired by an exclusive EONAHS design, features four rooms – all distinctly different – yet flow together as one.

Located in the best neighborhood and area of Asheville, this private loft is your gateway to unforgettable adventure.

name: Historic Asheville Home - Montford (Walk Downtown)
description: Beautifully renovated 1915 historic home set on 1/2 Acre. 10 minute walk from downtown Asheville. 4 bedrooms upstairs (King, 2 Queens, 1 twin), Gourmet Kitchen, spacious living room, 2 working fireplaces, Yoga Room, upstairs laundry, attached studio space with its own entrance, bathroom, kitchen space & sleeping loft.  Fenced in backyard with Sand Box, garden space, outdoor seating area, large back porch.

name: Edwin Place
description:
My home is a restored 100 year old house within the city of Asheville, one mile from Rt. 240 & close to downtown. Just a 25 minute walk or a 6 minute ride to the heart of downtown; a ten minute drive to the Biltmore Estate, and one block from the Grove Park Inn golf course.
This is a family oriented neighborhood in a historic district, Grove Park, designed in the early 20th Century.

name: Biltmore and Brewery Base-Camp
description: Our studio apartment is located just atop the hill above historic Biltmore Village.  From here, enjoy an easy downhill (10 min) stroll through our quiet neighborhood to make your way to the action. The historic village, that once served as the logistical basecamp for the construction of the Biltmore estate, has since transformed into a boutique shopping district and is now home to 5 breweries, a distillery, and excellent dining options. The home itself is tucked away providing peace and quiet.

name: Tent Site #2 @The Baying Hound Campground
description: Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

name: Green Acres Groove w/ HOT TUB,  8 Miles to ASHV
