description: The Green Acres Groove is  a 3 BR / 2 Bath home positioned on a partially wooded park like setting of  2.5 acres.  Enjoy the groovy retro décor and the blissful location which is centrally located to both Asheville and Hendersonville NC.   The Groove is only 8 miles from downtown  Asheville where you'll find the  Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn, French Broad River Arts District.  Nearby are hiking trails, mountain biking trails and hot springs, etc.   Its close to everything Asheville.  Enjoy!

name: Sweet Suite in Asheville Y'all!
description: Location, location, location! Garden level suite w/private entrance great for exploring Asheville & Western NC.  Whether you are drawn here to explore our craft brewing and beverage scene, interested in the Biltmore Estate (only a 12 min drive), want to hike or mountain bike, or experience our arts and crafts culture, this suite is for you.  We offer easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway, I-40,  I-26 and downtown.  Hosts can provide recommendations to make your Asheville experience memorable!

name: The Asheville Frog
description: Climb a set of exterior stairs thru your private entrance and enter a bright, airy, modern space with some mid-century charm. You'll be welcomed into the space by beautiful floors made from reclaimed barn wood. An open floor plan includes the living room with 55" smart TV, kitchen and dining areas. The kitchen is fully equipped. The bedroom has a super comfy queen bed, dresser and large walk-in closet. We are 100% solar powered and offer a Level 2 EV charger for guests.

name: We're OPEN: Woodland Retreat w/HOT TUB & DECKS
description:
We're open: all utilities & amenities available/restored!
Let Woodland Retreat be your relaxation headquarters with an outdoor hot tub just 2 miles from downtown Asheville with self check-in! Entire property is extremely private and surrounded in native plants and trees! Stand on the front deck and glimpse life at tree level and enjoy waterfall sounds. The back deck is shady, has a charcoal grill & is the beginning of our nature trail.

name: Explore Breweries, Trails, & Galleries from West Asheville
description: A relaxing mountain getaway located in one of Asheville's best areas! Guests enter at the garden-level, featuring a beautiful, private, outdoor patio and garden. Inside, discover a cozy living room, kitchenette, modern bathroom, and a large bedroom with lots of natural light and views of the dahlias, sunflowers, and neighborhood trees.  The apartment is the perfect location for business travelers or couples and friends looking to explore our wonderful city in the Blue Ridge Mountains.

name: Beaver lake lodges 301
description:
Located five minutes from downtown, easy access to everything Asheville has to offer. The lodge is within walking distance of a YMCA, several restaurants, and Beaver Lake. The Blue Ridge parkway and many other hiking destinations are ten minutes or less drive from our site.
Our lodges have private entrances with key-less entry, fully equipped kitchens, comfortable furnishings and a memory foam air mattress with extra pillows and linens if needed.

name: EastWest Asheville with Private Entrance
description: We welcome you to our home in West Asheville.  Our wonderful neighborhood is located conveniently near I-26 between Haywood Road and The French Broad River.  Here you will have a cozy, safe place that offers you a private entrance while visiting and exploring the area.  Within blocks is New Belgium and a bit further across the bridge is the River Arts District.

name: Laura's Landing
description: Fabulous location - inside and out - for couples or singles who want a VERY clean space and a private landscaped patio within walking distance to Asheville's vibrant downtown and the South Slope area. Laura’s Landing is located in a small community next to a wooded area where you’re guaranteed to see a diversity of wildlife - including the occasional bear! We take pride in providing the best experience for our guests and enjoy helping to make your visit truly memorable! Check out the reviews!

name: #3 Dogwood Room - Oakland Cottage B&B
description: Dogwood #3 is a wonderful Queen bedroom on the first floor with it's own outside porch & private entry.  The entry foyer to the Dogwood Room, has a daybed for an extra guest.  Full private bath, TV, complimentary WIFI & off-street parking (just steps from your private entrance), in-room mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker.  Breakfast is healthy and hearty!  Served each morning in the dining area.  Additional common areas & amenities available to all guests at the inn.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Loft in the Countryside
description:
Get a taste of quiet country living next to a peaceful pasture. Gaze at woodlands and mountains from a window and find a cozy loveseat to curl up on and read. Explore nearby breweries and return for a great night's sleep under a tall pitched roof.

The Nest is very private, peaceful and quiet. You will have an entire brand new garage apartment to yourself with your own entrance and two parking spaces. The loft contains a private spa-like bathroom with a large walk-in shower, cozy queen bed, relaxing sitting area and a small kitchenette. We also provide coffee and tea and all basic tolietries.

The guests will have their own private access/entrance but are welcome to take walks around our beautiful lane.

I am available for any questions or recommendations. We love to chat with our guests and introduce ourselves but will also maintain your privacy if desired.

The guest house is on a private road near a horse pasture. It is close to Hendersonville

name: Modern Bungalow Just 10 Minutes Walk to Downtown
description:
Private Room within a Shared home. Brand new KING BED! I offer two suites within the home and a third I live in. GREAT location! Walk downtown in 5-10 minutes! This Newly renovated Historic Asheville home with modern amenities is the perfect place to recharge after a day of Adventuring around our lovely little town!

There are 3 grocery stores within a 3 minute walk, and a Local Diner at the corner!

This is a shared home. Shared space include Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen and Bathroom.

name: Big House only 12 minutes from Downtown Asheville
description:
Our peaceful haven is nestled in a small quiet neighborhood, just 12 minutes from
downtown Asheville. The house sits on 1.25 acres, with large yard and forest, treehouse, and trampoline for endless adventure. Woodfin Riverside Park, only 1.5 miles away, offers fishing, kayaking, cycling, and tranquil walks along the river. Take in the scenery and enjoy a cup of coffee from High Five. Come experience the magic of our home, where adventure, joy, and peace unite to create unforgettable memories.

name: Luxury home w/ chef's kitchen, screened porch
description:
Luxurious home in a quiet neighborhood, close to everything. Huge windows provide tons of natural light. Open floor plan with chef's dream kitchen & comfortable bedrooms.

Fabulous outdoor spaces for cooking out or just relaxing. Covered porch is a true oasis. Escape there with a book and a glass of wine or share with friends after dinner.

Walking distance from the Folk Art Center and the Blue Ridge Parkway. 5 minutes to downtown, 10 minutes to world famous Biltmore Estate.

name: 80 LEX 202 Iconic Location
description:
80 LEX Apartment 202 : Iconic Downtown Location 1 BD King / 1 BA private apartment at 80 N. Lexington Ave, includes one off street designated parking space, less than a block away.

They say that wherever you go, there you are.

We say, when you go to Asheville, this is where you want to be. Right here, in the heart of Asheville. Right here, on N. Lexington Ave., in a building once home to farmers and growers and today the heart of all things trendy, artsy and quintessential.

name: Tent Site #1 @The Baying Hound Campground
description: Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read the full description for more details!

name: Relaxing private suite  Us and Biltmore !
description: Located in South Asheville, and a quick 15 minutes from many of Asheville's top attractions. 3 miles to the Biltmore House, 3 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway and a short 15-minute drive or Uber to the heart of downtown. Please come enjoy a slice of our Mountain Bliss!

name: Honey's Place: Asheville • River Arts • Biltmore
description: Honey's Place is a private, modern, garden-level 2 bedroom apartment. Conveniently located 5 miles (10-15 mins drive) from Downtown and the River Arts district. Easy access to I-26, UNC-Asheville, and the Biltmore Estate. Clean, quiet, and spacious with a full kitchen. Wake up to complementary coffee and tea. Luxury, hypoallergenic bed linens on all beds and original art on the walls. Stay here to relax, recharge, and explore the beauty of Asheville!

name: Very Special Downtown Asheville Loft
description:
Come stay in this very special loft, located in historic downtown Asheville, a romantic and unique city surrounded by the beauty of Western North Carolina's mountains.

Our loft is on the 3rd floor of a private and secure building, renovated and beautifully furnished to include a king size bed more comfortable than the one at home, a 52' television, satellite radio, central air, and a fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops.

Enjoy local eateries and breweries right outside your door.

name: Private Suite with in-house massage
description:
Complete privacy with in-house massage appointments available.

This spacious room has a private entryway, deck, and full bathroom separated from the rest of the home by a lockable doorway. This cozy accommodation features views of downtown, a centralized location, off-street parking, TV, coffee and tea, a mini fridge, hardwood floors, and a soft, comfortable king-size bed. Also, the option to book a massage for your stay. I am a licensed massage therapist and offer treatments to my guests.

name: Tiny Home at the Gardens—Near Center of Asheville
description: Pocket of peace just outside city limits. Tiny Home sits on hill overlooking 2-acre native flower nursery, orchard, meadows and surrounding mountains. Feels like you're in the country, yet you're a 10-15 min drive from eclectic downtown & famous Biltmore. Pine-cedar paneled 8'x24' studio layout is bright and sunny with high ceilings. Full-size bath/tub. Comfy queen-size bed. Full-size mattress in loft. Well-equipped kitchen. Composting toilet. Please see Location section for post-hurricane info.

name: West Asheville Private Studio Apartment
description: Entire lower level Studio apartment. Private separated entrance.  Separated off street parking in guest dedicated driveway. Established West Asheville neighborhood.  A comfortable, clean, safe place where you can sleep sound and rest easy.  3.3 miles to downtown Asheville. Less than 1/4 mile to many close by West Asheville Haywood Road restaurants.

name: 1 mile from downtown, patio w/ sunset view!
description:
This bohemian haven offers vintage pieces, handmade and artful decor, and a sweet look at local life.

✔ Prime Location: Only 1 mile from downtown’s best attractions.
✔ Comfortable Living: Fully equipped kitchen, cozy seating, and hotel-quality bedding.
✔ Outdoor Bliss: Firepit, patio and mountain views.
✔ Bright and Minimalist: Stylish interiors with warm, inviting touches.
✔ Perfect for romantic getaways, work trips, or a peaceful retreat in any season

name: Studio #1 / Modern Design / 8mins to DWTN AVL
description: Only 8 mins. drive to downtown, 5 mins. drive to Biltmore Estate and 5 mins drive to Blue Ridge Parkway, this sleek and modern studio apartment in a quiet residential neighborhood is a comfortable, stylish oasis and home base for exploring all of Asheville. Artfully appointed and all brand new!

name: Cave Creek Hideaway
description: Enjoy this private space tucked into the woods of South Asheville, conveniently located to downtown Asheville,  Biltmore Estate,  Arboretum,  Blue Ridge Parkway, WNC Ag Center,  Asheville Outlet Mall, hiking trails, and Sierra Nevada Brewing while still allowing you to enjoy a quiet mountain retreat.

name: 80 LEX 203 Eclectic Industrial Apt
description:
80 LEX Apartment 203 : 1 BD King / 1 BA 565 SQ FT private downtown apt at 80 N. Lexington Ave includes one free designated off street parking space a half a block away.

Embrace the unique charm of this boutique space in an iconic red brick property. The loft-inspired private apartment features exposed original walls, dark surfaces, contrasting textures and patterns, an array of unique furnishings, and curated artwork throughout.

name: 80 LEX 204 Industrial Chic Apt
description:
80 LEX APT 204 : Industrial Chic Meets the Old World 1 BD King / 1 BA private apartment in downtown Asheville at 80 N. Lexington Ave + one designated, free off street parking space, in a private parking lot one block away

Wake up next to striking exposed brickwork in 80 LEX Apartment 204, designed to epitomize the chic and rustic flavor of trendy Asheville. It boasts soaring ceilings with a curated collection of antique and new furnishings, and thickly layered textures, colors and patterns.

name: West Asheville Artist Sanctuary
description: Charming artist retreat in the heart of West Asheville. A light-filled, uplifting atmosphere with colorful, whimsical decor and an expansive back deck for sunsets and libations. This is the perfect place to relax, recharge and reset. 25 min. walk to Haywood Rd. and West Asheville's restaurants, breweries, stores, and more! 5 minute drive to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, River Arts District, The Arboretum, farmer's markets, and the French Broad. EZ access to frwys & anywhere in WNC!

name: Chateau on Patton Mountain! Minutes to downtown!
description: Welcome to the Mountains! This beautiful and private 4BD/3.5BA home features hardwood floors, large bedrooms, walk in closets, stainless appliances, pool table, 12 person hot tub, garden tub, 2 master suites (one on each level), MOUNTAIN VIEWS and to top it off its just a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville!

name: West Asheville Rustic Studio
description: Asheville is opening back up! Located in the heart of West Asheville, quiet, cozy space that provides everything you need for your get away to Asheville. Kitchen area has coffee maker, fridge and microwave. Private entrance and sunroom is perfect for morning coffee. Walking distance to everything on Haywood Road. 5 minutes to downtown Asheville, 6 miles to the Biltmore House. Convenient to I-26, I-40 and off of I-240.

name: West Asheville Gem! *Laundry service included!
description:
Located in fun and funky West Asheville, this lovely private apartment is within walking distance of iconic Haywood Road, full of charming shops, eateries, music venues, breweries, etc.! It's amazingly convenient to Asheville's famous River Arts District, the Arboretum, Carrier Park, downtown Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and anywhere else you care to explore!

Offering plenty of natural light, the apartment is a welcoming and sparkling clean home away from home.

name: "The Grotto" Private King-size Suite (monthly)
description: Enjoy "the Grotto," our cozy and conveniently located private suite in the heart of West Asheville! Featuring private entrance / apartment, over-sized soaking tub, well-appointed kitchenette, dining area, couch, desk, and comfy king-sized bed.

name: **Asheville's Good Vibes Pet Friendly Suite**
description:
*Fast WiFi*
*Pet Friendly*
*Hot Tub*
* No Cleaning Fee*
* Your apartment suite is private and quiet but close to so much!
*Private Driveway*
*Private Covered Patio with HOT TUB, FIRE PIT & Beautiful Views*
*Excellent Water Pressure*
CLOSE TO:
*1 Mile to Crest Center & Pavilion*
*6 Miles to Biltmore Estate*
*4.4 Miles to Downtown Asheville*
*3.3 Miles to West Asheville center*
*3.4 Miles to New Belgium Brewery*
*4.6 Miles to Wicked Weed Brewery*

name: Pet friendly basement studio apt in West Asheville
description:
This is a pleasant and cozy(small-220 square feet) basement apartment. With an efficient camper sized bathroom.There is a comfy futon similar to a bed, and also a Queen size bed.
We are 5 minutes from West Asheville shops and restaurants, and 10 to 15 minutes from downtown.
I provide towels,soap, bedding, coffee and water.
Pets should be leashed at all times.
There is also a smart TV with Spectrum TV
* wooded basement apt,sometimes daddy long legs creep in despite my pet safe traps
No smoking

name: Stylish Asheville Home Walking Distance to City
description:
Private Room within a Shared home. I offer two suites within the home and a third I live in. GREAT location! Walk downtown in 5-10 minutes! This Newly renovated Historic Asheville home with modern amenities is the perfect place to recharge after a day of Adventuring around our lovely little town!

There are three grocery stores within a 3 minute walk, and a favorite Local Diner around the corner!

This is a shared home. Shared space includes Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen and Bathroom.

name: Historic King Room on 2nd floor in B&B
description: Indulge in an authentic b&b experience with amenities. Be a guest at our 1905 inn, located in historic Montford, 1 mile from downtown Asheville and near UNC-Asheville. Private king room with ensuite bathroom.   Homemade breakfast at 9am.  Quiet street with free  parking and great location. Walk to downtown, just 3 miles to Biltmore, and convenient to interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: {The Glendell} Entire home in Arden with backyard
description: The Glendell is a great home base for up to 5 guests. Our home is located in the South end of Asheville, in an area called Arden. Within minutes, you can access Asheville's best outdoor amenities, shopping and dining.

name: Near Downtown Asheville
description:
Enjoy your stay at our warm and cozy detached cottage that offers you privacy and is only five minutes to the fun of downtown Asheville, under five minutes to the University of North Carolina Asheville campus, and close to the Biltmore House and Blue Ridge Parkway.

The cottage stands alone along a quaint brook with seating and tables.
Listen to the many sounds of numerous birds!

name: 3 Mile Cabin, 3 miles to Downtown, Hot Tub, Views
description: AMAZING HOT TUB! Beautiful, super clean cozy cabin, fully stocked kitchen with gas grill and outdoor fire ring (dry firewood provided).  Beautiful views of the Blue Ridge Mountains and the pasture on our property.  Very private, parking, Netflix, Amazon Prime, fast WiFi, great hot tub to relax at the end of the day. Biltmore Estate  is only 6 miles away. Downtown Asheville is 3 miles away. Stay with us and you will see why we have hundreds of 5 star reviews, owner operated.

name: Convenience, Charm and Comfort
description: You'll love this spacious and airy apartment nestled in the historic tree lined Montford District. Delight in eclectic sun filled rooms with old world charm. This one bedroom, fully outfitted rental  has been recently, lovingly, and completely remodeled. You will find that you never felt more at home while traveling...

name: Hip Asheville "Cabin-Esque" Getaway -  3 Bdrm's
description: Welcome to a cozy, rustic-modern getaway- a restored 1940s “cabin-esque” gem w/ vintage soul & funky character. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood 9 mins to Downtown Asheville & UNCA. Dine in the roomy kitchen, relax on the gated deck, or let loose in a big grassy yard - great for groups, kids & your pup! Locally sourced, refinished furniture adds to the vibe. Unwind by the fire pit or fire up the BBQ. Cable TV included. 15 mins to Biltmore & Blue Ridge Parkway. Your AVL home base w/ personality.

name: Double Tent Site #3 @The Baying Hound Campground
description: Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

name: Cozy Comfy Eclectic Home in West Asheville near Downtown
description: Lean back on a couch in a living room filled with eclectic and vintage accent pieces while listening to vinyl collections. This 1928 house showcases original character such as hardwood floors, staircase, and wood trim.  It is a comfortable and homey retreat after exploring the beautiful city of Asheville.  It is located in West Asheville and is close to Downtown and to other top destinations such as Biltmore House, Grove Park Inn, River Arts District, and Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Asheville "Cabin-Esque" Getaway - 4 Bdrm's
description: Welcome to your cozy-hip mountain hideaway: a restored 1940s “cabin-esque” gem with funky style & old world mountain pizzazz. A 4 bedroom, 2 bath retreat with creative design, a wet bar, and spacious gated deck perfect for relaxing or entertaining with your pup! Set on a peaceful acre with a fire pit & open grassy yard. Tucked in a quiet country neighborhood just 9 mins to Dwntown Asheville & UNCA, 15 mins to Biltmore & Blue Ridge Parkway. It’s a soulful spot for an unforgettable Asheville stay.

name: West Asheville loft
description: This is a cozy upstairs garage apartment located in West Asheville.  It's an 8 mile drive to downtown Asheville and less than 2 miles off interstate 40.

name: Healing & Yoga Home 10min from Dtwn Asheville #2
description:
As a Mother Nature lover, gardener and artist, I've focused on creating a peaceful & soothing space in my home for those who travel and want to stay somewhere that is contemporary, unique, convenient and extraordinarily clean.

Located between West Asheville and Candler. Easily accessible to Hwy 40 and Smokey Parkway; only a 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville.

If this room is not available feel free to check my other private room #1
https://abnb.me/lsi1N4LN71

name: Billiards Bunkhouse- Koi Pond & Outdoor Fireplace
description: Come stay in a relaxing, spacious and bright, 500 square ft studio.  Choose to hang out by our beautiful koi pond and hand-feed our koi, chill by our outdoor fireplace next to the waterfall, or head to town for adventure!  The Bunkhouse is on a tranquil 1/2 mile gravel road, just 8 miles to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, and Riverside Drive, where there is river access, walking trails, UNCA Botanical Gardens, outdoor eateries, music venues, and much more!

name: Kmart’s Kastle  In Asheville
description:
Located in South Asheville
- approx. 7 miles south of downtown
- approx. 7 miles north of Airport/Sierra Nevada
This is a very convenient location located about one mile from all the great restaurants and shopping in South Asheville, yet tucked away for some nice privacy on an acre and a half lot providing nice outdoor space to enjoy yourself

name: Tent Site #4 @The Baying Hound Campground
description: Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

name: Close to All The Fun!
description: Private studio space in convenient N. Asheville available for 30 days or longer (month-to-month possible for longer). Has all essentials for a work stay or vacation in desirable Asheville, NC.  Basic kitchenette w/ refrigerator, microwave, toaster oven, 2-burner infrared ceramic hotplate. Full service for 2 w/ pots/pans, utensils, cups, wine glasses, & dinner ware.  Vacuum cleaner. Ironing board & iron. Generous drawer space, & bathroom has a large walk in shower and hanging storage for clothes.

name: Mt Air Private Apt.
description:
Enjoy your private apt., park in the shade at the front door. Less than a mile from I-40 (Exit 53 A); the Blue Ridge Parkway (MP 385). Easy access to all of the wonders of western North Carolina:
Biltmore Estate/Winery , gate 4.5 miles, 6 min.
Uptown Asheville 5.9 miles, 9 min.
Billy Graham Training Center, The Cove, 3 miles, 5 min.
Folk Art Center 3.9 miles, 7 min. drive
NC Mt. to Sea Trail .8 mile, 2 min. drive or 15 min. walk
Plethora of breweries....closest one 2.5 miles

name: Convenient and Cozy Lookout Retreat
description:
We love this beautiful area and are so happy to share it with others!
This cozy retreat (with private entrance and parking space!) is the perfect home base for all of your Asheville adventures! Conveniently located in North Asheville, it’s less than ten minutes from downtown, within walking distance to UNCA and central to many breweries and restaurants. This second floor apartment boasts light filled rooms and a tasteful, calming atmosphere.
All are welcome:)

name: Luxury Mountain Home near Biltmore & Breweries
description: Perfect for large groups and work teams! Two living rooms, full kitchen and game room. Six bedrooms and 4 full bathrooms offer privacy and convenience. Super convenient location. Perfect home base for your stay in Asheville! Near AVL Airport, WNC Ag Center & Hwy 26.

name: RAD house
description: Our home in the River Arts District is centrally located! We are a short downhill stroll to the artist shops and restaurants of the RAD and about a 10 minute walk to downtown/ south slope. Great hiking, the Biltmore , and Mission Hospital are only a few minutes drive. The spacious open floor layout of our home invites the gathering of friends and family. Off street parking, a fully equipped kitchen, and laundry available. Pets are negotiable. Please ask before booking about bringing your pet

name: *Ruby's Room* - 7 miles to Downtown Asheville!
description:
Perfectly located
1.2 miles off I-40, 6 miles to the Parkway 5 miles to the Asheville Outlets!
SUPER comfortable full-size (double) bed, Large (55") Smart TV, TONS of channels and FAST wifi!
It's Jason's house... We just live in it.
Jason is the golden retriever, he loves guests and so do we (3 humans, Jason and Wolf the cat), but if you don’t like pets and people this probably isn’t for you.
If you like to socialize, talk about travel, co-mingle, or are a foodie, COME ON IN, our door is open!

name: Bright, cozy Asheville suite w/ private entrance
description: We are located in the residential neighborhood of Oakley in East Asheville, with easy access by car to Biltmore Estate entrance, Downtown Asheville, and the Blue Ridge Parkway, all 10 minutes away. You will be in a private suite on the first floor of our home with your own entrance, bathroom, and mini fridge. While our neighborhood fared well in Helene, there are some areas in Asheville that are still rebuilding along the French Broad and Swannanoa River. We greatly appreciate your visits!

name: All Things Bright & Beautiful Apt  (Newly Built)
description:
A private entrance and space is a perfect place for your trip to Asheville. Enjoy fresh air on our private balcony.
Our cleaning crew is taking extra steps to sanitize in between guests, above and beyond our normal high standards of cleaning.

Location: east side of W. Asheville, overlooking the River and River Arts District.
1.5 miles to downtown Asheville and downtown West Asheville.
3 minute walk to New Belgium
5 minute walk to the Greenway
Bike and run on the beautiful new Greenway.

name: Creekside ~ w/HOTTUB~  8 miles to downtown Ashe NC
description: Private & safe 1 BR  just 8 miles from downtown Asheville NC , 13 miles from Hendersonville NC and only 3.5 miles to the airport and Blue Ridge Parkway.   Located on a partially wooded property abutting creek.  Niceties include a screened sitting porch with 2 person hot tub,  grill and propane fire pit  and covered parking at door for inclement weather. This property is not walking distance to a lake so I'm not sure why air bnb has this under lake category. However, Lake Julian is a 5 min drive

name: Garden Bungalow • Walk to Downtown • Greenway
description:
In the desirable, tree-lined Montford neighborhood, walk to downtown, restaurants, bars, cafes, music venues, shops, & grocery stores.

Lovingly updated 1926 bungalow, lots of windows, natural light, original hardwood floors, clawfoot bathtub, front & back porches, backyard creek and greenway.

One month to multi-month available. Send an inquiry to discuss dates.

name: Bright guest suite, hiking access | 7 Min to town
description: Bright, welcoming space just minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, and local restaurants and breweries. Located on a quiet cul-de-sac with direct trail access. Enjoy a cozy den, queen bed plus sleeper sofa, fast WiFi, modern bathroom with spacious walk-in shower, microwave, coffee maker, dresser, and full closet for a relaxed and comfortable stay.

name: HotTub | Views | FirePit | Pets | Wi-Fi | Hiking
description: Welcome to Asheville! *After Hurricane Helene, there is construction everywhere in Asheville so there may be some noise though we have had no complaints!* We are located in East Asheville, close to everything you would want to do - restaurants, parkway for biking, hiking, minutes to Biltmore and downtown.  The over garage apartment is beautiful and laid out spaciously with beautiful views. Enjoy your time in town then come back for a relaxing evening by the fire, in the hot tub, under the stars!

name: Downtown in a Flash. Relax with Your Family
description: We love Asheville. We’d love for everyone to soak in the mountains, enjoy the dining, hiking, and wonderful city we call home. The 1400 square foot, newly renovated house is an easy 8 minute drive to the heart of downtown. We welcome families with small children and groups to relax, celebrate, and unwind in a truly special place.

name: The Last Minute Cottage Getaway
description: The Last Minute Cottage is a cozy recently updated STAND ALONE studio in a converted 1940's garage! It is conveniently located 4 blocks from popular Haywood Road and all the West Asheville shops, restaurants, and bars it has to offer.  Looking to get outside?  The French Broad River, Carrier Park, and the Greenway are only 1/2 mile away.  Easy access to float or stroll the river!  The cottage is also conveniently located only 2 miles from downtown and just 1 mile from the River Arts District.

name: No Bad Stays (1 Month Min.)
description: This adorable stand-alone bungalow is tucked in the trees, full of warm vibes, and ready to make your visit safe and relaxing. The home is on the same property as my house but is not attached. If you're here looking to buy a house, use me as your Realtor during your stay and you'll have the flexibility to move when you close and not pay for any extra days booked. NOTE: I prefer guests with 1 car due to limited parking.

name: Just an easy 10 minutes from downtown Asheville!
description:
* We are so grateful we had no damage from Hurricane Helene.
Hiking trails are starting to open up.
PLEASE REACH OUT if you have any questions.

Beautifully renovated for relaxing between adventures, this studio apartment with its own private entrance is just minutes away from downtown Asheville and from the up-and-coming downtown West Asheville.

name: Cottage in the Trees- Walk Downtown AVL- Hot Tub
description: Architech Designed Loft and Cozy-Styled  1 bd 2 bth apt. (625 sqft) Overlooking Trees and DT AVL. PVT HOT TUB, Kitchen, Large Porch in RockWall Garden Nook/Lounge Entrance, Bdrm Deck. Nestled amongst large trees in the Heart of beautiful Asheville. WALK to the HEART of DOWNTOWN in 7 Min. FREE PRIVATE PARKING! Iconic Pack Square, South Slope, French Broad Chocolate Lounge among all breweries, restaurants n coffee houses 10 min Walk. Cozy. Relaxing. Romantic. Modern Open apt. attached to the home.

name: 1950s Boutique Bungalow w/ Patio-Walkable West AVL
description: Come Vacation/work in an American Golden Age Vintage bungalow in one of the hippest neighborhoods in historic Asheville (Three Blocks/Five minute walking distance to Haywood Road. Breweries, live music venues, restaurants, arcade, coffee shops. Ten minutes to Pisgah Natl Forest and blue ridge parkway. 1.1 mile to Hominy Creek River Park where there’s a “Put-In” for watercraft and also the beginning of the French Broad Greenway. No Kids allowed no exceptions

name: Heart and Hearth Cottage
description: This lovely home sits atop a ridge 7 miles Northwest of downtown Asheville. We have a large garden in spring, summer, and fall. There is a gentle western view of the mountains. We are close to hiking, biking, and river fun. Sit around the fire in the evening at the rock fire pit, or relax in the gazebo to the sound of the water feature. The excitement of downtown Asheville is a 15 minute drive away.

name: Upstream Penthouse - Ask about Wedding Venue
description:
Step into a rooftop hot tub at the end of an active day and slowly unwind under the stars. Find plenty of cozy beds in colorful rooms for the whole family. Descend a staircase to an upscale kitchen and enjoy wide woodland views of the mountains, the Biltmore Estate and French Broad River. The patio is a perfect place to enjoy a cup of morning joe or watch the sunset while sipping your favorite cocktail. No parties or events

This Eco-Friendly home was designed and built exclusively for luxury Vacations.

Entire house.

Will be available personally.

The house is perched above the French Broad River, across from the Biltmore Estate. It's near a park with bike paths leading into Downtown Asheville and New Belgium Brewery. Launch a tube from the new boat ramp directly across from the house.

The River Arts District is centrally located and only a short Uber into town. Or, follow the Greenway bike paths.

name: Downtown Condo Self Checkin. Walk Everywhere -Safe
description:
Everything is right at your doorstep from this downtown condo located only a stone’s throw away from all the shops and restaurants that Asheville has to offer. Take advantage of the free parking to save time and money. Easy interstate access. No traffic noise.



The kitchen is fully equipped for easy preparation of snacks or meals.

High speed internet. Wired and wireless for you work needs. Folding portable work desk available in closet.

name: Modern, minimalist, spacious W. Asheville studio
description:
Large private studio in immaculate West Asheville home. Walking distance to hip Haywood Road and its many coffee shops, bars, shops, and restaurants. Private entrance and located on a quiet, residential street (you can hear the crickets at night). The studio offers everything you'll need for a comfortable stay: queen bed, new bath, plush sofa, table for two, and other thoughtful amenities.

Your pup will be allowed upon approval. A $75.00 non refundable pet fee will be applied after approval.

name: South Asheville Serenity
description:
Beautiful, fully-remodeled home on 2-acre wooded lot near Asheville airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, Blue Ride Pkwy and Biltmore House. Home is right out of HGTV with 2 indoor fireplaces, an outdoor fireplace, bar and dining room! This home has plenty of character. Very comfortable, quiet and a short ride to downtown! Great for families or multiple couples.
***NEW Outdoor fireplace. Firewood available. Beautifully landscaped back yard with stone walls and unique plants.
No pets allowed

name: Welcome to Asheville! Private room #1
description: This cozy getaway is on a private road with minimal traffic, making it a very quiet and peaceful place to relax. Perfect for students, working professionals. Couples getaway. Or just someone passing through that needs a great place to rest. The owners/occupants of this property still resides here and as a result, maintains it with great care and uncompromising cleanliness. Guest will self check in with lockbox. Instructions step by step will be provided

name: Magic mountain new west Asheville chalet
description: Magical mountain home! This new  4 bedroom home, completed in July 2018, sits nestled above Carrier Park with sweeping, panoramic views of the mountains and the French Broad River. Perfect for a family vacation or a getaway. Enjoy an easy stroll to Asheville Adventure Park where you can rent tubes and kayaks for a spectacular ride on the river. Only a short drive or Uber ride to downtown, the house is a wonderful retreat  furnished in a contemporary decor.  It was unscathed by the storm.

name: Family Retreat 10 min DT AVL & Biltmore 4 min Pkwy
description: Nestled in a serene, wooded neighborhood, our cozy family home is just a 10 min drive from the lively heart of downtown Asheville, 10 min to the Biltmore Estate, and 4 min to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Gather around the firepit on cool evenings, and awaken to the chirping of birds on our tree-canopied deck. This inviting haven is well-suited for family gatherings, couples, and groups. It offers comfortable living spaces, a fully equipped kitchen, and options for indoor and outdoor dining.

name: Grove Park Bungalow
description: Recently renovated bungalow in desirable Grove Park neighborhood. This is a 3-bedroom, 2 full bath home with a fenced backyard. Walk to the Grove Park Inn, bike the Blue Ridge Parkway or head downtown for food, music and fun or simply hang out on the sleeping porch with beautiful Mountain View’s. This house has it all and is located 1 mile north of downtown. This is a minimum 30-day rental.

name: Malvern Phoenix -  West Asheville
description: Family-friendly, cozy West Asheville basement apartment, with private entrance and covered porch. Walk to the park & explore the creek along a beautiful walking trail. 2 blcks from bowling, ice cream & restaurants. It's a 2-min drive to the famous Haywood St for coffee shops, restaurants, live music, shopping, and more.  It's a 9-min drive to Downtown.  If you're kind & respectful, you're our type of people and welcome at our home!  We hope you enjoy our little town as much as we do! No cats.

name: Welcome to Asheville! Private room #2
description: This cozy getaway is on a private road with minimal traffic, making it a very quiet and peaceful place to relax. Perfect for students, working professionals. Couples getaway. Or just someone passing through that needs a great place to rest. The owners/occupants of this property still resides here and as a result, maintains it with great care and uncompromising cleanliness.

name: Forest retreat near Biltmore and Downtown -Dogs OK
description: This Certified Green Built home is nestled in the forest, on 1.5 acres,  in the heart of Asheville. From here it's a 10-15 minute leisurely stroll down the hill to historic Biltmore Village. The suite is very close to 6-7 breweries, a distillery, chic retail, and some fantastic restaurants. Ask us for recommendations! The  Biltmore Estate entrance is also less than 2 miles away. Downtown is only a couple of miles away and is only a 5 minute Uber/Lyft ride away.  Fares are generally reasonable.

name: Tranquil Garden House
description: This 2 bedroom, 1 bath private house is located on its own half an acre of gardens. Surrounded by flowers, trees and birds the property is on a quiet, safe no outlet road. 15 minutes to downtown and 8 minutes to West Asheville makes guests feel close to everything but at their own garden oasis when they are at home. Highlights include: an inviting front porch and gardens, spacious living room and kitchen, 2 bedrooms with comfy queen beds & a pull out sofa in the office that sleeps 1.

name: Pocket Studio Apt • Walk to DownTown • Creekside
description:
Our cozy, clean & tranquil pocket studio is a perfect urban-oasis for the minimalist solo visitor and/or a close & in-sync couple. Walk to downtown, the greenway, yoga studio, restaurants, shopping, coffee, groceries, and breweries.

In the desirable, historic Montford neighborhood, 4 blocks from Asheville’s vibrant downtown, creekside greenway walking path & tree-lined streets. We invite you to experience the beauty and tranquility of the studio apartment coupled with the great location.

name: Asheville Mt Serendipity-Town Mt near downtown
description:
Wake up to birdsong and enjoy sunset over the mountains! Mountain Serendipity is a 1000sf 2-room suite and private patio surrounded by 1/2 acre of lush gardens. Great for remote work, fast wifi at 400 Mbps; Aeron desk chair available. 5 minute driving time to downtown Asheville.

Although the area is still recovering from the devastation of Hurricane Helene, Mountain Serendipity does have power, internet, running water and potable water.

name: Natural Homestay in Downtown Asheville
description: Please read ALL details. Welcome to my homestay, you found a gem! 3 blocks to the popular South Slope + 2 more to downtown + a little park around the corner. Gorgeous organic gardens. Peaceful boho vibes. This SINGLE room is for 1 PERSON ONLY. It's small with a single bed, many windows, lamp, fan. NO A/C or TV. Bathroom & kitchen are shared. Everything under 'Neighborhood' is an easy walk. Read all details below. Thank you!

name: Tiny Home with Gorgeous Mountain Views
description:
Nestled in one of the most picturesque valleys in Asheville. Perfect getaway for relaxing. Guests can enjoy all of their creature comforts while trying out a tiny tiny home. Located in the heart of the Mountains. You feel miles away; but only 10 min to d-town for 5* restaurants & breweries or the Blue Ridge Parkway for hiking & views. Take the weekend & unplug w/ a book! A deck available for relaxing with breathtaking mountain views.
Now with a real toilet!

name: 10 min to dwntwn AVL, super cozy 1930s bungalow
description: As you explore Asheville, let our charming 1931 "Little Gem Cottage" be your cozy retreat after days filled with adventure and artistic inspiration. Recently renovated, this cozy space combines vintage, industrial, and farmhouse elements. We’ve carefully curated an eclectic mix of finishes, artwork, and locally handcrafted furniture to capture AVL’s artistic energy. Eclectic design, local artistry and comfy accommodations for up to four people awaits you.

name: Mountain Vista
description: Newly remodeled ranch style home, artist paintings and decor. 8 minutes from downtown Asheville yet completey private. Back deck overlooks 50 acres of pristine forest and mountain views. Bonus daybed in Sunroom for extra guests. Extended stays for Corporate guests and traveling nurses. Pets welcome, with dog/walking/biking disc golf park 1/4 mile away.

name: Asheville - Mountain Bike & Hike in Bent Creek!
description: Mountain Bike and Hiking private, wooded paradise! Falcon's Escape is located right near the Rice Pinnacle trailhead of the Bent Creek Experimental Forest and Lake Powhatan with 10,000 acres of nature for you to explore. We are also 1 mile away from the NC Arboretum, the French Broad River, and the Blue Ridge Parkway.  You can reach downtown Asheville within 15 minutes with attractions galore including the Biltmore Estate the historic, New Belgium Brewing, and the River Arts District.

name: CozyAirSuite
description: We prepared a place where one would feel comfortable and relaxed. Spacious Clean rooms, Loaded kitchen, and comfortable seating.  There are outside stairs to go down to the Air. We are close to downtown Asheville, The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village and just minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. We hope you come visit our Beautiful and unique city.

name: yoga hOMe retreat
description:
Stay at our elegant country oasis within the city of Asheville! Enjoy the privacy and solitude of a rural retreat on 7 acres of rolling meadows, while only a ten minute drive to downtown Asheville.
You'll have the entire downstairs to yourself, with easy parking, private entrance, and your own outdoor patio off the fully equipped, eat-in kitchen. Relax after a long day of hiking in the full living room with pull out bed. Both spacious bedrooms have comfy queen beds and en-suite bathrooms.

name: Historic Cottage With Private Garden and Hot Tub
description: Historic cottage nestled on park like setting 1.3 miles from downtown Asheville and a five minute walk to the Grove Park Inn. artfully updated 1913 cottage has period features and modern amenities. New in June 2025 guests enjoy a secluded garden with covered swing and hot tub as well as a private deck w/ a 12 ft waterfall. Hotel style linens and bath toiletries and 4000 k Amazon Fire TV with Amazon Prime, Netflix and Hulu.  Private one car parking pad w/ 14 steps to cottage.

name: Biltmore Charm - (30 night minimum)
description:
Charm abounds in this sweet, sunny, upstairs apartment. This lovely tree lined property is located in a quaint, friendly neighborhood. The energy here has been lovingly cultivated through years of spiritual practice, and is uniquely pristine and nurturing.

Only 5-10 minutes from Asheville's wide array of activities: Biltmore Estate, Downtown Asheville, Arts District, Blue Ridge Pkwy, shopping, walking routes, amenities & I-40.

name: We welcome you back! Near the    BRP & Biltmore
description: "Welcome Back! Our Home is Ready for You!" our home is located 10 minutes from downtown and the Blue Ridge Parkway.   A quiet country feel but is still minutes from Downtown. Quiet and peaceful away from the noisy city traffic.  There is plenty of free parking. The house is located off a flat paved road and has no steep mountain roads. This home is located close to 1-40, Blueridge Parkway, Hiking trails, Parks and Rivers, Breweries, restaurants, and shopping.

name: Downtown Condo • 2BR/2BA • Walk to Dining & Shops
description: Experience Asheville from this centrally located 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo. Perfect for families and groups, enjoy spacious living areas, a fully equipped kitchen, and comfortable accommodations. Step outside to explore downtown's vibrant dining, shopping, and entertainment—all within walking distance. Your ideal home base for mountain adventures and city delights awaits!

name: 2 bd apt w/ great porch 10 min from town!
description: A gorgeous, clean, modern 2 bedroom apartment with private entrance & huge private covered deck (lower level of our mountain home built in 2016). With forest on all sides of the deck, it is like living in a treehouse in spring and summer, gorgeous colors in fall, mountain views late fall and winter. Only 4 miles/10 minutes from downtown Asheville (Pack Square)! Parking for 2 cars max and 4 guest max. Uber and various food delivery companies service the area! Unfortunately no pets :(

name: ShovelheadExpress
description: Welcome to the Shovelhead Express!  This property is located in a prime spot convenient to everything! It is a quiet, safe location. Enjoy the retro decor with the amenities! It’s a 1 bedroom with a full-size bed and an Ikea sofa bed to comfortably accommodate 4.  The main living space has a TV with provided Netflix. Well behaved dogs are welcome. (You are responsible for cleaning up after them!) No Cats! (Unless you can convence me your cat is not destructive and willing to pay for damage!)

name: West Asheville Haven
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. West Asheville, NC is a vibrant, fun community nestled in the Smoky Mountains!

Less than a half-mile walk to the heart of West Asheville, a 2-mile bike ride to downtown Asheville, and countless opportunities for hiking waterfalls, mountain biking, water recreation along the French Broad River and multiple regional lakes.

name: Enchanted 4BR Cabin & Suite| 15mins to Downtwn AVL
description: Tucked away in Asheville's enchanted forest...escape to a 4 bdrm, 3 bath quiet, rustic-lux mountain haven. Serene yet near downtown AVL. Stylish, vibrant, spotless with vaulted ceilings & a cozy wood-burning stove. Nestled among towering trees, with glimpses of wildlife & a gentle stream below…on 2.5 acres. Just 15 mins to Downtown AVL & Biltmore, 8 mins to Blue Ridge Parkway hiking. The lower level feels like a private 1 bedroom, 1 bath spacious suite with a den, kitchenette & separate entry.

name: Gorgeous Mountain Views; Asheville luxury escape
description:
Breathtaking mountain views; romantic, quiet, large, private and clean apt. And pet-friendly! Situated on lower level of our home in prestigious North Asheville in a peaceful setting. Close to Blue Ridge Pkwy; surrounded by Pisgah Natl. Forest, downtown 9 min.

This large 900+sf guest apartment-- includes high-speed Wi-Fi, 1-king bed / bathroom ensuite, radiant heat/AC; custom kitchen, bkfst. nook, living and office area, walk-in closets, laundry, bike "parking", patio, loveseat: twin bed.

name: "Birds & Bidets", 10min DT+ Biltmore, Hot Tub, EV
description: Welcome to Asheville Hillside Hideaway, affectionately known as "Birds and Bidets". Our retreat offers a serene escape in Asheville, attracting fascinating bird species for nature lovers. Enjoy modern comforts, including bidets in every bathroom for a luxurious experience. Guests have playfully dubbed us "Birds and Bidets",  highlighting our unique charm. Whether you’re here to explore the outdoors or relax in comfort, our home is the ideal getaway blending nature and comfort!

name: 🏃‍♂️Walkable West Asheville
description: Join us in the heart of West Asheville, home to breweries, river sports, art, and all kinds of good times. Our space is new construction and furnished with all the amenities you’ll need for an awesome time. We are conveniently nestled between Haywood Rd. and the French Broad River.

name: Five Stars in Five Points
description: In the heart of one of Asheville's cool neighborhoods, you'll find a clean, cozy, peaceful private bedroom and bathroom to rest with a covered porch. Nestled in an expansive Dame's garden in the coveted Five Points Neighborhood. Here you will find yourself less than a mile from downtown, with easy access to all the very best Asheville has to offer. Free street parking and and a lit walk up the gravel drive.

name: One Mile To Downtown Asheville, Pet Friendly
description: Located just one mile north of downtown Asheville. Very safe and walkable neighborhood. Steps away from an urban Greenway for dog walking and bike riding. The cottage is a separate unit with a private entrance. 400 square feet with a bathroom, kitchenette, heart of pine antique floors. We are two miles from the Grove Park Inn and four miles from the Biltmore house. The space is appropriate for two adults or one adult and one child.

name: Blue Ridge Parkway Treehouse
description: This one of a kind tree top guest house is located adjacent to the Blue Ride Parkway where you can bike or hike from the back door and into Bent Creek and Mills River.  It sits above the French Broad River where you can easily access the river to paddle, SUP, or fish. Perfect for 2-3 people who love the outdoors yet want to be close to the Asheville area. This property is 10 minutes to downtown and is also pet friendly.

name: Modern Biltmore Village Guest Suite
description: Welcome to our modern guest suite in Biltmore Village! Completely remodeled with new, hotel-like amenities. Our central location could not be better. Walk to 20+ restaurants, breweries and bars! Only 1/4 mile to the Biltmore Estate gate, 2 miles to downtown Asheville, 1 mile to Mission Hospital and easy access from I-40. Enjoy a queen bed, fantastic bathroom, sofa, bistro table and chairs and tv/wifi. A great space to relax in after a day of sight seeing!

name: Cozy Cruise Inn
description:
Cozy, modern retreat near Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 bed, 2 bath, close to town!
Our place is close to parks, great views, art and culture, restaurants and dining, and breweries. From our house you are moments away from the Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, French Broad River. Downtown is 15 minutes away by car. The new Asheville Outlet Mall is 5 minutes away.You’ll love our place because of it’s convenient location. Accommodates 4 or less guests. Must be 21 years of age. No Heavy traffic allowed.

name: The Owl's Nest Studio Apt
description:
Come relax and enjoy the views from the private screened in porch, private guest garden with sun deck, or from inside the apt. The choice is yours. At the end of the day, have a restful evening in the comfy king size bed. Mornings are easy with coffee, tea, cereal, or make some toast with the homemade bread.
Internet password is on the fridge and you can log onto your favorite streaming accounts. We thoroughly clean and disinfect after every guest. No smoking anywhere on the property.

name: Studio Apartment in West Asheville Private Home
description:
BACK AFTER HELENE - GOOD WATER, POWER, WIFI, ETC. -
Cozy, complete, dog-friendly studio.
Near Asheville Outlets, Blue Ridge Parkway, I 40, I 26, Farmers Market, and NC Arboretum.
544 sq ft, full private bathroom, kitchen area and walk-in closet.
First floor private entrance and terrace viewing lovely garden surrounded by trees in Blue Ridge foothills.
Very private on quiet street with off-street parking.
Washer, and dryer available.
Small sofa opens to make third bed.
Discounts for longer stays.

name: Modern Mountain Escape | Private Fireplace & Views
description:
Escape to this private Modern Mountain studio, perfect for couples and solo travelers! Cozy up by the gas log fireplace, unwind on the screened-in porch with mountain views framed by lush foliage, and relax in a luxurious king-size bed. Enjoy a mini-kitchenette for light meals.

Just 4 miles to Downtown Asheville, 6 miles to Biltmore Estate, and minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, hiking trails, breweries, and top restaurants. This serene retreat blends nature, comfort, and convenience.

name: HUGE Dog-Friendly Lodge w/Hot Tub & Games @2698ft
description: Vista View Lodge is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends!  If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight.  A Vacation Coordinator from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 24 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

name: Black Oak by CM | Chef's Kitchen, Fireplace, &Mtns
description:
Gorgeous Home with Mountain Views! A Green Built NC Gold Certified home, Black Oak offers the ideal location if you're seeking in-town convenience coupled with uninterrupted, south-facing mountain views. This upscale North Asheville home also enjoys a quiet end-of-road neighborhood location.

Imagine cooking your favorite homestyle meal in the gourmet kitchen, then dining with a million-dollar view from the dinner table.

name: Deer Run by CM | Outdoor Fire Pit & Chef's Kitchen
description: Cozy Log Cabin with Satellite TV! Just ten miles northwest of downtown Asheville, Deer Run invites you to sit a spell in the front porch rocking chairs and gaze out at the mountain horizon.

name: Your Asheville Adventure Base
description: The Asheville Adventure Base is the perfect spot for gatherings of families and friends.  Conveniently located in North Asheville, this home is only ten minutes from Downtown and is nestled in a wooded neighborhood on the French Broad River. Its great location makes for a quick trip to many breweries, restaurants and UNCA.  Though the cheery, light-filled, open concept layout might beckon you to just sit back and relax. We welcome all to stay with us and soak in the beauty of this area!

name: Private setting in West Asheville
description: With a private wooded back yard and a creek in the back yard this place is close to everything West Asheville has to offer: dining, shopping, live music and breweries. Only 10 minutes drive from downtown and 15 minutes to the airport and Blue Ridge Parkway. A green way trail runs in front of the house. There is a fire pit in the front yard and plenty of fire wood.

name: Daylily Delight- Camper on a farm close to town
description:
Enjoy the comforts of home in this remodeled 23' camper. It's tucked away on the edge of the woods with a tiny creek flowing at the foot of the spacious deck out front. You have a view of the farm and High Top mountain behind us. You have privacy and many modern conveniences in this small but adequate space.

FYI: It has a composting toilet (clean and smell-free, see photos), and I do charge a pet fee which depends on pet and length of stay, so please inform me if you plan to bring a pet.

name: Asheville Oasis ~ near Downtown
description: Nestled in an Ivy glen only three miles from downtown Asheville, your oasis awaits. A fully private basement apartment.  Sleep on a foam air topper over a firm Queen mattress and enjoy the tranquil space of more than 800 square feet to relax and call your Asheville home. Additional 550 square ft. covered deck is furnished to enjoy carry-out dinners alfresco or simply rock on Grandmother's gliders. This quiet family neighborhood sits with easy access to everything on your to-do list.

name: Shelly's Place- walk to Biltmore Village
description:
totally remodeled 700 sq ft vacation suite! Two blocks from the numerous shops, restaurants, galleries, breweries and events of Biltmore Village, 1/2 mile to the Biltmore Estate entrance, and 2 miles to downtown Asheville ($10 uber!). An abundance of extra artistic touches and curiosities make this a comfortable place to serve as base camp while you explore Asheville or just relax on a rainy day.
Permit# 18-09079.

name: Historic Victorian Home near Aston Park
description:
Contemporary 2BR/2BA private access apartment within our 1890 Queen Anne Victorian home, 1/2 mile to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, and the South Slope - steps from the most wonderful eateries, breweries and bars. Right across the river from West Asheville. A quick 5 mile drive to Biltmore.
Ideal for two couples traveling together, or a group of friends, who can have fun together in the lounge or at the porch and have their privacy in the large and comfy bedrooms.

name: Walk to downtown Asheville from this chic studio!
description: The cottage has been completely remodeled and the downstairs studio is ready to welcome you! It is located on a quiet one way street with beautiful mature trees . Enjoy morning coffee or a glass of wine on the covered patio overlooking the grassy yard. Walk 1 block downtown to dine at one of the over 60 restaurants and enjoy art studios, breweries, concert venues and festivals!

name: Mountain views close to everything in Asheville!
description:
Come stay away from it all in Asheville! Drive the Blue Ridge Parkway and hike all the wonderful trails for a weekend! Mountain Breeze is a newly remodeled, cozy modern home 10-20 minutes to everything in Asheville with awesome mountain views! Best of both worlds! Get the cabin experience but close to all the top attractions, restaurants, and activities!

Pet Fee:
$125 for 1 dog
$150 for 2 dogs
$175 for 3 dogs

name: Modern Round House - Mtn Views - 2 Miles to DT AVL
description: Enjoy beautiful, long range mountain views in all seasons from this unique mountain home.  Super convenient location between downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway (8 minute drive to downtown Asheville/ ~$10 Uber) and only 4 miles to the parkway and ~12 minutes to the Biltmore Estate. Additionally you can walk, bike or drive to the Grove Park in which is right down the road and through a lovely neighborhood (6 min drive).

name: Upstream Bachelorette Oasis - New Wedding Venue
description:
River Arts District, minutes away from Downtown Asheville. Spectacular Modern Eco-friendly house with a hot tub and spectacular mountain views. Designed for large groups and special occasions. The home over looks the French Broad River and the Biltmore Estate.
The home is close to everything Asheville has to offer. This house is directly across from the French Broad River, Carrier Park, bike paths, the green way and a boat ramp. There are also outdoor activities just next door at Climbmax.


*New Sterilization Protocol*


Since COVD-19, our cleaning crews have adopted the following:


1. Changing from eco-friendly cleansers to Clorox bleach products, then a final Lysol attack of all contact points on entire property post bleach treatment. 2. Airing the house out with blower fans and open doors and windows prior to cleaning and during cleaning. 3. Replacement of home air filter between each stay. 4. A guarantee that no known

name: Asheville Getaway Beautiful Mountain/Valley View
description:
We are a family-owned property in a neighborhood. The space is a lovely, recently renovated, 1-bedroom apartment. Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

Facing the Blue Ridge Parkway, we have the appeal of the beautiful mountains in our backyard. Only a short walk to the Mountains-to-Sea Trailhead on the Blue Ridge Parkway.

* 10 minutes to Biltmore Village
* 10-15 minutes to downtown Asheville
*Close to breweries, restaurants, local attractions

name: Magnolia Mountain by CM | Full Kitchen &Jetted Tub
description: Welcome to Magnolia Mountain, a rustic mountaintop lodging option with a great location to downtown Asheville. Perched just a mile from the entrance to the Blue Ridge Parkway, this home is designed to capture the beauty of the mountains as well as the desirable urban experience of downtown Asheville with the abundance of top eateries, art galleries, and our world-famous craft breweries.

name: Crows Nest 2.0
description:
The Crows Nest 2.0 is a green home built in 2018 that was designed to provide a private and comfortable getaway space in the lower portion of our home for guest of all backgrounds.

Enjoy a private, modern space while exploring the vibrant city. We are located steps away from Asheville's best restaurants, breweries, and cultural & historical gems. Your hosts, Justin and Autum, are passionate locals who will guide you to outdoor adventures, wellness spots, and music hotspots.

name: Modern Shipping Container Home
description: This modern shipping container home has everything you need for your Asheville getaway! Lounge on the deck and relax, step into the luxurious shower for an energy boost, then soak up the spacious feel of this converted world-traveled container. 5 minute drive to local breweries and 10 minutes from downtown AVL and Biltmore Estate! House is walking distance to Blue Ridge Parkway hiking. Hosts live next door and are here to help if needed. Guests will enjoy complete privacy during their stay.

name: Awesome Mountain Retreat
description:
Nestled on a little knoll just outside Asheville city limits, this single level, 3 bdrm, 2.5 bath, 2200 sq. foot home offers everything needed for a perfect home base to explore Asheville and Western North Carolina.

Dynamic mountain views from the front porch, living room and den. A large private back yard has plenty of tables and seating for family and friends.

A mile drive on a country road and you are at the supermarket, 10 mins more and you are parked downtown.

name: West AVL & River Arts Oasis - Private & Walkable
description:
Asheville is open and ready for visitors! Come support local businesses!

Relax in our light-filled apartment with 9 ft ceilings and modern furniture, once a peaceful yoga studio, now your private home base. Overlooking the nearby river, downtown, and surrounding mountains, it's all about location! Walking distance to everything. Stocked kitchenette, comfy queen bed, sparkling clean bathroom and plenty of space to stretch!

name: The Hill on Lexington Market
description: $25 off Biltmore Estate tickets.  Breweries, restaurants, bars, civic center and shopping all walking distance.   Park in your numbered reserved spot for your stay and walk for the rest of your journey.

name: Very Close to DT & Biltmore, Fire pit, View
description:
HOSTED BY: SANCTUARY PROPERTY MANAGEMENT

Asheville tourism has returned, with 90% of all attractions open to guests. Our beautiful Downtown area is in pristine condition, the vast majority of hiking trails and the famous Blue Ridge Parkway are open. Major attractions such as the Biltmore Estate and the Omni Grove Park Inn are welcoming visitors daily. Hundreds of shops and top rated restaurants are ready to serve you. See ExploreAsheville website for more information.

name: Boho Bungalow in walkable West AVL
description:
Asheville is open and ready for you to return and visit. Asheville now has potable drinking water from the tap.

Stay in our West Asheville Boho Bungalow, located in a quiet residential neighborhood within walking distance to hot West Asheville's Haywood Road. Many breweries, coffee shops, restaurants, bars, grocery stores & shops all within a :15 walk.
We offer your own private basement apartment with a separate private entrance with plenty of available street parking.

name: 10 MIN to DT, 15 MIN to Biltmore, Fire pit, View
description:
HOSTED BY: SANCTUARY PROPERTY MANAGEMENT

Asheville tourism has returned, with 90% of all attractions open to guests. Our beautiful Downtown area is in pristine condition, the vast majority of hiking trails and the famous Blue Ridge Parkway are open. Major attractions such as the Biltmore Estate and the Omni Grove Park Inn are welcoming visitors daily. Hundreds of shops and top rated restaurants are ready to serve you. See ExploreAsheville website for more information.

name: Bear Crossing—10 minutes to downtown
description: We are located in a quiet private neighborhood within 10-20 minutes of most Asheville attractions including the Biltmore House, downtown Asheville, shopping, restaurants, Blue Ridge Parkway and numerous hiking trails. AirBnB area allows for guest privacy in a walk-out basement with separate entrance. Feel free to start your day off with a morning workout on the elliptical.

name: Biltmore Village Apt, close to the Estate entrance
description: We made it through Helene, with no damage to our home or rental, we are thankful. We rely on tourism and are ready for you to visit. While the Biltmore Village won't be ready for the public for quite some time, there are many other bordering towns in WNC that are unaffected and ready for your visit. Day trips to those towns are highly recommended. The Biltmore Estate is reopening 11/2/24, so our apartment is perfect for you if they are the reason for your visit to Asheville.

name: Rose Ranch Montford 1, central, private suite
description: Your room, light and cozy, with a private entrance and private bath, is part of our owner occupied home. Can be rented in conjunction with "Rose Ranch Montford 2," allowing up to 2 additional guests. In Montford,  20 minute brisk, 30 minute leisurely, to downtown. Wonderful, friendly, diverse neighborhood, 2 blocks from the Historic Riverside Cemetery. Many trees and Victorian homes. Great for walking, running, biking and getting exercise!

name: Luxury Downtown Asheville Loft
description: This beautifully downtown Asheville Loft features a vast open-plan layout, soaring tin tile ceilings, brick walls, hardwood floors, a gourmet chef's kitchen, oversized windows with mountain and city views. Have some fun with the pool table and enjoy the beautiful views from the living room and the balcony. This property is an established l rental with great reviews. Eleven can stay here but one will sleep on a twin in a loft, and 2 on a blowup.

name: Private and wooded! Minutes to Downtown Asheville!
description:
Private, tree top wooded views. Located on a 4 1/2 acre property with-in Asheville. Minutes to downtown and West Asheville.
Private stand-alone structure, huge porch, king size bed with pull out queen sofa. Peaceful and serene yet close to all of Asheville's activities. Gardens, bird watching, and fireflies in the summer!!
Located near the Blue Ridge Parkway, Arboretum, and Bent creek hiking! Great location to experience all Asheville life and also have a peaceful, private, wooded get away!

name: Furnished Room/Private Bath in Heart of Asheville
description: This large 1920’s Tudor Revival home has a furnished upstairs private room with views, queen bed and private bath. Home has three upstairs ensuites. You have use of an upstairs work room, upstairs laundry, downstairs kitchen, living room, covered deck and patio dining area, front yard with hammock, lawn seating and ample on-site parking.  Central air/heat, TV, Internet, streaming channels All utilities included. Dog/cats live on this property. Three housemates are all mature, professionals.

name: Trendy West Asheville Apt. Walk to breweries!
description:
Bright and cozy West Asheville Basement Apartment. Located blocks from popular Haywood Rd (less than a half mile from Biscuithead!), 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, 15 mins from the Biltmore Estate, and 15 mins from the Blue Ridge Parkway. This trendy, desert-toned apartment is the perfect homebase for exploring Beer City, USA!

City Permit #22-04401

name: Stylish luxury downtown condo with parking
description: When you come to Asheville you want to stay where all the fun is, right? In the middle of all the great restaurants, bars, micro breweries, shops, art galleries, artist studios? You want to park your car somewhere easy and safe, and then walk to all the great and interesting things that Asheville is so famous for? Well, that's exactly what our downtown apartment offers: chic and stylish luxury with private parking in a location that is so central that you'll never need your car.

name: Carol's Creek House
description: Hey y'all Asheville is back! Restaurants are open, come see us! Beautiful boho-chic private apartment in quiet residential neighborhood with private entrance. Bedroom with one queen size bed, brand new, very comfy queen pull out couch. (Will add picture soon.). Bathroom has rainwater showerhead. Large living  room, open floorplan. Off street parking. Great location about 3 miles from Biltmore Estate, 4 miles to downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway .

name: Asheville Yoga Training? Here's your spot!
description:
Enjoy a private ensuite with queen-size bed, private bath with tub, and sitting area in a beautiful 1920's light-filled home in an historic neighborhood in North Asheville - just a quick walk to downtown, and just one block to Asheville Yoga Center, Liberty House Coffee and Cafe.

Street parking on side and back of house - no parking in front

name: Cozy Asheville Getaway Mountain/Valley View
description:
We are a family-owned property, with a small quaint Asheville apartment! You will no doubt have a quiet and peaceful stay. Facing the Blue Ridge Parkway, we have the appeal of the beautiful mountains in our backyard. We are within walking distance to the Mountains-to-Sea Trailhead on the Blue Ridge Parkway.

-10 minutes to Biltmore Village

-10 minutes to Downtown

-Local art, breweries, and attractions within minutes!

name: Secluded MtnTop Luxe-Spectacular Views-Hotub-FrPit
description:
** EARLY SUMMER SPECIAL = Stay 4 nts. and get the 5th nt. FREE! Dates: June 25 - July 8 , 2025. Military discount of 10% honored as well **

MountainTop Escape can sleep 22 guests total with a maximum of 16 adults. Our incredible 7- acre, 5,500 square foot secluded end-of-the-road mountaintop luxury estate -- has 360 degrees long range panoramic mountain views.

*Please send an inquiry/message before requesting to book. We like to know a little about our guests and why they're coming to stay!*

name: Blue Ridge Retreat
description: Charming, walkable neighborhood close to many great amenities in West Asheville.  Short drive to hiking, breweries, the River Arts District and  many great restaurants. Well behaved dogs are ok. $25 pet fee required

name: Bears' Den on Buffalo Mtn
description: This is your perfect getaway spot no matter what-after a day of adventures and fun come to a restful, calm and fresh place and recharge for your next set of activities.

name: Peaceful, modern retreat with mountain views
description:
Set on two wooded acres, Rainbow Vista is our recently built, mid-century modern retreat overlooking Reeves Cove and Pisgah National Forest.

Since we can only accommodate one booking per week, we prioritize 4+ day weekend reservations. If you are looking to book 10 or more days, we may be able to adjust restrictions on check-in/check-out days. Just ask!

name: Pink House on Floyd
description:
This beautiful, freshly renovated 3-bedroom house with a hot tub, spacious deck, and large fenced yard is super convenient to both Asheville and Biltmore. Located only 1/3 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway, this home offers comfortable indoor space and a beautiful outdoor setting only 12 minutes from downtown Asheville and 8 minutes from the Biltmore House.

Well behaved dogs are welcome at our rentals! Pet fee is $50.

name: Modern Downtown Loft with Amenities
description: Park your car and leave it for your whole stay! This luxury condo is located in the middle of Downtown Asheville. You will be steps away from Asheville's famous restaurants, breweries, and independent stores. This is the perfect Asheville location!

name: WALK to Downtown AVL + River Arts District
description: This whimsical Wes Anderson-inspired guest suite is the perfect space for a solo trip or a couples retreat! Moonrise Motel is a bright, private getaway centered between historic downtown Asheville, eclectic West Asheville, and the vibrant River Arts District (RAD), making it ultra-walkable.

name: Rose Ranch Montford 2, central, private suite
description: Your room, light and spacious, with a private entrance and private bath, is part of our owner occupied home. Can be rented in conjunction with "Rose Ranch Montford 1," allowing up to 2 additional guests. 20 minute brisk, 30 minute leisurely, to downtown. Wonderful, friendly, diverse neighborhood, 2 blocks from the Historic Riverside Cemetery. Many trees and Victorian homes. Great for walking, running, biking and getting exercise! Single, pullout sofa bed. Linens for it available upon request.

name: Cottage Under the Blue Ridge
description: Enjoy everything Asheville has to offer! Take a short walk through the backyard to hit the Mountain to Sea Trail for a scenic hike on the Blue Ridge Parkway or hop on by car approx two miles away to enjoy breathtaking scenery of the Blue Ridge Mountains.  Start your day enjoying coffee on the peaceful front porch in the rocking chairs, or an afternoon nap in the hammock, and then to downtown less than 10 minutes away to your choice of incredible restaurants, breweries and shopping!

name: South Slope Rooftop Patio
description:
4-story townhome located in the South Slope district of downtown Asheville, equipped with a private elevator for convenient access to all floors and a roof-top patio.

Step right outside your front door to enjoy local breweries, restaurants, and spas, while also being conveniently close to the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

For your safety, security cameras are located on the property's front and back exteriors. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors.

name: Almost Heaven Mountain Top Cabin-Asheville
description: Almost Heaven Cabin is the perfect place for your stay!  Unplug, unwind, and enjoy the peaceful charm of cozy log cabin living!

name: Your Downtown Asheville Pet-Friendly Oasis
description: Third floor condo in the heart of downtown Asheville. This 1 bedroom and 1 bath unit, features a king bed and queen sleeper sofa. Relax in your private kitchen, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this condominium, and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville. There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Rare Three Bedroom in Downtown Asheville
description:
Location is unbeatable - walking distance to popular restaurants, shops, and entertainment.
Welcome to this 3 bedroom, 3 bath condominium located in the heart of downtown Asheville. This beautiful unit has everything you need for a comfortable and convenient stay. The living room is perfect for relaxing and the full kitchen is equipped with modern appliances. Step out onto the balcony and take in the sights and sounds of the bustling city below. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Awesome Fifth Floor Views
description:
Whether traveling for business or pleasure, this unit offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. With its prime location, you'll have easy access to the city's best restaurants, art galleries, breweries, and outdoor adventures. The unit features 1 king bedroom and a queen sleeper sofa in the living room, full kitchen, and balcony. *Rental Agreement Required*

There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions).

name: Two Bedroom Downtown with Balcony
description: This two bed, two bath unit has all the premium amenities you can imagine, including an east facing balcony. An open floorplan, large kitchen island, premium appliances and large, spa-like bathrooms make this ideal for relaxing and regenerating after spending the day exploring downtown Asheville. The condo is within two blocks of restaurants, live music, art galleries, and shops. There is ONE dedicated parking spot. We recommend midsize or smaller vehicles only. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Two Bedroom in Ideal Downtown Location
description: This condo offers the ultimate location for your Asheville adventures! Third floor condo in the heart of downtown Asheville. This 2 bedroom and 2 bath unit, features 2 king beds and a queen sleeper sofa in the living room. Enjoy the full kitchen, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Heart of Downtown Sunrise Balcony Pet Friendly
description:
Stay in the heart of downtown Asheville in this 2 bed 2 bath pet friendly luxury condo. This residence features a full, high-end kitchen, expansive island, dining area, living room, king ensuite bedroom, queen bedroom, a separate full bathroom and a sunrise balcony. There's even a fold out queen sofa bed for additional guests. $75 (plus tax) non-refundable pet fee to be paid directly to host.
*Rental Agreement Required*
There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo.

name: Balcony Condo in Downtown Asheville
description: Luxurious condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. This 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit has all the premium amenities you could want. This residence features a full kitchen, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this fantastic condominium, and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.   *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Three Bedroom Beauty in Central Downtown
description: Rare 3 bedroom, 3 bath downtown unit on the fourth floor. Perfect for families or groups of up to 8 guests, this spacious condo offers a full kitchen, inviting living room, and a private balcony.
