With its prime location, you'll have easy access to all the best attractions, restaurants, and shops in the heart of the city. This unit will quickly become your go-to accommodation for your Asheville getaways.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Three Bed Three Bath Central Downtown Condo
description: Experience the beauty and charm of downtown Asheville with this 3 bedroom, 3 bath unit on the fifth floor. Perfect for families or groups of up to 8 guests, this spacious condo offers a full kitchen, inviting living room, and a private balcony. With its prime location, you'll have easy access to all the best attractions, restaurants, and shops. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Roomy and Accessible Downtown Balcony Condo
description: Condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. This 2 king bedroom, 2 bath unit has all the premium amenities you can imagine, including a cozy corner reading nook in the main bedroom. This residence features a full kitchen with a large island, dining room, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville. There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere.

name: Newly renovated apartment with private entrance
description: Well lit and newly renovated basement apartment with private entrance. Located in east Asheville less than 10 minutes from downtown. Situated in a peaceful, quiet neighborhood. A family of 3 lives upstairs. There is a queen bed in the bedroom. The kitchen has a full size refrigerator, a 2 burner induction cooktop, a microwave, a Breville toaster oven, and a coffee maker. Netflix and Amazon streaming available but no cable service. A covered deck with a gas grill adjoins the apartment. Enjoy!

name: Cate's Cottage
description: Charming 1920's fully renovated cottage in Montford, Asheville's most historic neighborhood!  Walk downtown, or visit one of the award-winning restaurants nearby.  Everything you need for a comfortable stay is provided.  Live like a local!

name: The Cherry Cottage - Downtown
description:
Home located in the heart of Montford, one of Asheville's most cherished neighborhoods. Just a short stroll to downtown Asheville. Easy access to its vibrant dining, shopping, and entertainment scene.
Walk to the Harrah's Cherokee Center for concerts.

name: The Cumberland Cottage - Downtown
description:
Home located in the heart of Montford, one of Asheville's most cherished neighborhoods. Just a short stroll to downtown Asheville. Easy access to its vibrant dining, shopping, and entertainment scene.
Walk to the Harrah's Cherokee Center for concerts

name: Free parking! Fantastic downtown apartment
description: FREE PARKING available for this gorgeous apartment in the heart of downtown Asheville!! Walking distance to the best restaurants breweries, shops, and nightlife Asheville has to offer. Half a block to city center. 4 minute walk to Harrah’s Cherokee Center. FREE PARKING available 8/10ths of a mile from apartment

name: Charming Private Cottage in the Heart of Downtown!
description:
Welcome to the Cozy Cottage in the heart of downtown Asheville!

Our stand alone cottage is an authentic Architectural Jewel nestled amongst the few historical homes that line this charming street. Situated in the heart of downtown Asheville, all the activities and excitement of downtown are only a short walk away.

We provide a clean and safe environment for you to enjoy, a true private home away from home.

name: Relax in our cozy studio filled with local art
description: Come and relax in our cozy studio perfect for a couple. Your space is private and filled with all the ammenities you could ask for.  There is a small kitchenette that is fully equipped, a living room to enjoy complimentary beverages and freshly baked cookies. The bedroom has  quality sheets, darkening shades and a sound machine to help you sleep. Outside you have your own private entrance and patio for enjoying a morning of bird watching. We do live up on a hill but there is room to turn around.

name: Cooper Cottage
description: Charming, modern, newly renovated guest studio. It’s located along side my personal residence in a quiet little neighborhood just minutes from downtown Asheville, NC. Uber is available. It’s quiet and close to everything.

name: Bent Creek Escape
description:
We’re located in Bent Creek, right across the street from a 22-acre community park, with immediate access to hiking/Mtn biking trails, and about 2 miles from the BR Parkway, French Broad River & the Arboretum. It’s a quick 15 min ride to downtown. Our 22x14’ room is brick, simple and rustic with it's own private entrance. The private hot tub is right outside your door. Plain and simple, this is a fun, romantic getaway.
**Please note, if you are local please inquire with Mike before booking.

name: Emily's Cottage
description: North Asheville.... near Beaver Lake, Asheville Country Club University of North Carolina at Asheville, and the Grove Park Inn

name: Asheville Forest Hideaway| 3BR | 15mins to Downtwn
description: Tucked away in Asheville's Enchanted Forest, escape to a 3 bdrm, 2 bath lux-rustic-magical mountain retreat. Peaceful, stylish & surrounded by nature’s beauty. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood beneath the lush Blue Ridge canopy on 2.5 acres with a gentle trickling stream. 15 mins to Dwtn AVL & Biltmore, 8 mins to BR Parkway. Bright, clean & modern w/ vaulted ceilings & a cozy wood-burning stove. Savor forest views from two decks, the hammock or a fireside chat. (Optional lower-level guest suite.)

name: {The Caroline} Stylish Dog-Friendly Townhome
description: ✨ The Caroline✨ is a newer spectacular 3-story contemporary mountain home located on Reynolds Mountain. You'll find your spacious hideaway conveniently located near downtown and all of Asheville's favorite hot spots. If staying put is your desire, this home has everything you'll want. 🌷

name: Lofts of the Mountains ll
description: New Construction 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment.1000 square feet .Stainless appliances,wood floors.granite counter tops.5 minutes to downtown Asheville.3 miles to Biltmore estate.

name: Asheville 2 Cozy Bungalow. Pets OK!  5 Min To Dwtn
description:
Built in 1927, this charming home has just enough room to be comfortable for sleeping and lounging.
Fully equipped kitchen for cooking, charcoal grill in back porch for cook out or plenty of restaurants within a mile or two. The backyard has a garden and fenced in area for dogs to play.
Beaver lake is a few minutes walk from house with a 2 mile trail around it. Some of the best road cycling in the world is available from the front door. Mt. biking is 15-45 minutes drive. Yoga studio next door.

name: One Groovy Place~8 miles to downtown ASHE~ Hot Tub
description: The Groovy Place is located on a partially wooded park like setting of 2.5 acres.  Enjoy the groovy retro décor and the blissful location,  located between Asheville and Hendersonville NC.  Located just  8 miles from downtown Biltmore District where you'll find the Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn, French Broad River Arts District. and near hiking, mountain biking trails and hot springs, etc. Its close to everything Asheville. Enjoy!

name: Spacious Sunset View Condo
description: Located on the 4th floor, this spacious 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom residence is perfect for couples, families or a gathering of friends. With both a king size bed and a queen size sleeper sofa you can comfortably accommodate up to 4 adults. The sizable bathroom boasts a large walk-in shower and double vanity sinks.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Bring Your Pets to this Spacious Condo
description: Third floor condo in the heart of downtown Asheville. Features 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a full kitchen, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this condo, and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville. There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions). *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Downtown Condo with Stunning Mountain Views
description: Fifth floor condo in the heart of downtown Asheville! This two king bed, two bath unit, features a full kitchen with high-end appliances and a large island, living room, and balcony.  Ideal for couples, small groups, and business travelers, this condo offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience.  There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Asheville View, Comfort, and Convenience
description:
Private room with queen bed & full bathroom.
Deck with great views of city, mountains, and woods. Comfortably appointed.

All services and downtown Asheville within 5 minutes

Sorry, no pets.

Home Stay permit with City of Asheville 18 09907

Shared entry, shared kitchen. Parking in front of unit.

Parliamo italiano, benvenuti!
Let's speak French. Be at home!

name: Fire Pit | Fenced Yard | Safe | Modern | Inclusive
description: Quiet guest unit just under 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. This cozy space includes a full kitchen, modern bath, and private entrance. Enjoy shared access to a fire pit, gas grill, outdoor dining area, and fenced backyard. Linens and kitchen essentials included. Ideal for solo travelers or couples seeking a peaceful stay close to the city. Uber and Lyft accessible.

name: The Hilltop Hideaway
description: Relax in the Hot Tub after along day of sightseeing! Welcome to our home situated on beautiful hill with lovely Mountain views. Our home is located just minutes to the Outlet Mall, grocery store, Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, Restaurants, Biking Trails, Waterfalls, Breweries,  and so much more.  We are convenient to all major Highways & just 15 minutes to the airport and Downtown Asheville. This is our 3rd AirBnb and we are delighted to have you as our guests!

name: Edge of West
description: Garden Apt. in Vintage 1930 Bungalow on the outskirts of West Asheville.  7 Mi. to center of West Asheville.  9 Mi to downtown Asheville.  Full Kitchen, convenient for longer stays.

name: Tranquility in the Mountains
description: Stylish and modern basement apartment. This will be your home away from home! There is private parking and a seperate entrance to this modern and lavish space! Only 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, 2 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway, 1.5 miles to the VA Hospital, close to many great restaurants and attractions! Enjoy your morning coffee or tea while listening to the birds chirp. Come and experience a little piece of southern tranquility.

name: Asheville Orange Oasis
description: This Airbnb offers a private entrance, two bedroom apartment with a private bathroom. The unit is attached to my home, but there is no shared space and has a locked, inaccessible door to the main house .  Our place is right outside of downtown Asheville and conveniently located off of Tunnel Road. This Airbnb is perfect for couples, small families, or soloists.

name: Mountain Magic
description: 12 minutes from downtown Asheville, NC. Located in the scenic mountains, in an artist community populated with writers, artists, and musicians as neighbors. Nice hiking trails, with lots of wildlife to photograph. A place to find yourself again.

name: Steps from Harrah’s Cherokee Center
description:
Asheville Flat
Prime downtown Asheville location on Hiawassee Street adjacent to Harrah’s Civic Center. You can't beat our super convenient location!

You’ll have one free parking space . Additional metered parking is available if needed.

name: Spacious Two Bedroom Downtown Balcony Condo
description: Large 2 bedroom and 2 bath unit located on the fourth floor, in the heart of downtown Asheville. This unit features 2 king beds, a full kitchen, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Asheville ready for you! GreatView,Dogs,Duplex A
description:
Asheville is ready for your visit! We are too!

Please read entire description of the rental.

1 bedroom, 1 1/2 bath duplex is in a quiet and Convenient Neighborhood. Great for 1-4 guest only.
This rental has a full working kitchen, living room, King size bed, Tub/shower, and amazing Mountain views from living room & sitting area. Outside is your own deck.

Dog Friendly, BEFORE booking please check with us for dog guidelines & give a description of dogs. There is a pet fee for them to stay.

name: King bed, hot tub, fire pit, 11 mi to downtown AVL
description: Explore the best of Asheville from our cozy mountain sanctuary perfect for family gatherings or group retreats. Located near iconic attractions like Biltmore Estate, your holiday will be filled with urban delights and natural wonders. With a hot tub, a fire pit, and accommodations for up to 12 guests, our property offers a memorable stay, especially for the upcoming holiday season.

name: Pet-friendly- Fenced yard- Full Kitchen -UN1
description: Enjoy beautiful mountain views from this artistically decorated, bright, ground level suite. You will appreciate the privacy and convenience of this cozy home, located only six minutes from lively West Asheville. Thoughtfully furnished and designed,, this space offers a full kitchen, keyless entry, and a comfy king bed and queen pull-out sofa. Larger groups of up to eight are invited to book the adjacent unit connected by shared laundry room. Dog-friendly with fully fenced-in yard.

name: Pets, fenced yard- Full Kitchen- UN2
description: Enjoy beautiful mountain views from this artistically decorated, bright, ground-level suite. You will appreciate the privacy and convenience of this cozy home, located only six minutes from lively West Asheville. Thoughtfully furnished and designed, this space offers 1 bedroom with a king bed, a full kitchen, keyless entry, and comfy queen pull-out sofa. Larger groups of up to eight are invited to book adjacent unit connected by shared laundry room. Dog-friendly with fully fenced-in yard.

name: Cal’s Cabin
description: Traditional log cabin on a large private lot with beautiful Mountain Views.  Spacious living room with large stone fireplace. Three bedrooms and a full eat-in kitchen.  Two great covered porches for spending a lazy afternoon and enjoying a peaceful natural setting.  8 minutes to downtown  Asheville & The Biltmore Estate.  Only a half mile away to the Blue Ridge Parkway and some of the most stunning vistas imaginable.  Mt. Mitchell and Mt. Pisgah are both just a short drive.

name: Biltmore Village Bungalow in Asheville
description: PRIVATE Luxurious King-size Bed Suite located about 5 minutes from downtown and only 1/2 mile from Biltmore Village. This freshly designed, Stand Alone Bungalow offering total privacy with an expanded 720 Sq. Ft. living area  that features charming, bright, spacious, and super clean getaway. Uniquely finishes, 13 Ft vaulted ceilings, & perfectly located to enjoy your Asheville experience. The water is completely filtered too in our space, from the showers to our faucet, enjoy clean healthy water

name: Explorers Retreat 2 mi to Dwtn + Firepit & Yard
description:
Cozy private suite located 2 miles from downtown Asheville with spacious yard, fire pit, river & sunset views! Perfect for travelers looking for a casual space to retreat to.

-Easy access to interstate & surrounding areas
-2 breweries + BBQ under a mile from the home
-Fiber Internet & work desk with 27" Monitor
-Less than 1 mile from new greenways & river put-ins
-Large rain shower head included in shower
-Gear Storage plus multiple closets

name: Private North Asheville Bungalow No Cleaning fees
description:
Private, quiet, modern bungalow. Newly updated with designer finishes in North Asheville. Can accommodate 1 additional guests if needed on couch.

Private entrance and parking.

Located between UNCA and Merrimon Ave. Bike or Uber to downtown. Walk to restaurants, bars and coffee shops.

We CANNOT accept ANY type of ANIMALS due to family member having MEDICAL DOCUMENTATION.
This is a “NONSMOKING” resident. NO smoking, vaping, drugs or incense burning.

name: Asheville Country Cabins - Sunflower
description: The Sunflower Cabin is our brand new luxury cabin with 2 Beds and 2 Baths, fully equipped kitchen adorned in granite, hand-stained spruce cathedral ceilings, gas fireplace, remote-adjusted king beds and large walk-in shower.

name: Cabin 2.2 miles from downtown Asheville
description: HURRICANE UPDATE:  Fortunately, this property was not damaged by Hurricane Helene.  The roads are clear, potable water, electricity, and the internet have been restored.  Downtown Asheville which is minutes away was not damaged either.  Most of the shops, breweries, and restaurants there have reopened.  The Biltmore is open, and most of the Blue Ridge Parkway near Asheville is open.  To encourage people to return to the mountains a significant discount is being offered.

name: Modern lux mountain cabin, 3 miles to town/BR Pkwy
description:
This unique and tranquil 13 sided round home offers luxurious living surrounded by nature. From the walnut breakfast bar to the oversized air jet tub, as well as the lush forest and mountain views, every slice of this pie exudes style, comfort, and serenity.
Enjoyed best by those looking for an upscale, private getaway; something truly unique and special. Located 2.5 miles from the eastern edge of downtown and 3.5 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway entrance and the nearest hiking trail.

name: Asheville 1 Cozy Bungalow. Pets OK! 5 Min To Dwtn
description:
Built in 1927, this charming home has just enough room to be comfortable for sleeping and lounging.
Fully equipped kitchen for cooking, gas/coal grill on back porch for cook out or plenty of restaurants within a mile or two. The backyard has a garden and fenced in area for dogs to play.
Beaver lake is a few minutes walk from house with a 2 mile trail around it. Some of the best road cycling in the world is available from the front door. Mt. biking is 15-45 minutes drive. Yoga studio next door

name: Biltmore & more! Private, cozy, modern, yard &deck
description:
Inviting, light-filled, contemporary space situated in a quiet residential neighborhood. Completely new en suite bedroom/sitting area with private entrance and deck.

Close to all Asheville has to offer: historic and dynamic downtown (2.5 miles), the Biltmore estate (2.5 miles), Blue Ridge Parkway (1.8 miles), UNCA (4.5 miles) and Warren Wilson College (5.5 miles).

Includes kitchen amenities: refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker.

Free parking on premises.

Sorry, no pets allowed.

name: Newly Built~Resort Style Amenities~Mins to Dtown
description: The Mountain Laurel is our brand new luxury cottage featuring 2 Beds and 2 Baths. Enjoy forest and mountain views from the spacious 1,000 square foot wrap-around porch with private hot tub! Comes with fully equipped kitchen adorned in granite.

name: Chicken Pie Alley, walkable to downtown
description: Welcome to our private downstairs apartment that has been lovingly renovated to offer easy comfort minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville. Nestled on a quiet cottage lane, our space offers a clean, welcoming and private space that is easy walking to coffee houses, pubs, restaurants and the civic center (4 blocks away).

name: A beautiful, serene, vacation  spot with views
description:
Location with mountain views!
This lovely 3 bedroom 2 bath home spacious open floor plan. 1/2 mile from Pisgah National Forest Trail head Minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, Outlets, Blue Ridge Parkway and Asheville Arboretum, and still has a feeling of a private wooded environment . Enjoy more than occasional deer crossing in a pristine forest location close to everything Asheville has to offer. Home features, mountain views, fire pit, covered porch, hi-speed wifi, & Directv.

name: Bungalow & Suite 2mi to Dwtn lots of Plants & Yard
description:
1920's Craftsman's Bungalow with lots of character, plants, spacious yard, spacious balcony with rocking chairs, grill, river & sunset views! Perfect for travelers looking for a casual space to retreat to.

-4 Beds & 2 living areas
-2 miles from Downtown Asheville
-Easy access to interstate & surrounding areas
-Fiber Internet, work desk with 27" Monitor & bedrooms with TV's
-2 breweries + local BBQ less than a mile from the home

name: Stylish House By Riverside Park - Entire House!
description:
Water, Power, Internet all available!
Asheville Water is currently under boil water notice.
The deck is currently unusable due to damaged from the storm. Repairs are scheduled

Enjoy a tranquil stay on the hills at our cozy 3 bedroom house. Take a 10 minute stroll to the Riverside Park or head to downtown and eat at the restaurants or drink at the breweries that Asheville is famous for. It's only a 10 minute drive away

We are also solar powered!

name: the RUBY ROOST cozy retreat near West Asheville
description: A true gem, conveniently tucked away in a quiet neighborhood near West Asheville. We welcome you to your 2nd story private apartment of our home. Enjoy your private deck and comfy suite with every amenity you may need and more. Located minutes from West Asheville and 10-15 min to the heart of downtown. Delight in a recently built, fully equipped and dreamy space to relax after a night on the town or a hike through the mountains. Private Deck, Full Lounge, Kitchen, BA, BR, Laundry.

name: Cozy mountain retreat close to town, Covered Porch
description:
Placed within the trees in a quiet neighborhood where houses are spaced far apart. Gravel parking is enough for at least 4 cars. You'll also have a covered deck on the side of the house.

This special hide-away is centrally located & 10 minutes to just about all of Asheville's major destinations, including Downtown, Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Village, and River Arts District. Sleeps up to 6 people.

name: Mountain Escape - 10min to DT Asheville
description: Spacious and comfortable home with a large fenced in yard, back deck with hot tub, plenty of parking and enough space for a large group or family. Located in a quiet neighborhood about 15 minutes from Downtown Asheville, 5 minutes to West Asheville, 7 minutes from the Biltmore and more!

name: near downtown, pet friendly, fenced yard
description: Nana's Cottage is a two bedroom home with a fenced yard only 3 miles from downtown. It is a short ride to everything you want to do in the Asheville area. Asheville has a host of antique shops, boutiques, art galleries, and crafts. Evening activities include diverse dining options, movies, live theatre, live music, or just walking through Asheville's energetic downtown filled with street performers and art. The Biltmore estate is breathtaking in summer and glorious when decorated for Christmas.

name: Cozy Front Porch, Fireplace, & Fenced-in Yard
description:
* 1,320 sqft., two-story house
* Safe, quiet neighborhood
* Fireplace
* Screened-in front porch
* Fenced backyard
* Cool gel ventilated memory foam mattresses

name: The Suite at Club View (Grove Park Inn)
description:
Conveniently located directly across from the Grove Park Golf Club, & a short walk/shuttle ride to Grove Park Inn...2 miles to dwntwn Asheville, yet completely removed from the city bustle.

The suite is private w/ its' own entry; Gorgeous views of the surrounding mountains...Enjoy the perfect location for a special weekend, honeymoon, or a week with an excuse to not cook & explore all of the wonderful Asheville restaurants (several w/in walking distance). You'll likely never want to leave.

name: Passive solar house 14 mi from Asheville
description: This net-zero house is conveniently located on one secluded acre 5 miles from Asheville Regional Airport, 6 miles from Sierra Nevada Brewing Company. Built-in 2020 by Blue Ridge Energy Systems, Asheville's oldest green builder (est. 1977), it features large south facing triple pane windows, six-inch walls, 6.5 kW of  PV panels, and a Tesla destination charger. Handcrafted cherry bed frames support queen size Casper memory foam mattresses in each bedroom and a handcrafted cherry table seats six.

name: Cozy Cottage Avl
description: The Cozy Cottage boasts a welcoming modern farmhouse decor as well as a quaint and calming atmosphere. Enjoy a cup of hot tea as you sit on the front porch and take in the gorgeous mountain views. Recently thoroughly remodeled and upgraded in summer of 22. We now have central heating and air, 6 person Hot tub, brand new huge fire pit, new washer and dryer, and all new furniture. We think you’re gonna love it here :)

name: Incredible Views, Luxurious,Magical,Modern ,Serene
description:
Incredible Views, Luxurious, Serene, Organic,Magical,Pristine

We are proud to offer the Bamboo House at Mountain Meadows for your stay in Asheville.

This luxuriously appointed Private House is 5 miles from downtown Asheville & 1 mile to the Blue Ridge Parkway
Breathtaking views and sunrises at 3500 ft.
• Eco Friendly Bamboo Allergen Free Floors
* Gourmet kitchen,Stainless Steel appliances, Gas Stove
• Custom stonework in Shower with Rain Head
• AT&T U-Verse wireless internet/Direct TV

name: Centrally Located RAD Bungalow
description:
This new bungalow is in the heart of the River Arts District, and directly overlooks New Belgium's Taproom. Parking, privacy, and a gorgeous lawn/balcony where you can take in the view.

New mattresses as of April 2025!

Enjoy Breakfast at Ultra Coffee Bar, Lunch at All Souls Pizza, tour artist's studios, & catch a show at The Grey Eagle. Take a short walk over to the French Broad Greenway, or grab a beer over at the Wedge Brewing. There isn't a better location than this.

name: OPEN! Hot Tub, Private Pool, King Suites, + more!
description:
Gather the family for a mountain "HomestayNC" vacation!
Sleeps 24
8 bedrooms, 12 beds
3 Kings, 4 Queens, 5 Twins, 4 sofas
Beautiful, comfortable, private home perfect for multi-generational family getaways. Close-to-town yet secluded, you have total privacy as you swim/sun in the private pool, enjoy the sunset from front porch rockers and share stories by the fire pit. Enjoy a spacious, professional kitchen and 14-seat dining room.
This home is the perfect setting for a relaxing, easy vacation.

name: Pet Friendly Central Downtown Condo
description: Fifth floor, 1 bedroom and 1 bath condo in the heart of downtown Asheville. Features a king bed, queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen, living room, and balcony. Enjoy the convenience of being within walking distance to all that downtown has to offer! There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions). *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Pet Friendly Downtown Condo
description: Fourth floor, 1 bedroom and 1 bath unit features a king bed, queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen, living room, and balcony. Enjoy the convenience to all things downtown Asheville! There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions). We recommend midsize or smaller vehicles only. This unit is pet friendly! *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Condo in the Center of Downtown Asheville
description: Experience the best of city living with this charming and modern 1 bedroom and 1 bath unit located on the fifth floor in the heart of downtown! This residence features a king bed, queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen, living room, and balcony. There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions). *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Cozy Modern Downtown Condo with Balcony
description: Third floor,1 bedroom and 1 bath residence. Features a king bed, queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen, living room, and balcony. Just steps away from all that downtown Asheville has to offer! There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions). *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Cozy Cottage 2.2 miles to downtown Asheville
description: HURRICANE UPDATE: Fortunately, the cottage was not damaged by Hurricane Helene.  The roads are clear, potable water, electricity, and the internet have been restored.  Downtown Asheville which is minutes away was not damaged either.  Most of the breweries, shops, and restaurants there are reopened.  The Biltmore is open and parts of the Blue Ridge Parkway near Asheville are open.  To encourage people to return to the mountains, a significant discount is being offered.

name: Home So Sweet! Add Cottage next door for 4 more
description: Location, Location! This beautifully furnished home is close to all the action Asheville and Hendersonville has to offer. The open floorplan makes group gatherings easy. The den has two interior doors to make it private from the main house plus a half bath.  The outdoor fire pit is a favorite, quite spot on cool nights. Collier's nature preserve is about 2 minutes away, offering hiking trails in the neighborhood. Coffee shop and other conveniences are within walking distance or a short drive.

name: New Belgium Lower Level Duplex,  Heard of the RAD
description:
This newly constructed home apartment is in the heart of Asheville, and the River Arts District. This is the best location in town: five minutes to downtown, five minutes to West Asheville, and next to the French Broad River. This property has ample parking, a gorgeous lawn and a front deck where you can kick back, and take in the view.

Take a stroll over to Wedge brewing, catch a show at Grey Eagle, or walk along the greenway!

name: Cozy Log Cabin Suite in Asheville
description:
UPDATE: Futon in the living area is replaced with a regular couch, so plan accordingly.

Escape from the world for a romantic getaway in this cozy log cabin apartment! Wake up delighted + refreshed amongst a sunflower mural done by local Asheville artists. Step outside onto your porch overlooking the forest on our peaceful street. Just a short 12 minute drive into downtown or the River Arts District and all of the great restaurants, breweries, and other attractions that Asheville has to offer.

name: Vast Sky Mountain View Asheville Studio
description:
Ample ground level studio with fantastic views of the Western North Carolina mountains. We are close to many things that make Asheville the BEST CITY to live in and visit, including the Grove Park Inn, Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, River Arts District, French Broad River, Pisgah National Forest, and the NC Arboretum.

**Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) we are contact free for our guests, including self check-in with keyless entry. We sanitize hard surfaces and linens between guests**

name: Modern Luxury in RAD, Stylish Balcony
description: This stunning newly constructed 2nd floor apartment is in the heart of Asheville, and the River Arts District. This is the best location in town: five minutes to downtown, five minutes to West Asheville, and next to the French Broad River. This property has PARKING, ample space for off-roading gear, and a gorgeous lawn and balcony where you can kick back, and take in the view. The balcony overlooks New Belgium's Taproom, a chic, quiet tourist attraction.

name: Downtown & RAD within walking distance!
description: Stay in Chicken Hill, a 10-25 minute walk to downtown Asheville or the River Arts District(depending on where you are going).  The bottom floor, back porch, and fenced in backyard are all yours during your stay.  You'll also have access to locally roasted coffee to start your day off caffeinated and can store your local six-pack in the downstairs minifridge.

name: Wizards Hollow - Earth & Sky Dwellings
description:
"Wizards Hollow" is one of seven unique homes that make up "Earth & Sky Dwellings" (formally Treehouses of Serenity). We are located 10 mins north of downtown Asheville in the Blue Ridge Mountains. Each property has expansive windows in order to take in the long-range mountain views and includes fully functioning bathrooms.

We love our pups, but we don't allow pets, and please read and understand the cancelation policy

name: East West Nest ~ Walkable ~ Private ~ Stylish
description: Welcome to our bright and super stylish free standing carriage house on the east side of hip West Asheville! We have one bedroom with a queen bed and a full sofa bed in the living room. Enjoy your morning coffee or evening beverage from the second story porch in the trees. With a ten minute walk, get to Hole Doughnuts, Taco Billy, Early Girl Eatery, Owl Bakery, and Pizza Mind. Find yourself in downtown Avl or in the River Arts District with just a 5 minute drive.

name: The Aerie - Earth & Sky Dwellings
description:
"The Aerie" is one of 20 unique homes that make up "Earth & Sky Dwellings". We are located just 10 mins north of downtown Asheville nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains. Each property has expansive windows in order to take in the long-range mountain/sunset views and includes fully functioning bathrooms.

Please note, we love our pups, but we do have a strict no-pet policy. Also, prior to booking, please read and understand the cancelation policy.

name: 45 Asheland. New downtown luxury condo. #304
description: Bright, airy corner residence with beautiful views of the mountains and downtown skyline. This 2 bedroom 2 bath condo is a spacious, open concept design with stylish finishes and fixtures. Everything is brand new and sparkling clean. Large windows invite plenty of natural sunlight. Kitchen opens directly into living area. Walk out the front door of the building and you're in the heart of downtown Asheville and it's many award winning restaurants, tasting rooms, boutiques and galleries.

name: Mountain View Tiny house with Hot Tub & Firepit
description: Come enjoy Asheville from our light & bright tiny house.  Super efficient open floor plan.  Kitchen area with full size refrigerator and microwave. Living area with sleeper sofa, tv and electric fireplace. Queen bed in the sleeping area. Step out one of two sliding glass doors to enjoy the mountain views from the deck or gather around the firepit or soak in the hot tub Outdoor grill with burner for additional cooking needs. Pet friendly with $25 fee.

name: Mountain Cottage and Tiny House with hot tub
description:
This listing is for BOTH our main cottage AND the adjoining tiny house.

Both were renovated and decor are in "Fixer Upper Farmhouse style". Hot tub, grill & fire pit are available for guest use.

The main house was originally located on the Biltmore Estate Dairy Farm property & was moved to this location in the 1950's. It is a sweet somewhat quirky place.

Need more space? Check out our Blue Bird Cottage for 2 additional bedrooms/baths.

name: Quiet Refuge Close to Downtown
description: Recently built in 2018 and furnished apartment with everything you need to be comfortable. Quiet setting close to downtown in desirable Kenilworth neighborhood. Walking distance to Mission Hospital and perfect for temporary situations or an extended vacation.

name: Entire Guest Suite Near Asheville
description: Close to everything, our guest suite is tucked away in a non-cookie cutter, wooded neighborhood just 1/2 mile from the Asheville city line, near the Blue Ridge Pkwy, airport, breweries, hiking and restaurants.  This is the perfect space to act as homebase while you explore all that Asheville has to offer.

name: {The Josephine} Summer Ready with Stunning Views
description: The Josephine is a beautiful townhome, located less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Our home offers a comfortable and relaxing home base for up to 8 guests. Now welcoming up to 1 dog to stay!

name: Charming House By Riverside Park - Entire House!
description:
Power & Water Available!

Enjoy a tranquil stay near the river in this lovely vacation home by the French Broad River. Take a 10 minute stroll to the Riverside Park to have a scenic walk and take photos by the river. Then head to downtown and eat at the restaurants or drink at the breweries that Asheville is famous for. It's only a 10 minute drive away.

This house has a fiber connection and is suitable for multiple people to do remote work, gaming, and streaming. We are also solar powered!

name: The Magic Bullet @Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Magic Bullet, located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground, is a sleeping pod suspended in the air. Part tree-house, part airplane, and part pick-up truck, this spot is like no other. The floor is padded, but be sure to bring sleeping bags, pillows and possibly a sleeping pad if you like a little extra softness. The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural Asheville.

*Read the full description below*

name: Car Spot at The Baying Hound Campground
description:
Do you love car camping, but hate WalMart parking lots? Come stay with us! This car-camping/van-camping spot is located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. You'll have access to a hang-out platform perched above the campground, a community fire pit, old-school outhouse, solar shower and a sink with cold running water.

** If you're looking for a site where you can pitch a tent, check out our other listings because this one does NOT INCLUDE a tent camping spot. **

name: In east Asheville and close to so much more!
description: Located in east Asheville, only 12 minutes to downtown. The neighborhood is adjacent to the Blue Ridge Parkway (milepost 382) and the Mountain to Sea Trail. Great setup for spending your days exploring Asheville and  western NC, then resting up for the next day's adventure. Private bedroom and bath in a traditional ranch home. Bathroom remodeled in 2017.  Bed and mattress new in 2019.  You are also welcome to use the kitchen fridge/freezer and laundry room--just ask.

name: Modern Mountaintop Cottage in Asheville
description: Sunrise Cottage is a property which affords plenty of privacy for all. Your get-a-away Asheville escape at the top of Town Mountain has surprising views, ultra-modern, high-end finishes, and is mere minutes to downtown & everything Asheville. This is bound to become your go-to vacation spot! Your must-stay Asheville destination! Sunrise Cottage is a cozy gem nestled on top of Town Mountain – close to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Peaceful Retreat - Close to Biltmore Estate
description: Sweet studio with private entrance in the lower level of my home. Perfect for visitors who want quiet and comfort close to all Asheville has to offer; 3 mi to Biltmore Estate, 6 mi to Downtown, 5 mi to River Arts District and 30 mi to DuPont State Forest. Many use UBER/LIFT from here for a safe night on the town. I love helping guests with brewery, hiking, restaurant and other recommendations. We have one indoor cat and one in/outdoor cat. Come enjoy Asheville and the surrounding areas!

name: The Mountain Creek Big House
description: Visit one of the original homes in the Bent Creek area near Asheville N.C. This light and airy home has been in our family for 5 generations. Let us share the charm that you can only find in a good old mountain home. It is a 4 bed room 1 and 1/2 bath home set in a quiet cove.

name: TwinStar In Central Downtown
description: Two side by side flats that mirror each other in central downtown,  newly renovated flats are a great pick!  Well-designed space with skylights, high ceilings, large windows, and all modern amenities.  Closest listing to the center of downtown.   Legal City-Inspected listings

name: Sol Retreat * Modern Oasis in the Heart of W. Avl*
description:
Private & peaceful downstairs suite powered by the sun. Clean, modern & spacious.
5 min walk to vibrant Haywood Rd, lined with lively restaurants, bars, shopping, & music.
Perfect for couples, families or solo travelers.
Our home is tucked off a quiet street, surrounded by an oasis of plant life.
Set up for comfort & relaxing. Enjoy a cup of locally roasted coffee in the cozy lounge or out on the patio hammocks.
Short drive to downtown Asheville, the Biltmore House, RAD, and the Blue Ridge Pkwy

name: Groovy Turtle Shell-ter @Baying Hound Campground
description: The Groovy Turtle Shell-ter is  located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. Part truck cab, part perma-tent, this sleeping pod will keep you dry and one-with-nature at the same time - no tent necessary! The floor is padded, but be sure to bring sleeping bags, pillows and possibly a sleeping pad if you like a little extra softness. The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville.

name: Bright, modern studio- 10 mins to dwntwn & RAD
description:
Welcome to our home! We built a private studio apartment for you to enjoy! Just 10 minutes from downtown. This stunning property is surrounded by trees, wildlife & sounds from the FB River. We live in the house upstairs and my in-laws live in the other apartment down below. Although your stay will be private, we are here to help if need be, but respect your space and solitude. Please note- there are NO shared air vents in this space. Unit has it’s own A/C, heat.

*We had no damage from Helene*

name: Mountain View Home
description: Situated on a quiet street between Beaver Lake & Lake Louise, this beautiful space is in a quaint setting 10-15 minutes to Asheville & 10 minutes to Weaverville. This listing is for the first floor of the house. This space has a private entrance with your own private deck on the lower level of a two story deck with hammocks and some other fitness equipment. It has beautiful Mountain Views and great local hiking nearby.

name: Charming Historic Condo
description:
Charming and renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 3rd level walk up of the historic King James Building.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown. *Rental Agreement Required*
*Please note: There is not an elevator in the building*

name: Mountain Views Minutes from Brews
description:
Walk to dozens of nearby eclectic shops, eateries, cafes and pubs then relax & recharge in your peaceful well-appointed space.

We welcome travelers of every race and religion/non-religion. Upon arrival, you will receive a key to the house and a key to your private room. We recently installed a keyless entry pad on the front door for guest convenience.

Our hosting style is casual; We are available if needed but otherwise give guests plenty of space and privacy.

name: Arts & Crafts Home off Blue Ridge Parkway
description: Step into this beautifully crafted Arts & Crafts-inspired retreat, designed to offer a serene and cozy escape. The space radiates warmth and tranquility, with guests consistently praising its inviting atmosphere. Perfectly located right off the Blue Ridge Parkway and just 10 minutes from top attractions like downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, local breweries, shopping, and a Whole Foods Market, this home blends peaceful seclusion with convenience.

name: Villa Rose-On 2 Acres.FP, King Bed. 1mi Biltmore
description: Modern, Luxurious, Relaxing & Large private one-bedroom in-law apt. (1,050 sqft) with Fireplace, KING Bed & Barn view on 2 Beautiful Acres under towering trees, while only being an 8-min. drive (4 mi) to the heart of Downtown Asheville, NC;  3  min.(1 mi) to the Biltmore Estate,  Breweries and Restaurants; 5 min. to the Blue Ridge Parkway, South Slope DT. Bike or drive to breweries, coffee houses, and restaurants. Romantic, Quiet, Retreat Cottage, Nestled in Nature. A unique gem, close to it all

name: Light Airy West Asheville Room
description: Beautiful room in historic home right in the heart of East West Asheville. Walking distance to many breweries, restaurants, and coffee shops. Also a short walk to River Arts District and only a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville.

name: Trippy Tortoise Shell-ter @Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Trippy Tortoise Shell-ter is located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. Part truck cab, part perma-tent, this shell-ter will keep you dry and one-with-nature at the same time - no tent necessary! The floor is padded, but be sure to bring sleeping bags, pillows and possibly a sleeping pad if you like a little extra softness. The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural Asheville.
*Read on for full description*

name: Large Sunset Balcony Two Bedroom
description: Luxury condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. This corner unit 2 bedroom and 2 bath condo has all the premium amenities you can imagine. New appliances, bedding, furniture, and heated floors create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Located on the 5th floor, this residence features a full kitchen, dining room, and living room; and enjoy mountain views while lounging on your sunset view balcony.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Wooded Oasis minutes from i26 and French Broad!
description: Our guest suite is a perfect experience for travelers to Asheville!  We are just over a mile away from i26 yet our property makes you feel you’re in a wooded oasis.  The French Broad river is also minutes away and a great tubing experience!

name: Grey River Gatherings (perfect for large groups)
description:
Very large home - perfect for your large group!

This home is in a quiet culdesac in North Asheville. The home is 8 minutes from downtown off of Riverside Drive.

The home features 5 bedrooms with 5 queen beds, 1 loft with 2 twin beds, 2 lofts & each with a full size futon and a queen size pull out couch.

It’s a spacious home with 9ft ceilings.

There is parking available for at least 3 vehicles.

This home is located at 23 Grey River Run, Asheville 28804.

name: Entire house, 6 minutes from down town!
description:
This newly built home is snuggled in between nature and downtown. Enjoy rafting on the French Broad River or hiking and biking the Blue Ridge Parkway. Plenty of breweries are close to this great location. The property is perfect for family vacations, reunions, and bachelorette gatherings.
Plenty of room as well as privacy with 2 living areas.
Enjoy sitting on the porch while barbecuing amidst the peace of the mountains.

name: The Namaste Room at River Row Flats
description: Take a breath and relax in the Namaste Room, minutes from downtown, walkable to the River Arts District, and across the street from New Belgium Brewery.

name: The Black Balsam Room at River Row Flats
description: With its airy interior and eye-catching views, the Black Balsam Room affords a peak lodging experience. Right across the street from New Belgium Brewery and just minutes from downtown.

name: The Mount Mitchell Room at River Row Flats
description: The pinnacle of chic comfort enveloped in vibrant décor awaits you in the Mount Mitchell Room. Located minutes from downtown and centrally located for all of Asheville's major attractions.

name: The Triple Falls Room at River Row Flats
description: Come and relax in this spacious studio suite, 5 minutes from downtown and a short walk to the River Arts District. With a full kitchen and amenities included, this is the perfect place to enjoy Asheville and all it offers.

name: The Craggy Gardens Room at River Row Flats
description: Have a seamless stay in this spacious studio apartment. Minutes from downtown and centrally located to Asheville's major attractions. Walkable to the River Arts District.

name: The Max Patch Room at River Row Flats
description: Views from the studio suite will inspire you to soak in the outdoor activities in Asheville . Just a short walk or bike ride to the Greenway path along the French Broad River and directly across the street from New Belgium Brewery.

name: AVL Modern Vintage Retreat w/ Mtn Views
description: **LOCALLY OWNED** Scandinavian inspired, vintage, authentic, and cozy log cabin. Views of Busbee Mountain...situated on an acre at the end of the road…plenty of outdoor space. Sunny retreat is 5 min from downtown scenic Asheville, Biltmore, and South Slope fun! Less than 2 min from the Blue Ridge Parkway & convenient highway access from I-40. Easy driveway, (4) person max, min rental age is (25).

name: Historic Building with Bakery and Restaurant
description:
Charming and renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 3rd level walk up of the historic King James Building.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown. *Rental Agreement Required*
*Please note: There is not an elevator in the building*

name: Charming Historic King James Building Unit #5
description:
Charming and renovated 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo on the 2nd level of the historic King James Building.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown. *Rental Agreement Required*
*Please note: There is not an elevator in the building*

name: Charming Historic King James Building Unit #8
description:
Charming and renovated 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo on the 3rd level of the historic King James Building.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown. *Rental Agreement Required*
*Please note: There is not an elevator in the building*

name: Asheville Zen Studio ~ 3 miles to downtown
description: This charming, newly renovated private studio is only 3 miles north of downtown Asheville & half mile to Beaver Lake! Enjoy a beautiful city view from the side window and find  your zen surrounded by a serene, mature bamboo garden. This space features a private bath, kitchenette, smart TV and cozy queen bed ~ perfect for a peaceful retreat, while still being close to downtown events. Experience the best of both tranquility and convenience in this wonderful getaway!

name: Cozy Country Colonial "Jacuzzi Suite"
description:
Charming Colonial Home with Hot Tub in peaceful neighborhood.
Your spacious oversized suite is complete with a private luxurious full-sized Jacuzzi bathroom🛁, 55" smart T.V., 📺work desk, superfast Wi-Fi, extra storage with rolling closet and dresser.
🐕Fenced in backyard with 6 person hot tub,🔥 fire pit, BBQ, and lounge chairs.
Wood burning fireplace.
🌄You are just minutes from Grove Park Inn, Biltmore House, Mission Hospital and downtown Asheville loaded with shopping and restaurants.

name: Quiet Cottage - Dwntwn-Biltmore- Near Tesla Chg
description: Our Blue Ridge Mountain home is  located near all the action at the edge of Pisgah and only 10 minutes to West Asheville and downtown.  Enjoy solitude on the expansive deck and screened porch or have a locally crafted beer as you unwind around the fire pit or enjoy the small garden and large terraced yard. We are located 5 minutes from Bent Creek Park and it’s vast mountain biking / hiking trail system-also  5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and outlet shopping.  *TESLA CHARGING 1/4 MILE *

name: The Blue Ridge Room at River Row Flats
description: After a day of driving along the Parkway, come "home" to the chic yet cozy Blue Ridge Room. 10 minutes from the Parkway and 5 minutes from downtown.

name: West Asheville Treasure
description: A suite of rooms in a lovely house in a quiet neighborhood, perfect location to explore all that Asheville has to offer. Located in west Asheville, 1/2 a mile from all the restaurants and shops on Haywood Rd. Only a mile from downtown, , and a short drive to both the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway. New Belgium Brewery, sitting next to the French Broad River,  is a short stroll away. Parking available. Private bath.

name: The Bent Creek Room at River Row Flats
description: With its striking decor and vibrant views, the Bent Creek Room calls to mind the exhilaration of biking, hiking, or simply taking in the natural beauty of Western North Carolina. A short walk to the River Arts district greenway for biking and walks.

name: The Hominy Creek Room
description: Come and relax at River Row Flats. Right across the street from New Belgium Brewery and minutes to downtown. Walkable to the River Arts District.

name: The Harmony Room at River Row Flats
description: Unwind in style in our modern studio suite. Just minutes from downtown, breweries, and Blue Ridge trails, this cozy suite blends urban charm with touches of home. Fully furnished and thoughtfully designed with full kitchens for any type of getaway.

name: The French Broad River Room at River Row Flats
description: 10 minutes from Asheville's most visited attractions. 5 minutes from downtown.

name: The Cheers Room at River Row Flats
description: Relax in the bright, sparkling Cheers Room, and raise a glass to good times. Directly across the street from New Belgium Brewery and minutes to downtown.

name: The Catawba Falls Room at River Row Flats
description: A cascade of soothing colors, vibrant art and invigorating views awaits you in the Catawba Falls Room. Just 5 minutes from downtown and 10 minutes to Biltmore.

name: Charming Condo 2 in Historic King James
description:
*These units overlook a construction project, and the hours of operation are 8am - 7pm weekdays, 10am - 7pm on Saturdays, and off on Sundays. The rates have been adjusted to reflect this inconvenience*

Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown. *Rental Agreement Required*
*Please note: There is not an elevator in the building*

name: The Pet Friendly ADA Pisgah Room 102
description: Looking for a cozy, stylish spot that welcomes your furry companion? Nestled in Asheville’s vibrant River Arts District, this modern pet-friendly studio offers the perfect blend of artistic energy and homey charm.

name: King bed, fire table, BBQ grill, 11 mi to downtown
description: Nestled between serene mountains and the bustling city pulse, our Asheville gem is the perfect retreat for up to four guests. Enjoy sparkling extravagance at Biltmore Estate, verdant beauty at North Carolina Arboretum — all minutes away! Our pet-friendly abode offers snug beds, gourmet-ready kitchen, and a porch that marries breathtaking Appalachia vistas with serene sunsets.

name: Burt's Cozy Country Log Cabin
description: This is a lovely log cabin in a country setting, but yet 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville.  You get the peace and quite you need along with fun, and great restaurants just minutes away.  This is a private cabin located in a small community in buncombe county.  One mile away from the French Broad River.

name: Heavenly Tree House! Close to Biltmore
description:
Rustic cabin with modern amenities in wooded mountains just outside Asheville. Surrounded by nature, the sleeping porch is reminiscent of a tree house.

Conveniently located near the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, downtown Asheville, and the Asheville Regional Airport -- all within 11 miles.

Authentic wood-fire stove.
Hot tub built into deck.
Hi-Speed Wifi and Roku TV's for streaming.
Golden Tee arcade game, Foosball coffee table. Complimentary coffee and snacks.

name: Cozy Asheville Mountain Home - Entire Main Floor
description: Located less than 5 minutes from downtown Asheville and just 1 minute from I-26 Exit 24, we offer an unbeatable location, sparkling clean accommodations, 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms (with tubs), an expansive wraparound deck with vista views, outdoor grill, well-equipped kitchen, and so much more.  This home has 2 separate levels.  Guests access the main floor and all outdoor amenities.

name: Luxe Townhouse with Garage and Terrace
description:
Renovated corner townhome is located in the heart of Asheville’s
South Slope District. With four floors of living space, 2 bedrooms, 2.5bath and queen sleeper sofa. Unit also has a private elevator and rooftop terrace to enjoy the views. *Rental Agreement Required*
For your safety, security cameras are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors

name: High-Design Downtown Loft
description: Over 1,300 square-feet and two loft bedrooms, 33 Carolina Lane – a block once dedicated to agricultural industry, today a multi-cultural gathering spot – offers modern amenities and industrial design, with just the right touch of history: Curated artwork and pops of color, designer furnishings and massive flat-screen TVs, exposed ducts and lofted ceilings – all, in perfect balance with wizened walls and striking wood floors, layered with the patina of the past.

name: #5 Garden Room, king bedroom at Oakland Cottage!
description: Extra spacious room at Oakland Cottage Bed and Breakfast !  The Garden Room with king bed and extra daybed for an extra guest.  Enjoy the private deck through sliding glass doors, and lots of windows to bring in the sunshine.  Full healthy and hearty breakfast is served each morning in the dining room with other inn guests and is included in the price.  Special diets may be accommodated with advance notice.   Daily maid service is provided, unless otherwise requested.

name: Asheville Mtn. Retreat Cabin with Hot Tub near BRP
description:
Mountain Retreat with flowers, wildlife and luxurious comfort surrounded by gardens of organic vegetables, berries, fruit and nut trees. Original art available for purchase in stone, etc, soft fabrics, skylights upstairs and a feeling of comfort with the trees throughout. An array of flavors pleasing to the senses. This is a real log cabin with a lot of charm. Be in the hot tub under the stars, enjoy the blinking innocence of the fireflies or the sound of the creek nearby.
Easy Parking

name: Near Rabbit Rabbit Salvage Station Peel King Bed
description: Great space in West Asheville about a 5 to 7 minute drive to downtown Asheville. Quiet neighborhood, two nice dogs live on the property. Front porch and central air conditioning. Toaster oven, fridge, electric kettle,  are available.

name: Spend Quality Time  In  Fabulous Asheville
description:
This compact but perfectly located apartment is located in walking distance to stores, shops and hundreds of restaurants , breweries and music venues art galleries.
The apartment is one bedroom, newly renovated in a terrific neighborhood.
There is on site parking, and laundry facilities in the building. It's on the second floor and there is a large balcony for relaxing.

name: Rooftop Terrace Townhome
description:
The 4-story townhome located in the South Slope district of downtown Asheville, equipped with a private elevator for convenient access to all floors and a roof-top patio
Step outside your front door to enjoy local breweries, restaurants, and spas, with the Biltmore Estate and Blue Ridge Parkway also conveniently nearby.
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors.

name: Elegant Atkinson Ste In Funky/Eclectic West AVL
description:
The Atkinson suite has large bedrooms, one king and one full-size bed, mountain views, a kitchen, and room for entertaining. It has its entrance and is private from the other suite. This listing is for the Atkinson suite only.

The house has two individual/separate suites. Each unit has two bedrooms and one full bathroom. You can rent the Atkinson and /or Bennett suites as one for eight people. Message us if interested in both so we can check availability.

name: Country Cottage Getaway | Private & Pet Friendly
description:
Plan your next cozy getaway at this private & pet-friendly cottage and feel like you're miles away in the country, all while being close to shopping and dining in downtown Asheville.

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: Mountain Chalet, Close to Downtown, Dog Friendly
description:
Dog-Friendly Mountain Chalet - 3 min to downtown Asheville.

The Interlaken Chalet is charming and well-appointed. Guests will love being tucked away in the trees with such close proximity to downtown Asheville!
This Chalet has a fully-stocked kitchen with appliances, pots and pans, dishes, coffee, soaps and paper products. We provide linens, towels and blankets.

This home has Wi-Fi, Cable TV in the living room and Roku available on all TVs. Gas fireplace.

name: Historic Bennett Suite Funky/Eclectic West AVL
description:
This listing is for the Bennett suite only. The Bennett suite has two bedrooms each with full-size beds, bathroom, full kitchen with a table, and living room. It has its own entrance and private from the other suite.

The house has two individual/separate suites. Each separate unit has two bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. You can rent the Bennett Suite or / and Atkinson Suite. Atkinson and Bennett Suites together hold eight people. Message us if interested in both so we can check availability.

name: Comfy and Convenient South Asheville Getaway
description: Enjoy your stay in South Asheville(Arden)! Only minutes from the airport and some of Asheville's finest breweries such as Sierra Nevada! Twenty minutes to Downtown Asheville. Twenty minutes to Downtown Hendersonville.  Hiking trail about a mile away. Mountain biking trails less than 10 miles away. Group and family friendly house. *There is a tenant in the basement. Tenant has a separate entrance.

name: Casita Amelia Asheville Mountains
description: We are excited to share  Asheville with you. Whether you want to relax and stroll through nearby neighborhoods enjoying the many Bistros, arts and crafts, and breweries or use Casita Amelia as a springboard to adventure. We have hiking, rafting, zip lining and biking just to name a few ways to enjoy nature and the great outdoors. Enjoy our simple and comfortable place while sipping a warm coffee in the morning listening to the birds sing.

name: Asheville Pet Friendly Apartment - Woods, Trails
description:
Apt. connected to our house by a private screened porch. Heat/AC system, queen bed, comfy couch. For your dog, a private fenced side yard (no leash), freedom of yard and woods, with leash please.

Secluded, surrounded by Bent Creek Forest, WALKING ACCESS to hiking and biking trails, beautiful woods, wildlife!

5 min- NC Arboretum, river access/tubing on French Broad, Blue Ridge Parkway, Lake Powhatan
10- Outlet Mall, Lake Julian Park
20- downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, breweries

name: Urban Farm Oasis~Hot Tub~Fire Pit~Walk Downtown
description:
Welcome to downtown Asheville's only luxury micro-farm and retreat! Exemplifying the true spirit of Asheville, Rose Knoll Urban Oasis is an homage to the adventurer, the dreamer, the artist & the wanderer within us all.

Our newly remodeled circa-1925 suite offers pick-your-own gardens, private deck & entrance, hot tub, clawfoot tub, indoor fireplace, plush king-size bed, outdoor grill, fire pit, daybed love nest & more — all within walking distance to both downtown & the River Arts District.

name: Charming Historic King James Building Unit #4
description:
Charming and renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 2nd level of the historic King James Building. Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown. *Rental Agreement Required*
*Please note: There is not an elevator in the building*

name: Private, New & Walkable to Haywood Rd & River Arts
description: Artsy modern guest suite in new green-built home in East-West Asheville convenient to everything.

name: Renovated Farmhouse with Pond-10 min to Downtown!
description:
****NO CHILDREN BELOW AGE 12 DUE TO DEEP POND JUST OUTSIDE THE DOOR

This is the original farmhouse on our 40-acre property. Recently, we updated the inside with modern amenities, while preserving much of the original charm. Note that there is a slightly uneven floor in the kitchen due to the age of the house, but the kitchen is otherwise modern. The house has a pond and water feature, and is super convenient to downtown (just 6.5 miles).

name: Montford Nest Couples Private Retreat Walk to Town
description: Relax in a lush & serene cottage setting nestled in Historic Montford. Surrounded by trees and charming homes, you'll love how close you are to downtown while feeling tucked away in your own cozy paradise.  This studio suite comes equipped with private entrance & porch, hotel style luxury mattress and linens, fully equipped kitchenette, and luxury master bath. Be rest assured, this remodeled suite is thoroughly & professionally cleaned and is equipped with all you'll need to feel right at home.

name: Rustic cabin 15 minutes from downtown Asheville!
description:
Nestled in Buffalo Mountain, this charming hideaway in the trees is less than 15 minutes from downtown Asheville with endless opportunity for fun, art, shopping, music, history (the Biltmore), and stellar farm to table restaurants. Enjoy nearby hiking and biking trails, tubing on the river, or taking in mountain views.

Perfect for families or couples looking to enjoy all the entertainment Asheville has to offer, or those just looking for some peace and solitude.

name: Brookstone Lodge Biltmore Village Area
description: We are a small boutique hotel located 1.8miles from the Biltmore Estate and 3.5 miles from the downtown area. We offer a complimentary hot breakfast to all guests.

name: ★Rudy's Place★30Day|Wlk Dtwn, Biltmore&Hospital
description:
Luxury, tiny condo in convenient Central Asheville. 2nd /Top Floor walk-up. 1 BDRM, 1 Bath 600sq ft. Fully renovated.

East/West facing picture windows, guest will enjoy fabulous morning sunrises over the hill, and beautiful evening sunsets over a well-manicured courtyard.

This quiet retreat is perfect for solo travelers, digital nomads, or couples. Get to all the attractions Asheville has to offer in a jiffy; or stay home, relax, and enjoy the serenity.

name: Families, groups, outdoor area, near downtown AVL
description:
Welcome to Reynold’s View! Cheaper rates available on other platforms.
Custom built by your hosts in 2017, this 1800sqf home comes with mountain views! About 4 mi to dwntwn AVL, conveniently located off the highway, this is the perfect spot to relax and still be close to everything! Open concept with primary suite on main level. We strive to be eco conscious and low waste!
Perfect for small groups and families!
Due to severe allergies, we cannot host any animals.
Insta @Reynoldsandpoplarview

name: THE NEST | Weeknight Discount!  This is your sign!
description: Your upscale home-away-from-home is an easy drive and perfectly located near downtown (8.9 miles, 4 turns/ no highways), The Biltmore Estate (7.1 miles, 3 turns/ no highways) and the Blue Ridge Parkway (2.9 miles). Lounge around on the large couch and watch movies on the Roku TV by the warm fireplace.  Play a retro arcade game or challenge a friend to an air hockey or foosball match in the cool neon glow of the game room. Go outside to enjoy the giant swing, zip line, and ninja course!

name: First floor at the Hill on Lexington Market
description: Slow season amazing rates.  Great home base literally 10 steps from downtown Asheville.  No Uber or parking fees.  A hop to the interstate and  mountains. Lexington Market spot, with designated parking space, all downtown nightlife Asheville offers within easy walking distance.  Breweries, bars, restaurants, galleries, music etc. . . .  Wifi throughout, SMART tv with courtesy Netflix,  Walk in shower with 2 shower heads and separate soaking tub.  THE DESIGNATED PARKING SPACE IS A#10 on premises.

name: Lucerne Chalet in The Treetops in DT AVL, Dog Fndy
description:
The Lucerne Chalet is nestled in the private mountain treetops while being a five minute drive away from downtown with easy access to the Biltmore Estate, the Blue Ridge Parkway and local breweries.

Excellent location to take advantage of current downtown restaurant pick up services.

Inside there is an updated kitchen, a gas fireplace and two chalet style bedrooms. Soak in the mountains from the rocking chairs on the gated porch or during a relaxing stroll through the neighborhood.

name: Asheville Cabin Resting on the Swannanoa River
description: Cabin on the Water; your Asheville escape on the Swannanoa River.  This special home is a unique & fantastic, newly renovated & updated 4-bedroom Asheville destination. The vacation home is located right on the river, with a wooded & open yard, overlooking the Swannanoa River with, and private access for fishing, swimming, exploring and more.

name: DT AVL! Matterhorn Chalet -Treetop Mtn Views, Dogs
description:
Come enjoy the mountains of Western North Carolina!

Gaze at the mountains from the gated porch & stroll through the quiet neighborhood with your dog.

The open floor plan is perfect for small gatherings, the many windows give an outside treetop feel to the living space and you can cozy up to your gas fireplace in the living room.

Enjoy a special treat and reserve this one-of-a-kind chalet in downtown Asheville.

One dog with prior approval. Fees apply

name: Peaceful Haw Creek mountain apartment
description: Super convenient 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment suite in Haw Creek.  10 minutes to downtown, 15 minutes to Mission Hospital.  You will have private access to this space via your own door.  Includes a living room, dining area, full kitchen, full bath, and washer/dryer.  Parking for one vehicle is included with additional parking in cul-de-sac.  There is a nice walking trail adjacent to the property!  The upper portion of house is occupied by owner so you will see us around the yard/driveway.

name: Biltmore Hideaway: Luxury urban treetop retreat
description: Welcome to your Biltmore Hideaway! Located in historic Kenilworth, this 750 SF 2 bdrm/1 bath private lower level apartment is a stone’s throw away from Biltmore Estate and historic Biltmore Village, and 1.7 miles to Downtown Asheville. We offer luxury accommodations with a screened porch nestled among the treetops where you can enjoy your complimentary Biltmore Estate wine, local spirits, & snacks. You will have a private entrance to this lower level apartment in our home.

name: Mary Ann’s Place filled with casual country charm.
description:
Nestled on over six well maintained acres this house is the perfect private location that is also very convenient to all local attractions such as the Biltmore House, Arboretum, Sierra Nevada Brewery and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The house features four bedrooms, two and a half bathrooms, full kitchen, wifi, washer and dryer and a private well with excellent water filtration system.

There are three ponds and a creek on the property which entice local wild life. Deer, foxes & bear do visit.

name: Charming Tiny Cottage in Central Location
description: This is a sweet cozy getaway centrally located less than 5 min. from Asheville airport and Sierra Nevada, 15 min. from downtown Asheville, and 20 to downtown Hendersonville. Relax on a new memory foam mattress with a walk in closet and an updated bathroom. Enjoy smart TV with cable, internet, refrigerator, microwave, range, cookware, and a coffee maker. There’s a keyless door code for convenience and privacy. The house is easy to get to, has ample parking in a safe and quiet neighborhood.

name: Gorgeous Views!  Great Location-Spa-Dreamy Porch!
description:
Min. age to rent: 27 - Up to 2 dogs max for $75.
Rustic, cozy house with modern touches and incredible long range mountain views. Max 8 people. 20 minutes to downtown Asheville and 5 minutes to restaurants/bars in S. Asheville. Large screened porch with ample seating/bar. Sun room, Game/Family room on lower level with 9' shuffleboard table. Hot tub and fenced yard.

PLEASE DO NOT BOOK THIS HOUSE FOR A BACHELOR/BACHELORETTE PARTY OR SIMILAR TYPE OF GATHERING. SORRY, THIS IS NOT A PARTY HOUSE

name: *Town Mtn*3 mi to Dwntn AVL*King*Starlink*Hot Tub*
description: Newly renovated mountaintop lodge just 3 miles to Downtown Asheville. Guests will enjoy plenty of space on three levels with breathtaking views from two decks overlooking the Beaverdam area of Asheville.

name: "Hygge" 3BR Bungalow
description:
Our 1920s bungalow with its great natural light and comfortable space defines Hygge - cozy contentment and simple enjoyment.

Bungalow includes:
-Comfortable living and dining room
-Large fenced-in back yard for relaxing with your pet
-Full kitchen for dining in (if desired)
-Easy to access private parking
-Bluetooth enabled vintage stereo
-Celling fans in bedrooms and living room
-Complimentary coffee & tea
-Convenient access to all Asheville has to offer!

How’s that for cozy contentment!

name: Charming Historic King James Building Unit #3
description:
Charming and renovated 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo on the 2nd level of the historic King James Building. Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown. *Rental Agreement Required*
*Please note: There is not an elevator in the building*

name: Modern topnotch breathtaking Mountain view home
description: Beautiful mountain views, front porch, Beautiful water fountain,large Backyard place with fire pit and sitting area also a grill.

name: Apple Blossom Retreat mins to AVL & Cove, Mt. View
description: A Mountain Experience 13 min. from downtown Asheville, 3 min to the Billy Graham Training Center Cove, 9 min to Biltmore Estate & Biltmore Village! 4 min. to Blue Ridge Parkway, 8 min to Highland Brewery, 25 min. to Catawba Falls.  On a hill with beautiful mountain views, farmhouse lower level 2 bed room apt: King and Queen, living room: couch  & futon, 1 bathroom, W/D, full kitchen, dining room, picnic table for the lovely outdoors, generous onsite parking. Best of both country and city living.

name: Casita AshevilleTownhome w/ fireplace and balcony
description: Our townhome has everything you need and provides a comfortable home base for up to 9 guests (Up to 5 Adults + 4 Children). You will love the incredible mountain views that can be seen from nearly every room in the house. For guests with accessibility challenges, our home features an elevator.

name: The Yap house
description: Bright and cheerful house in West Asheville.  Three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Host lives in a private apartment on the ground floor.  The second and thirds floors are reserved for guests with private entrance. House is a 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville and a 7 minute drive to colorful historic West Asheville. Close to many eateries and entertainment.

name: Walkable Asheville Vacation Rental
description:
Escape to our inviting downstairs suite in West Asheville! Enjoy access to the entire downstairs, featuring a queen bedroom with a Tuft & Needle mattress, a bathroom, and a living room w/twin pullout sofa bed.

West Asheville is a 10-minute walk to restaurants like Biscuit Head, Sunny Point, etc The Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville are 3 miles away.

Experience seamless check-in with our door code system. We provide complimentary coffee & tea.

We live upstairs with our 2 year old son.

name: Asheville’s Green Valley Cottage
description: Tucked back amongst lush growth, find comfort and calm in our charming little cottage. The space has been thoughtfully decorated and outfitted to not only meet your needs, but to offer a unique space to make cherished memories in. Situated just on the outskirts of West Asheville, this cozy gem offers the best of convenience as well. With quick access to I-40, it's an easy drive to all that Asheville has to offer.

name: Herron's Hideaway
description:
Adorable space in a great location for exploring Asheville and areas north. Easy walk to great restaurants and just a short hop to Downtown, the River Arts District or Weaverville.
The upstairs is your private space - a bedroom, bathroom, and a TV room with a kitchenette and desk area. Perfect for singles or couples on a short trip to the mountains.

name: ~5 star Downtown Spacious Retreat at 35 Patton
description:
Spacious 1965 square foot loft in a historic Patton Ave building in the epicenter of downtown Asheville where luxury meets Asheville flair.
The loft was originally owned by one of Asheville's finest artists and retains its art gallery roots with walls of many original works. Modern updates along with cozy fireplace makes it a true oasis in a bustling city. Just outside your front or back door is live entertainment, shopping, and fine dining.

name: Cozy, Stylish Montford Retreat
description: We think you'll love our space. It's quirky, comfortable, and stylish. A bit like Asheville, really. This studio apartment has a private entrance and is a 10 minute walk downtown. This clean, modern space in our 100 year old home is your perfect launch pad for brewery tours, culinary interests or explorations of all the wild beauty the local Blue Ridge has to offer. This space is below our main living space so there may be occasional noise since we have 2 young kids. FYI: there is no TV!

name: Luxury 2BR 2 Bath Condo
description: 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an open kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you.

name: Warm and Inviting 1BR 1BA Condo
description: 1BR/1BA open kitchen, living room, balcony. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. A moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Mountain Home Nestled in Nature, close to town
description: Mountain Home Nestled in Nature is delightful. Enjoy a drive through the picturesque Riceville Valley on your way to our quiet and cozy home.  Hear the sounds of nature all around you from the lovely covered deck that overlooks the forest.  Unwind to the soft whispers of the wind in the trees, the perfect setting to enjoy your morning coffee, evening drinks and for relaxing.  A private and quiet retreat yet less than 10 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville. No pets -see other notes

name: Laurel's Rest
description: A basement studio apartment with private entry and patio.  Quiet and great nature views.  Full kitchen for those who cook!  We are in Arden (south of Asheville) and conveniently located near the Asheville airport, numerous breweries (Sierra Nevada, Blue Ghost, Mills River, Sweeten Creek, Burning Blush, Hillman, French Broad, etc), restaurants, Biltmore House, Hendersonville, Brevard, Pisgah National Forest and other activities. Keyless entry for easy check-in.  Designated guest parking on-site.

name: Simply Divine in West Asheville!
