description: Beautiful new contemporary.  Private 1600 sq ft accommodation with all the bells and whistles – smart TVs, cable/high-speed internet, gourmet kitchen, washer/dryer and more.  Relax after a busy day in two cozy outdoor venues.  The treetop level deck features inviting places to sit/dine and an adjacent indoor bar area.  Bring out the smart speaker for your favorite tunes or sporting events.  Quiet neighborhood, large comfy beds and upscale décor promise a very special stay.

name: New! Asheville's French Corner: Touch of Provence
description:
Experience a “Touch of Provence” in our freshly renovated, self-sufficient pied-à-terre.
Rented mid-term, this independent suite sits moments from foodie-favorite restaurants, live music, art & small businesses lining Haywood Road in hip West Asheville.
May this lovingly & thoughtfully designed French inspired interior invite you to savor & embrace “la Joie de Vivre!”

name: Classic and Timeless 1 BR Condo
description:
Spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence with an open kitchen, living room, and balcony. Located in the heart of downtown Asheville, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you.

description: Let's be serious, besides the tremendous amount of local art, hiking, history and music... You're here to experience Asheville's world famous beer scene! Come experience the life of a local Asheville Brewer. The Barrel-Aged Beer Home is a 2100 sqft fully craft beer inspired home, covered head to toe in artwork and regenerated brewing equipment.

name: Serene Getaway By The Heart Of AVL - Entire House!
description:
Water & Power Available!
Mandatory Water Boil Notice is in effect for all of Asheville

Your next Asheville vacation begins with the perfect vacation house. Amazingly convenient and Incredibly close to everything Asheville has to offer! We are 5 minutes away from the River Arts District and less than 10 minutes away from Downtown and West Asheville. We are a legal vacation rental and located right outside the edge of city limits!

name: Excellent Views & Short Walk to Downtown Asheville
description: Welcome to the Overlook on Beaucatcher Mountain, a fully remodeled rental with approximately 1500 sqft overlooking downtown Asheville.  The space includes 2 bedrooms with high end queen mattresses, 2 gorgeous bathrooms with spacious showers, a game room with pool table, dart board & bar area, living area with stone hearth & wood burning fire place, & fully operational kitchenette with mini fridge.  The space is so comfortable some of our guests decide to spend more time at home versus going out.

description: You will love "Happy Hideaway"! It is a new listing, now for the entire 4 BR, 3 bath home. It is nice and private, in the back of a quiet neighborhood within minutes of DT Asheville (6 miles) and the Biltmore Estate. It's an easy walk (1/4 mile) to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains to Sea Trail, and just 2 miles from a grocery store, and delicious Italian restaurant.  This modernized rustic home has a great kitchen,  a woodstove, firepit, and large deck with a swing to enjoy gorgeous sunsets.

name: Charming, condo #1 in Historic King James Building
description:

name: Mountain View Guest Suite
description:
Mountainside retreat; 500 sq foot guest studio located above a detached garage in a quiet private neighborhood with mountain views; Kitchen space with full sized refrigerator & ice maker, Keurig coffee maker and toaster; king-sized bed; microwave; access to a gas grill, screened in porch, and fire pit are just some of the ammenites provided.

Approximately 7 miles from the Biltmore Estate, 8 miles from downtown Asheville, and 4 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway Visitor's Center.

name: Cozy Wooded Cabin, Spa Hot Tub, Close to Biltmore
description:
Rustic cabin surrounded by nature and close to everything Asheville has to offer. Relax and heal amongst the trees in our 34 Jet Spa Therapy hot tub built into deck.

Conveniently located near the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, downtown Asheville, and the Asheville Regional Airport -- all within 11 miles.

Hi-Speed Wifi and Roku TV for streaming.
Quaint gas stove.. Toddler play area with slide and climbing wall. Complimentary coffee and snacks.

name: The Woodland House Mountain Retreat
description: Nestled in an old growth forest, this artisan built reclaimed 1853 log cabin features hand hewn timbers, hard wood floors, all the modern conveniences, plus an expansive outdoor living space. Enjoy mountain sunsets surrounded by nature in the 6 person hot tub. Located just ten minutes from downtown Asheville, twenty minutes to the Biltmore Estate, and a short walk to the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Woodland House is a true one of a kind mountain experience you don't want to miss.

name: Parkway-1.5m, River access, Hiking, Downtown-5m
description:
Peaceful, private, separate, small country guesthouse on 1.5 sunny acres, Fully fenced with lots of green space!
Short trail to river across the street
1.5 miles Blue Ridge Parkway Entrance
Pet fee: first 2 nights included 35 each additional night due after booking

Trails nearby
Organic queen bed, Microwave, toaster,coffee maker/coffee/creamer/tea, small fridge

10mi-Blk Mtn

name: Serenity Now!
description: The space is a warm and cozy modern apartment with an access deck overlooking a serene wooded area frequented by bears, groundhogs, foxes, turkeys, and who knows what other wildlings. We are fewer than five minutes from just about everything including Biltmore Village and downtown Asheville. Inside you find a beautiful and inviting queen bed, spacious bathroom, and plenty of natural light. There is a long descending pathway with stone steps--please see the pictures in our profile.

name: Exclusive Peaceful Brand New Model Home 3bdrm 2bth
Creek-side retreat in the Heart of West Asheville
description: The Sunburst Suite is a peaceful retreat in the heart of West Asheville, ideally located as a jumping-off point for all activities in and around Asheville. Guests have a short walk up a quiet tree-lined street to reach Haywood Road, the center of West Asheville, with its restaurants, bars, breweries and shops. Downtown Asheville and the up-and-coming South Slope neighborhoods are only 5 miles away. Wake up to birds chirping and wind down listening to the creek and relaxing in the back yard.

name: Luxury condo Unit #201
description: Large two bed, two bath with open kitchen, dining room, and balcony. name: Views | FirePit | Pets | Hike | Wi-fi | Large Home
description: Welcome to Asheville! *After Hurricane Helene, there is construction everywhere in Asheville so there may be some noise though we have had no complaints!* This house is perfect for large families, conveniently located in East Asheville. Sleeping 9 guests with so much room to stretch out.  Fenced area for your dogs. Enjoy 360-degree views, large yard.  Enjoy all Asheville has to offer and precious family time or reconnect with friends! Minutes to the Parkway, Grove Park, downtown.

name: Eco-friendly tranquility minutes from downtown
description: This is a perfect home for a couples’ quiet getaway, a family vacation, or a friends weekend in the Blue Ridge Mountains. You'll be enchanted by the peacefulness of country living while being barely over 5 minutes from downtown Asheville and its spectacular dining, festivals, breweries, live music and shows. -- Note: we were thankfully unaffected by Hurricane Helene --

name: Beautiful lower level apartment with outdoor tub
description: Beautiful, modern, brand new apartment with two bedrooms, lots of light, and lovely outdoor space with exclusive use of a charming outdoor bath tub. Kitchenette with all the essentials, flat screen television with cable, and a dedicated parking spot with plenty of room for extra cars. This location can't be beat; just a five minute drive from downtown, and a 5 minute walk to New Belgium Brewery, the French Broad river greenway, and all of the wonderful WAVL businesses along Haywood.

name: Non-smoking, Retreat Away From Home
description: My home is 8 minutes to Asheville central. Surrounded by trees, this is a unique property. and there is no hustle or bustle here.  I  have a cat who has adopted me. So if you have severe cat allergies, beware. Also, at this time I am not accepting dogs.

name: Charming 1 Room Guesthouse, Heart of West AVL
description:
Welcome to the Blue Door Bungalow (Bungalito, if you will!)

Custom, tiny house, huge on charm -- A quiet retreat only steps away from the best of West Asheville! 1-room guesthouse with full bath, fast wifi and easy street parking.

A great home base to explore Asheville's rivers, mountains, historical sites, breweries and incredible restaurants. There is also a full grocery store (and MANY more shops) all just 2 blocks away.

Come & ENJOY!


*See "other details to note" regarding pet boarding

name: Asheville Home with Superb Mountain Views
description:
Experience the splendor of the Blue Ridge Mountain skies from your deck or front porch, just a 14 minute drive from downtown Asheville, 16 minutes to the Biltmore Estate and less than 20 minutes from Black Mountain.

The deck features views of the Mountains to Sea trail and Blue Ridge Parkway. All photos of views in this listing are taken from our back deck.

Your Blue Ridge Mountain adventure awaits, and we'd be honored to host you!

name: 8 min to Biltmore 5 miles to Downtown Sleeps 8
description:
3 bedroom home just minutes from Interstate 40, Blue Ridge Parkway, Asheville Mall, downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, & historic Biltmore Village.

BDRM 1 : King bed
BDRM 2 : Queen bed
BDRM 3 : Queen bed
Living RM : Full sleeper sofa

Large living room for entertaining with a TV & surround sound. Large front porch overlooking the main road & neighborhood. Large back deck to enjoy the crisp fall temperatures and changing leaves with plenty of grass for kids to run and play.

name: Adorable Tiny Guesthouse Super Cozy & Clean
description:
Come and enjoy our cozy, clean, unique and very sweet tiny guest house.
Ideally located just 15 minutes to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate & Blue Ridge Parkway
Our tiny guest house has everything you may need to enjoy a short stay.
Designated parking space w/motion sensor lights if you arrive after dark. A loveseat swing greets you as you enter the covered deck leading to the outdoor seating area, bar height table/2 chairs & entry door
W/Keyless entry
Free WiFi
AC/Heat
Simply a Great Stay!

name: Charming Tiny House by the Biltmore Village
description: Private charming tiny house with loft bedroom.  Amazing location: less than one mile from the Biltmore house, 1.5 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway, 7 minute drive to the heart of downtown.  Enjoy a quiet tiny house overlooking gardens, coffee and tea available, refrigerator, covered porch, customized shower with mosaic tiles.  This studio is in the privacy of a fenced in area with private entrance.  Parking available.  Enjoy Michelle's vegetable garden and flowers and stone patio.

name: Private Guest House! Walkable West Asheville
description: RARE FIND! Grandfathered in from the city ban on detached Airbnbs, our place is a unique! Total privacy. No more trying to sleep in someone's basement while your hosts crash around upstairs. In the neighborhood of West Asheville, our private detached guest house is a short walk to restaurants, music, breweries and shopping.  7min drive to downtown. 500 sqft Three separate rooms. Queen bedroom, full bathroom and separate living room with convertible sofa. Sorry NO PETS.

name: Downtown Asheville with Great Views & Sunsets
description:
Unit is undamaged and the water is now drinkable!

This quaint bungalow was recently remodeled & is in a prime walk able downtown Asheville location. It has a large front porch, where you can relax on a glider couch or two rocking chairs while looking at downtown Asheville & amazing sunsets. Both bedrooms have brand new mattresses & each have two windows with black out blinds. The front living area has a mini fridge, couch, TV & two more windows. The bathroom has a full tub/shower.

name: Earthy & Spacious Private Bungalow
description: One bedroom, one bath apartment located in the front of my beautifully restored 1920s bungalow in downtown Asheville

name: Bear-a-dise Found
description: Absolutely adorable and totally remodeled apartment overlooking the pool area of the Bear Creek RV park & Campground. This place is fairly private and perfect for two people or a family with children. You can even bring your fur baby for an additional charge. Swimming pool, playground, dog walk, and more located on the property.

name: The Cozy Cottage with the Illusion of Seclusion
description: The Cozy Cottage has gorgeous long range views of the Blue Ridge Mountains.  Our guests love having the illusion of seclusion just minutes away from all modern conveniences. A quiet refuge that sits on about an acre of wooded property where you can relax, regroup and plan the adventures awaiting you just minutes from the front door. The cottage has been completely updated, furnished and stocked with everything you may need for your total comfort and enjoyment.  Your next retreat awaits...

name: Complete Private Suite near Asheville activities
description: Close to the airport and downtown Asheville, this is a private entire downstairs suite of rooms with a private entrance through the garage and a large amount of space. There is a sitting/TV area, a dining area with kitchenette, a comfortable queen bedroom, and a full bathroom. Ten minutes from the airport and 20 minutes to the center of Asheville, the house is in a lovely suburban setting close to dining and all that the area has to offer.

name: Private Master Bedroom Suite w/ KING Tempur-Pedic
description: You will enjoy your own large private master bedroom, a king size Tempur-pedic bed,  and private en-suite full bath. This is a West Asheville townhouse with a shared entrance to the home - just 2 miles from city center and 1 mile from fun and hip Haywood Rd. You can walk to the Asheville Adventure Park for an afternoon zip-lining or mountain biking, or to the Crown Plaza Resort, for tennis, salt water pool, or fitness center. This  is a shared space so you might see myself or another we guest!

name: Private apartment near Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
This private basement apartment is 620 sq. ft. and includes a living room, kitchen, bedroom & bathroom. We do live upstairs but have been told that the sound doesn’t carry, so you can enjoy the peace and quiet. Access entrance with your own private door code. There are a few steps from the parking area to the ground level entrance. A backup power generator keeps the power on all the time.
Our property is a tobacco, e-cigarettes and alcohol-free location. Pets are not permitted.

name: Bohemian Bungalow
description: Quaint home located just minutes from Breweries, Aboretum, Shopping Outlet, Airport, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and so much more. This home is here for your convenience! Pets welcome! $50 pet fee

We host this clean, budget friendly room for travelers who just need a place to sleep, and who understand this is our home, not a hotel.

Only 3 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway, 2 miles off of I-26. Room also has mini-fridge, TV with Roku, & electric kettle!

description:

name: Asheville Urban Oasis at Emma
description: Built brand new for you! We asked ourselves and our guests exactly what we would want in a vacation rental built from scratch, then we customized the Urban Oasis to make your Asheville experience as fun and memorable as possible. Amazing open floor plan, full kitchen, soundproofed rooms, large deck, private fenced yard, hot tub, fire ring and picnic area make this the perfect vacation destination only 8 minutes from downtown Asheville, 6 from the River Arts District and West Asheville.

name: Walkable Downtown Asheville Condo w/ Balcony
description: Whether you’re a beer drinker, a mountain hiker, or a canopy cruiser, this 1-bedroom, 1-bath condo is the perfect resting place after an adventurous day in Asheville! Located in the heart of downtown, the updated vacation rental offers a fully equipped kitchen, a community terrace with views of the hills, and a modern living space to call home during your visit. Walk to nearby restaurants and breweries, take a stroll through the North Carolina Arboretum, and snap a photo at the Biltmore Estate!

name: Stylish & Comfy Home Mins Downtown
description: Tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area is our peaceful 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom home away from home. Here you’ll find room to breathe, plenty of natural light, and just a touch of what’s familiar. We’ve made a peaceful place for you to relax, so you can focus on the next adventure. Why pile everyone into a hotel room (or two) when you can breathe the mountain air without stepping on any toes?

name: {Skyloft} Modern Townhome walkable to downtown AVL
description:
Asheville is open and ready to welcome you!
Explore Asheville and Come Home to our Modern, Comfortable & Convenient 3BR Townhome.

With all the amenities of home, you're sure to enjoy all that Asheville and the surrounding area has to offer.
This is a brand new listing and we are new to hosting! We are excited to launch this rental property and are eager to receive our first guests.

description:
NEW LISTING!

Cozy pet friendly bungalow close to downtown, shopping, dining and walking.

Newly remodeled home in popular North Asheville. Nestled in a quiet, family friendly neighborhood, this house features an open floor plan with brand new furnishings, updated kitchen and bath rooms.

You will find everything you need for an extended stay in the mountains in this cheerful, stylish relaxing haven.

name: Private Grove Park Suite near downtown Asheville!
description: Nestled in the picturesque and historic Grove Park district of Asheville, our 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom basement apartment offers both charm and convenience with its private entrance. Just a stone's throw from downtown Asheville, you're a leisurely walk or a brief drive away from the vibrant heart of the city and the renowned Grove Park Inn.  Stay with us and immerse yourself in the true spirit of Asheville, surrounded by beauty and rich history at every turn.

name: 306 SW Condo Asheville - Historic Art Deco Gem!
description: Stay in the historic SW Cafeteria Building!  Built in 1929, the building is iconic art deco architecture, located in the center of downtown!  The condo is spacious 1000 square feet with hard wood floors, exposed brick, and open light filled living/dining and kitchen. Highland Brewery taproom and high end food hall in commercial space on first floor and mezzanine.  You can walk to everything downtown has to offer!

name: Biltmore Oasis in Asheville.
description:
You'll love our large private suite with luxurious king size bed in the bedroom and tv. Private bath off the bedroom with large tiled shower, heated floors and plump towels. Livingroom with couch, tv, fridge, coffeepot and a pool table.
Keyless entry.

Private patio overlooking woods with gas firepit, bbq grill and inground pool. (open May - Sept.) Shared with owners.

Close to Biltmore Village and Biltmore Estate, Asheville and many breweries in the area. Great area to enjoy hiking.

name: Wanderlust Lofts: The Sapphire, Downtown Haven
description: The Sapphire is our 2 bd luxury loft in the heart of the South Slope of Downtown Avl. We also have a 1 bd loft, The Opal. (See booking specials for Wanderlust Lofts on our web site.) The Sapphire features high ceilings, expansive windows and a thoughtfully curated design. The loft offers an unbeatable location, premium bedding, fully stocked modern Italian kitchen and appliances, artwork from the owner's world travels, & complimentary morning coffee from our family's coffee/wine bar downstairs.

name: Wanderlust Lofts: The Opal, Downtown Urban Retreat
description: The Opal is our 1 bd luxury loft in the heart of the South Slope of Downtown Avl. If booked, see our 2 bd loft, The Sapphire. (See booking specials for Wanderlust Lofts on our web site.) The Opal features high ceilings, expansive windows and a thoughtfully curated design. The loft offers an unbeatable location, premium bedding, fully stocked modern Italian kitchen and appliances, artwork from the owner's world travels, & complimentary morning coffee from our family's coffee/wine bar downstairs.

name: The Gnome Home- spacious and private
description: A five minute drive to fun and funky west Asheville's hip Haywood road full of restaurants, bars and local craft breweries and music venues. A 15 minute drive to downtown. This house however is slightly more in the country so more room to breathe. I have local and international art on the walls including many of my own pieces. I love the local art and music scene and would be happy to give you insider tips on where to go. You can have complete privacy or I am willing to interact/chat.

name: Beautiful porches made for families and friends.
description:
We are less than 7 miles to the heart of Asheville and close to the Biltmore House. Waterfalls, hiking trails & the Blue Ridge Parkway are all nearby.

Our comfortable home has an open floor plan that exceeds 2000 sq feet. Your family or friends can spread out among the 3 bedrooms and find space to play games, watch 3 TVs, sit in rocking chairs on the front porch , or relax in our screened in back porch sipping provided Starbucks coffee, or bring back brews from over 25 breweries nearby.

name: Private Mountain Home Near Downtown Asheville
description:
Welcome to the top of Town Mountain!
Mountain splendor, close to downtown Asheville, and luxurious surroundings.....this is the place to create memories for a lifetime.
Town Mountain Breeze will deliver just that, and is a true breath of fresh air/
This destination has your vacation memories written all over it!

name: Dreamcatcher
description: This is a beautiful Art and Craft Home on a quiet street and close to everything!! The house was fully redone while maintaining its historic charm. Each bedroom has a King size bed and in the den a comfortable futon. Beauty and simplicity. Beautiful front porch on a quiet street. Private driveway for parking. We also have a jacuzzi!! Indoor/ outdoor cat at the house.

name: Spacious inside and out, fun, tons of amenities
description:
Our beautiful home sits on 3 acres of terraced backyard, a creek, and a small pond - and it's in Asheville city limits. Perfect for families or a group of friends. 5 mins to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Arboretum, and Asheville Outlets. 10 mins to Bent Creek hikes. 15 mins to the center of downtown.

All the amenities make our place quite unique. We have a large collection of board games, jacuzzi, ping pong, trampoline, slack line, climbing dome, long swings, soccer, and a huge sandbox for kids.

name: Private AVL studio w/Hot Tub! Close to it all!
description: Unique private studio close to everything Asheville has to offer! This one of a kind property is a stones throw away from the French Broad River Greenway and just a three minute drive from the eclectic restaurants and shops in the heart of West Asheville. Downtown Asheville and Biltmore estate are less than 10 minute drive! All spaces are completely private including hot tub, sauna and expansive deck to relax and enjoy a rejuvenating getaway!

name: Coveted Downtown Asheville Location with Balcony
description: One king bedroom, one bathroom, open kitchen, living room, and balcony. New appliances, luxury hotel bedding, and comfy seating create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourselves. Only a short distance to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries. You are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: The Loft at Deer Crossing
description:
Our home is nestled in a beautiful area just 2 miles off of interstate 26. My husband built our barn style home in 2019 to fit our piece of land. He took the wood from the property and used it to build this one-of-a-kind home. We are close to airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, Blue Ridge Parkway, and many restaurants.
There are eight homes off of our road and the neighborhood is quiet. It is peaceful and scenic to sit on our porches after a day of hiking or sightseeing.

name: Asheville Mountain Bluebird Cottage
description: The Bluebird Cottage is a newly constructed modern studio cottage located on a beautiful wooded mountain lot in the Shope Creek area of east Asheville, NC. This private home  in the trees is minutes from Pisgah National Forest where hiking and biking trails are plentiful. Downtown Asheville,  the Blue Ridge Parkway and Warren Wilson College are in close proximity. You get the best of Western North Carolina with a quiet mountain home close to vibrant downtown Asheville.

name: Artsy Apartment, walk to W. Asheville
description: Our guest suite is colorful, peaceful, and cozy. You'll be enchanted by original artwork and unique handcrafted items. Cozy linens on a king bed, bathroom robes, morning coffee in a handmade mug, and a private patio overlooking a wooded park will make you feel right at home. It’s a 10 minute drive to downtown or the River Arts District, and walkable to the heart of charming West AVL. If you are looking for a quiet, comfortable getaway close to it all, book with us!

name: The River Nook✨A Tiny Refuge
description:
A bright, new, custom tiny home welcomes you for your visit to Asheville!
The River Nook is a magical refuge and starting point for all your Asheville area adventures! The careful thought and attention to detail that has been put into every aspect of this space, paired with the prime North Asheville location (within walking distance to a French Broad river park and lovely coffee shop) is sure to make this your future go-to vacation spot in the mountains.All are welcome here

name: The Studio at 217
description: The Studio at  217 is tucked away on a quiet cul-de-sac in as-yet-to-be-discovered East Asheville.  This cozy, light filled space is attached to a corner of our handmade log home, with it's own private entrance and designated parking. Our property abuts  Blue Ridge Parkway land, so it's a short hike on a clear trail through the woods to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail or the Parkway.  The Studio is 15 mins from the Biltmore, just 12 mins from downtown, and one mile from a local grocery store.

name: The Woodfin - Chateau de Bro & Chalet de Bae
description:
THE SPACE IS ALL YOURS!

The Woodfin is a chateau de bro, chalet de bae, camp for champs, and home for the roaming adventurer. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood just a 5 to 7-minute drive from downtown, this private dream pad is the perfect hub for couples, friends, and family to explore everything Asheville. Recharge in the high-end Tempurpedic TEMPUR-Cloud® bed for an unbeatable nights sleep! Fully equipped kitchen. Professionally cleaned!!

name: Asheville  Zen Cottage
description: Peaceful Mountain Cottage over 100 years old. Sits on 1.5 acres, just north of Asheville.   My grandfather built this house for my grandmother & their 9 children. It is filled with charm & nostalgia. Original hard wood floors, bead board walls & ceiling.  Front porch for watching my 3 goats play, an afternoon sunset or enjoy conversation with those dear to your heart. Sit in the gazebo to enjoy a good book, beverages or watch the night sky bring out the stars for your amazement.

name: Bear Way to Heaven
description: Adorable & newly remodeled SPACIOUS 1 BD/1BA located in the Asheville Bear Creek Campground & RV Park.  Fairly private w/ huge back deck overlooking the mountains of  WNC.  Perfect for 2 people, but great if you have 2 children to put them on the futons in the LR. We do accept pets with an additional charge. Swimming pool, playground, dog walk, and much more. So close and convenient to EVERYTHING!

name: The Llama | Entire place West Asheville
description: An entire 1000 sq ft basement apartment with 10-ft high ceilings, and its own private entrance, deck, and parking spot in West Asheville. Our family lives upstairs, so please expect to hear our toddlers throughout the day. Located on a quiet street with mountain and Biltmore Forest views, just minutes from Downtown Asheville, the Blue Ridge Parkway, and the Biltmore House. Thoughtfully designed for a relaxing stay near the best of Asheville!

name: Serene spot with nature, near shops and dining.
description:
This lovely 3 bedroom 2 bath, open floor plan cabin located MINUTES from Biltmore Estate, Asheville Outlets, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek and Downtown, has the feeling of private wooded environment. Enjoy view of mountains with a horse farm in the backdrop and occasional family of deer crossing the path, while sipping your coffee on the covered porch in the pristine forest location. 1/2 mile from Pisgah National Forest Trail head.
Fully equipped kitchen, hi speed wi-fi and 55” tv.

name: *Pool*Hot Tub*GameRoom*5 Miles to Dtwn&Biltmore*
description:
**Pool reopens May 2025**
Numerous upgrades make this Asheville home ideal for families and groups. With an expansive kitchen and dual living areas, there’s plenty of room to relax or entertain indoors. Prefer the outdoors? Whether watching your four-legged friends run around the yard or children splash in the pool, the backyard oasis is always a hit.

name: Studio
description: The Studio is a lofted double bed that sleeps two (requires steps). It has its own private bathroom, sink and shower. One of the three private rooms we offer, we have a communal fully equipped kitchen, dining room and living room.

name: Asheville Cottage 19
description:
If you're looking for that cozy cottage feel, Cottage 19 is the space for you! Getting around is as easy as a stroll, bike ride, Uber, or drive through gorgeous historic neighborhoods surrounded by charming Asheville ‘wildlife'.... bunnies, possums, cardinals, oh my! Something to catch your eye around every corner.

NO SMOKING ALLOWED ANYTIME INSIDE OR ON THE PROPERTY. TWO (2) PERSON SLEEPING MAXIMUM.

name: 6 MIN To Downtown AVL% Discounted Rates
description:
7 Min Drive to Asheville Art Museum
6 Min Drive to Downtown Asheville
11 Min Drive to Biltmore

Located in the quaint Woodfin community, this beautiful, 1500 sq ft home is the perfect base for an extended staycation. It’s clean and tidy with plenty of room to unwind and every modern amenity for your comfort. Stroll along the French Broad River, hike the Appalachian Trail, or head downtown for some shopping, dining, or the Asheville arts scene.

Experience Asheville With Us & Learn More Below

name: Cozy 2.5BR 1400 sq ft triplex in historic Montford
description: This spacious, cozy apt is located in Asheville's scenic historic district. We specialize in long term, pet friendly stays. Main level apt has 2 BR, 1BA, and a roomy office; perfect for remote working guests. Enjoy the charming front porch, back balcony, and fenced in yard. The apt is conveniently located within walking distance to eateries, park, greenway, downtown, UNCA, and botanical gardens. Come relax in this lovely home if you are relocating, or just getting away for fresh mountain air!

name: Private Room
description: A private room with a double bed that sleeps two. It has a small sink and ceiling fan. It shares communal restrooms and showers with the rest of the hostel.

name: King beds, hot tub, fire pit, 11 miles to downtown
description: Embrace the magic of Asheville at Mountain Haven, a luxury retreat housing up to 16 guests within its expansive 4 bedrooms and separate apartment atop a garage! Nestled amidst stunning vistas, our haven sits mere minutes from the historic Biltmore Estate. Amenities like a 6-person hot tub, fire pit, and our pet-friendly policy make us the perfect choice for memorable family occasions or relaxed winter retreats.

name: Breathtaking Views, Close to Downtown
description: Escape to a serene 51-acre retreat with rolling fields, a meandering creek, and breathtaking mountain views. Hike private trails, gather around fire pits, or explore the federally protected land next door. Just 9 miles from Asheville, enjoy the city's charm before unwinding in the cozy home. Watch sunsets from the deck, stargaze under open skies, or simply relax in nature. On-site caretakers ensure a seamless stay while respecting your privacy—you’ll have the house entirely to yourself.

name: Pet Friendly West AVL Quiet House w/ Large Yard
description:
Quiet West Asheville neighborhood just 3 minutes to Haywood Rd and restaurants/shops/breweries. Two bedroom suite with full kitchen and bathroom, open living room and dining room. Large flat yard and plenty of parking.

10-15 minutes to Biltmore Estate.
10-15 minutes to downtown Asheville.
15 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Super Comfortable 1BR Apt - Backyard Forest
description:
Just 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate and the airport and 20 minutes to downtown Asheville, Weston Woods is an oasis to come home to after enjoying the wonders of Western North Carolina.

Guests have a pass-coded private entrance, full kitchen (stove, microwave, fridge, sink, toaster oven, Keurig, etc. and cookware), comfy living room (Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu and HBOMax and a pull-out queen bed), bedroom (queen), bathroom (with bidet toilet seat), and wifi (150 mbps).

name: Bunk Bed at Sweet Peas Hostel
description: Bunk Bed in a partially enclosed  room with 8 total bunks. This room is Co-Ed. Comes with a school size locker and lock. Each bed has a reading lamp. Guests share communal restrooms and showers.

name: Pod at Sweet Peas Hostel
description: Pods are located in doorless hallways off the kitchen. Either 4 or 8 Pods in a hallway, they are all co-ed. Each bed has a reading lamp and a large lockable locker. A pod is an extra long twin bed, with an acoustic curtain and built in shelving.

name: Mountain location. Five minutes to downtown
description:
This charming, cozy mid-century modern home is located just 1 mile from downtown and 5 minutes from the entrance to the Biltmore Estate. Close to everything, centrally located on a quiet, forested mountain road with privacy and wildlife! Shared drive and yard with downstairs apartmen

It is the perfect home base to explore Asheville. This is a unique property in the city. Enjoy a mountain escape within the heart of Asheville. We are just 10 minutes to the River Arts District and West Asheville.

name: Cozy with Nature in the Mountains
description: House is in a quiet low key neighborhood in a small mobile home park community. Very well maintained property located minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and The NC arboretum.

name: Asheville Home Sweet Home
description: Cozy, comfortable house minutes from the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, North Carolina Arboretum, the Biltmore House and the Asheville Outlets. Access mountain biking and hiking trails in Pisgah National Forest less than a quarter of a mile from the door to the trailhead! The property includes a large fenced back yard adjacent to the 22 acre Bent Creek Community park which includes a pavilion, playground, bicycle pump track, and stone grill.

name: Hip, Atomic Getaway in Downtown Asheville
description: The Atomic getaway is a newly furnished, open concept midcentury studio.  The apt is located on the ground floor featuring a private entrance, a sitting patio and off street parking.  The spacious living area has a smart tv,  a kitchenette with a mini fridge, microwave, a Keurig,  and a water cooler.  The sleeping area includes a king bed and another tv.  Conveniently  located in downtown Asheville,  the Atomic getaway is the ideal home base for exploring all destinations Asheville has to offer.

name: Asheville Arts and crafts cabin on the river.
description: My house in Woodfin NC offers guest a unique Asheville experience.. The house has views of the river, inexpensive ubers downtown just 8 min away. Three bedrooms upstairs provide a cozy private quarters with a with kitchen, fireplace in living room and remodeled bath.  I am a local artist with 20 years experience in avl.  Come explore Asheville and stay at my basecamp for a night or a week.  My house is quiet enough for a business trip, relaxing enough for a vacation.

name: THE HIVE | BIG Discounts THIS Summer! Come to WNC!
description: Welcome to The Hive! This 3,400 sq. ft. luxury home boasts 6 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, and a half-acre fenced yard, perfect for large groups visiting Asheville. Enjoy cooking in the full kitchen, streaming shows on the Smart TV, and playing ping pong, foosball, or retro arcade games. Don't miss the zipline! Nestled in a peaceful 4-house neighborhood on a private road, The Hive is less than 9 miles from top attractions like The Biltmore Estate and Downtown Asheville.

name: Calm and Sunny Studio Apartment
description:
READ WHOLE LISTING AND RULES BEFORE BOOKING!

Sunny ground floor studio apartment in West Asheville. 10-15 minutes from downtown Asheville, 5-10 minutes from Haywood Road. Private entrance. Smart TV with Netflix, Prime. Kitchenette - mini-fridge, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, kettle.

Apartment has one queen size bed and one full size pull out sofa.

NO DRUGS OR EXCESSIVE DRINKING. NO PARTIES
No bookings from people who live in Asheville
Last minute bookings welcome!

name: Beautiful Asheville tiny home get-a-way..
description: A feel-good, loving mindful space offering a great location walkable to West Asheville. One bedroom loft, one bath, kitchen with an induction stovetop, mini-fridge, coffee pot, and toaster. A little breakfast bar with 2 stools and a sitting room with a small couch, coffee table, and tasteful ascents. Access to our communal stone patio for outdoor relaxing and backyard trampoline for some "bring you back to your childhood" fun!  Free access to loving on our super sweet cat Una and dog Shiloh.

name: South Slope View
description: A quiet, comfortable home in the downtown area will have you relaxed after your explorations of Asheville and the surrounding areas. The front door opens to the South Slope and you can walk to restaurants, breweries, music venues, theaters, and much more. The two (2) car garage has a keyless entry lock. Use the stairs or ride the private in house elevator to living areas.

name: 1-BD Apt with Patio- Minutes to Downtown & Parkway
description: Beautiful 1-bed, 1-bath apartment with a private entrance and patio in a peaceful neighborhood within city limits. NO hurricane damage. Start your day on our neighborhood hiking trails, with access to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains-to-Sea Trail. 10 minutes to downtown, 5 minutes to I-240, and 6 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Apartment is attached to our family home. Very soundproofed, however, you may hear muffled noise or footsteps. Hypoallergenic dogs considered with added pet fee.

name: Downtown Asheville Condo, Walkable to Everything!
description:
Grand Slam!
True to its name, Grand Slam hits it out of the park, and is actually located just outside of the Asheville Tourists ballpark. As such, it is right in the heart of it all in downtown Asheville, making it possible to literally walk to everything and anything downtown!
Come create special Asheville memories in the heart of it all!

name: Retro Cabin | Cozy Stylish Getaway 10 to AVL
description:
Retro forest cottage is nestled on 3 acres only 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and easy access to local breweries, restaurants, music venues, and outdoor activities.
We offer an opportunity to indulge in simple outdoor pleasures like listening to the birds chirp on the deck, star gazing at night, or playing music and telling stories around the campfire. All while staying close to all of Asheville's major attractions.

name: Peaceful cottage by the river, 7 miles to downtown
description:
Nestled among tall trees, just 7 miles from downtown, this cozy hideaway is perched above a river, providing not just an idyllic, treehouse-like view, but also a peaceful backdrop of sound as you fall asleep, or dine on the wrap-around deck.

A serene nature-lovers setting on the outside with colorful creative boho decor and lots of light and plants on the inside. Two bedrooms, a dedicated office/writing room, high-speed wifi, make for the ideal personal retreat or work-from-home getaway.

name: Mid Century Bungalow Mins to Biltmore & Downtown
description:
Perfectly located just south of downtown, our 2-bedroom/2-bath home (sleeps up to 6) is ready to host your group for an amazing extended trip to Asheville! Perfect home base for leaf-peeping, hiking, working remotely, connecting with family, or exploring Asheville’s many restaurants and breweries,.

Decked out to be your mid-century getaway, we also offer a fenced-in front yard for pets. Equipped for long term stays and remote working. Come enjoy everthing Asheville has to offer!

name: Sunflower Suite, 10 minutes to Downtown
description:
Bright and private one bedroom/one bathroom with kitchenette and dining area. Located in a quiet West Asheville neighborhood only 10 minutes to Downtown
and minutes away from the heart of West Asheville. This is a legal, permitted stay by City of Asheville.

name: Downtown Asheville Loft in Historic S&W Building
description:
Colby Loft is one of downtown Asheville's original vacation rentals, located in the historic & fully renovated S&W Building, providing truly luxurious accommodations! Walkable to everything in downtown Asheville with restaurants right outside your front door, with easy access via car to literally everything in the area for outdoor enthusiasts & more.
Come live downtown for awhile & create your own memories!

name: Downtown Asheville Apartment with Private Deck
description:
Southern Gem is one of downtown Asheville's original vacation rentals, located in the historic & fully renovated S&W Building, providing truly luxurious accommodations! Everything is walkable in downtown Asheville with restaurants right outside your front door, with easy access via car to literally everything in the area for outdoor enthusiasts & more.
Come live downtown for awhile & create your own memories!

name: Charming Cottage-Convenient and Comfortable
description:
This Cottage is nestled in the woods in a quiet neighborhood but minutes to the Biltmore House and downtown Asheville.
This newly constructed, 800 sq ft cottage has all the amenities you would expect, a well appointed kitchen, cozy bedding, delicious coffee, and large windows that allow an abundance of natural light to pour in. Perfectly rustic and modern!

name: Asheville is ready for you!  GreatView,Dog,DPLX B,
description:
Asheville is ready for you to visit!

Please read entire description of the rental.
1 bedroom, 1 1/2 bath duplex is in a quiet and Convenient Neighborhood. Great for 1-4 guest only.
This rental has a full working kitchen, living room, King size bed, Tub/shower, and amazing Mountain views from living room & sitting area. Outside is your own deck.

Dog Friendly but before booking please check with us for dog guidelines & give a description of dogs. There is a pet fee for them to stay.

name: Bright + Modern West Asheville Guest House
description: Welcome to our guest house in West Asheville—your home base with super easy access to the best parts of town. The private studio has everything you need: a comfy loft bed, giant couch, TV, fridge, workspace, and a patio with a fire pit for those cozy evenings. You’re just 5 minutes from Haywood Road (hello, awesome food and breweries), and 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, the Biltmore, River Arts District, Blue Ridge Parkway, the Arboretum, and more. Quiet nature vibes, prime location.

name: Luxurious Suite-Easy Access to Town & Mountains
description: Relax in your comfortable and perfectly clean private one bedroom suite with separate entrance after a fun day of sight-seeing and exploring the town. You will enjoy unwinding in this newly built suite or being outside on your private patio with beautiful views of the mountains and Blue Ridge Parkway. Conveniently located only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Free parking and a sidewalk leads you to a separate entrance, which has keyless entry for self check-in. First booking was 6/18/21.

name: Downtown Townhome with Private Elevator
description:
* Please note: There is currently ongoing construction at the ball field, directly in front of the townhome*

Luxury townhome located in downtown Asheville. This 3 story townhome is located in Building #2 of the Bauhaus South Slope development. Walkable to the popular South Slope district of downtown, right beside Asheville's minor league baseball field. The home has a private garage that will fit 1 midsize car. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Blue Ridge Bungalow <10 Minutes to Downtown
description: This contemporary home was built in 2019 in favorable location minutes to Downtown Asheville, West Asheville and the beautiful French Broad River.  Step into this light-filled space that boasts an open floorplan including split bedrooms and two full bathrooms.  Enjoy the sunset each night or start your day with a cup of coffee or tea from the covered porch in our desired climate.

name: Modern Farmhouse Studio
description: Nestled on 2 acres in a quiet neighborhood in Asheville NC. This studio space is 2 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 3 miles from the center of down town. A simple studio space with a clean modern vibe above the garage of a brand new modern farmhouse.

name: Wanna Stay in AVL's Summer Forest? | Sleeps 8
description: Nestled within Asheville's magical forest! Stay awhile in a forest mountain retreat! Private yet peaceful and sprawling with wildlife, listen to the neighboring waterfall while relaxing on the back porch. The house is 10 mins to Downtown AVL,  Biltmore Village and 7 mins to Blue Ridge Parkway hiking & waterfalls! Ideally located to everything to get the full Asheville experience! The home has all of the desired amenities to have an incredible stay!

name: Quaint Carriage House in Historic District
description: This legal rental is just a short walk to downtown (.8 miles).  This well appointed carriage house is nestled in a beautiful historic residential neighborhood on the grounds of the 1899 Wright Inn and Carriage House.

name: W. Ashe Cottage Near Downtown-Full Kitchen
description:
Good vibes abound in cozy West Asheville cottage near New Belgium Brewery, Haywood Rd and downtown.
Fully equipped home with high speed internet, large screened TVs, FULL KITCHEN, blue tooth speakers, all new furniture only 5 minutes to all of the downtown sites! House is very private in a small, quiet neighborhood.
Two levels easily accommodates 4-5 people. Enjoy coffee or beer on the screened porch or around the fire pit.

name: Cabin in Asheville Hot Tub nr Biltmore.
description:
Private, luxury cabin, Hot Tub, close in with privacy


Private and convenient vacation rental cabin in Asheville . Enjoy the privacy from the hot tub. Located close to restaurants the parkway and shopping. Few minute drive to Asheville airport. Cedar cabin in Asheville with all new kitchen, stainless appliances including dishwasher Enjoy the designer finishes. 7 miles to the Biltmore Estate.
Located just South of city limits this cabin in Asheville is convenient to hospitals and the airport.

name: 2 AirBNBs in 1 | Sleeps 12 | Hot Tub | Pets |Views
description: Welcome to Asheville! This entire house includes two separate AirBNBs, perfect for large families, conveniently located in East Asheville. Sleeping 12 guests with so much room to stretch out.  Fenced area for your dogs (no cats). Enjoy 360-degree views, large yard. Upstairs ideal for wedding couple, house for family/wedding party. Enjoy all Asheville has to offer and precious family time or reconnect with friends! Minutes to the Parkway, Grove Park, downtown.

name: Downtown Asheville Condo with Private Rooftop
description:
Stealing Home!
True to its name, Stealing Home is the vacation equivalent to one of the coolest, most exciting plays in baseball, and is actually located just outside of the Asheville Tourists ballpark. As such, it is right in the heart of it all in downtown Asheville, making it possible to literally walk to everything and anything downtown!
Come create special Asheville memories in the heart of it all!

name: Historic Moog Music Farmhouse! 5 mins to DT!
description:
A piece of Asheville history! Former home of Moog Music’s owner, Bob Moog. Musician and music enthusiasts
must-see!

Completely renovated beautiful space, 1 block from UNCA & 5 mins to beautiful downtown Asheville:

Work from home friendly space! Orbi Mesh (fastest modem around) wifi and plenty of space to hook up laptops/work equipment

Entire home with winter views overlooking the city and Sunset Mountain, there sits a classic 1920’s historic farmhouse on over two acres with bountiful gardens.

name: CC's Cabin with Hot Tub
description: This fabulous cabin is located seven minutes from West Asheville in a relaxing wooded cove. The cabin was built in 1972 and completely renovated in 2021. Due to the spectacular location and size of the cabin, we decided to retain the first story as a vacation rental while the basement level is an art studio. We invite you to relax, soak in the hot tub, listen to the creek running 50 yards away and enjoy one of the best Airbnbs in Asheville.

name: Asheville Town Cabin by CM | Rec Room & Hot Tub
description: Mountain Privacy with Proximity to Downtown! Discover the desirable Town Mountain community with a stay at Asheville Town Cabin, where the privacy and tranquility of the woods is only minutes away from downtown's many restaurants and shops. This might very well be the perfect Asheville vacation rental, offering convenience, seasonal mountain views, a rec room, and a hot tub!

name: City Access Country Charm w/ Hot Tub and King
description:
Gorgeous, newly built luxury apartment in the heart of West Asheville. 5 minute walk to Biscuit Head, Sunny Point Cafe, and all that the up and coming Haywood Road strip has to offer visitors. Less than 10 minute drive to the center of downtown, the Blue Ridge Parkway and hundreds of miles of trails. Both city living and the great outdoors are at your fingertips with this dream vacation rental.

Check our Guidebook under the "Where you'll be" section of the listing below for things to do!.

name: Appalachian Mtn Retreat: 4 Mi to Grovewood Village
description: Stop dreaming about the Blue Ridge Mountains and start exploring them at this Asheville apartment! Located just 5.5 miles away from downtown and 2.6 miles from the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway, this 2-bedroom, 1-bath vacation rental gives you easy access to the charming history and natural beauty of North Carolina. Take a quick Uber downtown for some premier brewery hopping, or stay at home to birdwatch through the wall-to-wall windows while dinner cooks in the full kitchen.

name: Velvet Underground Asheville unique music inspired
description: My intention is in keeping with the year the house was built 1967 and incorporating music. There is a  turntable and a selection of noteworthy records. Last house on the road in a quaint quiet neighborhood (think Brady Bunch)

name: Fireplace and koi pond in Asheville
description:
Recovered from storm! Relax in this oversized sunny Asheville 2br private ground-floor apartment, with lush grounds, koi pond, and seasonal waterfall.

Away from the hubbub yet convenient to all: Walk to hiking trails off the nearby Blue Ridge Parkway or drive less than 15 minutes to the Biltmore Estate, colleges, and downtown restaurants and breweries.

Private entrance down well-lit exterior stone steps.

Equipped with high chair, pack-n-play, microwave, mini-fridge, coffeemaker, tea kettle

name: private backyard, Hot tub, fire pit, pets
description: This cozy 4-bedroom cottage with a private guest suite offers the perfect blend of comfort and privacy. Enjoy a hot tub, firepit, and covered breezeway, plus a living room with a fireplace. With a tankless hot water heater, you'll never run out of hot water! Just 6 miles from Bent Creek for hiking and biking, and 4 miles to Tanger Outlets. Relax in a peaceful setting, yet close to all that Asheville has to offer. Perfect for a getaway with all the comforts of home!

name: *Comfy Smart Condo|10 mins to DT & Biltmore
description:
Pets are welcome! $75 per pet
Come stay in our quiet mountain retreat! This upstairs condo has everything you could need to enjoy a stay in beautiful and exciting Asheville, NC. Our condo has everything you could need during your stay, including 50" TVs in the living room/bedrooms, a fully-stocked kitchen, charger stations, blackout curtains, sound machines, smart locks, books/games for the whole family to enjoy. Artfully decorated to maximize the space our condo is ready for you!

name: Dog Friendly! Entire House - Only 9min to downtown
description: Cozy single level home 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway & only 9 mins to downtown Asheville! Set back from the main road on 10 acres, you'll have privacy & plenty of room to play outside. Three total bedrooms with a King, Queen & single/bunk bed combo (rated for adults up to 200lbs) share one full bath, fully equipped kitchen & living/dining area. Tons of parking, self-check-in at your convenience, pets allowed. Fenced side yard. VA Hospital, Folk Art Center, Warren Wilson College & Exit 55.

name: Cozy Mountain Retreat -  Views, Fire Pit & Hot Tub
description: Awesome, large apartment with beautiful views, amazing natural light and incredible outdoor spaces including hot tub and fire pit table.  A true place for total relaxation and stress relief.  All of this is close to the airport, shopping and downtown.

name: Cozy bungalow getaway w/firepit 12min to downtown
description:
Bright and cheery home in a quiet rural neighborhood. Wood and slate tile floors, eclectic decor from all over the world, and a unique garden filled backyard with firepit to enjoy Asheville's lovely evenings.

The home is located in a quiet, safe, rural residential area with private backyard. The neighborhood (Woodfin area of Asheville) could be classed as gentrifying as Asheville expands, therefore it is a mix of home types.

name: "Suite" Record Room in walkable West Asheville
description: Private guest suite on 1st floor near level concrete off street parking space in  West Asheville

name: King Bed | Screened Porch | Back Deck| Fenced Yard
description:
This home is in the Biltmore Terrace neighborhood. Close to all in Asheville.

Private home, access to all it has to offer. 3 queen beds in 3 bedrooms. 2 full baths and a 1/2 bath.

This location is 5 minutes to Biltmore Village and the historic Biltmore House. Downtown Asheville is 10 minutes. Ubers and Lyfts are easily available.

name: #6 Magnolia Room at Oakland Cottage
description: King bedroom with additional sitting room with extra twin bed.  Enjoy private ensuite full bath, bathrobes, specialty soaps,  in room TV, mini-fridge, microwave & coffee maker.  Hearty breakfast is served each morning in the dining room.  Many shared common areas indoor & out to expand your space.

name: Private Luxury Terrace and Elevator
description: This new 2 BR/2BA/2 half BA townhome is located in Downtown Asheville’s South Slope District. Truly one of a kind with a private elevator and private roof-top terrace.  Four floors of living space offer the perfect combination of privacy and comfort for your group including a custom futon that folds out into a comfortable queen bed. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Water, Electric, WiFi, PETS Sleeps 11. Near Aville
description:
TOP FLOOR ONLY
Come experience the luxury and tranquility of this newly remodeled high end mountain home. This home boasts a SPA featuring a two person Jacuzzi tub and a spacious steam shower, and a game room with a pool table, a ping-pong table, and a Galaga game console

Only 6 min West-Aville, this home is convenient yet private, with long-range mountain views from the enormous deck. Enjoy entertaining in the chef’s kitchen or relish a quiet night by the fire.

name: Cabin of the Pines, Dog Friendly with Hot Tub
description:
Welcome to this NEW custom uber-clean and private nature lovers eco-home.

Come wake up to the sound of birds and nature with a cup of coffee on the back porch. Watch the stars from the hot tub with friends. A fun 9-mile drive from downtown Asheville, you can experience the peaceful beauty of the woods and the nightlife easily with a quick drive.

A dog-lovers sanctuary with an expansive fenced-in back yard, w/ a large firepit, book today for a one of a kind Asheville experience!

name: West Asheville Town Home for simple living
description: A 2 bedroom, two story duplex condo in the heart of W Asheville. It is fully outfitted for extended stays.  Grocery store, breweries and cafes all are within an easy walk. Downtown and River Arts District are about 2-3 miles, an easy drive, uber, or take the bus from a stop less than a block away.  Avoid the bustle of downtown and enjoy the local feel of W Asheville.  Great access to all the river and mountain adventures Western North Carolina has to offer. 30 day minimum required by local law.

name: Convenient to Asheville and Hendersonville
description: While staying in my home, you can experience all that Asheville, Hendersonville and the surrounding area has to offer in a clean, comfortable and welcoming environment located minutes away from the airport, Ag center, shopping, restaurants and breweries. Pillow top mattresses, shower and claw foot tub, stainless appliances, hardwood floors, WiFi, cable, W&D, central heat and AC, screened porch and garage. Visit Biltmore, Grove Park, Blue Ridge Parkway, Flat Rock theater, national parks etc.

name: Sunset Suite ~ Heart of West Asheville
description: The suite includes a private, spacious room & bath with lovely patio. Located in a quiet, wooded, residential neighborhood with views of the Blue Ridge in the heart of West Asheville. Easy access to everything Asheville has to offer - whether you're looking for relaxation or recreation you can access great restaurants, art galleries, spas and a multitude of outdoor activities in minutes.  If you’re looking for a peaceful space to retreat,  we’re the place.

name: *NEW* Retreat to Stylish Condo |10Min DT Asheville
description:
Pets are welcome! $75 per pet

Our home offers all of the amenities and luxuries of your home while being ideally located near to the best of Asheville! Come and escape with convenient features such as king sized beds, a fully-stocked kitchen, charger stations, blackout curtains, sound machines, smart locks, Amazon Echo, TVs in the living room and bedrooms, and books and games for your whole family to enjoy together!

name: Sunny Asheville Retreat- 4 miles to downtown
description: Bright, spacious and impeccably clean. Private one bedroom apartment conveniently located in the desirable Haw Creek Neighborhood. Quick, easy access to downtown Asheville (4 miles),  the Blue Ridge Parkway (2 miles), and Biltmore Estate (7 miles).  In addition to location, nature and accessibility,  you're minutes from one of the mountain to sea trail heads, a local neighborhood restaurant and Penny Cup coffee shop.

name: Extra large Studio with Pool table
description: Extra clean One level recently remodeled Studio apartment.  Great space for visiting the local Asheville area.  Breweries like Sierra Nevada is 5.7 miles, Biltmore Park is 2.7miles.  Biltmore House is 10 miles, downtown  Asheville is 11 miles. Asheville Airport is 2 miles. 3 miles to the Agricultural Center  (Uber and Lyft readily available.) Pets are welcome!

name: Webb Cove Mountain Getaway
description: Get away from it all and enjoy one of a kind views in this luxury guest cottage located at the top of Town Mountain Road and only 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy all that Asheville has to offer; the famous Mountains-to-Sea hiking trail is steps from the home (~100 ft), the Blue Ridge Parkway is right nearby. Brand new state of the art appliances, luxury furnishings, and a deck with stunning mountain views truly make this the perfect mountain getaway in an unbeatable location.

name: Asheville Luxury-Game Room_SPA_Sleeps 19_PETS
description:
Come experience the luxury and tranquility of this newly remodeled high end mountain home. This home boasts a SPA featuring a two person Jacuzzi tub and a spacious steam shower, and a game room with pool and ping-pong tables, and Galaga.

Only 12 min to Asheville, this home is convenient yet private, with long-range mountain views from the enormous deck. Enjoy entertaining in the chef’s kitchen or relish a quiet night by the fireplace, inside or out! This home has it all including 3 kitchens!

name: Luxury Manison 2 blocks from DWNTN Asheville
description: The Bunn House is the perfect setting for gatherings of up to 8 close friends, offering enough space for privacy & separation, while at the same time providing guests with the opportunity to come together as a group in an intimate setting.  After a day of outdoor activities in the North Carolina mountains return to your luxurious guest room with en suite bathroom and steam shower for a restorative spa-like experience.  Only 2 blocks from downtown,  you can easily walk to the center of Asheville.

name: Kenilworth Apartment near Downtown and Biltmore
description: This private apartment with a walk out deck is located on the lower level of our new construction, Green Built home. Conveniently located in the Kenilworth neighborhood of Asheville, we are 1.5 miles from the Biltmore Estate entrance and 1.5 miles from downtown. We are near many local breweries, restaurants, and shops and have many great outdoor adventures nearby. Guests must be able to walk an exterior staircase to access apartment.

name: Hillside Hideaway
description:
Welcome to Hillside Hideway!

We recently welcomed a new baby to our family. While we will take every measure to minimize the noise, you may hear some baby sounds occasionally throughout your stay. Please reach out with any questions or concerns.

A woodland suite located 12 minutes from Downtown Asheville and 5 minutes to the Blue ridge parkway, Hillside Hideaway offers you the experience of a rural mountain retreat just minutes away from fantastic dining and adventure!

name: Romantic Getaway & Playroom w/Hot Tub!
description: NEW! Welcome to Asheville's premiere romantic getaway right on the edge of the city. You get all the privacy of a mountain retreat while still feeling the pulse of Asheville at your fingertips. Your custom Chalet features an elevated bohemian design, a full on private mountainside spa, and a playful atmosphere you can't find anywhere else in Asheville. Rest in the luxe King canopy bed. Take in the Appalachian views from your private hot tub. Escape into your own little world of passion!

name: *NEW* Escape to Comfy Condo|10 Min-DT & Biltmore
description:
Pets are welcome! $75 per pet

Want to unwind on a quiet hillside in the mountains? This is the vacation home for you. Our condo offers all the amenities and luxuries you’d expect, while being ideally located close to the best of Asheville! Come enjoy our mountain views, hike to a secluded waterfall, sit down to a gourmet meal, or grab a local brew in one of our award-winning breweries.

name: Beaver Lake Retreat
description:
Welcome to our bright, shiny, joy-filled space! Beautiful, quiet, oh-so-walkable neighborhood in North Asheville. Walk to Beaver Lake! Hiking trails two blocks away. 3.7 miles to the heart of downtown Asheville with all it's fabulous restaurants, galleries, and breweries.

Off-street parking. Your own private entrance to your completely private space. Large family room with billiards table. Gorgeous bedroom. Cool bathroom. Sitting area for breakfast/coffee.

name: Chic Retreat -Biltmore- Dwtwn - Near Tesla Charg.
description:
Our Asheville cottage is located near everything that makes your mountain experience matter. The cozy mountain retreat sits at the edge of Pisgah Forrest and is only a 10-minute ride to the downtown micro-brews and restaurants.
Enjoy the back porch and expansive yard. Need more space? We are only 1.5 miles away from Bent Creek Park and the NC Arboretum. Not enough ? You're only 5 minutes from The Blue Ridge Parkway, outlet shopping and great restaurants! The mountains are calling!

name: Tent Site #6 @The Baying Hound Campground
description: Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

name: The Flying Gogoplata @ The Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Flying Gogoplata, located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground, is a tree-house-like sleeping pod suspended 10 feet in the air on stilts. There’s a *small*, padded twin bed-sized platform for either a small couple or single person. Be sure to bring sleeping bags and pillows (and maybe a sleeping pad if you like it extra soft). The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural Asheville.
*Full description below*

name: Hammock Site @The Baying Hound Campground
description: Welcome, hammock campers! We are easily one of the closest, and cheapest, camping options when it comes to staying in Asheville. Only 8-12 minutes by car from downtown Asheville, we are a friendly, family-run outfit. The camping spots are in a small, private, green valley, and you’ll feel like you’re "out in the sticks" even though you're actually super close to all the breweries and parks that make Asheville what it is. This site accommodates one tent or up to two hammocks - bring your own! :)

name: Bear Me the Necessities
description: Recently remodeled 3 bedroom 2 bath home that is located in the Bear Creek RV Park. Just minutes to I-26/I40, downtown Asheville, BILTMORE Estate, breweries, Blue Ridge Parkway, parks, hiking, airport and so much more! Hot tub on site for guests only and pool just walking distance away.

name: DownTown Duplex West Asheville Getaway Newly Done!
description:
Youtube:
https://youtu.be/0LrexOOQZc4
Newly Renovated WEST ASHEVILLE 2 BR 1 BA Get-Away, 3.7 Miles to Hospitals, Steps to Haywood Rd, Downtown, Duplex Downstairs Apartment with Queen Bed, Murphy Bed, Living / Dining Area with Sofa Bed and Kitchenette, Billiards Table with Table Tennis removeable top, LARGE refrigerator, dishwasher, convection oven, microwave, laminate hardwood flooring in bedrooms / office area and common area, washer-dryer laundry. SO CLOSE to Everything!!

name: Views, hiking, biking, close to shops & dining
description:
Location With Views!
Close to Downtown, Biltmore Estate, Pisgah National Forest, & Outlets. Trail head for hiking & biking 1/2 mile from cabin.
Farm House Decor, dining table seats 6, comfortable reclining leather furniture, 55" tv with DTV, Hi-speed internet, fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer in laundry room, covered front porch with rockers to enjoy the serenity of the mountains, the deer frolicing through the woods, and the horses running through the pristine lush pasture.

name: Beautiful serene spot for relaxation & convenience
description:
Location With Views!
The Pisgah National Forest trail head 1/2 mile from cabin offers hiking and biking trails for the beginner and intermediate, with a creek for the kids and dogs.
The cabin is located minutes from the Biltmore Estate, Asheville Outlets, Blue Ridge Parkway and Downtown but still has the feeling of a private wooded environment. Enjoy more than occasional deer crossing in a pristine forest from your front porch. Hi speed wi-fi and 55” tv. Relax in the hottub in the evenings.

name: Mountain Serenity | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1001 | Find your Zen and ease your mind with Mountain Serenity, a calming haven that inspires tranquility.

name: Endless Sunset Retreat | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1002 | Breathe a sigh of relief, settle into relaxation and delight in the vivid sunset views that Endless Sunset Retreat offers each evening.

name: Southern Exposure | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1003 | Bask in the full southern sun. Our south-facing condo featuring plenty of natural light and unparalleled views of Asheville’s South Slope and the Blue Ridge Mountains.

name: The Views Over Pack Square | Arras Vacation Rental
description: Unit 1005 | When life gets busy, the Views Over Pack Square is just what you need to reset, recenter and feel refreshed.

name: Arras Altitude Adjustment | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1006 | If you desire excitement and adventure, take your Asheville journey to new heights, and uplift your perspective.

name: Cloud 10 | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1007 | You’ve heard of ‘being on Cloud 9,’ so elevate your stay and enjoy a state of euphoric bliss on Cloud 10.

name: Mountain Gem | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1008 | If you need a get-away to restore peace and tranquility, Mountain Gem is unique in that it will help relieve the pressures of day-to-day life.

name: Mountain Day Dream | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1010 | Feel inspired and let your mind and body wander with Mountain Day Dream, a west-facing one-bedroom, one-bath condo with a skyline view of the Blue Ridge Mountains.

name: Charming Spacious Asheville Home
description:
Great classic house with tons of charm. Walk to downtown Asheville and S. Slope. Huge downstairs living area with a large newly remodeled kitchen, spacious living room, TV room with wood burning stove and large dining room. Upstairs features 3 large bedrooms and a newly remodeled bath, with glass tile shower and clawfoot tub.

The spacious front porch is great for relaxing or enjoying and outdoor dinner, while the backyard features a hot tub, grill, patio, trampoline and basketball goal.

name: Butterfly Cottage.
description:
Elegant, efficient space focused on the natural world. Lots of conveniences to make living here simple. It qualifies as a tiny house with rooms including all the native growth around and a lovely view of Bull Creek. Books available to enhance understanding of local history.
Off street dedicated parking. Private outdoor and patio space! Additional fees for cleaning when staying over 2 months, or if someone needs a place to stay for 1 night. Really best for 1 or 2 people.

name: Modern Cabin Retreat w/ Sauna
description: This space was designed with love and care and the hope that all who stay here feel relaxed and connected to nature.  We recently added a cedar barrel sauna that heats up quickly and is user friendly.  Often we don’t see guests but I’m always available for questions and recommendations. We live "next door" on the same property with our two young sons.

name: Walkable West AVL— Newly Remodeled
description:
Newly renovated 2 bed/ 2 bath only a 9 min
WALK to Biscuit Head and favorite Haywood Rd restaurants, bars and breweries (3 miles/ 10 min drive to downtown)! Inspired by the mountain vegetation, this thoughtfully designed space brings you a uniquely Asheville stay. Amenities include private outdoor space w/ sectional and string lights, kitchenette (Keurig, sink, fridge, microwave, air fryer/ toaster oven), washer/ dryer, off-street parking, keyless entry, fiber wifi and chromecast tvs.

name: Cozy Queen in Historic B&B plus fireplace
description: Indulge in an authentic b&b experience with amenities. Be a guest at our 1905 inn, located in historic Montford, 1 mile from downtown Asheville and near UNC-Asheville. Private queen room with ensuite bath. Homemade breakfast at 9am. Quiet street with free parking and great location. Walk to downtown, just 3 miles to Biltmore, and convenient to interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Spacious King Suite in Historic B&B with Fireplace
description: Indulge in an authentic b&b experience with amenities. Be a guest at our 1905 inn, located in historic Montford, 1 mile from downtown Asheville and near UNC-Asheville. Private king room with ensuite clawfoot tub, large shower and separate entrance.   Homemade breakfast at 9am.  Quiet street with free  parking and great location. Walk to downtown, just 3 miles to Biltmore, and convenient to interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Mountain Views Hot Tub Firepit @ Bluebird Cottage
description:
Part of our STAY Happy Asheville collection. Nestled in Reeves Cove this is the perfect blend of city convience with that moutain getaway feeling. Less than 20 minutes to downtown Asheville or Biltmore Estate. Hiking trails 1 mile away.

Relax and take in the mountain views from our relaxing hot tub or covered porch as well as living room & Master.

Need more space? Rent together with our main cottage and/or tiny house.

name: Immaculate Sanctuary  in North Asheville
description: Pristine and private, this over-sized loft studio is the perfect getaway. Experience your own designer sanctuary nestled among the mature trees and rolling hills of AVL's premier neighborhood. Secluded, quiet and serene, but just minutes to downtown, it is the perfect Asheville escape. World class hiking, walk to Beaver Lake, minutes from the Biltmore, Grove Park Inn and famous breweries. Luxury truly meets nature and it's ALL BRAND NEW!

name: Private Pool, Spa, Firepit w/Mountain View!
description: You'll love the mountain view from the private 18x36' saltwater pool, spa, & firepit at Cane Creek Valley Swim-Soak-Stay, a comfortable 910 sq. ft. lower level guest apartment conveniently located minutes from S. Asheville, Hendersonville, restaurants, Blue Ridge Parkway & airport.  Customizable Sleep Number king bed; 2nd BR w/pillowtop twins; junior crib/high chair available. Kitchenette, dining area, complimentary coffee bar & s'mores; free hi-speed wifi and premium channels on 3 smart TVs.

name: Blue Ridge Escape | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1009 | If you are looking to break free of your daily routine and explore all that Asheville has to offer, make a run for Blue Ridge Escape.

name: Peaceful Cottage, Centrally Located!
description: This cozy and stylish cottage is centrally located to downtown Asheville, the Biltmore, and Bent Creek. Enjoy relaxing in this well equipped and comfortable 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home, surrounded by natural serenity. The expansive backyard and two patios provide the perfect place to unwind.  Soak up time with loved ones on the porch while you plan your Asheville adventures.  Mountain biking, hiking, shopping, & dining awaits just a short distance away! Enjoy Wi-Fi & a Smart TV!

name: 20% off! Blue Wolf Lodge, Hot Tub, WiFi, Pets Ok!
description:
Take advantage this fantastic deal. Book early to get 20% off our regular price!

Blue Wolf Lodge is a beautiful "In Town" Log Cabin. This custom built log cabin is uniquely located on a mountain side in the heart of Asheville, just 6 miles from Downtown and 3 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway. This location is very Uber and Lyft friendly!

name: SweetHaus: Cool cozy cottage; AWESOME location
description: We are Super Hosts pleased to bring you Sweet Haus Cottage, in iconic Beaverdam. Lovingly renovated from inside & out, this very cozy mountain retreat features an eclectic mix of vintage & modern touches and amenities specially curated for Super Guests. Enjoy all that Asheville has to offer from this lush and peaceful mountain valley setting just 10 minutes from downtown. The natural beauty of the surrounding mountains will calm your mind and restore your soul.

name: Peacful/quiet Mountain Views at Willow Pond Cabin
description:
Willow Pond invites you to relax/ enjoy peace /quiet overlooking two small ponds. Relaxing indoor/outdoor views with mountain range landscape.
Great cabin for two guest to unwind and enjoy the crickets, birds and streams all within reach. Only ten miles from center downtown Asheville and other surrounding towns. Feel like hiking, travel short distances to see the most beautiful waterfalls around the state.

name: Downtown Digs with private entrance & parking
description: *Please refer to neighborhood highlights section about hurricane impact information before you continue to book.*

name: Asheville Cozy Charmer!
description:
== Enjoy a getaway to beautiful Asheville, NC ==

• Just 10 minutes drive to Downtown Asheville, River Art District and West Asheville. Half mile to the French Broad River

• 3 bedrooms, 2 baths. Two living rooms. Full kitchen, dining and breakfast nook/cozy reading corner.

• High speed internet, 2 smart TVs inside, backyard oasis (deck, fire pit/wood, gas grill), Central Air/Heat, Free laundry.

Check-In: 3 PM, self check-in/key less entry

Check-Out: 11 AM

name: Le Chateau D'Arce @ The Baying Hound Campground
description: Le Chateau D'Arce, located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground, is a sleeping pod suspended in the air. Part tree-house, part medieval castle, and part pick-up truck, this spot is like no other. The floor is padded, but be sure to bring sleeping bags, pillows and possibly a sleeping pad if you like a little extra softness. The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville.

name: Entire 2nd Floor in Beautiful Montford Home
description: 2 blocks from downtown Asheville, entire upper floor of the historic Hyatt House, a private home in the Montford Neighborhood. Does not have a private entrance, but easy front door access by door code. Short walking distance to downtown with dozens of bars and restaurants, including Harrah's Asheville Event Center.

name: Townhome with Large Rooftop Terrace
description:
* Please note: There is currently ongoing construction at the ball field, directly in front of the townhome*

luxury townhome located in downtown Asheville. This 3 story townhome is located in Building #2 of the Bauhaus South Slope development. A moments walk to the popular South Slope district of downtown, right beside Asheville's minor league baseball field, and just several blocks to the heart of downtown Asheville you will be in one of the most desirable locations in town.

name: Modern Downtown Luxury with Balcony
description: Roomy one bedroom, one bath fourth floor unit, features a king bed, queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen, living room, and balcony. We invite you to make this charming fourth floor unit your go-to accommodation for all your future trips to Asheville. There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions).

name: Fun and Roomy Close to Everything
description: This spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence has an open kitchen, dining room, living room, and patio. Located in the heart of downtown Asheville, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds.
