Only a moment's walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you.There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions).

name: Downtown Condo with dedicated parking space
description: Enjoy this tastefully updated, and well appointed home away from home.  This is an exceptionally convenient location.  You can walk to restaurants, breweries, shopping and any other downtown destination that you desire to see.  If you have plans to spend your time outside of downtown, easily access several different major highways within a stones throw of the parking lot.  Our goal is for you to have everything that you might need of a home, available, and easy to find.

name: Stylish and comfy- convenient south Asheville
description: Super convenient location in south Asheville. Stay in a well established neighborhood with a mountain feel, but all the city life convenience. 15 minutes to downtown and 15 minutes to Hendersonville. Access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is minutes away. This space is located in the downstairs of a family home. You have completely separate key code access with driveway parking. You have your own laundry is in the space. Full kitchen with stainless steel appliances

name: East Asheville: Hot Tub & Game Room, 6 miles to DT
description: Indulge in the perfect blend of tranquility and thrill in our graciously spacious 4-bedroom family sanctuary, nestled snugly in East Asheville, only 7 miles from downtown. Bask in the amalgamation of luxury and homely warmth while benefiting from the location's proximity to attractions like Biltmore Estate. Ideal for groups of 13, this retreat offers a soothing hot tub, an engaging game room, and an ambiance that simply feels like home.

name: W. Asheville Urban Oasis In the Heart of the City
description: My place is in the heart of W. Asheville's funky & vibrant commercial district just off the main drag. Restaurants, bars, parks, local shops & more are just steps away. Perfect for those who want the convenience of being in the middle of it all but still want an authentic locals experience in a quiet & stylish oasis to relax in. Comes complete with all the amenities needed for a pleasant & convenient stay,  including a simple kitchenette, private patio, off street parking & self check in.

name: South Slope Suite
description: Welcome to your private suite in the South Slope, near over a dozen of Asheville renowned breweries and just a 10 minute walk to Downtown Asheville which is filled with shopping, arts/culture and restaurants.  We live and work in Asheville, with our 2 kids and cat.   The apartment is private and makes a comfortable place to land after a day enjoying nature, local restaurants and breweries, taking in cultural events or visiting the world-famous Biltmore.

name: North Asheville Art/Firepit/Porch/Rocking Chairs
description:
Everything in this home is Brand New - Including the cozy Fireplace!

A short 5 min Uber ride to downtown!

Nestled in the quiet Blue Ridge Mountains and just a few miles north of Downtown Asheville - vibrant with Food, Art, and Music!

Located near Beaver Lake in North Asheville! Just a few minutes from Downtown!

Sit and relax on the front porch in the rocking chairs or the new porch swing, have a cup of coffee on the back deck while taking in the views or cozy up to a fire in the back yard.

name: Bending Oaks Carriage House beautiful & convenient
description: Come enjoy our delightful mountain-top carriage house. With stunning views from this peaceful setting, you can relax, rewind and rejuvenate. Just minutes away from downtown Asheville, historic Biltmore Village, and the Blue Ridge Parkway, you can experience the beauty, history, and ambience of our fabulous region.

name: Near Downtown Asheville! 30-day Executive Rental
description:
Haw Creek Escape; luxury "Executive Rental" for the discerning traveller.
Right on the doorstep of downtown Asheville! This Asheville mountain escape, nestled within the Haw Creek area, in the spectacular Blue Ridge Mountains, offers a relaxing and invigorating escape.
Exceptional 30+ day rental for those looking to have a luxurious home-base while experiencing Asheville.

name: Cabin-themed Home in Asheville | Near Biltmore
description:
The Oakley House; an eclectic and unique Asheville vacation experience.
Come experience the easy life and the true feeling of relaxation amidst the shadow of the surrounding Blue Ridge Mountains. Very close to downtown Asheville and all the areas amenities and activities.

name: Beary Relaxing-Cozy Getaway -Pet Friendly
description: Recently renovated 75 year old mountain home. 3 bedroom / 2 bath house less than 10 minutes from Sierra Nevada, 15 minutes from Biltmore House and 20 minutes from downtown Asheville. Close to hiking trails, Blue Ridge Parkway, and conveniently located near the Asheville Regional Airport. Short drive to shopping, restaurants, and local breweries.  Amenities include, Wi-Fi, full-size washer/dryer, plenty of parking,  Keurig coffee/tea and bottled water. Dog-friendly fenced-in back yard.

name: Asheville Reserve - Entire House w/ Water & Power
description:
Working Power and Water!

Stylish House right at the edge of the River Arts District in North Asheville. Very conveniently located within 10 minutes away from Downtown, West Asheville, River Arts District, and The Asheville Mall. Only a few minute walk away from the planned Silverline Park that is along the French Broad River.

name: Beautiful serene spot for relaxation & convenience
description: This is a 3 bedroom 2 bath  cabin located minutes from Asheville in a quiet wooded setting.

name: King Suite in Historic B&B with Fireplace
description: Indulge in an authentic b&b experience with amenities. Be a guest at our 1905 inn, located in historic Montford, 1 mile from downtown Asheville and near UNC-Asheville. Private first floor king room with ensuite bathroom with walk-in shower.   Homemade breakfast at 9am.  Quiet street with free  parking and great location. Walk to downtown, just 3 miles to Biltmore, and convenient to interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Asheville Escape, minutes to West Asheville
description: Come to beautiful Asheville for your family’s fun and health! Fresh mountain air, gorgeous views, endless hiking trails, and great food make the Asheville area the perfect escape from a humdrum daily routine. Enjoy mountain views from your front porch and a cozy indoor fire when the temperatures dip. Your three bedroom two bath mountain getaway is just outside of trendy West Asheville, quiet when you need it to be, but just minutes away from all the action.

name: Victoria's Cottage in the Paris of the South
description:
Located on the side of peaceful Pisgah mountains away from city conglomeration, Victoria's Cottage makes the perfect place for a small getaway. It is also only minutes away from the city giving you the freedom to explore some of Asheville's most popular locations.
A full modern kitchen, a full bathroom with freestanding bathtub, shaver, washer and dryer, well designed bedroom with a touch of Paris, and a TV with Wi-Fi, NETFLIX. A parking space, reserved for one vehicle.

name: Spacious Queen with fireplace in Historic B&B
description: Indulge in an authentic b&b experience with amenities. Be a guest at our 1905 inn, located in historic Montford, 1 mile from downtown Asheville and near UNC-Asheville. Private large queen room with ensuite bath. Homemade breakfast at 9am. Quiet street with free parking and great location. Walk to downtown, just 3 miles to Biltmore, and convenient to interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Views Mins to Downtown Asheville, Firepit, Hot Tub
description: This cabin can be rented by itself to sleep 6 or combine it with the cabin next door to house a group of 12.  Come relax and enjoy everything Asheville has to offer in this charming home. You are also only minutes from Downtown Asheville, Biltmore, Blue Ridge Parkway, golfing, hiking, and skiing! High Speed wifi Internet, cable TV and a washer/dryer are included. There is ample parking for 2 cars. 1/2 mile from Pisgah National Forest Trail Head.

name: *Mtn Views*3mi to Downtown*King Bed*Hot Tub*
description: Newly renovated modern mountaintop home just 3 miles to Downtown Asheville. Guests will enjoy plenty of space on four levels with breathtaking views from two decks overlooking the Beaverdam area of Asheville.

name: 1920s bungalow near river, 8 min drive to AVL
description: This convenient, eclectic, industrial neighborhood is located about 8 minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville!  Across from the house is The Mill at Riverside, complete with local artists' studios and High Five Coffee Shop. Just up the way is Woodfin Riverside Park, located directly on the French Broad River with waterside benches and a pedestrian path. You'll be so close to water activities such as floating, paddle boarding, kayaking, and fishing during the warmer months.

name: Asheville Journey Master Suite - King bed
description:
Asheville is OPEN and ready for visitors! Reach out to me for updates on outdoor activities.

Enjoy this sunny, spacious private master suite in West Asheville with a king size bed! Located in a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood just 2 short blocks from Haywood Rd. and within a few minutes’ walk to restaurants, breweries and shops. This space is perfect for a couple or two friends that want a quiet place to unwind and relax after your day of fun and adventure in Asheville!

name: Quiet Asheville Home Near Appalachian Trail & Dtwn
description: Treat yourself to a glorious getaway while staying at this updated 3-bed, 1.5-bath home in popular North Asheville! Nestled in a quiet area a stone’s throw from the Blue Ridge Parkway, this vacation rental compliments it’s easy access to the area’s natural attractions with equally short drives to city-favorites like Wicked Weed Brewing and The Biltmore Estate. After long days of exploration, you’ll enjoy returning home, making your own meals, and curling up with a movie on the TV.

name: Very clean | 2 min to AG Center | Dog friendly
description:
Summary:
4 min drive to Asheville Airport
7 min drive to Sierra Nevada Brewing Company
20 min drive to Downtown Asheville

This cozy one-bedroom cottage is tucked in a tree-lined cul-de-sac in a picturesque neighborhood. It features an open-concept floor plan, locally inspired decor, and ultra-modern appliances for your convenience. Relax and enjoy the outdoor views from your private deck or take a short drive downtown for more sightseeing.

name: WALK DOWNTOWN: Beautiful private room in eco home
description: Please read details before booking! Our shared homestay is a 3 block walk to the popular South Slope + 5 blocks to downtown. Everything under 'Neighborhood' below is walking distance. You've found a beautiful gem here with handcrafted gardens + courtyards. This spacious bedroom is 1 of 4 & has a mountain view, queen bed, desk, plenty of floor space & closet. Bathrooms + all commons are shared. WFH is welcome in the privacy of your room. Not a party house. No regular drinking. Clean people only!

name: Downtown Gorgeous Garden Homestay: Private Room
description: PLEASE READ ALL DETAILS: You will have your own private, beautiful, fully furnished, clean bedroom in a gorgeous home. 3 blocks to the popular South Slope & Downtown Asheville. Everything under 'Neighborhood' is walking distance. Stunning, natural home. Handcrafted organic gardens + courtyards. 60-acre woods nearby. Very spacious bedroom. 1 of 4 upstairs. Long range mountain view, queen bed, desk, large floor space, closet. Bathroom + all commons are shared. We keep it clean + tidy.

name: Bohemian Paradise Nestled in the Trees
description: Welcome to your bohemian paradise nestled in the treetops of desirable Kenilworth neighborhood! *Please note this is a 30 day rental. *This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home is full of warmth and light. It boasts a large fenced-in backyard, 2 porches, a spacious living and dining room, fully equipped kitchen, brick fireplace, comfortable beds and lots of good energy. The trees surrounding this home give it a remote, treehouse feel yet you are minutes away from downtown Asheville and Biltmore village. *P

name: The Cozy Cove. Private Guest Suite
description: Quiet, private, clean, comfortable, bedroom suite in a chill but slightly quirky neighborhood in West Asheville, with convenient off street parking. Private entry, private bath, walk in closet, queen bed, breakfast nook, sleeper sofa, and a generously appointed kitchen cart. Covid conscious enhanced cleaning protocols are implemented between each guest stay

name: Downtown Gorgeous Garden Homestay: Private Room
description: PLEASE READ ALL DETAILS! This is a shared house. 3 blocks to the popular South Slope > beginning of downtown. Everything under 'Neighborhood' is walking distance. Beautiful, natural home. Handcrafted organic gardens + courtyards. 60 acre woods nearby. Bright bedroom. 1 of 4 upstairs. Garden view, queen bed, enough floor space for yoga, closet. Bathroom + all commons are shared. We keep it clean + tidy.

name: Downtown Gorgeous Garden Homestay: Private Room
description: “Gorgeous home. Beautiful gardens. Friendly hosts. Favorite spot in Asheville.” VERY CLEAN. Private room in shared, gorgeous garden homestay. 3 blocks to popular South Slope. 5 blocks to downtown. Everything in walking distance. Beautiful, natural residence. Eco-crafted courtyard. Organic gardens. Your bedroom is 1 of 4. Wake up with to view garden views. Double bed, dresser, small closet & small desk. Bathrooms, kitchen & common areas are shared. WFH in your room. PLEASE read more below.

name: Lost Fox Sheep Farm at Bent Creek
description: No chores just enjoy this peaceful pasture, soak in the hot tub and feel a million miles away while only being 4 Miles to trail heads in Bent Creek, 2 miles to the Bent Creek river park and access (you can borrow my Kayaks or tubes) and 2 miles to the Blue Ridge parkway and Arboretum. 10 Miles to downtown Asheville.  great location for hikes and mountain biking. This is a tiny  house on a sheep farm. Early or late check in/out might be available on request.

name: Hop, Skip, Jump Studio★2 Min Walk to Hip West AVL!
description: New construction, furnished with modern sensibilities and full of art.  This private guest suite is attached to our main home, but for your convenience is accessible through a private exterior entrance. Enjoy this beautiful, tree-lined street while being a 2 minute walk away from thriving Haywood Road, filled with restaurants, cafes, music venues, breweries, shopping and more.  Adjacent suite available to travel "together but separate", found on Airbnb as "Stone's Throw."

name: *NEW* Cozy, Smart Condo| 10 mins to DT, Biltmore
description:
Pets are welcome! $75 per pet

All the amenities and luxuries of home while being ideally located to the best of Asheville! Make yourself at home with convenient features including 50" TVs in the living room and master bedroom, a fully-stocked kitchen, charger stations, blackout curtains, sound machines, smart locks, Amazon Echo, and books and games for your whole group!

name: Quiet, Long-Range MTN Views, 12 Mins to DT AVL
description: If you're looking for a mountain getaway, you can look no further than Royal Cottage. It offers long-range mountain views and is secluded enough to ensure a relaxing experience.  This home is ideal for entertaining. On the outside, the home boasts a lovely wrap-around deck that is partially covered so you can enjoy the warm days and cool mountain nights. The cottage is only minutes from world-class hiking, mountain biking, the Biltmore Estate, many breweries, and downtown Asheville.

name: Malvern Hills Hideaway
description: A sanctuary tucked away in a great location.  Private lower level duplex with lots of amenities. The suite opens up to a large, beautiful wooded yard perfect for games, grilling, a fire pit, disc golf, or enjoying a cup of coffee on the deck atop a small pond. 2  minute drive to West Asheville, 10 minutes to downtown, 20 to Biltmore and just a short walk to Malvern Park for tennis. The perfect location to experience all Asheville has to offer while still enjoying a quiet getaway.

name: Asheville Mt Home Top-NEW Water Filter-3 mi to DT
description: Looking for a place with the calm and quiet of a mountain cabin, yet 3.5 miles from downtown?  Our house rests in a quiet mountain neighborhood on 1.3 acres of forest with views of the French Broad River and plenty of space to play and explore!  Take a walk out the door down to the old barrel road next to the Om Sanctuary, from where you might spot the noon train.   Upon your return, cool off with a drink on the balcony as deer, turkey vultures, and the occasional bear meander through the yard.

name: Perfect for four in east Asheville.
description: Located in east Asheville, only 12 minutes to downtown. The neighborhood is adjacent to the Blue Ridge Parkway (mp 382) and the Mountain to Sea Trail. Great setup for spending your days exploring Asheville and western NC, then resting up for the next day's adventure. Private bedrooms and baths in a traditional ranch home. Bathroom 1 remodeled 2017. Bedroom 1 bed and mattress new 2019. Bathroom 2 updated 2020.  Bedroom 2 mattress new 2020. You are welcome to use the kitchen and laundry, just ask.

name: Spacious Elk Mountain Sanctuary w/ Deck & Views!
description: Eager for a peaceful getaway in a serene setting conveniently located to town? This Asheville vacation home, located on Elk Mountain, surely will not disappoint. It’s a mere 10 minutes from downtown, moments from the famed Grove Park Inn & Spa, and a short drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Not only does the property feature a bedroom and en-suite bathroom on the main level, but it also boasts 3 other bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, a gym, pool table, and more!

name: Chickadees Cottage and Pottery
description:
Chickadee Cottage is Centrally located in Westin North Carolina. Close to many major attractions in the Asheville area. Including the Asheville airport, SierraNevada, wnc arboretum, access to the blue ridge parkway, Pisgah forest, the Biltmore, Hendersonville and Asheville. Yet you will feel far from it all.
The cottage is set back in the landscape with fields, forest and a small creek on the property. You can watch the birds and if you’re lucky you will spot wildlife visiting the property.

name: Charming Cabin with Fire Pit
description:
charming cabin, located in a quiet residential area. Enjoy three comfortable bedrooms on the upper level; king bedroom with ensuite bathroom and 2 additional bedrooms with queen beds and shared bathroom in the hallway. On the lower level of the home, let kids enjoy their own space with a twin bunk bed and foosball table.
*Rental Agreement Required*

name: Asheville Mt Home-2 Families-WaterFilter3 mi to DT
description: Looking for a place with the calm and quiet of a mountain cabin, yet 3.5 miles from downtown? Our house rests in a quiet mountain neighborhood on 1.3 acres of forest with views of the French Broad River and plenty of space to play and explore! Take a walk out the door down to the old barrel road next to the Om Sanctuary, from where you might spot the noon train. Upon your return, cool off with a drink on the balcony as deer, turkey vultures, and the occasional bear meander through the yard.

name: Family Launch Pad
description: Unwind in nature, AND be close to everything. Blocks from pkwy entrance at the Mountain to Sea Trail. 6 hwy miles to all dwtn Asheville has to offer, 5 hwy miles to Biltmore Estate, and 20 miles to the beach at Lake Lure!  Waterfall hunting books provided!  This unique 2800 sq ft home has room for large groups to gather and room to spread out. The covered back patio nestled in the woods is relaxation at its finest.  Bring a piano player!  Cannot accommodate paid events.

name: Cozy AVL Treehouse – Sleep Among the Trees!
description: Sleep among the trees in this cozy treehouse, just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville yet surrounded by nature. Cross the hanging bridge to your treetop retreat, where adventure and relaxation meet. Explore waterfalls, hiking trails, and Asheville’s vibrant food and art scene. Enjoy glamping with an outdoor shower and compost toilet while soaking in the beauty of the forest. Unplug, unwind, and wake up to birdsong in this magical getaway! 🌿✨

name: Modern and Cozy Mountain  Getaway
description: You will enjoy exclusive use of our stylish, spacious and private apartment set in a wooded landscape 6.5 miles from the Biltmore entrance,  minutes from downtown Asheville and all it has to offer.  Living room with 50”TV,  cable, dining area, bedroom with desk/sitting area. Light flows through large  windows and French doors overlooking beautiful nature. Well-behaved dogs are welcome and cherished.  The apartment is attached to our house and you may occasionally see us on the property.

name: Wooded Retreat 10 min to Downtown!
description:
Feel like you're tucked away while being only 10 min to downtown! Just 5 min to the West Asheville downtown too.

The house is unique and comfortable, with large stone accents, surrounded by trees. The spacious rental unit is on the first floor and has a private entrance with a semi-shared deck and fire pit seating area. You'll have a brand new king size memory foam bed and newly remodeled gorgeous bathroom. Wifi and a 65" smart TV with access to most streaming apps like Netflix and Hulu too!

name: Full Apartment Just South Of Asheville
description: This is a cozy, newly finished basement apartment. 800 total square feet! Just 20 minutes to downtown Asheville and 10 minutes from AVL Airport!  It is the full basement of the house with two separate rooms. One area is the bedroom with bathroom/kitchenette separated by a barn door to the TV\Office space area. The apartment has its own entrance with key-less access.

name: Newly Listed West Asheville Home Close to Downtown
description: Be the first to stay in this newly furnished arts and crafts home steps from the best restaurants/bars/music and fun of West Asheville.  This is a 4 bedroom, 2 full bath home perfect for families, several couples or large group of friends.  Easy access to downtown, bike or walk to coffee shops and food.  Private off street parking, large back yard, large front porch.

name: Malvern Parkside - West Asheville Family Friendly
description: Family-friendly West Asheville 4 bedroom/2 bath home located steps away from Malvern Hills park, playground, & pool. Enjoy movie nights on the large screened-in back porch. Off-street parking makes this a rare find in West Asheville. This hip neighborhood is safe & bright. 2min from Haywood and all the great food, music, breweries, & art. Fully stocked kitchen and bathroom. Bike to the greenway via Hominy Creek. River access is 5min away. Walk to the neighborhood restaurant/bar. Min 45-day stay

name: Candyland Cottage - New Hot Tub & No Pet Fees
description: Location Location location! Right off Smokey Park Highway allows for quick access to all Asheville has to offer. 15 mins to downtown Asheville, Biltmore House, Blue Ridge Parkway, Outlet Mall, Farmers Market.  Grocery, gas and drive through convenience store 1 block.  If the cuteness of the front doesn't get you, the backyard will. All fenced in for your pooch, hot tub, pergola, fire pit, covered deck & rose garden gives you even more space to enjoy your stay. Parking, wifi and no pet fees.

name: Country home minutes to Downtown Asheville
description: Stay in this spacious and cozy 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom house, conveniently located near everything you want to see and do in Asheville and Western NC. You’ll be just 15 minutes away from the lively downtown area, where you can enjoy the local breweries, restaurants, and shops. You’ll also have easy access to the outdoor adventures in Asheville where you can go mountain biking, hiking, or tubing. Or you can drive along the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway and admire the stunning views

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #207
description: Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Breathe in the mountain air from your balcony and enjoy a glass of wine while you observe the bustling city below. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

name: The Retreat in West Asheville
description: Welcome to our wonderful house in the heart of West Asheville. We offer a private, spacious basement apartment walkable to all the best spots West Asheville has to offer, such as Biscuit Head, Sunny Point Cafe, Westville Pub, Universal Joint, and much more. Our house is located just two blocks from the epicenter of Haywood Road where all the action is. We offer a newly renovated basement creating a cute and cozy space for you to enjoy your stay and take in all that Asheville has to offer.

name: Wooded Studio & Deck-Close to Biltmore & Breweries
description:
This cozy space is the entire bottom floor and deck of a three story home in a family neighborhood. While this apartment is private, please note a quiet couple lives above you.

The newly finished apartment is warm and inviting. Relax on the deck, or warm up next to the wood stove. The deck provides a private entrance, Summer treehouse vibes, and winter views. Enjoy an afternoon walk to local breweries (7 within 2 miles), shopping, or a quick Uber ride to Downtown (3.5 miles).

name: AVL Bear Haven | Luxury, Romance, Views & City Fun
description: AVL Bear Haven is nestled perfectly on the city's mountain ridge. It is only 3 miles down the ridge to Downtown Asheville, 5.3 miles to Biltmore Estate and only 4 miles up the ridge to Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy the tastefully designed unit with a huge front deck, views, nature & lots of fresh air. A baby grand piano is there for your musical inspiration. You may see a bear, or two, occasionally, so please be careful, lock your doors and do not feed bears!  You will not be disappointed!

name: Private n cozy little room
description: This is a small and cozy room with a queen size bed, with a private entrance and a parking area. The door to the main house stays locked and there is no access from either side.  Close to Biltmore park, the highway and 15 min from downtown Asheville. Great location and a great room for a couple. We would love to have you!

name: Brewery District With Rooftop Terrace and Elevator
description:
This 4-story townhome is located in the South Slope district of downtown Asheville. It has 2 bedrooms with 2 full baths and 2 half baths, plus a private loft on its own floor with a queen sized pull out sofa. *Rental Agreement Required*
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors

name: Walk to breweries, coffee, restaurants, bakeries
description: The house is right off the heart of Haywood Rd. There are 6 breweries on Haywood Rd, numerous amazing local restaurants and bars, coffee shops, bakeries and music venues, and grocery stores all within a few minutes walk.

name: Forest Edge Family Escape
description:
Escape urban madness and refresh your mind and body on the edge of the forest. This house is great for family and friends to enjoy Bent Creek Experimental Forest, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Lake Powhatan, the NC Arboretum, Bent Creek River Park and so much more!

Also a short drive to Asheville sights, eats and breweries. Walking distance to neighborhood trails for a run, bike ride or splash in the creek.

The listing is set for 6 ppl with a requested max of 4 adults/2 kids; infants also welcome.

name: Vista View-Cozy & Relaxing Get-Away Home-Candler
description: Well-loved quaint family home with free driveway parking and free second gravel parking lot. Spacious front and back yard with comfortable covered back porch to relax and enjoy yourself.  Family-friendly neighborhood conveniently located close to numerous Asheville tourist destinations including Bob Lewis Park and several wedding venues. Wi-Fi and live stream tv are available in the home.

name: Top rated! Close to downtown/Biltmore,dog friendly
description: Located just minutes from the Biltmore & downtown Asheville, this  top 1% rated home is ideal for your Asheville getaway.  The home is nestled on a private parcel in a cute, quiet neighborhood.  We are in close proximity to all surrounding highways making all of your planned activities easy and quick to access.  The open floorplan and quaint backyard area are ideal for gathering with friends and family.  Please note, there is a "boil advisory" for City of Asheville water which comes to our home.

name: Unique & Cozy Arden Cabin, 6 Mi to Blue Ridge Pkwy
description: Hike, bike, and golf, or simply enjoy a leisurely vacation filled with dining, shopping, and scenic drives when you stay at this cozy Arden vacation rental. Centrally located near Asheville, this 1-bed, 1-bath cabin  invites you to enjoy the sights and sounds of downtown Asheville, take a scenic drive along the Blue Ridge Parkway, or kick back at the local breweries, all within a short drive. When you're not out and about, enjoy beautiful afternoons on the lounge chairs by the fire pit.

name: Mountain Cabin Near Downtown Asheville
description: Come for a mountain getaway in our newly-constructed, two-bedroom cabin less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy a rustic mountain experience with the comforts of all new appliances, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a large flatscreen TV with Roku.

name: Oak Fern Cottage
description: Located within the Heart of Fletcher- 3 1/2 acres just 20-30 minutes to all the must-see destinations: Pisgah National Forest, Biltmore Estate, Asheville, Chimney Rock, Hendersonville; less than 3 miles to Sierra Nevada Brewery.   Relaxing place to land after your many adventures.  Owners live on the property in a separate house along with 4 luxury vacation RV lots rented seasonally either weekly or monthly geared for 55 and older visitors

name: Cute, Cozy, and Quiet
description:
Walking distance to bars, restaurants, and greenways! Located in a quiet residential neighborhood in West Asheville and minutes from downtown Asheville.

Fully furnished one bedroom apartment with bonus room. Newly tiled shower with tub. Kitchen has full sized stove, fridge, and dishwasher. Off-street parking and shared laundry.

name: Mid-Century Modern Retreat, off Blue Ridge Parkway
description: Mid-Century Modern Hideaway preserved and renovated by local Asheville artist, Grace C. Bomer.  Enjoy new modern amenities mixed with classic decor.  The property borders the Blue Ridge Parkway with access to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail, yet only a short ride to downtown, groceries and more.  A spring-fed pond sits on the 4.8 acre property and empties into a creek which provides an idyllic nature setting.  Enjoy the pond for morning coffee or sipping local craft beers or wine in the evening.

name: Spacious 4-Bedroom Arts & Crafts Home w/ Mtn Views
description:
Welcome to Highland Hideaway! Charming secluded mountain home, centrally located in Asheville: 7 min to downtown, 6 min to Biltmore, 5 min to Blue Ridge Parkway.

Space to spread out & relax. 2,300sq ft. 4 large bedrooms, 2 full baths, covered porch with rocking chairs and views, firepit, xlarge gourmet kitchen & 3 home office workspaces.

Other amenities: keyless entry, fiber internet, efficient washer/dryer, 55in TV, sound bar, PC monitors and large soaking tub, dual sinks in master

name: Short/Long Stays Welcome!  Hot tub, Dog Friendly!
description:
Soak in the new hot tub at Topsy's Trailer, located in Arden, only 15-20 minutes from downtown Asheville. This is a great location to take advantage of many locations, including Asheville, Hendersonville, and Brevard.

It has been fully renovated with hardwood floors, super comfy beds, fast/reliable Wi-Fi, Smart TVs, a Weber gas grill, two covered decks, easy flat road access (no 4WD needed), & plenty of parking. A small dog is ok (a fee will apply).

name: Independent Unit w/ Parking
description:
Independent apartment in quiet Woodside Hill neighborhood of Candler, NC. Just 10–20 minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, River Arts District, Parkway, and more. Features open living/dining area, granite countertops, new kitchen appliances, private laundry room, and bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Located on the lower level with a separate entrance for privacy.

Note: Driveway is steep—AWD or confident driving is recommended.

name: AVL Round House - only 6 miles West of downtown
description:
This adorable round house sits on the West side of Asheville in a quiet neighborhood just on the outskirts of town. Convenient to I40, just 17 min from the airport, 13 min (6 miles) to downtown, 15 min to Biltmore, 15 min to UNCA, 17 min to the arboretum and 10 min to happening Haywood Rd.

Clean, comfortable and stylishly funky with all new beds and mattresses, wifi, roku TV, a lovely porch for sitting and even small fire pit in back. There is also enough parking for 3 or 4 cars off street.

name: Comfortable AVL retreat with hot tub+fireplace!
description:
Inviting and comfortable 3 BR, 2 BA home close to the NC Arboretum and Parkway entrance. Some of the best mountain biking and hiking in the southeast are located just minutes away - Approx. 5 minutes to Bent creek forest and 35 minutes to DuPont . The entrance to the Biltmore estate is approx. 20 minutes away. 15-20 minutes to downtown Asheville.
The house is in a very quiet/safe neighborhood. Easy interstate access. It has Parking for approximately 4 cars. Easy keypad entry.

name: Rustic-Yet-Cozy Cabin w/ Patio, 12 Mi to Asheville
description: Have the ultimate North Carolina getaway at this inviting 2-bed, 2-bath Arden cabin - perfect for a small family or couples' retreat! Tucked away in the Blue Ridge Mountains but only 12 miles from the hustle and bustle, this vacation rental provides the luxury of both privacy and convenience. Whether you're seeking an art-inspired getaway in Asheville, sight-seeing exploration at the Biltmore Estate, or outdoor excitement in the Pisgah Forest, you're sure to find your desired adventure here!

name: Apartment with private deck in Downtown
description:
The apartment is on the second floor of a quirky old building that has been recently updated in the heart of downtown Asheville. You have your own private deck with great views.
Spacious bedroom and separate living/kitchen area that is fully stocked.

Parking pass included, walk to everything downtown and the south slope have to offer. Easy access to Patton Avenue and the river arts district is just a few minutes drive.

name: Mountain Views, Firepit, By Biltmore, DT+WAVL+BRP
description: Private Airbnb with scenic Mountain View backyard including a fire pit, koi pond, and outdoor dining & seating areas. Less than 10 minutes from Downtown & West Asheville, 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and The Biltmore. 1 bedroom with a queen bed & bathroom attached, sleeper couch, and air mattress also available. Stylishly decorated with plenty of indoor plants to liven your stay. Sunroom, kitchenette, living room, desk. Lower level of 2 story house with private entrance and backyard.

name: Private artistic home 15 min to downtown or UNCA
description:
*Entire home is yours to enjoy!
* Hot tub temporarily not available
*3 bed, 1 bath on 1/4 acre
*full kitchen, open and bright living area
*Fenced back yard
*Central heat and air
*12 minutes from downtown Asheville and 15 minutes to UNCA
*Roku TV, WiFi high speed internet, speed 212 mbps download
*Washer and Dryer
*Private parking, paved roads
*Quiet residential neighborhood
*Basement has office space
*hand made art

name: Star Light on Beaucatcher Mountain
description: Private Suite Surrounded by 50 Acres of Woods Less than 1 mi from Downtown Asheville! - Handcrafted King bed & full-sized pull-out sleeper. Private keyed entrance/TV/microwave/toaster/fridge/coffee/snacks. Unwind in our secluded wooded backyard & trails. Patio & outdoor seating - space to enjoy a cup of coffee/glass of wine & soak in the mountain air. Easy 15 min walk (or 5 min. drive) to downtown Asheville, less than 1 hr to skiing & 20 min to the airport.

name: Shrimp Shack @ Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Shrimp Shack is located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. We snazzed up a regular old shed with a pop-out sleeping pod, added padding, a custom paint job and VOILA! You've got a one-of-a-kind, tent-less camping experience! The sleeping section is padded for your comfort, but be sure to bring sleeping bags and pillows. The campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural Asheville.
*Read the full description below.*

name: Busbee Mountain Vista with Hot Tub and Game Room
description: This freshly-remodeled peaceful mountaintop cabin has stunning views from the large, wrap-around deck and is only 15 minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville and the Biltmore House. Relax in the hot tub on the spacious deck, chill in the cozy living room with wall-to-wall windows looking out at the mountains, hang out in the heated game shed out back or in the fenced yard with your furry friend. There's plenty of room for everyone to enjoy this incredible setting just minutes from Asheville.

name: Bent Creek Retreat Bike, Hike & dog friendly
description: Located in Bent Creek, Asheville's best kept secret. Paddle or float the French Broad River past the Biltmore Estate with river access less than 1 mile away. Enjoy the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Arboretum, for your ultimate hiking, biking or sightseeing adventures, only minutes away. Head downtown after a long day of adventure, it's a 15 minute drive or Lyft ride and only 10 minutes away from the Airport.

name: Cozy and convenient in the heart of West AVL
description: Sharp Quarters is the perfect space for your Asheville getaway! It's a 10 minute walk to many restaurants (Walk, Taco Billy, Pizza Mind) and breweries (New Belgium, Archetype) in West Asheville. Visitors have their own parking space and outdoor patio. The Tempur-pedic mattress on our king-size bed offers maximum comfort. We can also add a Pack-N-Play for the little one(s). The neighborhood is perfectly peaceful and safe, yet accessible to all things West Asheville!

name: Woodfin Cottage
description:
Private & close to downtown!
Enjoy quick access to downtown Asheville (2 miles/8 minutes) while being nestled in the trees at Woodfin Cottage. This tastefully decorated cottage accommodates up to 4 guests comfortably with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Enjoy morning coffee or evening sunsets by the gas firepit on the deck. Also featuring a well-equipped kitchen & gas grill.
Close proximity to downtown and interstate, so there is traffic noise.
Minimum age of booking guest 25

name: Two King Bedrooms in Downtown Asheville
description: Modern and comfortable fourth floor, 2 bedroom/2 bath condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. Features 2 king beds and queen sleeper sofa in the living room. This residence features a full kitchen, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this condominium, and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: East Asheville Neighborhood Charm
description: Beverly Hills Charm is a quiet and spacious guest suite in the basement of a private home in the lovely "Beverly Hills" area of East Asheville.  With its own private entrance, the space boasts lots of natural light through double windows in living room and a single window in the bedroom as well as an airy feel with high ceilings - not your typical "basement apartment"!  Snack/beverage bar area gives you the chance to sip your favorite beverage as you plan your Asheville adventures.

name: great location
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: West Asheville Cozy Getaway
description: Family-friendly West Asheville 2 bdrm/1 bath home located steps away from Malvern Hills park. Enjoy movie nights on the large screened-in back porch. Off-street parking makes this a rare find in West Asheville. This hip neighborhood is safe & bright. 2min from Haywood and all the great food, music, breweries, & art. Fully stocked kitchen and bathroom. River access is 5min away. Walk to the neighborhood restaurant/bar.  Must climb stairs to enter home. No Cats

name: Unique Downtown Studio
description:
The studio is in a an older but updated building in the heart of downtown Asheville great walkable location. Spacious living and kitchen areas with a full bathroom with a walk in shower.

The kitchen has all you need to cook a meal and a nice dining table for two.

Parking included, walk to everything in downtown or hop in your car for easy access to West Asheville and the River Arts District.

name: Tranquility Base Suite. Clean, Comfy, & Private
description: Brand new, sparkling clean guest suite. comfortable, private, quiet, and perfectly located to access all that Asheville has to offer. I even provide home roasted coffee beans to enjoy during your stay, and some to take home, as well.

name: 4 miles from downtown & on the MST trail
description:
Located less than 4 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville, this cozy house has everything you need!

Hiking - The iconic Mountain-to-Sea trail is ON this residential road. A short 3 minute walk down the hill

Inside a large kitchen, and plenty of room.

Bedroom is a KING bed with full closet, and large 4 foot mirror.

Couch can be made up to sleep a third person in the living room.

Mostly private yard and back deck, surrounded by bamboo.

2 miles to Whole Foods
1 mile from I-240

name: Trendy & Spacious Apt on Chicken Alley. DT AVL
description:
Trendy and spacious apartment in the heart of downtown Asheville, NC. Located on Chicken Alley, guests are steps away from restaurants, breweries, art galleries and bars. Attractions like the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are only a 10 minute drive away.

It is a bright and airy ground floor apartment, with parking located on-site, and self check-in with a keypad. There is a king bed and queen bed. The king bed is separated by a partition wall.

name: Haw Creek Cottage- 30+ day stays!
description: Plan ahead for Fall 2024!  Skip hotels and live in an updated cottage while you work remotely or shop/build your new home!  Desirable Haw Creek, five minutes to downtown Asheville, ten minutes to Mission Hospital and the Biltmore.  Located at the end of a short private road, surrounded by trees, with an oversized fenced yard, firepit, raised beds, roomy deck, and fully appointed kitchen updated in July 2024!  This is the best of city living, with total privacy, yet so close to everything.

name: Historic Montford 10-minute walk from the AVL Buzz
description: Savor the buzz of downtown Asheville in just a 10 minute walk from this ground level apartment suite with private entrance in the quiet Montford National Historic neighborhood. Flooded with natural light, all new furnishings include, a dinning/living area, large separate bedroom with queen-size Saatva mattress, and outside patio area. Everything you need for take-out dinning is provided.  Enjoy the large smart-TV and high speed internet access.

name: Modern Classic Townhome
description:
4-story townhome located in the South Slope district of downtown Asheville. equipped with a private elevator for convenient access to all floors and a roof-top patio. *Rental Agreement Required*
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors

name: The Bird's Nest - One Bedroom, Bath & Kitchen
description: One bedroom, queen bed, private bath and kitchen. Surround yourself with songs of native birds from this private  wooded retreat nestled within a larger estate. This one bedroom has a queen bed, private bath, full kitchen, ample closets and pantries, two TVs, privacy fencing and off street parking - perfect for your monthly stay in Asheville. Access to washer and dryer. Enjoy a peaceful stay at this stylish, well-furnished, centrally-located retreat.

name: *NEW* Two Cozy Condos| 10 mins to DT, Biltmore
description: All the amenities and luxuries of home with the room for a big group to spread out. All while being ideally located to the best of Asheville!  Make yourself at home at these two condos with convenient features including 50" TVs in the living rooms and bedrooms, a two fully-stocked kitchen, charger stations, blackout curtains, sound machines, smart locks, Amazon Echo, and books and games for your whole group!

name: Blue Ridge Digs!
description: Private 1BR duplex just minutes from downtown Asheville and The Blue Ridge  Parkway! Pets approved on case by case basis for $100 non-refundable fee, to be settled separately at time of booking. Pets must be cleared and approved by Airbnb host  in advance of booking.

name: The Blue Door ~ entire house
description:
The Blue Door is our backyard guesthouse located in an urban neighborhood just north of Asheville and is well situated for the area.
We invite well behaved dogs who have been treated for fleas and have a lovely space for being outside.
The house is rather private. It also comes complete with full kitchen (with sharp knives), whirlpool tub, and a super comfy queen sized latex mattress.
Our guest house is perfect for an Asheville weekend getaway.

name: Grand Cozy Cottage
description: Come enjoy a furnished modern 4 bedroom 2.5 baths. Comfortably sleeps a total of 7 guest. Parking available for 3 cars. Check-in at your convenience any time after 3pm with our smart lock key pad. We provide Netflix and Disney+ on all three TVs for your convenience.

name: Quiet idyllic riverfront bungalow near Asheville
description: Perched on the river's edge, surrounded by trees and rhododendron, this quaint 2000 sq ft bungalow is a nature lover's sanctuary only 7 miles from downtown Asheville. A minimalist urban-boho vibe with OMG river views plus a well-equipped kitchen for stay-at-home meals, high-speed wifi, a work-from-home office/writing space (and bubbling falls just beneath the window), a TV room, and a "let's-never-leave-here" riverfront screened in porch.

name: Weekender Cabin 3 Miles from Downtown Asheville
description: AMAZING HOT TUB! Cozy tiny home cabin located 3 miles from downtown Asheville, perfect home base to enjoy all the area has to offer, beautiful wooded setting, hot tub, fabulous king size adjustable bed, spacious covered porch to relax and enjoy the outdoors, firepit with complimentary fire wood, gas grill with side burner, microwave, fridge, and complimentary coffee, tea and snacks.  We are a short distance from Biltmore (6 miles). Stay with us, see why we have hundreds of five star reviews.

name: Historic DT pet-friendly suite w/hot tub & views!
description: Enjoy all that Asheville has to offer in a private apartment in our 1880 Victorian home. Period details & all the amenities in a part of Asheville's history.  Beautiful mountain & city views, private deck. Quick stroll to Charlotte Street, a leisurely walk to downtown. Close to groceries & Blue Ridge Parkway. Relax in the hot tub or feel nostalgic with some original Nintendo! Kitchenette has microwave, minifridge, toaster oven, & coffee maker. Let us help you stay like a local.

name: Hot Tub, King Bed, Grill, Fire Pit, Close to AVL
description:
Helene Update:
House has POWER, WATER, and WIFI. Our home is back to normal after the storm.

Simply Squared is a bright duplex apartment that is fully equipped for long term stays and short term stays. 10 min to downtown Asheville, 5 min to popular Haywood Rd in West Asheville.
Apt is 785 Sq Ft with 2 Bedrooms and 1 bathroom

It has everything needed:
★Fully equipped kitchen
★Desk
★Fire Pit
★Grill
★Coffee and Tea
★Washer and Dryer
★Private Hot Tub
★55" Smart TV
★Wi-Fi - 300+ mbps
★Board Games

name: Luxury Downtown Asheville Condo, Mountain Views
description: Modern luxury awaits you in this stunning new-build condo in downtown Asheville. Two king ensuite bedrooms with their own private balcony provide incredible south-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer, including nearby restaurants and the historic ballpark. Also, just a short drive to the Biltmore Estate or the Blue Ridge Parkway.  Come be a part of Asheville's renaissance! *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Biltmore Avenue Balcony Condo
description: This is a Corner Unit Condo with two Master Bedrooms. Your own private balcony provides incredible southwest-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer. Also, just a short drive to the Biltmore Estate or the Blue Ridge Parkway. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Downtown Asheville Southwest Mountain Views
description: Stunning new build condo in downtown Asheville. This is a Corner Unit Condo with two Master Bedrooms. Your own private wrap-around balcony provides incredible southwest-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer Also, just a short drive to the Biltmore Estate or the Blue Ridge Parkway.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Game & Movie Room, Pet Friendly, BBQ Deck, Stylish
description: Your group will love the space in this beautifully designed, 2,700sq ft, 4 bedroom, 3 bath home only 10 minutes to downtown and the Biltmore Estate. With 2 large living areas on separate levels, including a game room with arcade cabinets, ping pong table, and foosball table, and a movie room with a huge sectional to spread out on, there’s plenty of ways to have fun, relax, and gather together.

name: Charming, Cozy Cabin with Everything You Need.
description:
A charming and cozy one bedroom cabin with a small loft. Cabin includes small kitchen/dining area and a queen sleeper sofa.

Located in beautiful western North Carolina. Conveniently located 20 minutes from Asheville and the beautiful Biltmore House. Cabin is located in an RV Resort with a 2.5 acre lake for fishing, paddle boats and feeding our ducks. Laundry room on premises and a seasonal pool.

name: Entire House w/fenced backyard, gym & 2 workspaces
description:
The cutest 1940's cottage, with a huge fenced in yard. It's only a 5 minute walk to Haywood where you'll find some of Asheville's best restaurants, cafes and bars. Because the lot is big with lots of trees you'll have plenty of privacy to feel right at home. WFH guests will enjoy two desks, as well as a dedicated workout space. You're going to love it.

P.S. We have a third bedroom with a twin that could be made available as well for an extra charge.

name: Cozy Winter Home
description: February sublease, 13 minutes east of downtown Asheville, two bedroom, one bath, 1000 SF house, fully furnished, includes utilities, central heat, wifi, w/d, wood floors, off-street parking. Near the Folk Art Center, off Riceville Road, with mountain views, adjacent to a ten-acre pasture; a 20-minute walk to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Studio #2 / Modern Design / 8mins to DWTN AVL
description: Only 8 min. drive to downtown, 5 min. drive to Biltmore Estate and 5 min. drive to Blue Ridge Parkway, this sleek and modern studio apartment in a quiet residential neighborhood is a comfortable, stylish oasis and home base for exploring all of Asheville. Artfully appointed and all brand new!

name: Beautiful Farmhouse with Hot Tub and Fire Pit
description:
Welcome to Laurel Hill Farmhouse – Weekly and monthly discounts available of of your nightly rate!
Nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains, Laurel Hill Farmhouse offers a warm and inviting retreat. Conveniently located near Asheville, you'll be just a short drive away from two must-visit holiday destinations: the Biltmore Estate, dressed in all its festive glory, and the enchanting North Carolina Arboretum, showcasing its seasonal wonders.

name: The Roost at Chicken Alley/Loft Style Downtown Apt
description:
Welcome to our studio apartment located in the heart of Asheville! 🐓

With all of downtown in walking distance, and quick access to almost all of our major roads, The Roost makes the perfect base for anyone looking to enjoy our local shops, vibrant music scene, fantastic food, cold beer, natural wonders, and so much more!

Yes, our apartment has a complimentary parking spot right out front! 😊

Please let me know if you have any questions!

name: Two King Ensuite Bedrooms with Views
description: Stunning condo in downtown Asheville. Equipped with two king bedrooms; each has an ensuite bathroom and a private balcony. Each balcony provides incredible southwest-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer Also, just a short drive to the Biltmore Estate or the Arboretum. Once parking space is available, but the car can be no larger than a Tahoe type vehicle. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Downtown Asheville Stunning City Views
description: Stunning new build condo in downtown Asheville. Enjoy two Master Bedrooms and a private balcony with downtown and mountain views. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer; shopping, restaurants, breweries, and galleries. One parking space is available but the car can be no larger than a Tahoe type vehicle. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Enjoy City Views Around a Cozy Firepit
description: Stunning newer condo in downtown Asheville. This unit has 1 Main Bedroom and a Murphy Bed with balcony that opens from the bedroom and runs the entire length of the condo. Enjoy city views by the firepit. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer.  One parking space is available but the car can be no larger than a Tahoe type vehicle. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Private 3/2 Biltmore Village Home Near Everything!
description: Updated home in Biltmore South, less than one mile to the Biltmore house and a 5 minute drive to downtown.  This 3/2 is tucked away on a dead end cul-de-sac, away from all the traffic but still close to everything!  It has lofted deck space in the backyard for your morning coffee as well as a large lower deck with a fire pit, which opens up to the basement that has been converted into a finished theater room complete with a 125" projector and surround sound!

name: @ Home in Best AVL this September with Meows!
description:
Welcome to my cozy, clean and serene home located in a desirable neighborhood in the cool vibes of West Asheville. Easy access to downtown and the Blue Ridge Mountains. Sleep well! Charming front porch with swing. Updated kitchen and cheerful breakfast nook. Work comfortably from home. Settle into the cozy den. Lots of space for yoga.
IMPORTANT NOTE: During your stay, you agree to care for my darling ginger tabbies - Bobo and Zeppie (brothers).

name: Two Ensuite Bedrooms with Private Balconies
description: Stunning new build condo in downtown Asheville. Equipped with two king bedrooms; each has an ensuite bathroom and a private balcony. Each balcony provides incredible southwest-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer. One parking space is available, but the car can be no larger than a Tahoe type vehicle. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #208
description: Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Breathe in the mountain air from your balcony and enjoy a glass of wine while you observe the bustling city below. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

name: Walk to the Asheville River Arts District!
description:
Spectacular new home with a unique combination of location, amenities, and a cliff-top view of the French Broad, River Arts District, Downtown Asheville, and mountains beyond!

Spacious 4 bedroom home on 3 levels, but all of the "basics" are available on the walk-in main level with no stair climbing required to access master suite, kitchen, dining area, main living room, and huge back deck.

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #204
description: Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Enjoy the outdoor space from your unique interior balcony and enjoy a glass of wine while you observe the mountains. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

name: Casa Negra - Monthly rental only
description: Brand new modern home in a walkable West Asheville Neighborhood. Three levels, off street parking, two private bedroom spaces with queen size bed, two bathrooms, TV, full kitchen with dishwasher, gas range, a full size refrigerator, all dishes and pots pans, utensils,  coffee maker, toaster etc. iron. Private deck and gorgeous view of a small urban forest.

name: 2 bedrooms private house near downtown Asheville
description:
This is a completely private unit located 5 minutes driving to downtown Asheville. There are many great choices of restaurants, boutique shops and Asheville must visit places. They are all within convenience driving distance.
PS: I saw there are several reviews in regards to no sink in my kitchen. There is no sink in the kitchen due to city rule, we are unable to override this. Thank you for understanding.

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #203
description: Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Enjoy the city and mountain views from your living space while enjoying a glass of wine. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #202
description: Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Enjoy the city and mountain views from your living space while enjoying a glass of wine. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

name: City and Mountain Views with Spacious Balcony
description: Bring the outdoors in with balcony amenities and beautiful vistas! This is a north-facing condo where you can enjoy mountain and city views. French doors from the living room and kitchen open to a large balcony that creates even more open space to relax and unwind. A fireplace in the living room adds warmth and ambiance, while the outdoor firepit and grill give you cooking and lounging options. One parking space is available and cars can be no larger than a Tahoe type vehicle.

name: #8 Rose Room - OaklandCottage B&B
description:
Charming Rose Room 8 with Double bed - full private bath w bathrobes, in-room TV, coffee maker, mini-fridge and microwave. Quaint & cute, on second floor of Oakland Cottage B&B, circa 1910.

Hearty breakfast each morning; enjoy shared guest spaces in the living room by the fireplace or on the front porch. Large yard, meet the chickens out back!

Our Inn is wonderfully located in Asheville, NC, 1 mile south of the Historic District, 1 mile north of the entrance to the Biltmore Estate.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Luxurious Downtown Asheville Condo!
description:
Luxurious downtown Asheville destination!
Shelley's Asheville Getaway is exactly what it portends to provide the discerning traveler; a luxury accommodation, amidst the heart of downtown Asheville, beckoning you to come "getaway" from the stress of your everyday life, and instead create the dream trip of a lifetime.

name: The Bluebird (Tiny House, 5 mins to downtown AVL)
description:
We want you to love visiting West Asheville as much as we love living here! Our tiny house is ideal for duos and solo travelers in search of a uniquely Asheville experience.

• Newly constructed in 2020
• Walkable to Haywood Road (coffee shops, restaurants, breweries)
• Short drive (under 5 min) to River Arts District and Downtown AVL
• Close to hiking and all Blue Ridge Mountains have to offer
• Quiet, friendly neighborhood.
• Private but central to the places you want to be!

name: Kimono Cottage-homestyle Zen in West AVL
description: Sunny, peaceful, private suite on the top floor of a contemporary Japanese home w/ 2 large bedrooms, living room, bath, kitchenette, and dedicated guest entrance. You'll feel like you've stepped into another world with its authentic Japanese decor, textiles, books,  and refreshments, tucked off a quiet street in popular funky/artsy West Asheville, a short walk to amazing restaurants, music venues, and breweries. Quick access to Downtown, River Arts District, Biltmore Estate & Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Asheville Cozy home with fire pit
description: Small Cabin on three acres. New listing for 2021. If you're looking for a great place to stay that is extra clean the tackle box tiny home is the place for you to stay! Pets are welcome.

name: Cozy Mountain Retreat near Downtown Asheville!
description:
Stunning!!!
Color Me on the Trail...this contemporary Asheville mountain retreat, nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains, on the south side of downtown Asheville, offers a relaxing and invigorating escape. Impeccably decorated with both an eclectic urban feel, and a taste of the mountains, this gem will have you coming back again & again.

name: Cumberland Cottage, Chef's Kitchen, Walk to Town
description: This 1st floor, furnished monthly rental has everything you need to feel right at home. The open concept and spacious one bedroom unit comes equipped with a private entrance, chef's kitchen, and a luxury master bath with walk in shower. The unit offers filtered water from every fixture, on site parking steps from the door, comfortable furniture, full size appliances including a dishwasher, a 56" flat screen TV, dedicated 500 MPS WiFi, and a mini split for your heating and cooling needs.

name: Hide Out Camper, 5 min. to airport and Ag center
description: It’s 2021, 30’ camper with a slide out and full hook ups. You have a flat lawn area in the sun and shade trees all to yourself with a fire pit and outdoor seating area to enjoy.  We’re located only 5 min. from the Asheville airport, and right in the middle between Asheville and Hendersonville, taking 20 min. to get to either downtown. You can enjoy many of the nearby forests: Bent Creek and Mills River are 15 min. away, Pisgah and DuPont are 30 min. away. It’s such a fun experience!

name: Eco-Luxury Studio • King Bed • West AVL • Biltmore
description: Relax in this eco-conscious studio suite in West Asheville’s peaceful Malvern Hills neighborhood. Perfect for solo travelers or couples. The space features a plush king bed, private entrance, and a serene patio. Enjoy walkable access to Asheville’s best cafes, breweries, and shops. With sustainability in mind and comfort at the core, this retreat is your stylish, green getaway just minutes from downtown.

name: 4BR House-Hot Tub-Backyard Forest
description:
4BR house that includes an in-law suite.

Just 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate and the airport and 20 minutes to downtown Asheville, Weston House is an oasis to come home to after enjoying the wonders of Western North Carolina. Soak in our hot tub after a full day of exploring.


Close to Blue Ridge Parkway & NC Arboretum.

name: *Cozy Tiny Cottage*  20 min to Downtown Asheville
description: Woodfield Cottage is new construction that has an open floor plan with full kitchen, one bed, one bathroom, screened in porch with hot tub, pellet grill and everything you need for a relaxing retreat. You will have the entire place all to yourself. Woodfield Cottage rests at the end of a cul-de-sac in a quiet neighborhood and is in a perfect location to all the great things Asheville has to offer. Just 8 mins from the Asheville Regional Airport and a 20 min drive to downtown Asheville.

name: East Asheville Private Guest Room
description: Comfy and private guest room hosted by experienced Airbnb hosts.  Custom home has hardwood and tile floors, granite counter tops, all new appliances. Enjoy all the area has to offer like Blue Ridge Parkway & Folk Arts Center(5 min)Biltmore Estate(10 min) downtown Asheville (10 min).  Take a hike, explore history, gawk at breathtaking scenery, savor fine meals and beverages, then relax on one of our three covered porches to plan your next day in Asheville.

name: "Albergue" Home base for exploring Asheville & WNC
description: Our home is in charming Montford just north of downtown Asheville.  Our lower level guest suite has its own private entry to come and go as you please. The open floor plan has a queen bed, lounge space  with fold out double sofa), Wifi & TV, table w/ chairs, and kitchenette with fridge, microwave, coffee and toaster.  You'll spend most your time out exploring, and as locals, we offer tips for the outdoors, food, activities, and other unique local favorites.

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #201
description: Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Enjoy the city and mountain views from your living space while enjoying a glass of wine. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

name: Elegant + Edgy Loft
description:
King & Queen + 2 Full Bathrooms + Fully Stocked Kitchen + 1,300 sq. ft Private Residential Loft + One Free Off Street Parking

Secreted into the heart of the city – an industrial 2-bedroom loft, cloaked within the confines of a one-way alley, long known only to the real Asheville. A block once devoted to agriculture, today ensconced within the multicultural vibe of downtown. A modern-yet-historic, industrial-while-inviting, convenient-but-secluded (as cities go) kind of place.

name: Luxury condo downtown...In the heart of AVL Fun!!
description:
Luxury condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. Stay steps away from restaurants, breweries, shopping, art and more. A new 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo that has the refined features of luxury.

Beautiful fixtures and amenities in an amazing location make this a phenomenal place from which you can explore all Asheville has to offer. Located on the 3rd floor, this residence features a full kitchen, living room, balcony and much more. You'll love your time in Asheville at this beautiful condo.

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #206
description: Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Breathe in the mountain air from your balcony and enjoy a glass of wine while you observe the bustling city below. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

name: Beautiful Guest Suite by Parkway and Bent Creek!
description: You'll be right at the edge of the Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek Forest, the Asheville Arboretum, and the Asheville Outlets in this beautiful guest suite! Relax in the spacious, well-lit living and dining area with a convenient kitchenette. Or take in the fresh air in the outdoor seating area. Enjoy the beautiful tiled bathroom with deluxe shower and soaking tub. This suite sleeps 1-4 people with a queen size bed and futon/double bed. Plus, it's solar powered!

name: Spacious 2BR retreat with Mtn view. Pets allowed
description: Private,  2 bedroom/1 bath home in the beautiful valley community of Fairview with mountain views. This spacious abode offers light-filled spaces and modern conveniences, yet still manages to feel cozy.  There's a large yard with a covered patio and fire pit under the pines. Nights are quiet here with low light pollution allowing one to star gaze country-style.   Fairview shops and restaurants are nearby,  and Asheville/Biltmore Estate a picturesque 25 min drive.

name: Private Oasis in Downtown
description: Welcome to downtown Asheville in this unique Private Oasis.  Boasting free street parking and a comfy king size bed, this cozy spot is blocks away from breweries and a short walk to downtown and the south slope.  Easy access to Interstate 240 and all of downtown make this the perfect lock up and explore spot for your stay in Asheville.

name: 1mile to AVL/ KING Studio-Lil' Castle in the City
description: Summer is in full BLOOM in AVL! Our hidden retreat—just one scenic mile from downtown Asheville—is ready to welcome you! Wake up to cool mountain mornings on your private patio—bird watching included (maybe even a bear sighting!). Our castle-like home in historic Montford is a stress-free stroll to local favorites like Nile Mile, Tall John's, and All Day Darling. Enjoy high-speed WiFi, Roku TV, Keurig, and free parking. See you soon!

name: Cozy 100+yr old home -  500 ft walk to UNCA
description:
Updated 100+ year-old, small 3 bedroom house on hillside in quiet Woodfin neighborhood. A few hundred ft from Asheville border and the UNC Asheville campus. Short ride to downtown, with 3 breweries less than a mile away.

It's a place we use frequently to visit the area and see our adult children at UNC Asheville, so the kitchen comes well-equipped. 50" TV, high speed internet, stereo with aux and bluetooth. Bedding and towels. Deck with OK views.

name: South Slope Skyhaus with Rooftop Terrace
description:
* Please note: There is currently ongoing construction at the ball field, directly in front of the townhome*

This 3-story townhome boasts floor-to-ceiling windows, and an abundance of natural light. With a private elevator and a 1-compact car garage Stunning mountain and city views from the large, private rooftop terrace. South Slope Skyhaus can comfortably sleep six guests, making it perfect for families and small groups. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Sports Park Nearby! Sleeps12, Dogs ok Fenced Yard!
description:
1 mile from Buncombe County Sports Park & Bob Lewis Ballparks. This charming bungalow boasts four large bedrooms and three baths with two large living areas, each with their own pullout sleeper sofa, sleeping as many as fourteen people.
Very tastefully decorated with a mix of vintage pieces, local art, and the best of the Amazon.
The open floor plan on the main level is great for entertaining. Head downstairs for sports and movie watching on the 75” Roku TV and make some drinks at the wet bar.

name: Boutique Condo in the ❤ of Downtown Asheville
description:
● We are welcoming guests & excited to host again! Water/Electricity/Heat are functional.
● Outstanding Boutique Luxury Condo
● Modern, Spacious & Clean
● Private balcony w/ grill
● Free onsite parking +EV charging station
● Common outdoor area w/ firepit, heaters & 2 grills
● Walking distance to top restaurants+ breweries+galleries
● 10 min drive to The Grove Park Inn, Biltmore Estate & Village
● Easy drive to hiking trails+ waterfalls
● Walk score 87

The outpost to your next great adventure!

name: Bright garden cottage w/firepit 12min to downtown
description: Bright and cheery 1950's renovated home in a quiet neighborhood.   Wood and slate tile floors, eclectic decor from all over the world, and a unique garden filled backyard with firepit to enjoy Asheville's lovely evenings.

name: Upstream Bachelor Sanctuary - New Wedding Venue
description: You can be one of the first people to experience this brand new custom built resort home.  Don't be fooled, it only has a few reviews so far because we just finished building the flagship home in our resort.  Convenient location in the River Arts District, minutes away from Downtown Asheville. Spectacular Modern Eco-friendly house with a hot tub and amazing mountain views. Designed for large groups and special occasions. The home over looks the French Broad River and the Biltmore Estate.

name: Little Hickory Top - Views, Firepit, Close to AVL!
description:
Beautiful Mountain Views, Amazing Fire Pit, Private yet Close to Asheville!

Welcome to Little Hickory Top Cabin. Named after the mountain it overlooks, this beautiful new modern cabin is perched on a ridge facing Bent Creek Experimental Forest. Convenient location offers easy access to all that Asheville has to offer. Find rest and recharge with beautiful views from every room, and a great deck to grill from.

name: Large Condo Near Biltmore Estate
description: Spacious and recently renovated, this historic Biltmore Village condo is roomy and relaxed. Located in the heart of Biltmore Village guests and close to local restaurants, galleries, and boutiques. It is also located a moment away from the entrance to the famed Biltmore Estate, a short ride into downtown Asheville and easy access to the Blue Ridge parkway. This large 2 kind bed and 2 bathroom condo includes a comfortable queen sofa bed. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Historic Biltmore Area Renovated Condo
description: Spacious, renovated Biltmore Village condo is perfect for your Asheville visit. Located very close to the entrance to the famed Biltmore Estate, this beautiful condo is a short ride into downtown Asheville. This two king bedroom and two bathroom condo has a bonus room with a twin over full bunk bed and television AND a sleeper sofa in the living room, so you can bring the whole family or friend group! There is plenty to see starting with downtown Asheville and the South Slope Brewery District.

name: Asheville Creekside Forest Home ~ 7 Mi to Downtown
description: This 2-story North Carolina home is as vibrant outside as it is inside, from the cheerful interior to the running creek and endless foliage surrounding it. Bring the pet to explore Asheville in this 2-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental presenting the ideal getaway for those seeking iconic landmarks and architectural treasures with family or friends. Hike Grandfather Mountain, tour the Biltmore Estates, drive the Blue Ridge Parkway, and then settle in at home with a BBQ dinner on the private deck!

name: Stone's Throw Studio★2 Min Walk to Hip West AVL!
description: Located on a tree-lined street, steps away from restaurants, cafes, breweries, music venues & shopping on the vibrant Haywood Rd. corridor in West Asheville. Stone’s Throw is a newly constructed guest suite attached to our 1920’s bungalow, accessible through a private exterior entrance. Just a short drive to the arts district, downtown, Biltmore, mountains and lakes. We’ve lived in here for 20 years and strive to provide a welcome retreat for visitors.  We love to give recommendations too!

name: West Asheville Cabin with Hot tub
description: Welcome to the quaint cabin in the Blue Ridge Mountains. Just 10 minutes to West Asheville & 15 Minutes to Downtown's shops, world renowned restaurants & breweries! After an afternoon exploring the Blue Ridge parkway and dining at your soon to be favorite restaurant, escape back to your retreat in the woods to relax in the 4 person hot tub listening to the calming sounds that our forest has to offer. Tuck yourself into the king size bed because you deserve it! Tomorrow is a new day.

name: Cozy Comfortable Asheville Couple's Getaway
description: Relax in solitude and style in a newly constructed, private suite. Nestled in the historic and eclectic neighborhood of West Asheville and centrally located,  you'll be only minutes away to everything Asheville has to offer.

name: Monthly Rental Montford Basement Studio Apartment
description: Beautiful Basement Studio Apartment located in Historic Montford.  Walk to downtown and to local restaurants.  Queen sized bed,  equipped kitchen, washer and dryer.  TV and wifi.  All utilities included.  I've lived upstairs for 12 years and just love the location and neighbors.  This is a monthly rental only!  City of Asheville will not allow a short term on this property at this time.  $1300 per month until May 1st.

name: Peaceful Mountain bungalow minutes to the Parkway
description: Come soak in the outdoors and mountain living in our peaceful renovated country bungalow located 15 min. from downtown, and a few minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and active individuals with close proximity to all outdoor sports yet nestled in the woods, this is a wonderful base for exploring the area.  The house sits at the end of a cul-de-sac, which makes for a very private get away and provides spacious outdoor space with mature azalea bushes and oak trees.

name: Serene and In Between Downtown and RAD
description: Welcome to our historic 1895 home in the heart of the West End Clingman Avenue Neighborhood (WECAN) where you have your own private guest quarters located one mile from the center of downtown Asheville and South Slope,  and 1/2 mile from the River Arts District and New Belgium brewery. At the end of a dead end street, the area feels secluded and peaceful despite being in the middle of the city. Many of Asheville’s attractions are within walking distance or a quick drive in your car or Uber.

name: 1/2 price 5 min to downtown Asheville
description:
Experience Asheville like never before in our new, bright, sunlit haven just 2.5 miles from downtown Asheville. Unwind in this cheery abode, a short 6-minute drive from the heart of the city. Nestled a few blocks from the French Broad River, our spot offers seamless access to AVL's hotspots – Downtown, River Arts District, Biltmore, and West AVL. Your perfect base for an Asheville adventure!

Downtown Asheville 6 min drive
Biltmore 12 min
French Broad River 1 min
New Belgium Brewing 5 min

name: In the Trees of West Asheville w/ private deck
description:
Beautiful lower level guest suite in our West Asheville home. Visitors will enjoy a private deck and self- check in key pad entrance to come and go with ease.
