You’ll enjoy a king bed, a sofa seat that folds out into a single bed and a newly renovated bathroom. Also, while you are planning your time on the town enjoy plenty of snacks, wine, a mini-fridge, microwave & dish-ware.

NOTE: My partner and I live in the upper two levels of the home so you will most likely hear footsteps.

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #205
description: Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Enjoy the outdoor space from your unique interior balcony and enjoy a glass of wine while you observe the mountains. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

name: Large Windows Overlooking Historic Church Street
description: The theater on the first floor is permanently closed.  To check availability for tonight, please send an inquiry.  Question about rate from prior screen?  Click "More Details" below.

name: Third Floor condo with amazing views of Downtown A
description: To check availability for tonight, please send an inquiry.

name: Pet Friendly Condo in the Heart of Downtown
description: The theater on the first floor is permanently closed.  To check availability for tonight, please send an inquiry.  Question about rate from prior screen?  Click "More Details" below.

name: Three bedroom condo in the heart of downtown Ashev
Beautiful Views of Downtown Asheville
description: To check availability for tonight, please send an inquiry.

name: Pet Friendly Condo Downtown
description: The theater on the first floor is permanently closed.  To check availability for tonight, please send an inquiry.  Question about rate from prior screen?  Click "More Details" below.

name: Three bedroom condo in the heart of downtown Ashev
Entire Home just outside AVL- 1 min from airport!
description: Beautiful entire split level home in Fletcher, NC with great location! Lots of space and natural sunlight in every room. LESS THAN A MILE from the Asheville airport and Sierra Nevada Brewery. 10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, 15 minutes to Biltmore Estate, and only 8 miles to downtown Asheville. Brevard, NC is only a 20 minute drive away as well. If you have come to explore Asheville or the surrounding area, this is the perfect home for you!

name: Charming, Renovated Charlotte St. Condo
description: Charming one bedroom duplex located in the convenient and historic Charlotte Street/North Asheville/Grove Park neighborhood. There is one parking space (unassigned) for this rental located in the parking lot beside and behind the King James Building. The neighborhood feel of the area combined with the short distance it takes to get downtown, the famed Biltmore Estate, and the Grove Park Inn will leave you counting the days to come back and visit. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Fire pit, swing, 6 miles to downtown Asheville
description:
Find the best of Asheville at your doorstep at our inviting two-bedroom cottage, promising a blend of modern comfort and traditional Carolina charm. Perfect for families or small groups, our dog-friendly sanctuary sits in close proximity to popular attractions like the historic Biltmore Estate and the NC Arboretum. Bask in the cozy environment and relish our unique amenities for an unforgettable experience.

Dogs welcome. Cats are not allowed.

name: Lovely Private Studio in West Asheville
description: Private studio apartment in a newly-built home addition.  Excellent location within two blocks of parks, restaurants, shopping and transit.  Also walkable to restaurants, breweries, bakeries and MORE.  Lovely queen-sized bed, bathroom with shower/tub, refrigerator, microwave and storage.  A short drive to downtown Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway (closed in NC) and The Biltmore Estate (NOW OPEN)!  Our guests are interested in Asheville and the surrounding mountains and culture!

name: Comfy and Close to EVERYTHING AVL! See Reviews.
description:
Newly renovated home, steps away from the Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains to Sea Trail. The room is 400 sq ft, complete with: a new kitchenette, private living area, full closet and wall mounted flat screen TV with Roku. Stairs lead to studio. Access to the entire home, minus one bedroom.

Perfect for a quiet vacation, or a convenient base for taking advantage of all Asheville has to offer. I have had both COVID vaccines.

name: Quiet woods, minutes to downtown! Private 1BrApt
description:
A tidy private apartment in a secluded & safe Asheville neighborhood. Super Low cleaning fee, and no list of cleaning chores for checkout!

The garden apartment is large (aprox 650sqft) 1br/open plan unit on the ground level of a unique multi-unit dome building. Fresh bright paints & eclectic decorations that reflect the colorful culture of Asheville!

The perfect home base for your Asheville getaway!

name: Historic Oakland Cottage B&B in Asheville, NC
description: Reserve a guest room or all of Oakland Cottage B&B for that special small gathering; 6 guest rooms, each with private bath, in-room cable TV, mini-fridge & microwave in each room.  Some of the rooms have additional beds for an occupancy of up to 16 guests.  Breakfast is served each morning in the dining room. Complimentary WIFI available throughout the house, onsite complimentary parking, wonderful guest spaces for your group to enjoy inside and out. Guests DO NOT have access to the kitchen.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: The Lodge at the Huntly Estate | Peaceful Escape
description: Nestled in the serene beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains, The Lodge at The Huntly Estate is a grand yet inviting retreat where comfort, privacy, and nature come together.

name: Close to downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate
description: 5 minutes to downtown Asheville.1 mile from interstate 40.  5 minutes to Biltmore Estate.New construction in multi use community.All new stainless appliances.All new furniture.1100 square feet.Wood floors,granite countertops. 14 foot ceilings

name: East Asheville Hideaway w/ Private Entrance+Space
description:
Retreat to this cozy hideaway tucked away on a quiet loop 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore. With its own private entrance and space, its the perfect spot for a serene Asheville getaway. High ceilings with wood beams, clean and comfortable linens, plenty of natural light and thoughtful touches make this homey space your ideal launching point into Western North Carolina.

Please note we charge an extra $30 cleaning fee for pets

name: Family Home w/ Views ~ 5 Mi to Downtown Asheville!
description:
Private Hot Tub | Near Hiking | ~ 7 Mi to River Arts District

Nestled amidst the stunning Blue Ridge Mountains, Asheville, NC, beckons travelers with its eclectic blend of arts, culture, and outdoor adventures. Hike or bike the Blue Ridge Parkway, sample craft brews at New Belgium Brewing Company, or listen to live music at The Orange Peel. At nightfall, retreat to this 3-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental home to relax in the private hot tub, followed by a movie night on the Smart TV.

name: Asheville Cottage 18-20
description: Perfect cozy feeling in this newly renovated 1 bedroom 1 bath cottage which is one of two remodeled units within a duplex.  This is the place for the mature adult or couple, either coming to town for work or vacation. This is not a space for parties, events or gathering over 4 people. Enjoy the bright private airy space with just about every amenity you expect and more! Centrally located in beautiful East Asheville across and on block from the VA hospital and entrance to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Modern South Slope Condo EV Charger 2 Parkng Spots
description: South and southwest mountain views, outdoor space, and contemporary design in this conveniently located condo in downtown Asheville. This 6th floor two-bedroom features king and queen masters, each with private baths, and a king sleeper. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown, central to all that Asheville has to offer. The unit also provides 2 garage parking spaces, cars can be no larger than a Tahoe type vehicle. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Luxury Downtown Condo City Center
description:
Beautiful condo in downtown Asheville! Amazing outdoor space and contemporary design in this very convenient condo in downtown Asheville. This second floor condo features a queen bedroom and a queen sleeper sofa.
Located on Biltmore Ave. in downtown, you are central to all that Asheville has to offer. The Biltmore Estate is just a short drive away. One parking space is available, but the car can be no larger than a Tahoe-type vehicle. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Ellington Loft by CM | Chef's Kitchen & City Views
description:
Modern Loft in the Heart of Downtown Asheville! Located in an Art Deco building that's listed on the National Register of Historic Places, Ellington Loft's penthouse flair will "wow" you with beautiful city views and exquisite contemporary decor.

Show off your culinary skills in the fully equipped kitchen and enjoy your meal with scenic urban views from the spacious private balcony. At the end of the day, cozy up and watch movies on the flat-screen TV with cable service and an AppleTV device.

name: Carolina Roost by CM | Pet-Friendly & Pack n' Play
description: Carolina Roost is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends!  If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight.  A Vacation Coordinator from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 24 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

name: Busbee Cabin by CM | Grill, Fireplace, & Hot Tub
description:
Authentic Log Cabin on 36-Acres with Private Hot Tub! Stretch your legs on trails through Busbee Cabin's 36-acre wooded estate, then rejuvenate your spirit and refresh your body with a good soak in the bubbly hot tub.

Gather around the stone hearth in the central living area and watch your favorite shows on the flat screen TV with DirectTV service.

name: Kid Friendly | Play Ground | Neighborhood | King |
description: Stylish 3BR/2BA just 7 mins from downtown Asheville! Cozy, modern, and full of charm with a bright living room, comfy beds, full kitchen, fast Wi-Fi, and a private deck. Quiet, walkable neighborhood close to Biltmore, Blue Ridge Parkway, and top breweries. Perfect for couples, families, or remote work. Book your Asheville getaway today!

name: One bedroom tree house
description: Private one bedroom in a serene seting.

name: Open Floorplan Ideal Location
description: 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an open kitchen, dining room, living room. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Mountain Modern- Blue Ridge Parkway luxury cabin
description: Nordic meets North Carolina! Our brand new Scandinavian-inspired cabin is bordered by the Blue Ridge Parkway, walking distance to the Mountains-to-Sea trail and less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Private, yet conveniently located for access to all the hiking, biking, brewpub and culinary adventures that Asheville has to offer. Enjoy the luxury amenities of the cabin and the peaceful surroundings of our great outdoors. Bring your bikes too! Newly installed bike shed to store your toys!

name: Luxe Loft-cozy and clean!
description: Surrounded by a bamboo forest just outside of Asheville, our private, loft-style home has high ceilings and ample natural light that fills the space all hours of the day - a cozy sanctuary! Professionally designed for comfort and style, you might not want to leave! If you do, you're just 15 mins downtown AVL and a short drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Whoever you are, you are welcome here! We have over 200 Five-Star reviews for a reason. We care deeply about providing a great place to stay.

name: Luxury Lodge | Near Downtown Asheville
description:
Location, location, location!
Timeless and true, and the saying certainly applies to Asheville Mountain Alchemy. You will experience total serenity and peace in this woods-like setting amidst the panoramic views of the Majestic Blue Ridge Mountains, while being minutes to downtown Asheville .This home is perfect for family gatherings, a friends retreat or just a calming respite in the Mountains.

name: Mountaintop Home 3 min from Downtown Asheville
description:
The dream location for anyone traveling to Asheville.
Everyone wants views, but close to all that Asheville has to offer, well here you go: 3,000 ft. elevation, absolutely stunning mountain views, & all only 3 miles from downtown Asheville!!

name: Walkable West Asheville Studio
description:
A newly remodeled studio apartment in vibrant West Asheville. The studio includes its own private entrance, parking space, and personal outdoor patio with streaming lights to enjoy the mountain air. Our apartment is the perfect landing spot for two to three friends or a couple. The apartment is furnished with midcentury modern furniture which includes local art, records, and maps for you to kick-back or explore.

**please note our airbnb description says walkable West Asheville - not Downtown 😎

name: The Lil’ Blue Mountain Magic Hut
description: Entire 2 bedroom mountain home on private half acre, located just 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville. Outdoor fire pit to enjoy s'mores beneath the stars. Large 2-story cedar play house in the backyard near the main house for children to enjoy.  The playhouse and a small portion of the yard is fully fenced in, to keep pets and children safe. Some toys, books, games and amenities for families with kids.

name: Bright Asheville Retreat with Hot Tub & Decks!
description: Leave the city behind for the mountains of Asheville when you retreat to this 5-bedroom, 3-bath vacation rental! This 2-story getaway boasts multiple outdoor seating areas overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains, a hot tub, and a game room; there’s something for everyone! The house is under 10 miles from the Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville so you can easily fill your days with city and historical sights. With Blue Ridge Parkway nearby, you’ll also find outdoor fun within easy reach.

name: Asheville's Forsythia House  Support Local Craft!
description:
All of the main living area of Forsythia House is included in your rental. The property also includes my personal woodshop adjoined to the rear of the house with a separate entrance (see the section “other things to note” or feel free to ask me questions).

The Forsythia House is nestled at the end of a quiet private road 3 minutes from a grocery store and 10 minutes from downtown.

FORSYTHIA HOUSE IS A DOG-FRIENDLY! Due to allergy issues, we do not allow cats.

name: Cozy Private Ranch Apt 5 Min From Biltmore
description: Asheville is amazing! With only a 5 minute drive to The Biltmore, 10 minutes to downtown, and 25 minutes from the airport, this location allows you to really get out and explore all that beautiful Asheville has to offer. Whatever your interests are, Asheville has you covered and more, look forward to hosting you during your next visit to our stunning town!

name: Eco Cottage near river. 5 min drive downtown AVL
description:
Entire house 2 bed/1.5 baths, 1700 sf eco-friendly. Newly constructed near French Broad River, River Arts District and Downtown Asheville . Includes fireplace, beautiful fenced in outdoor space, fire pit, patio seating, and hammocks.

Just minutes away from everything in Asheville - a quick 5 min drive to downtown Asheville via Riverside Drive, or a short 3 minute walk down to Riverside Park, this is the perfect place to get away to be near downtown and also have safety, peace and privacy.

name: 1950s Chalet Above Downtown -$6 Uber to all!
description:
☆ Vintage and nostalgic tiny home set on the mountain above downtown. Our 1950's Swiss Chalet is just a mile or so from downtown and a $6 Uber down the hill from Beaucatcher Mtn.

The Geneva Cottage offers a deck off of the bedroom, a king bed, comfortable LR, well stocked and efficient kitchen and small bathroom.

Pets generally are tough but can be possible and ALL pets do need to be pre-approved. The Pet Fee is $50 and we do ask that you cover furniture and vacuum prior to leaving.

name: 11 min to Biltmore Sleeps 6
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Freshly updated and recently remodeled. Relaxing deck with a BBQ grill and outdoor fire pit. Each bedroom has a ceiling fan with light dimmers. Main bedroom has its own access to ceramic tiled shower, sink, and toilet. Center bathroom has a bathtub/shower with a dual sink vanity and toilet. Laundry room has access to washing machine and dryer. Kitchen has a sink, garbage disposal, electric stove oven and range microwave.

name: New Home Near | Near Downtown Asheville
description:
Avondale of Asheville.
Tucked just off the historic & iconic Blue Ridge Parkway, and just outside downtown Asheville, this newly constructed gem welcomes travelers to our mountains.

name: Montford Cottage in Downtown Asheville
description:
ASHEVILLE & Historic Montford!
A Perfect 30-day rental for executives or families wanting more than just a week, or needing monthly, luxury accommodations for 1-month to 8 months.
How about the feel of our majestic Blue Ridge Mountains, while being able to walk into downtown Asheville?
Welcome to Montford Cottage!! A historical gem, fully renovated and modernized for contemporary luxury.

name: Lofts of Asheville with a touch of elegance
description: 5minutes to downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate.1000 sq ft new construction apartment in multiuse complex.Woodfloors,m granite counter tops,stainless appliances,washer and dryer, High speed internet.Close to greenways,biking,hiking,Breweries.

name: Downtown Pac-Man Condo 55 S Market St
description: Top 5% Airbnb!!! Locally Managed! Thank you for considering our place situated in the heart of downtown! Featuring the Pac-Man icade with all your favorite 80's games. Our stylish condo is filled with elegant and modern touches, and local Asheville art.  We’re walking distance to everything Asheville has to offer, including some of the city’s favorite restaurants like Curate, Limones, and Wicked Weed. Plus, we have one free parking spot!

name: Blue Sky Charm
description: Relax and enjoy the sights and sounds of nature in our newly renovated home located only 7 miles from downtown Asheville. Located in a quiet country setting this house comes with plenty of amenities.  This house features a relaxing dining area or laptop friendly workspace with a bay window, a screened in sunroom, a large front and backyard for games or just watching the deer that frequently pass through.  A great place to relax after a busy day in town or hiking in our beautiful mountains.

name: Whole Renovated Home 10 min to DT AVL, Fenced Yard
description: Welcome to your spacious and newly renovated home, just a 10-minute drive from vibrant Downtown Asheville. This inviting haven boasts a sizeable kitchen, ample living area, and a large deck overlooking a fenced backyard, ensuring an ideal retreat for all. Nestled just 2 miles from Biltmore village, revel in seamless access to Asheville's gems while enjoying the tranquility of a quiet Asheville neighborhood. With five bedrooms and two full baths, there is room for everyone!

name: Time Traveler Studio at the Mystery Mansion
description: Live like a local, just 1.5 blocks from the heart of West Asheville, in a private entry suite of our historic 1915 Mystery Mansion. This unique stay is artistic, fancy & over the top fun. Whether you're coming to Asheville for a wedding, nature, breweries, or the Biltmore, our comfortable suite will surely make your visit even more memorable. Enjoy complete privacy with off-street parking, well-lit pathway, outdoor seating, & entry.

name: Mountain House in the Woods close to Everything!
description: This Newly constructed cabin is located in a private wooded setting only 10 min. from downtown Asheville, 5 min from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Relax on the back porch or take stroll down the Creekside firepit. Convenient to all that Asheville has to offer. The cabin is beautifully furnished and well equipped with everything you need to enjoy a peaceful weekend getaway or extended stay.

name: Asheville Mountain View Retreat w City Amenities
description: Experience a high end mountain retreat close to all of the amenities! Nearby construction completed 1/23. This 3 bed/2 bath home on 1+acre features an open concept living room w. gas fireplace, home office, covered front porch, bbq, firepit, and large fenced lawn for a quiet stay only 3 miles to the Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, breweries, restaurants and stores. Downtown Asheville is 5 miles away. This rental is only available for 30+ day stays with additional discounts for 2+ months.

name: Contemporary Mountain Home in Asheville
description: Long Grass View: mindfully curated, modern construction, nestled in the Riceville Valley just outside of downtown Asheville. This contemporary mountain home affords stunning views of the Blue Ridge Mountains, while also being very close to both downtown Asheville and Black Mountain. Sleek lines and luxury touches are balanced with the natural surroundings and the calming effect of our beloved mountains. Long Grass View beckons you to come experience the Smokies, and everything WNC has to offer

name: Keys to Happiness Studio
description: UNBELIEVABLE location for this beautiful, brand new open-concept apartment suite with kitchenette nestled in a small, quiet, wooded neighborhood in city limits with gardens, water feature and trails.   Located steps away from the Mountains to Sea Trail, 5 minutes to the Biltmore House entrance, Blue Ridge Parkway, and downtown Asheville only 7 minutes away, you'll be close to everything--Historic Biltmore Village, Breweries, Eateries, Art Galleries, Ashevillle Airport, I-40 and much more.

name: The Westside Rancher: Five Star *Cozy* Retreat
description: The Westside Rancher is a single story ranch style home beautifully designed for you to experience Asheville like a local. This home is tucked away in the secluded countryside of West Asheville. You will be surrounded by lush landscape, blooming cherry tress, and bustling wildlife. This 3 bed 2 bath home has been remodeled with love and is a perfect home base to explore all that Asheville has to offer.

name: LEAF weekend rental only
description: I’m willing to rent out a full house rental for Oct 21-Oct22. 20 mins from LEAF. Two bedrooms one bath, bachelor pad. Mildly appointed w/ light renovation imperfections but cozy and convenient and furnished. 300$ per night.

name: Light and bright West Asheville
description: Welcome to Asheville! Enjoy our quiet guest suite in west Asheville. The suite includes a private entrance, queen bed, smart tv and wifi, mini-fridge, microwave and coffee maker, a spacious renovated bathroom, and off-street parking. And we have brand new solar panels to offset your carbon impact! A 16-inch twin air mattress and bedding is available upon request. We are located a short drive or Lyft/Uber ride from West Asheville, the River Arts District and downtown Asheville.

name: Woodsy Hideaway near Downtown, Parkway, Biltmore
description: Airy & private guest suite in a woodsy location right off  i240 on the urban & commercial side of town with private gravel driveway & parking tucked away at our home near downtown Asheville.  Private entrance with patio, outdoor seating & private bathroom.

name: Asheville Cozy Tiny House with Hot Tub
description: Cute, cozy, and comfy tiny house in West Asheville, this rental is located at the end of a small neighborhood of other rentals about 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, in West Asheville less than 5 minutes to Haywood Road and the River Arts District. This rental comes with our commitment to exceeding our guests expectations and if you're not looking for a tiny house experience this may not be for you.

name: Luxury Condo, Downtown Asheville
description: Stunning east city views, outdoor space, and contemporary design in this newer, conveniently located condo in downtown Asheville. This 3rd floor condo boasts two queen bedroom, each with private baths. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer. The Biltmore Estate and many other area attractions are also just a short drive away. One parking space is available but cars can be no larger than a Tahoe type vehicle. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: ASHEVILLE COTTAGE 18-10
description: Perfect cozy feeling in this recently renovated 1 bedroom 1 bath cottage which is one of two units within a duplex.  This is the place for the mature adult or couple, either coming to town for work or vacation. This is not a space for parties, events or gathering over 4 people. Enjoy the bright private airy space with just about every amenity you expect and more! Centrally located in beautiful East Asheville across and on block from the VA hospital and entrance to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: West Asheville, Prime Location, 2.5 Bath
description: Nestled in West Asheville, minutes from attractions, this cozy personalized abode offers 2 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, +additional sleeping areas upon request, full kitchen, entertainment room, and 2 porches offer relaxation. Living room with smart TV, dining area, and unique bedrooms with private baths. Primary bedroom boasts a king bed, workout nook with weights and stationary bike, and a spacious bathroom. Custom renovated, light-permitting design, & charming style. Book now for a memorable stay!

name: Elegant Colonial walking distance to Omni, cafes
description:
Enjoy Asheville's year-round beauty in this stunning, thoroughly remodeled 1917 Colonial Revival for the discerning guest. Located in the Proximity Park historic district of Grove Park, this gorgeous home features hardwood floors throughout, large windows, a sleek, modern kitchen with stainless appliances, stone counters, custom cabinets, and oversized island.

After a day hiking or exploring downtown, enjoy a serene evening by the fire pit.

One month minimum

name: Cozy Mtn Home, 5*Views, Near Biltmore
description:
Getaway to our mountain house located just outside of Asheville, NC. A scenic drive up the mountain road where beauty and peacefulness await you at the top! Best part- the 5 minute ride down to grab coffee, groceries, or dine out...truly, an Illusion of seclusion.

The remodeled house features new flooring, new furnishings, and a new kitchen. Large deck overlooks the mountains and city lights; upper deck is perfect for enjoying your morning coffee as the sun comes up.

Come relax and enjoy!

name: Elegant Retreat in Montford Victorian!
description: Beautifully curated studio apartment located in the heart of the Historic Montford, with all the modern conveniences. Featuring a queen bed and a kitchenette with a coffeemaker, toaster oven, microwave, and fridge. Living room with comfortable seating, and access to wifi, Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon. Enjoy a glass of wine on your private patio. Walk to "All Day Darling" for coffee or "Nine Mile" for a Caribbean dinner. Walk to Asheville downtown, Botanical gardens, and breweries. Parking available

name: Home Convenient to Mtns & City with Hot Tub
description: Welcome to the Advantageous Asheville Home!  We are on half an acre surrounded by other homes. Our four bedrooms are spacious and comfortable. The adorable living space is open and allows for a comfortable space to hang out. The kitchen is fully functional and provides a great place to prepare food. We are 15 minutes or less to downtown, the parkway, the mall, and wonderful restaurants. Fiber Optic WiFi is provided for stable internet with smart TVs in the living room and the master bedroom.

name: Azalea Cottage, BOHO hideaway
description:
Azalea Cottage Retreat has excellent reviews and rates. The place to stay if you want to be near all Asheville has to offer!!
This sweet cottage is newly renovated with 1 bedroom, 1 bath and an open concept eat-in kitchen & living room. The bedroom has a comfy queen-sized bed, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to prepare a large meal or a small snack, the bathroom has a washer/dryer and outside is private paved parking right in front.

name: Spacious Mid Century Home Close To Everything
description: Relax in luxe comfort in our renovated 1965 traditional charmer. Our space boast a fun and quirky style that is Instagram worthy and will be sure to make your vacation memorable. This 2,700 square foot space, boasts two separate living spaces, pool table, fireplace, wifi, and gourmet kitchen. Our neighborhood has access right into the Pisgah Forest and is minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, French Broad River, and 15 minutes to Downtown. Spend your next vacation in style and comfort!

name: Bent Creek Beauty
description: Enjoy the sights and sounds of nature at our newly renovated home in Bent Creek.  Moments from the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Arboretum.  This 3/2 features a private backyard with an amazing pool area to keep everyone entertained.  It will comfortably fit 8 guests.  Relax poolside after mountain biking in the neighborhood, hiking on the Parkway, floating down the French Broad River, sightseeing at the Biltmore, or enjoying downtown Asheville restaurants and breweries downtown.

name: Luxury Condo, Downtown Asheville
description: Stunning views, outdoor space (with infrared heaters!) & contemporary design define this sun-soaked, conveniently located condo in downtown Asheville. Features two bedrooms, each w/private bath & 1 King, 1 Queen bed + queen sleeper sofa. Perfectly located on Biltmore Ave, close to shopping, dining, breweries, galleries, live music & more. One parking spot in onsite garage, fits vehicle no larger than a Tahoe. The pet fee for this pet-friendly unit is $75 plus tax and must be paid before arrival.

name: Dogwood Cottage - Perfect couples escape
description: This sweet cottage is newly renovated with 1 bedroom, 1 bath and an open concept eat-in kitchen & living room. The bedroom has a comfy queen-sized bed, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to prepare a large meal or a small snack, the bathroom has a washer/dryer and outside is private parking right beside the unit.

name: "Eastern Sky" - Deck & Mountain Views"
description: "Welcome to our wonderful home with year round Mountain Views!  Our two-level, one bedroom offers a comfortable getaway in a quiet neighborhood conveniently located to shopping and dining. Only minutes to Asheville, and Blue Ridge Parkway. We offer high-speed WIFI, cable,  and access to streaming channels via Roku TVs. Plus a well-equipped kitchen for stay-at-home meals. The ultimate place to start your Asheville adventures with lots of extras to make you feel at home!"

name: Private master suite with hot tub
description: This beautiful private room with hot tub is located in a convenient location five minutes from the airport, ten minutes from the Biltmore estate and fifteen minutes from downtown Asheville. The property is a small urban flower farm that mainly produces during the summer. If flowers are important for your visit then please message me to find out what is blooming while you are here. I do not grow flowers 365 days a year. Please be aware I live near a road and you may hear cars drive on it.

name: Vintage inspired haven!
description:
Located in a quiet family neighborhood, walking distance to restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries of West Asheville and just a short drive to downtown Asheville. Very close to the French Broad River Greenway!

Sunny and spacious, with a large sunny deck and a shade porch as well.

Off-street parking, gas stove, and ping-pong table

name: Treehouse-like Hideaway, Walkable West Asheville
description: Welcome to our upper-level, private entrance guest room. This cozy, furnished bedroom and full bath also has a spacious, private deck opening up to a backdrop of woods and eclectic back yards. There is outside shading and wall dividers for privacy too. With off-road parking for guests, this spot is close to Haywood Rd's local restaurants and shops, with a greenway along the River Arts District.  It's our goal to be wonderful hosts and share a one of a kind place we call home.

name: Mountain Refuge w/ View, 12 Mi to Asheville!
description: Looking for a place ideally located to all the adventure Asheville has to offer? Nine Peaks Asheville is the perfect vacation rental for couples, families with older children, and reunions. This property features the ability to rent the 5-bedroom, 5-bathroom house, complete with a game room and 5-star amenities, giving the entire group endless options for comfort and convenience. Book today to enjoy views of nine mountain peaks on the private decks!

name: Grove Park Neighborhood~Quiet Retreat w/ Hot Tub
description: Located in the historic Grove Park neighborhood on one of the most beautiful streets of Asheville, our home is 3 blocks from the Grove Park Inn, parks & restaurants. Live like a local with your 900 sq foot guest suite on the first level of our house with your private patio entrance. Beside your entrance, the English cut flower garden is yours to enjoy. 2.5 miles to the center of downtown Asheville. Enjoy the comforts of home including full kitchen & workspace! The mountains are waiting for you!

name: "Our Place!" Private Guest Suite & Great Location!
description: “Our Place!" Guest Suite on a Private Road just a couple of miles from I-26, the NC Arboretum, French Broad River, Bent Creek, Blue Ridge Parkway, Breweries, River Arts District, Biltmore Park, Art Galleries, Etc.! Downtown Asheville, Hendersonville & Brevard are a short drive away. After a full day of adventures, enjoy the outdoor fire ring, the birds, the blooms, & the breeze! Lighted on site private parking area/private entrance. Pets welcome w/a $10 flat fee! (2 dog maximum)

name: RV Deluxe
description: 2018Jayco 25.5REOK, 30' fifth wheel with two push outs and full hookup, parked in a lot, with nearby access to downtown Asheville, and a short distance to surrounding recreational opportunities of Bent Creek, Mills River, Pisgah and DuPont Forests.

name: Lg Studio, 29 days or $630 per week.
description: Lovely getaway! Newly remodeled, spacious (1000sq ft), private studio/garden apartment in a lovely old (1905) home in downtown Asheville.  Ten foot ceilings, lots of windows and decks, private locked gate and entry to backyard garden area adjacent to the apartment entrance.  Off street parking in front of private entrance. Walk to downtown restaurants, Coffee shops and breweries. Or walk to The River Arts District. 4 min drive to hospital 6 min drive to Biltmore Estate. Private outside hot tub.

name: Biltmore Village Getaway
description: Spacious, newly renovated, historic Biltmore Village condo is perfect for your Asheville and WNC getaway. Located in the heart of Biltmore Village, guests can walk to any one of the many local restaurants, galleries, and boutiques. It is also located a moment away to the famed Biltmore Estate, a short ride into downtown Asheville and easy access to the Blue Ridge parkway. This large 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom has a Queen sleeper and queen Murphy Bed and Twin Bunk Beds.

name: Asheville lofts III with a touch of luxury
description: Fully Furnished 5 minutes to downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate.Close to Breweries, biking,hiking,tubing,kayaking.2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms 1000 square ft.New construction stainless appliances,wood floors fully furnished.Very convenient to Buncombe,Haywood and Henderson Counties

name: West Asheville Bungalow - Walk to New Belgium
description: West Asheville - bedroom & bathroom with private entrance in a trendy bungalow, centrally located to West Asheville and River Arts District, and minutes away from downtown, Biltmore Village, and grocery stores. Walk to New Belgium, Hole Doughnuts, Archetype Brewery, Taco Billy etc.. **Owners live upstairs, but completely separate space. This is a furnished basement apartment**... 9 min drive to the Biltmore, 6 min to south slope. (Check-in @3pm, Checkout @11am)

name: Stone Cottage-2.5 miles from Biltmore Park!
description: From the drive you will see stone pillars surrounding the wrap around front porch. Inside, this adorable cottage is a 1 bedroom, completely updated 1 bath, a spacious eat-in kitchen & living room. The living room has a comfy couch with chaise and a 49" HDTV. The bedroom is spacious w/ a comfy king sized bed. The covered wrap around front porch has an outside dining set to relax with a drink after a day of sightseeing complete wit 2 comfy chairs to lounge with coffee or a glass of wine.

name: Cozy Bear Hideaway - No Cleaning Fee - Firepit
description: Located in the South Asheville area, the Cozy Bear Hideaway is a 700 sq. ft. bright and airy retreat with 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. Every inch of this newly renovated basement space was designed with comfort in mind. Equipped with a small kitchenette, desk area, original artwork/photography, coffee bar, cozy beds, and storage. Each bedroom and the living room have a TV. 9 mins to AVL airport/Biltmore Park, 16 mins to Biltmore Estate, 18 mins to downtown AVL, 20 mins to downtown Hendersonville.

name: The heart of West Asheville.
description: Brand new home in the heart of west Asheville. Let us know if you are interested in long term stay we will work with you.

name: Wooded Retreat in Asheville w/Fireplace & Hot Tub
description:
*Asheville IS OPEN & Beautiful*
Escape to this charming 1.5-acre mountain retreat just 2 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 5 miles from the vibrant pulse of Asheville and the iconic Biltmore Estate. Soak in the hot tub, relax around the outdoor fire pit or wrap-around porch, or get cozy by the indoor wood-burning fireplace or gas burning kitchen fireplace . This 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath mountain sanctuary offers a fully equipped kitchen and gas grill, ensuring a comfortable and memorable stay.

name: The Black Bear Bungalow <10 mins to DT Asheville
description: The Black Bear Bungalow is Airbnb as it was meant to be. A cute little house in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Parkway that is well loved and lived in. The Black Bear Bungalow is your home away from home to explore mother nature at its finest. Located less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville with access to the Mountain-to-Sea trail less than quarter of a mile away.

name: Stay In The Loop
description:
Enjoy the convenience of being just 3 miles from both the heart of downtown and West Asheville while delighting in the suburban comforts of a fenced in backyard, garden beds, morning birdsong, evening crickets and spring peepers, salt water swimming pool and hot tub access.

Master bedroom with attached bath.
Second bedroom by hallway bath. Both restrooms have showers and bathtubs.
Additional bedroom with sofa trundle that sleeps 2. Perfect for the kids! No kids? Use it as an office instead.

name: Brand new green built 2 bedroom duplex.
description: This is the downstairs of a brand new green built duplex, on the future Woodfin greenway which will connect with the French Broad River recreational area.  It can accommodate up to 4 guests.   There is 1 bedroom with a queen size bed and a queen size murphy bed in the living area that can be made private with a room divider curtain. We are right off of 19/23 and Interstate 26,  5 minutes to downtown Asheville and 5 minutes to Weaverville.

name: Blue Cottage West - Cozy West Asheville Home
description:
Blue Cottage west feels like a remote cabin but is a short 10 minute drive to the heart of West Asheville/Haywood Rd., and 15 minutes to Downtown.

The home has a wrap around deck and large yard with fire pit for enjoying the surrounding nature.

Inside, you'll feel that cozy, "lived-in" kind of vibe with a wood burning fireplace and a large kitchen with stainless steel appliances and all the kitchen tools necessary to make this place feel like home.

name: Explore West Asheville
description: Hi all! This is a shared space in a cozy condo that’s just a short stroll from Izzy's, Odds coffee, Biscuit Head, and Sunny Point along Haywood Road in funky West Asheville. Less than 3 miles from downtown Asheville brewpubs, restaurants & events.

name: "Eastern Sunrise-Breath taking Mountain Views"
description: Soak up mountain living in this newly remodeled home with spectacular mountain views. Fully equipped modern kitchen with all new appliances. Cozy living room with Roku TV, spacious bedroom, Roku TV, with king bed and reading area. 2 bathrooms with high-end towels. Deck and  grill. Conveniently located to attractions, groceries, dining, walking trails, Blue Ridge Parkway. All nestled in a quiet community. Within 15 minutes to city but country living.

name: Clean & cozy basement apartment in West Asheville
description: Located near the heart of West Asheville, our clean and cozy basement apartment is waiting for you! We’re an enjoyable 10-minute walk (or one-minute drive) to Haywood Road, which is famous for its many eateries, cafes and boutiques.

name: “828 Escape” welcoming workers!
description: Welcome to “828 Escape”.  This rustic small cabin is nestled in the Blue Ridge mountains and is located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy a “glamping” feel with all the luxuries and comforts so you don’t have to rough it!

name: Walkable West Asheville,  Vacation or Work Remote
description: Surrounded by trees, this quiet West Asheville gem feels remote yet is just a short walk or bike ride to the French Broad River, cafes, restaurants, breweries, art studios and more. This newly renovated two bedroom, one bath is clean, bright, has a private furnished outdoor patio, washer/dryer, AC/heater, kitchen, desk, wifi, original art, a coffee/tea station, comfortable beds, cozy sheets, and all the quality amenities you'll want for a special Asheville visit.

name: Cozy Asheville Mtn View Chalet 1 Mi to Downtown
description: This cozy 550 SF chalet is literally less than 1 mile from central downtown Asheville yet high up in the trees in a little neighborhood on Beaucatcher Mountain. It's just a few minutes and few dollars via Uber (or a 25 min walk) to downtown with all its attractions, food and entertainment. Relax in our 1BR chalet complete with open air porch with mountain views, and all the comforts of home.

name: South Slope Brewery District Townhome
description: Stunning southside city views, outdoor space, and contemporary design in this conveniently located condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom features 2 king bedrooms one bunk room, and 3.5 bathrooms. The unit also provides garage parking-EV for 1 midsize car and a 2nd space outside, a private elevator, and rooftop terrace. The Biltmore Estate and tother attractions are also just a short drive away.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Ginger’s Nature Nest (2br suite, great location)
description: The large suite (best suited for non-smoker adults (solos, couples, trios, or foursomes)  includes a king bedroom,  two-queen bedroom,  walk-in closets, full bath, spacious living room,  generous kitchenette, and furnished deck. High-speed Wi-Fi works anywhere in the suite.   Living space on one level...no steps to maneuver from parking to entry.  Enjoy the peaceful residential area surrounded by natural beauty just minutes from downtown Asheville, all major attractions and  lots of outdoor fun.

name: Quiet Cottage w/ Outdoor Oasis
description: Welcome to Gusty Winds in gorgeous, laid-back Asheville, NC. In our one-of-a-kind cottage, you’ll find all the comforts of home, because we use it as our own home when visiting family! Susan, your host, has put her heart and soul into the 3 BR home - you'll find artistic details everywhere. Just minutes away from downtown, it also offers plenty of opportunities for peace & tranquility – cozy evenings on the back deck under starry skies or mornings filled with birdsong among our lush gardens.

name: Tranquil & Teal West Asheville home
description: Looking for a peaceful retreat after exploring Asheville? Look no further! The Teal House is set back from the road, is surrounded by trees, and every window greets you with greenery. This feeling of seclusion is hard to come by with the convenience to so many amenities. Only 3 minutes to walkable West Asheville. 10 minutes to downtown. Take it easy at this unique, quiet, and tranquil getaway.

name: South Asheville Sweet Bungalow With Cozy Cabana
description: South Asheville Cute 2 bedroom & outdoor bed, grill, fire pit, seating patio. Quiet, safe and established neighborhood. 1 Queen bed, 2 twin beds. Free coffee. 211 MBPS internet speeds. Walk to Rocky's Hot Chicken Shack. 2 minutes to 12 Bones Smokehouse South, 10 minutes to airport, 15 minutes to Biltmore Village, 20 minutes to downtown & River Arts District. Free parking. A peaceful retreat after a day in the city, the trails, or seeing the sites. We can't wait to host! Long monthly available.

name: Cozy getaway near Biltmore Estate and downtown
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally located walk out basement stay in the charming neighborhood of Oakley in Asheville.

Less than 5 mins to the Biltmore Estate and historic Biltmore Village, 7 mins to downtown Asheville, and 7 mins to the River Arts District.

Close to amazing breweries, shopping, and restaurants.

The suite is private. Y’all may see/hear us and our dogs/cat coming and going. Feel free to say hi or just keep on doing your thing!

Safe space. All are welcome!

name: Sweet Bungalow 8 minutes to Downtown AVL
description: Adorable 2 bedroom, 2.5 baths Bungalow 8 minutes to downtown Asheville.  Close to Biltmore Est and everything AVL.   2 small (under 30 lbs) dogs upon approval with $50 pet fee.  Modern furnishings with 55” TV in living room and cool electric fireplace.   Spacious kitchen is fully equipped.   King bedrm with private deck and bathroom with walk-in shower.  Queen bedrm and private bathroom, tub/shower.  Nice outdoor spaces with propane fire pit and grill.  Small fenced in area off side deck

name: Mountain Views - 2,500 ft elevation
description:
Apartment at 2,500 ft. elevation facing east toward Sunset Mountain. Uninterrupted long range mountain views of Blue Ridge Mountains. Sunset Mountain is home to the Grove Park Innn.
Spectacular sunrises start behind the mountains and offer great sunrise opportunities above the mountains vwithout leaving the Lions Den or your apartment.
Mountain facing outdoor courtyard is a perfect place to experience "Sky City" at night.

name: *sweet little cottage on the north side
description: Welcome to Woodfin!  Our home is conveniently located on the north side of Asheville-- just a hop and a skip to the River Arts district, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Beaver Lake, and downtown Asheville.   Avery's park is a short walk, and the Craggy Mountain RR Line is just down the road.   Our neighborhood is warm and welcoming,  and so is our pet-friendly home, which was built as one of Woodfin's local mill houses in the 1920's.  You'll find a clean, restful vibe with a lot of love in the walls.

name: Stunning Gem in the Heart of Asheville
description: In the heart of the historic Montford neighborhood, this picturesque detached carriage house is tucked away behind our 1897 Queen Anne Victorian home, previously operating as the Bed of Roses Bed & Breakfast. Make yourself at home with your own private entrance, private parking, fast WiFi, a 50" TV w/ Netflix and Disney+, and full use of our serene outdoor garden, complete with hammock and comfy patio furniture. Perfect for couples or solo travelers. A mere 10 min walk to downtown Asheville.

name: The Urban Cottage - Chic West Asheville Home
description: Bright, private 1 bd/1 ba home set in highly desirable W. Asheville, minutes walk to Haywood Rd restaurants & breweries. This modern, cozy cottage features open plan living space, areas for eating,  working & relaxing. Kitchen is fully equipped & includes dishwasher, microwave etc. Enjoy Smart TV,  Wifi, A/C, private porch, Washer and drier. Secluded backyard edged with trees plus a fire pit feels far away from the city but infact whatever you need is right on your doorstep- literally.

name: Spacious Modern Getaway 10 Minutes From Downtown!
description:
Power and Water Available!
Mandatory Water Boil Notice is currently in effect for all of Asheville.

Welcome to your next Asheville vacation getaway! This beautiful modern getaway is located in West Asheville and is close to everything Asheville has to offer. Located less than 10 minutes away from Downtown and the River Arts District makes it convenient for you to visit our famous breweries, and local restaurants. This house is within 15 minutes of virtually everything Asheville has to offer.

name: Highland Hideaway by CM | Fun Rec Room & Hot Tub
description: Discover urban serenity with a stay at Highland Hideaway, a gorgeous contemporary home where mountains, comfort, and convenience come together! Highland Hideaway is situated on a two-acre wooded oasis in a central location just east of downtown Asheville - close enough to have food delivered or to call an Uber for a night out.

name: City View South Slope Townhome
description: Stunning southside city views, outdoor space, private elevator, and contemporary design in this new-build, super-convenient townhome in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom townhome features 3 king bedrooms. The unit also provides 1 garage parking space and 1 dedicated parking space behind the townhome. Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Contemporary Asheville Home with Firepit & Hot Tub
description:
Come experience the feel of a majestically cozy, modern and contemporary mountain home, and soak in the true high-end luxury and grandeur that is Trails End Retreat.
Set privately at the end of a wooded street, directly bordering the Pisgah National Forest; Trails End Retreat offers a truly spectacular and unique Blue Ridge Mountain vacation experience.

name: Upscale family oasis. Close to everything. Hot tub
description: Upscale Mountain Retreat. Stunning Views. Perfect Location - private & quiet yet 15 min to DT/Biltmore/Breweries/Hiking. New Hot Tub. Super Clean. Spacious. High End Furnishings. Well Stocked Kitchen. Two Big Living Areas - 2 Fireplaces (wood/gas). Huge Decks - Covered Dining/Weber Grill/Fire Table/Hammock Chair. Fun Indoor/Outdoor Amenities - pool/ping pong table, air hockey, outdoor fire pit, corn hole, horse shoes. OWNER PERSONALLY OVERSEES, not mgmt company! Pls see rules before booking.

name: River Arts District "Treehouse" (30+ day)
description:
We are open for business! Come support the artists of the River Arts district, the community could really use your help!

Need a place for a month or more? Why stay at an expensive and small hotel room?!

Location, location, location! This green-certified, 3-story house is on a quiet street with little traffic but within a short walk to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, and the French Broad river greenway. 6 mins drive to Mission Hospital and 8 mins to UNCA.

name: West Asheville Peaceful Oasis w/ Private Entrance
description:
Peacefully tucked away near West Asheville. After a day of exploring all Asheville has to offer, kick back and relax at our quiet suite. Come and go as you please with the private entrance. Enjoy the intimate, lighted deck, luxury king bed, movie projector, and coffee + amenities. You will be less than 10 min from the heart of super hip West Asheville and less than 15 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Downtown.
Note: up to 2 dogs allowed ($10 pet fee). Sorry NO CATS allowed, highly allergic.

name: Modern home - Mtn views-4 miles to Downtown AVL
description: Relax and unwind with the whole family or friends in our new modern home nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Sit out on the spacious deck to watch the sunset and view the gorgeous mountains, or sit by the fire pit and enjoy the sounds of the birds and sometimes turkeys.  Within walking distance of Reynolds Village, which is filled with delicious restaurants and unique shops, while just minutes drive to downtown Asheville (6 minutes).

name: Your adventure starts here.
description: The Excitement starts here! Fresh air and open spaces. Having a North Carolina adventure is just naturally amazing. Quiet cul-de-sac just 5 minutes from airport & WNC Agricultural Center. Easy access to hiking, canoeing, sightseeing, biking or just enjoying nature. Entrance to Blue Ridge Parkway just 15 minutes away.  Convenient to both Asheville and Hendersonville for shopping and entertainment. The perfect get away.   Sorry no pets or children!

name: Comes with a cat. Walk to River Arts & Downtown
description: Perfect for solo travelers and couples looking for close proximity to Downtown, River Arts, and South Slope. Thoughtful amenities provided to make your stay as comfortable as possible, including a friendly cat co-host!

name: BearsDenAVL, modern 3 bed/2 bath in Asheville
description: This cottage is nestled on 2 acres in the heart of Asheville. Hang out or hide out, you're just minutes from town in this 3 bed 2 full bath with an attached  garage. Modern updates make it easy to relax after you ride your bike up to the Blue Ridge Parkway or work from home from a built-in office nook. The extended deck invites you to enjoy coffee in the woods.

name: The Library,  a book-filled nook in West Asheville
description: A cozy library bedroom in a writer's house one block off the main road in walkable West Asheville. Separate entrance, access to patio and yard with walking path, swing, and hammock. Adjacent property is a tiny working farm plot.

name: Private POOL & HOT TUB; Family-friendly Retreat
description: Stay-Swim-Soak-Sleep. Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place in Fletcher, North Carolina, in the foothills of the legendary Blue Ridge Mountains. Centrally located to both Asheville & Hendersonville, this spacious 4-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental features amenities like a full kitchen, 65” smart TV, Sonos soundbar, free WiFi, indoor gas fireplace, private in-ground swimming POOL, new HOT TUB SPA, fully fenced-in backyard, & outdoor gas grill – perfect for summer night barbeques.

name: Adorable Historic Renovation North of Downtown
description: Charming 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 2nd level above the Chop Shop. The center of town is less than a mile away, a 2 minute uber/Lyft ride to all of downtown restaurants and shops. There is one parking space for this rental located in the parking lot beside and behind the King James Building. This parking lot is shared with City Bakery and the Bone and Broth Restaurant so there are no assigned spaces.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Historic Two Bedroom Charlotte Street Condo
description: Two king bedroom/one bathroom condo on the 3rd level. Downtown is less than a mile away, and the building is also home to City Bakery and Bone & Broth restaurants. There is one parking space for this rental located in the parking lot beside and behind the building, and you may park wherever you like as there are no assigned spaces. This neighborhood is known for tree-lined streets, fantastic restaurants and includes the famed Grove Park Inn. *Please note: There is no elevator in the building*

name: Charming Montford Oasis, 5 Min. Walk to Downtown
description:
2025 Update: Asheville is welcoming guests and so are we!

The Oasis is a private suite in quiet historical Montford. Park for free and walk everywhere - 3 blocks to Harrah’s Cherokee Center and downtown Asheville, with restaurants, shops, breweries & entertainment. Our cozy suite features original artwork, hand-painted furniture, cotton linens & comfy bed. You'll have a private bath & bright dining nook with coffee, tea & snacks. Guest wing with private entrance. Spotless - low cleaning fee!

name: Walk to Downtown; Great outdoor living space
description: Located in a walkable downtown neighborhood on a quiet street surrounded by forested mountains. The best of both worlds!

name: Beautiful, cozy home just minutes to downtown.
description: Beautiful 5 bedroom retreat just 4 minutes from vibrant downtown Asheville. Less than one mile to Beaver Lake and the accompanying bird sanctuary. Quiet spot with plentiful parking and nearby to grocery stores and  local restaurants. Newly designed and furnished stylish unit with a secret bedroom and an abundance of natural light. Large covered porch for dining or simply enjoying time with friends and family. A short distance from several popular hiking trails and the Biltmore house.

name: The Little House on Beaucatcher
description: Private Guest Home surrounded by 50 Acres of woods Less than 1 Mile from Downtown Asheville! - Bedroom w/ queen bed and plenty of closet space. Living room has Smart TV and a full-sized pull-out sleeper. Fully equipped kitchen for longer stays. Unwind on the deck in the wooded backyard while enjoying a cup of coffee or glass of wine and soak in the mountain air. Easy 15-minute walk on the local trails (or 5 min. drive) to downtown Asheville, less than 1 hr to skiing and 20 min to the airport.

name: MTN VIEWS/ 1 Min to Downtown Asheville/ Peaceful
description:
ENTIRE APARTMENT. NOT A SHARED SPACE. THE OWNER HAS A SEPARATE APARTMENT IN THE BASEMENT

Indulge in a private designer retreat, perfectly located with mountain views and a serene communal garden. Situated on the National City Bike Trail and within easy walking distance to downtown Asheville, it’s ideal for digital nomads or travelers seeking effortless access to the Biltmore Estate, top restaurants, breweries, and vibrant entertainment, including live music venues—all without the need to drive.

name: 3BR/2BA Short/Mid/Long-Term in West AVL & Dogs OK!
description: Welcome to Ashevilleshire Cottage. Fantastic West AVL convenient location - Easy access to the best that Asheville has to offer. Five mins to Haywood Rd, 10 mins to DT AVL, 15 to Blue Ridge Parkway, 15 mins to Biltmore, 15 mins to hiking/biking trails, dozens of breweries/wineries within mins.  Covered front porch, private back deck w/grill, open floor plan, 2020 construction, dog accepted, 3BR/2BA, fast WiFi, smart TVs, private and in Asheville! House is on a main road so some traffic noise.

name: Newly Remodeled Cheerful  Home Centrally Located
description: Centrally-located  Cheerful mountain home located in the heart of Asheville.  Just a few short minutes to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore House, BlueRidge Parkway, French Broad River, Grove Park Inn, Grocery stores, and all the wonderful things that Asheville has to offer. It can sleep up to 5 and has a huge yard for outdoor activities with plenty parking. Come experience Asheville's awesome local food scene, shopping and abundant outdoor activities such as hiking, kayaking, tubing, parks, and more

name: NY Style-STR 3 mi to Mission & 1 Mi to Downtown
description: Amazing Location! Garage!Beautiful, NY Style Townhome…light & Bright in a quiet, safe, charming neighborhood. Writers as long-term guests, travel nurses, sport bikers, interns  & remote professionals. Small-complex! This unit is the front part of the duplex with lots of windows and light, + your own 1 car garage. 1 mile to downtown! Walk to UNC, the tennis/b-ball courts, Farmer's market & biking trails. We are 3 miles to the mission hospital & the Biltmore! The Grove Park Inn is only 5 min.

name: Private Bedroom in Creekside Home
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Blue Sky Manor by CM | Cozy Hot Tub & Rec Room
description: Blue Sky Manor welcomes you to Asheville in style! Conveniently located just south of Downtown Asheville, and only 2 miles to shopping and restaurants, this home is truly an elegant escape for all seasons with a hot tub and mountain views. Tons of natural light, gracious living spaces, and top-of-the-line furnishings define this luxurious 5,500-square-foot estate.

name: NY Style Lofty Home 1 mile to downtown,ski,hike
description:
Amazing Location! Guests love this location! North Asheville- Short term, spacious, monthly rental. Hike, bike, or ski. 1 Car Garage!
Peaceful townhome & only 1 mile to downtown AVL, 5 min drive to the Omni Grove Park Inn, 3 mi to the Biltmore & to the Mission Hospital. Many happy doctors, nurses, guest & professionals have stayed at our complex…spacious 3 bedroom 2.5 bath townhouse with 2 levels. Chirping birds are outside your door. Close to Harris Teeter’s, Trader Joe’s, & Whole Foods.

name: The Howell House
description:
This is a NON-SMOKING and NO PET house.

Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway located approximately 8 miles from downtown Asheville, NC. Relax in the rocking chairs on the porch & at night listen to the frogs.


Attractions nearby are the Biltmore House, Grove Park Inn, lots of local & cultural foods downtown, many local breweries, cycling routes, ski resorts nearby, hiking on the Blue Ridge Parkway and many gorgeous Mountain View’s.

We have WiFi, smart TV with tv and movie apps.

name: Cozy Bedroom with private Bath in West Asheville
description: You will enjoy your own private bedroom, queen bed, and a private full bath in West Asheville townhouse - just 2 miles from city center and 1 mile from fun and hip Haywood Rd I just updated the room with new paint and Sony TV. The Adventure Park is within walking distance for an afternoon zip-lining or mountain biking. You can also walk to the Crown Plaza Resort for tennis, golf, salt water pool, fitness center, and spa. You’ll be just 5 min drive from the breweries, Haywood Rd, or downtown.

name: Peaceful Cottage tucked away in Asheville
description: Come relax in a quiet and peaceful cottage tucked away in Asheville! Two minutes from the Biltmore House, five minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway and 10 minutes from downtown AVL and the River Arts District. Come with your partner and enjoy a king sized bed and suite or bring your family of four to a safe and private home with room to play outside! The cottage is a separate building and I live right next door. Kick your feet up after a day of exploring and relax in my peaceful spot of the city!

name: Blue Ridge Getaway
description:
Yes! We are open for business after the hurricane!

Relax with the whole family at this peaceful lower-level apartment. If you're lucky you may see a friendly visit from a curious bear!

**Be sure to add any pets to the reservation when booking**

name: Luxury Camping Experience Asheville
description:
We know you will enjoy the privacy of this luxury camper nestled in the woods.
Our spacious comfortable luxury camper is situated on a beautiful parklike setting!
All the comforts of home:
2 Central Heat/Air units
King Bed
Twin Sized couch bed
Electric Fireplace
Refrigerator
Cathedral Ceilings
Paddle Fan
Walk in Shower
Large Screen TV
Wifi-may
Awning
Fire Pit
Gas Grill
This unique property and camper awaits your arrival!
Must be at least 25 years of age to book.

name: Upstairs Apartment with kitchenette
description:
The space is one of peaceful, quiet and thoughtful design.  You will feel it as soon as you walk in.
You have a Private living room with
with a dedicated working area desk, TV with more then 200 channels, Couch
*Bar setup
Room Fridge
Microwave
Coffee maker
Toaster
Silverware
Private thermostat.
Cooling Fan

Private bathroom
Walk in shower

Private bedroom
Queen bed

name: A four bedroom gem in heart of downtown Asheville
description: Looking to vacation in Asheville? Considering  moving to this wonderful city? Search no more! Our welcoming  family friendly, pet friendly home in the central yet quiet location is close to EVERYTHING! With an oversized porch, a welcoming deck and a fully fenced in back yard, mountain views yet walking distance to everything downtown Asheville has to offer;  stores, coffee shops and restaurants, all just around the corner. Short drive to the most beautiful hiking trails, lakes and mountains.

name: Cozy Mountain Cabin Close to Downtown!
description:
Get ready to relax in this cozy cabin in a quiet wooded neighborhood less than six miles to the heart of downtown Asheville!
Enjoy privacy, quiet and solitude in your spacious guest suite. In room coffee, mini fridge, microwave and guest essentials all provided.
You'll find this central location ideal for excursions in all directions. Minutes to downtown restaurants and breweries, the Blue Ridge Parkway, West Asheville, the River Arts District and more. Sorry, no pets.

name: Mins to Asheville/Peaceful/Secluded/Large Groups
description: Experience peacefulness in our country home just minutes from all the attractions of Asheville! Set on 2 acres, our property immerses you in nature with two decks for outdoor living. Perfect for families or large groups, we provide multiple areas for gathering. Parents or couples will appreciate the privacy afforded by our 4bd/3.5ba's, while kids will enjoy the ample outdoor space to run and play. Take in the city's food scene or the outdoor activities of West NC, and then relax in serenity!

name: Studio Apartment Close to Downtown Family Friendly
description: This newly-renovated space is the perfect base for exploring Asheville & beyond. Just 2.5 miles from the heart of downtown and 5 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway, you could follow up a day of hiking with a beer and burger at one of Asheville's top notch breweries. Come back after a day of exploring & enjoy a campfire in the backyard before heading off to sleep in your super comfortable, brand new bed. Kids will love playing on the playhouse with slide, monkey bars, sandbox & climbing wall.

name: Montford Bungalow
description: You'll be staying in the heart of Montford's  historic neighborhood with the lovely weirdness of downtown Asheville, less than a mile away.  There, you will find the Drumming circle,  great restaurants, many breweries, pottery studios, boutique shopping, glass blowing, street buskers and art galleries.

name: Secluded Dog Friendly suite near AVL. Come escape!
description: Relax at this fun getaway in a gated, wooded community. Queen sleeps two. Kitchenette with coffee/tea. Bathroom w/tub. Non working fireplace. WiFi, TV for Netflix etc.  Just minutes to the Asheville airport, stores, breweries, restaurants + more. Funky Downtown Asheville, Historic Hendersonville + BlueRidge Pkwy are a short car ride away. Dog friendly but please bring your crate if dog needs to be left alone. Use of back patio too. Fire pit in back yard and small grill in carport are available.

name: Historic Cottage in Montford *2 Blks Downtown
description:
Welcome to the Sallie Lee Cottage! We hope you will enjoy your stay in Asheville in this charmingly renovated Historic Montford Cottage!
The Sallie Lee Cottage is amongst the oldest homes in Asheville and is believed to have been built around 1883. This amazing Cottage has been well preserved and restored to her former glory.
Located less than 1 mile from downtown Asheville!

name: Cozy Bungalow 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville
description: Go visit downtown Asheville or West Asheville for some excitement, great dining, art and music (in 10 minutes!) or stay in, cozy up by the fire pit and relax.  This little bungalow has a fully fenced in yard and can satisfy your every mood and make you feel like you've been here all your life.

name: Grandmamas Cottage - Convenient location minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore, Shopping, and more!
description: Convenient 2 bedroom cottage, walking distance to Asheville Outlets, dining and more. Just 5 minute drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway and the NC Arboretum,  15 minutes to downtown Asheville and The Biltmore Estate.  After a day of exploring the beauty of Western North Carolina come home and relax by the fire or snuggle up and enjoy the 60 inch TV with multiple streaming services, wifi and cable. Both bedrooms have queen beds, smart tvs and cable. There is a sleeper sofa and fully stocked kitchen.

name: Near Rabbit Rabbit Salvage Station Peel Queen Bed
description: Charming 1927 bungalow Queen sized bed in the heart of West Asheville, seven minutes from downtown Asheville. We go the extra mile to make your stay perfect.

name: Spacious and private retreat - fire pit, hammock
description: Tucked away at the end of a quiet horseshoe drive, this spacious home offers both privacy and convenience. The home exudes character and warmth. The inviting covered front porch is perfect for relaxing, while the expansive, fenced backyard is a true highlight—ideal for outdoor activities, al fresco dining, or even remote work, offering a peaceful retreat. Just steps from vibrant West Asheville, you’re within walking distance to local breweries, and a variety of shops and restaurants.

name: Private Studio Apartment- Walkable to Downtown
description: Studio Apartment w/ kitchenette, walking distance to downtown Asheville and many of Asheville’s best Restaurants, bars, shopping amenities, and 2 parks.

name: "Sol" Your place in amazing West Asheville
description:
This room with a private entrance and private bathroom is a part of our family home building. It is the perfect fit to all welcoming normal life traffic during the day, and enjoy quiet times at night. Check out the map on this site for specific distances.
Based on our personal needs, absolutely no animals are allowed.
Long term stays for 1 person only.
Security cameras in the parking area.

name: "Luna" Your place in amazing West Asheville
description:
This room with a private entrance and private bathroom is a part of our family home building. It is the perfect fit to all welcoming normal life traffic during the day, and enjoy quiet times at night. Check out the map on this site for specific distances.
Based on our personal needs, absolutely no animals are allowed.
Long term stays for 1 person only.
Security cameras in the parking area.

name: Hot Tub, Short Drive To Downtown, 2 Bed, 2 Bath!
description: Come enjoy this comfy, bright West Asheville home, in a friendly, walkable neighbourhood. Please note, our home and area of town were not directly affected by the flooding, however areas of Asheville around the rivers are in need of rebuilding. We invite you to stay and enjoy the many local businesses that will be open and in need of support. Please feel free to message me with any questions you may have about our wonderful town post Helene. It is still a very lovely place with lots to do!!

name: Sauna and Healing Sanctuary
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. This space is a quiet place away from the bustle of the city, but still very central. Haywood road in wrst Asheville and downtown are both accessible in 10-15 minutes by car.

Included is a sauna and a massage room, so you can truly recover and recuperate. The massage room is also equipped with a queen Murphy bed so there's ample space to spread out and have multiple private sleeping spaces.

name: Charming Downtown 2nd Floor Unit
description:
Private 1 bedroom apartment on the second floor of a historic building. This is a walk up so no elevator is available.
Great location very easily walkable to everything downtown Asheville has to offer. Also, a very short walk to the south slope.
Eat-in kitchen with full size appliances. Pots/pans and basic cooking utensils included.
Bedroom is spacious with a queen sized bed and walk-in closet, TV.
Full bathroom with large tub. Shampoo, conditioner, soap and all linens included.

name: Asheville Abound
description:
The house has power, potable water and WiFi!

The roads are abl



This is a split-level home that sits upon a hill surrounded by trees! There are two living rooms and two laundry rooms. The living room downstairs has theater seating for four people. There is a gas fireplace downstairs that is seasonal from October - March. A fire pit is available outside all year! Bring firewood and enjoy s'mores!! The home is surrounded by trees and very quiet. Shopping and eateries are only 1.5 miles away.

name: Sweet Apartment- Walkable to downtown
description:
Relax in Historic Montford while still being able to conveniently walk downtown to everything Asheville has to offer!
Suite apartment w/ kitchenette, walking distance to downtown Asheville and many of Asheville’s best Restaurants, bars, shopping amenities, and 2 parks.

name: House in Historic Montford. 10% off July-Sept.
description: This is a 30 Day minimum rental only. (unless calendar shows shorter gap) Quaint 2 story House walking distance to downtown in a great neighborhood. This 2 story 1272 sq. ft. house was built by Horace and Barbara Seeley in 1925. Located within walking distance to downtown, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Harris Teeter, Grove Arcade, restaurants and coffee shops. It's located on a quiet street with off street parking. Stroll around beautiful historic Montford or access the Greenway for a walk or run.

name: Cozy and Bright One Bedroom Condo
description:
*These units overlook a construction project, and the hours of operation are 8am - 7pm weekdays, 10am - 7pm on Saturdays, and off on Sundays. The rates have been adjusted to reflect this inconvenience*

Charming 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 2nd level above the Chop Shop. The center of town is less than a mile away, easy walk or 2 min uber/Lyft ride to all of downtown restaurants and shops. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Historic Charlotte Street Condo
description: Two king bedroom, one bath condo on the 3rd level above the Chop Shop. Downtown is less than a mile away or a 2 min uber/Lyft ride to all of downtown restaurants and shops. There is one parking space for this rental located in the parking lot beside and behind the King James Building. This parking lot is shared with City Bakery and the Bone and Broth Restaurant so there are no assigned spaces. The majestic Grove Park Inn is a short ride away as well. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Fabulous Loft in the Heart of Downtown
description:
Thank you for visiting Asheville and helping us get back to normal after the hurricane! The city is open for business and excited for visitors!

*******

This wonderful loft features beautiful hardwood floors, high exposed ceilings, and a professionally designed interior to create a bright and relaxing space. 

Located in the heart of Asheville's lively and vibrant culture, the home offers the best location in the city.  Y

name: Monthly rental, Lovely Montford Home
description: Monthly Rental. Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located home.  Built in 1925 and updated in 2015 you enjoy the Montford experience of Historic Asheville.  Walk to restaurants, parks and UNC-A.

name: Biltmore Village Gem
description: This spacious, renovated, historic Biltmore Village condo is perfect for your Asheville getaway. Located in the heart of Biltmore Village near the entrance to the Biltmore Estate. It is also located a short ride into downtown Asheville and other nearby attractions. This large two bedroom and two bathroom condo features an additional trundle bed and sleeper sofa. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Amazing Town Mountain Getaway
description: Escape to this charming mountain cottage, nestled in the heart of Town Mountain. The roundel design adds a unique touch to this cozy retreat, making it a perfect spot for a relaxing mountain getaway. This 2 bedroom home features a king primary bedroom, with ensuite half bath and king second bedroom, full bathroom and a queen sleeper sofa. Access the private, 30-ft wide terrace from the living room.  The unit also provides 2 parking space near the entrance of the cottage.

name: "The Birdhouse" Eclectic Mountain Vibes w/ a view
description:
Mountain Views and sunsets from our expansive deck will have you breathing deep and feeling inspired.

This spectacular space was creatively & craftily curated with in-house art and global decor. Our home is always singing with birds & chimes and known for adorable bear visits.

Just 3 minutes to downtown and 12 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, whether you're feeling city adventures or ready to pull on your hiking boots, our location on the famous Town Mountain Road is unmatched.

;)

name: Modern South Slope Townhome with City Views
description: Stunning southside city views, outdoor space, and contemporary design in this sunny and conveniently located condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This three bedroom, 3.5 bath townhome also provides 1 garage parking space and 1 dedicated parking space behind the unit. Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Asheville Proud South Slope Townhome
description: Stunning southside city views, outdoor space, and contemporary design in this new-build, walkable condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom features 3 king bedrooms, and 3.5 bathrooms. The unit also provides a double garage. Located in the South Slope Brewery District and walkable to everything downtown. #AshevilleProud *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Cozy Haw Creek Retreat
description: Located in Haw Creek, in convenient East Asheville. We are 4.1 miles from downtown and 2.1 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway. This private guest suite is in a quiet neighborhood surrounded by trees and wildlife. The renovated space was completed in late 2021 and has its own private entrance, deck, and hot tub.

name: Historic Montford,  Private Suite, walk to town
description:
*Spacious 580 SF couples suite
*240 SF deck with seating group
*Luxury bath with a clawfoot tub, double vanity and walk-in shower
*Walk-in closet with shelves/hangers
*Snack center with sink, microwave, refrigerator/freezer, & coffee maker
*Dishes, utensils, coffee supplies
*Dedicated off street parking
*Room thermostat
*TV with Spectrum channels and sports, Netflix, Amazon Prime, and PBS
*Strong internet and work table
*Seating area with USB charging
*Queen bed with dual night stands

name: Walkable West Avl Studio Apt with King Bed
description:
Welcome to Gnomaste, a private guest suite located in the heart of personality-filled, walkable
West Asheville. We are a short walk from sought-after eateries, breweries, and coffee shops
and just a 5-minute drive from downtown Asheville. Make Gnomaste your hub from which to
enjoy the best that Asheville has to offer. Our home is new construction in a charming historic
neighborhood. Get the best of both worlds: enjoy desirable West Asheville while enjoying the
comforts of a new home.

name: Industrial Modern, walkable W. AVL, shops and bars
description: Industrial modern 1-bedroom downstairs efficiency, conveniently located in West Asheville. Sleeps four; one Tempur-pedic mattress, one pull-out couch.
