Shops, bars and amazing restaurants are within a short walking distance. Izzy's Coffee Shop, Leo's House of Thirst, Up-Country Brewery and the Odditorium within a 5 minute walk. Downtown Asheville 7-minutes by car. Bent Creek, Arboretum and Blue Ridge Parkway 15-minute drive.

name: Hidden Hills Top Floor One Bedroom
description:
Unwind in the tranquil mountains with Hidden Hills! A comfortable one-bedroom home nestled in the heart of West Asheville awaits your visit.

We just installed a hot tub in the back yard, so you can soak with a view of the garden! Photos are coming soon. The house is walkable to bars, restaurants and boutiques on Haywood.

Please note that a long term tenant stays in the basement unit. The units are completely private with separate entrances, but you may hear some noise.

name: Vintage Norwood Carriage House
description:
Vintage Norwood is a 1930's intimate small carriage house located in the heart of North Asheville in historic Norwood Park. It's just a 5 minute drive to downtown, 10 minutes to Biltmore and a 3 minute drive to the Grove Park Inn. We are located in a walk-able neighborhood with beautiful homes and gardens.

The upstairs apartment features one bedroom, one bath, an eat-in kitchen & small living room. It’s across the courtyard from our home & features glorious wood craftsmanship throughout.

name: Casa Blanca N. Asheville Retreat
description: Enjoy a delightful stay held in nature at this stunning and bright 3BR home affectionately named “Casa Blanca", just 10 minutes from the center of Asheville! Feel the expansiveness of the lawn wrapped with privacy from the surrounding woods 1+ acre of lush land. Set up for 6 & Sleeps up to 8 .

name: Hillcrest Hideaway-Entire Home 10 Minutes to DT
description: This private, comfortable, new construction home is less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and Haywood Rd. Corridor (West AVL or "Locals Downtown").  Nature-filled .5 acre backyard has all the privacy with a fire pit, Adirondack chairs and more. Spacious deck ready to enjoy our perfect climate. Open floorplan on main level and bonus room upstairs complete with a large table ready for remote work and board games after a long day of adventure.

name: North Asheville Guest House
description: Unwind at this cozy hideaway. This home was lovingly built with high-beamed ceilings and mix of modern and antique flare for a plush and charming feel. This house is located in north Asheville. Although downtown is located 10 minutes away, this home is tucked into a peaceful neighborhood, surrounded by wildlife. Dog friendly with one allowed. No cats.

name: Cozy Cottage Downtown/Biltmore!
description:
Like new updated cottage near town with private back deck and fenced in yard for dogs. Only 3 miles to downtown, this lovely home has been recently updated with new kitchen cabinets, tile in the bathroom and much more. 3 bedrooms and 2 living rooms (1 with available extra sleeping) make this the perfect spot to visit Asheville yet have your own space for grilling and relaxing with friends while your pets play in the big back yard.

Dogs are allowed but no cats please.

name: Cozy Studio w/ private entrance near Asheville
description: Enjoy an affordable stay in this bright and cozy studio apartment. The space is located close to the Asheville Regional Airport and I-26. It’s about 20 minutes from Downtown Asheville, 13 minutes to the Biltmore Estate, and about 15 minutes from Mission Hospital. Explore tons of nearby breweries, restaurants, shopping, and hiking trails. The calendar fills up fast, book soon so you don’t miss out!

name: Downtown Home in Walking Distance of City Center
description:
*** 30 Day Minimum Rental *** to comply with Asheville ordinance.
Newly Remodeled 100 year old home in downtown Asheville. This home has all of the old school charm with the new home feel. Tons of refinished original wood and textured plaster walls. All new appliances. Two Bedrooms, One Bathroom, Full Kitchen, Formal Dining Room, Laundry Room, Off Street Parking. 2nd bedroom has option of switching from queen bed to bunk beds for kiddos if needed. WiFi, internet, cable included.

name: Charming 2-bedroom cottage minutes from downtown
description: Decompress at this peaceful cottage under the canopy of an established Asheville neighborhood. Children and pets will enjoy its large fenced-in yard. Perfectly situated to access all of WNC's natural and cultural destinations. Minutes from downtown and Biltmore and just one street away from the golf course, this newly renovated cottage is fully permitted by the city of Asheville (per city code, well-equipped kitchenette).

name: May Special! Mtn Home - 5 mi to town - Spa
description:
Enjoy mountain living while only 5 miles from downtown Asheville! Located on Elk Mountain Scenic Hwy, a beautiful mountain road leading to the Blue Ridge Pkwy and is a major destination for road cyclists. Only minutes for N. Asheville and downtown. Plus enjoy our hot tub!

Our home was NOT damaged by Helene. We leased to a family with home damage so home was off market. We are happy to share we are beginning rentals again on May 1st - See our discounted May rates!

name: Asheville Riverside Bungalow Close to Downtown+RAD
description:
Sweet 2 bedroom 2 bathroom 1920s bungalow minutes from downtown Asheville! This house is walking distance to parks, walking trails, and coffee along the French Broad River. This location is easily accessible to amazing food, culture, and outdoor recreation.

Enjoy the charms of yesteryear with high ceilings, wood floors, butcher block counters, and the spacious claw foot tub. This home has a master suite, another full bathroom, and large walk in closets to accommodate a variety of needs.

name: Elevation Lofts Boutique Hotel - Unit 301
description: Single-level “flat” corner unit with windows facing Broadway Street and a cozy gas fireplace in the living room. It sleeps 4 people with 2 bedrooms (1 King bed and 1 Queen bed), both with en-suite bathrooms (1 with shower and 1 with tub/shower combination). Dining space on center island includes 5 barstools.

name: Elevation Lofts Boutique Hotel- Unit 302
description: Two-level unit with windows facing Broadway Street, a cozy gas fireplace in the living room, and a large living/dining area. It sleeps 4 people in 2 bedrooms (both with King beds), both with en-suite bathrooms with showers. One of the two bedrooms/bathrooms is on an upstairs mezzanine level. The main level bathroom has a roll-in shower. Kitchen and laundry appliances are ADA-compliant. Center island has 4 barstools and large custom dining table seats 6.

name: Elevation Lofts Boutique Hotel - Unit 304
description: Single-level “flat” corner unit. It sleeps 4 people with 2 bedrooms (1 King and 1 Queen) and 2 bathrooms (both with showers, one en-suite with King bedroom, and one directly across hall from Queen bedroom). Center island has 4 barstools and dining table seats 6.

name: Elevation Lofts Boutique Hotel - Unit 305
description: Two-level unit that is ideal for families. It sleeps up to 7 people, with 1 King bedroom, 1 Queen bedroom, plus an additional “flex” room furnished with a bunked Full bed & Twin bed. It has 2 en-suite bathrooms with showers. Living room includes fireplace and center island has 4 bar stools.

name: Elevation Lofts Boutique Hotel - Unit 306
description: Single-level “flat” corner unit. It sleeps 4 people with 2 bedrooms (1 King bed and 1 Queen bed) and 2 en-suite bathrooms with showers. Dining table seats 4.

name: Cozy 3-bedroom cottage 12 mins from downtown AVL
description:
Easy access to all the outdoor activities, restaurants, and breweries of Asheville- just 15 minutes from downtown!
Staying in? Grab a plush blanket and have a picnic in the grassy backyard. Finish off your serene day around the crackling fire pit and enjoy the starry skies just outside of the city.
Ready for adventure? Enjoy a cup of coffee on the tucked in back porch before your day exploring town or on the Blue Ridge Parkway.
This is the perfect place to call home during your mountain getaway.

name: Delightful Brewery District Three Bedroom
description:
Stunning southside views, outdoor space, and luxe design in this new-build, centrally located condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom features 3 king bedrooms, and 3.5 bathrooms and also provides garage parking for 1 midsize car and a 2nd assigned space outside, a private elevator, and rooftop terrace. The Biltmore Estate and the Grove Park Inn are also just a short drive away.
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property.

name: Chic Southside Three King Bedroom Townhome
description: Stunning southside city views, outdoor space, and contemporary design in this new-build, walkable condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom features 3 king bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms. The unit also provides garage parking for two compact cars and a rooftop terrace. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Firefly Cove Guesthouse
description: Step away from it all and relax in this newly renovated guesthouse.  Only 10-15 minutes from everything Asheville has to offer, this property is the perfect, peaceful setting for couples or small families. Enjoy a stress-free, first morning with local bread and eggs from our chickens.  A full kitchen with new appliances and everything you need to cook elaborate meals, an open living area with huge windows looking out at trees and gardens, all make this the perfect sanctuary.

name: 2B/1B Private entrance Suite in Sweet Location!
description:
Welcome friends & fellow travelers! This listing is for the entire upstairs of my 1915 home. Enjoy more privacy and feel more secure while traveling. Come and go easily with keyless entry. I’m biased but we do have THE BEST location. 😁

With advance notice, we can pick up your family/group at the airport.

I’m also happy to coordinate special on-site events & experiences such as spa time, cheese & wine, dessert bar, wellness experiences, readings, food tours, celebratory gift baskets, etc.

name: West Asheville Garden Retreat
description: Enjoy friendly West Asheville during a stay in our garden suite, tucked away on a quiet but convenient street with old trees, sidewalks, and lots of birdsong.

name: Bent Creek Complete Apartment
description:
Peaceful and fully furnished Bent Creek apartment - in the woods and close to town!

Right next to Bent Creek Forest and the NC Arboretum, this well-appointed apartment's location is perfect to leave the house on-foot or on two wheels and access some of the Asheville area's most beautiful nature trails.

2 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, 10 minutes to West Asheville's Haywood Road, 15 minutes to Downtown Asheville and 0 minutes to Western North Carolina Paradise!

name: Art Deco Building Condo w/Private 50 ft Terrace
description: Stunning city views, outdoor space & contemporary design in this Historic Art- Deco building in downtown Asheville. This 4th floor 2BR features a large living room, 2 king bedrooms, each with private baths and an additional king bed in the loft.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: *Asheville’s Misty Mountain Pet Friendly Suite*
description:
* Relax at Misty Mountain Pet Friendly Studio Apartment while enjoying Asheville*
*Swim or Relax in our Swim Spa*
*No Cleaning Fee*
*Your apartment suite is private and quiet but close to so much!*
*Covered Patio with fire pit and beautiful views*
*Excellent Water Pressure*
*Pets Welcome*
*1 Mile to Crest Pavilion*
*5.9Miles to Biltmore Estate*
*4.4Miles to Downtown Asheville*
*3.3Miles to West Asheville center*
*3.4Miles to New Belgium Brewery*
*4.6Miles to Wicked Weed Brewery*

name: Charming and Modern 1-bedroom Asheville Log Cabin
description: Live both rustic and modern in this fully equipped and newly renovated historic log cabin! Asheville living at its best...

name: Secluded 2 Bedroom yurt with a view- Bennets yurt
description: Secluded 2 bedroom Yurt with a view. This is a unique property that allows you to be close to nature and not skimp on amenities. Though you will feel you are remote, you will be only 15-20 minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore, Black Mountain, multiple breweries and restaurants. The Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains to Sea Trail will be literally right out the door.  The yurt has a 30 foot diameter making it a little over 700 sq feet.

name: Chic Retreat:walk to Downtown:Sunset view
description: Plan for an exceptional vacation experience at this chic centrally-located home in DT AVL. Let this be your home base in the heart of AVL. Walkable to all things downtown, yet in a peaceful neighborhood. Enjoy sunset & city views from the front porch daybed.  Open floor plan & fully equipped modern kitchen.  Quality amenities. Butterfly attracting herb gardens throughout the property.  Guests can harvest herbs and fruit, fresh mint, lavendar, rosemary, peaches & figs.

name: Pet Friendly South Asheville Hot Tub Townhome
description: South Asheville Townhome, with outdoor space, and contemporary design. This 3-bedroom townhome features two king and one queen bedrooms. Located in South Asheville, drivable to shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. The Biltmore Park and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Pet Friendly Contemporary Townhome Hot Tub
description: South Asheville Townhome, with outdoor space, and contemporary design. This 3-bedroom townhome features two king and one queen bedrooms. Located in South Asheville, drivable to shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. The Biltmore Park and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: ❀Nurses/WFH❀ Cozy Apt by RAD, Mission & Downtown
description:
Enjoy a cozy stay at this centrally-located guest suite, just two miles to downtown, 5 minutes to the trendy River Arts District, and 5 minutes to Mission Hospital! The immediate neighborhood is quiet, while being convenient to all Asheville has to offer.

This is a perfect home base for exploring the local arts and food scene and for adventures in the surrounding mountains. It's an ideal spot for couples, solo adventurers, travel nurses, and business travelers.

name: River Cottage
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally located place. River Cottage is located only a 7 minutes drive  to Asheville Downtown, 5 minutes to Haywood/Montford street restaurants, 5 minutes to River Art District and 20 minutes to Blue Ridge Parkway. Only a few minutes walk to French Broad River. Perfect location to enjoy a peaceful mountain setting tucked in trees while being so close to many entertainments (kayaking, breweries, hiking, tubing, downtown and more).

name: Accepting Guests – Spacious 4BR Near AVL Airport
description:
The home features 8 skylights which welcomes blissful natural sunlight to pair perfectly with your morning brew! Or cuddle up with a book on the swinging bench in the front porch. Sleeps up to 9 guests
Located in Arden, just 5 miles from the Asheville Regional Airport and conveniently located to everything on your Asheville bucket-list!

✔ 4 Comfortable BRs
✔ 2 Living Areas
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Board Games
✔ Covered Patio + Yard
✔ Smart TV
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Free Parking

See more below!

name: Sunset Retreat | Hideaway
description:
Pets with additional $75 per pet. (2 pets maximum)

A comfortable and convenient home with easy access to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, River Arts District, and so much more! Bring the family and explore Asheville like a local. You’ve planned an Asheville weekend filled with scenic hikes, incredible eats, and the world’s greatest brewery hop, but have you thought about where you’re going to kick back and relax after all that hustle?

name: The Magnolia Lodge - 9 minutes to downtown AVL
description: Welcome to the Magnolia lodge, a cozy retreat in the Blue Ridge mountains just 1 minute from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 9 minutes from downtown AVL. This rare location feels private, yet is minutes from pack square, restaurants and breweries. This 1930's historical home has been preserved to maintain its historic charm, relax and enjoy stepping back in time.

name: Perfect Downtown Pad!
description: In the thick of downtown this small but stylish condo is the perfect monthly rental for anyone spending an extended stay in town.  Minutes from EVERYTHING!  The condo includes soundproofing for a peaceful stay,   dedicated parking for one, is convenient, safe & ready to be your home away from home while visiting Asheville!

name: Lazy Daze Hideaway Comfortable 2 Bedroom Bungalow
description:
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located "Hideaway". This trendy Bungalow is tucked away in Sayles Village just 5 minutes to downtown Asheville. It is a perfect balance of mountain getaway, and city around the corner!
We offer free washer and dryer access, parking, and have GREAT WIFI!

name: Mountain View Room A
description:
Spacious, modern room w views to Blue Ridge Mountains and it's own private in-suite bathroom. Room has a new queen size bed, bamboo mattress, 2 nightstands, desk and chair and a 50" smart TV.
Kitchenet: sink, fridge, microwave, coffee maker, griddle, ninja 12 in 1 cooker,, toaster oven/air fryer, kitchen table and stools.
5 minute drive to downtown Asheville.
Long-term rentals: $100 pet fee per month and Cleaning fee is $100 instead of $50.

name: Mountain View Room B
description:
Spacious, modern room w views to Blue Ridge Mountains and private bathroom. Room has a queen size bed, bamboo mattress, 2 nightstands and a 65" smart TV.
There is a sink, fridge, microwave, grill, ninja 12 in 1 cooker, toaster oven/air fryer, kitchen table and stools and coffee maker. Free parking.
The house is just a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville. 1 pet only fee $50. Long-term rentals: $100 pet fee per month. Cleaning fee is $100.

name: Stylish 2 bedroom/2.5 bath, parking + huge yard
description: Get ready to relax in this calm, stylish West Asheville bungalow. Enjoy two large bedrooms, both with gorgeous ensuite baths.  Cook a delicious meal in the large, open kitchen, walk to Haywood St. restaurants and bars or a short bike to the River Arts District. Large lot on a quiet side street. All utilities, cleaning, lawn care and pest control included. Large laundry room.

name: Canvas Tent #0 @Baying Hound Campground
description:
This canvas tent is in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. You’ll get a full-size bed with sheets & pillows in your tent. Take a look at the surroundings because this isn’t a spot for light sleepers or folks craving seclusion. Great for the social camper who doesn’t want to lug around camping gear! You've got prime access to our indoor bathroom, hang-out space and outdoor solar shower.

Note that we're not calling this "glamping". :) Please read the FULL description.

name: Spacious Studio- Convenient to Hiking and Biking
description:
Enjoy a quiet and relaxing experience at this conveniently located private studio. You'll be in close proximity to Pisgah National Forest, Bent Creek, the Blue Ridge Parkway and Wicked Weed's Candler brewery and taproom. Bob Lewis ballpark is 2.5 miles away, a 5-7 minute drive. Get to downtown Asheville in less than 20 minutes and West Asheville in 15. This modern unit sleeps 4 with a queen bed and pull-out sofa.

Follow us on insta @air_shuler

name: Arthouse Suite on Country Club
description:
Arthouse Suite is located in N Asheville, Grove Park Neighborhood, three miles from Downtown.

Guests enjoy private of Large Living space with dedicated workspace (WiFi, Desk and Printer), One Bedroom, 3/4 Bathroom (modest size corner shower no tub), Kitchen and Dining area with stack Washer / Dryer.

Arthouse Suite offers dedicated Outdoor Living Space with Patio, Grill and Fire-ring.

name: Spacious 2-story Apt in Downtown AVL w/Mural
description:
Spacious 2-story Apt in the heart of DT Asheville. Located on Carolina Ln, guests are steps away from restaurants, breweries, art galleries and bars. Attractions like the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are only a 10 min drive away.

Upstairs, the unit boast tall ceilings, big windows, a beautiful mural and plenty of areas to relax while you're there. The downstairs is a smaller space that can be separated if guests would like some privacy.

Mural done by local artist Megan Kelly

name: Relaxing Montford Retreat, 5 Min. Walk to Downtown
description:
2025 Update: Asheville is welcoming guests and so are we!

The Retreat is a private suite in quiet historical Montford. Park for free and walk everywhere - 3 blocks to Harrah’s Cherokee Center and downtown Asheville, with restaurants, shops, breweries & entertainment. Our cozy suite features original artwork, hand-painted furniture, cotton linens & comfy bed. You'll have a private bath & bright dining nook with coffee, tea & snacks. Guest wing with private entrance. Spotless - low cleaning fee!

name: Luxe Asheville Home w/ Stunning Mountain Views!
description: Overlooking the striking scenery of the Blue Ridge Mountains, this elegant escape is the perfect place to call home for your Asheville getaway! The 4-bedroom, 3.5-bath vacation rental features ample entertainment space, luxurious bathrooms, and a movie projector with a home theater system. Spend the day out in the beautiful wilderness, explore Biltmore Estate, or sample from local breweries. After a day of adventure, relax on the furnished deck and watch the sunset over the stunning landscape.

name: Central to Asheville+Hendo+Biltmore
description:
A great night's sleep awaits you in this private open concept suite with a king 12" deep Casper bed, full kitchenette, bath, washer/dryer, futon, separate office and sauna for guests only. The newly updated private 600+ sq ft suite is at the lower level of our Arden home and overlooks the wooded mountains. Access to the suite is through a separate private entrance.

Central location: 25 mins or less to DT Asheville & Hendo, 5-10 mins to airport, many grocery & big box stores, & restaurant/bars

name: West Asheville Retreat, 4 bd, 3 bath, W/hot-tub,
description: We can’t wait to host you at our 2400 sq ft northwest Asheville home! Close to everything yet offers you a secluded oasis to relax and unwind. Enjoy your coffee or wine on the huge covered front porch or an evening fire in the backyard. A 8-10 min drive gets you to downtown or south slope. A 6 min drive to New Belgium Brewing and the River Arts District. 5 mins to river access with public parking area, Zen tubing or the river walkway and bike path. Everything is a short drive or ride share away!

name: Pets Welcome at this Hot Tub Three Bedroom
description: South Asheville Townhome, with outdoor space, and contemporary design. This 3-bedroom townhome features two king and one queen bedrooms. Located in South Asheville, drivable to shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. The Biltmore Park and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Fab South Asheville Townhome Hot Tub Pet Friendly
description: South Asheville Townhome, with outdoor space, and contemporary design. This 3-bedroom townhome features two king and one queen bedrooms. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Absolutely Amazing Downtown Condo
description: Stunning downtown condo with contemporary meets turn of the century design in this historic new-buildout building, sunny and walkable condo in downtown Asheville. This 2nd floor two-bedroom features 1 king master and a king guest bedroom. Each with private baths.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Blue Ridge Digs!
description: Private 1BR duplex just minutes from downtown Asheville and The Blue Ridge Parkway! Save on fees by booking through Houfy.com - Listing #19165. Pets approved on case by case basis for $100 non-refundable fee, to be settled separately at time of booking.

name: Stylish home in GREAT location!
description:
Welcome to Asheville!!
Enjoy a stylish experience at this quiet West Asheville neighborhood.

- Short drive to West Asheville, River Arts District and downtown
- amazing local restaurants and breweries a short drive/Uber away.
- In close proximity to hiking, biking, tubing, golfing, tennis, Asheville Treetops Adventure Park
- Large soaking tub
- private in ground pool open May-Sept 15th
- private entrance

name: Romantic Yurt | Private Sauna | Fire Pit |
description:
**Welcome to your romantic mountain escape just minutes from downtown Asheville. This handcrafted yurt is tucked into a peaceful valley with a flowing creek, private sauna, and fire pit perfect for stargazing. Whether you're planning a cozy couple’s getaway or a solo retreat, this space invites you to slow down, breathe deep, and reconnect with nature (and each other).

⭑CONTACT US FOR SEASONAL DISCOUNTS⭑

name: Warm Family Home-Mins to Downtown Asheville
description: We have clean water!When traveling with family or friends, settle in and relax in our spacious family home. Just minutes from downtown Asheville, French Broad River, breweries and more. This home is a great place to jump into your Asheville adventure and a peaceful retreat after a busy day. Cook meals together in the kitchen, read in the main living room, play games in the garden level media room, tell stories around the firepit, or just lounge on the deck. Your family will love our family home!

name: Bring Pets Fun South Asheville Hot Tub Home
description:
South Asheville Townhome, with outdoor space, and contemporary design. This 3-bedroom townhome features two king and one queen bedrooms.
The unit also provides 1 garage parking space and 2 dedicated parking space behind the townhome. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: {Getaway} Family Friendly, fireplace, balcony
description: Our modern and comfortable townhome has everything you need for a relaxing stay in Asheville. Enjoy mountain views in a quiet neighborhood less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. For guests with accessibility challenges, our home features an elevator.

name: Long Range Mtn Views, Fire Pit, 3 Ensuites, Quiet!
description:
Mill Grove offers you privacy, relaxation, and rejuvenation in the heart of the mountains. It has 3 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, an open living room/dining room/kitchen floor plan, and a newly remodeled kitchen. Enjoy 2 lovely private decks, part of it covered/screened. A Peloton is ready to ride!

Situated in the woods within minutes of world-class hiking trails, mtn biking, breweries, delicious restaurants, local bars, the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, DT, Biltmore, only a 15-20 minute drive.

name: Comfortable South Asheville Townhome W/ Hot Tub
description:
South Asheville Townhome, with outdoor space, and contemporary design. This 3-bedroom townhome features two king and one queen bedrooms.
The unit also provides 1 garage parking space and 2 dedicated parking space behind the townhome. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Elegant Central Ruby-2BDRMs/1 BATH-3 beds sleep 4
description:
Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village, and Downtown around the corner.
Enjoy easy vacation in this centrally located townhome. Pleasantly situated in one of the historic neighborhoods in Asheville. 2 private bedrooms, full size pull out sofa in the living room, 1 full bathrooms. Total of 3 beds can sleep up to 4 people. Private patio overlooking back yard is great for gathering. Families are welcome, pack'n play may be available upon request and based on availability.

name: 3 miles to downtown, fire pit, BBQ grill
description: Experience the subtle blend of urban charm and natural tranquility at our Asheville haven - featuring stylish décor, modern amenities perfect for up to 8 guests & pet-friendly setup! Nestled just three miles from vibrant downtown, you are only minutes away from breweries, parks, and the iconic Biltmore Estate. Welcome to our sanctuary city-life style which harmoniously coexists with abundant nature.

name: Romantic & Tranquil Gem: Dog & EV friendly
description:
Enjoy the best of both worlds in this cozy log cabin, just 2 mins from the vibrant River Arts District and 8 mins from downtown Asheville.

Start your day with coffee on the covered porch or back patio, where you can unwind and enjoy the serene surroundings. With fast WiFi, you'll have no trouble joining your next Zoom call—or let nature inspire you to write your next great American novel.

There's a dedicated EV charging station, making it easy to explore everything Asheville has to offer.

name: "White Cottage Inn" Charming, Cozy & Convenient!
description: Tranquil spacious Cottage with front porch swing and gated wrap around deck! Mins to Sierra Nevada, Biltmore Park, Airport, Biltmore Estate, Downtown Asheville, Hendersonville, Lake Lure, Chimney Rock, Grove Park Inn and all Asheville has to offer! Easy access off I-26 (Airport Rd Exit)

name: Top floor private suite with large deck & balcony.
description:
Great location, on quiet dead-end street, 5-10 minute walk to Haywood Road & all the pubs/restaurants/breweries that West Asheville has to offer, including New Belgium Brewery. 1.5 miles from downtown Asheville, about a 30 minute walk, or short drive.

Top floor unit with private entrance & secure(double locks) to lower unit where owner lives. Kitchenette, bedroom, sofa that opens to short queen bed(60" x 68"), large deck off front & balcony off back. Parking. "Well-Behaved" dogs welcome.

name: Power - Water - Great for Groups
description:
~ Central location - Safe from Hurricane Helene
~ Power, Water, 4 Bedrooms, 4 bathrooms
~ Midpoint location between areas needing tourism and areas needing Helene recovery help.
~ Large Deck, Grill, Fully Equipped Kitchen
~ Latte Maker, 2 Coffee Pots

Big deck with fenced yard, two living rooms. Ideally located in Fletcher, near Asheville, Hendersonville, and Brevard. Perfect place for groups coming to help with Helene restoration or coming to see fall leaves in Brevard.

name: Spacious 3BR Dog-Friendly house w/ Fenced Yard!
description:
Fortunately, our property was unaffected by the hurricane, and it is fully habitable, including all utilities as well as running water.

This house has three charming bedrooms, a full kitchen, a fully fenced backyard, and a large deck, making this the ideal place for families with dogs. Conveniently located, just a short drive from local breweries and eateries.

10 Min drive to the Biltmore & Downtown

name: Craftsman Gem | King Beds|Firepit|Hottest Location
description:
This 2/1 bungalow is the perfect place for those looking for a peaceful retreat in an incredible, highly walkable location.

*30-day min stay*

★ Walk to West Asheville's best bars/restaurants
★ Comfiest KING beds
★ Indoor electric fireplace
★ Large fenced yard
★ String lights, picnic table
★ Firepit
★ Charcoal Grill
★ Fully Equipped kitchen
★ Designated workspace + ultrafast Wi-Fi
★ Record Player
★ 7 minute drive to Mission Hospital
★ 7 min to downtown

name: The Triangle @Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Triangle is in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. No need for a tent! Just bring your sleeping bag, pillows and sleeping pad for an extra cushy night’s sleep.

Room for *TWO* people IN The Triangle, and space in front to set up a small tent for the kids or a third wheel. ;) The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville. Be sure to read the full profile before booking.

name: May Acres Cottage - South Asheville
description: This cozy 1930 cabin-style garage apartment, set on a 15-acre farm in South Asheville, is perfect for a peaceful getaway. It blends historic charm with modern comforts, offering beautiful sunrises & mountain views. Conveniently located between downtown Asheville and Hendersonville, it provides easy access to urban attractions & nature's tranquility. Enjoy the spacious sunroom, private outdoor fireplace, and nearby hiking, biking, and trout fishing. All amenities and the airport are within reach.

name: Bluebird Bungalow - Cozy South Slope Home
description:
Convenient access to downtown city life from this sweet 2 bed/1 bath bungalow.

Location is key. Make it home for a while - walking distance to downtown Asheville - fully equipped kitchen, memory foam mattresses, and large front porch.

name: Hit the trails! Hot Tub! Sauna! Fenced Yard! AVL
description:
1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, and the Bent Creek Trails, Bent Creek Ranch is perfectly located to enjoy all of the outdoor activities that Asheville has to offer while still being only 10 min to the River Arts District and downtown Asheville.
5 BR and 3 baths will comfortably accommodate up to 12 guests.
The 1.5 ac lot includes a large fenced area for your 4 legged friends to enjoy while you’re on the trails and provides privacy for you to enjoy the hot tub when you return.

name: A Quiet Getaway in Historic Grove Park - Asheville
description: We are excited to share the newly renovated walk-out basement apartment in our historic home nestled near the Grove Park Inn golf course.  Take a stroll through this wonderful neighborhood soaked in pine and take in the varied architecture that makes this area so special and unique.  Why look at this neighborhood from a tour bus when you can actually stay in it?!?  A two minute car ride will get you to the middle of downtown Asheville (or almost to the Parkway) and all that it has to offer!!!

name: Entire Home 10 min to downtown Asheville
description:
Privacy on 5+ acres of forest! Enjoy views of the Blue Ridge mountains. Only 10 min to downtown Asheville. Unwind on one of our four decks. A fenced yard- perfect for pets to enjoy the outdoors. Amenities include: washer and dryer, fire pit and fireplace, 50” tv, high speed internet, office area, modern furniture & clean. Only one bathroom.

$150 nonrefundable pet fee

name: North AVL Hideout - Close to Downtown and Parkway
description:
Welcome to Asheville! This house has a vibe that instantly puts you at ease when you walk through the door. The hideout is nestled off Beaverdam road in north Asheville. Just a few miles from downtown yet surrounded by nature. During your stay you may get a visit from local wildlife, including black bears and wild turkeys!

A perfect home base for city exploration and mountain adventures. One level home accessible year round in any vehicle!

name: Renovated Duplex, full kitchen by Biltmore/Mission
description: This is the perfect space for one or two guests! This beautifully renovated suite is one mile from Biltmore Village and less than two miles to Mission Hospital. Just three miles from either Downtown Asheville or the Blue Ridge Parkway, you will be at the center of it all while enjoying a safe and quiet neighborhood. With a fully stocked full kitchen (including coffee, tea, sugar, etc.), private parking space, smart TV, and a full bathroom, you will have everything you need for a long-term stay!

name: The Barn
description: Relax surrounded by nature in this adorable and homey barn apartment. This apartment sleeps four with a queen master bedroom and a full pull-out couch. A full bathroom that includes a washer and dryer. Prepare a meal in the fully equipped kitchen, with a kitchen table and a bar that seats two. Wake up and enjoy a cup of coffee while sitting in the rocking chairs on the front patio. There is plenty of yard space for your children to enjoy and plenty of room for parking.

name: Brand new Cozy home with a perfect view in the mountains.
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located home with a beautiful mountain view,Private gate entrance with remote, deers and wild turkeys to enjoy the view,15 mins to downtown Asheville restaurants, brewery's,
Outlet malls and shopping centers
10mins ride to the Supermarket,
Of course hiking and walking trials,French river broad canoeing,tubing,fishing and man made beach minutes away, Amazing blue ridge mountain view, Chimney rock and Biltmore estates, come & enjoy life is too short.

name: Casa Blanca Relaxing Retreat
description: Enjoy a delightful stay held in nature at this stunning and bright 4BR home affectionately named “Casa Blanca", just 10 minutes from the center of Asheville! Feel the expansiveness of the lawn wrapped with privacy from the surrounding woods 1.5 acres of lush land. Bedrooms sleep 8, House sleeps maximum of 13.

name: Bright Room in the heart of West Asheville
description:
Come enjoy our home with us!

Heads up: we have a black lab mix named Scout. She loves to snuggle up with guests on the couch!

name: Private, serene 1 bed apartment in the trees
description:
**Tropical storm update** I do have running water and power and no damage to the property.
Private 1 bed apartment with own entrance close to everything. 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and 10 mins to Asheville. For even more adventure Black Mtn is right around the corner. This cozy apartment is in a beautiful wooded setting. Comfy queen bed and full size murphy bed and full size bathroom. TV with streaming. WIFI and nice kitchen for all cooking needs. Has a washer/ dryer with closet space.

name: Mountain View Villa - Asheville
description: Welcome to our elegant villa, where luxury furnishings complement breathtaking views from multiple decks and the inviting hot tub. Nestled on a serene 2-acre property surrounded by nature, this retreat offers tranquility just 15 minutes from Downtown and West Asheville. Ideal for groups, our location is perfectly situated to explore North Carolina's natural wonders like the Blue Ridge Parkway, alongside its vibrant artistic community, dynamic culinary experiences, and bustling brewery scene.

name: Eclectic Asheville Abode w/ Backyard Oasis!
description: Head to Asheville for a one-of-a-kind vacation when you book this 4-bed, 2-bath vacation rental! Step inside the home to find an industrial living space filled with unique furnishings and décor, a full kitchen, and all of the essentials. Explore the Smokies with a scenic drive on the Blue Ridge Parkway or enjoy the mountain views as you cruise into downtown Asheville. When you’re ready for some R&R, head out to the backyard to have a zen moment by the pond or roast s’mores around the fire pit!

name: King beds, hot tub, entertainment/lounge space
description: Immerse in Asheville's charm, residing in a chic 4BR haven, ideally outfitted for ten guests. Our pet-friendly home features a hot tub and fire pit, located in the serene yet vibrant area of Asheville. Close to iconic sites - Biltmore Estate, it's the perfect base for relaxation or adventure-filled holidays. Enjoy the convenience of power, water, and free parking available on-site.

name: Hot Tub & Fire Pit: Chic Asheville Oasis
description:
Dogs Welcome w/ Fee | 5 Mi to Downtown | Kid-Friendly Amenities

Enjoy outdoor adventures and discover the charm of Asheville at this modern 3-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental. Savor your morning coffee on the deck, overlooking a wooded glen filled with birdsong, then go hiking in the Pisgah National Forest or browse Asheville's vibrant shops and eateries downtown. At day's end, make a toast while you barbecue on the deck or huddle up for a bonfire under the stars.

name: Summer Vacay at Eclaire | Sleeps 16
description: The Eclaire welcomes you to Asheville in style! The Eclaire is 15 minutes to downtown and just 2 minutes to Yesterday's Spaces Wedding Venue. The Eclaire is a perfect place to enjoy a family vacation or a friends getaway! You'll have a relaxing yet stylish vacation in this three-level home that features an open living area, two awesome game rooms, outdoor dining and firepit! There's plenty of space to create unforgettable memories at The Eclaire!

name: Willow Hill Cottage charming 2BR in Asheville
description:
Close to downtown (10 mins drive) and West Asheville (5 mins drive) but the deck overlooking a peaceful former pasture gives the cottage a countryside feel. Winter mountain views from kitchen & main bedroom.

The cottage can fit 4 people. It has 2 bedrooms (1 queen, 1 full) and 1 bathroom, with midcentury-modern decor and a well equipped kitchen. The cozy living room has a large picture window, Roku TV w/cable, and decorative fireplace. Level 2 EV charger (J1772 plug) available on request.

name: Quiet, private room and entrance
description:
Enjoy this peaceful location next to the French Broad River nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains.
Less than a mile from Silverline park with river access and terminal for scenic tours with Craggy Mountain Railway Line.
Only 7 minutes from DT and River Arts District (RAD).

Newly renovated with many amenities for your comfort.
King bed with full bath; shower and tub.
The private deck and back yard is a wonderful place to relax any time of the day.

name: Elevated Elegance in this Luxe Condo with Views
description: Stunning south and southwest mountain views, outdoor space, and contemporary design in downtown Asheville. 5th floor two bedroom and two full bathrooms is located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: 4br Escape in Walkable West AVL for Sept 2024
description:
**currently only available for mid-December 2024 - January 2025

Our home is tucked away in the hills of West Asheville, with enough room to host overnight guests while still offering remote workspaces and quiet rooms.
It's a great launching pad for adventures in the city of Asheville, or all around western North Carolina. You get the best of nature--waking up among the trees. And, you get the best of city living, in a new, modern house, in walking distance of Asheville destinations.

name: Luxurious Home in Asheville. 8mins to Downtown!
description:
🌲 Welcome to Brennan Brook!

This is where mountain charm meets modern comfort just minutes from downtown Asheville. This spacious 5-bedroom retreat offers over 3,000 sq ft of relaxation with a private pool, hot tub, luxe furnishings, and a lower level packed with games and a home theater. Whether you're hiking the Blue Ridge, brewery hopping, or cozying up by the fire pit, Brennan Brook is your perfect basecamp for unforgettable Asheville memories.

name: The White Squirrel, Entire Residential Home, Arden
description: Renovated 2 Bedroom and 1 Bathroom cottage in the heart of Arden, North Carolina. Super convenient to Biltmore Park, Sierra Nevada Brewing, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Asheville Airport, Dupont and Pisgah National Forests, Bent Creek and restaurants. Enjoy a cozy atmosphere with free cable/WiFi, free parking and washer and dryer. Safe area with security camera on site. There's definitely a good chance you will see a white squirrel running through the yard as you chill on the back deck .

name: The Perch, off Elk Mountain
description: Peaceful!! Views!! Location, Privacy and Breathing space! < 10 min to downtown AVL!! Scandinavian style—focus on comfort and entertainment. Minimalistic. Perched upon a hill, the home offers fantastic views of historic Reynold’s Mtn from the living room, bedroom and deck. Sip coffee on the deck and contemplate the day's adventures! Meal prep in the kitchen and host a ball game on the big screen. End the day relaxing in the rain shower. Recreate and Appreciate, from The Perch off Elk Mountain!

name: New* Comfy and Stylish Home |Mins to DT| Sleeps 10
description: Tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area is our peaceful 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom home away from home. Here you’ll find room to breathe, plenty of natural light, and just a touch of what’s familiar. We’ve made a peaceful place for you to relax, so you can focus on the next adventure. Why pile everyone into a hotel room (or two) when you can breathe the mountain air without stepping on any toes?

name: Private 2BR Home w/ Yard & Hot tub. 10 min to DT!
description: 17 Dove is a small 2-bedroom home on. 1.2 acre lot just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. The home features a hot tub, fenced in yard, walking trail and stellar views. THE HOT TUB WILL NOT BE OPERATIONAL MID-APRIL through MID-OCTOBER. You’re  also just 5 minutes from Haywood St in West Asheville and 30 minutes from great hiking. The home is small, but spacious and stylish with anything you may need for a relaxing vacation. Dogs under 30lbs are welcomed with an additional $50 fee per pet.

name: Home w/ Yard: 8 Mi to French Broad River Park
description: Perfect for a couples retreat or a small family getaway, this pet-friendly 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home is calling your name! Enjoy a cozy living room with a fireplace, 2 porches with patio furniture, a gas grill, and a fire pit when you stay at this lovely North Carolina vacation rental. Head to Downtown Asheville and visit the famous Biltmore Estate or the beautiful North Carolina Arboretum. Drive through Blue Ridge Parkway and experience all the gorgeous mountain views it has to offer.

name: Sweet West AVL Retreat w/ Large Fully-Fenced Yard
description:
This 3-bedroom is a stylish, comfy home base - perfect for your adventures in Asheville! Just 5 mins from hip West Asheville and 10 mins from downtown, with countless restaurants, shops, galleries, music venues, etc. Huge fenced-in backyard with fire pit is a great place for kids and pets to romp and play. Fast WiFi plus designated workspace in each bedroom makes it the perfect place to work from home!

If you will be bringing pets, please inquire about pet deposits/pet fees before booking.

name: 2 King 1 Queen, Treehouse deck, 10 min to downtown
description:
A great place for a mountain escape, nestled on 3/4 acre, surrounded by mature trees. At night rest in the two king rooms and/or queen room. During the day enjoy the screened in porch, relax on the treehouse deck, or have a romantic bonfire in the firepit.
This mountain hideaway is only 3 miles from Biltmore Estate and 5 miles from downtown Asheville.
Fix meals in our kitchen stocked with spices, cookware and utensils.
This Asheville artists' guest house features artwork from local artists.

name: Five Star Suite, Prime Location
description: The best location to explore all that Asheville has to offer!  Avoid the noise and  congestion of staying downtown, which is an easy three mile drive away.   Peaceful, private and safe.  Off street parking.   Start the day with a walk to beautiful Beaver Lake and its scenic two-mile trail loop.  Convenient access to Blue Ridge Parkway (Craven's Gap).

name: The Blue Door, cozy apartment with boho vibe.
description:
Newly renovated one bedroom apartment. Ground level with covered patio and off street parking. Centrally located in a quiet, safe and diverse neighborhood.

Just a short distance to shopping, dining and entertainment in Asheville and surrounding areas. Only minutes to French Broad river access, equipment outfitters, walking, hiking and biking trails.

Thoughtfully appointed with hypo-allergenic mattress and HEPA air filters. Thoroughly cleaned and sanitized with eco-friendly products.

name: Penthouse Style Condo Atop Hotel Indigo
description:
The Asheville Club at 151 is 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathrooms penthouse-style residences atop the Hotel Indigo.
Suite 1103 features floor to ceiling windows offering views of Asheville and the surrounding Blue Ridge Mountains. This condo features a kitchen, hardwood floors, gas fireplace, private terrace, and spa-inspired bathrooms. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Cozy Kenilworth Retreat
description: Charming suite in the lower level of a Kenilworth home,  just minutes from the Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville. Relax in your own private sanctuary that leads out to a sunny patio area and a wooded back yard. Separate entrance around the back of the home, with guest parking in the driveway to allow closer access to the suite. Beautiful, historic neighborhood that's centrally located with all the amenities you could ask for close by.

name: Asheville Downtown 2 BR 2BA Condo overlooking city
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space overlooking the city of Asheville down below at the top of Beaucatcher Mountain, 5 minutes from downtown, 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate.  Over 10 breweries and Asheville's fantastic restaurants are a quick drive away.  Come back to the condo to relax with vaulted ceilings, brazilian hardwood floors, granite throughout, Hi-Speed Wi-Fi, Cable, Smart TV, full kitchen, dining area, patio deck with dining area, jacuzzi jetted tub showers :)

name: The Cottage at Bent Creek
description: Enjoy this cozy freshly remodeled home in the heart of Bent Creek. Located on a private drive just off of the Pisgah National Forrest. You will have hiking and biking trails that dreams are made of just 2.5 miles away from your door! The Asheville outlet mall is also only 2.5 miles away, 2.2 miles to the Asheville Arboretum and Blue Ridge Parkway entrance, and 4 miles from I-26. Once you are on I-26 your are just 5.2 miles from downtown Asheville. Enjoy all that this beautiful area has to offer!

name: Mountain home by river
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.It's private property, large back Yard and a lot of trees , birds song in the morning...just 15 minutes to down town Asheville,  10 minutes to Biltmore house.

name: Lovely second floor 1 bedroom downtown
description:
Private 1 bedroom apartment on the 2nd floor of a historic building. This is a walk up, no elevator is available.
Great location very walkable to everything in downtown Asheville and the south slope.
Eat-in kitchen with full size appliances. Pots/pans and basic cooking utensils included.
Livingroom has a small sofa and a television.
Bedroom is spacious with a queen sized bed and walk-in closet.
Bathroom has a standing shower. Shampoo, conditioner, soap and all linens included.

name: Walk to Breweries, Coffee, Restaurants, Bakeries
description: The house is right off the heart of Haywood Rd. There are 6 breweries on Haywood Rd, numerous amazing local restaurants and bars, coffee shops, bakeries and music venues, and grocery stores all within a few minutes walk.

name: Modern Fenced Yard Close To Biltmore, DT, Pkwy
description: Escape to our exclusive 3BR luxury home, nestled in a super unique location just outside of Asheville's city limits, offering a stand-alone rental experience while being incredibly close to the renowned Biltmore estate and downtown Asheville. Immerse yourself in designer comforts, including a gorgeous open kitchen, professional design, high-end amenities, Egyptian cotton linens, and smart TVs. With easy access to the city's attractions, indulge in the ultimate Asheville experience.

name: Comfy, beautiful Asheville Studio with Mnt Views!
description: New beautiful terrace studio located in one of Asheville's most picturesque valleys, quietly tucked in mountain cove, w/ gorgeous farms below & acres of mountain privacy behind! 2.5 miles to Blue Ridge Parkway -- home to endless hikes, waterfalls, swimming holes, rivers & lakes. Groceries, restaurants, bars & convenient stores 5min drive. Downtown Asheville & Biltmore Estate 10min. Enjoy mountain sunrise on front patio & picnic on your lawn outside while watching horses play in the meadow below.

name: Stylish Retro Studio - Walk to New Belgium & RAD
description: Spacious, open-concept studio with trendy furnishings and local art. This colorful space is the perfect place to relax and unwind after a day of hiking or exploring the city. Get around with ease from this incredible location in a friendly and walkable West Asheville neighborhood.

name: Dogs Welcome! 12 Minutes to Asheville!
description: First it was a hay barn and then a place for friends and family to stay when visiting. When we aren’t hosting family we welcome you to our family farm and the peace and quiet enjoyed by us and all who have visited over the years. Tucked away in Jenkins Valley, only 5 miles from downtown Asheville , we think you’ll enjoy listening to the cicadas and watching the deer and turkeys graze in the pastures. Looking out the front door you’ll probably see horses and chickens and maybe even a peacock!

name: 5 mins to Downtown! 3 bed/2 bath with office.
description: We are one mile from downtown, with easy access to unique restaurants, world class microbreweries, the Grove Park Inn, the Biltmore House, hiking, mountain biking and kayaking.  We offer the perfect getaway for working from home, or taking in all that amazing Asheville has to offer!  Enjoy a full kitchen, living room, office, dining room, back porch, and a spacious front yard located in a quiet and charming neighborhood in the heart of Asheville.

name: Charming 3/2 Dog friendly home near Asheville
description: Asheville is back and ready for tourists! Less than 8 minutes from the Asheville airport 30 minutes from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore 15 minutes from Sierra Nevada and many local favorites! 5 minutes to Fletcher Park with Tennis, Pickle ball, disc golf, dog park and running trails, 7 minutes from Agriculture center. Lovely well equipped newly renovated kitchen.  Great dog walking, kid friendly and biking neighborhood.

name: Beautiful Ashville House in the Trees
description: Nestled within Asheville's magical forest! The SoJax is private yet peaceful and sprawling with wildlife. Relax on the front or back porch or take a hike on one of the many famous local trails our neighborhood has to offer. SoJax is 18 mins to Downtown AVL, Biltmore Village and 9 mins to Blue Ridge Parkway hiking & waterfalls! Ideally located close to everything to get the full Asheville experience! SoJax is a stylishly updated home with all of the desired amenities to have an incredible stay!!!

name: Hot tub, fire pit, King bed, 4 mi to downtown AVL
description: Experience the perfect blend of historic charm and modern luxury at our enchanting cabin, nestled in the exciting heart of Asheville. Well-suited for large families or group of friends, this pet-friendly haven gracefully combines rustic allure and contemporary comforts, promising an unforgettable stay.

name: Near Asheville!  1 bedroom apartment w/ lake view
description:
Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place - a newly built guest apartment over a garage. It is across the driveway from the owner’s home, which allows for privacy! There is a bedroom with a queen bed, a queen sleeper sofa, a kitchenette, W/D, a patio, and an elevator for use if needed.

3 night minimum.

Located about 15 minutes from downtown Asheville, with beautiful lake and mountain views. It is very close to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Bent Creek running/biking trails.

name: Charming Home | Office | Agreeable Pets welcome!
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located home. This completely remodeled house is perfect for family and friends looking to enjoy all that the Asheville area has to offer! From close-by hikes, popular mountain bike trails, and a wide range of activities for the whole family, right at your fingertips. Relax on the private porch while cooking a tasty meal on the grill or enjoy the beautiful sunset by the fire-pit. Our home also offers a fully fenced in area for pets and an office.

name: West Asheville Blue Mountains Bedroom!
description: Welcome! You’ll stay in a private bedroom in my 3 bedroom house in a quiet neighborhood in West Asheville. This central spot is a few blocks from the shops, bars, restaurants & cafes of Haywood Road, and a 10 minute drive to Downtown! The room has a double bed with memory foam mattress and topper, and a view of the veggie garden. If you enjoy an arty, maximalist aesthetic, and a warm, homestead-ish environment, you’ll enjoy your stay - come enjoy my home with me!

name: West Asheville Homestead Bedroom, with Queen Bed!
description: Welcome! You’ll stay in a private bedroom in my 4 bedroom house in a quiet neighborhood in West Asheville. This central spot is a few blocks from the shops, bars, restaurants & cafes of Haywood Road, and a 10 minute drive to Downtown! The room has a Queen bed with memory foam mattress and topper, and a view of the front gardens. If you enjoy an arty, maximalist aesthetic, and a warm, homestead-ish environment, you’ll enjoy your stay - come enjoy my home with me!

name: Chic Modern Duplex by Biltmore/Mission sunset view
description: This beautifully renovated suite offers the perfect blend of convenience & comfort. Just a mile from Biltmore Village and minutes from Mission Hospital, Downtown Asheville, & the Blue Ridge Parkway, you'll be in the heart of everything while enjoying a peaceful, safe neighborhood. The suite features a fully equipped kitchen, smart TV, private parking, & a cozy deck with stunning sunset views. Ideal for long-term stays, this is a perfect retreat for 1 or 2 guests seeking a home away from home.

name: Affordable + Clean Mountain Cottage
description:
Experience a charming cottage in the heart of Asheville, NC!

This beautifully decorated 2 bed 1 bath home is conveniently located just 8 minutes from Asheville Downtown, bars, restaurants, and entertainment. The iconic Biltmore house is 5 minutes away from this home too! For those traveling with pets, our spacious backyard offers ample room for your furry friends! Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, luxury bed-sheets, a remodeled bathroom, high-speed internet, Smart TVs, and more.

name: Modern Luxury in Downtown AVL - Free Parking - Condo 205
description: Stay in the heart of Downtown Asheville in the beautiful 55 South Market building! Located just steps from the vibrant South Slope and Biltmore Avenue, this one-bedroom unit was built in 2018 and features designer furnishings, work by local artists, and everything you need to have a comfortable stay. The unit has a king-sized bed in the bedroom along with a full-size sleeper sofa in the living room. The spacious bathroom has a double vanity and large shower to accommodate multiple guests. There's also a washer/dryer if you need to freshen up your wardrobe while you're here!

name: Asheville Mountain Getaway w/ Patio & Koi Pond!
description: Escape to the scenic Blue Ridge Mountains with a charming home base when you stay at this Asheville vacation rental! This 1-bedroom, 1-bath apartment boasts a fantastic shared backyard with a koi pond, dining table, and a screened-in patio. Inside you'll find a fully equipped kitchen and a gas fireplace to make you feel right at home. Whether you want to ride down the Blue Ridge Parkway, hike through the Pisgah National Forest, or take a swing at a nearby golf course, there's something for you!

name: Contemporary Mountain Home Close to Asheville
description: Mountain to Sea Modern! The perfect mix of a mountain setting with a modern design and amenities! This brand new construction boasts short range mountain views and is located just 10-15 minutes to downtown Asheville.

name: Asheville Home near Airport! Near Biltmore Estate!
description:
🌿 Creekside is a private, family-friendly escape just 20 minutes from Asheville. Enjoy a heated pool, hot tub, game garage, EV charger, and cozy indoor spaces.

With 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and thoughtful amenities throughout, it’s perfect for group getaways. Relax by the fire pit, play under the stars, or unwind in the jetted tub—your mountain retreat awaits!

name: Asheville Luxury Home: Secluded with Pool & HotTub
description:
Welcome to White Oak Gap! 🌳

Experience the ultimate vacation home in this stunning 8-bedroom 4-bathroom mountain retreat, just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville. This ultra-luxurious estate sleeps 20 guests and gives access to a fully-equipped kitchen, spacious living areas & private yard, pool, hot tub, game room, home theater, various outdoor activities, and breathtaking mountain views. Perfect for family reunions, group getaways, and retreats in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains.

name: The Asheville Boho Chateau
description:
Less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville in West Asheville (4 mins from Haywood road), this newly renovated 7000 SF house sits on over 1.5 acres & sleeps 16+ comfortably. Complete with a bocce ball court, hot tub, firepit, ample parking, and 3 TV rooms. There are 2 fully stocked kitchens, as well as a pool table and wet bar in the upstairs den. Perfect for bachelor/bachelorette groups, and families.

*Brand new road 7/24
*Brand new Water Filtration System 1/23

name: Bright & Tranquil Guest House!
description: Relax and unwind in this calm & stylish space, tucked away in charming Woodfin, NC just minutes from downtown Asheville.  Enjoy unique shops & dinning, music & festivals, open markets, and outstanding breweries!  With all there is to offer you're sure to be pleasantly surprised by this lovely city and the surrounding beauty of the mountains.  For the outdoorsy type this  conveniently located spot is a quick drive up to the Blue Ridge Parkway along with many mountain biking and hiking trails.

name: Bent Creek Studio with nearby trail access
description: This space is a perfect getaway for mountain bikers, hikers, runners or just visiting! Less than 100 ft. from access to Bent Creeks trail system. New, 1 bedroom king studio with sitting area, 65" tv, kitchenette, & bathroom (shower only).  Private entrance to a cozy and comfortable space, with a new ductless mini-split system so you can control the temperature.  No shared air with the main house. The kitchenette has a small fridge w/ freezer, microwave, electric kettle,  & coffee making options.

name: Comfortable Home Walkable to West AVL & River Arts
description: Come home to popular West Asheville! Enjoy this cozy, beautiful 3 bedroom sanctuary just minutes to downtown AVL and walkable to shops and restaurants at Haywood Rd (0.4mi) or the River Arts District (<1mi)! Stroll along scenic Riverview Drive, taking in the views of the city, or bike over to New Belgium for an evening of live music and food trucks by the river before heading back home to your hot tub. Experience the magic of West Asheville while just a short drive to the Biltmore and downtown.

name: Stunning, Furnished, Pickard Place Condo
description: This 2 bed 2 bath condo is perfect for travel nurses or a corporate rental. Everything in the condo is brand new, all you'll need is your luggage and personal items. Centrally located to Asheville, makes this condo the perfect jumping-off point for all the area has to offer.  Which includes national parks, breweries, and world class restaurants.  30 day minimum rental. Walking distance to Mission Hospital.

name: 5 minutes to Biltmore and 10 to all of Asheville
description:
While staying in my home, you can experience all that Asheville has to offer in a comfortable, clean and welcoming environment. Being located within 1 mile of Biltmore Village offers nearby restaurants, breweries and shopping while residing in a quiet, friendly residential area. Newly completed total renovation includes a natural gas-on demand-water heater for endless hot water, a gas stove and cook top for your culinary pleasure, and a gas furnace/AC and gas logs in the living
room.

name: Fun & Sunny Getaway Close to Everything Asheville
description: Newly renovated and modernized, this sunny home is located in the heart of West Asheville and just minutes from downtown and the River Arts District. A short walk to Carrier Park and the French Broad River, plus breweries and some of the best dining and late night options in town.

name: Fresh and Humble
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located home. With modern upgrades and ample space to enjoy each others company or just relax either indoors or outdoors. Minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, Downtown Asheville and so much more.

name: Cozy Camper - 1 bd/1br w/kitchenette -Mtn Views
description: Enjoy this cozy 1 bedroom camper. It has a full bath and kitchenette. Bedroom has a queen-sized mattress, built-in closets, storage, and a privacy sliding door. Whole camper has stereo system with aux available. TV and wifi available for streaming movies and shows. Beautiful mountain sunsets. Camper is located on owner's property and offers free parking. Recently added a small deck to enjoy the sunshine. Surrounding area around camper is still a work in progress and will be updated in time.

name: The Madera Madre - Made for Asheville Living
description: The Madera Madre - the “mother wood” gives life to the visceral vacationer and warmth to the weary traveler. Settle in with ease to your home away from home, nestled in a quiet neighborhood just a 5 to 7-minute drive from downtown. This private dream pad is the ideal hub for couples, friends, and family to explore everything Asheville. Recharge in the high-end Serta iComfort® bed with adjustable frame for an unbeatable night’s sleep! Fully equipped kitchen. Professionally cleaned!!

name: Cozy, peaceful suite in walkable West Asheville
description:
This simple, serene guest suite has everything you need and nothing you don’t for your Asheville adventure. Relax and refresh between taking in all the area has to offer! Features a private entrance, plenty of natural light, and special amenities to support a restful night's sleep. A short walk to Haywood Road and easy access to downtown and other popular nearby destinations.

Fully re-open after Helene and ready to welcome you to my sweet little corner of West Asheville!

name: The Mulberry Cottage - Cozy stay with Fireplace
description: Cozy and chic relaxing cottage close to all of the conveniences of Downtown Asheville.  Enjoy your favorite local brew or cup of coffee cuddled around the fireplace or sitting around the outdoor firepit. Perfectly located close to downtown, Biltmore, RAD, & UNCA. 1.5 miles to breweries, coffee, restaurants, & local hang-outs while offering a private retreat. 5-7 minute Uber ride to most Asheville attractions & Downtown. 15 min to Blue Ridge Parkway. Stays up to 28 days accepted Jan & February.

name: Luxury 7 bedroom home with spectacular views
description:
A newly renovated home on the side of a mountain overlooking the city of Asheville. The modern decor, high end finishes, art and furniture, plush bathrooms and bedrooms makes this house a standout above the rest.

Sunrise to sunset this home is incredibly private yet convenient to downtown, only 5 minutes away.

name: West Asheville private Escape.
description: Apartment 1 BR/1 BATH with full kitchen, living room and washer/dryer. Private entrance, with easy keyless access.

name: The Asheville Bungalow: 5 Miles to Downtown!
description: Private, completely remodeled, retro-styled modern home sits on half an acre of land, surrounded by trees and peace & quiet in beautiful west Asheville. Come relax, reset, and celebrate at The Bungalow. A quick drive to anything you might need and close to downtown! Thoughtfully curated space that's perfect for any kind of traveler: couples, families with kids, or small groups. Fire pit, outdoor chairs, record player, entertainment (DVDs, streaming, board/card games, and a Nintendo64), & more!

name: New King Bdrm Condo between downtown and South AVL
description:
Brand new luxury 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo in the across from New Belgium Brewery between downtown and South AVL. King bed in bedroom. Built in Queen Murphy Bed in the entry area for an occasional additional guest. Separate workstation. Open floor plan with large comfortable sectional. Kitchen with all new appliances and bar seating for 3. Round dining table with seating for 4.

5 min drive to Biltmore.
15 min to Blue Ridge Pkwy.
Walk to West Asheville, RAD, and downtown Asheville.

name: 'Foxglove Cottage' in Walkable West Asheville
description: Experience the heart of Asheville at 'Foxglove Cottage'! This 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom cottage boasts plenty of character, all the comforts of home, and easy access to hot spots like New Belgium Brewing and the French Broad River Park. From its quiet neighborhood location, you can also bike across the bridge to the vibrant River Arts District or head to the Greenway for an afternoon stroll. Looking to stay in? Enjoy reading a book on the sunny daybed and sipping an evening cocktail in the backyard!

name: Modern, Trendy, Dog Friendly Home in West AVL
description: Welcome to the Sand Hill Hideaway! Get the friends and family together in this beautifully-designed, newly-constructed West Asheville home, close to everything this wonderful city has to offer. No expense was spared to make this your stylish, comfortable, and enjoyable home away from home. Named one of the best pet-friendly Airbnbs by Travel Guides Asheville!

name: West Asheville cozy one bedroom guest suite unit
description:
Non smoking only!
This is a comfy cute little guest suite with close proximity to downtown and West Asheville,and near many great hikes and mountain bike trails.
I have another very successful AirBnb and will make sure that you have an awsome stay!
Sorry,Please no pets in this
apartment.
There is a smart tv with Netflix only,no live tv.You May stream your own subscriptions.

name: Home near Asheville with Power & Water
description:
**Our home is intact post-Helene, no damage. Power and water have been restored and the house is ready for guests. Price has been reduced for linemen/service providers.

Our home boasts 3 bedrooms, a fully-stocked kitchen, and cozy living room with smart TV. It is a short drive to Hendersonville, Brevard, downtown Asheville, Black Mountain. Linens, towels, and some paper products are provided. Washer/dryer are in the basement. The space is cozy and in a quiet neighborhood. Enjoy!

name: Downtown Asheville! Walk to everything!
description: Clean, safe, convenient. 100 restaurants at your finger tips! The river and all of the amazing breweries are less than 200 yards away. Half a mile from central downtown Asheville. There is no property like this on any website!!! Come stay and see for yourself the magic of the RAD Resort (River Arts District) Tons of restaurants, shops and breweries. There are 15 steps up to the house and only street parking.

name: cozy home 15 mnts to Downtown Asheville
description: located in a quiet and friendly neighborhood in West Asheville. You’ll be just 15 minutes away from the vibrant downtown area, where you can explore the local restaurants, shops, hiking trails, and breweries. The Asheville airport is also conveniently close, only 25 minutes by car. If you need more space for a larger group, you can also inquire about our next-door property.

name: Sauna & long term bedroom with adjustable bed
description:
Fully furnished master bedroom with attached private bathroom. The bed is a queen size and adjustable for comfortable reading position or a Zero G weightless rest.
The house is a 3 bedroom home that you will be sharing with one other quiet, clean individual.
The deck and outdoor space look out to 7 acres of woods. Great for coffee with the sunrise. There is also an outdoor sauna that you have access to after those long days.

name: There’s no place like home away from home!
description: Come relax and enjoy some time off in this lovely comfortable suite. Enjoy the city in a short drive and relax in the peaceful little town of Arden to wind down the afternoons and evenings. This place is central to city life and nature hikes or beautiful waterfall trails. It’s located 3.7 miles from Asheville Airport and Agricultural center. Also only 22 min from the infamous Biltmore Estate. There is lots to love about our city! Come relax in a nice comfortable space while you explore!

name: Luxury Private Suite: Bedroom/Bath near Asheville!
description:
Welcome to Asheville!
Enjoy a renovated luxury suite with a king-sized bed, private full bath, dual-monitor workspace, and high-tech amenities. This super-clean, shared townhouse was designed for Airbnb guests—everything is brand new.

Conveniently located minutes from Asheville Airport, downtown Asheville, Hendersonville, Biltmore Estate, Pisgah Forest, and the Blue Ridge Mountains. Perfect for work or play!

name: Large 3 bedroom 3.5 Bath Downtown Condo
description: Gorgeous downtown condo with contemporary meets turn of the century design in this historic new-buildout building, sunny and walkable condo in downtown Asheville. This 1st floor 3-bedroom features 3 king masters, each with private baths and a 1/2 bath in the common area. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: The Barebridge Suite ~ a modern mountain retreat
description:
Best of both worlds– quiet mountain experience close to everything.

Newly built space with a private entrance in a wooded mountain setting, minutes away from Downtown.

Lounge on the porch in the shade of the grape vine trellis, enjoying the quiet serenity of the mountains, and watch as deers, rabbits, and birds play in the yard. Recharge with a rain head shower before going out to explore.

name: Secluded 2BR Cabin | Hot Tub | 10 min to Asheville
description: Adventure meets serenity at this cozy 2BR cabin just minutes from Asheville! Nestled in peaceful woods, it features a king bed, twin loft beds, 1.5 baths, open floor plan, and a HOT TUB for unwinding. Hike the Blue Ridge Parkway, explore Biltmore, brewery-hop downtown, or simply relax and recharge in your private retreat.

name: Cozy Home Away From Home
description: Our charming 2-bedroom house has everything you need for your trip here to Western North Carolina.  Enjoy the use of 2 large smart TVs, Wi-Fi, a coffee bar and outside lounging. During your stay, you are conveniently located to all that Asheville has to offer.  With close range to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Asheville Regional Airport, the Biltmore Estate, I-26, Sierra Nevada, and Downtown Asheville and Hendersonville.  We hope that you enjoy your stay at our cozy home away from home.

name: Bay Window Beauty Close to Everything
description: Cozy 1BR duplex in the historic Charlotte Street neighborhood of North Asheville. This beautifully renovated one-bedroom is part of a historic home that offers a true local experience.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Wonderful Home with Hot Tub
description:
Wonderful multi-level, 3 bedroom 2.5 bath home with all King beds and a Queen sleeper sofa, conveniently located 5 min from Downtown Asheville.
​​​​​​​ Bring the family or group of friends to this comfortable home.
Close to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Downtown Asheville, Highlands Brewery, Shopping, and everything else Asheville has to offer. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Bright & Inviting Home by Biltmore Village w/ Deck
description: Take advantage of a location that can't be beaten at this brand-new vacation rental home, situated minutes from the Biltmore Estate and horseback riding lessons. Five miles away, explore the artist's haven and culinary mecca that is downtown Asheville, complete with a myriad of galleries, gardens, museums, and craft breweries. If the diverse array of attractions the city offers hasn't sold you already, the backyard, sunny interior, and elegant decor of this 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath home surely will!

name: Luxurious 2BR Loft in Downtown Asheville
description: Come experience The Press Loft, a 30+ day Executive rental, with  historic charm & eclectic feel of Downtown Asheville! This luxurious 2 bedroom loft apartment is an upscale, luxury destination for those looking to experience Asheville for an extended period of time. Walkable to everything!

name: Walkable 1BR Dog Friendly | Balcony
Idyllic 2BR Mountainview | Sauna | Fireplace
Downtown 2BR | Deck | Washer/Dryer
Spacious 6BR Dog Friendly | Fireplace | Deck
Vintage 3BR | Patio | W/D
Walkable 2 bedroom home close to everything!!!
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. Minutes to Mission Hospital, Biltmore Village, and Asheville Mall. Only a short drive to DT Asheville and Whole Foods. Open and bright floor plan; offering great room, kitchen, and 9' ceilings in the other rooms for maximum light; granite counters. Master Suite with full ensuite & direct access to the large side porch.

name: Remodeled 2BR | W/D | Chef's Kitchen | Downtown
Sunset view 3BR | Fireplace | Patio
Peaceful dog-friendly 2BR on private lake, dock
4BR | Balcony | Firepit | Koi Pond | Home Office
Cabins 5BR Mountainview | Fireplace | Patio
Mountain 3BR with large yard - near downtown
Dazzling 3BR | Fireplace | Deck | Firepit
Sunrise 'N Shine: NEW W Asheville Cozy Studio Apt
description: Stay in our newly renovated, open concept space that is peaceful, private and centrally-located in West Asheville. Complete with your own screened-in porch and separate entrance, our cozy apartment is the perfect spot for your Asheville getaway.

name: Beautiful Historic Home in Montford by Downtown
description: Beautifully restored 1907 original in the historic Montford neighborhood, only .08 of a mile from downtown. Fantastic front porch with swings overlooking neighborhood, private fenced in yard and patio in the back, new appliances in kitchen, 65" flat screen and comfy sofas, king and full sized beds, a futon, 2.5 bathrooms, private off street parking. Easy walk to great neighborhood restaurants/coffee shops and only .08 of a mile from downtown shops/brewery/dining/entertainment.

name: 15 mins to DT!  Firepit, games, 2 office spaces
description:
Relax with family and friends at this peaceful home in a quiet neighborhood. Located in S. Asheville (Arden), you are 15-20 mins to DT and 10 mins to the airport, but surrounded by nature. Relax on the front & back porches, down by the stream or under the giant Magnolia where the firepit and picnic table is located. Excellent wifi with 2 dedicated workspaces, full size W/D, fully stocked kitchen and plenty of parking.
Near to Breweries, River Arts, Biltmore, Fabulous Hiking, Kayaking & more!

name: Lovely Downtown Retreat, with fenced yard
description: Welcome to the stunning mountains of Asheville. Our lovely 2 bedroom apartment is centrally located in historic Montford - one of the oldest and most beautiful neighbourhoods in Asheville - 3 minutes drive or 20 min walk from downtown bars and restaurants.  All modern conveniences are provided such an an electric fireplace, large shower and small hotel quality kitchenette. There are 2 large bedrooms with plenty of room for everyone to enjoy mountain life.

name: Craftman Home in Historic West Asheville
description: Walk to everything west Asheville has to offer. This craftsman style 100 year old two bedroom is in the middle of it all. There is a wood burning fireplace, original wood floor, full kitchen and brand new appliances. Everything is close by within 5-10 minute drive. Restaurants, bars, shopping are just outside steps away. Although it is so close to everything, the house is situated in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. A great neighborhood and very walkable.

name: 3BR Valleyview Dog Friendly | Fireplace
Bedroom with private bathroom. 15 min to Asheville
description: Charming space overlooking a lovely backyard garden in a quiet residential neighborhood. Clean, safe premises close to Asheville. Plenty of great nearby eateries and breweries. Close to Blue Ridge Parkway, straight shot to Biltmore Estate. Supercomfortable queensize bed. Great shower flow. 2 sweet elderly cats also live here.
