name: A lovely one bedroom, quiet area, near downtown!
description: Get comfortable and enjoy plenty of extra room at this spacious(1200)sq ft basement apartment! Big bedroom and living room and spacious kitchen. Nice neighborhood for walking, Friendly neighborhood. Near the world famous 12 bones restaurant,the Biltmore estates, downtown Asheville, Sierra Nevada brewing company, the Asheville airport. From my location easy access to highway 26 Or highway 40

name: Five Bedroom Home Close to Downtown
description:
Very convenient five bedroom three and half bath home in North Asheville. Enjoy the ability to explore Asheville in this lovely updated contemporary home.
Bring the family and/ or friends to this fully functional house.
Perfect for your group getaway to Asheville! *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Historic Downtown Escape
description: Located on the garden level and overlooking a in-ground pool and spacious back yard complete with fire pit and outdoor swing, this newly remodeled private oasis is truly unique to the Asheville area. Located downtown in the renowned River Arts District, this spot boasts walkability to all of your favorite art galleries and breweries. This stylish private bedroom has its own outdoor entrance, outdoor seating, private full bathroom, mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Come stay with us!

name: Claude Jean Damme Van @Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Claude Jean Damme Van is located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. Experience #VanLife without the car payments or headache of converting your parents' minivan. Bring your own sleeping bags and pillows. This van is "off grid" so there's no power in the vehicle, but indoor bathrooms and outlets are just steps away. The campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural Asheville.
*Read the full description below.*

name: Casa Negra Studio - Monthly rental
description: Lower level studio in a brand new modern home in a walkable West Asheville neighborhood. On street parking, fully equipped kitchenette, queen size bed,  small bathroom, TV - no cable just Netflix, under counter refrigerator, oven and cooktop, all dishes and pots pans, utensils,  coffee maker, toaster etc. iron. Outdoor patio and beautiful view of a small urban forest. Shared washer and dryer and freezer.

name: The Yellow Door
description: Welcome to our lovely, vibrant space conveniently located just 4.5 miles from downtown Asheville and 2 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway. This room is filled with beautiful original art, plants, and pops of color that will make you feel right at home. The large windows provide plenty of natural light. You'll notice unique touches like handmade wood countertops, a charming handcrafted pottery sink, and an antique window that all add to the good vibes.  The TV rotates to allow viewing from bed.

name: Beautiful Condo in the Heart of Downtown Asheville
description:
Perfectly situated in the heart of downtown, this 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo is a short walk to the music venues, breweries, restaurants, and art galleries that define the Asheville experience! The property is located only a mile from the River Arts District and a 15-minute drive to the Biltmore Estate or Blue Ridge Parkway.

Comfortable, stylish, and clean, this condo is located on the 4th floor and offers all the amenities you’ll need in a phenomenal location you will not want to leave.

name: Hill Top Tree House by CM | Hot Tub & Near Hiking
description: Nestled into a wooded, neighborhood cul-de-sac just west of Asheville, Hill Top Tree house offers a comfortable home away from home with privacy and unbeatable convenience. This four-bedroom retreat is perfect for a big family or a group getaway.

name: Asheville-Mountain Views | Close to Everything
description: South Asheville Getaway- views of the mountains but only 3 minutes from restaurants, shopping, movies, gyms, and more. This centrally located home is perfect for a weekend getaway, a small group retreat, a place to stay while visiting family, or a longer stay for business or house hunting. 3 minutes to Biltmore Park, 15 minutes to The Biltmore House, 15 minutes to all downtown has to offer, 10 minutes to the Airport, 10 minutes to mountain biking, hiking, tubing, climbing, breweries, and more.

name: King beds, hot tub, fireplaces, 7 mi to downtown
description: Experience the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern comfort in our spacious "Camby Cabin," nestled amidst Asheville's majestic woods. Just 7 miles to downtown, our cabin offers close proximity to landmarks like the Biltmore Estate and WNC Nature Center, making it an ideal choice for group retreats. With 6 cozy bedrooms, an outdoor hot tub, and a number of luxurious amenities, every moment here is a rejuvenating escape.

name: Comfortable Modern West Asheville home
description:
Modern Green Built and Energy Star certified home. Located in lively West Asheville - easy walking distance to bustling and trendy Haywood Road. Easy drive to downtown, Biltmore, River Arts District, and everything Asheville has to offer. 3 bedroom/2.5 bath home has 3 levels with open kitchen/living; features stainless appliances and Silestone countertops. Two parking spaces.

Fully furnished and decorated with queen beds in all bedrooms. Bring your (well-behaved) furry friends!

name: Private mountain retreat near downtown AVL.
description: Drink your morning coffee on the large deck while you watch the sunrise over the mountains.  Take an afternoon nap in the hammock in the shade.  Gaze out the windows at the mountain views.  Sleep peacefully in the quiet and dark bedroom.  Heat up leftovers from that wonderful Asheville restaurant and have dinner with a glass of wine on the deck.  Watch roku tv or play games.  Super close to all Asheville has to offer, yet feels like a mountain retreat.

name: *New*Bright&Trendy 3bed Pad|10minDT,Biltmore,WAVL
description:
Pets are welcome! There is a $75 pet fee per pet for a maximum of two.
A comfortable and convenient home with easy access to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, River Arts District, and so much more! Bring the family and explore Asheville like a local. place.

You’ve planned an Asheville weekend filled with scenic hikes, incredible eats, and the world’s greatest brewery hop, but have you thought about where you’re going to kick back and relax after all that hustle?

name: Creekside in W AVL in fantastic walkable area!
description: The lower level of our home will be your own private, beautifully decorated space.  Queen bed w/heated mattress pad; sectional sofa that converts to queen bed, fully stocked kitchenette, private deck overlooking creek to enjoy a glass of wine!  Walk to numerous restaurants, breweries, music venues, shops and the River Arts District; easy jaunt to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, and floating/kayaking down the French Broad river; and a quick car ride to a multitude of gorgeous hikes!

name: Huge Asheville house Views Hot Tub & Sauna
description: A beautiful home with mile long mountain views  of Asheville, NC. This home is great for large groups and families, desiring an executive home. All bedrooms have comfortable king size beds!  We are located only 15 minutes to downtown Asheville and less than 10 minutes to Haywood Rd in West Asheville. An incredible location close to everything! Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: 2 bed/2 bath Apt Mtn Views
description:
2 Bed/2 bath w amazing mountain views! Rooms have queen size bed, 2 nightstands, desk and TV. Bathrooms are spacious. Kitchenet with sink, fridge, microwave, coffee maker, electric grill, Ninja 12 in 1 , toaster oven/fryer, kitchen table with stools.coffee, tea, hot chocolate.
Space has a private entrance with self check-in and is the entire first floor of a 2 story house. Owner lives 2nd floor. 1 pet only $50fee.
Long-term rentals: $100 pet fee monthly Cleaning fee is $200.

name: Adventure and relaxation 5 miles from downtown AVL
description: 5 miles from downtown and 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway, you are close to it all. After a day of adventure, enjoy the woods with a fire on the back porch, skip rocks down at the Swannanoa River, or watch a movie with the whole family in the basement media room and live like a local in the best little neighborhood between Asheville and Black Mountain.

name: The Snuggery - 1 bedroom with full kitchen
description:
The Snuggery is a fully functional cozy apartment in a quiet neighborhood of West Asheville. We offer sleeping accommodations for up to 4, a sizable living/dining area, a complete kitchen, and internet access.
Discover our eclectic bohemian atmosphere easily on foot from here. Steps away, you can find many quaint and delicious offerings at shops, breweries, and restaurants. Explore Downtown Asheville less than 10 minutes away. 
Rest and relax back at ‘home’ after your day’s adventures.

name: Gem of the Blue Mountains. High speed WI-FI
description:
Recently constructed house with modern amenities in a quiet neighborhood. It is conveniently located 10 min away from downtown Asheville and 6 min away from Biltmore estate. Blue ridge Parkway is around the corner as well. Stroll along French Broad River, Asheville arts scene, hike the Appalachian trails, or head downtown to enjoy finest dining, and shopping!
Fiber optic internet, up to 300 Mgps.

name: Newly-Built Villa in Downtown Asheville!
description: Get ready to be welcomed by High on the Mountain, one of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain. Quickly becoming a premier location for travelers coming to one of the most sought after travel destinations. Come enjoy the comforts of home in this newly built (2022), luxurious 4-bedroom property.

name: Little Sadie | Newly Built Asheville Villa
description: Come experience Little Sadie! This beautiful property is one of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain. This newly built property will have you amazed by the attention to detail, the décor and finishes exude luxury! You'll be walking distance to restaurants, shops, and more! And, located just a 10 minute drive from downtown Asheville, near hiking, biking and kayaking, this will be the perfect home away from home for your time in the area!

name: 4BR Pet-Friendly Villa in Asheville with Hot Tub
description: Welcome to Little Sparrow! This unique luxury destination, is newly constructed (2022) and while providing all of the modern amenities, exudes warmth. Tucked away, this is one of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain. A number of restaurants, shops, YMCA located within walking distance and you are a 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville and just around the corner from hiking, biking and kayaking!

name: Orange Blossom | Asheville Villa with Hot Tub
description: Introducing Orange Blossom! One of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain. With a name inspired by the areas old folk song, this brand new, 3 level property exudes comfort and luxury. You will not be disappointed, as every detail has been thought of! Located in a premier destination, short walk to dining, shopping and more! And only a 10 minute drive from downtown Asheville!

name: Shady Grove | Asheville Villa with Hot Tub
description: Welcome to Shady Grove! This brand new build (2022) is one of Asheville's newest vacation rentals that provides truly luxurious accommodations!  The name is inspired from the traditional Appalachian folk song, and is one of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain. Shops and dining within walking distance you and you are located just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, and close to everything the Blue Ridge Mountains have to offer!

name: Southbound | Asheville Villa with Hot Tub
description: Welcome to Southbound, one of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain! This 4 bedroom property is newly built and has brand new furnishings! It exudes luxury from the moment you walk in. Stay close and walk to the restaurants and shops in Reynolds Village. Or, enjoy downtown Asheville and all of the shops, galleries, restaurants and more...you're just 10 minutes from your home base!

name: Modern Retreat Near Downtown with Hot Tub
description: The Sunny Side is a special mountain luxury retreat, perfect for families or groups of friends alike. One of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain and close to all the Blue Ridge Mountains have to offer, walkable to Reynolds Village with dining, shopping, wellness and more!  And, you're only 10 minutes to the heart of downtown Asheville.

name: Weeping Willow | Near Downtown Asheville | Hot Tub
description: Weeping Willow! You will feel right at home in this spectacular modern, contemporary mountain retreat. One of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain and a short walk to Reynolds Village shops and restaurants. Perfectly located just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and near everything the Blue Ridge Mountains have to offer. Make this your “home-base” for your trip to Asheville!

name: Pet-friendly 4BR Home | Asheville | Hot Tub
description: Wildwood Flower! Welcome to this newly constructed, (2022) modern and luxurious destination! One of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain, this is the perfect place for your special trip to Asheville. A short walk to shopping, dining, gym, etc! And just 10 short minutes to downtown! You will experience the vibe that is Asheville, while being able to return from a day of enjoying all the local attractions to this oasis.

name: Mountain View’s Near Sierra Nevada Brewing
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.  This house is sitting on 1.76 acres land with beautiful Mountain View’s, close to everything airport, arboretum, kayaking, movie theater, outlet mall, Sierra Nevada beer brewery and 15 minutes to downtown asheville.

name: DT Asheville - Zurich MNT Chalet #9A/Low Cost Uber
description:
5-star 1960s unique mountain cottage that is just 1.2 miles from downtown Asheville. Located on Beaucatcher Mountain, this charming home sits on a narrow switchback road above the famous mountain tunnel heading into downtown Asheville.

The home is secluded on a mountain top with beautiful views, offers hiking opportunities and occasional bear sightings, yet it is still only a 5-minute drive to downtown. It really is in one of the best locations in the entire city of Asheville!

name: Asheville Mountain Home 5 BDRM Dog Frndly, Hot Tub
description: Located in a small quiet mountain subdivision, this 5BR/3.5BA getaway has it all - a large fenced yard perfect for kids or furbabies (due to hurricane damage, some fencing is down in the backyard), screened porch, 2 levels of porch/deck, hot tub, game room, chef’s kitchen, ample parking space and 5BR/3.5BA spread out over 4,600 square feet. Enjoy easy access to a many outdoor adventures and the culture and cuisine of nearby Asheville. Enjoy fast, reliable WiFi and a private office space.

name: Big Oaks Cozy 2-bedroom home in West Asheville
description: Walking distance to the heart of West Asheville, where you will find a variety of restaurants, coffee shops, breweries, and everything that makes Asheville unique!   One block from Malvern Hills Park, which has a public pool, tennis/basketball court, picnic shelter, playground, and lots of green space.  10 minute drive to downtown Asheville.  Come stay at Big Oaks and enjoy hiking, mountain biking, tubing the French Broad River, breweries, and fantastic restaurants!

name: Cozy Studio, walking distance to downtown
description: Convenient and private Studio, only a 5 minute drive to downtown, South Slope and the RAD (River Art's District). Or walk 15 minutes and access each area without the hassle of parking! There's a queen bed as well as a queen sleep sofa (memory foam makes ALL the difference). This cozy Studio makes the perfect resting spot between adventures whether you're visiting a brewery or exploring nature!

name: Quaint, Pet Friendly & 10Min to Downtown Asheville
description: Experience all that Asheville has to offer while staying at a fun, relaxing, family friendly and Pet Friendly farm home that's just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and West Asheville!  Staying in for the night? Enjoy a game of Foosball, practice Yoga, get some work done, or make some S'mores at the Fire Pit.

name: “Lady's House" - cheerful 3 bedroom home
description: Welcome back to Asheville!  As western NC continues to recover from the devastation brought by Hurricane Helene, businesses, restaurants and shops are open and so very appreciative of the guests returning to the area.  Lady's House is conveniently located to the Asheville Regional Airport, the NC Arboretum, Biltmore House, the Blue Ridge Parkway, and a short drive to downtown Asheville.  Local attractions and businesses are open, and the Asheville area welcomes you!

name: Quiet West AVL suite with city & mountain views
description:
Post-Helene update: we are open, have clean water, and look forward to your visit!

Located in the heart of E/W AVL, this cozy guest suite is walkable to Haywood Rd shops/restaurants and is less than a 10 minute drive from downtown, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and more!

Located in a safe, quiet neighborhood, the unit has its own private entrance, on-site parking, patio, hammock, and a super comfy bed. Come enjoy the beautiful views at your perfect home base for AVL adventures!

name: Suite in contemporary home, near UNCA & downtown.
description:
Kick back & relax in this quiet, contemporary, chemical & smoke free environment. Living room w/sofa bed, bedroom w/queen. Whole house water filter system, including UV light to remove bacteria & viruses. Full kitchen w/counter oven/air fryer, induction stovetop & all necessary equipment. Private parking space, entrance, patio w/table & chairs, deck w/chairs.
*New construction
*Quiet
*Plug-in for electric car
*Short walk to UNCA
*1 1/2 miles from town center
*Five minutes to downtown Asheville

name: Walking Distance To Charming Downtown Asheville
description: Stay in our beautifully renovated 1917 home in Asheville’s Historic Montford District, minutes from downtown. Relax on the cozy front porch with a gas firepit. Walk to parks, the greenway, great restaurants, or downtown’s shops and dining. Whole Foods, Trader Joe’s, and Harris Teeter are nearby. Prefer wheels to walking? Ask about our new golf cart rental for easy exploring!

name: DT Asheville - Zurich MNT Chalet #9B/Low Cost Uber
description:
5-star 1960s unique mountain cottage that is just 1.2 miles from downtown Asheville. Located on Beaucatcher Mountain, this charming home sits on a narrow switchback road above the famous mountain tunnel heading into downtown Asheville.

It is located in one of the best locations in the city!

name: West AVL Gem: Dining, Breweries & Outdoors
description:
Steps from New Belgium and the French Broad hiking/biking Greenway, 5 min drive from downtown, this spacious, private guest suite in our newly built home provides a secluded stay in the West Asheville/River Arts District while still being within walking distance to breweries, restaurants, music venues, and art studios.

The AirBnB has a private entrance, kitchenette, bedroom, full bathroom and living area.

We love our new home and its location and look forward to sharing it with you!

name: Cozy 3 bedroom home near Downtown Asheville
description: Make memories in beautiful Asheville while relaxing in our quiet neighborhood vacation home. Enjoy s'mores by the fire, listen to the birds on our two decks, or just relax in a rocker.  Dog friendly fenced in yard, and minutes to hikes and other Asheville adventures!

name: Lodge at Capps Lake Helene: Relief Workers Welcome
description: Explore this 1.68 acre serene getaway, complete with a stream, a bridge, a meadow perfect for lawn games, a bamboo grove, fire pit and extended spa deck with luxury hot tub. Winter views of Capps Lake offer a picturesque scene from the deck. The lake is obscured by shrubs during warmer months, but the frog song and critter's chorus' are abundant! The lake is privately owned, we do not own the lake but the property boarders the edge.

name: Home away from home to be with friends and family!
description: Get together with your loved ones to enjoy a location close to downtown Asheville! Enjoy a fully-stocked house with everything you need to make your stay comfortable. Closely located to some of Asheville's most wonderful attraction such as the BIltmore, Grove Park Inn and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Log Cabin in Blue Ridge Mountains Near Asheville
description: Welcome to Skyridge Cabin! This beautiful log home is nestled in a private woodsy area convenient to South Asheville shopping, dining, and only 20 minutes to Downtown Asheville. You will immediately feel at home with this cabin as your home base while you go out and explore all the Blue Ridge Mountains have to offer.

name: Location, location, location! 1/2 mi to Biltmore!
description: Kick back and relax at this apartment, with its own private entrance, private bath with shower over tub. Creature comforts abound: queen bed with luxury linens, 60 inch Roku, fireplace, bistro table & chairs, work desk/chair, wardrobe, Duo Keurig Coffee Station, microwave/convection oven & more, Mitsubishi mini-split for temperature control. French door opens unto a 27x13 covered porch and large fire pit. 3 blocks to Biltmore Village for food, breweries and more.  1.2 mi to city center.

name: Cozy suite with private entrance
description: Cozy private suite with off street parking & separate entrance in West Asheville home.  Queen bed and own private bathroom.  In a quiet neighborhood just 2 miles to Haywood Road in West Asheville. 15 minute drive to downtown Asheville.  This downstairs bedroom is tucked away from homeowner.  No shared inside space at all. Separate entrance steps away from parking.  Mini fridge in the closet.  Freshly painted & renovated after Helene.

name: Serene Getaway in S. Asheville Near Everything!
description: NEW PAVED DRIVEWAY!! Relax in our renovated South Asheville Hideaway. Tucked away on quiet acreage but central to everything; we are minutes from great dining and the Blue Ridge Parkway, 10 minutes from Biltmore Village, and 15 minutes from the airport and downtown Asheville. Enjoy our complimentary coffee, tea, and hot chocolate, fire up the grill, and enjoy a night around the fire pit!

name: The Look Out Trail at River Row Flats
description: Enjoy the city feel while staying in this spacious room with vibrant colors and tall windows. Minutes from downtown and all of the city's attractions.

name: Grand Victorian home --walk to downtown
description: Impeccably restored Victorian, 7 gas-fireplaces, wraparound porches, English gardens, outdoor seating areas, private parking, ac, laundry, 9 ½ ft ceilings. Historic neighborhood, blocks from heart of downtown Asheville. Greenway, Whole Foods. 1st floor: full chef's kitchen, dining room, butler pantries, reception area, large office (w/pull out sofa bed), full bath. 2nd floor: 2 bedrooms, full bath, luxurious bed/bath master suite. 3rd floor: tv den, kitchenette, bath, office. Hot tub outside.

name: Private, safe, and clean near Biltmore
description:
Enjoy a safe, clean home central to all the best of Asheville! Great for individuals, couples, or small families.

2021-built basement suite features privacy, off-street parking, and views, but is only 4 minutes to Biltmore Village and 8 to downtown Asheville. Private rear entrance to your own floor! Separate bedroom, living room, and bathroom. Walk-in shower. High speed wireless internet, charging stations, patio, and kitchenette.

Please expect yard damage and debris due to Hurricane Helenee.

name: Newly Renovated- 5min- Downt. /Biltmore Estate
description: If you are looking for a Modern, Charming, Spotless and Private townhouse with fantastic location, close to Downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate, this townhome is for you!

name: Cozy modern home near Biltmore Estate&River Arts.
description: Come settle into this private detached, modern guesthouse.Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space curated to make you feel at home. Apple HomePod speaker in each bedroom and bathroom.

name: Cozy 1 bedroom home in a great area
description: Nice 1 bedroom set up that is pet friendly. I currently travel so am not around and the house would be empty for you. This area is right in between the airport and downtown. You can pretty much get anywhere in 15-20 minutes. There is a large unfinished basement where you could store any outdoor equipment. Jake Rusher park and Collier Cove nature preserve are both within 2 minutes from the front door.

name: Three King Bedrooms, Terrace, and Private Elevator
description: Stunning southside city views, outdoor space, and contemporary design in this new-build, walkable condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom features 3 king bedrooms, and 3.5 bathrooms. The unit also provides a double garage that can accommodate two compact cars, a private elevator, and rooftop terrace. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: 🔥 Tranquil Mountain Cottage in East Asheville ⛰
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. We’re merely 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Located less than a mile from the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway. Stroll to the Mountains to Sea Trail.

We look forward to welcoming y’all to the beautiful city of Asheville. Your family will enjoy our unique and serene cottage with a creek in the backyard.

The house has a full kitchen, fenced in yard for pets, and plenty of living space and room for you to enjoy.

Additional, $75 pet fee.

name: Hickory Hilltop Hideaway • Sauna • 15 to AVL
description: Nestled on a hillside in the Blue Ridge Mountains, the Hickory Hilltop Hideaway offers a peaceful escape just minutes from all that Asheville has to offer. Enjoy the barrel steam sauna, cozy accommodations, and a range of thoughtful amenities designed to make your stay as relaxing and enjoyable as possible. Just to note: there are two other AirBnBs in the vicinity so you may run into other guests, the property manager lives on property so if you need anything just reach out!

name: 4BR Home Minutes to Downtown, RAD & Biltmore
description: Discover comfort in our spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home, ideal for families and groups of friends traveling for a perfect getaway in Asheville! This home offers a prime location just minutes from Biltmore Estate, River Arts District and Downtown Asheville. Immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city while enjoying the comfort and convenience of this home away from home.

name: Kenilworth Tudor w/full kitchen near Biltmore
description:
Centrally located in the walkable, wooded Kenilworth neighborhood, enjoy the serenity of a comfortable home base just minutes from Asheville’s top attractions. Very close to Biltmore Estate and Village, Downtown, River Arts and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space is a clean, well-appointed 800 sq. ft. apartment with spacious bedroom, full kitchen, dining area and separate entrance on the ground level of our home. Dedicated off-street parking for one vehicle, free Level 2 EV charging (J1772 only)

name: Cottage 5 min to Biltmore Estate or 10 to Downtown
description: Tulip Tree Cottage is 10 min to Downtown & the River Arts District, 5 min to Highland Brewing,  Biltmore House, or the Blue Ridge Pkwy entrance. This sweet cottage has been totally remodeled with high-end stainless steel appliances, hand hewn wood accents, ceramic floors & lots of modern touches. Covered front porch to enjoy your morning coffee and privacy fencing in backyard. Hiking, mountain biking, shopping & the French Broad River are all within 15 minutes. Monthly stays welcome.

name: Historic Montford Home
description:
2020 Asheville Preservation Society Griffin Award Winner

Available immediately until October 3, 2023

Originally built 1915; Renovated and Restored in 2020

2200 sq.ft

4 victorian fireplaces, 43 custom designed (Richard Sharp Smith) windows, Fully restored from roof to sump pump; all walls and ceiling insulated, Oak flooring, New HVAC (Rheem); original boiler for radiators restored and updated.

3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths

search Youtube for Griffin Award-84 Elizabeth-2020

elec. car 220 plug

name: Chic AVL Getaway – Minutes to Biltmore & DWTN
description:
“Peace of Mind” combines charm and modern luxury, featuring abundant natural light, spacious living areas, a well-appointed kitchen, and an elegant master suite . Gather indoors or outdoors with a large deck, fenced yard, firepit, hammocks, and a special kids' hideaway.

Nestled in a peaceful neighborhood with no storm damage, you're less than 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate, downtown Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, and local breweries. Book now for an unforgettable stay!

name: Asheville Airstream & Hot Tub
description: This place to stay is truly one of a kind. Great glamping experience with all the luxuries of home.  Hot tub, patio and fire pit.  Close to Haywood road and Downtown Asheville.

name: Cute as can be! 2Bd-1Ba 10min from town (the nest)
description: "The neighborhood is quiet, friendly, and within a close drive of the river park, grocery stores, and downtown Ashville. It's removed enough that it almost seems like you're staying at a quaint cabin in the woods." - Courtney, from her review

name: Cozy Mountain Home in the Blue Ridge Near Biltmore
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located home. Relax on the large back yard deck or chill around the firepit. Fully equipped kitchen and laundry room. Large master bedroom opens onto the back deck. The neighborhood is friendly and safe for walking. 13 miles from downtown Asheville, and 1/2 mile from Biltmore Park and I-26.

name: Adorable Detached Studio Minutes from Downtown
description: This studio apartment is located in the beautiful Norwood Park neighborhood.  It is 2 miles to downtown Asheville and 1.3 miles to the historic Grove Park Inn.  Amenities include a mini fridge, microwave, and coffee bar.   Parking is on street with motion activated lighting to safely guide you to the keypad coded entrance door.

name: Land & Lower Level, Private Natural Beauty
description: The Lower Level of the Brown House is a daylight basement apartment with a private entrance on 5 acres in a quiet wooded neighborhood backed up to National Forest & the Blue Ridge Parkway.  We, the owners , a couple of retirement age, live in the house, but confine ourselves to the Upper Level when guests are staying.  The door at the bottom of the stairs will be locked.  We rented the whole house out for 2 years (5 star reviews!) after it was built and we just moved in the beginning of 2024.

name: Stunning, Light filled, 3-4 BR 3 Bath Luxury Home
description: New listing.  Gorgeous 4bd, 3ba home, walking distance to downtown and the River Arts District. Our home is full of light, with windows up to 16 feet high, very contemporary, with views of the mountains and downtown Asheville.  Full of amenities,  lush gardens. We are very convenient to all areas of Asheville and surrounding mountain towns. Our renovated family room (no photo) and 4th bedroom, brings both togetherness and privacy. 10% discount for first guests as we begin to add reviews.

name: White Oak|3 Bed Pad|10min DT,Biltmore,WAVL
description:
Pets are welcome with $75 per pet fee!
We invite you to White Oak, a stylish, cheery, mid-century modern inspired home less than 10 minutes from Asheville. Our newly constructed, two-story house has a thoughtful floor plan for you and your guests, and is accented with art pieces from local artists. This is the perfect spot to recharge after a day of exploring the town and wondrous mountains. Come treat yourself to style and comfort!

name: Stylish, secluded cabin—5mi to Biltmore, downtown
description: Welcome to Haw Creek Hideaway, the perfect place to relax in seclusion while staying close to all that Asheville has to offer!  Just 5 miles from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore and  3 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Whether you are visiting Asheville for the hiking, biking, art and music scene, breweries, eclectic dining, or to visit the world famous Biltmore Estate, the cabin will provide a stylish, well-appointed home base for you!

name: The SWEET SPOT!  Huge Porch, By River, Near Town!
description:
Have fun with the whole family at this recently updated home!

Minutes to downtown Asheville, UNCA campus, or the River Arts District. A short stroll across the street to the French Broad River and the newly opened Silver-Line Park. Location, location, location!

Home is perfect for families or friends and is a great home base for exploring everything in Asheville and WNC.

While it is near everything, it offers a good deal of privacy, due to the fire pit area and the screened in porch.

name: New Bright and Airy Home in Ideal Spot!
description: Beautiful, new, fully furnished green home on culdesac in friendly, central West Asheville neighborhood. Spacious and open living room and kitchen (with walk-in pantry) on main level with mudroom and half bath. All 4 bedrooms (1 currently used as den/office) and 2 full baths upstairs with laundry room. Multiple outdoor living spaces including front patio, expansive back deck overlooking flat back yard, and side patio and outdoor dining area. Utilities & lawn maintenance included. 3 month minimum

name: Cozy Historic Montford with Spa Bathroom
description:
Beautiful and comfortable studio, private bedroom in the Montford neighborhood of Asheville. You can walk to great restaurants and coffee shops (Nine Mile, All Day Darling, Tall Johns) and downtown Asheville. The rental comes with off-street, driveway parking and a separate, private entrance. There is a mini-refrigerator, microwave, Keurig with coffee and tea, WiFi, A/C, heat, a brand new, comfortable queen size bed, and a beautiful and renovated spa-like bathroom.

Homestay permit#: 22-01076

name: Silver's Sunset Suite #2
description: You'll enjoy our nice, quiet location away from the hustle and bustle of city life, but only 20 minutes away from downtown, Biltmore House, Grove Park Inn, River Arts District, etc.

name: Silver's Sunset Suite
description:
We have transformed our Master Bedroom into a private suite that includes king bed, Television, High Speed Internet, Kitchenette with microwave, refrigerator/freezer, toaster oven, Keurig, dishes, silverware, coffee, tea , etc. We also have a new queen blow up mattress for extra quests.
A great place to stay and relax or close enough to the many Asheville amenities to enjoy.
The sunset on the website is taken from our deck where you can enjoy your morning coffee or evening glass of wine.

name: Town Mountain Breeze by CM | Hot Tub & Fire Pit
description: Make your vacation a breeze with a stay at Town Mountain Breeze! This well-appointed mountaintop home is located in an upscale neighborhood that values peace and quiet. It is close enough to downtown Asheville for an Uber ride and food delivery. Plus, enjoy scenic mountain views from the deck and hot tub.

name: Hilltop Cottage- New! - Kitchen-Near Tesla Chg.
description:
Asheville vibes abound at this totally renovated cottage , centrally located near downtown , Biltmore and Pisgah. TESLA CHARGING STN 1/4 mile away.
Relax on our expansive wrap-around deck and screened in porch. Cottage is 800 square feet and boasts a queen bed , a double bed and large comfy sofa. Each bedroom is appointed with high def flat- screened TV. Stream your shows on our 55” Fire TV. Modern full kitchen allows you to prepare meals at home. Full coffee and tea station provided.

name: Updated Asheville Studio - Walk to downtown & UNCA
description: Scenically situated near the Asheville Botanical Gardens, our updated studio is a perfect stay to enjoy the nature of Asheville while still being walking distance to the restaurants and shops in downtown. Inside of our walkout basement unit you will find a king-sized bed, a living room area with a full-sized pull-out couch, a breakfast table to enjoy your morning coffee, and a kitchenette equipped with a Keurig, mini fridge, microwave, and water purifier.

name: Home Theatre, Game Room, Mins to DT AVL & WVL
description:
Welcome to Woodridge! This newly renovated home is on the lower of two levels with its own private entrance. Features include a theater with surround sound and a game room with a ping pong table, dartboard, & TV.

Woodridge sits on one beautifully wooded acre on the ridge of a sunken yard with a firepit. Out here, you might even get a visit from deer and turkey friends!

Last but certainly not least, downtown Asheville and Weaverville are only 7 minutes away. This is having it all ++

name: Hunnicutt Cabin
description:
Historic cabin that was built in the late 1800's but has all of the modern accommodations located on a very private 3 acre lot while being conveniently located near all of Asheville's must see hot spots!

Only 6 miles from downtown Asheville
7 miles from Biltmore Estate/Village
1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway
3 miles from Billy Graham Training Center
8 miles from Mission Hospital
20 miles from the Asheville Airport

name: 5 Miles To Downtown Asheville W/Hot Tub
description:
Welcome Peacock Retreat!


Look no further for the perfect Airbnb experience! Peacock Retreat has everything to offer. A newly constructed home perfect for family and friends to get away. Just minutes from downtown Asheville and walking distance to the blue ridge parkway this homes location is unmatched. Nestled on over one acre soak in the privacy this home has to bring while having access to all that Asheville and the blue ridge mountains have to offer.


5 night min Christmas-Thanksgiving.

name: The Tremont House
description: This sweet suite is spacious, comfy, & beautiful!!! Enjoy king sized Sleep Number bed & velvet couch. The full kitchen has what’s needed for cooking. Enjoy the porches! Walk to cafes, restaurants, & breweries. Drive 5 min to reach fun, vibrant downtown or walk along Haywood Rd corridor in cute West Asheville. Walk by the river on nearby greenway to River Arts District! Adventure it up in the mountains & return to a lovely comfy space.

name: 10min to dwntwn Pets 5Br 3 King Bds Gameroom
description: Welcome to this charming 5-bedroom, 2.5-bath home, perfectly nestled in a quiet neighborhood just minutes from Asheville’s arts, dining, and historic districts. With the stunning Blue Ridge Mountains as a backdrop, this home offers bright, spacious rooms, cozy outdoor spaces, and plenty of parking—perfect for a relaxing getaway.

name: Stylish Woodfin Home w/ Backyard & Fire Pit
description: Spend a relaxing weekend with your closest pals and the comfort of this vacation rental! This 2-bed, 1.5-bath cottage offers a comfortable and serene resting place for your trip after days of brewery visits and Asheville adventures. You won’t want to miss the natural beauty Woodfin has to offer, from exploring cascades to hiking trails. After days of escapades, gather around the fire pit for s’mores and stories under the stars. No matter your chosen adventure, this home is sure to fit the bill!

name: Convenient Modern 4/2 w/ King Bed + Pet Paradise
description: This beautiful home in a peaceful neighborhood is the perfect place to bring family & friends. The home is recently remodeled, tastefully decorated, and packed with amenities. The large deck and huge fenced in backyard are a great place to unwind after a day of exploring. Only 3 miles to downtown Asheville & 2 miles to Biltmore Village, this location is sure to be near every Asheville adventure. Pets welcome!

name: Beautiful farm-near Kayaking, hiking, restaurants
description:
Welcome to the wide open spaces! Drive the winding country road to the 1930's farmhouse on the hill. Survey the green that sourrounds you. Horses graze in the pasture. Enjoy the cool mountain evenings around the firepit.
30 min to Biltmore House, Hendersonville, Pisgah National Forest, DuPont State Park. Restaurants & grocery are close.
This is my childhood home & I would love to share it with you. Please keep in mind this is a working farm so if you have allergies, It might not be for you.

name: The Convenient Cottage/Asheville Abode
description: Well maintained and centrally located bungalow will provide you with a stylish and affordable place to explore one of the most desirable areas to eat and adventure in America.  Transitional neighborhood offers a relaxed atmosphere to let your hair down and enjoy a nice fire at the end of a day of shopping, eating, hiking, exploring, fishing or whatever your imagination desires.  Come explore this little slice of heaven where you won't have to spend top dollar to receive top shelf accommodations.

name: Two Separate DT Asheville MNT Chalets-Zurich 9A&9B
description:
5-star 1960s unique mountain cottage that is just 1.2 miles from downtown Asheville. Located on Beaucatcher Mountain, this charming home sits on a narrow switchback road above the famous mountain tunnel heading into downtown Asheville.

The home is secluded on a mountain top with beautiful views, offers hiking opportunities and occasional bear sightings, yet it is still only a 5-minute drive to downtown. It really is in one of the best locations in the entire city of Asheville!

name: Blue Ridge Escape: Private Suite Near Downtown
description: Welcome to the Blue Ridge Mountains. Private one bedroom and one bathroom suite located in Asheville’s Haw Creek Neighborhood. We are within walking distance to a local coffee shop Penny Cup (0.6 m), restaurant and bars Creekside Tavern & The Whale Outpost (0.6 m). Conveniently located near the Blue Ridge Parkway (1 m), Biltmore Estate (4 m), Municipal Golf Course (1 m), Highland Brewery (1.8 m) Eda Rhyne Distilling Company (5 m) and Downtown (4 m)

name: Mountain Abode~10 Mins to Downtown AVL~Sleeps 6
description: Convenient to Asheville & Black Mountain, yet tucked away on a quiet, wooded lot with mountain views throughout the neighborhood. Relax in this cozy, thoughtfully equipped home featuring 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a spacious living area, well-stocked kitchen, and fast WiFi. Ideal for families or small groups seeking a welcoming space to unwind after exploring the area. Simple comfort and a fantastic location make this the perfect home base.

name: 2 bdrm near Christ School, Sierra Nevada, Airport
description:
Arden Oasis. Entire private, basement living space. 850 sq ft with 2 bedrooms and kitchenette. Every part of this space is new with custom, mountain craftsmanship.
Private parking & entrance. There is a large outdoor fire pit/patio area in the back yard that is available for use. If you are awake early enough, you may catch sight of the flock of wild turkeys roaming through my yard. I have lived here since 1997 and have extensive knowledge to share with any hikers, cyclists and beer enthusiasts.

name: Walkable West Asheville
description: Cute walkable west Asheville house, centrally-located place close to restaurants, bars, breweries. Just up from French Broad river and the River Arts District. One bedroom with den. Perfect for someone that needs a temporary home while looking for their own home or working in Asheville temporally. I plan to be out of the country for 6-12 months starting in October so I am looking for someone to use my place while I am away

name: Private 1-BD Suite w/Patio, Center of Asheville!
description:
Close to everything, yet insulated and quiet.
This clean and cozy efficiency apartment is located in the heart of Asheville.
6-min to the River Arts District and Downtown Asheville.
2 miles to Mission Hospital, a perfect spot for travel workers.
20-min from Swannanoa. Easy access to I-240 and I-26.

name: West Asheville Hideaway
description:
Kick back and relax in this serene, stylish cottage just a short 12 minute drive to the heart of downtown. Or if you’d like to hang on the west side, you will be less than 10 minutes away!

Our home has 3 bedrooms with 1 full bathroom. We recently just installed a brand new hot tub! You can stargaze as you relax on the brand new deck. We have fast WiFi, smart TV, filtered water system in the kitchen, and some of the best vibes.

name: Cheerful 1-bedroom Tiny Home in South Asheville!
description: Brand new, peaceful tiny home centrally located to all things Western NC has to offer!  Hiking, biking, shopping, restaurants, breweries, the Biltmore House and more!  This is truly a spot for any lifestyle!  Nestled on a quite lot with outdoor living space that will allow you to relax under the mountain stars! Fully furnished home complete with an outdoor grill located 3 miles from the Asheville Airport.

name: Carriage House Near Downtown & the Parkway
description: Purported to be built over a vortex for the surrounding sense of serenity, this unique, 1-bedroom, 1-bath Carriage house awaits — along with a bottle of Biltmore wine to welcome you. Head into nearby downtown Asheville for a range of dining options and attractions, or enjoy hiking/biking the numerous Blue Ridge Mountain trails only a mile away. Expect peaceful relaxation amid lush, natural beauty at this North Carolina vacation rental.

name: Beautifully Renovated Historic Bridle Path Inn
description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. Hot tub for 8!

name: *NEW*The Rose Cottage|10 mins to DT and Biltmore
description:
Pets are Welcome! $75 per pet fee
Tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area in Asheville is our peaceful 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home-away-from-home. Here you’ll find room to breathe, plenty of peace and quiet, and just a touch of what’s familiar. We’ve made a tranquil place for you to relax, so you can focus on your next great adventure. Why pile everyone into a hotel room (or two) when you can breathe the mountain air without stepping on any toes?

name: 8 Bedroom | Hot Tub | Asheville | Biltmore Lake
description:
Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains at their peak of excellence in this 7400 sq. ft. mansion nestled in Biltmore Lake.

Sleep 24, comfortably!
8 BEDROOM
4 FULL BATHS
2 HALF BATHS
6 KING BEDS
5 QUEEN BEDS
1.5 ACRE PRIVACY
7400 SQ FT
2 LIVING ROOMS
SOLARIUM
SKY BRIDGE
Pool Table
Fire Pit
1 GIG WiFi

Steeped in history and elegance! Yes, we're a FAVORITE for weddings.

name: Asheville Mountaintop Home with Unparalleled Views
description:
Welcome to Sunset Sanctuary! The unobstructed long-range views are the focal point of this stunning home. The views are unparalleled and overlook North Asheville, Beaver Lake and Blue Ridge Mountains.

From the moment you enter the home, the view steals the show. You'll feel miles away but are only 4 miles from the action of downtown Asheville, 3 miles from the jogging trails and bird watching of Beaver Lake, and 2 miles from the golf, tennis and relaxation of the Omni Grove Park Inn.

name: Adorable guest suite with hot tub! Walk to DT!
description: This charming guest suite in an arts and crafts bungalow has a private entrance with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom and a wonderful, private backyard patio with a hot tub. There's a large TV with cable, Netflix, Amazon Prime, and HBO, as well as a minifridge, microwave, Nespresso machine, and electric kettle. This location is easy walking distance to Downtown and South Slope restaurants and breweries. Park anywhere on the street, walk to your brewery of choice, and relax in the hot tub under the stars!

name: Casita West Asheville
West Asheville Bungalow - Close to Biltmore/LexAve
description:
Thoughtfully updated, this charming bungalow offers a superb location in a quiet West Asheville neighborhood -- minutes from downtown and popular Haywood Road. Visit Biltmore Village (5.8 miles) and don't miss the Blue Ridge Parkway drive.

Nestled on just over a half-acre, this 3BR/2.5BA home offers plenty of outdoor space -- complete with a covered patio and huge yard with fenced in section. Inside, find a full kitchen, two living areas, and a spacious two story layout with a lofted bedroom.

name: Phenomenal  Downtown Property
description: Stunning condo: contemporary meets turn of the century design in this historic new buildout in downtown Asheville. This 3rd floor 2BR features 1 king Main and a king guest BR. Each with private baths and also a half bath in the common area of the home.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Clean, Modern Studio Apartment with Sauna!
description:
Welcome to the Humming Bird's Nest, a newly remodeled studio apartment surrounded by nature and minutes to downtown.
Enjoy your stay in this clean, artistic, modern space.
Relax in the sauna after a fun day floating down the river, mountain biking through the woods, or eating downtown between art galleries visits.
Perfect for a couple's get away or a business trip.
Amenities include-
Sauna
Full Kitchen
Private Entrance
Fast Internet
Full Bathroom
Hummingbird Mural
and so much more

name: Private Views with Hot Tub and Fire Pit
description:
Our home offers an outdoor oasis in trendy West Asheville.

Located only 12 minutes from downtown AVL and Biltmore Estate. Haywood Rd, NC Arboretum, and the Blue Ridge Parkway are only minutes away.

name: Cheery W.Asheville-Hot Tub-Porch-Fenced Yard-Pets
description:
Bring your family and fur babies home to our conveniently located in West Asheville, 5 minute drive to arts, eats and entertainment romantic cottage!
Use the spacious driveway for off street parking, large fenced yard for playing, dogs or gathering around the fire pit. Relax in the hot tub on the covered front porch. After taking in a day of outdoor adventures, art, downtown, Biltmore, entertainment and Asheville breweries and cuisine, wind down just outside the city limits.

name: ♦Country Feel ♦City Appeal 5 miles to Downtown
description: Unwind on the front porch or covered patio of this beautiful 3br/2ba country home w/ full kitchen. Ideal for a family of 6, friendly gathering or a couple looking for a relaxing stay in a prime location to everything Asheville. Only 5 miles to Downtown, 3 miles to UNCA/Botanical Gardens, and minutes to the River Arts District. Peruse local eateries, art galleries, breweries, parks & water sports. 11 miles to Blue Ridge Pkwy and 8 miles to Biltmore Estate. Easy access to I-40, I-240 & 26.

name: Entertainment & Hosting Dream: Amenities 6k+ sq ft
description:
This 6k+ square foot renovated home with LONG MOUNTAIN VIEWS is at the very top of a residential street w/ stunning views & built to entertain.

Excellent for groups who want to be close to all the action in Asheville while maintaining a secluded, mountain home feel when at the house (only 11 min from downtown, 14 min from Biltmore, and 20 min to Blue Ridge Parkway).

We have enough beds to accommodate 21 people.

name: 3 BR/ 2 BA Wooded Bliss - 10 min to Asheville
description: Close to everything Asheville and surrounding areas have to offer when you stay at this centrally-located furnished single-family house comfortably accommodating up to 6 quests. Easy access to I-40, the Blue Ridge Parkway,  Biltmore Estate, and the many restaurants, breweries and activities Asheville is known for. Fully stocked with everything you need and more. Grill and propane fire pit are provided with the screened in porch, extended deck and lovely fenced in yard.

name: River Arts District Hidden Gem II
description: Enjoy one of the best neighborhood in Asheville, NC walking distance to restaurants, art galleries, cafes, breweries, greenways and very short distance drive to the best hiking trails, waterfalls and  the top attractions of the area

name: Westmont by Purely Asheville! ENTIRE HOME
description:
The home is perfect for a solo traveler or a couple traveling to relocate to Asheville area or get away for 30 days or longer in the mountains of Western North Carolina.

Please send a message for booking request! Thanks!

name: Private Guest Suite in the Blue Ridge Mountains
description: The Guest Suite is in our home, which we lovingly call the Blue Ridge Chalet. The room has a private entrance and features free wifi, Roku TV, kitchenette, stylish bathroom, outdoor sitting area, and parking.  We are located 15 minutes from the AVL Airport, Downtown Asheville, NC Arboretum, and countless other attractions, including the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway and Bent Creek park.  As of Dec. 2023, we’ve received over 100 five-star reviews & 1 four-star review. Enjoy your 5-star stay soon!

name: Peaceful home close to downtown - Room 1
description:
My home is located 2 mi from downtown Asheville - get to South Slope, Orange Peel, and the sweet shops / dining / museums that make up the heart of AVL in 5-8 minutes!

We’re also walking distance from Biltmore / Biltmore Village and local breweries & distilleries.

You’ll have your own suite with a private bathroom and walk-in closet, plus access to the living room, full kitchen, and outdoor living areas.

name: West Asheville Cozy loft with fireplace
description:
You will enjoy easy access to all near attractions from this centrally located clean and cozy 800 sq foot studio.
The studio has a separate private entrance with key pad and parking for 2 cars.
Feel at home - Amenities include comfortable king bed, Futon, walk in closet, washer/dryer, full kitchen, Pod coffee machines, smart TV/Bose speaker.
Explore outside - included camping chairs and cooler.
Enjoy convenient office space with High speed internet, desk and a printer (WiFi)

name: Just a few steps from everything in West Asheville
description:
Excellent location to experience West Asheville.
Peaceful private a few steps from everything.
Newly remodeled, one bedroom, one bath/walk in shower -
Situated on a No Thru street, so little to no noise or traffic.
Right up the road from great restaurants, cafes, bakeries, yoga studios, breweries, shopping and more are only a few steps away. If Forgot something? no worries - the main grocery store and laundry mat are right around the corner. Feel free to inquire about longer stays!

name: Relaxing Getaway
description:
Enjoy a stay in the beautiful Grove Park neighborhood. Quiet, peaceful and within minutes of all that Asheville has to offer.
Your suite is to the left and the house is to the right, so you will have total privacy but we are close enough should you need anything.
We are honored that you have chosen to stay with us and strive to make your visit to Asheville memorable. See you soon!

name: Impressive City Center Condo with EV Outlet
description: Impressive condo with contemporary meets turn of the century design in this historic new-buildout building, in downtown Asheville. This 1st floor two-bedroom features Queen Main and Queen guest bedroom. Each with private baths and also a half bath in the common area of the home.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: Home Suite Home - 10 Min. From Downtown AVL
description: Welcome to our newly renovated basement guest suite! Charming and clean 1 bedroom apartment with private entrance. Located only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville! 10 minutes from West Asheville/Haywood Rd! This is a great place for people to stay who are coming to experience all that Asheville has to offer. We strive to make this space clean, safe, and welcoming enough to feel like home. Nearby amenities include grocery stores, drug stores, Noble Cider, and several restaurants!

name: Large 3BR Asheville Home - Quiet Neighborhood!
description: Bring the whole family to our spacious home with lots of room to spread out! Only ten minutes from downtown Asheville and five minutes to shopping and restaurants in West Asheville. Twenty minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway or the Biltmore Estate. Enjoy the full kitchen and dining room. Relax in one of the two living rooms equipped with smart TVs. Get some sun on the large private back deck or take a walk through the quiet neighborhood.

name: Creekside King Suite
description:
Enjoy a relaxing stay in tranquil surroundings, with the sound of the creek right outside your french door. Private bathroom and nicely appointed king bedroom with desk. Shared kitchen and living room. Gigantic deck overlooking the creek and forest. Just 12 minutes from Asheville airport, 20 minutes to Biltmore Estate, 25 minutes to downtown Asheville. Two and a half acres of trees and natural beauty surround you.

You will notice some tree debris in the yard left from Hurricane Helene.

name: Hot tub,  firepit in Asheville
description:
Welcome to our cozy apartment by the creek! If you're looking for a romantic getaway or relaxing trip with friends, then this is your place!

The apartment is located seven miles from downtown Asheville, where you'll find delicious restaurants, numerous craft breweries, unique art, museums, and more.

The apartment is located 0.8 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and the area is rich with wildlife. Our most common visitors are black bears and turkeys. The space is completely private.

name: Luxury Log Cabin | Hot Tub*Kids*Pets*Hiking*Toys
description:
Welcome to Blue Ridge Bliss! Escape to Asheville's Blue Ridge Parkway forest, just minutes from downtown!
Cozy up in our gorgeously renovated log cabin nestled on 4 acres of verdant Blue Ridge forest, adjacent to protected Parkway land. Hike the land, visit our gurgling creek & mini waterfall, soak in the hot tub, dine al fresco, entertain kiddos with our toy collection & be spoiled by gourmet coffee bar, full service kitchen, plush Helix mattresses, luxurious sateen sheets, spa baths & more!

name: Mountain Modern Asheville Cabin
description:
Our updated cabin is a great place to get away & enjoy life among the trees & all that Asheville has to offer. Tall beamed ceilings and windows all around let in the natural light and give an indoor/outdoor feel.

Wooded one acre property that's 10 miles to Asheville downtown, hiking trails & all the local mountains. A 2 king bed & 1 bath cabin with an eclectic mix of bohemian & mountain rustic vibes.

Our smaller Casita is also on the property and can be booked together or separately.

name: NEW Bathroom and Kitchen! Guest House AVL
description:
Our Guest House is a great place to get away & enjoy life among the trees & all that Asheville has to offer. 10 miles to downtown Asheville, and central to hiking trails & all the local mountains. A 1 bed/1 bath guesthouse with an eclectic mix of mid-century, bohemian & mountain rustic vibes and enjoy the covered deck

The 420 sq ft guest house is on a 1 acre wooded property with our Cabin (separate listing that can be booked together) but situated in a way that there is privacy from each other

name: Walkable Home In Heart of W.Asheville Near Dwntown
description: Wake up to this peaceful and friendly neighborhood and enjoy the cool mountain morning breeze as you walk towards your favorite breakfast cafe!  This newly renovated 1951 home is located in the heart of West Asheville and is only 0.3 miles 6-10 minute-walk from West Asheville’s vibrant and quintessentially hip Haywood Rd and all the restaurants, bars, breweries, and shops it has to offer.  This  home is quiet especially at night yet very walkable.  This is West Asheville Living at its best!

name: Merrill's Cove-2 BDR Retreat, Pets Welcome
description: Welcome to Merrills Cove!  Step into a newly renovated 2 bd/2 bath space situated in a beautiful country setting only 15 min. to downtown Asheville and 7 min. to the Blue Ridge Parkway.  Pets are welcome with $100 pet fee (per pet).

name: Charming 2200sf house with MTN view.
description:
Private country home with a large yard.
Minutes away from Asheville outlets mall, Restaurants, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek Arboretum and Zen’s Tubing.
Only 15 Minutes to Downtown Asheville, Sierra Nevada Brewery, Asheville Airport, Biltmore House and Gardens, Grove Park Inn and many other Asheville attractions.
Large Living Room with Leather Sofas and a 55” HD Television.
A cozy Upper Balcony with beautiful mountain views and the front patio.
Ample Parking

name: The Haven -
description:
Welcome to your home away from home! This great location is only 8 miles from downtown Asheville, go explore The Biltmore Estate only 12 miles away, multiple hospitals nearby making it a great location for travel nurses!

All stainless steel appliances, open living room with 65" Smart TV, 1 Queen bedroom, 1 King bedroom with 55" TV.

2 Full baths, double vanity, tub, walk-in shower.

Living room gas fireplace not currently in use.

name: Stunning Views | Hot Tub | Close to Asheville!
description: Views & Brews has an amazing combination of fabulous views, seclusion in the midst of nature, and proximity to all Asheville has to offer. Views of Lake Julian and Mount Pisgah (and more) are available year-round. Located on 2 acres of land, there are no visible neighbors, and you’re 5 minutes to the grocery store, dining, and more!

name: Best Of Downtown Asheville At Our Front Door
description: Downtown Asheville, and greenways, are at your doorstep in this immaculately restored century-old home. Of 350+ prior 5-star reviews, guests Matthew & Belinda sum it up best: We have stayed at AirBNBs all over the world, and this was the best stocked, best cleaned place - and with more helpful suggestions - than we have ever stayed at! We wanted for nothing! And we walked to EVERYTHING! After a day of exploring, enjoy space to spread out and relax in hammock chair on the porch.  New owner/host.

name: Designer Home near Biltmore Village, 10 to AVL
description: Escape to our 3BR luxury home, nestled in a super unique location just outside of Asheville's city limits. Experience a stand-alone rental that offers the best of both worlds—tranquility and proximity to the renowned Biltmore estate and downtown Asheville. Immerse yourself in designer comforts, including a gorgeous open kitchen, professional design, high-end amenities, luxurious Egyptian cotton linens, and smart TVs. With access to the city's attractions, indulge in the Asheville experience.

name: Foster Burton Mountain , near river and downtown!
description:
Beautiful 3 bedroom 2 bath home near French Broad River, 4 miles from downtown AVL. Home is located in a peaceful, serene neighborhood. Many have told me it feels like a treehouse on the side deck, surrounded by lush trees & happy birds singing to you.

We are close to:
River Arts District
Silver Line Park
Downtown Asheville
Beaver Lake
Botanical Gardens
UNCA
Aboretum
Biltmore Estate
Blue ridge pkwy
Woodfin Riverside Park

name: Cozy Love Nest 1BR - minutes to Downtown Asheville
description:
Perfect for couples, this private entry retreat offers a warm and inviting atmosphere to relax and unwind.

The studio features a kitchenette, ideal for preparing light meals before heading out to explore downtown, only 10 minutes away.

For those cozy evenings, our backyard fire pit is perfect for sharing stories and laughter under the starry night sky.

Consider this your Love Nest, a haven to feel the love and tranquility Asheville has to offer.

name: Power/Water/WiFi and Easily Accessible
description:
2 min drive to WNC Agricultural Center
4 min drive to Asheville Airport
7 min drive to Sierra Nevada Brewing Company
20 min drive to Downtown Asheville

This cozy one-bedroom cottage is tucked in a tree-lined, quiet and friendly neighborhood. It features an open-concept floor plan, locally inspired decor, and ultra-modern appliances for your convenience. Relax and enjoy the outdoors and the sound of the creek from your lounge chairs on the private deck or take a short drive downtown or t

name: Asheville Mod Cabin  IG @ ashevillemodcabin
description: Stay in fully renovated 1968 midcentury modern A-frame style cabin nestled into a wooded mountainside only 10 minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville. Incredibly convenient to hiking, great restaurants and breweries, Biltmore Estate and other local attractions. Two new spa-like bathrooms feature heated floors, an oversized bathtub, and all new amenities. Watch local wildlife from the flying deck that brings you right into the surrounding trees. A stylishly mod mountain retreat!

name: Bob's Cottage - seclusion in the center of things!
description:
A sweet 2 bedroom cottage on a quiet cul-de-sac. Offers rural-feeling seclusion 5 minutes from downtown. Less than 10min to Mission Hospital (for Travelers). Near all the amenities as well as hiking and biking. Easy on/off highway. Big yard. Great neighbors.
We rent this space on AirBnb only intermittently, as we have a regular renter part of the year who splits their time between Asheville and overseas, and we keep available some times for visiting family.

name: New Eco Scandinavian Farmhouse in the Trees
description: Modern sparkling unit perfect for quiet getaway. Meticulously designed with sustainable, organic finishes. Designated secure driveway parking. Safe location - Highly sought after community with architecturally gorgeous homes. Tucked away, but minutes to all the action: West Asheville, Rivers Arts, Downtown, Blue Ridge Parkway. Close to Biltmore, Nature, Arboretum & Hiking Trails. Surrounded by greenery & forest fauna, you will feel like you are in your own stylish tree house.

name: Cold Creek Cottage by CM | Grill & Cozy Fire Pit
description: Cold Creek Cottage sets the stage for your vacation with your own little Western North Carolina paradise, perfect for wildlife lovers and families with kids. This spacious two-level home is located just east of Asheville and features a huge yard with a rushing creek running through it.

name: New! Relax at Blue Ridge Dream in Asheville
description: Enjoy bold panoramic Blue Ridge Mountain views in this expansive custom home!!  Take in the fresh mountain air outside in the relaxing 6-person spa.  This home is over 4,000 square feet, has 6 bedrooms,  office cove and 3.5 bathrooms with a large living room, open kitchen, formal dining room and large media room and 2 car garage.  The second floor has a very large wrap around deck with a gas grill and multiple seating areas.  The master bathroom has a walk-in shower and heated floors.

name: Contemporary Asheville home
description: This unique place has a style all its own! A modern contemporary design with elegant loft and spacious surroundings. Outdoor fireplace, open floor plan, privacy, and conveniently located to downtown Asheville and surrounding areas. This unique home offers full amenities and a house manual that may guide you to local restaurants, breweries, trails, waterfalls, and more! Great location to many local attractions and entertainment. Easy parking and access!

name: Cheerful "big blue" home with a porch and loft
description: The "big blue house" is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. It is 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, 5 minutes from Biltmore Village, 15 minutes to Biltmore Estate parking lot C and 15 minutes to Black Mountain. Also not far to the French Broad River if you want to get on the water. Host has recommendations to share if you're looking for things to do or places to go.

name: Indoor hot tub, fire pit, hiking trails nearby
description: Experience the serene charm of Asheville in this cozy, pet-friendly retreat, nestled between urban splendor and nature’s allure. Our 2BR, 2Bath sanctuary comfortably sleeps 5, ensuring a perfect getaway for families. Within minutes of key attractions like the iconic Biltmore, it also offers luxurious amenities such as a hot tub and a BBQ patio, promising a memorable stay.

name: Perfect | Hot Tub | Arcade l Fireplace | Grilling
description:
Welcome to Asheville
•Pets are welcome (2 max)
•Infant friendly
•Pac man Arcade in the living room
•Built in 2022
•3 bedrooms
•2 bathrooms.
•3 queen beds
•1 couch that opens and comfortably sleeps 2
•Packable play pen for babies
•60" TV streaming Netflix in livingroom
•30" TV streaming Netflix
55" TV in the LR
•Barbecue grill available
•Outdoor eating for 6 people
•Hot tub stays on all year round (fits 6)
•Fenced in backyard
•Washer and dryer available (Free)
•Indoor electric Fireplace

name: Suburban three-bedroom oasis close to everything!
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located home in West Asheville. Walking distance to vibrant Haywood Rd., a short drive to Downtown Asheville, and close to interstates 26 and 40. Located in a neighborhood with a private half-mile greenway across the street from a school. There is a soccer field in the front yard, and the home backs up to a creek. The yard is complete with nature trails, a trampoline, and zip-line! You won't find a better family location.

name: "BABY BLUE"  Our bright and sunny little cottage.
description:
Welcome to "BABY BLUE", the perfect place to get away & experience ALL THINGS Asheville! A perfect couple's retreat!

This fully updated bohemian abode is nestled at the end of a quiet street, offering respite & privacy while being 5 - 10 minutes from the best parts of Asheville (River Arts District, Downtown, West AVL, North AVL & Bear Lake). Offering convenience to amenities, breweries, music venues, outdoor activities, and all the amazing restaurants that the area has to offer.

name: Spacious Two-Bedroom with a View on the East Side
description:
Greetings and Welcome to Asheville!
We are offering two private rooms, kitchenette & bathroom in a shared and quiet house. You will have plenty of privacy. Within walking distance to the WNC Nature Center, Highland Brewery, and Azalea Park.
Home has a trail in the backyard that leads to the Swannanoa River, with the Mountains to Sea Trail easily accessible by foot.
Both bedroom have beautiful views of the serene forest. Located within 10 minutes to almost everything Asheville has to offer.

name: Hip basement apartment less than 1 mi to downtown!
description: This space is a labor of love, designed to host friends, family and guests alike in the lower level of our home. We are in a quiet family neighborhood just north of downtown Asheville. We've taken every measure to soundproof the space and give maximum privacy, comfort, and a feeling of a home, not just another Air Bnb. Every detail was done by our hands and we hope you feel that when you stay here!

name: 7 Mi to Dtwn Asheville: Apartment w/ Patio
description:
Step-Free Access | 6-Acre Property | Surrounded By Greenery

This welcoming 1st-floor apartment in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains is the perfect base for solo travelers or couples! Enjoy the lush forest surrounding this spacious studio, 1-bath vacation rental, located on 6 acres adorned with a creek and natural falls. Once you've rested and relaxed, head into Asheville to explore the breweries, eateries, and lively neighborhoods. The best of both worlds awaits at 'Bluebird Hideaway.'

name: Brookstone Lodge an Choice Ascend Collection Hotel
description: plore the beauty of western North Carolina when you stay at our Brookstone Lodge Near Biltmore Village, Ascend Hotel Collection®. Our hotel in Asheville is located in the heart of the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains and within minutes of the historic Biltmore Estate. Guests can enjoy resort-style amenities like a seasonal sundeck, free WiFi and free parking. Spacious guest rooms include a refrigerator, microwave and flat-screen TV.

name: Brookstone Lodge Boutique Hotel Near City Center
description: Explore the beauty of western North Carolina when you stay at our Brookstone Lodge Near Biltmore Village, Ascend Hotel Collection®. Our hotel in Asheville is located in the heart of the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains and within minutes of the historic Biltmore Estate. Located near Asheville Center. Guests can enjoy resort-style amenities like a seasonal sundeck, free WiFi and free parking. Spacious guest rooms include a refrigerator, microwave and flat-screen TV.

name: Wellington Cottage | 2BR | Modern Boho
description:
This stylish retreat offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and convenience. With a full-size kitchen for culinary adventures and a dedicated workspace for remote work or creative endeavors, this cozy haven is designed to cater to your every need.

Whether you're here for work or play, our home is your ideal base for an unforgettable stay in this vibrant city. Book now and make the most of your Asheville experience!

name: Adorable "little red" house with kitchenette
description: The "little red" house is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. It is 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, 5 minutes from Biltmore Village, 15 minutes to Biltmore Estate parking lot C and 15 minutes to Black Mountain. Also not far to the French Broad River if you want to get on the water. Host has recommendations to share if you're looking for things to do or places to go.

name: Cozy House 2 Bedroom with Hot tub
description: This cozy home is great for solo travelers and couples, close to everything, with strong wifi, a hot tub, brand new copper themed bathroom and beautiful walnut counters located in our low traffic community of rentals making it easy to plan your visit just a few minutes away from Haywood Rd in Asheville and less than ten minutes to downtown this home is professionally managed by locals and we're happy to host you!

name: Charming 1940s bungalow with hot tub
description: Located in a quiet cove across a 100 acre cow pasture with a peaceful creek.   You will feel like you are in a country retreat, yet only 2 miles to Blue Ridge Parkway, 6 miles to Biltmore Village and 8 miles to downtonwn breweries, central to all Asheville has to offer.

name: ❤️Couples Suite❤️-in the middle of it all!
description:
This perfectly located home base places you minutes from anywhere and at the center of it all. Bright lower-level apartment with perfectly appointed kitchenette, comfortable queen bed and cozy separate living space.
Post Helene Update: No damage sustained. Water is flowing and is potable. Water entering home is filtered.

name: Flat, fenced backyard minutes to DT & the Outdoors
description: Location, Location, Location! Minutes from DT & renowned restaurants & breweries. Outdoor excitement awaits at this cozy convenient 3 BR, 2 BA home < 2 miles to French Broad River Parks, Pisgah Forest's Bent Creek, Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum & Lake Powatan. Recently renovated light & bright home w/ new furnishings & large den w/ retro arcade games that leads to a covered patio, lush fenced backyard,  grill area & fire pit. Perfect getaway for couples, families & adventurers.

name: Fantastic Historic Montford near Downtown!
description:
This cozy loft apartment feels as though your living in a tree house. Large elevated deck is set amongst magnificent pines & white oaks. This location is perfect for walking/biking in the neighborhood, Farmers Market or Downtown AVL. Extremely convenient to UNCA, Mission Hospital, Reems Creek Greenway, Montford Park, Nine Mile & All Day Darling. Stylishly furnished, central A/C & washer/dryer.

Parking for one car in the driveway & 1 pet is negotiable. I'm sorry no dogs.

name: Gorgeous 3BR Stone Cottage in West Asheville!
description:
A beautiful stone cottage on ~1 acre of land less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville with easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Sprawl out with 1900+ sq feet, 3 bedrooms, a fire pit, gas grill, home gym, 80" OLED TV, home office, fenced in front yard, bright rooms, 2-car garage, and peaceful back porch!

Serene and comfortable living just minutes away from all of the best dining, drinking, and shopping in West Asheville / River Arts District / Downtown Asheville.

name: Garden Suite in West Asheville
description: Newly renovated lower level suite with private entrance, private back patio surrounded by gardens, King bed, pull out queen size sofa bed with memory foam mattress, living room area with a smart TV, kitchenette, full bathroom and plenty of natural light.  Located in a cul-de-sac just 5 minutes from the center of West Asheville and 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. This bright, spacious, and clean suite  is comfortable and stocked with everything you need to enjoy your stay.

name: 4-8 Guests. DOWNTOWN Asheville Eco Retreat House
description:
READ ALL DETAILS // DOWNTOWN LOCATION // Eco-Boho Home // 5 block walk to Downtown Asheville. Can walk to everything under 'Neighborhood' // Sleeps 4-8 // Peaceful, unique, organic, natural // Ideal for families, groups, retreats

INCLUDES
• Beautiful residential 100-year old home
• 4 double occupancy bedrooms w desks
• 1 Office/Sun Room w/2 day beds + desk
• Kitchen + living + dining rooms
• Gorgeous courtyard + garden
• 1.5 bathrooms
• Wood stove

READ ALL DETAILS

name: Adorable 1 bedroom suite, close to downtown, UNCA
description: Our historic 1900 bungalow in the quiet Five Points neighborhood located less than a mile from downtown Asheville and less than 1/2 mile to UNCA campus. There is a keypad private entry to this walk-out suite. Guests have access to the yard and gardens, a covered porch with a swing bed, and outdoor dining table and chairs. There is off-street parking and walkers enjoy proximity to downtown, UNCA woods, the Botanical Gardens, and the Reed Creek Greenway, coffee shops, bars, and restaurants.

name: Cheerful Arden home in Royal Pines with a Hot tub
description:
Come enjoy your mountain escape at Arden House! This spacious home is located close to all the Asheville attractions visitors crave and has all the amenities to make your mountain vacation great!

We are located 8 minutes from the airport, 12 minutes from Downtown Asheville, South Slope and the Biltmore Estate, and 10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

After exploring our amazing city, relax in the hot tub while taking in the crisp mountain air. I promise it won't disappoint.

name: May Acres Coop - adorable cottage amidst 15 acres
description: This unique getaway is located on our historic home place and 15 acres. Adorable cottage is bright & open with mountain and sunrise views. Situated 10 miles from DT Hendersonville and 12 miles from DT Asheville, it is close to all amenities but feels private atop a knoll.   Kitchen complete with toaster oven,  microwave,  Keurig coffee maker,  hot plate & fridge.  Large bath with 5' walk in shower.  Large setting area on the front deck.  EVERYTHING NEW! Gravel walkway is 100 feet from parking

name: Panoramic Pack Square | Arras Vacation Rentals
description: Unit 1004 | True to its name, Panoramic Pack Square provides an unobstructed 120-degree view of downtown’s iconic Pack Square Park and sweeping views of the mountains.

name: Charming 2 bedroom cottage near Asheville, NC
description: Stay in the heart of the beautiful city of Asheville! Home to a wide variety of shops, food and entertainment; this home is the perfect pad for all things Asheville. With Biltmore House, Downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Pkwy near, you won't run out of things to do! This home is convenient to the restaurants, breweries and nightlife that Asheville is known for! If you're looking for a comfortable place in the heart of Asheville, this house will be the perfect fit for you!  *30 day minimum*
