name: 3BR Mountainview Dog Friendly | Firepit | W/D
A-frame Cabin Campground with communal River Lodge
description: Wrong Way River Lodge & Cabins is an unconventional cabin campground in Asheville, NC at the intersection of urban and the outdoors. The property features 16 A-frame cabins with all the creature comforts, including bathroom, HVAC, and WiFi. A shared River Lodge anchors the property as a place to eat, drink, gather, and shop. You'll have easy access to all of Asheville being less than 3 miles to downtown, and outdoor activities right out your front door with the river greenway across the street .

name: Charming Emma Bungalow
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.  Bring your furry friends (with a reasonable pet fee applied at booking when indicated) and enjoy a fire in the fenced in backyard. Just minutes from New Belgium, Haywood Rd and Downtown Asheville. Also a short distance to ski resorts such as Wolf Laurel and Cataloochee.

name: Cute Little Downtown Studio
description:
The studio is in a historic building in the heart of downtown Asheville great walkable location. The apartment has a kitchenette and a bathroom with a walk in shower.

The building has a parking lot where you can have one vehicle. Walk to everything in downtown or hop in your car for easy access to West Asheville and the River Arts District.

name: Mill House - Quiet Neighborhood
description: Mill House in a desirable location, conveniently located 15 minutes to downtown Asheville and the airport. Come enjoy the patio and peaceful neighborhood!

name: The Walkable Wonder! Full Kitchen & King Bed
description:
Private & freshly renovated basement studio apartment with a separate entrance has cozy furnishings, a king bed and a kitchen with a full-size fridge, range & sink.

Only 5 min drive to the heart of downtown (27 min walk). Highly sought North Asheville location with an amazing walk score! A plethora of shopping / dining options within easy distance. Close to UNCA and the Botanical Gardens

Located across from Weaver Park - a lovely public space perfect to enjoy what Asheville has to offer.

name: Brookstone Lodge Hotel Easy Access I-40 Downtown
description: Enhance your experience with all that Asheville NC has to offer. Scenic hikes, breathtaking views, and historic downtown Asheville offer an abundance of adventures. Explore the live music, fine dining, and vibrant arts scene sure to appeal to all. , Brookstone Lodge is located in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. 1.5 miles from Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village offering many popular social gathering places.

name: Bright, open studio in East Asheville
description: You will enjoy a quiet residential neighborhood, with own private entrance, bathroom and efficiency kitchen.  Centrally located with easy access to downtown, local breweries and restaurants, hiking, biking, paddling / tubing and climbing in our beautiful mountain playground. You will have a relaxing get away in our studio apartment. Business travelers, couples, and solo adventurers from all backgrounds, ethnicities, religions, and sexual orientations are welcome here!

name: Trout Lily Cottage-steps from downtown Asheville
description: Welcome to Trout Lily Cottage - a charming 1910 remodeled home located within a short walking distance to restaurants, bakeries, the Grove Park Inn, and ALL that downtown Asheville has to offer. Our home has two spacious bedrooms, 1 bathroom, relaxing living room, a brand new kitchen, sun porch with yoga mats and a small front fenced in yard too. Original moldings and hardwood floors throughout. We would love to host you at Trout Lily! Send us a message with any questions you may have.

name: 10 Min to Downtown. Luxe finishes. Private HotTub!
description:
🌳Welcome to Nana's Branch – Your Inner Haven in West Asheville!

Experience award-winning luxury in this stunning 4BR 3BA arts and crafts masterpiece, featured in the 2020 Parade of Homes. Discover high-end finishes throughout, from the gourmet kitchen to the game-filled lower level with arcade classics. Outside, find your perfect relaxation spot—soak in the hot tub, gather around the fire pit, or lounge in the hammock within your private yard. Just minutes from downtown's vibrant attractions!

name: Old World Elegance: Renovated Historic Landmark
description: Beautifully renovated home is on the must-see list as one of the oldest and largest homes in the city of Asheville.  Treasured for its storied history, it features numerous architectural details:  2-story foyer, hand carved paneled walls, stained glass, and elaborate fireplaces.   Modernized with an open floor plan, luxury finishes, and top of the line appliances (though you won't see them) make this the perfect backdrop for your getaway with family and friends.  Note: 2-week min stay.

name: Serenity Sojourn:  Hot Tub, Fire Pit, & Views
description:
Kick back & relax in style at our home in West Asheville!

Enjoy the spectacular private backyard:
- Mountain views
- Patio w hot tub
- Fire pit
- Yard games
- Grill & more

Home includes:
- Smart TVs (you sign into your streaming accounts)
- Washer/dryer
- High speed Wifi
- Desk for remote working
- Central AC/heat
- Sound machines in every bedroom

Located only 12 min from downtown AVL & Biltmore Estate. Haywood Rd, NC Arboretum, & the Blue Ridge Parkway are only minutes away.

name: Private room in large house outside of Asheville
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Guest Room with 2 Queen Beds at Kimpton Hotel
description:
Welcome to Kimpton Hotel Arras

A Downtown Asheville Hotel on the Pulse of the City
Rising from the center of downtown Asheville, North Carolina, Kimpton Hotel Arras invites you to share in the unique artistry of this Blue Ridge Mountain town.

name: Fenced Yard, Home Office, & Covered Deck (Monthly)
description: Link to virtual tour in cover photo description! Beautiful sun-filled 3 bedroom, 1 bath bungalow in the heart of West Asheville with 9-ft ceilings, home office, elliptical, and a soaking tub. Back and front yard fully fenced with covered patio, hammocks, and fire pit surrounded by privacy fence. Pet friendly - 3 dog/cat limit, no weight limit, no pet fee. 1 minute walk to Haywood & all of West AVL. Off street parking along the side of house for 2 cars/SUV/Small truck. Regular leases available!

name: House of Art 2 bed 2 bath with Sunroom
description: This is a unique and tranquil getaway located 2 minutes from the hotspot of entertainment. Biltmore Park a city within a city is famous for it's well roundness of variety. Shopping, fine dining, movies, pharmacy, ymca, and gas to visit our many local attractions. The Biltmore House is 15 minutes away and 5 minutes to downtown where you can enjoy all of the local artisan shops and dining. Not only are you surrounded by excellent accommodations, you come back to relax in the same tranquil vibes!

name: Eclectic 2 Bedroom West Asheville home.
description:
Make some memories at this unique and family/pet friendly place.
West Asheville home located 4 mins from Haywood road in the heart of West Avl as well as 7 mins from historic downtown AVL.
2 bedrooms ,1 bath and small fully equipped eat in kitchen.
Home comes equipped with 2 queen sized beds.
Pet friendly with large fenced in yard. I do have two cats so my home would not be suitable for anyone with a cat/dog allergy.
Outdoor area include a fire pit ,hammock, grill and smoker.

name: Peaceful Getaway 10 Minutes to Downtown Asheville
description: Located 10 minutes to Downtown Asheville, 4 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, and 7 minutes to the Biltmore Estate, the Blue Ridge Basecamp is your ideal home base for all your adventures. This pet-friendly, 1 bedroom/1 bath is located in a quiet, wooded neighborhood, but close to everything Asheville and the surrounding area has to offer. Its nature meets city at its finest! ✨

name: Spacious Family Home Near Hiking & Breweries!
description: Explore Asheville, spend quality time with loved ones, and experience the perfect blend of seclusion and convenience when you stay at this woodsy 5-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom vacation rental home. Create lifelong memories of lounging in the backyard hammock, sipping your coffee on the deck, and roasting marshmallows around the fire pit. While uniquely enjoyable on its own, this Arden abode is also near scenic vistas on the Blue Ridge Parkway and historical sites like the Biltmore Estate.

name: Cozy up in the Bear Den-dog friendly
description: Come spend some time at the Bear Den! Someone recently said this sweet house feels like a warm hug. It's my primary residence and, I lend it while I'm traveling. My hope is that it feels peaceful, inviting and restful, like you're staying at your friend's mountain cottage. It's at the end of the lane for maximum privacy but only 10-15 minutes to everything downtown Asheville has to offer!

name: Beautifully Remodeled 2 BR Home Close to West AVL!
description: This quaint home has a country feel but is literally 4 minutes from I-40, 7 minutes to Haywood Rd, & less than 15 minutes to downtown AVL!  Comfortably sleeps 4 with king & queen sized beds. With all the amenities you need, sip coffee on covered front porch, watch wildlife in front or back yard, grill out, relax by the fire pit, spend time exploring WNC! Store bikes, kayaks, gear in the utility bldg. Close to Blue Ridge Pkwy, Pisgah Natl Forest, Biltmore Estate, breweries, golf courses, & more!

name: Oak and Ivey Cottage
description:
Enjoy everything Asheville has to offer! Blue Ridge Parkway three minutes away. 10 minutes to Biltmore estate, downtown Asheville, and incredible restaurants breweries and shopping.
Our three bedroom, the three bathroom cottage is completely furnished with all the amenities to enjoy a comfortable getaway. ￼

name: Spacious 3BR | Deck | Washer/Dryer
Asheville Home - 5 min to town - Pets OK 4 BD/2 BA
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located home. 5 minutes to the Biltmore and several breweries and 7 minutes to the center of downtown or two entrances to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Cherokee tribal lands, waterfalls, rafting in Nantahala, hiking, and so much more are within 20-45 minutes. Whether you are here for a family trip or a bachelorette party, our mountains have everything you could ask for and more!

name: Clean and Convenient West Asheville Homestay
description: PWR/WTR/internet. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Walkable to restaurants, bars and outdoor activities in West Asheville. Only a ten minute drive to downtown!

name: Asheville New Home Close To Everything
description:
This new home offers an abundance of space both inside and out. Just minutes to downtown Asheville, West Asheville, breweries, great restaurants, shopping, hiking and only 5.3 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway!
The large covered porch has ceiling fans and lighting.
A large kitchen offers an eating bar and dining area.
Upstairs relax in the spacious master bedroom with ensuite (king bed). 2nd bedroom has queen bed. Bathroom on both levels. All new home with all new appliances & furnishings.

name: Asheville Studio Oasis
description:
Enjoy a quiet oasis to rest and recharge near Whole Foods Grocery store, and a central location to access all the surrounding sights of beautiful Asheville.

Less than 10 minute drive from Mountain to Sea Trail, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and charming downtown Asheville, dozens of coffee shops, breweries, and restaurants.

please note that our family has a considerable amount of traffic during the weekend days and evenings. We do our best to keep quiet from 10pm-6am.

name: Family friendly. EV! Fenced yrd, close to dwntwn
description:
Spacious peaceful mountain home. Lots of room for everyone to spread out and relax. Luxurious living room, chefs kitchen.

Very family friendly with pack and play, strollers, high chair and many books and toys.

Fenced backyard, gas fire pit. EV charger!

Downstairs suite can allow for privacy and separate living space if desired for multiple families or generations. No full kitchen downstairs but does have mini fridge, microwave, keurif

name: Stunning & serene riverside retreat in Asheville!
description:
Riverbend is a renovated home right on the Swannanoa River, close to downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Located at the end of a private road, with an airy, light-filled interior and a covered deck overlooking the river, it's a place to unwind and take in the beauty of nature and the relaxing sounds of the river.

Absolutely no parties - our home is in a quiet river community, so we ask that respectful guests looking for a relaxing getaway consider renting this peaceful retreat.

name: River Arts furnished apt in Craftsman Home
description: Lovely furnished 550 sq ft apartment in 1917 craftsman home, centrally located in the River Arts District. Walk to everything: RAD (<.5 mi), downtown (1.2 mi), West Asheville (1 mi), greenway & French Broad River (<.5 mi), bus stop (.5 mi) and more. Nature, galleries, restaurants, cafes, & music venues all easy to access. This is the middle apartment of a triplex, with air BnB guests above (no parties!) and complex managers below. Quiet, nice neighborhood, off-street parking, and loads of charm.

name: Private Creek Retreat Bungalow, Stroll to West AVL
description:
Our Creekside hideaway is a peaceful retreat in the heart of all that West Asheville has to offer. You can walk to local restaurants, breweries, live music venues, and parks while coming home each night to relax your well-appointed, modern, and comfortable Green Home-certified abode that looks into our backyard with a small creek and lush trees.

Perfect for couples, solo adventurers & business travelers.

Search 'Airbnb - Creekside Hideaway Asheville, NC' on YouTube for a video walkthrough.

name: Woodland suite minutes to Biltmore House and Mtns
description:
Cozy space with Mountain View is minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore House, Highland Brewery, and hundreds of hikes within the Blue Ridge Mountains.

The woodland Suite is located in the lower story of hosts home, though will remind you of relaxing in the great outdoors: complete with forest decor. You can come and go as you please utilizing a private entrance/exit.. Free and easy parking on premises in cul-de-sac.

name: Serenity by Purely Asheville! ! Entire Home!
description: The home is perfect for a solo traveler or a couple traveling to relocate to Asheville area or get away for 30 days or longer in the mountains of Western North Carolina.

name: French Broad River Cottage Oasis
description:
This uber cool and quaint cottage is nestled between I-26 and the French Broad River. Ideal for outdoorsy people who want a unique place to lay their head.

Watch the airplanes land and take off over the river while accessing the best downtown Asheville and Hendersonville, the Blue Ridge Parkway, state parks, Sierra Nevada, Bold Rock, shopping, and so much more.

name: Screened Porch | Quiet Neighborhood near Biltmore
description:
This home is in the Biltmore Terrace neighborhood. Close to all in Asheville. Construction is underway on the adjacent lot.

Private home, access to all it has to offer. 3 queen beds in 3 bedrooms with a big comfy sofa. 2 full baths and a 1/2 bath.

This location is 5 minutes to Biltmore Village and the historic Biltmore House. Downtown Asheville is 10 minutes. Ubers and Lyfts are easily available.

name: Garden getaway in downtown Asheville
description: Enjoy your time in Asheville at this unique and tranquil getaway, a green sanctuary only 2 miles from downtown. Take a peaceful break on the deck with mountain views or relax on a locally hand-crafted mattress. Surrounded by an organic garden and powered by solar panels, you can't get more green. Full kitchen, laundry, WiFi, TV (streaming) and compost pile. Plug in your e-car for $7.50 per night.

name: High Above Asheville! Beautiful Long Range Views!
description:
Come get away with these incredible views at 3400 feet but be within reach of all the local amenities!

》15 minutes to downtown Asheville
》10 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway
》8 minutes to MANY Restaurants and Grocery stores

• Private space to enjoy the beautiful views, soaring birds and rain moving in
from far away
• Onsite, free parking for 2 vehicles
• Neighborhood walking loop for 360 views
• Wifi and 5G cellular access (Our wifi is slow but most people have 5G cellular at our stay)

name: River Arts District Hidden Gem I
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Walk or ride your bike to the greenway and stroll all the café, arts galleries and restaurants on the way.

name: Downtown Chic Luxury Condo with Views
description: Stunning contemporary 5th floor condo in the heart of downtown Asheville. Steps from music venues, breweries, restaurants, and more, easily explore the vibe of Asheville. Enjoy views of downtown and mountain vistas from every room, or on your private balcony. Luxurious 2 bedrooms and 2 baths, open floor plan, and full kitchen - designed and accessorized with premium amenities to meet your needs. Free secure parking on site too. Whether for work or pleasure, you've found your home away from home!

name: Diego's Cozy & Warm Bungalow
description:
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.

Relax on the lovely front and side deck equipped with a grill. This house presents a very spacious main bedroom on the main floor and ensuite bathroom, spacious walk-in closet and built ins. Plenty of big windows and natural light.

The home is located in the vibrant neighborhood of West AVL walking distance to restaurants, bars, Cafes and all that Haywood Road has to offer.

name: Be Our Guest! Comfortable 3 bedroom home!
description: Location! Location! Location! 2 minutes to the Asheville Airport and 4 minutes to Sierra Nevada Brewing. 20 minutes to downtown Asheville and 15 minutes to Biltmore Estate. A short drive to the most beautiful waterfalls Western North Carolina has to offer in Pisgah National Forest. This modern 3 bed/2 bath home is decorated with comfort and ease in mind. You and your family and friends will love it here. Within a few blocks to restaurants and shopping.

name: West Asheville Backyard Oasis - private entrance
description: 12 minutes from the Biltmore! Private space with private entrance, in a beautiful setting.  Enjoy all that Historic West Asheville has to offer, and come home to a styled and uniquely built space that's as pleasing to the eye as it is to the spirit.  The comfortable queen bed will give you the rest you need to explore Asheville and the surrounding areas.  And with a host who knows all the best spots around town, you'll be able to experience our sweet little city like a local.

name: 3 BR Charming W AVL Getaway
description:
$75 per pet fee!
Pets are welcome with this private family-friendly residence is tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area just a few minutes west of Asheville. Experience all of what Asheville has to offer in this conveniently located new 3 bedroom home in west Asheville. This getaway has a great balance of convenience and amenities being only 5 minutes away from I-26 or I-40 or 10 minutes to the downtown or the River Arts District. Enjoy the beautiful frame TV in one of the two living

name: Private, quiet family friendly 3Bd Rm
description: Welcome to our serene, family-oriented neighborhood! Experience privacy in our stunning modern home, which has an open floor plan ideal for family gatherings. Abundant windows fill the space with natural light. Surrounded by bamboo, the back porch offers a secluded spot for your morning coffee or after-work glass of wine. Enjoy this tranquil oasis just seven minutes from downtown Asheville.

name: Happy Trails Hideaway - A Mountain Oasis
description: A brand new mountain oasis nestled in the heart of Pisgah National Forest and the Blue Ridge Mountains, with walking access to miles of hiking and biking trails, and convenient to downtown Asheville, the Arboretum and Biltmore Park areas. Whether you want to be on a private deck relaxing  on a hammock and enjoying the beautiful forest views and sounds,  or hitting town for Asheville’s vibrant food, music and arts scene, Happy Trails Hideaway will make it all an enjoyable and easy  experience.

name: Eco-conscious Luxury Haven
description: This studio sits next to a small woods, with ample bird song and occasional deer sightings, while being 7 minutes from hip Haywood and 12 mins from downtown.

name: Adorable Suite with fireplace in Fletcher, NC
description: This cozy, newly constructed one bedroom suite is located in a safe, end of road neighborhood. Includes a private entrance, walkway, and sitting area. Studio includes smart TV, WiFi, kitchen, coffee maker, and a stone fireplace! Located less than 2 minutes from Asheville Airport, 5 minutes to Sierra Nevada, 20 minutes from Asheville or Hendersonville. The perfect choice if you're looking for a quiet getaway in a convenient location!

name: 2-BR Walkable Home in W. Asheville near Downtown
description: Wake up to this peaceful and friendly neighborhood and enjoy the cool mountain morning breeze as you walk towards your favorite breakfast cafe!  This newly renovated 1951 home is located in the heart of West Asheville and is only 0.3 miles 6-10 minute-walk from West Asheville’s vibrant and quintessentially hip Haywood Rd and all the restaurants, bars, breweries, and shops it has to offer.  This  home is quiet especially at night yet very walkable.  This is West Asheville Living at its best!

name: Chalet with Hot tub, Sauna, & Firepit
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located Chalet with Mountain Views and amazing amenities.

name: Cheerful West Asheville home close to everything!
description: Welcome to our home in the heart of West Asheville, NC! This home is a brand new listing close to all things Asheville. Just minutes to the heart of West Asheville, downtown Asheville, a vast selection of local breweries and eateries, and close to numerous hiking and waterfall options within the surrounding beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. Our home is perfect for your stay as you visit this amazing city and enjoy all it has to offer!

name: 55 S Market St #212 - Downtown Asheville!
description: Welcome to Asheville!  Located in the 55 S Market Street building this condo isn't just 'close to downtown', it is in the heart of it all!  Walk out the door and explore all the exciting restaurants, art, and events that Asheville has to offer.   Private gated parking makes coming and going easy when you head out to explore the mountains.  If you are traveling with little ones, we also provide many items to make your stay convenient!

name: Adorable guest house in Asheville
description: Great location! Light filled, peaceful, private guest house. Perfect for 1-2 guests. Within walking distance to downtown, restaurants, bars, UNC, the Botanical Gardens, Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, bakeries, seasonal Saturday morning Farmer's Market, live theater, and the Reed Creek Greenway which is a great place for a walk, run or bike ride.  On site parking. A short drive to hiking along the Blue Ridge Parkway, exploring the River Arts District, or visiting charming nearby towns.

name: Walk downtown  & stay in an amazing historic home
description:
PLEASE NOTE 29 night minimum booking PER CITY OF ASHEVILLE
The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Downtown Asheville Guest Suite
description:
Enjoy a perfectly located and adorable guest suite that is only 0.8 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville and the River Arts District (RAD). The Biltmore Estate is a 4 minute drive, West Asheville only 7 minutes.

You will feel like you are in a mini oasis with all the natural light flowing in to the quaint studio that includes everything you need for your stay.

name: Hot tub,  Pool, King bed, Asheville
description:
Welcome to our private oasis in Asheville, NC! If you're looking to create lifetime memories with the entire family, then this is your place.

The house is located seven miles from downtown Asheville, where you'll find delicious restaurants, numerous craft breweries, unique art, museums and more.

The house is located .8 miles from the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway, and the area is rich with wildlife. Our most common visitors are black bears and turkeys.

name: Escape w/ Hot Tub, Mtn Views: 5 Mi to Urban Trail
description: Make the most of your next mountain adventure at this well-appointed family home in Asheville, North Carolina! Highlighted by its stunning views and ample amenities, this 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom vacation rental offers proximity to outdoor fun, breweries, and downtown attractions. After a day of hiking, you can enjoy free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, and all the comforts of home. Relax in the hot tub, fire up the grill for dinner, and gather around the fire pit for an evening under the stars.

name: Dog Friendly 5 BR W/ Hot Tub & Fire Pit on 9 Acres
description:
This 1920's Tudor home sits on 9 acres of rolling pastoral land!

Enjoy the spectacular private backyard:
- Hot tub & fire pit
- Yard games
- Blackstone grill & more

Home includes:
- Smart TVs (sign into your streaming accounts)
- Washer/dryer
- High speed Wifi
- Desk for remote working
- Central AC/heat

Conveniently located only 15 minutes from downtown AVL & Biltmore Estate. Our home will have varying levels of road noise due to it's proximity to I-40.

name: Ursa Minor by CM | Office, Chef's Kitchen, & Mtns
description:
This furnished property is available for stays of 30 days or longer.


Welcome home! Modern and newly constructed, Ursa Minor is perfect for discovering Asheville with its in-town location and proximity to shopping and dining options.

name: Whimsical suite 7min to Biltmore
description: Look no further: This whimsical 820 sq. ft private basement suite is the perfect place for your next Asheville getaway. The Hideaway at Caribou Blu is located in South Asheville, 10 minutes to downtown, 7 minutes to the Biltmore Estate entrance gate, and 5 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Be within 5-15 minutes from all the top Asheville attractions, while feeling far removed from it all in a tranquil suite with your own private patio overlooking a wooded area filled with wildlife.

name: Bright Cozy Asheville House Near Downtown, Monthly
description: A mile from downtown Asheville in the eclectic Five Points neighborhood, start your day with the sounds of cheerful birds and experience the area from our happy 2 bed/1 bath house; an ideal base to live, work, and explore Western NC. Features full kitchen, new queen beds, many quality furnishings, comfy couch, large sunny deck, great backyard, certified pollinator habitat, and more! Near UNCA, botanical gardens, farmers market, outstanding food/drink, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. No storm damage.

name: Cozy New Asheville Guest Suite, Near Downtown
description: A mile from downtown Asheville, nestled by the trees, start your days with the sounds of cheerful birds and explore from our bright, airy, solar-powered guest suite. This private, modern suite is snugged on the lower level of our new green-built home. Features 10-ft. ceilings, separate air system, the most comfortable king bed, bonus twin bed sleep nook, beautiful bathroom, outdoor patio, and more. Near UNCA, botanical gardens, farmers market, outstanding food/drink, and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Downtown Asheville, NC 2 MI & 5 MI to Biltmore
description: Experience a sanctuary of elegance and comfort in Asheville. This newly crafted retreat features six beds across four beautifully designed bedrooms, a dedicated office, and ample parking. Spend evenings by the outdoor fireplace under the stars or relax indoors by the cozy fire. Thoughtfully designed to provide a serene escape, every detail invites you to unwind and make yourself at home. Discover Asheville from this refined haven, crafted as your perfect getaway.

name: Private Home ~West Asheville ~Biltmore ~River Arts
description: 3 Bedroom 2 Bath ranch style house close to everything!  Less than 8 minutes from Downtown Asheville and West Asheville. The property is conveniently located less than 2 miles from the River Arts District. Enjoy all of the art, river front greenery, and food & beverage the River Arts District offers! The Biltmore Estate is less than 6 miles. Kaywood's Kottage is equipped with everything you will need to enjoy a relaxing trip to Asheville, NC.

name: Walkable West Asheville Relaxing Porch SwingPetsOK
description:
Welcome to our centrally located & spacious apartment. Take a 10 min walk up to Haywood Rd for brunch and breweries. 10min drive to downtown, Asheville Yards, Biltmore Estate, the Orange Peel.

New York Times 52 places to visit in 2025!

Biltmore is open - Asheville is OPEN. We cannot wait to host you!

Queen bed & Pull-out Queen couch. Full bath w tub. Partial kitchen with dishes small fridge/freezer, toaster, air fryer, kettle, Nespresso, microwave, dishes.

We are kid and pet friendly!

name: Asheville Cabin*Blue Ridge*Biltmore*Firepit*Arcade
description:
Welcome to Safi's Den at Hickory Hill!

Modern cabin checks off all the boxes for a perfect getaway to explore all things Asheville. This gorgeous home sits atop a hill offering privacy surrounded by lush trees yet minutes to all the attractions and tons of top restaurants and amenities.

We love to travel and explore the world. Asheville is one of our favorites and we're delighted to have the opportunity to share Safi's Den at Hickory Hill with you. We hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

name: Spectacular Views!  Convenient-Fenced Yard-Hot Tub
description:
Min. age to rent: 27 - Up to 2 dogs max for $75.
Newly remodeled ranch house. 10 minutes from downtown Asheville w/ amazing mountain views from the house/back deck! There is a heavenly hot tub, pool table, TV room w/ 65" TV with Netflix, a screened porch with table, dogs love the large fenced in backyard w/fruit trees and fire pit. Cozy gas fireplace on main level.

PLEASE DO NOT BOOK THIS HOUSE FOR A BACHELOR/BACHELORETTE PARTY OR SIMILAR TYPE OF GATHERING. SORRY, THIS IS NOT A PARTY HOUSE

name: Spacious,DECK,Hiking, near DWTN Ashville &Biltmore
description:
Location, Location! our beautiful , peaceful home is located on the “Mountain To Sea Trail” for Hiking enthusiasts &The BLUE RIDGE PARKWAY Entrance is around the corner for
We are conveniently located just 10 min from Dntn Asheville , the Biltmore, South Slope breweries

Our home is in great shape post Helene.
We have well water and all utilities!!!

The huge deck great for grilling & overlooks the Fire-pit & yard.
A quiet, safe, pretty neighborhood of large trees and occasional bear visitors

name: More Than a Stay: A Journey Into Nature & fun
description:
Set on 8 acres of peaceful wilderness, with wildlife like deer, turkeys, and even bears, this luxurious retreat blends nature's beauty with modern design and endless fun filled amenities. —
● Only 13 minutes from Asheville’s bustling downtown
● Lounge W/75" TV, Wet Bar + More
● 8 Person hot tub
● 3 min to top hiking trails
● Pool Table
● 2 decks to sit in peace w/ the sounds of nature
● Arcade Games & Video Games
● Blue Ridge Parkway
● Stocked Coffee Bar
● 14 minutes to The Biltmore
● Gas Grill

name: Historic Cozy Bungalow, 30 Day, Easy Walk to DTWN
description:
Romantic, warm, comfortable & filled with antiques & local art, stocked kitchen. Quiet tranquil setting, large fenced back yard, gas burning fireplace in the family room, lovely front porch with rockers and outdoor dining area on patio.
A taste of Real Asheville! This cozy cottage is in possibly the most popular area of Asheville, Montford. One of the most beautiful and largest historic districts in the state of North Carolina, w/ beautifully landscaped homes, w/ many architectural styles.

name: Tree House cool old apt near DT w/Biltmore Pass
description: Nestled within a grand 1907 home, our two-bedroom apartment is a unique blend of privacy and city access. Perched on a hill, it enjoys peaceful isolation from surrounding houses, creating a tranquil escape while remaining just steps away from downtown's bustling heart. The apartment's charming and spacious studio is perfect for unwinding after exploring Asheville. FREE activities for stays under 29 nights, including Biltmore, Rock Wall, Zipline, Rafting, Trampoline, Snow Tubing and Axe Throwing.

name: Asheville River Cabins Garden Cabin w/ Hot Tub
description:
Asheville River Cabins offers the ultimate glamping getaway, just 20 minutes from downtown Asheville, NC. Our charming cabins are nestled on the scenic French Broad River with views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located in south Asheville, only 2 miles from Biltmore Park, enjoy nearby dining and shopping. Your cabin includes an outdoor fire pit and charcoal grill.

No availability? Message us or check out our other listings at Asheville River Cabins.

name: Quiet attic rooms with partial mini kitchen
description: Quiet and pet friendly attic space with king bed, couch, workspace, and some private kitchen facilities as well as full access to the main house kitchen.

name: Cheerful 1914 bungalow close to Dtwn/RAD/SthSlp
description: Experience historic Ashville while enjoying modern amenities. This original 1914 bungalow is within walking distance of everything, making it easy to plan your trip. Shop and dine downtown - 20 min walk. Grab a coffee or peruse the galleries in the RAD - 10 min walk. Enjoy great food and local beer in South Slope - 15 min walk. Well stocked and thoughtfully equipped for a comfortable stay. After an adventurous day relax in the clawfoot tub or enjoy the peaceful backyard.

name: Mountain Home w Endless Views, Fire Pit, Near AVL!
description: Welcome to French Broad Sunset, an executive rental for 30 day stays or more. This Southern-style home was designed to embrace the distinctive sweeping western views that look out over the French Broad River. The panoramic views and breathtaking sunsets can be enjoyed year round . The property provides views of recognizable mountain peaks such as Mt Pisgah, Cold Mountain and Crabtree Bald. You are only a few minutes from Asheville's restaurants, breweries, galleries, and the Biltmore Estate.

name: Perfect location for rest or recreation!
description:
North Carolina Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway, French Broad River & Picnic area, and Hiking and Biking trails in Bent Creek Forest are all within 2 miles.

Updated kitchen, laundry room, fireplace, WiFi, TV with surround sound for movie night, garage access for your bicycles and kayaks. Plenty of parking room as well.

Excellent restaurants and outlet mall also less than 2 miles away. Downtown Asheville, you can be there in 15 minutes; same for Biltmore Estate, and the Airport.

name: Asheville-Hot Tub/Fire Pit/Fenced Yard
description: Private Asheville home. 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, 5 minutes from Biltmore Village, 10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Pkwy! Perfect for family vacation or friend's getaway. Close to breweries, restaurants, coffee shops, hiking, & necessities. 6 person hot tub, fire pit, back deck with grill and lounge area, large fenced-in back yard, and full kitchen. Sleeps 8 with 1 King, 1 Queen, bunk bed (twin over full), & 1 futon. Dogs welcome. EV Charger provided (must bring Tesla adapter).

name: The Hidden Gem in Asheville, NC.
description: The Hidden Gem is a centrally located guest suite nestled into a quiet neighborhood w/private entrance.  We are less than two miles from downtown Asheville, a half mile to the French Broad River,  and walking distance to a park with miles of hiking trails, a mountain bike skills trail!  We are also less than one mile from breweries, music venues, restaurants, and more!  We have slowly recovered from Hurricane Helene, there are trees down on our property, but the Hidden Gem sustained no damages.

name: Asheville River Cabins Riverview Cabin w/ Hot Tub
description:
Asheville River Cabins offers the ultimate glamping retreat, just 20 mins from downtown Asheville, NC. Our charming cabins are set on the scenic French Broad River, with views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located in south Asheville, only 2 miles from Biltmore Park, you’ll find dining and shopping nearby. Enjoy an outdoor fire pit, charcoal grill, and hot tub in your cabin."

No availability? Message us or explore our other listings at Asheville River Cabins

name: Asheville River Cabins Bunk Cabin w/ Hot Tub
description:
Asheville River Cabins is your ultimate glamping escape, just 20 mins from downtown Asheville, NC. Our cozy cabins, nestled on the scenic French Broad River, offer stunning views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located in south Asheville, only 2 miles from Biltmore Park, enjoy nearby dining and shopping. Your cabin features an outdoor fire pit, charcoal grill, and hot tub.

No availability? Message us or explore more listings at Asheville River Cabins

name: Firefly Cottage by CM | Chef's Kitchen & Gas Grill
description: Firefly Cottage is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends!  If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight.  A Vacation Coordinator from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 24 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

name: Cozy Cottage
description: Cute private living room. It sleeps 2 comfortably on a pullout sleeper sofa. Located a mile from downtown. Access to the kitchen and bathroom are all private. So please enjoy our home like it is yours. The house is walking distance from Asheville staples like Green Sage and Luella’s BBQ. Located in a quiet safe neighborhood. It’s the perfect place for your budget couples retreat.

name: Adorable newly renovated in-town oasis!
description:
Newly renovated 1-Bedroom guest suite with a private entrance and patio all to yourself. Relish a great cup of coffee on the tree-covered patio!

Enjoy easy access (2 Blocks, short walk) to all that West Asheville has to offer, yet stay on a peaceful and quiet street.

Brand new bathroom, Queen bedroom with a serene view of the garden.

Bright and sunny living space with Couch, TV Viewing area and Kitchenette overlooking the garden and coy pond. Low cleaning fee!

1 small dog is welcome :)

name: Leo's Place in historic Montford
description: Leo's Place is a charming, private guest suite tucked away in historic Montford.

name: Private Bungalow suite.
description:
Relax in a private entrance suite after seeing the sights in Asheville. The house is in the charming neighborhood of Oakley, minutes up the mountain from Biltmore Village and within 10 minutes of downtown Asheville. The area is a quiet enclave, close to hiking, breweries, downtown shopping, and amazing dining. We are located 20 minutes from the airport.
If our space is not available on the dates that you prefer, we also have another space in our home that has shared common areas.

name: Cozy Asheville Cottage Available For Monthly Stays
description: Charming Asheville cottage available for monthly+ stays. Conveniently located off of Merrimon Avenue in North Asheville, the cottage is in a lovely quiet neighborhood within very close proximity to the Grove Park Inn, Beaver Lake, and UNC-Asheville, and just 2 miles to downtown Asheville.

name: Paris of the South - Walkable West AVL Studio
description: Situated in West Asheville, this charming slice of Paris is only a 5-minute walk to Carrier Park/Karen Cragnolin Park (Riverlink/Greenway), a 15-minute walk to the lively downtown West Asheville and a stone's throw away from the French Broad River which borders the iconic Biltmore Estates. A blend of natural beauty and urban convenience with award winning dining, drinks, and entertainment just moments away.

name: Hillside Hideaway 15 min to DT & Biltmore
description:
This amazing 2100 sq. ft. property is located in the coveted Skyland community of South Asheville, has the feel of a getaway nestled into the mountains, yet is so incredibly convenient to all Asheville has to offer. Spend your days exploring the city, then come back and relax on the deck and enjoy the peaceful mountain air. This is the perfect home base for your next Asheville adventure!

8 min to groceries, food, & more
18 min to downtown Asheville
15 min to Biltmore Village & Blue Ridge Pkwy

name: Way Downtown | Newly-built Asheville Villa!
description: Come experience Asheville and stay at this brand new constructed (2022) property, Way Downtown! One of ten beautifully constructed villas located in the enclave of The Fold at Reynolds Mountain, this 3 level house was inspired from the Appalachian folk song that is popular in the area. Located in the Reynolds Mountain community, you're a short walk to the dining and shopping and you're just 10 minutes to downtown Asheville and close to the many shops, galleries and restaurants!

name: Log Cabin
description:
Welcome to our family cabin! We use the home June-November and rent it out the remainder of the year.

The Love Shack is a charming and cozy, 480sq ft, one bedroom, one bathroom, 93 year old, historic log cabin.

Located in East Asheville, the property is one mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway and Folk Art Center, four miles from downtown and four miles from The Biltmore.

The cabin is equipped with all modern amenities.

name: Delightful 1- bedroom fully equipped camper
description: Enjoy the sounds of nature when you stay in this unique place.

name: Private Primary Bedrm + Ensuite Bath, W Asheville
description: Enjoy this chic home, 2 blocks Haywood Rd, West Asheville. 2 bdrms available: Private primary bdm w/king bed, ensuite bath. smaller bdm w/queen bed, shared bath. Coffee/tea bar in the mornings.  2 blocks from excellent restaurants, shops, and breweries. Bedrooms have 100% linen or cotton sheets/ blankets, down comforters. 100% cotton towels. Large tv, fully equipped kitchen, living room, spacious backyard with deck furniture + fire pit. And be entertained by Gru, the French bulldog!

name: Vintage Vibes Hideaway in West Asheville
description: Remember that childhood feeling of snuggling up inside a giant blanket fort? Well, our vintage-vibes guest suite offers that same cozy sensation. It’s the perfect launchpad for your Asheville adventure! Situated in the Malvern Hills neighborhood of West Asheville, we are walking distance to a nature trail and creek, a 3-minute drive to Haywood Ave, 10 minutes to downtown, and 15 minutes to hikes and mountain biking. Free on-street parking + covered patio with private keyless entrance.

name: Vintage Camper Minutes from Downtown Asheville
description:
Tucked in a peaceful cove only 8 minutes from downtown, this clean, modernized camper will delight you. It's the perfect base camp for exploring Asheville and the Blue Ridge.

Lounge on the deck, build a fire, grill, and experience a private hot shower in the bamboo forest.

Wake up to views of Town Mtn and the sounds of nature outside your window or drive a beautiful, unpaved road up to the Blue Ridge Parkway!

*A/C
* heat
* hot water
*outdoor/indoor showers
*flush toilet
*gas grill
*fire pit

name: Sweet and welcoming studio  apartment
description: Clean. Safe. Lovely. Convenient. Studio apartment in our newly-renovated daylight basement. Nicely sound-proofed - very kid and pet-friendly. Great neighborhood for walking, 10 minutes to beautiful downtown, a couple minutes to trendy W. Asheville, & 5 minutes to major highways.  Suite has a mini kitchen, dining area, queen bed, bunk beds, & cozy seating area with TV all in one space. Easy check-in, close parking, private entrance and patio, chickens and shared fenced yard with playground.

name: Ridge Valley by AvantStay | Chic Asheville Escape
description:
- Private backyard w/ pool, poolside lounge chair and hot tub
- Outdoor bbq grill, dining table and pingpong table
- Spacious and large lawn
- Features 2 living room
- Deck w/ mountain views
- 4-minute drive to convenient grocery shopping

name: Cozy Arden Cottage, 2 Mi to Lake Julian Park!
description: Feel your stresses melt away the moment you enter ‘Blake Cottage.’ With Asheville just 9 miles away, this 2-bedroom, 1-bath vacation rental is ideal for your next adventure to the Tar Heel State. Spend your days exploring Blue Ridge Parkway or enjoy a relaxing afternoon sipping drinks at Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. In the evenings, chef up a delicious meal in the full kitchen before kicking back to watch a movie on Smart TV with your loved ones. Venture to North Carolina today!

name: Warm Asheville Home with beautiful outdoor deck
description: Inviting and comfortable 2 bedroom home in West Asheville. Centrally located and very quiet peaceful neighborhood.

name: Cheerful 2-Bedroom home off the Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
Close enough to town to enjoy the fun. Far enough away, to enjoy the quiet! Visit the Biltmore for inspiration, or explore the offerings at any of the many great restaurants and breweries that Asheville is known for. Only 3 miles away from the VA Hospital

For natural beauty, the nearby Blue Ridge Parkway offers one the country’s most stunning drives.

Hike or bike the nearby Shope Creek Trail or head out for a trail run on River Trail through meadows and farmland behind Warren Wilson college.

name: Sale • Secluded • Hot Tub • Dogs ok • Blue Ridge
description:
Discover the charm of our cozy and romantic secluded cabin in an amazing location that beckons you to unwind. Delight in the warmth of the hot tub under the string lights or relax by the fireplace in this dog and kid-friendly haven.

Centrally located. Grocery stores, restaurants and breweries are minutes away. 15 min from the airport, Biltmore, and 2 miles from Blue Ridge Parkway.

Romantic getaway? Birthday celebration? We got you! We can arrange things upon request for an additional fee.

name: Pet-Friendly Asheville Retreat w/ Hot Tub
description:
- Mountain Views
- 5 Mi to Downtown Asheville

Leave your worries behind at this 2-bed, 2-bath Asheville home! This mountainside vacation rental is perfect for those looking to disconnect from the digital world. Enjoy a soak in the hot tub or roast marshmallows over the fire pit. If you'd rather venture out, head downtown to tour the Biltmore or visit UNC Asheville!

name: Modern Hilltop Home - 5 minutes from Everywhere!
description:
Escape to this 2-story home in a hip neighborhood near downtown Asheville and Biltmore Village - less than 5 minutes to either. Walking distance to the South Slope brewery district. Enjoy all Asheville has to offer and "live like a local" in a modern house with all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay. This is a great home base for all your Asheville area adventures!

This escape is ideal for a small family, couples, remote workers, and outdoor adventurers.

name: Modern log cabin 15
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. She may be small, but has everything you need! Open the door and be welcomed by luxury and beautiful appointments. This log cabin/cottage comes ready for you with a nicely appointed kitchen, including an electric range/oven, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, Queen size memory foam bed, two draw nightstand, comfy couch, smart TV, load your apps or watch free content, Mini-split AC/Heat unit, W/D and a back porch for relaxing.

name: Asheville Creekside, Hot Tub/Fire Pit /Fenced Yard
description: Welcome to Asheville Creekside. Our city has recovered! 15 mins to downtown Asheville! Enjoy hiking & biking outdoors. Fenced in yard for up to 3 dogs!  Relax to the sounds of the creek, Hot Tub, Fire pit, covered outdoor game room. 2-bedroom, King & Queen beds. Queen sleeper sofa. Sleeps 6 people. Creekside patio, Creek access w/bench, Front & Screened porch, BBQ deck. Full kitchen, dining room, comfortable living room w/TV. Washer/dryer.  Support Asheville! Dog fees in Details

name: Sparkling Clean Asheville Live/Work/Play Condo
description: * 3 month minimum stays only please *

name: Walk to Cafés + Luxe Hot Tub!
description:
A serene getaway in the heart of vibrant West Asheville!
This historic bungalow, set amid lush gardens, seamlessly combines vintage character with contemporary comforts.

✨ Prime Location!
Only Steps Away From:
• Coffee shops & artisanal bakeries
• Local breweries & wine bars
• E-bike rentals & West Village Market
• Retrocade, toy store, ice cream parlor & more!

Relax in our luxury 6-person hot tub, thoughtfully designed interiors, and peaceful surroundings—all with unbeatable walkability.

name: New | Private | Clean | Walkable WAVL
description:
Welcome to our brand new home in trendy West Asheville! We are perfectly located on a quiet, wooded street within walking distance to all of Haywood Road, and next to a small park. Enjoy all of the awesome breweries, restaurants, and shops of West Asheville. Less than 2 miles from River Arts. A quick 5-6 min drive/Uber to downtown or Biltmore.

While we live upstairs, the sunny downstairs space offers a studio bedroom, full bath, and kitchenette- plenty of room and privacy for your visit!

name: Well water and power on, 10 mins to downtown AVL
description: We offer the perfect getaway for families and groups of friends. Bring yourt favorite people and your furry buddies to the soaring mountains of Asheville for comfort, peace and fun.Enjoy a full kitchen, living room, dining room, back patio, and private pond on 2 acres of land in a beautiful neighborhood. Our property is an easy 10 min drive to downtown, with easy access to unique restaurants, world class microbreweries, the Grove Park Inn, the Biltmore House, hiking, and mountain biking.

name: 1bd/1ba 2 miles to dwntwn Asheville, hot tub.
description:
Situated in a quiet residential neighborhood, Asheville Creek is only minutes from downtown Asheville. You have your own private entrance, bedroom, spacious high-end bathroom and covered patio with firepit and outdoor seating. More enjoyable and private than a hotel room!

Guest have full access to the hot tub on our newly build covered deck by the pool! Sit back and relax while you listen to Hawk Creek that runs right through the back yard. You can even hear it babbling right from your room.

name: Blue Ridge Mountain Cottage-Epic Mountain View
description: Enjoy gorgeous long range mountain views from the front porch of this newly renovated 2 bedroom 1 bath cottage. Watch the abundance of wildlife throughout the property.  Make s’mores and sip a drink at the outdoor fire pit.  Located on the East side of Asheville, It’s a 2 minute drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway, gas, groceries and a few great restaurants. Only a 10 minutes drive to downtown Asheville. Beautiful rural setting but close to everything Asheville.

name: Lovely Private Apt w/ Hot Tub & King
description:
This beautiful 1 bedroom apartment is both conveniently located and tucked into a private wooded neighborhood. Relax on the patio or soak in the hot tub to enjoy the outdoor space and rejuvenate. It is within walking distance from the up and coming West Asheville business district boasting dozens of popular restaurants. Less than 3 miles from downtown, Blue Ridge Parkway and many gorgeous trails.

Check our Guidebook under the "Where you'll be" section of the listing below for things to do!.

name: Sunny & Cheerful Home in Asheville - Entire house
description:
The most darling sunny cottage in all of north Asheville!
Dedicated desk and workspace.
Dog friendly but please choose the animal under guests as there is a fee.

name: Upscale Retreat - Hot Tub, Firepit, DT AVL 5 min!
description: Whether you're looking forward to the sights and sounds of downtown Asheville, taking in the beauty of the Biltmore Estate, or enjoying the mountain views along the Blue Ridge Parkway, you're in the right place. Located just 1.2 miles from downtown Asheville, 2.3 miles from The Biltmore, and 3.4 miles from the famous Grove Park Inn, our central upscale retreat offers quick and easy access to it all. Enjoy your morning coffee on your private deck and cozy nights relaxing in the hot tub.

name: Elevation Lofts Boutique Hotel - Unit 303
description:
Two-level corner unit with windows facing Broadway Street, with 4 bedrooms, and 4.5 bathrooms, including 2 with tubs. One of the bedrooms and en-suite bathrooms is on an upstairs mezzanine level. Center island in large kitchen can seat 5.

This unit has lovely hardwood floors on the main level, gas fireplace, full kitchen, two dishwashers, full size washer and dryer, custom walnut cabinetry, soaring ceilings with exposed rafters, exposed brickwork on exterior walls, and many interesting details.

name: New Luxury Condo - River Arts District
description: Stunning contemporary condo in fantastic central urban Asheville location. French Broad River greenway is right outside your door, with downtown, River Arts district, and West Asheville close by. Luxurious 2 bedrooms and 2 baths, 12 ft ceilings, open floor plan, full kitchen, and covered balconies - all designed and accessorized with premium amenities and thoughtful touches to meet your needs. Secure building and garage has dedicated parking and elevator. Storage unit and utilities included.

name: Tranquil cabin w/ hot tub
description: Take a deep breath and melt into the comfort of the Blue Spruce.  Greenbuilt certified you can relax knowing you’re 8 min to the Blue Ridge Parkway & 15 min to downtown Asheville or Black Mountain. Trailheads are 2.1 miles down the road for an afternoon hike or bike ride. Spend the evening lounging in the tv loft or soaking up the view from the hot tub. Please recognize we live in a neighborhood with wildlife. We have bears, foxes, bunnies, deer, and more. Be smart and respectful.

name: 1bd/1 Bath. <2 mile to Biltmore, Central  Location
description: Close to Biltmore Village. Stay in this private contemporary loft designed with your comfort in mind.  Enjoy a short walk or ride to Biltmore Village's best art galleries, restaurants, and breweries, like Red Stag Grill and French Broad Brewery. Treat yourself to a cigar at Casablanca Cigar bar or sip local brews at Hillman & Hi-Wire Brewing just down the road. Centrally located, this Airbnb is the perfect base for exploring Asheville's key attractions, most within 10 minutes from your doorstep.

name: Hot Tub, Downtown 3-bedroom & EV charger
description:
3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home walking distance to downtown Asheville, NC Well stocked kitchen, open concept main floor and backyard with hot tub, fire pit, grill, EV charger and outdoor dining.
Smoking is not allowed anywhere on the property. No parties or loud gatherings.

name: Stroll 2 blocks to town!  Quiet spacious studio
description:
Only 2 blocks to town from this sparkling studio apartment with separate entrance & off-street parking.

Enjoy a full kitchen, dining table/chairs, bar stools at a granite kitchen island/counter, and a sofa that becomes a comfy pillow-top bed.

The sleeping area features a king bed, built-in bookcases & armchairs that remind me of Goodnight Moon.

More: TV, WIFI, toiletries, hairdryer, first aid kit, washer/dryer, detergent & pods for mini-dishwasher, & new large-room air filter

name: Kenilworth’s Best! 3-bedroom
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. Whether you are traveling for temporary job or you are getting your home built, this is the perfect long-term vacation rental in Asheville. 2 miles from downtown, 1 mile from AVL mall in the beautiful Kenilworth neighborhood. Owners live in the basement area.  Guests and owner have private entrance and parking space.

name: Modern luxury apartment with fire pit
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this central location just minutes from Asheville, Biltmore and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Excellent location near grocery stores, restaurants, breweries, winery, and minutes to Botanical Gardens, River Arts District, West Asheville nightlife, and French Broad River parks. Large outdoor patio for relaxing with a beautifully landscaped and fenced backyard.

name: 10 Min. to DTWN, HotTub & Sauna Bunks, 2 Acres
description: Enjoy 2 acres of serene open yard w / veggie garden, hot tub, fruit trees, game room, arcade. Reconnect with loved ones in this family-friendly place.

name: Asheville Cottage 16. A modern log cabin/Cottage.
description: Take it easy at this adorable and tranquil getaway. A modern log cabin/cottage. Small , but has everything you need. Open the door and you will be welcomed by luxury and beautiful appointments. This log cabin comes all ready for you, with nicely furnished kitchenette , including a one pot induction cook top, microwave, toaster oven , coffee maker, French press! Queen size memory foam bed, comfy couch, smart TV, Mini-split AC/Heat unit, all in one W/D, dinette table and a private back porch.

name: Forest Oasis w Hot tub, outdoor sauna, & Privacy
description:
Welcome to our modern, spacious home nestled in a magnificence of the Blue Ridge mountains just under 15 minutes from downtown Asheville, Black Mountain and close to the Blue Ridge Pkwy.

Feel at home in this stunning environment where you can enjoy the incredible diversity of the forest, explore & hike the Mountain to Sea trail, immerse yourself in the vibrancy of Asheville and relax in this welcoming, nourishing and rejuvenating oasis.

Pet friendly with fenced in yard and forest hikes.

name: Spacious Cozy Pet-Friendly Home
description:
Spacious, cozy, charming, & centrally located - this home is perfect for traveling professionals, families, a solo traveler seeking a beautiful work-from-home space. Minutes away from downtown Asheville, Mission Hospital, shopping centers, and two neighborhood parks. Lots to do in the surrounding area such as skiing, hiking, biking, and rafting. Dogs love the private fenced yard that has front and backyard gates.
__________________
*4 guests, 1 dog max
*Long-term rentals only (30+ days)

name: Century home in 5 Points
description: Located within walking distance of downtown in historic 5 Points neighborhood. The suite has it’s own private entrance and a recently renovated bathroom with walk-in shower. In case the weather forces y’all inside,  I have plenty of streaming services and a fiber optic internet connection.

name: The Artist Haven - 4 Beds- Near French Broad River
description: This beautifully designed 3 bd/1 ba Arts and Crafts retreat sits on just under an acre of the great outdoors, a stream with a walkover bridge, and just a short stroll to the French Broad River. Our home has local artist works displayed throughout. Perfect for families or a group of friends. Only 8 minutes to the center of downtown.

name: Downtown Asheville Hideaway
description: This rental is very near downtown Asheville, only 2.5 miles from the Biltmore Estate & close to several Blue Ridge Parkway entrances.  Enjoy being able to walk downtown while at the same time being tucked away on a dead end street at the base of Beaucatcher Mountain.  The rental can sleep four people (with one queen bed and two couches) and is approximately 1,200 square feet.  It has a master bedroom, a bonus room/office that serves as a work area, and a living/den area and a full kitchen.

name: Cheerful King Room Asheville
description: Your suite has a king bed, 55 inch TV, and it's own fridge and microwave. A beautiful backyard that is fenced in to keep your pet safe. The sun room and back porch is where you can relax or have your space to work if you wish. The home is conveniently located 3 minutes from Ingles Shopping Center, gas, pharmacy, etc. The shared bath has a shower in tub unit for those long days where you need a soak. Pets welcome, $40 for the first two says, and five dollars per day after that.

name: The Garden Getaway in Asheville, King Suite
description: Welcome to the Garden Getaway in Beautiful Asheville North Carolina. You will find that you are centrally located to all of what Asheville and the Blue Ridge mountains have to offer.  Our home is a cozy 3-bedroom 2-bath private space for you to enjoy and make memories with your family.  Relax, unwind, enjoy and make yourself at home! ￼

name: Colorful modern suite near Blue Ridge Pkwy
description: Relax, be inspired, & make yourself at home in this stylish modern guest suite w/ a private driveway & entrance, nestled in a quiet wooded neighborhood .5 miles from the Asheville city line, near the Blue Ridge Pkwy.  Featuring a private patio, fully outfitted kitchen, work station, high speed internet & stunning mid-century boho design w/ colorful furniture & creative touches that are bound to make you smile.  Perfect for a weekend getaway, creative retreat, or remote work.

name: Mountain Lodge Living - Just a Quick Jaunt to Town
description:
Get the feel of living in a rustic mountain lodge in the woods with a fabulous view. But this place has another benefit... You are a 5-minute drive from downtown Asheville. With all the amenities in this house, you might never want to leave. But you can have comfort knowing that restaurants, bars, and stores are all an easy commute.

This escape is ideal for vacationing couples, groups of friends, work retreats, and outdoor adventurers.

name: West Asheville Treehouse
description: Come stay at the perfect getaway - private suite nestled in the trees in a historic bungalow and right in the heart of West Asheville.

name: Sand Hill Stay Awhile
description: Settle in & stay awhile in this 10/10 walkable West Asheville home. Live like a local just half a block from the best of West Asheville's restaurants, shops, music venues, markets, yoga and more. This spacious 2/2 is perfect for travel nurses, travelling professionals, or anyone just wanting to explore Asheville for more than a short weekend. Centrally located in a safe, walkable & desirable neighborhood, it is also just 2.8 miles to downtown Asheville, and 2.6 miles to Mission Hospital.

name: The Nest, Off Elk Mountain
description: Location & Views!! Fashionable too!!! <10 min drive to downtown AVL! 1920s Bungalow redesigned for relaxation, openness and style. Star and mountain gaze from the front porch, or chose an interior view-- many large windows. Awaken Royal! Refreshed! Neither King nor Queen suite disappoint. Sip coffee, read or socialize on the front porch. Or choose an interior setting, with cozy, Boho/ SoWest vibes. Explore WNC then flock back for some yoga studio time, a spa-like shower or dinner and a movie.

name: Blue Ridge Mtn Modern House w/ Pool & Hot Tub
description: Stunning architecture meets nature in this modern, glass bungalow surrounded by serene pasturelands that is sure to leave you feeling revived and refreshed! But, don’t just take our word for it. Architectural Digest chose it as the most beautiful rental in North Carolina, and GQ, Conde Nast Traveler, and TimeOut are also fans. This 2 bed/2 bath home with a hot tub and fireplace is equipped with super fast WiFi (300mbps+) and 2 state-of-the-art workstations, making it perfect for remote workers!

name: Luxury home in the trees
description: Cosmopolitan and whimsical, this modern chalet offers privacy and tranquility with winter mountain and city views. Nestled in the well-established community of North Asheville, just over 3 miles to downtown, and a mile to The Grove Park Inn. Main level boasts a natural light-filled open floor plan, sleek eat-in kitchen with breakfast bar, dining/living area with fireplace and deck to take it all in. Laundry and access to the outdoor patio with hot tub. Pack your bags as your city retreat awaits!

name: Peaceful Cottage Retreat Close to Asheville
description: Come enjoy the peaceful serenity of the mountain countryside while having all of the conveniences that Asheville has to offer near by.  This home lives perfectly for one large group or 2 small groups with separate living areas. Spend time floating down the French Broad River, biking, hiking, fishing, or shopping  just 10 mins away.  For the those that enjoy the home life, maybe you’d like to just spend your time relaxing on the deck watching the deer and turkeys graze in the back meadow.

name: Entire House with Fenced in Yard in Asheville
description: Escape to this private 2BR, 1BA house located just 2 miles from Haywood Road and 5 miles from downtown Asheville. This space is ideal for short or long-term stays, this pet-friendly retreat provides comfort and convenience. A generous fenced yard is perfect for pets and outdoor relaxation. Work with ease using the dedicated workspace and high-speed Wi-Fi.  House includes a fully stocked kitchen. The entire house and yard are yours to enjoy, great for remote workers and travel nurses!

name: Amazing Views | Studio Apartment in Asheville
description: Welcome to our cozy studio apartment nestled in the breathtaking mountainside, where you'll experience tranquility, comfort, and stunning natural beauty. This studio is the perfect retreat for solo adventurers, couples, or anyone seeking a peaceful getaway. The suite is attached to the side of the main home but has a separate entry. It offers a king size bed, large smart TV, fully stocked kitchen, washer /dryer, mini split heating and cooling system, fire pit area with wood, grill and more.

name: *4 miles to Downtown Asheville *2 Kings* Hot Tub*
description:
**New Listing! HOT TUB!
4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths and 2 separate living areas for your family and friends to spread out, or gather in the open concept main living/dining rooms/kitchen with seating for 8 at the dining table and four more at the spacious kitchen island.
Five TVs so there’ll be no fights over which game to watch.

name: Rustic Mountain Cabin Close to Downtown!
description:
Power, water (non-potable) and internet functioning normally.

Make this cozy mountain cabin your home for 30 days or longer! Situated in a private, quiet, wooded neighborhood less than 5 miles from downtown Asheville and 2 miles to downtown West Asheville. Central location makes this an ideal setting for life in Asheville and excursions in all directions!

name: Charming Marigold House in West Asheville
description:
Come feel cozy in our newly updated 1970s home.
This house is set on over an acre just past Asheville city limits, with plenty of opportunity for yard games and camp fires. Our house is a 5min drive to west Asheville, 15min drive to downtown and 20min drive to Biltmore. There is also a bus stop just around the corner for easy public transportation!
Our house is well suited for a family of 4-5 or a few friends wanting to visit all that Asheville has to offer.

name: Sunflower Sanctuary| Pet Friendly & Close to AVL!
description:
Filled with unparalleled charm and eclectic details, you will instantly feel as if you're in a Pinterest board come to life while staying in this quintessential Arts & Crafts style home.

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: West Asheville Studio
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located West Asheville studio apartment. Walkable to restaurants, bars, and outdoor activities! Only a 10 minute drive to downtown.

name: Lovely Park Home with Scenic Views
description: Country setting with tons of green space.  10 Minutes to downtown Asheville, hot tub and firepit. Enjoy the sounds of nature when you stay in this unique place.

name: West Asheville Studio Cottage
description: Beautifully crafted studio home located 3 miles from West Asheville and 6 miles from downtown Asheville.

name: James' and Ada's View
description: New garage apartment affords scenic views of the beautiful mountains of Western North Carolina. It is located in an established and quiet neighborhood just ten minutes from Biltmore Estate entrance and less than fifteen minutes from downtown Asheville, the Blue Ridge Parkway, breweries, and shopping.

name: Haus Salzburg
description:
This is a cyclist, hiker, ultra runner’s dream. The apartment is 4 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway/ Mountain to Sea Trail and bikable/runnable straight from the apartment door. Or the historical Grove park (2 miles) & amazing restaurants and bars in downtown Asheville (4 miles) The surrounding is quiet with wild turkeys and black bears in a small neighborhood full of walkers.
* This is not suitable for those wanting to party as a family lives upstairs and the space is only for 2 people.

name: The Nest | Home Office & 5 Min. to Downtown AVL!
description: Located just 5 minutes from AVL's city center in a quiet neighborhood, this cozy cottage has everything needed for a comfortable & convenient extended stay, including a washer & dryer, a home office with desk, Smart TV, and high-speed Wi-Fi, and a deck!

name: Quiet, 1 BR Apartment with Pool and Play Area
description:
Just 20 mins from the Biltmore Estate, 15 mins from AVL airport and 20 mins to downtown Asheville. Walnut Woods Retreat is an oasis to come home to after enjoying Western NC.

This lower-level, in-Law suite has a private entrance, full kitchen, private washer/dryer and a spacious living room with Smart TV. The bedroom has a king bed. There's also a pull-out queen in the living room. WIFI throughout (150 mbps) as well as an ethernet connection in a small office area.

name: The Retreat House~Large groups, pets, hot tub
description:
Sleeps 12! Hot tub & pets!
Entire home available with large yard, including fire pit and hammock. House is up the hill from the VA; convenient to grocery stores, Asheville mall, and downtown attractions & breweries.

Bunk room w/ trundle bed, allowing 4 to the room. Updated bathrooms. Smart TVs. Kitchen is large and whole house has enough room for everyone to gather together or spread out for down-time.


6.8 mi/15min to downtown
2.3 mi/6min to Blue Ridge Parkway
5.9 mi/15min to Biltmore

name: Travelers special on the Hill
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.  Enjoy all of the amenities of our larger listing in this studio.   Save money by making your own queen sized bed with provided linens on an extremely comfortable convertible IKEA sofa and having an assigned parking space.  Located within walking distance of everything downtown has to offer with 60 inch Roku tv for enjoying at home time.

name: Cheerful King Master Bedroom
description: Peaceful and centrally-located place. Your King Bed Suite has a 55 inch TV it's own fridge and microwave. A beautiful backyard that is fenced in to keep your pet safe. The sun room and back porch is where you can relax or have your space to work if you wish. The home is conveniently located 3 minutes from Ingles Shopping Center, gas, pharmacy, etc. Enjoy your Private bathroom. Pets welcome. $40 for the first two days, and five dollars per day after that.

name: Bunn House
description: The Bunn House is the perfect setting for gatherings of up to 8 close friends, offering enough space for privacy & separation, while at the same time providing guests with the opportunity to come together as a group in an intimate setting.  After a day of outdoor activities in the North Carolina mountains return to your luxurious guest room with en suite bathroom and steam shower for a restorative spa-like experience.  Only 2 blocks from downtown,  you can easily walk to the center of Asheville.

name: Treetop Retreat w/ Panoramic Mtn Views & Hot Tub
description: Pet-friendly lodge perched mountainside, just 10 mins from downtown! Enjoy 3 king beds, stocked kitchen, spacious living areas, relaxing hot tub, and cozy fire pit under the stars. Perfect for short getaways or extended retreats—comfort awaits!

name: Mountain Retreat: Duplex Haven on 4 Acres
description: Welcome to our Mountain Retreat, where you can escape and relax while being only 5 miles to downtown Asheville! Surrounded by 4 wooded acres, yet minutes away from the best breweries, restaurants and shopping Asheville has to offer, you won't find this unique environment this close to town anywhere else. This property brings together the mountain's historic charm with modern amenities and style.

name: Mountain Majesty: Luxe Lodge on 4 Acres, Asheville
description:
Escape to the perfect mountain retreat... Surrounded by 4 acres of serene woodlands, this luxurious lodge is the ideal getaway for groups looking for a peaceful escape while still being just 5 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville. Whether you're planning a romantic weekend, a family vacation, or a girls' trip, this property offers unparalleled space and convenience.

This stunning lodge strikes the perfect balance between rustic charm and modern comfort.

name: Countryside cottage minutes from Asheville
description:
Our little cottage welcomes you back to Asheville!

Come relax in this cozy little cottage in the historic Chunns Cove community, conveniently located only 3 miles from downtown Asheville. The perfect size for an individual or couple, this retreat offers a uniquely stylish and well appointed interior, with the feel of an English country cottage on the exterior. Fire pit outside in the spacious yard and excellent star gazing!

name: Tantric Yoga Studio Apt-Jacuzzi/Private Entrances
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful Zen Den. A couple Nights here to explore Downtown Asheville, Hendersonville or all the Nature Hikes you have the stamina for. Property is completely Private as Trees have been planted around Property Line for Peace . 6 minutes from AVL Airport. Feel free to Strength Train OR practice Yoga/Mediation on your own or join me for a class on M, W, F at 10am. Huge Fletcher Park back entrance is accessible from our backyard. Bon Fires & Jacuzzi are nice too.

name: Expansive Views, Hot Tub, Outdoor Dining | Leyland
description:
- Just outside central Asheville
- With tons of space, a modern rustic style, and plenty of entertainment
- Boasting multiple decks, each with expansive views
- Firepit outside the great room
- Outdoor dining area overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains
- Private hot tub and large recreation room

name: French Broad Overlook-3 miles from downtown AVL
description: Discover your perfect getaway just 3 miles from downtown Asheville! Our spacious retreat features 2 king beds, 1 queen bed, and a sleeper sofa, accommodating families or groups comfortably. Enjoy a large open kitchen and living area, perfect for gatherings, along with board and card games for family fun. Relax on the balcony overlooking the beautiful French Broad River. Plus, we cover the service fee, so you can focus on enjoying your stay. With 4 parking spaces, your adventure starts here!

name: Walker's Paradise
description: Centrally-located, stylish condo just steps from all downtown Asheville has to offer! Fully furnished, utilities included, Wifi and cable, washer/dryer and dedicated parking spot! One month minimum rental.  Ask about multiple month discounts.

name: Radiant Arden Home - 10 Mi to Biltmore!
description: Make your next Asheville area getaway memorable with this inviting 2-bedroom, 1-bath vacation rental. Located near downtown Asheville, this Arden home’s location makes an excellent launching point for exploring famous attractions like the Biltmore Estate or the Asheville Museum of Science. Take the fun outdoors and visit the nearby Lake Julian or French Broad River Park. When you’re not out exploring, unwind in the serene heated sunroom or watch a family favorite on the Smart TV.

name: Tranquil River Home-5 miles to Biltmore
description: We are grateful to share that our home came through the storm without damage! With water, internet, and power restored, our doors are open to welcome thoughtful travelers, relief workers, displaced neighbors, and anyone seeking a safe place to stay. Your comfort and well-being are our top priorities.

name: Modern Candler Home w/ Deck & Yard!
description: You can have the best of both worlds at this Candler vacation rental, tucked between the city lights in Downtown Asheville and the blissful nature of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Fitted with modern furnishings, a chef’s kitchen, and a spacious deck, this 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath abode is perfectly suited for spending quality time with your group. Whether you plan to explore Asheville’s breweries, tour the iconic Biltmore, or cruise along the Blue Ridge Parkway, this home offers easy access to it all!

name: Asheville Getaway Entertainment Galore 5k+ sq ft
description:
Newly renovated 5k+ square foot home that is built to host and entertain. Location is extremely central to everything Asheville - 11 minutes from downtown, 15 minutes from the Biltmore, & 20 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

We have enough beds to accommodate up to 18 people. If you are with a group of over 16 people, please message us and we can sort out the details.

name: Art House Furnished Room Rentals
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located Art House offering furnished Room Rentals in a creative, calm atmosphere.
Close by 10-20 miles to all major Highways, Airport, Blue Ridge Parkway and Downtown Asheville, this unique home is an Artists dream retreat space. Safe neighborhood with beautiful views, outdoor decks, gardens, free parking and walking distance to grocery shopping. Each room is fully furnished with access to share Kitchen, Living and Meditation Sunroom.

name: Black Bear 1
description: Private bedroom, bathroom and entrance/ living-room. Queen bed plus single pullout chair bed. Driveway parking. Centrally-located 3 miles to downtown Asheville. It is a peaceful, quiet 100 year old house with tons of charm.  Keyless  entry code to the private entrance . Foyer has sitting area, coffee, microwave, mini-fridge and bathroom. Remote control fan, dimming lights, TV, internet and work desk.

name: Sophisticated, modern, & unique. 5 miles downtown
description: Discover the distinctive charm of Asheville at "La Maison Mirch", a unique blend of modern convenience with antique elegance. This luxurious property is situated in the heart of Asheville, just steps away from landmarks like The Omni Grove Park Inn Spa and Biltmore Estate. Ideal for families and friends, enjoy refined living spaces, a chef's kitchen, and serene outdoor areas in our tranquil 3-bedroom sanctuary.

name: Sleeps 18! Fire Pit, Hot Tub & Game Room!
description: Spacious 5BR/4.5BA getaway just 13 min from Downtown Asheville & Biltmore! Sleeps 18 (including 2 ensuite bedrooms), parks 6 cars. Unwind in the oversized hot tub, hang on the large deck with fire pit & grill, or head to the game lounge with PacMan arcade + billiards/ping pong. Each bedroom features a large screen TV for ultimate comfort. Perfect for groups looking to relax, laugh, and make lasting memories in the mountains.

name: Walkable W. AVL *2 Full Baths* Convienent Location
description:
Centrally located in West Asheville & only 3 blocks to Haywood Rd offering eateries, shops, and breweries.

🔹10min walk up a sidewalk to:
The Admiral🍽️
W.A.L.K🍔
Cellarest Brewery🍻
OWL Bakery🥐
Whale (US Today's Top 10 Beer Bars in the U.S!)🍻
Golden Pineapple🍹
Double Crown🍸🎶
Haywood Common🍔

🔹Under 10min drive:
Downtown💫
New Belgium🍻
The Orange Peel🎶
South Slope District🍻
River Arts District🎨
Biltmore Estate🏡
Blueridge Parkway🛣️

🔹15min drive:
AVL Airport✈️
Sierra Nevada🍻

name: Davenport Cottage | Pet Friendly | Walk to Town
description:
