Embodying the hip & revitalized vibes of West Asheville, Davenport Cottage is within walking distance of Haywood Road—the epicenter of West Asheville. Situated in a quiet neighborhood, this quaint, pet-friendly home is ideal for small families, active couples, or creative individuals who have the flexibility to work remotely.

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: Cottontail Cottage | Pet-friendly, Fire Pit
description:
Cozy & convenient, Cottontail Cottage is a chic & newly-updated pet-friendly bungalow just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville that offers a deck, a gas grill, a fire pit, a ping pong table, a fenced yard, and high-speed internet to enjoy!

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: The Artist Retreat~$375 Free Activities Daily
description: Welcome to The Artist Retreat. Conveniently located just south of Asheville, in Biltmore Forest. Weather you visit for the National Parks, Breweries, or a foodie looking to sample the world class cuisine, this is the perfect jumping point for all your Asheville area activates. All the beautiful artwork is provided by locale artist Olga Dorenko.

name: Biltmore Hideaway Villa
description: Our tranquil villa is luxurious and very spacious! Enjoy everything Biltmore Village has to offer from multiple high end restaurants, pubs, cafés, taqueria and lots of shopping all within walking distance. You can go downtown Asheville and enjoy lots of shopping, eateries and tons of art. Asheville also has some of the most beautiful mountains to hike. There's endless things to do or you can do nothing and enjoy the beauty and peacefulness.....oh and don't forget the exquisite Biltmore Estate!!

name: Asheville Snazzy apart 5 Minutes to Downtown.
description:
Great location close to all districts of Asheville.
This newly remodeled house is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. Family friendly. We are centrally located.
Walking distant to the VA hospital.
Close to a cute tea and coffee shop and a shopping center.
Easy access to the interstate and travels to the Biltmore.
Ring Camera at front door for the safety of packages & deliveries.

name: LUX Mountaintop yet 5 minutes to downtown!
description: Enjoy an upscale experience at this new luxury mountaintop getaway. Feels like you’re away from it all with gorgeous long range mountain views & 8 acres yet only 5 minutes to downtown. 5 minutes the other way and you’ll be at the entrance to The Blue Ridge Parkway. On the private patio and the private covered terrace you’ll l enjoy spectacular long range views. Or relax in the living room or king bedroom and enjoy the same views. All 5 ⭐️  reviews here and on other sites. 93 of them✅ it out.

name: Mountaintop Modern by CM | Grill, Fire Pit, & Mtns
description:
This furnished property is available for stays of 30 days or longer.

If you’re looking to make the best of any season and be close to Asheville, Mountaintop Modern is the ideal home for you. With expansive windows, multiple levels, and a large deck, you can enjoy the fantastic view no matter the time of year. Feel like you’re in a treehouse in this three-story modern home that offers plenty of space with three bedrooms, three full bathrooms, and one-half bath.

name: Cozy Escape in the Mountains-10 min to Downtown
description: This cozy modern farmhouse  located in a beautiful country setting 10 min to DT Asheville and 5 min popular W. Asheville. Enjoy this new space, can host up to 6 guests, but Cozy enough for a romantic retreat for 1 or 2 couples. You can relax in this well appointed house or you can check out everything Asheville has to offer since it is located close to all popular spots, 15 minutes from Biltmore Estate, Asheville Outlet Mall, Blue Ridge Parkway and NC Arboretum.

name: Cozy sophistication West AVL
description: This 1924 brick bungalow is a three-minute walk to Haywood Road, with a walkability score of 87.  You can easily relax in the comfortably furnished space after touring western North Carolina either on foot or by car. Outdoor spaces include a covered porch, deck, and fire pit area.

name: Great house near Downtown/ West Asheville
description:
spacious home just couple of miles away from amazing restaurants, bbq, cafes, bars, breweries galore, and so much more. Perfect for weekend getaway, business trip, staycation, work-from-home alternative, or cozy home base.

Unbeatable location close to Downtown, Biltmore, River Arts District, West Asheville, hiking and waterfall spots and many breweries to try.

We are a Pet friendly house in one of the most Pet friendly cities in the USA.

name: South Asheville Getaway II
description: Beautiful 1920s updated house tucked away  in South Asheville (Arden). Feel as though you're in the mountain woods but just a few minutes from everything Asheville. 15 min to Biltmore, 18 min to Asheville, 20 min to Brevard waterfalls and hiking, 25 min to Hendersonville, less than 10 min to Sierra Nevada, Mills River, & Boldrock breweries. Close to great restaurants or have a night grilling & a bonfire.  CPI Security, personal security FOB on property, washer/dryer/kuerig cup/pot, hi speed wifi

name: Village People Vacations
description: Brand new to the rental market, Village People is the perfect spot for your Asheville vacation. Located in the heart of Biltmore Village, this 2200 square ft condo is less than .5 miles to the famous Biltmore Estate and 2.5 miles to downtown Asheville. Walkable to local shopping and fabulous restaurants- this luxurious condo is the perfect home base for a couples retreat or girls getaway to the North Carolina mountains.

name: Home in Walkable West Asheville
description: Comfortable and family friendly home in the heart of West Asheville with a big, flat yard for relaxation and play. You will be within walking distance of parks, restaurants, cafes, grocery stores, toy stores, ice cream shops, and bars. We have kids' books and board games for families. Our home is also pet-friendly, as long as your dog is not an escape artist or serial hole digger :) So, come enjoy a quick nap on the screened porch with ceiling fan while your kids and dog frolic in the yard.

name: Downtown Townhouse w/ elevator, 3 BR's & 3.5 baths
description: Newer 4 story townhouse with private elevator and roof top terrace. Walk to South Slope breweries and dining and all of downtown attractions. Fully stocked with everything you need including coffee, shampoo, soaps and luxury linens. Private parking onsite including an in unit garage. This property has recently changed ownership so reviews did not carry over from previous listing, but over 50 5 Star Reviews! Same management is in place.

name: Luxury Mountain Townhome Pet-Friendly with Office
description: Village Retreat is a Luxurious Townhome located in North Asheville, under 10 minutes from Downtown and convenient to all that the area has to offer. Our home has incredible mountain views, the most comfortable, high-end furnishings and a dedicated office space (with fast, fiber internet!) for working remotely. We welcome you and your well-behaved pups for a relaxing and enjoyable stay of 30 Nights or more.

name: Asheville, NC Escape | Private Stay Near Downtown
description: Built for you! This brand new home, appointed one-story house, 3/2, is minutes away from downtown Asheville and located in a quiet neighborhood.

name: Tennis! Fitness! Blue Ridge Prk!
description:
Come enjoy Amazing Asheville! This first floor 2 bedroom 2 bath condo has all the amenities you need for a great vacation. It is less than a mile to the Blue Ridge Parkway and 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, the airport, and Bent Creek (premier Mountain Biking and hiking).
Your stay includes Platinum membership to the Racquetclub, which offers outdoor tennis and pickleball, a gym, and a outdoor pool (indoor pool at the downtown location). Indoor tennis available at both locations for a fee.

name: The Dodge House
description:
Renovated charming cottage walking distance to Biltmore Village, 8 minute drive to Downtown and 5 minute drive to Mission Hospital.

Come and enjoy this chic and comfy home, sip a cup of coffee or glass of wine from the ample back porch that comes equipped with a grill and outdoor furniture.

Nicely furnished with a section leather sofa, a queen size bed, eclectic decor and high end finishing.

Fully fenced-in yard with doggy door in the back door.

name: Arden Bungalow w/ Fire Pit: Near Lake Julian Park
description: This welcoming Arden bungalow offers the ideal home base for couples or solo travelers for your next North Carolina getaway. Spend your days fishing, boating, or picnicking at Lake Julian Park or exploring the 434 acres of cultivated gardens at the North Carolina Arboretum! This 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom vacation rental boasts a stylish interior and spacious outdoor living space, complete with a grill and a fireplace. End the day roasting s'mores and exchanging stories by the fire pit.

name: Artsy Mountain Hideaway w/ Hot Tub & Fenced Yard!
description: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located home. This one story, 3 bedroom, 2 bath home in Asheville is close to it all! Open floor plan decorated in a worldly bohemian vibe, full of great energy, color and peacefulness. Recently upgraded and expanded covered back patio - making this a true indoor outdoor space! Full of all the amenities you would need plus all the ones you didn’t know you needed!

name: Sunny Ridge Retreat
description: Enjoy this beautiful home nestled in a quiet neighborhood, conveniently located just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville with easy access to restaurants, historic sites, hiking and other adventure destinations. The private rental offers 1600 square feet of living space in the LOWER AREA of the house with an entrance all to yourselves. Our 2-person spa and deck area will help you relax and enjoy the day looking at the surrounding forest.

name: River Mist Retreat
description:
After the storm ...We have power, water and internet.

Amazing location! 5 miles to downtown. Ideal for four couples (8 people). Main floor has two bedrooms with queen-sized beds, a shared full bath, dining and living space. Downstairs has a king bedroom suite with great living space and bar. Upstairs has a king bed, full bath, a desk and a pull-out sofa. Beautiful yard with fire pit. Parking for four cars. One small dog upon approval and $150.00 pet fee. Wifi fastest available.

name: Cottage with Mountain Views | 10 min to Downtown
description:
Relax with the entire family at this cozy, allergen-free historic cottage located 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, 15 minutes from the Biltmore, and 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Arboretum, and hiking trails at Bent Creek.

Enjoy the amazing mountain views and peaceful neighborhood full of wildlife in the comfort of a fully equipped house with everything you could need.

name: Rose Room romantic getaway near Avl, Biltmore pass
description: PLEASE NOTE: We do not serve breakfast. The Rose Room is a romantic couples getaway located in South Asheville just minutes to downtown, convenient to attractions like Sierra Nevada, Twelve Bones South and Jake Rusher Park. South Asheville is quickly becoming a "must see" destination in its own right, and we are right in the middle of it. FREE activities for stays under 29 nights, including Biltmore, Rock Wall, Zipline, Whitewater Rafting, Trampoline Park, Snow Tubing and Axe Throwing.

name: Sleep well in a cozy North AVL home
description:
Elegant Simplicity, Peaceful Repose

Clean, quiet accommodations in a historic N AVL neighborhood and favorite walking area
- Private room + bath in a charming, art-filled 1920's bungalow
- Emma Sleep queen mattress, linens + black-out curtains for restful sleep
- Free parking

Downtown AVL a 25 minute walk away. Easy walking to a variety of Merrimon Avenue restaurants, city park, houses of worship, natural beauty and attractions nearby...Simply, a great location!

name: The Kenilworth Apartment
description:
You will enjoy easy access to everything in Asheville from this centrally located home. In Kenilworth, the locals know each other and enjoy walking the neighborhood, the variety of architecture, nearby playgrounds, and quaint streets that wind through the hills.
This apartment is on the ground floor of a newly renovated, 103 year old home. It offers a well equipped, galley kitchen, a large sitting area, comfortable bedroom, and windows in every room that look out onto a well tended yard.

name: Charming Retreat w/ Mtn Views: Walkable Location!
description:
Brand New Build | Walk to Reynolds Village | Long Range Mountain Views

Plan your private escape to the Blue Ridge Mountains at this 2022 custom-built Woodfin vacation rental. Located just 5 miles from downtown, this family-friendly Asheville area vacation rental gives you both peace and quiet and easy access to attractions. Cruise the Blue Ridge Parkway for unparalleled views of the area! Return back to the 2-bedroom, 2-bath house for a home-cooked meal and a movie night.

name: Riverside House - quiet season discount rate
description: We are grateful to share that our home came through the storm without damage! With water, internet, and power restored, our doors are open to welcome thoughtful travelers, relief workers, displaced neighbors, and anyone seeking a safe place to stay. Your comfort and well-being are our top priorities.

name: Sage House - less than 3 miles to downtown AVL
description: We are grateful to share that our home came through the storm without damage! With water, internet, and power restored, our doors are open to welcome thoughtful travelers, relief workers, displaced neighbors, and anyone seeking a safe place to stay. Your comfort and well-being are our top priorities.

name: MidWay. Mountain Views. Spacious! 2 Drives!
description:
Beautiful corner lot, secluded community, right next to the Blueridge Parkway! Minutes from Downtown.

Private, quiet, with beautiful views! Centrally located to downtown, Blueridge Parkway & shopping!

The house is located off of Brevard Road in Asheville adjacent to Bent Creek and just minutes away from all kinds of fun! This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom sleeps 6 comfortably, and has room for 1 to 2 more if they rearrange the sectional!

name: Mountain Modern Eco-House (30+ day only)
description: Welcome to our Mountain Modern Eco-House in Chicken Hill! Steps away from the River Arts District and the French Broad River greenway and a short walk to downtown and the South Slope brewery scene, this is the perfect place to spend a month or more really getting to know Asheville. Sun-filled rooms with views of the Blue Ridge Mountains feature two bedrooms with queen-sized beds and a third bedroom set up as a home office. Perfect for remote work -- and all of it powered by solar panels!

name: Mountaintop Villa 8 min to Downtown!
description: Relax in a luxury mountaintop getaway just 8 minutes to downtown Asheville! You'll stay in the lower level guest suite of a gorgeous villa with jaw dropping  views. You have your own entrance, parking and large private terrace with a firepit and grill. Fully stocked kitchen to cook in with complimentary coffee. Located 10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and endless hiking trails. The perfect spot to unwind and take advantage of everything Asheville has to offer!

name: Pup-Friendly Asheville Oasis:Game|Sauna|Hot Tub
description: Escape to our peaceful, designer music-inspired retreat in a serene residential neighborhood, just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville! This luxurious 5-bedroom sanctuary is perfect for family gatherings and mindful escapes. Unwind in the hot tub and barrel sauna, make memories in the epic game room, or gather around the fire pit. Thoughtfully designed for multigenerational stays. Pampered pups welcome with fenced yard. Your quiet mountain retreat awaits!

name: Casa Luna Blue Ridge Mountain
description:
Wonderful Asheville getaway just minutes from Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Park and the Blue Ridge Parkway!

A quiet neighborhood, just minutes from all that Asheville has to offer for restaurants, shopping, breweries and more! This home offers privacy, with a large back yard with fire pit.
You can access the house with any type of car even if snows or rains.

name: Meadow Lounge | Pool | Hot Tub | 10 Min to DTN
description:
The Meadow Lounge: Stylish and Cozy Mountain Spa in Asheville, NC.

Escape to the ultimate chic getaway in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains of Asheville. Immerse yourself in nature and all the comfort and amenities you need for an unforgettable stay. Enjoy an array of activities all around you or relax in the sun-room, hot tub, pool, patio, and fire pit. Whether you are traveling with friends or family, this spacious 6BR house has everything you need to make your vacation truly unforgettable.

name: Trail's End Cabin in Bent Creek
description: This unique home is literally surrounded by the National Forest, yet only 12 minutes from Downtown Asheville.  Come experience the peaceful privacy of the forest and the mountains.  The Bent Creek Experimental Forest offers some of the area's best hiking and biking trails from the front door of this amazing property.  This property is under new management which is why we have no reviews yet. It has been on Airbnb for many years with many 5 ⭐️ reviews. Take advantage of our introductory pricing!

name: Hilltop Cabin | Cozy & Equipped | 10 to AVL
description: Escape to this mountain getaway in Asheville! This quaint 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom cabin nestled in the hillside is located 10 minutes from all the action in Asheville including award-winning restaurants, local breweries, and coffee shops! Take a drive on the Blue Ridge Parkway and hike the largest peak east of the Mississippi, or just take a walk to go fishing in the French Broad River.

name: Biltmore Ave Apartment
description:
Private apartment nestled between South Slope and Biltmore Village. Free off street parking. Quick walk to Hi-Wire Brewing and Biscuit Head. One mile to downtown Asheville and 1/2 mile to Biltmore Village and Biltmore Estate.

Apt is attached to my home. There is a private entrance that is up a flight of stairs. There is no internal connection between apt and home. There is one bedroom with king bed, one bathroom with tub, and a living space.

name: Perfect vacation home 1
description: New, professionally decorated in a quiet and safe residential area, offering all the amenities to make you feel at home. Free parking on premises, washer and dryer, fully stocked kitchen, comfortable beds and linens.  Home is located within 10 min to Asheville’s downtown and 6 min to Biltmore estate.  Ideal for families or groups up to 6 people. For a big group consider booking our second home, located on the same lot. https://www.airbnb.com/h/yourperfectgetawaytwo

name: Perfect vacation home2 wifi available
description: New and professionally decorated in a quiet, safe residential area. Enjoy the best Asheville can offer - stay within minutes to downtown, Biltmore estate, yet close to mountains that can be seen even from the parking lot!  4 parking spaces, washer&dryer, fully stocked kitchen, comfy beds to make you feel at home. . Ideal for families or small groups up to 6 people. If you plan for a bigger group, consider booking our second home, located on the same lot-just search for "Perfect vacation home 1".

name: Harmony Hideaway-Hiking & Sunny Mountain Views
description:
First floor of Single family home with Private entrance,
Sunny, Morning Mountain views with a rocking chair porch.
Prepare your favorite meal in the fully equipped kitchen, relax by the 55" TV with easy wifi, then snuggle into your King bed after a soak in the whirlpool tub.
New bunk beds in 2nd bedroom, plus huge desk for your work space.
Just 15 Minutes to hip West Asheville and its great restaurants. 35 min. to Maggie Valley. Great hiking nearby. 5 min. to groceries.

name: Walkable West Asheville Apartment
description: Nestled in the heart of walkable West Asheville. One block from the shops, restaurants and bars of Haywood. Easy access to the River Arts District and downtown. Spacious 2 bedroom 1 bath with private keypad entrance, off street private parking, and a large fenced in yard to enjoy. No cleaning fee, pet friendly ($35 pet fee does apply), discounts available for longer stays

name: Pet Friendly - Tranquility Suite
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. This bright and private 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment comes equipped with everything you need to feel like it's your home away from home.

A great location that's only 6 minutes from downtown, 8 minutes to West Asheville, and get onto the Blue Ridge Parkway in under 30 min.

The unit is one of two that reside on the property. This is the upstairs unit.

name: Pet Friendly - Relaxed Apt
description:
-Super cute and cozy 2 bedroom apartment.
-The apartment has everything you need to feel like it's your home away from home.
-A great location that's only 6 minutes to downtown, 8 minutes to West Asheville, and get onto the Blue Ridge Parkway in under 30 min.
-The unit is one of two that reside on the property. This is the downstairs unit.
- There are 2 doors that connect to the bathroom. One is off the kitchen and one is off one of bedrooms. You do have to walk through the bathroom to exit.

name: Spacious Loft w/Mural in DT AVL
description:
Spacious Loft in the heart of DT Asheville. Located on Carolina Ln, guests are steps away from restaurants, breweries, art galleries and bars. Attractions like the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are only a 10 min drive away.

This unit is the upstairs of our other listing:
https://abnb.me/jYBFi1lSwxb

The loft boast tall ceilings, big windows, a beautiful mural and plenty of areas to relax while you're there.

Mural done by local artist Megan Kelly

name: Asheville Cozy apart 5 minutes to downtown
description:
Great location close to all districts of Asheville.
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.
This newly remodeled house is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. Family friendly. We are centrally located .
Walking Distant to the VA hospital.
Close to a cute tea and coffee shop and a shopping center.
Easy access to the interstate and travels to the Biltmore.
Ring Camera at front door for the safety of packages & deliveries.

name: Private bedroom in West Asheville
description:
WATER iS BACK!!!
!I have two bedrooms for rent: one at $60, together at $85.
It's a lovely home in a very quiet, dead-end street. Grocery stores,(5 mins) restaurants and downtown Asheville are all within 15 minutes or less. You get the best of both worlds here - quiet, peaceful environment, and easy quick access to all that Asheville has to offer. Please note, I have a mini poodle (hypo allergenic) who lives with me - barks when you come in and in two minutes you are his best friend.

name: Wild Turkey Bungalow
description:
Bright and modern lower level apartment, includes a large bedroom with a king size bed, living room with queen size sleeper sofa, large full bathroom with bath, breakfast nook with frig, keurig coffee maker, and microwave. There is a smart tv in both the bedroom and living room.

Enjoy the convenience of your own private driveway right out side the step free keyless entry. Take in the fresh air and majesty of nature in the patio in Kenilworth’s wooded setting, frequented by wild turkeys.

name: Parker House Apt A I 5 Min from Downtown AVL!
description: Parker House is located in the historic Montford area of Asheville. It's an easy walk to downtown Asheville, where you will find fabulous restaurants, live music, art galleries, and shopping. Apartment A is the main level of the house. Unfortunately, this home is not pet friendly.

name: Parker House Apt B I 5 Min from Downtown AVL!
description: Parker House is located in the historic Montford area of Asheville. It's an easy walk to downtown Asheville, where you will find fabulous restaurants, live music, art galleries, and shopping. Apartment B is the upper level of the house. Unfortunately, this home is not pet friendly.

name: 1BR mountain view home near downtown Asheville
Sunrise Views and Hot Tub, close to W Asheville
description:
Take it easy at this unique getaway. Kick back & relax on the patio or barn with awesome views!

Book a week stay and save 20%!

Only 12 min from downtown AVL & Biltmore Estate. Haywood Rd, NC Arboretum, & the Blue Ridge Parkway are only minutes away.

name: Blue Ridge Bungalo
description: Set atop a quiet, woodsy road. This adorable, fully renovated North Asheville cottage features clean lines and an open floor plan, with two king-sized and one queen-sized bed. Enjoy modern appliances, cool contemporary furniture and furnishings, and two refurbished full bathrooms. Outdoors, a spacious deck and fire pit beckon in a yard framed by a split rail fence. Guests will be treated to spotless accommodations and attention to detail. Join us!

name: Cozy Guesthouse Minutes from AVL
description: Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis.  It offers a sense of quiet seclusion yet is located just minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and downtown Asheville.

name: Asheville-Biltmore 15 min, View, Hot Tub, 3 kings
description: Welcome to Mountain Meadows, your perfect mountain escape just 15 minutes to downtown Asheville and Biltmore! Nestled in the heart of green mountain meadows, this cozy cabin offers great views, modern amenities, and a peaceful setting for a relaxing getaway. Whether you’re here to explore hiking and waterfalls or enjoy local attractions you'll find everything you need for a memorable stay. Experience the beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains with us! LONG STAY DISCOUNT Jan-Mar $3,700-send inquiry.

name: Misty Mountain by CM | Warm Fireplace & Hot Tub
description: Memories will be made at Misty Mountain! This contemporary home perched near the summit of Town Mountain is close enough to downtown Asheville for an Uber ride and food delivery, yet enjoys an expansive private flagstone patio with a fire pit and hot tub. Delight in gorgeous views of the surrounding mountains and tall evergreen trees!

name: King size comfy suite in Montford-5min to downtown
description: Cozy and comfortable private studio apartment in historic Montford neighborhood in Asheville.  We are a close to Downtown (5min drive or 30min walk) .  UNCA Botanical Gardens, River Arts District, and South Slope are close by as well.  The apartment has a king size bed, kitchenette and large spa-like bathroom.

name: Colorful Biltmore Getaway
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located garden apartment. Five minutes from the entrance of America's largest privately owned home, the Biltmore Estate, 3 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway and 8 minutes to downtown - our charming garden apartment located on a quiet street will keep you close to everything but feeling tucked away.

name: Asheville Relaxing Sanctuary Arboretum adjacent
description: Fully remodeled contemporary ranch home in quiet Bent Creek neighborhood. Light-filled living space with fireplace, local art, and fully equipped kitchen. French doors lead to a large rear patio with BBQ grill and outdoor dining as well as a spacious backyard with fire pit. Includes locking storage for bikes. Just minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek Trails, French Broad River, Lake Powhatan & the NC Arboretum. Plus only 9 miles from everything that downtown Asheville has to offer!

name: Charming 2BD | West AVL | Private Entry + FirePit
description:
**This is a SHARED home with the owner.**
Traveling 7/11 - 14, 8/26 - 9/12, 9/18 - 22


Enjoy a 2bd/1ba downstairs unit in a newer home with your own private entrance, mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and workspace. Only 2 miles from Haywood Rd, 5 mins from River Arts District, and 10 mins from Downtown. Safe and quiet neighborhood mins away from all the fun Asheville has to offer! A 5 minute drive to West AVL, a 15 min drive to the Biltmore House, NC Arboretum, or Blue Ridge Parkway hiking

name: Ivy Cottage - Backyard Escape
description: Escape to out charming house in Arden, NC, just 8 minutes from Biltmore Park. This spacious 1100 sqft open living space is perfect for relaxing and unwinding. Step outside to your own private wooded backyard oasis, ideal for unwinding or grilling after a day of adventure. Experience the best of both worlds with convenient access to all things in the Asheville area and a tranquil retreat right at your doorstep.

name: Cozy Home in a Great Location!
description: This mid-century modern cozy retreat is nestled in the trees in NE Asheville. This property features beautiful accommodations within easy reach of all of Asheville's diverse attractions. Owner has spared no expense with high end furnishings, luxury bedding, comfy recliners, chef's kitchen, gas grill, and bar. The 2 decks, and fire pit area  provide year round outdoor space. Comfy game room with access to lower deck has ping pong, wall games, and  work out space. Contact us for weekday discounts!

name: Cozy boho lower level
description: *PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING!* Live like a local in walking distance to the popular Haywood Ave in West Asheville! Enjoy a peaceful stay on a quiet dead-end street. When you’re not out and about exploring this amazing mountain town, make yourself a delicious espresso drink, curl up on the couch or in bed to watch your favorite movies, or take advantage of the dedicated work space. With your own off-street parking and private keyless entry, you can come and go as you please and truly feel at home.

name: Home+ studio, Heart of Asheville with Views
description: Bright, clean, well maintained home in the heart of Asheville, epic views. Walking distance to Haywood Rd, West Asheville, the River Arts District, and New Belgium. Studio apt w/ separate entrance. 4 bedrooms, 3 1/2 bathrooms, with an upper deck for BBQing and lounging, great views, lower patio for studio. 30 day min charge and longer term lease available, you must contact us first to book w/names and reason for visit please. Newly furnished. This house is a gem to enjoy!

name: Restored 1915 Farmhouse in River Arts District
description: Experience the charm of a 1915 farmhouse in a central location, just steps away from the River Arts District. This adorable home features updated kitchen and bath, seamlessly blending with original wood flooring. Enjoy two bedrooms with walk-in closets, a well-designed kitchen, and a spacious living room. Relax on the covered front porch or back deck overlooking the large fenced-in yard. In the middle of everything -- just a short walk to downtown Asheville, River Arts District and Depot St.

name: Pranic Life too
description: Private bedroom, bathroom and livingroom. Centrally-located 3 miles to downtown Asheville, bus stop within walking distance. It is a peaceful 100 year old house with tons of charm. keyless entry code to the foyer. Foyer has sitting area, coffee, microwave, mini-fridge and bathroom. electronic locks, remote control fan, dimming lights, TV, internet. No smoking in the house or on the property.

name: Comfy home stay private entrance
description: A room with a private entrance and private bathroom attached to our home in West Asheville. We are a five minute walk to Haywood Rd in West Asheville that has everything you could ever want or need - tons of fun and worthwhile shops, restaurants, coffee shops, and a grocery. The room is very cozy and has a small fridge, microwave and tea pot to make coffee or tea in the morning or to heat up your favorite leftovers from the amazing restaurants nearby. The space has a separate bathroom/entry.

name: Asheville River Cabins Premium Riverview Cabin
description:
Asheville River Cabins is the ultimate glamping retreat, just 20 minutes from downtown Asheville, NC. Our charming cabins are nestled along the scenic French Broad River with views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located in south Asheville, only 2 miles from Biltmore Park, enjoy nearby dining and shopping. Your cabin features an outdoor fire pit, charcoal grill, and hot tub.

No availability? Message us or explore our other listings at Asheville River Cabins.

Located less than half a mile outside of city limits the location is so convenient, about 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, 5 minutes to West Asheville, 7 minutes from the Biltmore and more.

*Fire chimney is NOT functional*

Close to I-40, restaurants, shopping, attractions, YOUR QUIET CONVENIENT home

description:

You'll have access to a hangout deck perched above the campground, a community fire pit, indoor toilet/sinks, and outdoor solar shower.

** If you're looking for a site where you can pitch a tent, check out our other listings because this one does NOT INCLUDE a tent camping spot. **

description: Asheville Landing is the penthouse condo in an architectural gem that's within walking distance to everything downtown Asheville has to offer!

name: The  Asheville  Perch - Furnished 30 Day Minimum
description: Welcome to The Asheville Perch—a serene, fully furnished retreat designed for extended stays of 30 days or more. Nestled in a tranquil neighborhood, this newly-renovated rental offers a perfect blend of comfort and convenience for remote workers, couples, or solo travelers seeking a peaceful Asheville experience.

name: Comfy Asheville Vacation Rental w/ Hot Tub!
description: Take advantage of the best the area has to offer while still enjoying the peace and quiet at this cozy vacation rental in Asheville, North Carolina! This updated 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment provides ample room for any small family and includes all of the necessary amenities, plus a little extra! When you’re not out enjoying Asheville attractions, take a soak in the private hot tub, steam in the sauna, or simply enjoy the mountain views from the comfort of the covered patio.

name: Enchanting Escape-A Hidden Gem-Mins to Asheville
description:
Hidden Gem...Relax, Experience, Explore! This country-like, nature-lovers home is minutes away from America's favorite drive-Blue Ridge Pkwy, French Broad River, Arboretum, hiking, Asheville, airport, breweries, restaurants, shopping. Central to EVERYTHING!

Cozy up to a fire by the original stone fireplace, enjoy the rain shower, comfy beds, and fully equipped kitchen.

A private drive into quiet woods, mature spring & summer blooms, brilliant fall colors, brisk winter days a true inspiration!

name: A Mountain Oaks Cabin by CM | Gas Grill &Mtn Views
description:
***Improved Driveway***
Please note, A Mountain Oaks Cabin's driveway underwent major driveway repairs in November of 2021, and is much easier for guests to navigate going forward. If you have any questions or concerns feel free to message us. We look forward to hosting you!

name: Fairy Cottage Private Suite 10 min to downtown AVL
description:
Located just 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville, the Fairy Cottage boasts plenty of natural light, a peaceful atmosphere, and a bright and cheerful ambiance.

Decorated with whimsical and playful accents, it's equipped with Wi-Fi, work space, TV, kitchenette, and a comfortable queen-size bed. Enjoy a cup of coffee on the side porch surrounded by lush greenery. Utilize the fire pit, explore great hikes walking distance from the house, or hit up the neighborhood pub.

Cozy and convenient.

name: Private 2 BR w/ mountain views
description: Quiet and tucked away in Asheville’s Riceville Valley, surrounded by the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. Convenient to Warren Wilson College and Black Mountain. The private suite is one-level and separate from the main house. Downtown Asheville is about 15 minutes away, depending on traffic. 30 min to Asheville Regional Airport. The neighborhood has access to hiking the Blue Ridge Parkway, mere steps away.  All the conveniences of home, while being a safe, accessible and serene mountain retreat

name: The Royal Fern
description: Welcome to a wonderful home less than one mile from the Asheville airport. A beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with an additional lounge in the basement. The Royal Fern  is surrounded by shopping and restaurants, walking distance to Blue Ghost Brewing, 2 miles to Sierra Nevada Brewing, and just a short drive to Mills River and Brevard. This is the perfect location to enjoy the Asheville experience.

name: Mins to Asheville/Studio w/Fire pit/Pet friendly
description: Enjoy comfortable and cozy convenience in this studio apartment that we have set up, especially for the small traveling group or single worker! Our well-appointed space offers private entry, reserved parking, and plenty of room to spread out inside. Small groups of 2-4 love that we are 2 min to downtown West Asheville and close to all the outdoor adventures. Groups also love that the bathroom provides excellent privacy, with a shower on one side and a separate water closet on the other.

name: Relaxing spacious Home in Asheville
description: Very cozy home 5 miles  away from Downtown Asheville. ***Pool will be open in June***

name: Luxury Mountain Retreat with Hot Tub and Fire Pit
description: Check out Our Mountain Retreat! This unique property, with peek-a-boo mountain views, and a picturesque sunset you won’t want to miss, is the perfect spot for your large group! Located just minutes away from Biltmore Park Town Square and South Asheville shops, restaurants, and Lake Julian. 15 minutes to the airport!

name: Downtown House/Condo
description: Newly renovated home in downtown Asheville,  with three TVs in the living room, king-sized bed, open floor plan kitchen/living room with ample deck space. Across the street from Starbucks, city bakery & restaurants. 10 minute walk to the center of downtown Asheville. $10 uber rides to your favorite breweries downtown. 3 minutes to historic grove park inn. 6 minutes to blue ridge parkway access. 8 minutes to The Biltmore House. This house is in the perfect location for your Asheville stay!

name: Guest suite. Charming, near town. Kitchenette
description: Relax on the covered screened in porch. Quiet engaging neighborhood with abundant shady trees. 5 miles to Downtown Asheville. Close to hiking trails, Blue Ridge Parkway and Biltmore Estate. Minutes away from restaurants and Asheville Mall. Ample back yard is fully closed in and suitable for pets. I enjoy walking my two labs in this hilly neighborhood close to the Municipal Golf course which is currently under renovation. Private entry with lockbox. Parking can accommodate up to 2 vehicles.

name: Red Barn by CM | Fire Pit,Chef's Kitchen, Near AVL
description:
Romantic Getaway Cabin! Red Barn is the perfect cabin for two with mountain views and a covered front porch. Take a stroll to discover the nearby covered bridge and gurgling stream.

You'll appreciate the convenience of being able to cook your own meals in the fully equipped kitchen and eat-in while on vacation. Cozy up in the living room and watch movies on the flat-screen TV with satellite service.

name: East Asheville Family Getaway
description:
Wonderful East Asheville Getaway 8 minutes from Downtown Asheville and 20 minutes from Black Mountain
This wonderful home is just minutes from Asheville restaurants, shopping, breweries and more. This spacious 4 - bedroom 2.5 -bathroom home has privacy, spacious deck, hot tub, and fire pit.

Bedroom #1 - Primary Suite - King Bed w/ensuite and private full Bath & shower
Bedroom # - Queen Bed
Bedroom # 3 - Queen Bed
Bedroom # 4 - 2 Twin Beds

name: Cozy Getaway in South Asheville
description:
Welcome to our spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom house in South Asheville! Inside, you'll find a fully equipped kitchen with everything you need. There are two comfortable living rooms, each with a large smart TV. Outside, enjoy the firepit on the patio and a fenced backyard.

Book your stay with us and experience the best of Asheville!

name: Bright & Spacious New Net-Zero Home Near Biltmore
description:
Bring the whole family to this peaceful, spacious net-zero home! 3 large bedrooms & 3 full baths 5 mins to Biltmore & the Parkway, 10 mins to downtown AVL.

Inviting living space, full kitchen & outdoor patio to relax and retreat. Your perfect base for Asheville. Plenty of parking w/ easy access.

Dine on the back patio, charge your EV with solar power, enjoy the 55” smart TV.

All are welcome!

name: Cheerful Private Room Asheville
description: Your suite has a 55 inch TV its own fridge & microwave. A beautiful backyard that is fenced in to keep your pet safe. The sun room and back porch is where you can relax or have your space to work. The home is conveniently located 3 minutes from Ingles Shopping Center, gas, pharmacy, etc. The shared bath has a shower in tub unit for those long days where you need a soak. Pets welcome, $40 for the first two days, five dollars per day per pet after that. Relaxing space and centrally-located

name: Montford Charm - 3BR Monthly Rental
description:
Enjoy Asheville like a local by staying in one of its most desired and historic neighborhoods flanking downtown.

This is our sole home, not a vacation rental, that we make available during our long summer travels. We have managed our basement suite as a popular airbnb for close to 4 years, but for a stay of a month or longer, we are offering our entire home, including the suite (it will not be rented separately during your stay).

We love our neighbors and neighborhood, and you will too!

name: Boho paradise near downtown~ hot tub
description:
Unwind at this centrally located, stylish 3br/ 2.5ba sanctuary. Located in a quiet neighborhood, 0.7 miles from the Biltmore Estate and 2 miles from downtown. Upscale furnishings and thoughtful decor fill this peaceful space you will fall in love with.

Newly built 530 sq ft covered deck with vaulted ceiling, recessed lighting, built-in speakers, luxury hot tub and outdoor dining area. Fenced yard with fire table. Relax on the enchanting front porch and catch a glimpse of the Mountain View.

name: 5-Star Private Home-Game Room-Hot Tub-3 Acres
description: If you are looking for a LUXURY, SECLUDED mountain retreat yet minutes to all Asheville has to offer, look no further! Welcome to Owl’s Nest, a beautiful one-of-a-kind property, professionally decorated & equipped with 3300 square feet, 4 KING bedrooms, 4 full and 2 half bathrooms equipped with EVERY amenity in mind. The picturesque land offers a 7-person HOT TUB, outdoor firepit & MASSIVE 2 story GAME ROOM sure to entertain. Located minutes from Asheville and Asheville airport.

name: Asheville Mauna/Mountain House
description: Welcome to Asheville Mauna House! This family friendly centrally located home is located in a quiet cul-de-sac neighborhood. The surrounding area has several restaurants, as well as grocery shopping. Only 14 minutes from downtown Asheville.  As well as 10 minutes to Haywood Road, home of many fun restaurants and hot spots.

name: 5 min 2 Downtown Asheville w/ King Bed & Hot Tub
description:
True North Host Co welcomes you to Clyde's Cottage!

We were incredibly fortunate to have not sustained major damages as a result of Hurricane Helene and are thrilled to welcome back travelers and lovers of the Asheville area. Asheville area restaurants and businesses are open and ready to welcome guests back to the area!

We are 5 minutes from Downtown Asheville in the Town of Woodfin. Please reach out to me directly for any questions!

name: Studio near Airport & AVL.
description:
Newly renovated studio apartment attached to home. Private entrance, shares 1 wall with the main house that is blocked off. The only shared space is the driveway.
Located near the Asheville airport (2.5mi) and 20mins to downtown Asheville
Private bath, queen bed, dining table/chairs, couch, microwave, coffee maker, refrigerator/freezer, tv/firestick.
Mini split heater/AC unit with remote.
Hardwood floors.
Light blocking curtains for sleep.
PLEASE LET US KNOW IF YOU WANT TO USE FUTON BED.

name: The Westside Rancher *Cozy*Double*Suites
description: The Westside Rancher is a two story ranch style home beautifully designed for you to experience Asheville like a local. Our home has two separate suites with separate entrances to each suite. This is perfect for large groups or separate families that want some privacy under the same roof. Our home is centrally located and tucked away in the secluded countryside of West Asheville. Our home has been newly remodeled with love and is a perfect home base to explore all that Asheville has to offer.

name: Simple Downtown 1 Bedroom
description:
Private 1 bedroom apartment on the 2nd floor of a historic building. This is a walk up, no elevator is available.
Great location very walkable to everything in downtown Asheville and the south slope.
Eat-in kitchen with full size appliances. Pots/pans and basic cooking utensils included.
Livingroom has a small sofa and a television.
Bedroom is spacious with a queen sized bed and walk-in closet.
Bathroom has a small standing shower. Shampoo, conditioner, soap and all linens included.

name: West Asheville Hideout
description: Enjoy our cozy bungalow tucked away on a quiet street in West Asheville’s Wilshire Park neighborhood with easy access to WAVL's shops, live music, and restaurants such as Leo’s, Nine Mile, OWL Bakery, and more. Centrally located with The River Arts District and Downtown a quick 10 minute drive away, only 15 minutes to The Biltmore and easy access to all that Pisgah National Forest and the Blue Ridge Parkway have to offer. Stylishly and comfortably furnished. Safe and secure. Family friendly.

name: 7k Sq/Ft Mountain Estate - Luxurious Family Fun
description:
Welcome to our roaring 20s-themed estate in Asheville, NC! Sleeping up to 20 guests, this luxurious mansion boasts an array of amenities to ensure a fun-filled stay.

*Putt Putt Course
*Movie Theater w/ Popcorn Machine
*Poker Room
*Spa Room w/ Sauna & Massage Chairs
*Hot Tub w/ fireplace
*Game Room- Pool Table, Arcade Games, Shuffleboard, & Foosball
*Sports Court- Basketball, Pickleball
*Gym w/ Peloton, Treadmill, Weights, Ping Pong
*Fire Pit
*PRIME location- 8 miles to The Biltmore

name: AVL Monthly Retreat w/ Expansive Mountain Views
description: Tucked away on a dead end street in a beautiful neighborhood, this spacious home is available for monthly stays. Gorgeous mountain views spill into the large windows in every room that open up to the expansive back deck. The huge modern kitchen is a chef's dream! Also included is a private office equipped for remote work. Just minutes from Downtown Asheville and Downtown Weaverville, you can't beat this location if you're looking for seclusion yet convenience! Easy to access with paved roads.

name: Urban Oasis: pet friendly, mountain views!
description: It's unheard of to have this much space to enjoy in the center of Asheville! The whole family, including your pups, will enjoy relaxing and playing on over an acre of property. When you're ready to go explore, you are strategically located...walk to Biltmore Village, access the Blue Ridge Parkway within 5 minutes, and be to downtown in 10 minutes. This is our home when in the country.

name: Eclectic & Cozy Biltmore Village Studio
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located apartment. Stocked kitchenette and tranquil yard with fire pit to enjoy. Walking distance to Biltmore Village. Minutes from the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Quick Uber away from downtown and West Asheville. Host lives in non-attached flat upstairs and available as needed, while preserving privacy. Self-check in available with key code.

name: Luxury West Asheville cottage
Private and relaxing rental in Asheville
description: Close to the Airport, breweries, hiking, restaurants, and ten miles outside of Downtown Asheville - our guest suite is a quiet, private, garage apartment, tucked away in a sweet neighborhood.  Spacious, modern, clean! and with a light and airy feel.  Beautifully renovated and furnished in 2023. Private parking spot and private entrance. A wonderful home base while you are here to vacation or work.

name: Asheville luxury estate-Hottub, GameRoom & Sauna
description: Discover unparalleled vistas at our prestigious 6-bed 4 bath retreat, minutes from DT Asheville. This opulent 7-figure mansion provides an ideal setting for relaxation and indulgence in our exclusive spa, with a sauna, steam room, cold plunge, and hot tub. Experience rejuvenation amidst the property's expansive outdoor decks and lush, one-acre backyard, or enjoy our ultimate game room or State-of-the-Art Movie Room. Video Tour on YouTube search "Odubers Asheville".

name: Mountain Time
description: Located close to anything you'll need. Minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway or Down Town Asheville.  A nice base camp for all of your vacation needs.  Easy in and out location.  Idea for a traveling nurse. 5 miles from hospital.

name: The Bee Hive
description:
Welcome to The Bee Hive!

This cozy home is conveniently located in South Asheville.
Less than 5 miles from Asheville regional airport and Biltmore Estate. There are endless things to do and see.
(biltmore, grove park, parkway, arboretum, shopping, hiking, & more)

**new hot tub installed!**

Local hiking, eating and parks within walking distance!

The home is set back in quiet neighborhood making you feel one with the surrounding nature. A perfect vacation destination for all four seasons!

name: Welcome! ~Super Quiet Central
description: Rest and rejuvenate in this very peaceful, convenient neighborhood. Airport(8), Asheville, Hendersonville, Pisgah Forest, Biltmore estate~ all an easy 8-25 minute drive. Listen to sweet birdsong as you enjoy morning coffee on the front porch. Relax in the evening with a stroll in the neighborhood or close by nature trails. Check out the latest on Netflix in your room. Or better yet, enjoy any of the fabulous Asheville restaurants.( only dogs~ allergic to cats)

name: El Cosmico: Cozy hip W. Asheville chalet tiny home
description: Welcome to our guest house in the heart of West Asheville, a vibrant neighborhood known for its dining, breweries, and greenery. Our 600sq/ft two-story unique and contemporary wood cabin is a blend of rustic charm and modern comforts. Relax on the deck and enjoy the fresh mountain air. The full kitchen and cozy loft bedroom and fold out couch accommodates up to 3 guests. The local cuisine, art shops and craft beer scene. Your perfect Asheville getaway! Monthly rentals are welcome!

name: Enjoy the beauty of nature at Oak Grove Cottage
description:
Peaceful, quiet and secure… Located in a beautiful valley, convenient to Hendersonville, Brevard, Asheville and just minutes from Asheville Airport.

We have it! Fresh water and full of amenities. This hidden gem is situated perfectly with easy access to everything!

Oak Grove Cottage offers you a quiet, personal and secure property to relax and enjoy. Come and create your best experiences yet!

Our past guests have rated us to the top. Come find out what they have enjoyed!

name: Dog Friendly Private Retreat AVL
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish home with beautiful new bathrooms.  Enjoy fully fenced-in private yard, firepit, and plenty of driveway parking. Chill in the living room or the game room / work space. This quiet neighborhood is walkable to 2 restaurants, a spa, and City park. It’s a quick drive to groceries, restaurants, breweries, Blue Ridge Parkway, and the airport. Only 10 minutes to downtown, Biltmore Estate, hiking, biking, paddling, the NC Arboretum, Pisagah Forest,  Bent Creek.

name: Cozy Cottage / 5 mi. Dwtn & Biltmore Estate
description:
Perfect condition/ Extremely clean. Easy access to Tunnel Rd, downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate & Mission Hospital. Just down the street from Whole Foods & Ingles. 2 parking spots

Beautiful, very quiet guest unit. There are 2 very comfy beds in unit. 1 Queen Bed in main living area & day bed in front room that can be used as twin or extended into King Bed.

name: The Farmhouse
description: Welcome to your home away from home! The Farmhouse has everything you need and you'll never want to leave. Enjoy the chilly nights in the stunning hot tub and the early mornings listening to the birds chirping on the incredible front and back porch! Only minutes away from Downtown Asheville you will enjoy family-friendly waterfall hikes, many breweries and amazing restaurants. In the Farmhouse you'll find 3 incredibly spacious rooms. Book your home away from home with us now!

name: Storybrooke Place by CM | Hot Tub & Charcoal Grill
description: Showcase Estate with High-End Amenities! Storybrooke Place offers guests two separate homes, with a total of five bedrooms, and a beautifully landscaped estate featuring custom stone patios, a raised fire pit, and a private hot tub, among many more delightful amenities awaiting your discovery.

name: Sunset Peaks by CM | Chef's Kitchen, Grill, & Mtns
description: Sunset Peaks is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends!  If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight.  A Vacation Coordinator from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 24 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

name: Hillside Hideaway by CM | Hot Tub & Near Hiking
description: If you want to experience Western North Carolina in style, look no further than Hillside Hideaway, a contemporary mountain home with breathtaking views from every room in the house. Located just north of Downtown Asheville in an upscale neighborhood, Hillside Hideaway offers quiet seclusion and privacy while still being close to town.

name: Tranquil-Nest AVL by CM | Grill & Near Waterfall
description:
Treat yourself to Southern Charm at Tranquil-Nest AVL, a peaceful oasis urban with unbeatable convenience! Step inside to discover the renovation that has transformed this home into a luxury sanctuary with multiple gathering spaces and gorgeous decor.

Driving into the private community of Glen Arden Estates, located just south of downtown Asheville, you'll find a secluded neighborhood with desirable homes on wooded lots.

name: Ursa Major by CM | Stove, Fire Pit, & Near Biking
description:
This furnished property is available for stays of 30 days or longer.

A modern getaway in the middle of the city! Ursa Major's light-filled living areas feature floor-to-ceiling windows that give a feeling of spaciousness. The comfortable furnishings and stand-alone wood stove set the perfect tone for relaxing on chilly mountain nights.

name: Quaint Private Room in Oakley
description:
Room in Oakley home located centrally from all Asheville has to offer.

Room has a private entrance and parking on premises with full bathroom and essentials.

-less than 10 minutes away from Asheville Mall and its surrounding
-less than 15 minutes away from Downtown Asheville

name: The Hard Times Inn
description: The Hard Times Inn is the trail-front property of your dreams! With direct access to 74 miles of trails right out your front door, this is the luxurious basecamp for anyone who wants to hike or mountain bike. Nestled inside the borders of the Bent Creek Experimental Forest (part of the stunning Pisgah National Forest) you'll be just minutes from downtown Asheville, but feel a world away. Leave your car parked in front of the house and immerse yourself in the natural beauty that surrounds you.

name: 2BD/2BA Condo Near Biltmore Estate and Downtown
description:
Nestled in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood, our two-bed/two bath in one of Asheville's premier condo hotels is minutes from Biltmore Estate & Downtown Asheville.

Amenities including a seasonally open pool & hot tub; fitness facility; free WiFi; spa packages & in-room treatments by appointment; on-site security; & 24/7 concierge service. Most studios are equipped with a washer/dryer. Our location makes it the perfect "home base" to explore the art, history, nature, & culture of Asheville.

name: Asheville/Game Room, Hot Tub, Pet Friendly
description: Welcome to our family & pet-friendly home, located just a stone's throw away from downtown Asheville's buzzing brew and food scene! Nestled in a safe and quiet community, our property offers the perfect blend of relaxation and accessibility to the city's charm and nearby outdoor adventure. After exploring the area, relax in the new hot tub, sit around the fire pit, or enjoy the game room! We love hosting families with kids or groups of friends coming to enjoy the nightlife and outdoor fun!

name: Carved Tree Getaway
description: Welcome to the Carved Tree Getaway, nestled two miles from the thriving mountain city of Asheville, North Carolina, featuring a funky and eclectic downtown, known for its rich arts and music scene, historic architecture, dining, outdoor adventures and of course, the awe-inspiring scenery of the Blue Ridge Mountains. With its cheerful interior spaces, thoughtful amenities and central location, you’ll feel right at home! Let it be your landing place for exploration, fun and adventure.

name: Blue Bungalow by Riverside Park
description:
Charming recently renovated craftsmen style bungalow. Experience the tranquility and fresh air of the mountains, the crispness of the French
Broad River while only being five minutes from downtown Asheville. Locally owned and operated.

name: The Quiet Cottage Studio
description: Welcome to our charming studio in east Asheville.  Our cozy space features a comfortable queen-sized bed, bar set up, coffee bar, ice maker, modern bathroom, and a newly renovated warm and comfortable living area. You'll have easy access to local cafes & restaurants. Nearby public transportation makes exploring the city a breeze. Come and experience the magic of Asheville from our delightful studio – we can't wait to welcome you!

name: The Roost
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. The perfect restful hideaway, just minutes from downtown and all the wonderful things Asheville has to offer.

name: Asheville Cottage Charm #cattheme #badkittycottage
description: Cottage charm on city outskirts of Asheville. Convenient. Quiet. Clean. #badkittycottage cat theme

name: Bed and Bread in West Asheville
description: Take in all Asheville has to offer from this comfortable, private-entrance garden suite. Enjoy a loaf of your host's signature sourdough upon check-in, then head out to explore. Your suite is central to all the highlights, including Biltmore & the Parkway, and walking distance to the River Arts District, dining & breweries on Haywood Road, and miles of trails & bike paths along the French Broad River. Back at your suite, pick and enjoy herbs & veggies from the garden. The perfect urban oasis.

name: AVL Treehouse by CM | Office Space &Chef's Kitchen
description: This exceptional vacation rental is a standout among contemporary residential architecture in Asheville. With eye-catching curb appeal, AVL Treehouse's modern vibe is ideal for the guest in search of convenience coupled with an upscale experience. Designed to accommodate the flow of your lifestyle, the open floor plan focuses on shared spaces equally balanced with private quarters.

name: Large luxury 5 bedroom house walk to downtown
description:
Perfect for family reunions, wedding and bachelorette parties, group getaways and more! 4k square ft house.

6 blocks from vibrant downtown Asheville, an easy walk or drive.

Our elegant 1928 craftsmen home has been described as a peaceful sanctuary with inviting and warm energy; spacious rooms allow guests their own private retreat, but there are an array of communal spaces for family and friends to come together and enjoy each others company and the beautiful surrounding half acre compound.

name: Luxury Rental! 10 min to Asheville!
description:
Brand New Build!
Our home is located in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville
Pet Friendly
10 minutes from River Arts District and West Asheville
2 Minute Drive to Erwin High School which has a Public Pool that is open on the weekends from Memorial Day To Labor Day
Erwin High School also has a Tennis Court
5 Minutes From Ingles Grocery Store

name: Asheville Cozy Room near Downtown
description: My home is just a few minutes from downtown Asheville, so come enjoy all the fun Asheville has to offer! My home is brand newly renovated and you will have a spacious and beautifully furnished guest room with super comfy queen bed & your own private guest bathroom. Beautiful wood floors throughout, spacious layout and peaceful atmosphere. Parking provided and a beautiful covered back porch to relax on also! BBQ and pizza oven on the porch too! Come enjoy it all!

name: Blue Ridge View Cottage
description:
100% locally owned and operated! Please support our local economy!!

Come stage your Asheville getaway from this cozy and peaceful 2 BR cottage located conveniently 4 miles from Downtown Asheville, and 2 miles from the trendy West Asheville Hub of Haywood Avenue.

Watch the sun rise over the Blue Ridge from the sunny living room or spacious, fenced lawn. Plenty of locals recommendations will be available for your perusing!

name: Walk to downtown from our new guest house!
description:
Welcome to our brand new Asheville property. Situated less than a mile north from Asheville’s downtown scene, we offer exactly what any discerning traveler wants for a week or weekend getaway in the mountains. Our amazing location allows you to fully enjoy all that downtown has to offer while simultaneously providing a secluded and peaceful retreat.
Our ground floor apartment has its own private entrance, 2 parking spots, 2 bedrooms, full bath, & a kitchenette. The host and family live above.

name: Pools of Sunshine by CM | Pool, Hot Tub, & Views
description: Jump into Asheville at Pools of Sunshine! This luxurious mountain home features an exclusive experience with a in-ground pool and an adjoining fire pit patio which is sure to make your vacation a splash! Located in a secure garden area, the pool is perfect for family and friends looking to spend days relaxing together, plus a fun fountain effect that the kids will love!

name: Rustic Treasure
description:
"Rustic Treasure" is a 10 minute walk from downtown West Asheville, and a 10 minute drive from Downtown Asheville.
Whether you're in town to find some peace and quiet, looking for outdoor adventure, or just passing through, this cozy apartment won't disappoint.
Whatever treasure you're looking for, "Rustic Treasure" is the place to start.

P.S. there is a treasure hunt built into the place so if you like adventure, take a crack at the hunt when you stay!

name: Modern Mountain Stay | 10 Mins to Biltmore
description: Experience the best of Asheville from this modern, family-friendly retreat! Conveniently located just minutes from I-40 and I-240, you're only five minutes from the historic Biltmore Estate and ten minutes from downtown Asheville’s vibrant restaurants, bars, and shops.

name: Not Your Grandpa's Cabin
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located cabin.
Built in the 1930's, this cozy and modernized cabin puts you a hop, skip and a jump from the Blue Ridge Parkway, 10 minutes to downtown, and 15 minutes to West Asheville. With restaurants in walking distance and plenty of shops just a quick drive down the road, you'll have access to everything Asheville has to offer. Whether you go out on the town or have a night in, you'll have everything you need for a fun & relaxing stay.

name: Mid-century Modern Impeccable Remodel with Hot Tub
description:
Ready for your Asheville getaway! This classic brick mid-century home just completed a total remodel. New furnishings have been added to give this house a comfortable modern feel. We know you will be delighted to stay in this spacious home with all the latest amenities in a quiet yet convenient location.

This escape is ideal for vacationing couples, family travelers, business retreats, and outdoor adventurers.

name: Purple Cottage 10 Mins From DT.
description:
Keep Asheville Weird” by staying in this cute purple cottage located less than 10 minutes from downtown AVL!
This purple cottage will be all yours during your time in town! Enjoy a queen-size memory foam mattress in the main bedroom and a queen pullout in the living room. Have to balance work and play? No worries, there is a dedicated office at my place! The yard is fully fenced in for the fur babies and has an abundance of vegetation so enjoy the garden during your stay!

name: Views 1 mile from downtown!
description: Sit and sip in a sweeping horizon of layered mountains in the distance and the city scape in the valley below.   Or nurture yourself inside with the infrared sauna and garden soaking tub.  Easy gas fire table adds ambience to the expansive deck.  You don't have to sacrifice the view for indoor dining with floor to ceiling windows on the entire west wall of this stylish home.  Interior decor is classy and congruent throughout on the theme of floating in a utopia in the clouds.

name: Vintage Glamping in West Asheville: Big Yella’
description: West Asheville only 10min to downtown!  Enjoy the fresh air at this lovely setting & romantic spot in nature.

name: Countryside Escape~Hot Tub | Fire Pit | Game Room!
description: Escape to the countryside of the mountains~ enjoy a huge private backyard equipped with a hot tub, expansive deck, & fire pit. 3 bedrooms plus a pull out sofa in the living room sleeps a total of 12. Perfect for family reunions & friend gatherings! A peaceful oasis conveniently located in Arden, south of Asheville with quick access to I-26.  20 mins from Downtown Asheville, 10 mins to Asheville airport, 10 mins to Biltmore Park, 10 mins to the NC Arboretum. Pet friendly!

name: Cinema+Sauna in 5000 Sq Ft Luxe Chalet | Sleeps 20
description:
Discover the ultimate Asheville retreat at Skyland Serenity Chalet!

This spectacular 5,000 sq ft haven sleeps 20 in 6 luxurious bedrooms.

Entertainment reigns with a private cinema featuring reclining seats and popcorn bar, epic game room, indoor sauna, and hot tub.

Host unforgettable gatherings across two living areas with soaring ceilings, two kitchens, and outdoor gas fire pit.

Perfect for corporate retreats and group celebrations. Just 15 minutes from downtown!

name: NEW! Treehouse Scandi Log Cabin *Pets*Hike*Retreat
description: Welcome to Treehouse Dreams - our ultra-chic, newly-built, Scandi-modern log cabin nestled in the breathtaking Asheville mountains, just minutes from downtown! Sleep under the stars, slip into double outdoor tubs with views, relax on the loggia, enjoy our 4 acres of peaceful forest, and be spoiled by a gourmet coffee bar, plush bedding, spa bath, & more!  This idyllic retreat offers an unforgettable getaway.

name: Luxe Treetop Cabin*Hot Tub*Views
description:
Welcome to Treetop Twilight - our ultra-chic, moody modern cabin nestled in the breathtaking Asheville mountains, just minutes from downtown!

Cozy up in our gorgeously renovated, professionally-designed luxe cabin perched atop 2 acres of secluded forest. Lounge on our high decks among treetops & birdsong, soak in the new hot tub, dine al fresco, and be spoiled by a gourmet coffee bar, full service kitchen, plush mattresses, luxurious sateen sheets, spa baths & more! An unforgettable getaway.

name: Peaceful Asheville Getaway Mtn/Valley Views
description:
We are a family-owned property in a neighborhood. The space is a lovely, recently renovated, 1-bedroom house. Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

Facing the Blue Ridge Parkway, we have the appeal of the beautiful mountains in our backyard. Only a short walk to the Mountains-to-Sea Trailhead on the Blue Ridge Parkway.

* 10 minutes to Biltmore Village
* 10-15 minutes to downtown Asheville
*Close to breweries, restaurants, local attractions

name: Hike and Bike from the Farm.
description: This spacious home sits on a 35 acre hobby farm which backs up to the Blue Ridge Parkway- with access to the Mountains to Sea trail, Arboretum, and Bent Creek. Within 5 miles, you can reach the French Broad River, Outlet mall, and Biltmore Park Town Square. Within 12 miles, you can get to the airport, downtown Asheville, South Slope, River Arts District, Biltmore House, North Mills River, and Sierra Nevada Brewery.  Brevard is a 25 minute drive, and you can get to Dupont in 35 minutes.

name: NEW Easy Access Condo Walkable to Asheville's best
description: NEW Easy Access Condo Walkable to Asheville's best

name: Cozy WAVL Mountain Cottage
description:
Enjoy this comfy and conveniently located West Asheville bungalow. Located only 3min to the River Arts District, 5min to downtown, and 10min to the Biltmore. Safe, charming, walkable neighborhood.
Easy check-in with a keypad and a large, fully fenced -in yard for your pup’s enjoyment.

name: Cane Creek Cabin | Pet-friendly & 25 Min. to AVL!
description:
Cane Creek Cabin is a charming log cabin located in Fletcher just 15 minutes from Asheville Regional Airport and the famous Sierra Nevada Brewing Company and 25 minutes southeast of downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate.

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: Asheville getaway! 8 min to Bob Lewis! Hot tub!
description: Enjoy a mountain getaway at this brand new, peaceful, centrally-located home in Asheville, NC! It has all the amenities you could want on your vacation. From the fireplace, coffee bar, fire pit and hot tub, it’s the perfect place to relax!  Explore Asheville and its breweries, along with the Biltmore Estate. A 30 Minute drive to skiing or whitewater rafting. Just out the back door,  Bent Creek National Forest offers hikers and mountain bikers numerous miles of open trails to enjoy.

name: Vintage Glamping in West Asheville: ‘Lil Yella’
description: West Asheville only 10min to downtown!  Enjoy the fresh air at this lovely & romantic spot in nature.

name: Misty Mountain Retreat
description: Charming 1-Bedroom Getaway Near Downtown Asheville.

name: Sweet bungalow in popular W. Asheville
description:
This special home is close to everything . Many wonderful restaurants, great breweries, groceries, yoga, and a meditation center, all walking distance from the house. Just a 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville and the River Arts District. There is a dedicated work space.
I have been an AirBnb host for 9 years with a master suite, so I encourage you to read those reviews linked to below. Now, I've decided to rent the entire house October, November and December of 2023. 30 day minimum.

name: A Sweet Retreat AVL w/ Sauna Unit A
description: You will love our Sweet Retreat with Sauna and soaker tub. Cute place in quiet Asheville neighborhood right next Blue Ridge Parkway. Place has a lovely creek out back and plenty space to spread out and relax. Great place if you are on vacation or working remotely.  HVAC is now mini-split, and electrical outlets functional. Super convenient location near I-40 & I-240 with plenty of restaurants and shopping. Come on over and make yourself at home - we'll leave the light on for you.

name: The Star House
description: Enjoy our peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Asheville Guest Apartment
description: Monthly Rental - Rare opportunity to experience this award winning, exclusive apartment on the edge of Downtown Asheville. This custom apartment sits over top of the 3 car custom garage. The location can't be beat, just off Charlotte Street, close to Taco Temple, Chop Shop, OWL Bakery and Ultimate Ice Cream. This special apartment is located only a 15 minute walk from Pack Square in the heart of downtown Asheville and 2 miles from Mission Hospital. Available for monthly rentals or long term.

name: The Barn
description: Please note this Host requires a supplemental contract be signed at the time of booking.

name: East View
description: Please note this Host requires a supplemental contract be signed at the time of booking.

name: Cozy Rancher in Asheville
description:
Our home offers a quiet place to relax and unwind while being just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville.

This is our primary residence when we are in North Carolina so it is fully equipped with everything you need to feel right at home while on vacation. Relax in the cozy den, cook a meal in our well stocked kitchen, or just enjoy the view of the mountains.

We look forward to sharing our home with you!

name: Mountain & Lake View. Pet-friendly. Heated Pool!
description: Enjoy the mountain air in this centrally-located Asheville apartment! Features 2 bedrooms with full private baths, fireplace, heated pool (May-Dec), bar, gym, pool table, games, outdoor living space with lake/mountain views. Kitchen with oven/stove, full-size fridge, coffee machine, microwave, air fryer. Spacious backyard, with lake trails and hiking trails close by. Great Wifi, A/C, washer/dryer. Minutes from restaurants, arts, shops, and downtown. 15 minutes from Biltmore Mansion and Village!

name: Stunning mountain Views, hot tub, game room & more
description: Welcome to Falcon Ridge, a peaceful mountain property on over 7 acres offering the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience. You’ll feel like you’re miles away, yet you’re less than 20 minutes to all Asheville has to offer. this stunning retreat boasts panoramic mountain views that will leave you in awe.

name: Asheville River Cabins Accessible Cabin w/ Hot Tub
description:
Asheville River Cabins offers the ultimate glamping experience, 20 mins from downtown Asheville, NC. Our cozy cabins, nestled on the scenic French Broad River, boast stunning Blue Ridge Mountain views. Conveniently located in south Asheville, we're 2 miles from Biltmore Park, full of dining and shopping options. Your cabin includes a fire pit, charcoal grill, and hot tub.

No availability? Message us or explore our other listings at Asheville River Cabins.

name: Cypress Sycamore by AvantStay | 6 Mins to Downtown
description:
- Prime location minutes from Downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, and the Mountain-To-Sea Trail.
- Patio with a seating area, gas grill, and wood-burning firepit
- New furniture sourced from a local Asheville boutique
- Streaming televisions in every bedroom
- Open-concept kitchen comes fully equipped

name: Magnolia Sycamore by AvantStay | 6mins to Downtown
description:
- Elegant townhome with style, amenities, and comfort
- Custom-built for relaxation and tranquil escapes
- Gas grill for outdoor bbq
- Wood-burning fire pit for cozy evenings
- Bright, open kitchen with granite countertops

name: Dogwood Sycamore by AvantStay | 6mins to Asheville
description:
- Stunning townhome just 6 minutes from Asheville
- Back deck with seating, a BBQ grill, and a firepit
- Smart TVs, including Youtube TV in the living room
- Game-packed recreation space
- Fully-equipped kitchen

name: Willow Sycamore by AvantStay | 6 Mins to Downtown
description:
- Back patio, ideal for relaxation
- Enjoy an evening under the stars in the cozy outdoor fire pit
- 6-minute drive to Asheville's restaurant, brewery, and music scene
- Luxurious bathrooms: custom tiled showers
- Bent Creek Experimental Forest for mountain bike rides

name: Sweetgum Sycamore by AvantStay | 6Min to Downtown
description:
- A short 6-minute drive to downtown Asheville
- Wood-burning fire pit for cozy evenings
- Enjoy the overlooking serene stream from the deck with outdoor dining
- Cook by the fire in the stylish kitchen
- Proximity to attractions

name: White Pine Sycamore by AvantStay | Near Downtown
description:
- Modern luxury townhome near downtown Asheville
- Stylish kitchen, open concept with granite countertops
- Back patio with seating and enjoy the mountain air
- 5 miles to downtown Asheville
- Comfortable bedrooms with plush mattresses

name: Red Bud Sycamore | Custom Group Retreat w/ Patio
description:
- Attractions like The Biltmore Estate and Grove Park Inn nearby
- Open-concept kitchen with granite countertops
- Tranquil escape: Custom-built home designed for relaxation
- Embrace nature like hiking, biking at Bent Creek Experimental Forest
- Stunning 3BRs, 3-bath townhome

name: Cozy Cottage in Montford for 30-Day+ Stays
Steph's Place
description:
Gorgeous views and a short walk to a trail that connects with the MST trail & Blue Ridge Parkway. 20-minutes to downtown AVL, Biltmore Estate, River Arts District, etc. and 10 min to WWC.
Newly refurbished full level basement apartment.
Gravel-lined steps lead you down to the entry, patio, & large fire pit. Rooms have a queen bed in 1st bedroom & full in the 2nd bedroom.
Stocked coffee & tea bar, full size washer & dryer.
Sorry not pet-friendly & unfortunately not wheelchair accessible.

name: The Oasis 12 min to Downtown AVL
description:
Welcome to the Asheville, NC!


The perfect location for those wanting easy access to all the city of Asheville has to offer. From breweries to the Biltmore House which are all minutes away! After a pleasing evening experiencing the city, enjoy a serene evening next to the fire pit table.

name: Spacious w/ Game Room + Hot Tub | Mins to Downtown
description:
Spacious 5BR/3BA Retreat with a Game Room + Hot Tub + 7 Mins to Downtown Asheville!

✨ Key Features:
✔ Sleeps 12 guests – 2 living rooms w/ Roku TVs 📺
✔ Game room + hot tub for ultimate fun 🎱♨️
✔ Spacious deck to enjoy nature 🌿
✔ Fully equipped kitchen & dining area 🍽
✔ Pet-friendly – bring your fur babies! 🐾
✔ Located in Woodfin, just 7 mins from downtown Asheville!

Book your perfect getaway today! 🏡✨

name: Spacious & Bright New Net-Zero  Home near Biltmore
description:
Bring the whole family to this peaceful, spacious net-zero home! 3 large bedrooms & 3 full baths 5 mins to Biltmore & the Parkway, 10 mins to downtown AVL.

Inviting living space, full kitchen & outdoor patio to relax and retreat. Your perfect base for Asheville. Plenty of parking w/ easy access.

Dine on the back patio, charge your EV with solar power, enjoy the 55” smart TV.

All are welcome!

name: West Asheville Private 2 bedroom Getaway
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located 2 bedroom house. Easy walk to shops, restaurants, and Carrier Park / French Broad River Greenway. Quick 5-10 minute drive to Downtown or the Biltmore Estate. The homeowner lives upstairs with a separate private entrance.

Haywood Road in West Asheville – 1 mile

The River Arts District (RAD) – 1 mile

Biltmore Estate – 2 miles

Downtown Asheville – 3 miles

Blue Ridge Parkway access – 6 miles

name: The Fox Den. Artistic!Stylish! Minutes to Downtown
description:
Welcome to the Fox Den! 🦊
In a world of sterile uninspired vacation rentals this home stands out. The Fox Den is loved and it shows.
She is a fully renovated 1930s cottage minutes from Downtown, the Biltmore Village, and Tunnel Road shopping.
No detail is overlooked in this highly curated home. Uniqueness oozes from the original art and pottery collection, vintage lighting, a mix of new, antique and custom upholstered furniture.
The Fox den isn’t just a vacation rental….shes an experience.
