name: Beautiful mountain getaway! 15 min to Asheville.
description: This stylish home is the perfect get away.  Ideally located near Biltmore Park w dining, shopping, movies. The open floor plan creates an easy living environment. There are 2 master suites w king size beds, 2 queens, 3.5 baths, spacious living room w gas fireplace, den & fab sunroom make this home feel like you are living in nature. Rocking chair front porch, private back deck w dining table, fire pit in the backyard, designated walking trails & community pool access within a block of the home.

name: Rice Pinnacle Retreat
description:
POWER RESTORED! WE HAVE WATER, LAUNDRY, HOT SHOWERS!
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. This newly constructed, Scandinavian inspired home makes you feel like you've gotten away from it all, while only being 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. Relax in the hot tub on the deck surround by the mountain laurel canopy, snuggle up by the fireplace and watch a movie, or just bathe in the forest through the floor to ceiling windows while you take your coffee in bed.

name: Waterfall Manor by CM | Hot Tub & Views
description: Waterfall Manor is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends!  If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight.

name: 3BR home with deck, firepit, gas grill, & kitchen
Convenient Quiet Location AVL
description: The hotel is a charming and unique boutique hotel located just steps from the Asheville Outlets. The hotel has a modern design with a touch of Southern charm. Many outlets to restaurants and bars nearby. Blue Ridge parkway and Asheville downtown within 5-10 minutes. Our hotel is a great place to stay if you are looking for a convenient and stylish place to stay in Asheville. Newly remodeled hotel and rooms. Budget friendly stay with an upscale feel.

name: Micro Studio Downtown
description:
This is a very small studio in downtown Asheville. Great location, easy to walk to all of downtown and the South Slope.

This is a good spot for anyone who just wants somewhere to rest their head while visiting Asheville.

name: The Asheville House
description: You have found Asheville’s finest vacation home; located a few minutes from Downtown Asheville and close to all sorts of fun adventures!  You’re close enough to enjoy all the downtown activities you can think of and far away enough to enjoy peace and quiet with your family.  Fun and relaxation will surround you at every turn at the Asheville House, and there is so much to do at our location, and in the beautiful nature surrounding it!

name: 2 BR Asheville Getaway w/Sauna Unit D
description: Perfect place for vacation guests, remote workers or recovery workers looking to enjoy the Blue Ridge Mountains. Upgraded HVAC system, clean water, hot showers and all the amenities. Entire 2 Bed unit in multi-unit home. Available for daily or weekly rentals. Reach out and let us know what you need, we are here to assist. Nice firepit and grill next to a little creek out back. Quiet neighborhood with convenient access to I-40/I-240 makes most everything in Asheville about 10-15 minutes away.

name: Rare Gem: Steps to Lake-Minutes to Downtown | NAVL
description: Enjoy the best of Asheville and a few of its best kept secrets in this rare Beaver Lake neighborhood suite. Walk to the lake or the amenities of Merrimon avenue or take a quick drive down the street to downtown. With an enclosed, private outdoor area, you can enjoy coffee or takeout in the fresh Asheville air. We have taken inspiration from our own travels to bring you our own favorite experiences. The neighborhood is one of the safest in Asheville.

name: Garden Oasis near Downtown and River Arts District
description:
Private, no-contact entrance!
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. This private bedroom with a full bath boasts a king size bed, kitchenette with sink, Keurig, microwave and mini fridge and relaxing seating area with a TV. The room is located garden-side in a Victorian mansion in downtown Asheville with free parking + walking distance to downtown breweries and the famous River Arts District. Best of all, you get access to one of downtown Asheville’s only residential pools!

name: Mountain Retreat Couples Getaway w/ a view!
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space that is just perfect for a rejuvenating retreat in the mountains of WNC tucked away in a quaint community of East Asheville, just 10 minutes from downtown, 8 minutes from the Folk Art Center and access to the historic Blue Ridge Parkway. Unlimited hiking abounds including a 2 mile hike to enter the Mountains to Sea Trail from the guest suite! This exquisite retreat has all that a couple/guest would want to explore and enjoy beautiful Asheville!

name: Just built with hot tub,pond,kayaks,views,fire pit
description:
Come and enjoy the best of Asheville in this exceptional, brand new built, multi-family home with brand new furniture, on 3 floors surrounded by 15 acres of nature and a beautiful pond! You can enjoy a walk around the property, fishing, kayaking in the pond, as well as relaxing in the hot tub!
Downtown is about 10 minutes away and mountain attractions are also nearby.
Comfortably sleeps 6 on beds and 2 on futons in three bedrooms, all necessities are provided for long term or short term stays.

name: 2023 New Construction~Luxury~15 mins to downtown
description:
* * Just Listed * *

This is Luxury Living! Huge 23-acre estate w/ hiking trails. Everything Brand New. Built in 2023! Family-owned and operated.

Private hot tub, two covered porches with multiple forest and mountain views, all king-size beds, full kitchen, gas fireplace, walk-in showers, on-demand hot water, two private workstations, firepit, grill, large koi ponds (we even supply koi fish food), located in Asheville and 15 minutes or less to everything. This luxury cabin checks all the boxes.

name: Tiny Home w/ Fire Pit: Trail Access On-Site!
description: Explore the Pisgah National Forest, drive along the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, tour the Biltmore Estate, or visit downtown breweries during your visit to Asheville, North Carolina. Embark on a unique experience when you stay at this tiny home vacation rental that features 1 bathroom, a lofted sleeping space, a kitchenette, free wifi, and driveway parking. The best feature is the outdoor fire pit that overlooks tree-filled hills and mountains — perfect for watching the sunset.

name: Hubbard's Hideaway
description: Located on a wooded lot, tucked in the base of Burney Mountain, our newly renovated home is ready for you to relax and enjoy. Take in the beautiful, mountain views as the most amazing clouds drift by. Watch carefully and you might see deer or even a bear! Relax on the deck with a glass of wine for a perfect evening of stargazing and wait for the moon-rise over beautiful Western North Carolina. When you're ready for bed, rest well on dreamy, new memory foam mattresses.

name: Bespoke Bungalow
description: The Bespoke Bungalow is nestled in a wooded haven, features a unique outdoor shower, composting toilet and private outdoor area surrounded by forest for dining and lounging. Interior walls handmade with locally harvested wood. This guest house is best suited to nature-oriented travelers as it is located 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 15 minutes to downtown Asheville. This is an elevated off-grid glamping site with no electricity or indoor plumbing.

name: Brand spankin' new spot in West Asheville!
description: Enjoy a stylish two-bedroom spot on the first floor of this newly constructed home in the heart of West Asheville. It's only a ten-minute walk to Haywood Avenue and a three-minute drive to the downtown exit!

name: Private Suite near Downtown AVL
description:
Explore downtown from our private suite in Asheville's Historic Montford Neighborhood. Only 15 min walk to downtown's highly rated restaurants, boutiques, and the famous South Slope breweries. 5 min stroll to Montford's local café.

Enjoy a private patio under twinkling lights and cute little kitchenette. Fresh linens and toiletries provided along with high speed WI-FI and other amenities for a comfortable stay.

Count on us for local insights on must-visit spots!

Your urban retreat awaits!

name: Brand spankin' new house in West Asheville!
description: Plan your getaway at this stylish two-story, two-bedroom, newly constructed house in the heart of West Asheville. This clean, comfortable, and spacious home is only a ten-minute walk to Haywood Avenue and a three-minute drive to the downtown Asheville exit!

name: West Charmer 5-10min to Main Attractions
description: Be our guest in this brand new remodeled guest suite only 5 minutes to downtown West Asheville, 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. One whole acre fenced in — so feel free to bring your furry friends! Our home has the cleanest well water and an in-home water filter so all of the water is drinkable. A hot tub overlooking our large yard with plenty of space to walk around and enjoy the garden outside. You may see us out there tending to the garden — feel free to take a few tomatoes!

name: Hamlet House
description: Charming bungalow house with eclectic vintage interior design in the centrally located neighborhood of Shiloh.  Only 10 minutes to downtown, 5 minutes to Biltmore House and Village and less than 10 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway.  Your room is a beautifully decorated bedroom, super comfy queen sized mattress, has black out shades, and a dedicated locking bathroom.  You'll have use of the fully equipped kitchen, laundry room and living areas, all shared with only me.

name: New(2022) Pool Home w/ Hot Tub in West Asheville
description: Unbeatable location! Completed in 2022. Swim spa w/ hot tub in West Asheville. Custom EVERYTHING. BUILT IN Miele coffee machine & high end  appliances. Less than 1/4 mile walk to Haywood Rd for dining, shopping & bars.  3 bedrooms (all King beds) & 3 full baths. Master bath w/ heated floors & jetted, soaking tub.  2nd guest suite with walk-in shower. There is NOTHING like this in Asheville. Pets Welcome. NOT an investment property. This is our second home. Pics do not do it justice.

name: Be the 1st! Built 2023~Luxury~Hot Tub/Resort-Style
description:
This is Luxury Living! Everything Brand New, Built in 2023! Family-owned & operated. Private hot tub, covered porch with multiple forest and mountain views, king-size beds, full kitchen, gas fireplace, huge walk-in showers, on-demand hot water, dedicated workstation, outdoor patio with firepit, grill. Property features a large koi pond, hiking trail, overlooks. This luxury cabin checks all the boxes.

Downtown Asheville (15 mins.)
Biltmore (10 mins.)
Food options (5 mins.)
AVL Airport (15 mins.)

name: Retro Harmony-8 min to Downtown!
description: This unique space was converted from a garage.  Optimized for one or two people with a number of stylish details, this is the perfect retreat for digital nomads, relocators or visiting professors.  With dedicated workspace, high speed internet and easy access to the highway, accomplish your daily tasks and then retreat to the spacious living room or inviting patio.

name: Luxurious Sanctuary - Minuets to Downtown
description:
Welcome to my home - the Panther Palace!

Peaceful & Private. Nestled on an acre, minutes away from downtown Asheville.

There are two black cats (the panthers!) who dwell here. They come and go through their cat door. Automatic feeders are set up for them, so you just get to enjoy their company, pet and play with them. This place is ideal for you if you love cats and are excited to love on these dear panther guardians while you're here.

name: Dogwood & Sweetgum Buyout by AvantStay | Sleeps 16
description:
Welcome to Dogwood & Sweetgum at Sycamore Cove!

- 1/2 mile from DT Asheville!
- Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountain-To-Sea Trail are less than 1/2 mile away.
- BBQ & large yard with fire pit!

name: Sassafras & Magnolia Buyout by AvantStay | 16 Occ
description:
Welcome to Sassafras & Magnolia at Sycamore Cove!

- 1/2 mile from DT Asheville!
- Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountain-To-Sea Trail are less than 1/2 mile away.
- BBQ & large yard with fire pit!

name: White Pine & Red Bud Buyout by AvantStay | 16Occ
description:
Welcome to White Pine & Red Bude at Sycamore Cove!

- 1/2 mile from DT Asheville!
- Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountain-To-Sea Trail are less than 1/2 mile away.
- BBQ & large yard with fire pit!

name: Cypress & Willow Buyout by AvantStay | Sleeps 16
description:
Welcome to Cypress & Willow at Sycamore Cove!

- 1/2 mile from DT Asheville!
- Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountain-To-Sea Trail are less than 1/2 mile away.
- BBQ & large yard with fire pit!

name: Luxury sleeps 12! 10 Min to Downtown AVL!
description:
Brand New Build!
Our home is located in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville
Pet Friendly
10 minutes from River Arts District and West Asheville
2 Minute Drive to Erwin High School which has a Public Pool that is open on the weekends from Memorial Day To Labor Day
Erwin High School also has a Tennis Court
5 Minutes From Ingles Grocery Store

name: Comfort Stay Parkway w/ Sauna Unit C
description: Come on up for a visit to the Mountains and visit our Comfort Stay near the Blue Ridge Parkway. We offer a down to earth easy stay location just 10 minutes to Asheville downtown. This unit is often preferred by folks with longer stays as a great value option. The back yard is easily accessible with a nice creek and spring next door. Shared outdoor space and grill right there for your convenience. Close to I-40/I-240 exchange making everything about 10-15 minutes away.

name: New-Modern Private Luxury Suite with King Bed
description: Relax, you've arrived at your private entrance, luxury suite. Located just a minutes walk from New Belgium Brewery and walking distance to River Arts, Haywood Road and the French Broad River Greenways trail system, you won't find a better location.  Reserved off street parking and a covered deck with glider complete your modern guest suite.  Start each day in your huge walk in shower, migrate to the porch for a cup of coffee and enjoy our mountain air.  Welcome to Asheville!

name: Getaway w/ Fire Pit: 3 Mi to River Arts District!
description: Escape to Asheville with your family or friends and book this 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath vacation rental! This home features lovely furnishings and decor, a fully equipped kitchen, and an awesome outdoor space fit for the whole group. Enjoy coffee and breakfast on the furnished deck while your furry friend explores the yard, then take a scenic ride down Blue Ridge Parkway and relish the epic mountain views. When night falls, head downtown for a drink at one of the many local breweries. It’s up to you!

name: *NEW* The Maple Cottage
description:
Pets are Welcome! $75 per pet fee

Tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area in Asheville is our peaceful 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home-away-from-home. Here you’ll find room to breathe, plenty of peace and quiet, and just a touch of what’s familiar. We’ve made a tranquil place for you to relax, so you can focus on your next great adventure. Why pile everyone into a hotel room (or two) when you can breathe the mountain air without stepping on any toes?

name: *New* Cozy Haven|10 min to DTW & Biltmore
description:
Pets are welcome with $75 per pet fee!
Tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area is our peaceful 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom home away from home. Here you’ll find room to breathe, plenty of natural light, and just a touch of what’s familiar. We’ve made a peaceful place for you to relax, so you can focus on the next adventure. Why pile everyone into a hotel room (or two) when you can breathe the mountain air without stepping on any toes?

name: 6 miles to Asheville-Fenced yard-EV charger-Grill
description: This stylish, inviting home is perfect for couples or small groups. Situated 16 minutes from downtown and even closer to South AVL, you can explore nearby hiking and biking trails, try new breweries, and sample wines from the area's picturesque vineyards. For those moments when work calls, a dedicated office space awaits. With a spacious, fenced-in yard the perfect playground for your furry friends, this haven is not just a home, but an escape.

name: Pool W/ a View Hot Tub, Fire Pit, and More
description:
Helene Update: All utilities have been restored to this home.

Relax poolside at our unique Asheville getaway. King beds, hot tub, fire pit, and elegant outdoor living will be creating memories with your friends and family.

Only 12 min from downtown AVL & Biltmore Estate. Haywood Rd, NC Arboretum, & the Blue Ridge Parkway are only minutes away.

name: Creekfront, hot tub, Sauna, fire pit, 10 mi to DT
description: Discover Asheville's rustic charm in our fully-equipped, pet-friendly cabin. Sleeps 8, showcasing a blend of modern comforts within nature's tranquility. Experience outdoor living luxuries–hot tub, sauna, fire pit–while positioned conveniently near Asheville's top attractions like Biltmore, Blue Ridge Parkway, and North Carolina Arboretum.

name: Cozy Home Hot Tub, Pet Friendly, 15min to DT-AVL
description: The Copper Door - Come enjoy our Asheville home. Relax in the hot tub and cozy up by the gas fireplace. Enjoy the high-quality kitchen amenities with stainless steel appliances. Immerse yourself in nostalgia with the Crosley record player. Drift into dreamland on European linen bedding. Bring your pet! 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, and 15 minutes to the Biltmore Estate.

name: Peaceful Country Home
Teddy's Mountain Getaway
description: Escape to Teddy's Mountain Getaway, a beautiful vacation home nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains, just minutes from Asheville, NC. With spectacular views of the Pisgah National Forest, this peaceful retreat offers the perfect opportunity to relax and unwind. You can lounge in one of our outdoor spaces or gather around the firepit to roast marshmallows under the stars. Relax and unwind in the peaceful surroundings, and make memories that will last a lifetime.

name: Symphony of Luxury near AVL |Power, Water, Intern
description:
Hurricane Helene Update: Property has power, water and internet. The roads are clear and property is accessible. Please message for mid-term and long term stays.
Embrace 2025 in style at Symphony of Luxury AVL, located amidst the majestic Blue Ridge Mountains, just 25 minutes from Asheville.

name: Almost Asheville Oasis
description:
Tucked away in Candler, but still just eight miles from the heart of Asheville, this mid century ranch style one level home with a split floor plan, two bedrooms and a bathroom on each side of the home it is ideal for a group celebration or multi family gathering. Located less than half a mile outside of city limits the location is so convenient, about 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, 5 minutes to West Asheville, 7 minutes from the Biltmore and more.

*Fire chimney is NOT functional*

name: Upstairs Apt-King bed, kitchen, 6 mi to downtown
description: Find tranquility in our warm upstairs 2BR Asheville apartment, perfect for families and pet-lovers. Centrally located near Biltmore and Blue Ridge Parkway, our home offers a blend of convenience, comfort, and nature's charm. Features like a fully-equipped kitchen, smart lock, and free parking make for an effortless holiday getaway. Welcome to your Home in the Heart of Asheville!

name: Hilltop Haven by CM | Fun Hot Tub & Near Biking
description: Enjoy easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Downtown Asheville from Hilltop Haven, a renovated ranch with a fresh, clean take on country charm. You've found WNC's best yard for recreation! The home's complete makeover includes a screened-in porch, a hot tub, and a fully fenced yard with a stone fire pit. If your family likes to roam, play, and picnic, this property is perfect for you with a huge adjacent yard that's great for kids, pets, sports and games.

name: Peace Among the Pines
description: Welcome to the top of the mountain and your base camp for all things Asheville! This location is a PRIME spot for adventure; 10 mins from quirky and hip West Asheville and less than 7 miles to downtown! The long range mountain views from inside the studio are your perfect retreat after a day full of exploring, hiking, brewery hopping, mountain biking, cruising the Blue Ridge Parkway or enjoying the art, food and culture of our perfect little mountain town!

name: Oakley Oasis
description: Charming 3 bedroom 2 bath one level home in a central location of Asheville in the Oakley neighborhood, located on a quiet cul de sac. Convenient to downtown, trails, parks and the Blue Ridge Parkway. High ceilings, abundant light, open floor plan. Small front porch and sunny back deck. Pets considered...they are family!

name: 2 Rooms in Ultra-Convenient, Private Zen Oasis
description:
You’re own Bedroom where you can watch the stars as you sleep w/ personal Living/Game Room adjacent. The Game Room Sofa pulls out into 2 Beds as well. Private Full Bathroom.

Shared spaces include: fully stocked Kitchen, Jacuzzi, 3 Dining Areas, Large Main Living room, Gardens Surround our Home w Lounge Furniture in each shaded area. Zen Garden, Corn hole, Prof Hot Yoga Room/Gym fully stocked, 3 Porches.

6 Min from Airport, 15 to dwtn Asheville & Hendersonville. Breweries/Wineries 10 min away.

name: Cozy Cottage 5 mins. from Downtown
description:
Charming East Asheville Bungalow

This charming bungalow is located just one mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway and less than a 10-minute drive to downtown Asheville. The home is fully furnished and provisioned, and features a gas fireplace, covered front porch, fenced-in backyard with firepit, and is pet-friendly.

Book your stay today and experience the charm of East Asheville!

name: Home Sweet Asheville Getaway
description:
This is a beautiful, 720 square feet, new construction, in law suite with a private entrance. It has a full kitchen and bathroom. One driveway parking spot with additional street parking.
Come visit Asheville and all it has to offer with the comfort and feel of being right at home!

name: Asheville Urban Retreat
description: Discover Asheville's best-kept secret, our urban getaway! Mere minutes from downtown, enjoy the convenience of city life & tranquil retreat. The home is set in a friendly neighborhood often visited by our local bears, an extraordinary spectacle that never ceases to amaze our guests! Unwind after a day of exploration by cooking homemade meals in our full-kitchen and relax on the outdoor patio while you breath in the fresh Asheville air and maybe spot a friendly neighborhood bear. Be our guest!

name: Zenith | Forest Lux | Hot Tub | Fire Pit, 10 2 DT
description: Immerse yourself in a unique tiny house stay amidst the beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains. This modern new construction offers classic bohemian finishes, floor-to-ceiling windows, and an enchanting private deck with a hot tub and fire pit. Experience the ultimate forest escape with all brand new professionally designed furnishings and a massive wooded backyard. Get both the proximity to our thriving metropolis of Asheville and experience the clean, energizing vibes of modern luxury in nature.

name: Nest at the Overlook Asheville Guest House
description: Welcome to The Nest at the Overlook, an updated, elegant guest house nestled in the mountains in NE Asheville. Separated from the main house above the unused garage, with its own patio & parking pad, it is ideally located, with mountain views and easy access to local shopping and restaurants. Bedroom features a king bed w/washer/dryer in closet. Living room sofa pulls out to a queen mem foam bed, and coffee table lifts to double as a workstation (w/fast wifi!). Hall bath has dual showerheads!

name: Outdoor Oasis! Spacious, Dog Friendly, Fire Pit
description:
Bring your family or friends (and your dogs!) to this stylish, cozy home in the Oakley neighborhood. With a comfortable living area, spacious bedrooms, large outdoor dining area, private & smokeless fire pit, and BBQ grill, there's lots of room for fun!

The downstairs living area includes a large TV, electric fireplace, record player, fully stocked kitchen, coffee bar, and large dining table.

Upstairs are the 3 bedrooms, each with their own TV, including a primary with en suite bathroom.

name: Indoor Hot Tub & fire pit, 6 mi to downtown AVL
description: Experience the rustic allure of Asheville from our enchanting, pet-friendly 4BR retreat. This cozy haven, located near the famed Biltmore and Blue Ridge Parkway, offers luxury with a homey touch. With an indoor hot tub, BBQ grill, and spacious backyard, your getaway promises to be memorable. Suitable for up to 11 guests, our retreat offers the quintessential Asheville experience during all seasons.

name: Private Garden Suite with own entrance and patio
description: Private, safe, clean, natural, affordable and convenient!Enjoy your own quiet apartment attached to the back of our home, with your own private courtyard,  organic gardens and  private entrance. Spacious studio with original 60s kitchen and small private retro style bathroom. Our home is a lovely brick 1 story 1960s retro architecture with original features and modern upgrades. right in the heart of Asheville.Minutes to downtown,Biltmore, hospital, shopping, dining,  Blue Ridge Parkway and more

name: Sunflowers and Fireflies
description: Welcome! This beautiful home was built in 2018 and looks over the six acres that our little house sits on. It's about a fifteen minute drive to downtown and West Asheville and is surrounded by the Blue Ridge Mountains. The porch overlooks sunflowers in the summer with fireflies at night, deer throughout the year, and views of our ever-evolving gardens. We have goats, chickens, and a big garden area on the property that you are welcome to visit.

name: Le Petite Biscuit Pied-a`-terre!
description: T-Biscuit Dwellings also has a Fido Friendly Miniature Mountain guest house perfect for couples and/or solo travelers looking for longer stays in the Asheville area.  Primarily set up as a pied-a-terre and/or corporate rental, Le Petite Biscuit is best suited for travelers looking for an extended stay option (30 day minimum) that is centrally located in the North Asheville area with exceptional outdoor space for a variety of remote working options with their canine besties in tow.

name: Cute cottage in Asheville
description:
Lovely cottage in quiet, tree-lined golf course neighborhood.
Fully-furnished on the edge of the woods with lots of light.
Fully equipped kitchen including dishwasher
Private covered deck
5 minute walk to Friday farmer's market
4 miles to downtown
1 mile to the blue ridge parkway
One parking space
No pets of any kind or size permitted.
No smoking, drugs, weapons or parties
Strong wifi. *We do not have cable TV services. Content on TV is displayed via a Google chromecast from your device.

name: The Lucinda on beautiful Montford Ave.
description:
Built in 1910, located in the heart of the Historic Montford District, we are offering our three room apartment with a vintage ambiance setting reminiscent of the 1940's and 1950's.

Enter on the grand open-air front porch where you have full access for lounging in a smoke free environment.

Three restaurants on Montford Ave. are within two blocks. Nine Mile, All Day Darling & Tall John's Tavern plus a Convenience store within sight.
Three grocery stores and center of Asheville minutes away.

name: Baker House
description:
Baker House is located on a quiet street right in the heart of downtown West Asheville.

Just one block from Haywood Road, you'll have nearly instant access to tons of local shops, restaurants, and venues!

name: Contemporary Asheville Home w/ Panoramic Views!
description: Peaceful, private, and utterly picturesque, this 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath vacation rental hosts a true sanctuary within the bustling confines of city life. Warm up by the fireplace, stretch out on the mountaintop deck, and make yourself at home amongst bright, airy, mid-century modern spaces. However you and your group choose to spend your days — whether it be exploring the Blue Ridge Parkway or art gallery and brewery-hopping downtown — you'll love soaking in the sweeping bird's eye views.

name: Mountain Top Mansion | Hot Tub | VIEWS
description:
The Ashville Mountain Manor

This gorgeous estate was built in 1969, perched on 12 acres atop Burney Mountain. Local legend has it that Elvis, yes that one, tried to buy the property in the early 70's but was turned down.

Seclusion while being minutes from Biltmore Village, Sierra Nevada, and everything Asheville has to offer.

5 King Beds
1 Queen Beds
2 Full Beds (bunk bed)
4 Twins (2 bunk beds)
3.5 Baths
Wet Bar
Game Room
Theater
Hot Tub
Mountain Top

Wedding and Events are available, inquire

name: Couple’s Urban Sanctuary!  Unbeatable Location!
description: Exeptional location!  Private West Asheville residence with spacious living and dining areas,  plus front porch with day bed. All centrally located along the bustling Haywood Rd. corridor, on a quiet side street.   Off street parking.  Everything you need is a short walk away!  Breweries, award winning restaurants, you name it!  Enjoy a beer at one of 8 walkable breweries.  Ten minutes to the Biltmore Estate!  Five minutes to the River Arts District!  Five minutes to Asheville Historic District!

name: Asheville Blue Ridge Parkway Home, hot tub, grill
description: Secluded Mountain Home with private deck featuring a hot tub, grill, and full kitchen is only a mile from Blue Ridge Parkway and NC Arboretum. Enjoy private seclusion, yet only 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, Hendersonville and Black Mountain. Three spacious bedrooms and a bunk room is perfect for groups of three couples and 4 children.

name: Heart of West Asheville
description: Peaceful and centrally-located, this newly-built apartment attached to an early 1900s bungalow is in the heart of vibrant West Asheville. Within walking distance to amazing restaurants, bakeries, pubs, breweries, cideries, nightlife, and unique shopping experiences. Drive, walk, or bike to the French Broad River for water sports and the river arts district! Hike the Blue Ridge Mountains, just a short drive away. Time for a break? Come back to a quiet neighborhood to relax in your modern Airbnb.

name: Just built! Pond, kayaks, hot tub,fire pit,grill…
description:
Come and enjoy the best of Asheville in this exceptional, brand new built with brand new furniture, on 3 floors surrounded by 15 acres of nature and a beautiful pond ! You can enjoy a walk around the property, fishing, kayaking in the pond, as well as relax in the hot tub!
Downtown is about 10 minutes away and mountain attractions are also nearby. Comfortably sleeps 6 on beds and 2 on futons in 3 bedrooms, with all white organic cotton sheets and towels! All necessities provided for your stay!

name: Cozy Modern Mountain Apartment
description: Welcome to our modern pet-friendly apartment in West Asheville with breathtaking Mountain Views! Ideal for medium to long-term stays, our stylish and cozy space is just steps away from vibrant music venues and charming breweries. Discover the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and scenic beauty for an unforgettable getaway! 🏞️🏙️🎶🍻

name: Pisgah Mountain Hideaway
description:
Enjoy this open floor plan with accented wood, wood burning fireplace, updated bathrooms, gas stove.

The back deck overlooks a large private yard where you can enjoy plenty of southern exposure. During the winter months, the mountain sunset views are lovely, and can be enjoyed especially from the guest bedroom, back deck, and front porch. In the summer, there is plenty of shade, and you will find pots of freshly grown herbs and veggies for picking.

name: Serenity in Asheville center
description: Enjoy a stylish and comfy experience at this centrally-located Asheville apartment. Mix of old and new in a pre-war building with original wood floors and recently updated kitchen and bathrooms. One king and one queen bed with plush mattresses.  Everything you need for you home away from home.  This is a 30 day minimum stay.

name: 2 Houses! Sleeps 22! 10 Min to DTW Asheville
description:
Prime Location: Just a short 10-minute drive to downtown Asheville, you're never far from the action.
Double the Experience: Two houses side by side mean double the fun. Perfect for larger groups or families traveling together.
Pet-Friendly
10 minutes from River Arts District and West Asheville
2 Minute Drive to Erwin High School which has a Public Pool that is open on the weekends from Memorial Day To Labor Day
Erwin High School also has a Tennis Court
5 Minutes From Ingles Grocery Store

name: AVL Adventure Base: Private 1BR/1BA Guest Suite
description:
Welcome to your perfect vacation getaway in West Asheville! This charming 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom guest suite with kitchenette is centrally located, offering easy access to everything West Asheville and the River Arts District offers. Walking distance to New Belgium.

Whether you're a couple seeking a romantic escape, a solo traveler looking to immerse yourself in the local culture, or a business traveler seeking a convenient and comfortable stay, our guest suite is the perfect choice.

name: Modern Loft Style Guest House
description:
Brand new construction, loft style guest house has a very modern concept with many upgraded features including hardwood floors, new appliances, smart features, and a heated tile bathroom floor with wifi capabilities. It also has a covered deck overlooking a beautiful meadow.

This newly constructed home is located in a quiet and friendly neighborhood, just minutes from downtown Asheville, Mission Hospital, Kenilworth Park, and the natural beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains.

name: Ultra-Convenient Oasis•Hot Tub/Fire Pit•11Beds/5Bd
description: Hurricane Helene Recovery Ready. Power, Water & Strong WIFI! Lovely Family owned 5 Bdrm house sleeps 16, 11+ Beds, plus crib. 4-season outdoor dining, 4 person hot tub, in-ground fire pit. Pro yoga+strength-training studio. Dedicated working space in airy loft. 8min drive to AVL Airport, 15min. to BlueRidge Parkway/hikes, 20min. to Biltmore Estate, Dwtn Asheville or Hendersonville. Fireplace, in-ground fire pit, gas BBQ grill, 7 min to Climbing/Bike Track @ Rivater, 15 min to Omni Grove Park Inn

name: Modern Home Asheville, BiltmorePK CorporateRental
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located modern home. Relocating to the area and need to get a feel for the area like a local. Or vacationing with convenient access to Biltmore Park 2mins, Asheville 10mins, arboretum for hiking/biking 5 mins, Biltmore Village/Home 7mins, Hendersonville 10mins

name: Barn Suite, King bed, claw foot tub, farm animals!
description:
Embrace tranquility in our Barn Haven, nestled in Asheville's picturesque landscape. Ideal for couples or nature enthusiasts, this gem combines rustic charm & modern convenience.

You will hear horses during your stay. We do provide ear plugs if you are a light sleeper. You may also see some bugs during your stay. We have a pest control contract and we also provide bug spray but please remember, we are a farm with animals and bugs are inevitable.

name: 3B Log Cabin Mountaintop Sunset Views | Asheville
description:
Welcome to the Blue Ridge Cabin where you’ll kick back, relax, breathe in the mountain air, and take in glorious mountain range sunset views. This well appointed home features a historic 1800s log cabin with a ranch style lay out with all rooms on one level. The home is decorated with unique pieces that have been acquired throughout the US and abroad.

This cabin sits high above the Blue Ridge Parkway. You’ll enjoy the peace and quiet this home has to offer as your personal mountain retreat.

name: {Cheryl's Blackstone Retreat} Comfort and Style!
description: Memories of Asheville and the Biltmore House with the kids is what prompted us to create this Airbnb. Nestled in the quaint area of Woodfin, just outside city limits, this 3 Bedroom, 2 Full Bath house is the perfect spot for exploring, relaxing, or simply enjoying all that Asheville has to offer. The house sits on a steep hill, with nice views from the 3rd level fire pit. Comfy beds, including two Kings, 2 Fulls and 2 Twins, and lots of extras are sure to make your stay peaceful and memorable.

name: Bull Mountain Ridge
description: The site's first appeal is the amazing view of Bull Mountain Ridge. Beautiful all year long, but particularly in late October when the leaves are in their richest colors. The site is roomy for small to mid-sized RVs and offers a private water hook-up, 30 amp, and 20 amp power outlets. It feels private and tucked away, but is very accessible to all of what the Asheville area has to offer. Downtown is a 15 minute drive; ride services are both easy to secure and quite affordable.

name: Mountain View “No cleaning fee”
description: Rustic mountain home nestled up to a forest in a quiet neighborhood within 5 minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy beautiful mountain views from every room and from our wrap around front porch.

name: Bent Creek - Hot Tub + Games!
description:
Cute bungalow in the Bent Creek area of Asheville near the city's best mountain biking trails and the beautiful arboretum! Our 3 bedroom/2 bathroom house has a king bed, a queen bed, and 2 twin beds, all are memory foam mattresses with fresh, fluffy bedding.

Guests will love playing music on the record player, relaxing in the hot tub, playing foosball and ping pong in the basement, dining in the outdoor pavilion, and enjoying the nearby trails and community park!

name: Sugar Sweet Home
description:
Beautiful and fully furnished apartment with all the amenities you need! This apartment comes with all your utilities, as well as high-speed internet and more.

With downtown Asheville, and the Biltmore House 7 to 12 minutes away, you'll be living in a prime location. Plus, Haywood Road boasts some of the best nightlife and restaurants in the area and is only a 5 minute walk away. Carrier Park is also within walking distance, so you'll always have plenty of green space to enjoy.

name: Convenience and tranquility
description:
Plan ahead for spring! Book now to see the Chihuly exhibit at Biltmore!

We have the best mix of country tranquility and city convenience. Only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, enjoy this 1300 sq ft home with all the amenities you need.

Enjoy a peaceful cup of coffee on the porch in the morning and relax in the six-person hot tub in the evening.

Easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Close to great breweries and restaurants. 1 mile to the Ingles grocery and Starbucks.

name: Peaceful Private Lane, Near Airport & Ag Center
description:
Nestled on a private lane minutes from the Asheville airport and situated between Asheville and Hendersonville, this 695 sq. ft upstairs duplex unit blends modern style with comfort.
The two-bedroom, one-bathroom unit features a full kitchen, living room, and dining room. Exterior stairs lead up to a private, open-air front porch with seating. Wall-mounted TVs adorn each bedroom and the living room, with Netflix access provided.
Guests enjoy shared access to hot tub, laundry room, and fire ring.

name: Fully Loaded Escape w/ Hot Tub, Fire Pit & More!
description: Welcome to The Bright Bear Lodge of Asheville, located 15 minutes away from both downtown Asheville and The Biltmore Estate. With plenty of space for all to lounge both indoors and outdoors, you will make memories in the large hot tub, fire pit, or in the coffee lounge upstairs.  Come be our guests!

name: Asheville Amazing Tiny House & Hot Tub
description: This place to stay is truly one of a kind. Great modern tiny house with a comfy loft bed. Great new patio and hot tub.  Fire pit and grill. No Pets allowed.

name: Bent Creek Retreat by CM | Board Games & Fireplace
description: Immerse yourself in nature close to everything Asheville at Bent Creek Retreat! Boasting easy access, high-end furnishings, and a gated sanctuary, this newly built mountain vacation rental is centrally located but feels like a world away.

name: Grove Park's Finest
description: Our property, a Duplex, is located in Asheville, NC in the fashionably historic Grove Park neighborhood, nestled in the sweet spot of the famous Appalachians. The open concept, sumptuous finishes and lavish furnishings of this apartment, are eclipsed only by this homes' premier location. Whether heading up the tree-lined street to renowned Grove Park Inn or walking to nearby restaurants, taverns or golf, you'll experience Asheville living at its best.

name: Cozy West Asheville townhouse, walk to restaurants
description:
PMI Blue Ridge welcomes you to the Mardell Retreat!
Discover your serene extended stay retreat in the heart of West Asheville. This cozy 2BR, 1.5BA townhouse is tailor-made for travel nurses and professionals. Both bedrooms feature comfortable queen-sized beds, and we include all linens for a hassle-free experience. Step onto your private deck with a peaceful view of the woods. Immerse yourself in the culture of West Asheville, with eclectic shops and diverse dining options at your doorstep.

name: Ashevilla | Hot Tub, Views & 1 Mi. to Downtown AVL
description:
Nestled in a private community on Town Mountain, this spacious, well-appointed home has incredible proximity to shops and restaurants at only one mile from downtown. Overlook the beautiful skyline of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains from your perch-above-it-all, Ashevilla!

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: Pivate 1 bd 1 ba Biltmore Village
description: Experience the charm of Asheville with our quaint 1 bedroom 1 bath Airbnb nestled in Biltmore Village. Enjoy complete privacy as it features a separate entrance and is not shared. While there's no kitchen access, you'll have a microwave, mini-fridge and Keurig for convenience. Just .09 miles from the Biltmore House entrance, 2.8 miles to downtown and 2.6 miles to the South Slope. Plus, there are 3 popular Breweries in walking distance. Your perfect Asheville getaway awaits.

name: Sunset Perch over Asheville
description: Sunset views over downtown and mountains. Enjoy the convenience of a 10-minute walk to downtown Asheville while residing in a quiet neighborhood. Explore nearby Biltmore Estate (6 min drive) and Grove Park Inn (7 min drive). 2 KING BEDROOMS with ENSUITE BATHROOMS. 1 bedroom can convert to 2 twins. Full kitchen with workspace at the coffee bar. Outdoor screened in porch for bug free dining or lounging to take in the year-round sunsets. New construction and furnishings. 1 parking space provided.

name: WALK-BIKE to Biltmore Village3BR
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place with 3 Bedrooms, 1.5BA.  Walk or Bike to Biltmore Village Shops and Restaurants which include the Biltmore Estate; close to I-40 and Biltmore Avenue / Hendersonville Rd, I-240 and I-26, CLOSE to Downtown Asheville charming executive home with lovely hardwoods, granite, Smart TV's, fenced front yard (pet-friendly).  King Bed in the Master Bedroom, Queen Beds otherwise; desks in the bedrooms and 200 MBPS Wi-Fi.

name: Heart of Asheville
description: The guesr will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: White Pine Retreat | Pet-friendly, Views, Near AVL
description:
Located just 20 minutes from Asheville's city center, this spacious designer home offers an outdoor firepit, charcoal grill, expansive deck, gorgeous sunroom, well-stocked game room, Chef's kitchen, jacuzzi tub, and sweeping mountain views!

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: Five Bedroom Gameroom Hot Tub StarLink
description: Luxurious Vacation Getaway A 5-Bedroom Oasis with Game Room and Large Hot Tub and SpaceX Starlink High Speed Internet.  *Rental Agreement Required*

name: The Book Nook in South Asheville
description:
Come relax and cozy up with a book at our unique home in South Asheville.

We have a downstairs bedroom and bathroom ready to host 1 or 2 travelers. You are welcome to use shared spaces - our screened-in porch and connected outdoor dining area. It truly feels like you are in a treehouse when sitting out there.

Note: We live upstairs with 2 dogs & a cat. Some noise may travel through the floor but we do our best to be quiet from 9pm-7am.

name: Urban Oasis - Woodland Retreat Near Downtown
description: Just a short 2 mile drive to the heart of downtown scene and 3.5 miles from Historic Biltmore Village, this getaway with luxury amenities promises an unforgettable escape. Step inside and be greeted by the chic cabin -inspired modern decor that harmonizes seamlessly with the rustic charm of The Blue Ridge Mountains. With meticulous attention to detail, this home boasts an open floor living space, stainless steel kitchenette, and plush bedding ensuring you have everything for a rejuvenating stay.

name: Magic on the Hill by CM | Gas Grill & Fenced Yard
description: Enjoy mountain views in Asheville at Magic on the Hill! Located literally minutes from shopping, groceries, and fine dining, this freshly renovated home is ready for your family vacation. True to its namesake, this home's vantage point allows for a fantastic view. Pull up a chair on the front porch and be treated to city lights below and mountain peaks in the distance.

name: Bungalow with Hot Tub, Fire Pit, Dog Friendly
description: This one has it all!  Newly renovated, professionally decorated, centrally located oasis gives you 10-min access to downtown, Biltmore Estate, award winning dining and breweries, and the thriving River Arts District.  Maximize your stay by taking advantage of the private outdoor space with covered porch, hot tub, fire pit, gas grill & fenced yard. Minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway,  hiking, beautiful waterfalls, & floating down the French Broad.  Come make your favorite memories with us!

name: Blissful Bungalow - Entire House
description: Monthly Rental. 28 day minimum. Comfortable 1960's bungalow.  Screened in front porch and spacious back deck.   Good location in South Asheville/ Arden.   Fully equipped kitchen.   Two bedrooms with queen beds.   Closet space.   1 bathroom.   Washer and Dryer on main level.   Perfect for professionals on contract in the area.   Convenient to Pisgah National Forest and Blue Ridge Parkway.  All the hiking opportunities one would need for a lifetime.  Stay for a month or many more.

name: Cabin w/ Mountain Views to Relax, Unplug, Enjoy!
description: Nestled in a breathtaking valley overlooking the amazing views of the mountains & a lavender hill. A barn that has been re-imagined/repurposed into a creative space & gorgeous eco-friendly cabin. W/ vaulted ceilings, loft & fully outfitted kitchen. In the heart of the Appalachian Mountains but only 10 min to downtown & Blue Ridge Parkway. Unplug & relax w/ a good book, treat yourself to 5* restaurants, local breweries & shops. A stylish mountain cabin retreat.

name: Guest suite in Candler
description: This spacious one bedroom downstairs suite offers a private, peaceful stay. Located in a quiet neighborhood in West Asheville with a private entrance & you will have the entire suite, back yard & hot tub all to yourself!  When you’re ready for some shopping, breweries, hiking or amazing food you can be in West Asheville,  Downtown Asheville, River Arts District, Asheville outlets or the Blue Ridge Parkway entrance all within 15-20 minutes

name: Serenity in East Asheville
description: Peaceful, wooded, private 650 square foot lower level suite, located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Our home is convenient to Mission and VA Hospitals, UNCA, Biltmore Estate, Folk Art Center, and the Appalachian Trail (1 mile to a major trailhead).  This property is surrounded by trees and wildlife and is in a quiet residential neighborhood in the Haw Creek section of East Asheville.

name: Mermaid Lounge
description: New Ashley Home gel mattress. Private bath with tub & shower. Kitchen w/ all amenities. Ceiling fan in Liv. Rm & Bedroom. Forced air heat and air cond. Covered balcony where you can enjoy coffee, tea or cocktails w/ my Hummingbirds!  Smart TV/ Wifi. Saltwater Pool w/ 2 BBQ's, Lg Firepit.  Gym 24/7.

name: Charming, serene West Asheville bungalow
description: 1920 West Asheville bungalow recently completely renovated.  Nestled in an established neighborhood, this lovely private 2 bedroom, 2 bath home has all the peace and quiet of a country setting while being only a short drive from downtown Asheville (10 minutes) and all that West Asheville (8 minutes) has to offer.  Enjoy your morning coffee on the tiled patio while being serenaded by the birds.  Explore the property to find the hidden giant willow (21 feet in circumference).

name: The Garden Apartment
description:
Cozy AVL apartment for those seeking relaxation and a taste of the vibrant AVL culture.

Centrally located, less than 4 miles from Downtown, Haywood rd. & The River Arts District, our beautifully furnished, 1-bd, 1-ba guest house offers a comfortable and inviting atmosphere.

The apartment is the entire bottom floor unit of our guest house with a dedicated private entrance, private patio & parking.

(1br/1ba apt above, sounds from the upstairs apt are audible.)

Unaffected by Helene.

name: Camp Sassy
description: This immaculate 2022 Keystone camper trailer is parked at the end of a gravel road halfway up a mountain in the Riceville Community less than 20 minutes East of Asheville.  Master suite with a comfy queen bed.  2 extra wide bunk beds.  Dinette turns into a bed/lounge space.  Fire ring and more nature than you can shake a stick at.  11 minutes by car to Shope Creek trailhead.  11 minutes to Warren Wilson College.  Wifi.

name: Spacious Outdoor Living w/ Firepit + Scenic Views
description:
- Welcome to Idyllic Mountain by AvantStay!
- Cozy outdoor firepit for warmth and relaxation
- Seamless connection to nature and comfort in one retreat
- Scenic views of mountains
- Vaulted ceilings for abundant natural light in kitchen, living, and dining areas
- Two spacious covered decks for outdoor living

name: Creekside Mountain by AvantStay | Private Sauna
description:
- 3 private acres bordering the Blue Ridge Parkway Corridor
- Creek near the house provides ambiance and toe-dipping opportunities
- 5-minute walk to the Blue Ridge Parkway Trail
- Private sauna!
- Front and back decks
- Charming antique furnishings

name: Plum Perfect Hideaway by AvantStay | Near Downtown
description:
- Perfectly located 3 miles from downtown and the River Arts District
- Cornhole and fire pit for post-adventure relaxation
- Two parking areas for convenience
- Enjoy floating on the nearby French Broad River
- Upscale 3BR modern design

name: Riverside Ranch by AvantStay | Mins to Downtown
description:
- Nearby hiking, biking, and adventure activities
- Enjoy downtown Asheville's brewery scene and culinary delights
- Hot tub, fire pit, and wrap-around deck for relaxation
- Main suite with king bed, office, and luxurious bath
- Abundant entertainment like poker, cornhole, and frisbee

name: Modern Escape by Avanstay | Views, 10min to Town
description:
- Modern home just 10 minutes to downtown
- Perfect blend of modern comfort and scenic surroundings
- Enjoy the back deck with a BBQ grill, fire pit, and breathtaking views
- Ensuite with soaker tub and Avocado organic beds
- 24-hour check-in

name: Best of the Blue Ridge by AvantStay | A+ Location
description:
- Central location in a quiet, wooded neighborhood
- BBQ grill and a new solo stove on the back deck
- Comfortable bedrooms with memory foam mattresses
- Fenced yard with a view of the trees
- Pull-out couch in the living room for extra sleeping space

name: Cherry Blossom by AvantStay | 6 Min to Downtown
description:
- Known as "Paris of the South", 3BR townhome
- Explore outdoor activities such as biking, hiking, and paddling in the WNC mountains
- Indulge the dining highlights like BBQ delights at Buxton Hall
- Relax by the wood-burning fire pit with your groups!

name: Little Sycamore by AvantStay | Premier Location
description:
- Cook by the fire in the bright and open kitchen
- 6-minute drive from breweries like Sierra Nevada and New Belgium
- Iconic Attractions nearby like The Biltmore Estate, and Grove Park Inn
- 3BR luxurious townhome

name: Cheerful Cottage Retreat + Quick Downtown Access
description:
Escape to this newly renovated private home with a vibrant, cozy style and modern amenities. The eclectic cottage-style furnishings are inviting and comfortable for relaxing. But still, you'll be lured by the quick drive to downtown Asheville and the River Arts District - with shops, restaurants, and craft beverages. Silverline Park on the French Broad River is right across the street.

This escape is ideal for couples, small families, remote workers, close friends, and outdoor adventurers!

name: The Grape Escape by CM | Grill & Near Hiking
description: Achieve "grapeness" in Asheville, NC with a stay at The Grape Escape, a premiere Western North Carolina vacation rental! Plan your getaway to this renovated, well-appointed home featuring wooded privacy without sacrificing convenience.

name: The Grape Escape Collection by CM | Grill, FirePit
description: Achieve "grapeness" in Asheville, NC with a stay at The Grape Escape Collection, a premiere Western North Carolina vacation rental! Plan your getaway to this renovated, well-appointed home featuring wooded privacy without sacrificing convenience.

name: The Raisin by CM | Fire Pit, Gas Grill, & Woods
description: Raisin' the bar on one-bedroom vacation rentals in Asheville, NC, The Raisin is a renovated lower-level apartment with a private patio that enjoys easy interstate access only 9 minutes from downtown.

name: Arden Home
description: This spacious and cozy 3BR, 2.5 bath home sleeps up to 8 people and has a contemporary floor plan to give everyone their space yet also able to bring everyone together. Nestled in a tranquil, wooded property in Arden, this vacation rental offers the best of both worlds – a peaceful setting outside the city and easy access to award-winning restaurants, breweries, and entertainment in nearby Asheville

name: Creekside Charm minutes to Asheville
description: Welcome to Creekside Charm, your local family owned & operated vacation home to relax and recharge from the adventures you are sure to have while visiting all things Asheville, the Great Smoky Mountains, and the Blue Ridge Parkway.   Enjoy 1.5 acres of space and mature trees all bordering a bold creek.

name: New Fenced Yard for Dogs Near AVL,Airport,Biltmore
description:
Welcome to our home, nestled in the Garden of Arden. Convenient to everything Western North Carolina has to offer. Whether it's the Blue Ridge Parkway, Asheville Regional Airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, or downtown Asheville, you’ll be in the heart of everything.

Start your day off sipping coffee in a bright sunroom or spend the evening in a relaxing bath located in a spa-inspired master suite.

Bring your dogs, we have a brand new fenced in yard for them to enjoy!

name: Carriage House, 10 Miles to Asheville & Biltmore
description: Welcome to the cutest carriage house in western North Carolina. Start the day brewing coffee in a cheerful kitchen with vivid wood surfaces and a breakfast bar. This cozy, open-plan carriage house offers endless warmth by way of its modern furnishings and charming decor. A perfect landing spot to explore everything this area has to offer. Convenient to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Asheville Regional Airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, and downtown Asheville, you’ll be in the heart of everything.

name: Monthly Rental, Prime West Asheville Location
description: Everything you need. Great location. Walkable to west asheville corridor. Private. Quiet. Offering a longer stay option this winter.

name: Creekside Cabin
description: A peaceful, quiet getaway in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. Close to Asheville, Black Mountain and Swannanoa, Creekside Cabin feels like a remote retreat while only minutes from downtown. Perfect for short or long term stays- Clean, quiet and cozy!

name: Blue Ridge Retreat by CM | Near Appalachian Trails
description: Blue Ridge Retreat will invigorate your Asheville vacation with picture-perfect mountain views and modern comfort. This new-construction, custom-built home is just minutes from groceries and dining options and features a huge, grassy yard with a fire pit.

name: Quaint Blue Mtn Parkway Studio
description:
This cozy studio apartment is on the lower level of the home with its own private entrance. It's in a quiet neighborhood nestled in the municipal golf course and only 5 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway & Folk Art Center and 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Close to groceries, great eateries, & coffee shops, this studio has a full kitchen and its own lovely covered patio for you to enjoy on cozy winter nights.

Also includes off the street parking for up to 2 cars, free wifi, and local coffee!

name: Shipping Container Tiny Home | Pearl
description: Welcome to Pearl Container Home — your stylish little escape—where modern design meets laid-back comfort. This one-of-a-kind tiny home features a cozy queen bed, a spacious main deck for lounging, a private deck off the bedroom for morning coffee or stargazing, a sleek kitchen with all the essentials, and a spotless full bath. Tucked just minutes from Asheville’s best eats, shops, and trails, it’s the perfect launchpad for your WNC adventure—or just a cozy spot to unwind in style.

name: Shipping Container Tiny Home | Onyx
description: Welcome to Onyx Container Home — your stylish little escape—where modern design meets laid-back comfort. This one-of-a-kind tiny home features a cozy queen bed, a spacious main deck for lounging, a private deck off the bedroom for morning coffee or stargazing, a sleek kitchen with all the essentials, and a spotless full bath. Tucked just minutes from Asheville’s best eats, shops, and trails, it’s the perfect launchpad for your next WNC adventure—or just a cozy spot to unwind in style.

name: Wisteria Cabin
description: Escape to our Azalea or Wisteria Cabin, part of OM Sanctuary's holistic retreat center. Disconnect from the fast pace, embrace a healthy lifestyle, and find your inner sanctuary. While our main campus undergoes renovations, reserve one or both of our cabins on Airbnb. Just over the French Broad River, 2 miles from downtown Asheville, we offer a retreat near outdoor adventures, healthy activities, Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and River Arts District. Yoga mats available to stretch and rejuvenate!

name: Blue Ridge Mountain Retreat: Deck & Sunroom!
description: Experience the best of the Asheville area at this 4-bed, 3-bath vacation rental. Nestled in a serene neighborhood in Fletcher, NC, this home boasts ample natural lighting, wooded views, and all the comforts needed for a memorable getaway. Relax on the deck, explore Downtown Asheville just a short drive away, or visit attractions like the Biltmore Estate and Blue Ridge Parkway. With its prime location and inviting atmosphere, this house is the perfect base for your mountain adventures.

name: The Corral | 4,000 SQ FT | Upscale South Asheville
description: Wrangle up your friends for a restful escape at The Corral, Asheville's premier Western-inspired Airbnb.  Located in the heart of upscale south Asheville, The Corral is close to the area's most highly recommended restaurants and a stress-free drive to Biltmore Estate and Downtown.  With a newly renovated kitchen and carefully curated Joanna-Gaines-style decor throughout, this one-of-a-kind home is the perfect blend of rustic elegance and modern comfort.  Saddle up, y'all, and book The Corral!

name: Bittersweet Cottage - Hot Tub, Mountain Views
description:
Bittersweet Cottage is a wonderful retreat from your everyday cares. The one-bedroom cottage is located between downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway. It has everything you need for a relaxing and idyllic getaway including a private hot tub and stunning mountain views. We know that you will enjoy your stay here!

If we are booked during your desired stay, or if you are traveling in a larger group, check out our sister listing on the same property: airbnb.com/h/ashevillemountaincottage1

name: A launchpad for adventure!
description:
The Lazy Tiger Hostel is a traveler's hostel focused on being a launchpad for adventure and a home away from home!

This private room features a comfortable queen bed and access to the shared restroom/showers.

Like all of our guests, you'll also have access to the fully-stocked kitchen, front and back porches, and social areas.

All guests must be from out-of-area, book their own reservation, and have a credit card in their name.

name: Asheville Downtown: Style, Comfort, Workspace
description:
Welcome to a true Asheville experience! Our house offers the perfect blend of central city living and tranquility, providing a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in downtown Asheville's vibrant lifestyle.
- No neighbors – complete privacy for your stay.
- Dive into the heart of Asheville, where only a few residential houses remain, and experience authentic downtown living.

Discover the real Asheville. Book your stay with me today!

name: Private Room - home away from home!
description:
A private room with a queen bed in Asheville's newest traveler's hostel! This room also features its own private bathroom. Let us be your home base for adventure!

Like all of our guests, you will also have access to all common areas, including our fully-stocked kitchen, front and back porches, and social areas.

We are staffed and happy to help you plan the best Asheville vacation possible.

All guests must be from out of the area and book their own reservation.

name: Quiet country home,screened front porch,hot tub
description:
Relax at this peaceful family home located just 10 -15 minutes from Downtown Asheville & 1.2 miles from I-40 intersection.
The property sits in a quiet neighborhood on a private drive surrounded by woods and nature.
We are convenient to the Biltmore House, NC Arboretum and Blue Ridge Parkway.
We are pet-friendly, family oriented and have wheelchair access into house with other handicap amenities.
Kick back in the rocking chairs on the screened in front porch and enjoy life on Looney Creek!

name: Asheville Retreat ~ 6 Mi to Biltmore & Downtown!
description: Experience the scenic beauty of Asheville at this charming 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom vacation rental. Nestled in a tranquil neighborhood, this renovated home offers a welcoming interior to relax in after a day of exploring Asheville’s attractions. Visit the historic Biltmore Estate, cruise the Blue Ridge Parkway, or sample a local beer at one of the downtown breweries. You’ll be just a short drive from everything on your list! Unwind in comfort and style for your next family vacation.

name: Cozy Home in Asheville! - 10 min from Downtown
description:
Come enjoy all Asheville has to offer and stay at this newly renovated 2 bedroom/1 bath, pet friendly home located 3 min from the Blue Ridge Parkway in Asheville! With a park-like backyard, fenced dog run, and 2 spacious decks there is no need to leave nature behind at this private and cozy accommodation among the trees.

3 min to the Blue Ridge Parkway
10 Min Drive to Downtown Asheville
15 min Drive to Downtown Black Mountain
5 Min Drive to Grocery
4 Min Drive to the VA Hospital

name: Stunning cottage east AVL
Serene Asheville Retreat - Stunning Mountain Views
description:
Enjoy spectacular views of downtown Asheville and long range mountains from the comfort of your private balcony deck, or lounge in front of the fireplace and take it all in from the large picture window. Explore town, hike the Blue Ridge Parkway, visit National Forests, or any of the vibrant attractions Western North Carolina has to offer-all just a short drive away!

Nestled on an enchanting mountainside, this forest suite provides both seclusion and easy access. Outdoor space at it's finest!

name: Bunk in a 4-bed coed dorm in a new hostel
description:
This listing is for a single bed in a 4-bed coed dorm at The Lazy Tiger hostel. There's a shared bathroom directly across the hall. We can host more than 1 adult but they have to be booked individually.

Like all guests, you'll also have access to all common areas, including our fully-stocked kitchen, front and back porches.

We're happy to help plan the best Asheville vacation possible.

All guests must be from out-of-area, book their own reservation, and have a credit card in their name.

name: Orchards Nest
description:
Cozy up in this stylish, modern condo, perfectly situated just minutes from downtown Asheville, two minutes from the iconic Biltmore Estate, and one minute from Mission Hospital.

Renovated and thoughtfully furnished, a fully stocked kitchen, and everything you need for a comfortable stay. Enjoy the security of onsite parking.

Whether you’re here to explore Asheville’s art and food scene, sample craft brews, or hit the nearby hiking trails and Blue Ridge Parkway, you’re minutes from it all.

name: Parkway Retreat w/ Sauna Unit B
description: It's a perfect time to visit our cozy retreat near the Blue Ridge Parkway. Relaxing neighborhood in a country setting, just 10 minutes to down town Asheville. Perfect for vacation, remote work, or relocation home base. Easily reach Tunnel road shopping, Asheville Mall, VA Hospital, Arboretum . Lots of space on 8 acres where you can take a walk or enjoy the fire pit outside, and relax by our creek. Quick access to I-40/I-240 connector makes everything 10 minutes away.

name: Bent Creek Birds Nest
description:
We would love to host you for your next visit to Western North Carolina!

A mountain oasis; seconds from the Blue Ridge parkway. We're in the heart of Pisgah National Forest and the Blue Ridge Mountains, with access to miles of hiking/biking trails, and convenient to downtown Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, and Biltmore Park. Relax and enjoy the beautiful canopy views and sounds from our treetop deck. Head to the woods, or head to town for Asheville’s vibrant food/music scene.

name: Mid-Century Boho & Private Patio
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located suite with a private patio, King bed, and kitchenette. This comfortable and clean suite is stocked with everything you need to enjoy your stay.

WNC is open for business, and many local businesses and restaurants are struggling after Hurricane Helene. Please consider supporting a local business and/or restaurant during your stay!

name: Cozy Home South of Asheville
description: Relax at this charming and peaceful home nestled on half an acre. Just five minutes from the Asheville airport, 20 minutes from downtown Asheville, and 45 minutes from Pisgah National forest. Private and serene with a fully fenced in yard for one house-trained dog to roam. Great for travel nurses, remote workers, or anyone wanting to explore the Asheville area. You’ll have everything you need to consider this your home away from home.

name: West AVL Snugglepod w Private Entry, Patio & Bath
description: The Snugglepod is a light-filled oasis with its own entrance and relaxing patio space tucked away in a unique MCM bungalow. It's walkable to the hubub of the hippest part of town - West AVL's Haywood Road. This private, newly remodeled space with a separate entrance, bathroom and kitchenette is the perfect place to recharge. We are dog friendly and open-minded - whoever you are, you are welcome here!

name: Montford Bungalow Near Downtown
description:
So close to downtown!

Each bedroom in this home has its own private en suite full bathroom. Each room also has a separate entrance. There is an office with a stand up desk, and also extra private bath. To get some fresh air, there is a covered front porch, a side patio with string lights, as well as a back deck.

We have 2 off street parking spots, and plenty of on street parking if needed, as well as plenty of storage.

name: Luxury Apartment Downtown at the Grove Arcade
description:
The Grove Arcade is in the heart of downtown Asheville, where you will find the best in social opportunity, luxury, comfort, and convenience.

You will also find stylish, contemporary interiors, well-appointed
furnishings, linens, housewares, internet, 24/7 security, garage
parking, and utilities in this one-bedroom fully furnished apartment.

Whether you plan to visit for 1 Month, 2 Months, or 2 weeks,
consider staying with us in the Historic Grove Arcade.

name: The Fort @ Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Fort is in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. You’ll get a queen-size bed with sheets, a blanket & pillows. Take a look at the surroundings because this isn’t a spot for light sleepers or folks craving seclusion. Great for the social camper who doesn’t want to lug around camping gear! You've got prime access to our indoor bathroom, hang-out space and outdoor shower.

Note that we're not calling this "glamping". :) Please read the FULL description.

name: The Green House on Winding Road
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Available January 1st 2024

name: Spacious Horse Barn Suite, King bed, 8 miles to DT
description: Immerse yourself in a unique blend of rustic charm and city comforts at our pet-friendly barn retreat in Asheville, North Carolina. Perfect for couples, our one-bedroom haven offers exclusive access to all amenities, coupled with proximity to notable attractions like Biltmore Estate and the River Arts District. Experience winter coziness and stellar festive atmosphere in this countryside haven during upcoming holidays like Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day.

name: Hot tub|fire pit|Arcade game|King bed|6 mi to DT
description: Experience Asheville’s allure from our well-appointed 5BR sanctuary, located in the scenic Blue Ridge, within minutes from the enchanting Biltmore and Folk Art Center. Ideal for up to 16 guests, our property boasts an inviting hot tub and dreamy fire pit, making it perfect for wintry retreats and unforgettable holiday celebrations.

name: Stone's Throw Farmhouse, Asheville! Pets welcome!
description: *Please note we do not allow any work vehicles or equipment on property. Neighborhood roads and driveways are not suitable.* Located Just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, and 3 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, this private mountain house is the perfect home base for relaxing by the fire, cooking in the chef's kitchen and taking in the beautiful tree filled surroundings- with plenty of space for the whole family (including pets), you’ll feel right at home at this cozy mountain getaway!

name: Charming Asheville Cabin | Perfect Couples Retreat
description: Welcome to Collins Mountain Cottage—a romantic hideaway in the serene woodlands of Asheville, NC. This charming all-wood cabin is perfect for couples seeking both seclusion and adventure, just 15 minutes from downtown. Sip coffee on the private balcony, explore scenic trails on the Blue Ridge Parkway, or enjoy Asheville’s vibrant food and arts scene. Whether relaxing or exploring, this cozy retreat offers the perfect setting for a peaceful and unforgettable getaway.

name: West AVL Studio 15 min Drive to Mission Hospital
description: Studio Westmont is a dog-friendly and spacious studio apt within a modern, West Asheville home, offering stays of 30+ nights for traveling professionals or travelers looking to immerse themselves in the Asheville scene. Our comfortable and sleek accommodation is conveniently located within walking distance to hip Haywood Rd and minutes to Downtown Asheville. If you're here for remote work or looking to plant roots in Asheville, we welcome you and hope you'll make yourself at home while here.

name: Mountain sunset view 1 mile from downtown
description: Nestled in a mountainside neighborhood just outside of downtown Asheville, the Boho Haven in the Trees offers a peaceful yet convenient-to-everything experience.  Want to walk or ride bikes downtown?  We are just a mile away.  Want to chill on a balcony in the trees with a mountain view and a fire pit?  We got you.  Come experience the luxurious Boho Haven and live life like an Asheville local

name: Washer, dryer, dishwasher, no checkout chores
description:
Enjoy a patio drink at this cheerful, clean, off-city street North Asheville 950 sq ft walkout downstairs studio with dimmable lighting, windows with natural views, eclectic art, well-equipped kitchen/ laundry room and private entry and backyard.
Close:
4m Downtown
6m West Asheville
5m Mission Hospital
11m Biltmore & Parkway
3m Woodfin, River Arts District
Walkable to a few things: ex. Beaver Lake.
Need local tips on restaurants, day trips, what is open, where to park? We can help.

name: La casa en River Arts *Water+utilities restored*
description:
One Block from the River Arts District and Central to all of Asheville's Best Attractions.

Spacious new construction Apartment Suite, with Private Entrance, in a centrally located, convenient and friendly Residential Neighborhood. There are Two Bedrooms, each with en suite Bathroom and queen-size beds. Plus a huge parlor with kitchenette, dining area and gas fireplace. Comfortable, and Quiet. Great for Escape "Staycations" or "Work from Anywhere".

name: Cozy North Asheville Apartment
description: Welcome to your cozy North Asheville getaway! Located just a 10-minute drive from downtown, enjoy easy access to restaurants, shops, and attractions. With private parking and entrance, this warm apartment offers comfort and privacy. Explore shared outdoor spaces amidst natural beauty. Ideal for business, medical visits, or leisure, book your stay today and experience Asheville at its best! Your charming escape awaits!

name: Female dorm bunk in a new hostel
description:
This listing is for a single bed in an 8-bed female dorm at The Lazy Tiger hostel. There are shared (gendered) bathrooms directly across the hall. We can host more than 1 adult but they have to be booked individually.

Like all guests, you will also have access to all common areas, including our fully-stocked kitchen, front and back porches, and social areas.

All guests must be from out-of-area, book their own reservation, and have a credit card in their name.

Let us know of any questions!

name: Birchwood Manor
description: Welcome to Birchwood Manor! A stunning Scandinavian style 2,800 sq. ft. home located on 3+ manicured acres in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. You will experience year-round mountain views in privacy, but also enjoy being just minutes away from all the amenities Asheville has to offer. Birchwood Manor is a secure and gated property equipped with multiple balconies, outdoor spaces, luxury appliances, smart TV's, a game room, and bunk room for kids. Pets under 40 pounds allowed with deposit.

name: New home with privacy and views
description: Experience the delight of this very private brand new home just minutes from all Asheville has to offer.  The home sits at the back of a 35 acre hobby farm that backs up to the Blue Ridge Parkway-with access to the Arboretum, Mountains to Sea trail, and Bent Creek. Enjoy gorgeous views from the large wrap around deck, stay warm by the fire pit, wander down to the barn to meet the chickens and alpacas, or gather inside to cook a meal. This home has it all!

name: Farm Suite, King bed, hot tub, BBQ grill, animals!
description: Experience tranquility amid the bustling charm of Asheville, North Carolina, in our Yellow Door Suite, a luxury retreat designed for modern nomads & romantic couples. Enjoy cozying up in the private hot tub, or chill with our friendly farm animals. Major attractions like Biltmore Estate & Botanical Gardens are just minutes away. Perfect place to unwind during your next summer vacation!

name: Heartwood Cottage by CM | Grill & Chef's Kitchen
description: Make the most of Heartwood Cottage's convenient location only ten minutes from Asheville, NC, where you'll discover art galleries, eclectic dining, and breweries aplenty. This tiny home experience offers cozy comfort whether you're looking for a weekend retreat or a place to call home while you're exploring the Blue Ridge Mountains.

name: Beautiful Mountain Home
description: Incredible mountain house that doesn’t feel like a rental! The perfect entertaining home with tons of room for family and a true tree house feel.

name: Asheville 5BR Retreat |Game Room| Hot Tub|Fire Pit
description: Discover your perfect escape at our spacious 5 bedroom retreat home, peacefully tucked away in a welcoming, serene neighborhood that offers ample privacy. You'll find our location to be extremely central to fantastic attractions, dining options, breweries,  hiking trails, and a mere 15 minute drive to downtown.

name: Avery’s Creek: 4 Bedroom, 3 Bath, Deck & Hot Tub
description: Avery's Creek - 4 Bedroom, 3 Bath Full House Rental with Deck & Hot Tub

name: Super Location, Walk to Downtown, Montford, New
description:
PLEASE NOTE: Due to Asheville city zoning law, this home can only be rented long-term which means you must book for a minimum stay of 30 or more days.

Asheville is on a boil water notice.

Fully-furnished, garden-level apartment in beautiful historic Montford. 2 BR/2BA with washer and dryer in unit.
Stainless steel appliances and fully equipped kitchen. Abundant natural light and high ceilings. Luxury vinyl plank (LVP) throughout.

No cats. Small dog (less than 35 lbs) on a case by case basis.

name: Modern Asheville Home Near Great Food and Venues!
description: Best Bet West Asheville Location! There's always something to do when you stay at Gratitude Retreat, whether you're walking to Haywood Street, known for its laid-back vibe and hip assortment of restaurants and entertainment venues, or whether you'd rather stay at home and entertain in the home's game room with a 55" TV, pool table, dartboard, and wet bar.

name: Eclectic Escape: Hot Tub, Game Room, Movie Theater
description:
Stop scrolling—you just found your perfect Asheville getaway!

Asheville is a quirky city, and this house is just as fun as the destination itself! Here’s why you’re going to love staying here:

✅ Prime Location – Only 15 minutes from downtown, with easy Uber access
🎯 Endless Entertainment – Packed with fun amenities
🎨 Bold & Eclectic Vibes – A colorful, stylish space that’s anything but boring.
🌙 5-Star Comfort – Thoughtfully stocked for ultimate relaxation

name: Farm Suite, hot tub, BBQ grill, fire pit, animals!
description: Discover the charm of rural Asheville, NC, in our charming farm suite, nestled among 9.5 acres of picturesque beauty - perfect for families and pets. Located close to the famed Biltmore Estate and vibrant city center, enjoy breathtaking Blue Ridge Mountain views, an on-site hot tub, and daily interactions with friendly farm animals.

name: Tiny House on the farm, King bed, hot tub, firepit
