description: Immerse in a farm experience at the Big Red Tiny House. 2 guests, 1 bedroom with a king bed, and a hot tub. On a 9.5-acre working farm in West Asheville, close to Biltmore Estate, Basilica of Saint Lawrence & River Arts District. Perfect for nature lovers and summer retreat. Pet-friendly with modern amenities.

name: Cozy 3-Bed Home, Yard & Deck | Biltmore Village
description:
If you're traveling for work, relocating to Asheville, or long-term traveling... you'll love this home:

✔️5 mins to the Biltmore Estate, downtown Asheville, and restaurants, breweries, and more!
✔️Fully fenced-in large backyard for your pups
✔️Clear view of Blue Ridge Mtns from balcony (coffee & stargazing!)
✔️Newly remodeled home w/ newer appliances
✔️Private, quiet, safe, comfy
✔️Office with desk & monitor
✔️Free wifi (250+ mbps)
✔️Pet friendly!

name: King room with City View at Kimpton!
description:
Welcome to Kimpton Hotel Arras

A Downtown Asheville Hotel on the Pulse of the City
Rising from the center of downtown Asheville, North Carolina, Kimpton Hotel Arras invites you to share in the unique artistry of this Blue Ridge Mountain town.

name: Rainbow's Edge by CM | Board Games & Cozy Hot Tub
description: Begin your Asheville getaway at Rainbow's Edge, where gorgeous mountain views from the covered deck offer picture-perfect scenery and colorful sunsets. Only 15 minutes east of Asheville, NC, Rainbow's Edge welcomes everyone to feel at home with multiple gathering spaces, including a generous living area with a gas fireplace, a lower-level game room with a ping-pong table, and the ever-popular hot tub patio area.

name: Bradford by AvantStay | 10 Minutes to Downtown
description:
- Three bedrooms, two full bathrooms with shower/tub combos, and a half-bath
- Shaded side patio with comfortable seating and an electric fire pit table
- Modern, chic design throughout the home
- Located on a quiet street
- Fully equipped kitchen with a full suite of appliances

name: Creekside Unit in heart of RAD!
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place in the heart of the River Arts District and one block from New Belgium Brewery and more!

Other Amenities:
Free Private Parking Spot
In-Unit Washer/Dryer
Smart Home with Amazon Alexa and 55' SMART TV
King Bed in Large Room
Large Deck

Close By:
New Belgium Brewery
White Duck Taco Shop
Green Tea Sushi Bar
Salvage Station
Ultra Coffee Bar
Trader Joes
Earth Fare
Whole Foods
and a whole lot more......

name: Rose Hill Manor
description: Rose Hill Manor is a charming 3 bedroom recently renovated 100 year old victorian home centrally located 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville and minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, hiking, and breweries. Plus just a short drive to Chimney Rock, Lake Lure, and everything Asheville and the surrounding areas have to offer! This home is perfect for family gatherings, bachelor or bachelorette parties, wedding rehearsal dinners, and more!

name: Hip Studio In Heart of Downtown Asheville
description:
Get comfortable in this condo in the heart of downtown Asheville.
This desirable location puts you within walking distance to everything;
breweries, amazing restaurants and shopping. 10 minute drive to the Biltmore Estate

If you are booking over a holiday (Memorial, Labor, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Years), we require a 2 day booking and no check-outs are permitted on the holidays
On weekends, we require a minimum of 2 nights. We reserve the right to cancel your booking if you do not comply.

name: Wayward Moose Lodge
description: At the WML you will have a scenic mountain top all to yourself but will only be 15min from downtown Asheville. The Lodge also is on the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Mountains to Sea Trail.  It is the perfect gathering spot for larger groups of family and friends as well as corporate retreats.  A popular feature is that every room has its own bathroom.  Our kitchen is spacious and well equipped for those who enjoy cooking. There is a fire pit and wrap around deck where you can enjoy being outside.

name: Private West Asheville Getaway
description: 1 bedroom, peaceful and centrally-located.

name: Rose Mountain Escape (Pet Friendly)
description: Relax with the whole family, friends, or colleagues at this peaceful place to stay. Dedicated work station with fiber optic internet. Close to a variety of local favorites, and AVL Airport. Spacious fully fenced in back yard for our furry loved ones to run and play. Feel like a walk? Glen Arden Estates is a wonderful no outlet neighborhood to walk, run, or just enjoy the fresh mountain air.

name: Fireplace, Hot Tub, and Pet-friendly
description: Howland House is a mid-century modern gem located in the heart of Asheville. Whether you are seeking a peaceful retreat or a base for exploring Asheville, this home invites you to get cozy amidst the beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains. With three bedrooms and two bathrooms, Howland House promises an unforgettable stay for up to 8 guests.

name: Perry's Home Studio South
description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.  Our cozy cottage home was built in 1950 (many moons ago).  Our home is situated in East Asheville.  We are conveniently minutes away from Biltmore Village/Estate, downtown AVL, entering the Blue Ridge Parkway, getting on 40 East, or West, or 240 East, or West (Making travel less hectic while visiting AVL).  Haw Creek is pleasant to walk and take a ride through.  It is a beautifully diverse neighborhood.

name: Modern Retreat Near Biltmore
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at Picture your ideal getaway in the heart of Asheville's tranquil Oakley neighborhood. As you step into our modern ADU, you're greeted by a sense of relaxation and comfort. The spacious 800 sqft unit features an open and inviting living space, where you can unwind, socialize, and create lasting memories, a chef style kitchen, and luxurious spa like bathroom with marble tiles.

name: Modern Asheville 1-BR Suite in Quiet Kenilworth
description:
Modern, private 1-bedroom guest suite in new home w/ private entrance and patio. 5 min drive to downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate.

> Private living area, bedroom & bathroom.
> Bedroom is separate from living room w/ king size bed.
> Private entrance w/ patio.
> Free off-street parking.
> Pack-n-play & high chair available.
> Kitchenette w/ microwave, mini fridge, coffee maker, teapot, and dishes for your takeout meals from Asheville's amazing restaurants!
> Permitted by City of Asheville.

name: Urban Subterranean Luxury
description:
Welcome to our exquisite 3-bedroom home nestled in the heart of Asheville, North Carolina.

This one-of-a-kind haven combines the serenity of nature with the sophistication of custom midcentury interior design, creating a truly unique and luxurious retreat for your stay. Step into a fully remodeled masterpiece.
The earth shelter design offers a harmonious blend of sustainability and modern luxury. 2 king beds and two twins (1 is trundle)

Minimum Rental is 30 days.

name: Peaceful Mountain Sanctuary (Entire Home)
description:
Find calm and center in this spacious home. A newer home with two floors, there's plenty of room to relax and get grounded.

You can spend time on one of the three outdoor porches, read in a lawn chair, enjoy your coffee with mountain views, or take a nap in your treehouse room.

The area is just 12m from downtown, but house is tucked away in what feels like the mountainous countryside.

name: Hot Tub, Pet Friendly, Fenced yard, 10 min to DT
description:
Our home features Hot Tub, Large fenced in yard, 10 min to DT, Desk & Printer, Pets ~ Long Stays available!

4BD/2BA
5 beds, L couch (Need to sleep more people? Ask us about air mattresses or additional neighboring Airbnb units)
Large fenced yard, pet-friendly

With all utilities back, we're so excited to be welcoming tourists back to Soulful Nest Asheville!

name: Adorable space with hot tub
description: Adorable studio at this peaceful and centrally-located place. This space is located on the lower level of our home, though your space is completely separate and private. We’re 15 min from downtown Asheville, so it’s a quick ride, but you wouldn’t know it with the quiet, relaxed atmosphere. You’ll have access to the 10 person covered hot tub area, private bathroom, outdoor seating area with a chiminea, a king sized bed, indoor seating area, and kitchenette. There are also no cleaning or pet fees!

name: Whole hostel rental in West Asheville
description:
Hurricane Helene Update
The hostel is still standing. We have power, internet and water! We are ready to host Aid Workers and people in need of a place to stay.

****
Perfect for large groups, we offer 15 bunk beds and 2 private rooms. There is a full kitchen, firepit, large back deck and front porch.

Since this is a whole house rental of a property that usually books beds individually, please message for availability. Please also let us know what brings you to town.

Note: Staff lives on site

name: Asheville Privacy Close to DT, Parkway, Biltmore
description: Experience Asheville's charm at our family-friendly retreat, minutes from downtown. Close to the Biltmore House and the Blue Ridge Parkway, our spacious home is your ideal haven. Immerse yourself in the vibrant music scene, local breweries, and eclectic dining—all just moments away. Unwind on the screened porch, making our home the perfect base for your Asheville adventure and peaceful retreat. Owner is a licensed real estate agent, and can help anyone relocating search for Asheville properties!

name: Sweet, vintage 3/2 cottage
description: Recently remodeled, including two new bathrooms and updated kitchen. Nicely furnished and freshly painted (inside and out). Huge yard with fence located in hip West Asheville,  but also in a quiet, residential neighborhood.   Enclosed front porch and back deck to enjoy the birds and trees!

name: Walkable W. Asheville Comfort Oasis
description: This is a fully contained tranquil one-bedroom apartment on the bottom floor of our home with it's own private entrance. Custom designed by Shelter Collective with 10-foot-high ceilings and large sliding doors, nature is seamlessly incorporated. Full modern kitchen with all appliances and heated tile floors in the bathroom ensure your comfort. A ten-minute walk takes you to the River Arts District, New Belgium Brewery, Hole Donuts, Owl Bakery (incredible pastries), PizzaMind and other fun eats.

name: Sweeten Creek HideAway
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway nestled in quiet neighborhood and walking distance to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains to Sea trail. Biltmore Village just 3 miles away and AVL Transit less than .5 miles.
You have a private entrance and porch, all wheelchair accessible, dog and cat friendly with fenced in yard that has a mountain stream running through. Rest, relax, enjoy!

name: Relax at Spivey Chateau Central Asheville, NC
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. 6 minutes to West Asheville. 10 minutes to Downtown. Funky Mid-Century Modern decor. Porch with Scenic View. Great peaceful Star Gazing!

name: Fun & Funky Deltec Home with Pool Table, Darts
description: Come unwind at The Nonagon, your next stop for a unique and peaceful getaway. This funky, relaxing Deltec style home is located in South Asheville and will allow you to enjoy all that Asheville has to offer.  Indulge in the local food scene and breweries, hike our many trails, tour the Biltmore, or take a drive on the Blue Ridge Parkway.  When you're done exploring, enjoy the game room with darts and pool, warm yourselves by the fire pit, or simply relax and enjoy the cozy space curated for you.

name: Cozy Garden Studio Apt in West Asheville
description:
Welcome to our cozy West Asheville apartment. We’re centrally located just a 2-minute drive to Haywood, 10 minutes to downtown and 15 minutes to the Biltmore.

Please note we are not super walkable to Haywood.

name: Peaceful Cottage 5 miles from DT
description: Enjoy the mountainous Asheville area in this centrally-located cottage. Peaceful fire pit with mountain views 10 minutes from downtown. The cottage is located just North-West of town. Easy access to downtown Asheville’s local shops and breweries, or a short drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Cozy  Mountain View Apt
description:
Enjoythis stylish high ceiling house with a comfortable bedroom, 50" TV, double sided gas fireplace (bedroom/living room). Master bath well sized shower, vanity and a stand-a-lone bathtub. Living room is very spacious with 65" TV, sectional couch. Dining table/workspace w 4 stools.
Kitchen is an L Shaped with pantry, dishwasher, oven, microwave, fridge, and muddroom area. Deck is 10' * 40 with amazing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Very centrally-located. 5 min drive to downtown & RAD.

name: Asheville 7/4 Mansion, Views, Pool, Spa, Gameroom
description: This spacious 7-figure mansion is located only 5 min from Downtown Asheville and offers unparalleled, miles-long panoramic views from every room. It features 5k sqft, 7 BR with 5 showers and 4 toilets, a big sauna with views, steam room, cold plunge, infinity pool, hot tub, fire pit, 2 jacuzzis, a massive game room, and 360mb/s internet. It has massive wrap around decks and sits on an acre of land, which features a private, flat, fully fenced backyard with a lot of privacy and outdoor space.

name: Entire home - yours in Asheville
description:
Comfortable uncluttered stylish whole home on a large private landscaped lot in a quiet neighborhood. Just a few minutes drive to fine restaurants, a lake and sanctuary for an easy walk around in an hour - downtown venues, shopping, the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Folks Art Center, hiking and vistas.
Comfortable linens, newer mattresses, new sofa, dishwasher, fridge, stove and bathroom fixtures. Eat in or eat out. AND we welcome you to enjoy our meadow, fire pit and creek across the street.

name: Cabin, Hot Tub, Fire Pit, 4 miles to Downtown AVL
description: Surrounded by woods, yet perfectly situated 4 miles from Downtown Asheville or the River Arts District, 2 miles from New Belgium Brewery and 5 miles to the Biltmore, this rural setting allows you to be close to everything while feeling miles away. This brand new, light and lofty cabin offers a peaceful retreat with a large, covered deck overlooking the woods. Enjoy the hot tub, as well as a fire pit, picnic table and hammock.

name: Dog Friendly, Hot Tub & Fire Pit
description:
This 1920's Tudor home sits on 9 acres of rolling pastoral land!

Enjoy the spectacular private backyard:
- Hot tub & fire pit
- Yard games
- Blackstone grill & more

Home includes:
- Smart TVs (sign into your streaming accounts)
- Washer/dryer
- High speed Wifi
- Desk for remote working
- Central AC/heat

Conveniently located only 15 minutes from downtown AVL & Biltmore Estate. Our home will have varying levels of road noise due to it's proximity to I-40.

name: River City Oasis
description: Right on the French Broad River, in a peaceful and relaxing setting, this special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. Close to I-26, the AVL airport, shopping and restaurants.

name: Robins Nest—AVL/Biltmore—fp—ct bkfst—hot tub
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Erwin Hills Mansion
description:
April 2024 Update: We had an unfortunate fire incident at the property and currently not taking bookings until we get a better idea of when we will be accepting bookings again.

Please check out this alternate property for your large groups and families needs. Mention Erwin Hills and our friends have agreed to give 10% off for all bookings.
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1127712875336320928

name: Bright and Cozy Asheville Home
description: Escape from reality in our homey oasis with the entire family or with some friends! The home is tucked away in a quaint neighborhood conveniently located less than 15 minutes from all the big attractions Asheville has to offer–downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, the French Broad River, the Biltmore, and more. Relax inside the bright, open, inviting home and play some games or grill some food on the deck while enjoying the breathtaking view of the mountains!

name: King bed, 5 min to Airport, pool table, fire pit
description: Discover a chic oasis in Fletcher, North Carolina, capable of welcoming up to 13 guests. Our 4 bedroom, 2 bath sanctuary, just 5-minutes from Asheville Regional Airport, is beautifully designed for relaxation, entertainment, and creating memories. Enjoy a game room, vibrant local attractions, and a pet-friendly space, all in the heart of Western NC.

name: Travelers Rest
description: This  home has it all. Enjoy a peaceful day at home by the pond, listening to the nearby creek. Or, enjoy any number of adventures at your doorstep. We are minutes away from the Bent Creek trail systems, the arboretum, and Blue Ridge Parkway. There is also easy access to Pisgah National Forest, and Sierra Nevada Brewing Company. Come and enjoy serenity in the city of Asheville.

name: Mount Carmel Estate
description: Bring the whole family to Mount Carmel Estate with lots of room for fun. 3 minutes away from the grocery store and pharmacy. Less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Beautiful outdoors to run around. Back patio with a grill and jacuzzi. 75inch tv in living room. Bunk bed room with a basket of toys. And more :)

name: Historic Montford, 2 blocks from downtown
description:
Great location - 2 blocks from downtown Asheville restaurants and shops - Quiet, safe and walkable neighborhood! Off-street parking (1 car).
Pet Friendly. Perfect for a traveling nurse, corporate rental or transition home for moving. Monthly rentals only.

name: Hot Tub Arcade 10 min to Sierra Nevada & AVL
description: Welcome to AeroBrew Oasis, a luxurious home nestled in the heart of Arden, North Carolina. As your host Carter, I'm excited to share this picturesque haven that offers a super convenient location. Discover why our guests love the private hot tub under the starry sky.

name: Comfortable 1BR/1BA apt home near asheville
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.  This lovely and well appointed apartment home is located within a few miles from downtown Asheville and just around the corner from Biltmore Park Town Square where you will find loads of shopping, restaurants and entertainment.  The property is well maintained and you will have unlimited access to all the properties resort amenities such as a fitness center, pool, outdoor grilling station, hot tub and clubhouse.  Come, stay and enjoy!

name: Mntn View, Hot Tub, Arcade, Yoga
description:
HELENE UPDATE - Our home is SAFE and has power and clean water 🙌🏼


We know you'll love this spacious, incredible home with gorgeous views and 6-star hospitality!
- 5000sq ft home on 2 private acres
- 2 Large private decks with mountain views
- Newly renovated master bath
- Hot tub & Game room
- 5 min to downtown Asheville
- Yoga studio

name: Amazing West Asheville Property
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. This complete home in an ideal Asheville neighborhood offers some uncommon amenities like room to breathe in such close proximity to downtown as well as West Asheville. Resort luxuries in a private setting unique to this property would include a large in ground swimming pool (seasonal), and year round five person jacuzzi. Professionally designed and selectively decorated, the attention to detail can be seen in each space.

name: East Asheville Private Entrance
description:
Enjoy a getaway in our Private Entrance Basement space located in East Asheville. Easily access all things that make this area great.
<5 minutes to Biltmore Village, multiple great breweries including Highlands, Blue Ridge Parkway Access
<10 minutes to Downtown Asheville/South Slope

You will have access to free parking, private entrance, your own bedroom, bathroom and living room space with a kitchenette. Comfortably sleeps 2. Air mattress can be provided to sleep 4.

name: Update: Luxury Estate in Asheville
description:
UPDATE: We are currently renovating and updating our home to bring you the best experience in Asheville. Our upper floors are currently shut off, however our lower level is available. The lower level offers 2 bedrooms with king beds, 2 1/2 bathrooms, a full kitchen, laundry room, outdoor area with a BBQ and fire pit.
Located minutes from downtown Asheville and the breathtaking Blue Ridge Parkway, this estate is the perfect get away for any vacation without being far from the action.

name: Couples getaway with hot tub/firepit
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. Welcome to our cozy home by the creek! If you're looking for a romantic getaway then this is your place!

The house is located seven miles from downtown Asheville, where you'll find delicious restaurants, numerous craft breweries, unique art, museums, and more.

The house is located 0.8 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and the area is rich with wildlife. Our most common visitors are black bears. The space is completely private.

name: Safe quite mountain get away
description:
Although Asheville and surrounding areas have faced a natural disaster, we are coming out stronger. This rental did not experience any flood damage and operates on a well, so the water is safe. 11/18/24 and Asheville has lifted the boil water notice and all water is safe!!

Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Quite mountain get away all while being moments away from all Asheville and Waynesville have to offer.

name: SALE! Views! Game Room! HotTub! Near Town! Slps 22
description: Welcome to our opulent retreat with breathtaking MOUNTAIN VIEWS, only 15 mins to downtown Asheville! This sprawling estate boasts 6 brms, 5.5 baths, and slps 22 guests comfortably! Indulge in luxury mesmerized by custom mural art at every turn. There's fun for all guests!  Relax and melt off stress in the hot tub, enjoy the amazing mountain views, or escape to the downstairs custom movie THEATER and GAME room! The Alpine Artistry Estate promises an unforgettable getaway for families and friends!

name: Historic Montford Collins house c. 1893
description: Stroll, Laze, Explore Asheville all within minutes of downtown.. This completely renovated 1893 house is sited atop a knoll overlooking one of the main tree-lined streets of the  Montford neighborhood.  Visitors have  a winter mountain view: pure greenery in the summer.  You will be lost in birdsong in the early mornings and can watch the foot traffic go by from the complete privacy of the front porch sitting area.  Be anywhere in downtown within 15 minutes by foot, bike or car.

name: W Avl Abode
description: You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay.

name: Rosie by CM | Chef's Kitchen & Cornhole
description: Refresh your mind, body, and soul at Rosie! Only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, this one-level abode will make you smile with whimsical decor and a relaxed vibe. Sit back on the colorful couches and watch a movie or play a game of foosball in the den (games for all ages are provided).

name: The Woods at Richmond Ridge
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Bordered by woods and adjacent to Richmond Hill Park, this peaceful retreat is only 12 minutes from Downtown Asheville and less than 10 minutes from the River Arts District. Between exploring all that Asheville has to offer, enjoy a brand new modern house, comfortable beds, and a huge deck looking out on the woods. Well behaved dogs are welcome.

name: Panoramic Mountain View, Hot Tub,Close to Downtown
description: Perched among the beautiful tree canopies and surrounded by the rolling expanse of the Blue Ridge Mountains, this 4 bedroom 3 ½ bath home is the embodiment of mountain luxury combined with the convenience of city life, a mere 10 minutes away from bustling downtown Asheville.

name: Casa Grada by AvantStay | Loft-Style Group Retreat
description:
- Industrial-chic loft-style design
- Deck with an al fresco dining area and a BBQ grill
- Large firepit lounge on the lawn
- Four comfortable bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms
- Fully equipped kitchen + in-home washer and dryer
- 15-minute drive to central Asheville

name: Gorgeous Asheville Home - 6 Miles to Downtown!
description: A relaxing, rejuvenating trip to the Blue Ridge Mountains awaits at this beautiful home in Asheville! This 3-bedroom, 2.5 - bathroom vacation rental provides a secluded, private feel along with a convenient location just minutes from Downtown Asheville. Visit the Biltmore Estate, try out local breweries, explore nearby trails, or take a drive along Blue Ridge Parkway. After a fun-filled day, head back to play a game of foosball, grill up some dinner, and sit around the fire pit with loved ones!

name: FrenchBroad R&R Suite
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located place, only 10 min from downtown Asheville. Beautifully designed and thoughtfully equipped with everything you may need for comfortable stay. Open plan living space with queen size bed and area to prepare some meals with river view. Separate bathroom and an adjacent laundry area with all the essentials.

name: Cozy Asheville Getaway w HotTub 8 min to downtown!
description: Family trip? Friends getaway? Bring everyone to our cozy and private home that we personally enjoyed for many years! Located in a quiet neighborhood, it's clean, spacious and close to everything with downtown Asheville just 8 min away, Black Mountain 15 min and the Blue Ridge Parkway right next door! Endless hiking, mountain biking, great eats, breweries, shopping and lots of entertainment really close! Great flat yard for kids to play with a big patio, hammock, fire pit and brand new hot tub!

name: Asheville Acres by CM | Gas Grill & Cozy Hot Tub
description: Leave your worries at home and discover the peaceful tranquility of Asheville Acres. Located just west of downtown Asheville, this is the best of both worlds! Enjoy the ease of food deliveries and rideshares, while you also get a dose of country living with mountain views, a hot tub, and a huge property to explore.

name: Comfy Style - Hot Tub & Fire Pit
description:
We welcome you to this comfortable and stylish sanctuary that can accommodate both larger and smaller groups. Unwind in the luxury of two king-sized beds plus an additional five beds for 11 guests total.
Relax in the private hot tub, and enjoy the crackling fire pit. Fun for all with the air hockey table and board games. The home is full featured and conveniently located to the The vibrant energy of Asheville and the surrounding adventures.

name: Sage Lodge by AvantStay | 15 Min to Downtown
description:
- 15 minutes from Downtown Asheville
- Spacious deck with an outdoor dining area and grill
- Charming front porch with seating
- Timeless design throughout the home
- Living room, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen
- Three bedrooms and two full bathrooms

name: CozyEscape: Hot Tub,Fireplace, Firepit, Sleeps 14!
description: Embark on a family-friendly adventure at this spacious retreat near Asheville, North Carolina! With 4 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, and additional space for the whole family, including bunk beds, and a recreational room, this haven is perfect for gatherings. Discover the charm of a stone fireplace, a refreshing pool (open June through August), and various outdoor sitting areas including a firepit!

name: Modern home, private getaway
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: 1906 Eclectic Escape – 5 Mins to Downtown AVL
description: Delightful, vibrant, updated home with unique charm, located on a lively street in the heart of Asheville. Built in 1906, this inviting space blends seamlessly into the city’s creative vibe. Ideally situated near all the area’s attractions — 5 minutes to downtown and West Asheville, 3 minutes to the River Arts District, 10 minutes to the Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn or Blue Ridge Parkway, and 20 minutes to the airport. Features a cozy hot tub and parking for up to 5 cars.

name: Fern Creek Cottage
description: Enjoy a peaceful and relaxing stay at this cozy and charming cottage. You’ll be close to all the attractions and activities that Asheville and Hendersonville offer, including the Asheville Airport, Sierra Nevada, hiking, biking, Blue Ridge Parkway, and Biltmore House.

name: The Asheville White House
description: 9 min from downtown Asheville/8 min Art District/6 min from West Asheville, this newly renovated 6000+ SF house with 9 beds sits on an acre & sleeps 16+ comfortably. Complete with a sauna, hot tub, outdoor firepit, pool table, 2 TV rooms, fully stocked kitchen, ample parking, and a washer/2 dryers.  Perfect for bachelor/bachelorette groups, as well as families. One block outside of Asheville's restrictions this house can accommodate large groups with quick access to all Asheville has to offer.

name: The Pet Friendly - Berne Chalet
description: Kick back and relax in this newly updated 3/2 vacation rental tucked in the tree tops and just 5 minutes from the middle of Asheville!  It is a 2-story duplex, the Upper Berne is a 2/1 open floor plan.  The Lower Berne is a 1 bed/1 bath with a screened in porch for warm weather and a fenced-in yard for pets. Each unit has its own fully stocked kitchen and entrance. This listing is for the entire Full Berne (Upper & Lower units) There is not an interior door connecting the two units.

name: Cedar Hill-KING Bed-Hot Tub-LOFT
description: ‼️POWER/WATER AVAILABLE BOIL WATER ADVISORY FOR CITY OF ASHEVILLE‼️Come relax and unwind in this romantic Cedar Escape!

name: Downtown Asheville Hidden Gem+FREE On-Site Parking
description: Downtown Avl-Live Like A Local @ DTAshevilleHiddenGem; a 2-Room 390sq ft studio (avg hotel 325sq ft)+ON-SITE PARKING INCLUDED ($20-$30/day @ garage/hotels).  NO HIDDEN FEES in our $$ like most listings. Chic, minimalist mid-century modern decor and monochrome photography will transpose you back to a time when Asheville was just a Hidden Gem in the mountains.  Come stay, park and walk to EVERYTHING downtown offers. Use the studio's kitchen tabletop 30"x42" downtown street map to plan your route.

name: Mtn View/Firepit/Pet Friendly/20 Mins To Asheville
description:
Welcome to our beautiful family-friendly home just a stone’s throw away from downtown Asheville’s social scene! Nestled in a safe and quiet neighborhood, our property offers the perfect blend of relaxation and accessibility to the city’s charm and close outdoor adventure. After exploring the area come relax around the fire pit, play in the fenced yard, or enjoy the mountain view with family on our spacious deck! We love hosting families or groups of friends
coming to enjoy a relaxing atmosphere!

name: Jack & Jill suite, 2 hot tubs+ pool
description: Elegant 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom residence with  a beautiful seasonal pool, two hot tubs that are always ready to use, a ping pong table and more. Live like a local! Our home is nestled in a small and quiet neighborhood with only a 15-minute drive to Downtown Asheville.

name: "Magical, One of a Kind" Mirror House + Hot Tub
description: The glistening jewel of Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains. This brand-new, mirror house blends luxury, modern architecture, and the beauty of the mountains. Ideal for a romantic getaway or small gathering, offering sophisticated style and luxurious comforts. Located just 3 miles to the heart of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway. After a full day of Asheville adventures return to the mountaintop to catch the sunset, cozy up by the fire and enjoy the hot tub under the stars.

name: Asheville Gem Close to Downtown - Large Studio Apt
description: Spacious (630sf) one bedroom studio apartment that is walking distance (.7 miles) to downtown Asheville and only 1.2 miles from Mission Hospital. Located on a quiet street with free on street parking in front of the unit.  There is a local bus stop across the street for those that need public transportation. This unit is located on a property with 2 other units that all have private and separate entrances.  The apartment is fully furnished with a turn key kitchen that features all appliances.

name: Asheville Gem close to town - Large One Bedroom
description: Private 1 BR apartment that is .7 mi from downtown and only 1.2 miles to Mission Hospital.  Located on a quiet street with free off-street parking included. Very spacious with a turnkey full kitchen that has all appliances and a W/D on site. There are 2 other units on this property each with their own private entrances. Local ordinances require a minimum 30 day stay at this location. There is a bus stop with public transportation across the street and a park within a block from the apartment .

name: Asheville Gem close to downtown - Small Studio.
description: Spacious (450sf) one bedroom studio apartment that is walking distance (.7 miles) to downtown Asheville and only 1.2 miles from Mission Hospital. Located on a quiet street with free on street parking in front of the unit. There is a local bus stop across the street for those that need public transportation.  The apartment is fully furnished with a small kitchen that includes a refrigerator, microwave and induction cooktop as well as dishes, silverware, pots and pans.

name: Asheville Charm 2 bedroom 2 bath
description: Brand New 2 bedroom 2 bathroom 12 foot ceilings.Wood floors,Stainless appliances.Fully furnished.Great internet.Close to Groceries,Breweries,5 minute to Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville.5 Minute to mtn biking,hiking,and tubing.

name: Entire House! Hot Tub. Firepit.
description:
Kick back and relax in this cozy and stylish space!
Things we love about this house:
- The house is centrally located however off the main road on a private 3/4 acre lot surrounded by woods. Enjoy privacy and comfort while being close to everything.
- Hot tub
- Screened in porch with grill and comfy furniture.
- Large backyard with outdoor fireplace.
-Garage space available for storing anything you need.
- Designated office with high speed internet!

name: The SKY Box
description: SUNSET Views year round! Feels like you are floating in the clouds while also a 5 min drive to downtown Asheville. Newly renovated mid-century modern mountain oasis. Nature all around: red tail hawks, black bear, wild turkey, white squirrels, and a wide variety of birds to be seen from all windows. There is beautiful nature walking all around the neighborhood;  peaceful and quiet location in a mountain neighborhood that has close access to the city, making the SKY BOX  an ideal location!

name: Cozy west side suite
description: This simple yet stylish suite is the perfect home base as you explore Asheville and surrounding areas. Located in Candler, five miles from the heart of West Asheville. Six miles to downtown. Pet friendly with private patio and fenced yard. Enjoy a comfortable stay at the cozy west side suite!

name: Hot tub & fire pit, fenced yard, 7 mi to Downtown
description: Experience Asheville's seamless blend of nature and city living at our plush 2-bedroom, pet-friendly cottage. Luxuriate with amenities like a hot tub and fire pit, and be moments away from attractions like the Biltmore and Haw Creek Valley Overlook. Whether you're a group of friends, family, or remote workers looking for a refreshing change of scenery, our cottage is your perfect Asheville sanctuary.

name: Pet-Friendly Fletcher Home - 13 Mi to Asheville!
description: Your next memorable North Carolina retreat awaits at this 3-bed, 2-bath Fletcher vacation rental! Perfect for nature enthusiasts and fun-loving groups alike, this home in the ‘Land of Waterfalls’ features 3 flat-screen TVs, a fully stocked kitchen, and access to the area’s top attractions. Enjoy a morning hike to Looking Glass Falls or Sliding Rock, then head to Asheville and explore the River Arts District! When you’re ready to unwind, gather around the fire pit for stargazing and s’mores.

name: The “Round House”
description:
The “Round House” provides modern country living with easy city access.

This contemporary rondette home provides spectacular seasonal views of the surrounding mountains, easy access to dining, hiking and beautiful scenic drives.

name: Minute to Asheville airport and Ag center
description: Great Location! No more than 20 minutes to Asheville and Hendersonville. 1 min from airport and Ag Center.  15 min to Biltmore. 10 minutes to Sierra Brewing Company.  Just a short drive to Dupont Forest in Brevard where you will find the most beautiful waterfalls Western North Carolina has to offer also rent a bike and enjoy all the trails. We are in a quiet safe neighborhood at the end of cul-de-sac.  Estate. Enjoy our beautiful garden with pond and day bed swing with twinkling lights above.

name: Your Downtown Oasis Awaits
description: This centrally located modern home is walking distance to all downtown Asheville has to offer.  Park the car and walk to restaurants, shopping, and entertainment.  Only a short stroll to downtown center, River Arts, minutes to Biltmore Village, and easy access to I-26 and I-40.  This 1920's home has been restored with your comfort in mind.  Enjoy the fenced in back yard.  Security cams are also in place for added peace of mind.  Perfect for your temporary home.

name: Asheville Sunset Vista 10 min to downtown!
description: After some post-hurricane repairs, our special place is welcoming visitors on the weekends through April and fully open starting in May! We have missed our guests and welcome you back to Sunset Vista!This charming 1960s home in Asheville has stunning mountain views and is perfect for the whole family, couples, and friend groups (Pets included!) With a fully equipped kitchen, indoor and outdoor dining, smart TV, and fireplace, you'll find our place to be your perfect home away from home.

name: Big Mountain Vista House AVL! Pet Friendly
description: Welcome to the Big Mountain Vista in Asheville! This spacious home sleeps up to 12 and is only 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, making it the perfect location for all of your friend and family gatherings. This unique home boasts 2 decks with stunning mountain views, a fully equipped kitchen, plenty of seating and parking, and a great layout. NEW gas fire pit on the patio, updated cooking basics, and plenty of space to unwind overlooking some of the best views in Asheville!

name: Modern Asheville Oasis
description: Welcome to your private retreat just minutes from downtown Asheville! Nestled in the heart of the vibrant city, our modern Scandinavian-styled home offers a unique blend of comfort, sustainability, and sleek design. With a spacious bedroom, living space, dining area, and bathroom you will enjoy a bright light modern design. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. More photos coming soon!

name: Close to downtown Asheville
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.2 Bedroom 2 bathroom NEW Construction 1000 sq feet.  12 foot ceilings,wood floors,stainless appliances,granite countertops.7 minutes to downtown Asheville.Close to hiking, biking,appalachian  trail.Biltmore Estate  is 6 minutes away.

name: Hygge on Harrison by CM| Dog-Friendly in Asheville
description: Perfect for staying a while, Hygge on Harrison offers a comfortable, convenient, and delightfully functional long-term rental in the heart of downtown Asheville. This custom JAG construction has achieved a splendid level of "hygge" (pronounced hyoo-gah, definition: “creating a warm atmosphere and enjoying the good things in life with good people”).

name: 3BR *Dog Friendly* Hot Tub*
description:
Brand new home featuring everything you need for a family vacation.

We are only 3 miles from Biltmore Park.

We are less than 5 miles to the Asheville Airport and Sierra Nevada.

Access to the French Broad is only 3.5 miles away.

Our house is only 14 miles from downtown Asheville.

The Biltmore Estate is 13 miles from the house.

name: Tranquil Downtown Retreat
description:
Welcome to our cherished home in the heart of Asheville! This charming, historic mid-century bungalow offers a unique blend of vintage charm and modern comfort.

Just a short walk to downtown, you'll have easy access to the city's renowned dining, shopping, and cultural experiences. Plus, the Blue Ridge Parkway is only minutes away for those who love scenic drives and outdoor adventures.

name: Walkable Haven: Perfect for Remote Work!
description: In Asheville's most walkable neighborhood, this bright, beautiful townhome is furnished with modern amenities for remote workers, a fully appointed kitchen, and luxury beds for the perfect rest. Wake up and take a 2-minute walk to the Owl Bakery for some great coffee and pastries! Walk across the street for a swim at the JCC pool. Walk to the botanical gardens for a lovely picnic. Walk downtown for world-class, shopping, meals and entertainment options.

name: West Asheville Artist Cottage
description: Welcome to your ideal home in the heart of West Asheville! This charming cottage, nestled in a serene and walkable neighborhood, epitomizes the Asheville experience. A short stroll will lead you to the best local restaurants, coffee shops, and bars, making West Asheville the preferred choice for those in the know. Additionally, Mission Hospital is conveniently just a 7-minute drive away.

name: 5 Minutes to Biltmore - Blue Ridge Guest House
description: Welcome to our cozy Asheville guest house! Just minutes from downtown, our one-bedroom guest house offers easy access to attractions like the Blue Ridge Parkway and Biltmore Estate. Ideal for solo adventurers or couples, enjoy amenities like a memory foam queen-size bed, dedicated workspace, and fully stocked bathroom. Every piece of furniture is handpicked to create a warm, inviting atmosphere. Your perfect home away from home in Asheville awaits!

name: 15 mins to DT Asheville Pool Hot Tub Game Room
description:
This cozy house comfortably sleeps up to 14 in the heart of Asheville has EVERYTHING you need for a fun getaway including some unique amenities...

•Hot Tub
•In ground Pool! Available May-Sept
•Fire pit/seating
•Movie Theater
•Pool Table
•Ping Pong
•Gym
•15 mins to Asheville
•High Speed WiFi
•Family Friendly- Pack N Play and high chair

name: Riverside Trade Retreat | AvantStay | Modern-Chic
description:
- Conveniently located just 7 minutes from Downtown Asheville, offering easy access to the city's vibrant offerings
- Industrial masterpiece features a charming brick exterior, setting the tone for a unique and stylish experience
- Curated decor and chic design converge in this boutique-style sanctuary
- Terrace with seating, a grill, and outdoor dining space, along with additional seating on the front porch
- Fully equipped kitchen, in-home laundry, parking for 2 cars
- Clawfoot bathtubs

name: Adorable Cozy Mountain Home
New Gorgeous Home Walk Downtown!
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

Walk downtown, to coffee shops, restaurants, bakeries, and live music venues.

Quick access to highways and can drive to amazing hiking within minutes.

Up to 2 dogs welcome with pet fee.

Separate basement apartment with separate tenant downstairs (separate entrance) which is not part of rental.

name: Asheville Boho Fall Foliage Retreat
description: Your Asheville sanctuary, a cozy retreat nestled in our home's finished basement with stunning mountain views. This space boasts a fully stocked kitchenette, two plush queen beds, and a spacious living area for ultimate comfort and relaxation. Enjoy the great outdoors in our inviting backyard. Conveniently located just 10 minutes from the airport and 15 minutes from downtown Asheville, ideal for both exploration and tranquility. Experience the best of both worlds in this serene mountain getaway.

name: Peak a View by CM | Mountain Views Near Asheville
description: Peak A View is your own private estate only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville! Boasting year-round, long-range mountain views worthy of its clever name, this three-story gem sits atop a ridge in East Asheville and offers a convenient location and a paved driveway for easy access.

name: Contemporary Vibes | Hot Tub Fire Pit  15 to AVL
description:
Escape to our contemporary tiny home, a chic retreat just 15-minutes from downtown AVL. This modern haven boasts high-end finishes, including a stylish kitchen and designer touches. Experience the blend of comfort and convenience in style while exploring Asheville's vibrant culture and natural beauty.

✔ Modern Kitchen & High-End Appliances
✔ Stylish Living Area & Cozy Furnishings
✔ Tranquil Bedroom Retreat for Restful Sleep
✔ Sleek Bathroom & Luxury Amenities
✔ Hot Tub and Fire Pit for Relaxing

name: Kasa | Deluxe Suite in Downtown | Asheville
description: Experience the blend of vibrant city life and Kasa's signature comfort in our downtown Asheville property. Stroll through charming streets, explore historic homes, and indulge in various shops, eateries, and cultural attractions nearby. Our cozy accommodations ensure a memorable stay for both business and leisure travelers. Our tech-enabled apartments offer self check-in at 4pm, 24/7 guest support by text, phone, or chat, and a Virtual Front Desk accessed via mobile device.

name: Asheville Haven < 2 Mi to Biltmore & Downtown
description: Experience the charm and history of Asheville, North Carolina, from this wonderful vacation rental. Offering 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and ample modern comforts, this pet-friendly home makes for the perfect extended getaway in North Carolina. The house features staples such as a full kitchen with a dishwasher, coffee maker, and more. Easily access top attractions like Biltmore Estate from this home, or venture off to one of the many wineries, breweries, and orchards that Asheville has to offer.

name: Spacious Creekside Retreat, Hot Tub, Games, 12+ppl
description:
Relax, recharge & entertain in style at this spacious, newly renovated 5BR Asheville home. Perfect for families, groups, or bachelorettes w/2 kitchens, 2 living rooms, indoor fireplaces & a screened-in deck. Enjoy the 6-person hot tub, outdoor fire pit, games, & a wooded backyard with a year-round creek. Quality linens, memory foam beds & stylish decor throughout. Quiet, safe neighborhood close to shops, restaurants & nature.
