name: Kasa | King Suite Near the Biltmore | Asheville
description: Experience the blend of vibrant city life and Kasa's signature comfort in our downtown Asheville property. Stroll through charming streets, explore historic homes, and indulge in various shops, eateries, and cultural attractions nearby. Our cozy accommodations ensure a memorable stay for both business and leisure travelers. Our tech-enabled apartments offer self check-in at 4pm, 24/7 guest support by text, phone, or chat, and a Virtual Front Desk accessed via mobile device.

name: Caribou Retreat
description: This cute and cozy studio appt is close to everything in Asheville. Only 1.5 miles to Biltmore Village, Biltmore Estate and Hillman brewing. We have a storage building that can be used to store any outdoors items like a Kayak. This is a duplex with 2 apartments. You have you own entrance and parking in the back. The other tenant has private entrance in the front with parking in the front and under carport.  You will enjoy this quiet and private location. Sorry, no pets allowed.

name: Pet, King Bed, Fire Pit, Grill, Close to Asheville
description:
Helene Update:
Our house is back to normal after the storm.

Relax with the whole family at this home away from home. Located in a quite established residential area that is only 12 minutes from Asheville downtown. 3 minutes to I-40 (at exit 44).
Everything just as if you were at home, including
★Automatic Espresso Machine
★Coffee
★Tea and Tea Kettle
★Fully Equipped Kitchen
★Laundry
★Grill
★Wifi
★TV
★Fire Pit
★Kind Bed

name: Sunny Cabin 3 miles from downtown Asheville, WiFi
description:
This custom crafted, remodeled canin is minutes from downtown Asheville. It features a rustic, scandi design and an open floor plan great for socializing.

A front deck and a covered back patio offer multiple options for outside dining. Enjoy sunset on the deck, and sunrise on the patio. The open kitchen with gas range is great for cooking meals at home. Downtown Asheville is 3 miles away!

You will have the entire home to yourself. Welcome!

name: Park View at Richmond Ridge
description: Peace out in the woods close to everything! With an entrance drive through the park and a deck that looks out on the back corner of Richmond Hill Park, this peaceful retreat is only 12 minutes from Downtown Asheville and less than 10 minutes from the River Arts District. Between exploring all that Asheville has to offer, enjoy a brand new modern house, comfortable beds, and all the comforts of home. Well behaved dogs are welcome.

name: River Rock Cabin, Game Room, 12 mins. to Downtown
description:
Welcome to your sanctuary on the Swannanoa River!

River Rock Cabin has been designed with attention to every detail to make your vacation experience a feast for the senses. A true mountain cabin, with luxury amenities and a magical river backdrop!

name: Serene studio in West Asheville
description:
Spacious, quiet artist's studio with private entrance and porch overlooking a garden. The home is a quick walk to downtown West Asheville, in the historic Burton Street Community. The space is newly renovated, with a large living space and kitchen. Comes with a dedicated parking space and high speed WiFi.

Entrance is around the back of the house, with steps down from the street and up onto the private porch.

name: Mountain View Duplex
description: Welcome to our cozy retreat nestled in Fletcher, NC! Our suite offers 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and a comfortable living space perfect for solo travelers/couples/families.

name: 'City Serenity' Apt: 1 Mi to Downtown Asheville!
description: Convenience is king here at 'City Serenity,' a cozy 2-bed, 1-bath apartment that lies just steps from it all, yet feels worlds away. Embrace your inner explorer with a walk to local shops, restaurants, parks, and galleries, or make the ultra-simple ride into the hustle and bustle of downtown. Get lost in the beauty of the Biltmore Estate, or wander the breathtaking peaks and valleys of the Pisgah National Forest. Ideally fit for friends or couples, this charming vacation rental is one-of-a-kind!

name: Charming Asheville Pied-à-Terre
description:
Perfect launching point for all Asheville and surrounding areas have to offer. Built in 2001, this small bungalow is well designed and efficient, sleeps up to 4-
5 comfortably. Two queen bedrooms, one with a twin trundle. There are 1.5 bathrooms and a full pull-out bed in the living room. Kitchen stocked with coffee and tea. Four cars fit tandem in parking pad in front of house. Can relax on the back porch in the morning and at the end of the day to the sound of Lees Creek.

name: Luxury Cabins Near Downtown
description: Welcome to Kindling Cabins where the whole group can relax while being only 5 miles to downtown! Surrounded by 4 wooded acres, yet minutes away from the best breweries, restaurants and shopping Asheville has to offer. You won't find this much space this close to town anywhere else. Two adjacent cabins on the property allow time together in spacious common areas but separate quarters for rest. These cabins bring together the mountain's historic charm with modern amenities and style.

name: Beorn's Retreat | for Nomads + Adventurers
description: Natural living plus all the convenience of town -- our lush, quiet neighborhood is just minutes by car from downtown, the Biltmore Estate, and West Asheville and walkable to UNCA + urban trails. Relax in the cozy bedroom with a king-size bed and big flatscreen TV or unwind on the pullout queen in the lounge. Ideal for digital nomads and pet lovers with great wifi and a private yard. Enjoy the single-level layout, fragrance-free cleaning standards, cotton linens, full kitchen & ample storage.

name: Asheville Family Home | Hot tub, Gameroom, Firepit
description:
Welcome to our spacious 4-bedroom retreat, just 20 minutes from downtown Asheville and 15 minutes from the airport and Biltmore Village! 🌿✨ Asheville is back in business after the hurricane—restaurants, breweries, and The Biltmore are lively and ready to welcome you! Relax in the hot tub, gather around the firepit, or enjoy the game room.

Perfect for families and friends, with a play area for little ones and plenty of space to unwind!

name: Both Units! - 12 BR, 8 BA, Game Rms, Grill, Decks
description: This listing is TWO spacious homes next door to each other! There will be plenty of space for everyone in your group! 12 bedrooms, 8 full bathrooms, 4 living rooms. Enjoy the two game rooms, sit by the cozy fireplaces or relax in the hammocks on one of the two 40' covered porches. Guests love our attention to detail, sparkling cleanliness and exceptional service. Located minutes from Asheville Airport, WNC Ag Center and breweries. Easy drive to Biltmore, hiking & downtown Asheville.

name: Massive Mountain Retreat | 12 Mi to Asheville
description: Nine Peaks Asheville is a huge 4600 sq ft mountain retreat, ideal for large families, reunions, retreats, and group trips. It boasts 2 living rooms, 2 kitchens, 5 king beds and 2 queen sleeper sofas (w/ high density foam mattresses). Downtown Asheville, the Biltmore, hiking, and great restaurants are all within 20 minutes! Wake up to the sunset on the huge two level deck with incredible views. It's the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and natural beauty to ensure unforgettable memories.

name: Firefly House w/fire pit, office, Biltmore pass
description: Nestled just 12 minutes from downtown Asheville, The Firefly House is where you 'll find the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure amidst the charm of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Whether you're with family or friends, this comfortable retreat ensures cherished memories filled with laughter, togetherness, and fun. FREE activities for stays under 29 nights, including Biltmore, Rock Wall, Zipline, Whitewater Rafting, Trampoline Park, Snow Tubing and Axe Throwing.

name: Charming Asheville Retreat with Fire Pit
description:
Welcome to your perfect Asheville getaway!

- Charming 2-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental with 2,175 sq ft of space.
- Explore nearby iconic attractions like the Biltmore Estate and Blue Ridge Parkway.
- Cozy living areas with smart TVs, fireplace, and board games.
- Enjoy evenings around the fire pit with wood provided.
- Fully equipped kitchen and dining area for family gatherings.
- Fenced yard, gas grill, and pet-friendly.

name: Quiet House in The Woods - Right in Town
description:
Welcome to our charming 1200 square foot retreat nestled in the woods of Asheville, NC. Our beautiful home promises an lovely stay, combining comfort, style, and an unbeatable location.

Small dogs under 30lbs are allowed.

name: Modern Charm house in Asheville
description:
Experience the comfort and style of this newly renovated centrally-located house in the charming city of Asheville, North Carolina. With its modern design and comfortable spaces, this 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home is the perfect retreat for your stay.
Conveniently located within walking distance of stores and restaurants, this house allows you to easily explore the surrounding area and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere of Asheville.

name: Dream Home East Asheville
description:
Welcome to our enchanting BOHO Asheville Homestead, a tranquil retreat nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. This meticulously designed home invites you to experience the eclectic charm and relaxed elegance of bohemian living, complemented by modern comforts and a touch of rustic allure.

The outdoor yard offers a hot tub, where you can soak under the stars, enveloped by the soothing sounds of nature.

name: 5-bedroom Lux Home | Walk to Biltmore Village
description: Luxury and convenience await you! This new 5-bedroom, 3-full bath home offers everything you need for a wonderful Asheville experience. Enjoy spacious living, a gourmet kitchen, mountain views, and a prime location near Biltmore Village and downtown. Perfect for families and groups – and we're very pet friendly (dogs & cats)!

name: Black Bear 2
description: 2 queen beds, 1 pull out single bed. 2 separate bedrooms with shared sitting room and private entrance. No cleaning fee. Quiet neighborhood. Enjoy a peaceful quiet 100 year old house. 3 miles to downtown. Easy access to the high way. Kitchenette  with microwave  Mini fridge and Keurig coffee.

name: Farm Suite-Sauna, hot tub, King bed, jacuzzi tub
description: This romantic farm suite in Asheville, North Carolina, offers a unique retreat for couples or solo travelers. Bathe in luxury with a jacuzzi and custom-built sauna, or curl up with a book in hand beside the indoor fireplace. Surrounded by a pastoral setting, this farm stay offers a tranquil escape yet is just minutes from key attractions like Biltmore Estate and Asheville Botanical Garden.

name: Cozy A Frame 15 min to Asheville | Hot Tub & Games
description: Daltun's Ranch A Frame is a tucked away, peaceful gem yet in an unbeatable Asheville location. Blue Ridge Parkway, the North Carolina Arboretum, and French Broad River Tubing are all within 1 mile. Less than 15 minutes and you'll be in downtown Asheville with incredible food, drinks, and shopping. This unique getaway is the perfect launching point to all that Asheville has to offer, but also such a cozy space you may not want to leave - highlighted by a hot tub and game room.

name: Charming Farm House
description: Located in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains where you'll only be 5 minutes from the vibrant West Asheville bars and restaurants and a short 10 minute drive from the city center of downtown. It is steeped in rich history dating back to 1914 when it was originally built by hand by the great-grandfather of the current owners using rocks found on the property. Once a flourishing tobacco farm, it has been lovingly preserved and offers a delightful blend of vintage charm and modern comforts.

name: Two Spacious Living Areas | Modern & Stylish Haven
description:
⋆ 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms
⋆ 2 comfortable living areas
⋆ Stylish, modern interior
⋆ Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances
⋆ Short drive to all the attractions in Asheville

name: Craighaus
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Hyde Park Suite
description: The Hyde Park Suite, in our Carriage House just behind the Main House, is just over 350 sq. feet has a separate sitting room and is pet-friendly lodging. The bedroom has a King Bed with "half tester" canopy. There is a twin sleeper sofa bed in the front sitting room.  The suite includes wireless, high-speed internet, central air conditioning and heat, an iron and ironing board, safe, hair dryer, mini fridge, and a Flavia hot beverage maker. There is a small 2-seat balcony off the bedroom.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Grosvenor Square Suite
description: The Grosvenor Square Suite, located in our Carriage House just behind the Main House, measures approximately 300 sq. feet. The room has a King Bed  and a twin sleeper-sofa bed. Up to 3 persons can be accomodated.  The bathroom includes a shower, Sanijet pipeless double whirlpool tub, and a magnifying make-up mirror. The bedroom includes a hair dryer,  iron and ironing board, mini-fridge, hot beverage maker,  wireless high-speed Internet, safe, air conditioning and heat.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Secluded Mountain Dream
description: Stunning craftsman  home with spectacular outdoor entertainment. This is the perfect home with beautiful, secluded views. When you walk in this 5 bedroom, 4.5-bathroom home, you are met with a spacious living, dining and open kitchen, perfect for the entertainer. The master bedroom is located on the main level. Upstairs, you will find three spacious bedrooms and a cozy office for all your work needs.  Compete in a friendly game of pool or take a long hike in the surrounding manicured trails.

name: Loaded 25 p Private Estate on 5.2 acres
description: If I have to sum up what makes this 25-person place special, I'd say the outdoorsyness of it all. You have a luxury home with 8 large bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, 2 movie theatres, a large game room, pool, spa, and a covered hot tub /TV, but it's the huge private 5.2-acre pastured backyard with 2 barns (1 converted into a party barn), the firepit area and just the sheer privacy of this place, having this much space in total seclusion, yet 5 min from all the action in DT Ashville is just remarkable.

name: 3BR warm & inviting two-story getaway with deck
*2 Kings* Hot Tub* Game Room* 5 Miles to Downtown
description:
We’re excited to share our newest property with visitors to this amazing area! Located just 5 miles from Downtown Asheville, there’s plenty of fun to be had within a short drive, or Uber ride 😉.
With 5 bedrooms, 3 baths, &
2 separate living rooms, there’s plenty of space to spread out or entertain together!
Head outside to grill on the flattop, or lounge in the hot tub, while your children, two legged, or four, enjoy the huge fenced backyard.

name: Huge 3 Bedroom Condo, Central Downtown Asheville
description: Central location. Easy access to Western North Carolina. Floor to ceiling windows. Spacious condo - 3 bedrooms, 3 king beds, 4 full bathrooms and a sleeper sofa in living room. Two bathrooms in primary suite. Chef's kitchen, gourmet appliances & a 2nd pantry kitchen. Automated blinds. Two condos converted to one large space. Includes two parking spaces in the garage. Perfect if you need affordable accommodations and want to stay downtown to support #ashevilleforever. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: The Chapman House | 2 Minutes from Biltmore Estate
description:
The Chapman House is a 2-minute drive from Biltmore House and Gardens, a National Historic Landmark, making it the perfect getaway spot for a couple or solo traveler planning to explore the Gilded Age gem and everything else the city of Asheville has to offer!

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed - must be under 50 pounds). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: Modern & Cozy, Minutes to Airport & WNC Ag Center
description: Nestled on a private lane minutes from the Asheville airport and situated between Asheville and Hendersonville, this cozy ground level duplex unit offers one-bedroom, one-bathroom with a full kitchen, living room, and dining room. The exterior covered front porch welcomes you with a swing bed. Wall-mounted TVs in the bedroom and living room are connected to Netflix. Guests enjoy the shared; hot tub, laundry room, and fire pit.

name: *New* West Asheville Cozy Hideaway
description: Welcome to our cozy retreat in West Asheville. 10-minutes to Downtown & The Biltmore Estate while walkable to local breweries, coffee shops & restaurants! Asheville would love to see you!

name: downtown Asheville, NC 2 MI & 5MI to Biltmore
description: This exquisite residence is conveniently located close to all your favorite spots in town. It boasts two master bedrooms and two full bathrooms, providing ample space and comfort for all occupants. Moreover, this apartment is designed to be wheelchair accessible, ensuring an inclusive and comfortable living experience for everyone. It is also conveniently situated just 2 miles from downtown and the Art Dist, making it an ideal home for those seeking a balance between accessibility and comfort.

name: Heartwood Collection by CM | Two Cozy Homes by AVL
description: Refresh your mind, body, and soul at Heartwood Collection! Only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, these one-level cottages will make you smile with whimsical decor and a relaxed vibe. Sit back on the colorful couches and watch a movie or play a game of foosball in the den (games for all ages are provided).

name: BluRidge Mountain Farm home 10 min town Bicycl Rte
description: Forget your worries this spacious 2 br/rm 1bath  serene space.Come home and relax in this newly renovated farm house ,with comfy beds, rain shower in newly remodeled bathroom.Just north on bicycle rte this home just a short drive to Weaverville and the Blue Ridge Parkway, This home located 10 minutes north of down town Asheville but located in the farm country with a horse pasture across the way , new granite kitchen , Weaverville just a short drive with lots of restaurants and parks .Great loca

name: West AVL Oasis! 15 mins to Downtown w/ Hot Tub!
description:
**Located in Candler, we are 15 minutes from Downtown Asheville!

Our Asheville Oasis has everything you need for the perfect getaway!

Our 1,400 sq. ft. 3 bedroom, 2.5 ba home features must-have amenities like:

-4 Person Hot tub
-Game Room w/ multi-use Pool Table
-Fenced Backyard
-Laundry Room
-FULLY Equipped Kitchen!

Easily explore Asheville's hottest attractions or quickly navigate to other popular West N.C. locations!

*We are Dog friendly ONLY! $115 fee Max 2 Dogs up to 80lbs each*

name: Treehouse Studio East Asheville
description: Brand new build in 2024. No-smoking 400-square apartment  atop our garage features comfortable furniture and  linens for a relaxing and peaceful stay. Front porch boasts a birds eye view of surroundings and a mountain view. Five minutes to Blue Ridge Parkway and ten minutes to downtown Asheville. Maximum 2 guests. Guests must ascend 15 steps to front door.

name: Million Dollar VIEWS Amenities & Entertainment
description:
Brand NEW listing! Fully renovated 6k+ sq. foot mountain home built to host & entertain.

Breathtaking SCENIC mountain views with tons of entertainment & amenities just 14 minutes from downtown Asheville, 17 min from the Biltmore & 20 min from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Wonderful home for those who want to stay close to everything that Asheville offers while maintaining a secluded mountain home feel when you are at the house.

We have enough beds to accommodate 21 guests.

name: Cozy West Asheville cabin
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Calling Concert Lovers! outdoor sauna+cold plunge
description:
Love music and going to concerts? Then this is the place for YOU!

Spin your favorite vinyl with our high-quality turntable and diverse record collection.

Start and end your day with our outdoor sauna and cold plunge.

Soak up the fresh mountain air on our patio.

Take a hot bath or enjoy the rain shower to recharge and refresh.

Utilize our yoga and meditation room to ground into your stay.

Then explore nearby trails, restaurants, and breweries.

Carefully curated, and one of a kind!

name: Fox Den pets OK, 2 EV chargers, Biltmore Pass
description: Brand new purpose-built vacation rental featuring four large, private suites, each with its own en-suite bathroom. Three have king beds and one has two twin XL beds. Super fast internet, ultra modern, pet friendly and 2 EV chargers. Only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. FREE activities for stays under 29 nights, including Biltmore, Rock Wall, Zipline, Whitewater Rafting, Trampoline Park, Snow Tubing and Axe Throwing.

name: Small studio apartment near UNCA
description: Near UNCA, the botanical garden and greenway. Short drive to downtown and River Arts district. Small clean downstairs studio apartment with parking. Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Biltmore Basecamp-6 King BRs-Hot Tub-9ft Slate Poo
description:
Locally owned! Woman owner operator! Be part of our economic recovery! We need your support!
No Helene damage to our home, neighborhood, or general area. Not in a flood zone! Clean city water, power, internet, and cell service. Free spring water provided! Nearby restaurants are open!

SPECIAL OFFER: Buy 5 nights and get 2 free for dates in 2025 (holidays excluded), when you submit code WNCSTRONG at checkout! Don’t miss this special offer. We and other Asheville businesses need your support

name: Native penates
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Asheville Gothic Mnt Retreat
description:
Stay with us to enjoy mountain gothic charm mixed with modern comfort.

After a day of exploring, soak in the clawfoot tub or a long rainfall shower in our .

On the deck, lush green and fresh air await. Practice yoga outside or lounge with a glass of wine.

Located just miles from downtown, you'll have quick access to eclectic shops, restaurants, and breweries.

The perfect retreat for your mountain getaway.

name: Cozy Downtown Apartment
description: Beautiful centrally located downtown apartment located atop a hill between downtown Asheville and the River Arts District. 2 miles from Mission Hospital.Close to other Hospitals.    Walkable to restaurants, entertainment and coffee shops.  No through street so there is very little traffic.

name: Asheville’s Hillside Hideaway
description: Asheville’s amazing 30 day rental. Welcome to the coolest vintage studio within walking distance to downtown Asheville. Enjoy the benefits of living near downtown while staying in a place that takes you back in time. The studio is connected to a home via breezeway with separate entrance. Washer & dryer available on site. 30 day min rental. Perfect for traveling nurses/professionals/anyone needing temporary housing while in Asheville. Will consider extended short term lease.

name: Sunset Lodge/Panoramic Mtn View
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. This rustic & modern timber frame lodge, with spectacular mountain views, is the perfect complement to your blue ridge mountain experience. Soak in the outdoors on the screen porch, lounge on the spacious deck, or enjoy your layered mountain view from the comfort of the open floor plan living space. Private and peaceful bedroom w/ modern bathroom and oversized shower. Tucked away up the mountain, yet convenient to everything Asheville.

name: The Hideaway
description: Centrally-located north A-ville guest suite, private garden entrance, hammock, located on Blue Ridge Parkway access road, very  popular with bicyclists. Semi-rural setting 5 min to UNC-A & Botanical Gardens, 6 min to Grove Park Inn with public golfing, 10 min to downtown Asheville, 10 min to Weaverville, 15 min to Parkway and world-renowned hiking trails. Spa-like shower, luxurious king bed, Egyptian cotton bedding . Electric fireplace, streaming channels on tv, microwave, coffee maker, toaster.

name: Convenient Fletcher Townhome
description: Welcome to this stylish 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath town home centrally located only 5 minutes from the Asheville Airport and 15 minutes from both Asheville and Hendersonville, NC. This home is a perfect spot to relax after exploring all that the area has to offer. Kick your feet up after hiking The Blue Ridge Parkway or compare pictures with family of the Biltmore House. Nothing has been spared to ensure guests' comfort and convenience.

name: Premium Biltmore Village Home | 5-Bedroom, 2 Decks
description:
A beautiful, 24-foot vaulted living room with expansive, sunlit windows and modern furnishings awaits you in our new 2024-built Biltmore Village home. Our large, walk-out furnished top deck seamlessly connects to the kitchen, welcoming you to enjoy your coffee and meals outside. Gaze at the distant mountain views while listening to birds chirp.

Our spacious, pet-friendly 5-bed / 3.5-bath home offers a premium kitchen, 3 Smart TVs, comfy beds, private desks, 3 parking spots, laundry, and more!

name: Wildwood Chalet -NEW- 5 Stars.
description:
This must be the place! If you are looking for a stylish home that is in an unbeatable location, and close to some amazing breweries, you've found it. A safe, quiet neighborhood to enjoy the fire pit under the stars, or comfy beds after a day of exploring WNC is here for you!

Located in Fletcher, a central point that puts you around 15-20 mins from each destination on your list. Downtown Asheville, or the famous Brevard trails, or quaint Hendersonville await with only a short drive away.

name: New Designer 1-bed Home by Biltmore Village
description:
Enjoy this 1-bedroom home all to yourself (or with someone else!) in a relaxed neighborhood that's only 5mins to groceries, 5mins to the gym/sauna/hot yoga, 5mins to the highway, and 10mins to downtown Asheville. Take a 10min walk to The Daily Grind coffee shop or 15-20min walk to Hillman's Beer and 7 Clans Brewing.

Work, relax, and enjoy your own home while being close to everything Asheville has to offer. Super fast WiFi for remote work and only 5min commute to Mission Hospital. Pet-friendly!

name: Convenient Downtown Home | Extended Stay 1bd/1ba
description:
You’ve just found the perfect home for your extended stay. If you’re here for work, play, or need a place to stay, you’ll love my convenient and comfortable home (1 of my 2 available 1-BD/1-BA identical homes!). We're PET FRIENDLY!

Stay on a quiet, residential street only 2mins to Biltmore Village & I-40 highway access; 5mins to Mission Hospital; 7mins to downtown! Parking is free & easy with 1 reserved driveway parking spot. I’m responsive, and I’ve received 5-stars from guests. Welcome home!

name: Near Asheville: Mountain Meadow Getaway
description: Tucked down a long private drive, find comfort in our charming and spacious rambler. The house has been thoughtfully decorated and outfitted to not only meet your needs, but to offer a unique space to make cherished memories in. Situated just outside of Asheville, this cozy gem offers the best of convenience as well. You’ll find easy access to I-40 and all that Asheville and these mountains have to offer.

name: Renovated 1BR | W/D | AC | Central Location
Spacious 1BR condo with balcony - walk to dining
Large 3BR Dog Friendly | Patio | Firepit | W/D
NEW Quiet Retreat | Near Biltmore & DT | MTN Views
description:
Welcome to the Blue Ridge Brewhouse! Our home sits just one mile off the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway and less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Whether you're coming to Asheville for the hiking, biking, or craft beer scene—you'll be near it all situated on a quiet piece of land.

Our new construction home boasts 3 spacious bedrooms (2 King, 1 Queen/1 Twin), 2.5 bathrooms, modern kitchen, full size washer/dryer, 1 gig wifi and peaceful outdoor spaces. We can't wait to host you!

name: Pet-Friendly Home ~ 5 Mi to Blue Ridge Parkway!
description: Hop off the Blue Ridge Parkway and into this Asheville, NC, vacation rental! Sitting just 5 miles from 'America's Favorite Drive,' the 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home is your gateway to everything the Blue Ridge Mountains offers. Take the scenic route to Biltmore Estate or lace up your hiking boots for the postcard-worthy trails at Chimney Rock State Park. After, come home and toast marshmallows over a wood-burning fire while your crew's BBQ expert cooks up a storm on the gas grill.

name: Mountain Dream | Gorgeous Mountain Views & Hot Tub
description: Are you yearning for a dreamy vacation getaway? Your search ends at Mountain Dream! Tucked away in the charming town of Arden, NC, this magnificent three-level home is a mere 20-minute drive from Asheville. It's the perfect blend of vibrant city energy and serene mountain tranquility.

name: South Side Escape
description:
Come enjoy a peaceful family friendly stay just outside Asheville.
The condo is a cozy and open 2 bedrooms 2 bathroom with everything you need to enjoy a stay in the Asheville area. Situated well off the road, but close to restaurants and amenities this is the perfect place to recharge between trips into the surrounding outdoor activities or vibrant city of Asheville.

name: Bachelorette Paradise -Hot Tub*Near Dwntn*Fire Pit
description: Welcome to the Diva Den - Asheville’s premier bachelorette paradise!  Conveniently located just minutes from Downtown, this glam getaway was designed and renovated with girlies in mind. Stunning Maximalist aesthetic throughout, with thoughtful areas to eat, drink, & be merry with all your besties.  From pirouetting pink cranes in the living room, to a Moroccan Casbah cocktail lounge, to a new hot tub, fire pit & more - all set amidst peaceful, rolling pastures. Ready to host your playdays away!

name: Coming Soon! 5 Miles from AVL
description: New construction home coming soon. Less than a 5 mile drive to Downtown Asheville this homes location is unmatched!

name: Hidden Gem of Asheville - Lakeside Guest House
description: The location of this guest house is truly one of the hidden gems of Asheville, Lake Kenilworth. Less than 3 miles from downtown, Lake Kenilworth is a private lake that most Asheville natives do not even know exists. Located on the east side of the lake is a no-outlet neighborhood that adds to the tranquility of the area. The house sits lakefront with just enough elevation for both beautiful lake views and privacy.

name: Big Stylish Downtown Loft "Wolf Den"
description:
Welcome to Wolf Den Loft, a captivating industrial chic vacation rental in the vibrant heart of historic downtown Asheville on Carolina Lane. This urban sanctuary seamlessly blends the raw, gritty aesthetic of an industrial loft with a touch of wild inspiration.

Step into Wolf Den Loft and be enveloped by the allure of exposed stone masonry walls, soaring ceilings with skylights, and concrete floors that exude urban charm.

With 2,600 s.f. have your local friends & family over for a visit!

name: Secluded Asheville Mountain Oasis - 5 miles to DT
description: It may look like a dreamscape, but this Modern Mountain Property with stone garden walls tucked into the lush forest does, in fact, exist. 10 min drive from downtown Asheville, this secluded getaway is nestled on a private one-acre lot with backyard walking trails.  You’ll love the mountain-view deck and multiple outdoor spaces for dining, strolling, or hanging out under the stars around the firepit. Inside, you'll find a chef-ready kitchen, and cozy screened-in porch. Book your stay today!

name: The Heron - Walkable, Roof Deck, Elevator, Mural
description: Welcome to the Heron Suite at @PerchAVL! Ideal for families and friends; comfort and artistry collide in this newly constructed loft within walking distance of downtown Asheville, NC. At The Perch, Asheville’s famous murals don’t stop on the street—your suite is packed with pops of color and around the property you’ll see hand-painted murals and paintings from Wyatt Grant. Warm Evenings can be spent on the rooftop deck boasting city views, a firepit, gas grills, and ample seating for cookouts.

name: Cozy & Fun! Game Room, Putt Putt, Playset, Hot Tub
description:
This newly renovated house has EVERYTHING you need for a fun mountain getaway! Enjoy all of the amazing amenities this house has to offer- you won't want to leave!

*Gorgeous mountain views
*Walk to the NEW Collier Cove Nature Preserve
*25 mins to DT Asheville, close to breweries
*Game room w/ arcade games & basketball
*Outdoor mini golf & bowling
*Children's playground
*Hot tub
*BBQ Grill
*Cornhole
*Pool table & ping pong
*Family friendly- pack n play + high chair
*Sonos Speakers
*2 Decks

name: 4 Homes Together in Asheville!
description:
Your group will love this unique multi-home rental in Asheville’s Biltmore Village! With TWO 5-bedroom / 3.5-bath homes and TWO 1-bedroom / 1-bath homes — totaling 12 bedrooms / 8 full baths / 2 half baths — your group will have space while together.

Located in a relaxed neighborhood only 5mins to Target, 5mins to the gym/sauna/hot yoga, 5mins to the highway, and 10mins to downtown. 10min walk to The Daily Grind coffee shop or 15-20min walk to several breweries. Pet friendly! Fast, fiber WiFi!

name: Asheville River Cabins Premium Looking Glass Cabin
description: Experience a Nordic-inspired cozy cabin with a sleek design, featuring a king bed and beautiful river views. Enjoy plush linens, a floating fireplace, and a cedar shower. Outside, dine on the porch or unwind by the smokeless fire pit. Ideal for romantic getaways in Asheville

name: 2 Homes Together in Asheville!
description:
A unique way for your group to stay together in Asheville’s Biltmore Village! There’s one 5-bedroom / 3.5-bath home plus one 1-bedroom / 1-bath home — totaling 6 bedrooms / 4 full baths / 1 half bath. The two homes are directly next to one another.

Located in a relaxed neighborhood only 5mins to Target, 5mins to the gym/sauna/hot yoga, 5mins to the highway, and 10mins to downtown. 10min walk to The Daily Grind coffee shop or 15-20min walk to several breweries. Pet friendly! Fast, fiber WiFi!

name: Exquisite Retreat Near Downtown w/ Firepit & Views
description:
This brand-new, beautifully designed retreat offers the ultimate stay, giving you the best of 3 worlds!

-A luxurious 3 BR, 2.5 BA home with lavish interior comforts, creating the perfect space to relax and recharge.

-Step into a stunning outdoor haven featuring a stone firepit, BBQ area, and new privacy fence—ideal for entertaining or unwinding.

-Enjoy the perfect location: just 3 miles from downtown, where you can explore top restaurants, shops, and attractions.

Your dream getaway awaits!

name: Charming Wooded Cottage
description: Our beautiful furnished 3 bedroom home is on a lovely, quiet street in the Haw Creek neighborhood of Asheville. Our home has a large fenced and wooded backyard with patio, grill, and landscaping. Sunsets from the front porch, and nature all around. It’s a quiet getaway, just minutes away from all that Asheville has to offer. 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Less than 20 minutes to the Biltmore Estate. And there’s walkable access to trails and the Blue Ridge Parkway from the house.

name: Asheville Farm Retreat, hot tub, King bed, firepit
description: Experience the charm of rustic farm-life paired with modern comfort in our spacious Asheville haven. Perfect for group gatherings; this property, located close to major attractions like Biltmore & Asheville Botanical Garden, offers immersive interactions with friendly farm animals, multiple amenities like hot tubs & fire pits, and private suites. Unwind in the heart of nature.

name: Lutheridge House
description:
Relax in our peaceful mountain home in a gated, wooded community. Explore the beautiful mountains , waterfalls, sites, and breweries around the Asheville area.

The house is just minutes to the Asheville airport, stores, breweries, restaurants, and more. Downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, Historic Hendersonville, and the Blue Ridge Parkway are a short car ride away.

name: Serene Mountain Getaway on 12 Private Acres
description: This property is the full first story of a two story mountain home. It is 2400 square feet with its own private entrance. We are located 4 1/2 miles from the center of Asheville's downtown. Privately located on 12 quiet acres. This is the perfect property for those searching for a quiet place to unwind and yet be close to all that Asheville has to offer.

name: Lux 3BR Retreat w/ Firepit, BBQ, 3 mi to Downtown
description:
Discover the perfect escape at this brand-new, beautifully designed retreat! Combining luxury, relaxation, and an unbeatable location, it’s the ideal place to unwind or explore.

- A luxurious 3 BR, 2.5 BA home with lavish comforts, perfect for recharging.

- Step into a private outdoor haven with a stone firepit, BBQ, and privacy fence—ideal for entertaining or relaxing.

- Just 3 miles from downtown, enjoy easy access to top restaurants, shops, and attractions.

Your dream getaway awaits!

name: 2 New Homes, 6 BR & 4+ BA, Conjoined Yard/Firepits
description:
Looking for the perfect getaway? Enjoy TWO brand-new, beautifully furnished homes designed for relaxation and fun! Ideal for large groups or family trips, these side-by-side homes offer the perfect mix of comfort and space.

-Double the space: 6 BR, 4 full BA, & 2 half BA, for 12 guests
-Private yet connected: large gate for sharing yards
-Stunning outdoor spaces: Local stone walkways, custom fire pits, and a grand oak tree for relaxation

Escape to to your perfect double dose of relaxation!

name: The farmers garden
description: The Farmers Garden is peaceful and quiet with back to nature surroundings.

name: The Cardinal cottage
description: Escape to Cardinal Cottage and relax a little. Close and convenient to Asheville

name: Private Guest Suite Desirable West Asheville Area.
description: Private smoke-free suite at rear of our home in bohemian West Asheville, in walking distance to restaurants and unique Asheville hang-outs, minutes by car from downtown, Biltmore Estate, and Blue Ridge Pkwy. Private entrance and parking.  1 king bed and 1 fold-out queen (ideal for family with young children) Pet friendly to well-behaved dogs. Private bathroom, kitchen nook (mini fridge, toaster, microwave and coffee maker) and screened in porch.

name: Karaoke Chalet | 2 Kitchens • Hot Tub • Sauna
description:
Escape to this stunning 6-bed, 3-bath retreat! Unwind on the wraparound deck, soak in the hot tub, or relax in the sauna. Gather around the firepit or enjoy the game room with karaoke, ping pong, arcade games, and 2 TVs. Host events with 2 kitchens, work from multiple workstations, and bask in the amazing sunroom. Perfect for groups seeking luxury, fun, and productivity—book now for an unforgettable stay!

Questions? Message me.

name: Come Check Out Our Progress!  Asheville Strong!
description:
Perfect for those looking to do "EVERYTHING" on their trip to Asheville, we invite you to Wentworth Hilltop!

The prime location of this home puts you within easy reach of ALL things iconic Asheville! With the Downtown located less than 4 miles away & the entrance of the Biltmore Estate less than 2.5 miles away, these are but two of the many choices you have instant access to all with your adventure basecamp conveniently located at the end of a private drive & in a quiet neighborhood combined.

name: Modern 2 Bedroom House
description:
Brand new construction, modern 2 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom house has a very modern concept with an open floor plan, 9' ceilings, and many upgraded features including hardwood floors, new appliances, smart features, and a covered deck overlooking a beautiful meadow.

This newly constructed home is located in a quiet and friendly neighborhood, just minutes from downtown Asheville, Mission Hospital, Kenilworth Park, and the natural beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains.

name: Craftsman Cottage in Asheville
description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. Light-filled, beautifully furnished carriage house conveniently located in the heart of historic Kenilworth. Great walking neighborhood! Surrounded by mature trees and lush gardens, apartment has a newly renovated bathroom and brand new Trex deck. One garage bay for parking, storage, or studio space is included. One driveway parking space also included.

name: Pet Friendly 2 bed/2 bath Hot Tub & Pool West Side
description: Come enjoy our oasis in West Asheville! Relax by the pool with a cool drink, rest your tired muscles in the hot tub built for 4 and make smores by the fire pit. Enjoy our large yard with corn hole and horseshoes & cook out on the gas grill. You are welcome to play some records or one of my guitars! We are 1.5 miles to all the fun stuff happening in West Asheville and 4 miles ($10 Uber ride) to downtown.  We really love this house and know that you will enjoy it also!!

name: Min to DNTN, Biltmore-HTub-Theatre-Game Rm-Yoga
description: The Waterfall Retreat is perfect for families and couples seeking nature, peace and outdoor activities in a relaxing environment just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville. Nestled in the trees, the 8-person hot tub offers relaxation, complemented by a fire table and your own private waterfall and pond. The whole family will enjoy the game room with a pool table, ping pong table, a gaming TV with Xbox, poker table, and a deluxe home theater. Pets are welcome, making it perfect for family getaways.

name: Couples,Hot tub,Chill, Explore,Minutes from town
description: Welcome to the most cozy bath house bungalow in Asheville. Luxury meets rustic with style from top to bottom. We have integrated boujee with rustic and industrial. Plush West Elm Bedding will swaddle you as you sleep. The mini split with AC/Heat will keep you comfortable. The massive walk in 3 headed shower is an experience all its own. A hot tub just outside for your pleasure. Every inch of this bungalow has be created with style, flare and passion. Very close to town.

name: Tiny cozy home in West Asheville
description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape.

name: Asheville River Cabins Looking Glass Cabin
description: Experience a Nordic-inspired cozy cabin with a sleek design, featuring a king bed and beautiful river views. Enjoy plush linens, a floating fireplace, and a cedar shower. Outside, dine on the porch or unwind by the smokeless fire pit. Ideal for romantic getaways in Asheville.

name: Maddie’s Cottage
description: Experience the pinnacle of luxury in our mountain getaway boasting breathtaking views and lavish amenities. Nestled in a serene setting, yet just a short 5 mile drive from downtown Asheville, this beautiful home offers the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience. Indulge in the beauty of the surrounding landscapes while enjoying easy access to the vibrant city scene. Escape the hustle and bustle and immerse yourself in the serene mountain ambiance of your dream vacation retreat.

name: Cozy space steps from preserve
description: Come relax at this cozy downstairs apartment with a private entrance located at the back of a quiet neighborhood. Walk down the driveway to the end of the road and enjoy a hike in the nature preserve with wooded trails and mountain views. Convenient to the airport and all of the amenities in South Asheville/Arden, your stay will be located in proximity to countless places to eat, drink, and things to do.

name: Private home mtn view, hot tub
description: Beautiful home with mountain views. Hot-tub, fire-pit. close to Biltmore and downtown Asheville.

name: FrenchBroadRiverSuite
description:
Historic charm with modern touches…
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located 1 bed/1 bath , only 12 min from downtown Asheville. Beautifully designed and thoughtfully equipped with everything you may need for comfortable stay. Open plan living space with full kitchen and dining area, master bedroom with king size bed / motorized head adjustment, bathroom with steam shower/bathtub and laundry room attached.

name: Sycamore Suite w/free Biltmore Pass and more
description: Welcome to the Sycamore Suite, which is located on the downstairs level of the carriage house behind the main house. It is beautiful, sunny, comfy and delightful. We have spent a great deal of time and effort to make it perfect, and we hope you will love it as much as we do. PLEASE NOTE: We do not serve breakfast. FREE activities for stays under 29 nights, including Biltmore, Rock Wall, Zipline, Whitewater Rafting, Trampoline Park, Snow Tubing and Axe Throwing.

name: Tranquility and Elegance awaits!
description: Engage in our private luxury suite that is artful and relaxing, from the hammock, to your porch, and garden area. Absolutely newly built by us and first time on the market. From the soaking tub, to our invigorating shower, wrap yourself in the bathrobe of your choice. Enjoy a glass of Prosecco provided in your fridge, along with chocolates on the bed and breakfast foods for your morning meal. Conviently located  2 miles from downtown, and 2 blocks from the many restaurants and bars on Haywood Rd

name: New house close to DT 2 King beds 2 Queens
description: Enjoy Mountain View’s from the perfect nest 2.5 miles from downtown Asheville. Float or paddle the French broad river from the boat ramp a block from this home. Take a hike on the blue ridge parkway 8 miles away. Spread out in this well appointed 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home featuring 2 kitchens perfect for friends to gather.  Newly refurnished with pool table, ping pong table, and two large living rooms.

name: Asheville Haven
description: This is the perfect combination of peacefully quiet and close to all that Asheville has to offer. Gorgeous property just 8 miles from Biltmore House entrance and downtown Asheville. The Blue Ridge Parkway, Mountains to Sea trail just a few miles away. Wrap around porch and New large sunroom to enjoy sunrise in the morning, sunsets in the evening and everything in between. Great outdoor fire pit area with grill for outdoor cooking. Peaceful and quiet while close to everything!

name: Cozy West AVL Cottage!
description: Walking distance to Haywood Rd in West Asheville, but being tucked back from the road gives this home the unique feel of being off the beaten path while still being centrally-located to all of your West Avl favorites like Owl Bakery, Battlecat, Archetype Brewing and Sunny Point Cafe . This quaint cottage feels like a home away from home with amenities to provide everything you need for an extended stay. Fully stocked kitchen, on site washer and dryer, and lots of plants! Minimum 1 month stays

name: Cozy, artsy low-allergy home
description: Cozy, artsy, Asheville local home. Private room with dedicated desk space plus your own private bathroom including shower and tub. Air purifiers, allergy-friendly bedding, and super clean space make this a haven for those with environmental allergies. Sunny with lots of light and plenty of outdoor yard space to relax on warm days. Listen to the birds chirp outside your window. Central to all of West Asheville and Downtown, and 15 minutes to Candler/Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Great Asheville Spot
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Walk to Biltmore Village restaurants, breweries, and shops from this quiet eclectic neighborhood

name: Meadow Oaks Cottage
description: Historic home in Fletcher that is newly remodeled with renovated kitchen and bathrooms.  situated on a wooded lot overlooking a meadow and surrounded by oak trees.  A special family gathering place where during the summer months family from  Charleston would visit and enjoy sitting on the   "Piazza"  and enjoy the company of one another while also playing a game of croquet and enjoying the mountain life in Fletcher.

name: Charming & Cozy mountain Getaway
description: Escape to this newly built getaway. Perfectly located in the heart of Fletcher. Just minutes from downtown Asheville & Hendersonville. Ideally located in close proximity to the Blue Ridge parkway, Pisgah Forrest, breathtaking Chimney Rock, enchanting Biltmore Estate, and the NC Arboretum. Whether you want to kick back and relax or plan for adventures such as hiking, zip-lining, or white water rafting, this is the place for you.

name: Downtown Dollhouse
description: Enjoy the best of Asheville with an unmatched downtown location.  This beautiful historic 4BR/2.5 BA home is in the heart of downtown Asheville.   Sip coffee on the large front porch and feel the city vibes or retreat into your backyard and enjoy the peace and tranquillity of a nature preserve with a large backyard complete with a play set for any kids or grandkids. The home is well-equipped with all your travel needs especially for children

name: Comfort
description: Newly renovated house. Conveniently located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and many of it breweries. Only 2.7 miles to I-40 , 3 miles to I-26. Three bedrooms, two bathrooms,kitchen, dining, and living room. Family friendly. We have a dog in the back yard in a cage, but don’t worry he can’t get out on his own and he won’t bother people but he is occasionally barking.

name: Two quiet, private rooms
Welcome Back to Asheville! Private One Bdrm Apt.
description: Keep it simple in a peaceful and centrally-located private apartment. Located in a newer residence on a quiet, low traffic street in one of the nicest neighborhoods in Asheville. Central to almost everything, with downtown and Biltmore Village only 5 minutes away. Apartment is newly finished, meticulously clean, immaculately maintained, and includes all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay. Kitchen and sleeping area are separated and spacious. Close to shopping, entertainment, and dining.

name: Biltmore-Mission Hosp-DT-1 BR+loft
description: One mile from downtown and Biltmore Village. Two minute walk to Mission Hospital. We happily lived in this cleverly renovated two-car garage for that past 5 years.  It was designed for ease of use and comfort with interesting architectural flourishes. The garage door opens creating a cool indoor/outdoor living area that we used most of the year. The fully appointed kitchen will have everything you might need for a long-term or short-term stay.

name: Pickleball Court, Spa Room, Newly Remodeled Home!
description:
Beautiful Mountain getaway in Asheville.

Breathtaking views.

Private pickleball court.

Spa room with hot tub, massage chair, and custom built sauna. Yoga mats and light work out equipment.

Fully stocked KITCHEN with everything you need.

Huge game room.

Outdoor grill with nearby outdoor large table under beautiful pergola.

Close to downtown Asheville.

Very comfortable beds!

Please No pets!

description: Located off I-240, explore Biltmore, revel in the Arboretum, art museums, and nature – all within easy reach. Discover Asheville's charm, infused with culture.

name: Hang Your Hat @ Blue Ridge Condo
description:
Surrounded by lush landscaping on a peaceful drive in East Asheville. Primary Suite with private deck access and use of common areas for a daytime working professional.

Natural light abounds in the uncluttered apartment. Your private room includes a high-quality queen bed, large closet, shelving, dresser, private bath, and all linens.

6 min to downtown, 9 min to Mission or VA Hospital.

Convenience w/o the traffic or overcrowding. A quiet, relaxing place to be and call home for a few months

name: Cozy Cottage 7 Min to Downtown Asheville
description: Welcome to Hillside Cottage, where mountain magic meets modern comfort, in the heart of Asheville! Perfect for families and groups seeking a memorable getaway, this enchanting vacation home offers four bedrooms plus a cozy built in bunk bed nook perfect for families with little ones to enjoy, providing ample space for everyone to unwind and create lasting memories.

name: Fellowship Hall - Walkable W. Asheville
description: Experience the best of West Asheville in this unique, newly remodeled studio with massive ceilings in an amazing location. This former church fellowship hall offers a cozy yet spacious retreat with a king-sized bed, kitchen area, and walk-in shower. Located near Haywood Road, enjoy local spots like OWL Bakery, Archetype Brewing, and the Greenway. Two bikes are provided to explore the area. Driveway parking for one car. Enjoy this unique and convenient spot perfect for your Asheville adventures!

name: Slice of Awesome-Walk downtown!
description: Experience the charm of a beautifully restored historic apartment just a 10-minute walk from  Asheville’s vibrant downtown and South Slope! This inviting 2-bedroom gem features a fully equipped kitchen, a private backyard and access by car to RAD, Biltmore Estate and Grove Park (5min) and Blue Ridge Parkway (20min) Rest easy with a queen bed, twin trundle, and queen memory foam sofa bed. Perfect for couples, families, or small groups exploring WNC’s best. Street parking only for large vehicles.

name: The Art & Pottery House
description:
This is one of the three 6 BR houses to downtown on VRBO.

New to Airbnb but I have 225 5-star reviews on that other site, VR....

Book a week and only pay for six nights, June 1 thru Sept 6! New hot tub installed -- Drained, scrubbed & refilled before each arrival!



Welcome to our art-filled modern gem: a 6BR, 5 BA home on two floors with an exterior staircase that unites the space .

name: Asheville’s Creekside Getaway
description:
Relax with the family at this peaceful place on the creek….this property is definitely a gem. Walk down & wade in the creek. Enjoy the large expansive back deck which has plenty of room to grill out, relax & entertain as you look over the beautiful back yard which ends at the creek. The home offers 2 bedrooms 2 baths with a pull out sofa in the living room so sleeping 6 is a breeze here. The kitchen, living room & dining room are completely open.
This is a 30 night minimum stay property!

name: Forest haven escape
description: Beautiful trees and a fire pit next to a babbling creek creates  a peaceful and tranquil getaway. An expansive backyard with space to play games, toast s’mores, or even pitch a tent for a special creekside evening. Unique home with hand painted murals in all of the bedrooms and bathrooms  completed by a local artist. Bright home with a forest view and cozy bedrooms. Ample living and dining room space for fun group/family gatherings. Just minutes to downtown and the trendy West Asheville area.

name: Walk to DT West Asheville & RAD!
House in Arden
description: The whole group will be comfortable in this spacious and unique space. If you are looking for a LUXURY, SECLUDED mountain retreat yet minutes to all Asheville has to offer, look no further! Welcome to a beautiful one-of-a-kind property, professionally decorated & equipped with 4,000 square feet, 2 KING 1 queen bedrooms,  2 full and 1 half bathrooms equipped with EVERY amenity in mind.  Located minutes from Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Park, and Asheville airport.

name: Cozy Apt close to UNCA Asheville & Grove Park Inn
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

The apartment's design seamlessly blends modern elements with natural textures, creating a balanced and inviting atmosphere. The neutral color palette is punctuated by warm wood tones and rich, earthy accents, making the space feel both contemporary and cozy.

name: Asheville 'n' Chill | Pet Friendly & Mountain View
description:
Located just minutes away from hiking and biking along the Blue Ridge Parkway and under 20 minutes from the award-winning restaurants and breweries in artistic downtown Asheville, this home’s comfortable and charming atmosphere will instantly “chill” and delight you!

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: Cozy Cabin w/Hot tub 3.7 miles from Biltmore House
description: Andrew’s Attic is one of our Asheville cabin rentals w/hot tub that offers multiple amenities and beautiful surroundings. Rediscover what a vacation is supposed to look like by enjoying a quiet afternoon lounging in a hammock, fishing, hiking, soaking in your hot tub, or simply enjoying the sights and sounds of nature by strolling through our gardens and ever-refreshing water fountains. This cozy one-bedroom cabin offers a king-sized bed, 1.5 baths, and a daybed for two additional guests.

name: Asheville Oasis Walk to Downtown
description: More photos coming soon! A beautifully maintained arts and crafts bungalow in amazing central location. Three bedrooms (two with en-suite bathrooms), a comfy living room with a leather sectional sofa and 50" television, adjacent dining area, kitchen with tons of counter and cabinet space, office/workspace with desk and futon, and a sunroom (heated and cooled). There is a lovely shaded patio in the front yard and an exquisitely landscaped patio in the backyard with fire pit and hot tub.

As our only rustic cabin on the property. With one bedroom featuring a King-sized bed and one bath, this is the ideal choice for those who want to get away and experience what staying in a real log cabin is like. Guests can stay cool in the summer with the use of a large wall air conditioning unit. Stay heated in the winter with gas.

description: Sandy’s Chalet is the perfect cabin for a romantic getaway. As our only Asheville cabin built in classic mountain chalet style, this is one cabin that is truly unique. The floor to ceiling windows lets in ample light allowing you to enjoy the cabin’s soft surroundings. Sleeping up to four, this two-bedroom one level cabin is equipped with one queen-sized bed and two twin beds, plus one full bathroom. Discounted monthly rates are available.

description: Ruby’s Dogwood is where nature is met at your front doorstep. Situated on Trout Trail, Ruby’s takes on a commanding view of both the trout pond and soothing fountain. This tastefully decorated and spacious two-bedroom cabin offers you a great room with plush leather couch and easy chair. Both bedrooms reside on the lower level. Each room has access to the hot tub an lower deck. Discounted monthly rates are available.

description: Look no further than Colt’s Cottage- resting atop a hill, at the end of Willow Lane. Just a short walk to the Mountain -to -Sea trail, peace and tranquility are found here with natural privacy from surrounding untouched forests and sounds of trickling water. Downstairs offers two bedrooms, one with a king-sized bed and one with two twin beds, plus a sleeper sofa in the living room. A private hot tub on the lower deck is accessible from both bedrooms. Discounted monthly rates are available.

name: Pet-Friendly, Fire-Pit, Spa, Game Room, By DWTN!
description: Welcome to the Asheville Getaway! This spacious, pet-friendly 4BR/3BA home accommodates up to 14 guests, making it perfect for families and large groups. Every detail has been considered for your entertainment: a hot tub, arcade/board games, pool table, and an 85-inch Smart TV. The outdoor space is perfect for evening gatherings, with string lights adding to the ambiance, a fire pit and swings. Plus, our home is just 12 minutes from downtown and 10 minutes from Biltmore!

name: Tiny Home in the Woods | Hot Tub 4 miles to DT
description: Escape to a storybook setting on 9 acres, just minutes from Downtown Asheville.  Climb to panoramic views, relax by the natural spring. Sleep in plush comfy queen beds with blackout curtains, refresh in a rain shower. Stream movies in the cozy living room, then grill out on the deck surrounded by nature. Gather around the fire pit or soak in the hot tub. In this modern expansive 800 sqft Tiny home, cook, laugh, and breathe in fresh mountain air while supporting local businesses.  Book your stay!

name: The Kingfisher - Mural, Elevator, WFH Setup
description: Welcome to the Kingfisher Suite at @PerchAVL! Ideal for families and friends; style and location collide in this newly constructed loft within walking distance of downtown Asheville, NC. At The Perch, Asheville’s famous murals don’t stop on the street—your suite is packed with pops of color and around the property you’ll see hand-painted murals and art from Wyatt Grant. Warm Evenings can be spent on the rooftop deck boasting city views, a firepit, gas grills, and ample seating for cookouts.

name: Cute family cabin w/hot tub
description: Donna's Diamond is just a short walk to the Mountain -to -Sea trail. Enjoy the covered back deck, tranquil water fountains and mature landscape. Soak in the hot tub or rock back and forth on your rocking chair sipping a cup of coffee. Downstairs offers two bedrooms, one with a king-sized bed and one with two twin beds, plus a sleeper sofa in the living room. A private hot tub on the lower deck is accessible from both bedrooms. Discounted monthly rates are available.

name: Darling cozy cabin w/hot tub
description: Look no further than Irene’s Oak for Asheville, NC cabin near Biltmore House.  This delightfully decorated and spacious two-bedroom cabin is ideal for a quick romantic getaway or for a long-term stay. Pine-paneled cathedral ceilings add to the ambiance of this cabin and coziness of the great room. Cuddled up with a book on the leather couch or easy chair and enjoy the soft surroundings of the cabin. Discounted monthly rates are available.

description: Looking for a romantic cabin in Asheville, NC? Welcome to Mom’s Manor! As one of our romantic cabins, you will find everything you need for a family, or couples stay. Heavy timber beams with traditional construction bring special effects to the great room. Adding to its atmosphere are hardwood floors, and cathedral ceilings. Sleeping up to 6, this two-bedroom cabin is equipped with one king-size, one queen sized bed, and sleeper sofa, plus 2 full baths. Discounted monthly rates are available.

name: Cozy 2 bedroom cabin w/hot tub
description: Dad’s Digs is a twin cabin of Mom’s Manor with the same amenities but decorated differently. Uniquely styled, Dad’s Digs is painted forest green which helps to complement the heavy timber posts in the great room. Relax in your hot tub after a nice hike on the Mountain-to Sea trail. Sleeping up to six, this two-bedroom is equipped with one king-sized bed, one queen-sized bed and sleeper sofa, plus two full baths. Discounted monthly rates are available.

name: Mountain to Sea trail access out your front door
description: Jessie’s Magnolia located on the highest point of Willow Winds is only a few steps away from the forest of the Blue Ridge Parkway, as well as the Mountain-to Sea trail. Your group will enjoy views of the Blue Ridge Mountains from the large deck as well as inviting views of the gardens. Sleeping up to 8, this three-bedroom cabin has one king-bedroom, one queen loft above the kitchen, two twins beds and a sleeper sofa plus 3 full baths and hot tub. Discounted monthly rates are available.

name: Great family cabin w/hot tub
description: For a unique cabin rental book Dons Den for your next vacation. This octagon shaped cabin, made of stone and cedar, is completed with a wrap-around deck, wood rockers, outdoor dining area and an electric grill, all makings for a relaxing vacation. Sleeping up to 8 people, the cabin is furnished with two queen-sized beds, two twin beds and one sleeper sofa plus 2 baths. Enjoy relaxing in the hot tub downstairs. Discounted monthly rates are available.

name: 3 bedroom cabin w/hot tub
description: For a unique cabin rental book Jackie’s Gem for your next vacation. This octagon shaped cabin, made of stone and cedar, is completed with a wrap-around deck, wood rockers, outdoor dining area and an electric grill, all makings for a relaxing vacation. Sleeping up to 8 people, the cabin is furnished with two queen-sized beds, two twin beds and one sleeper sofa plus 2 baths. Hot tub on lower level outside porch. name: June sale, 5 BR home! Hot tub, game room, fire pit
description:
Gather your friends & family for an unforgettable getaway in this colorful, welcoming home.
With easy access to downtown Asheville’s breweries & restaurants, plus endless outdoor activities at your fingertips, you’ll be raring to get out & explore each day. At the end of every adventure, you’ll love returning to your bohemian, open-plan space where your group can cook, dine, play & relax together.
There’s enough space to sleep 16 & property is pet-friendly, so nobody has to miss out on the fun!

name: Unleash the Adventure
description: Nestled in the blue ridge mountains, this charming home offers the perfect blend of tranquility and adventure. The house features: 1 bed/1 bath. Queen bed in bedroom and Full size sleeper sofa. A fully-equipped kitchen with butcher block countertops and new appliances. A cozy living room with Hulu TV and electric fireplace. This home has a secluded hot tub perfect for stargazing on clear nights. Located minutes from Asheville, AVL Airport, hiking trails, etc. Come relax and unwind in this oasis.

name: Biltmore Forest Retreat! Hot tub | Sauna | Game rm
description:
Welcome to our Biltmore Forest hidden retreat! Nestled back in the trees, this home is the perfect blend of a North Carolina mountain getaway meets Asheville entertainment house! Just minutes from grocery stores and all the great restaurants and breweries Asheville has to offer, this location can't be beat!

*7.5 Miles to Downtown Asheville
*5.4 Miles to the Biltmore House
*2 Miles to the BlueRidge Parkway
*6.2 Miles to Asheville Airport

name: The Move | Heated Pool, Tikibar, Full Spa, Theatre
description: This is The Move: The Key Collection's newest design and amenity driven piece in Asheville! Designed for those who know recovery produces quality. Renew in the heated pool, hot tub, sauna, and cold plunge. Sip elevated cocktails in the swanky tiki bar, challenge friends in the exotic billiards and poker lounge, and kick back in the movie lounge. This epic spot sleeps 17 and promises a full sensory experience, next level recovery, and an unforgettable stay in Asheville. Book now to get locked in!

name: The Lofts at Church Street #202
description:
This second floor 1BR/1.5BA apartment commands a prime locale! Just 2 blocks from iconic Pack Square, you can easily walk to abundant restaurants, art galleries, shops, museums, and theaters.
*Rental Agreement Required*

name: Welcome to Carol's Castle!
description: Welcome to Carol's Castle. Mountain views & horses within 15 min of DT Asheville! This spacious and stylish home has long range mountain views and plenty of space for your vacation. 2 King and 2 Queen beds outfitted with luxury linen hotel style bedding and towels, On demand tank less water heater and fully stocked kitchen will enhance your stay.  Downtown Asheville is less than 15 minutes with grocery, restaurants and drug stores within a few minutes.

name: Favorite mountain cabin overlooks trout pond
description: There are few cabins in Asheville that offer as much charm and character as Pat’s Place. Its tranquil setting overlooks the gardens, mountain stream, pond, and fountain below. A larger master suite has a king-sized bed w/en suite bathroom and features a private deck/hot tub. The 2nd bedroom has a queen bed and a sitting room with a day bed. Enjoy your meals at the cabins separate dining room or out on the covered porch. Pat's Place has 2.5 bathrooms. Discounted monthly rates are available.

name: New and fully Walkable West Asheville Home
description:
Take it easy at this unique and cozy getaway. Located 1 walkable block from the pubs, restaurants and shops of West Avl, this completely remodeled and newly furnished home is thoughtfully decorated and outfitted to immediately make you feel as if you are home.
Situated on a lushly tree-lined quiet street, the house has both a beautiful front and rear yard where you can chill on either the front or back porch.

Close to both I-26 and I-40, as well as 2 miles from do￼wntown Asheville.

name: Large luxury 4 bedroom house walk to downtown
description:
Perfect for family reunions, wedding and bachelorette parties, group getaways and more! 4k square ft house.

6 blocks from vibrant downtown Asheville, an easy walk or drive.

Our elegant 1928 craftsmen home has been described as a peaceful sanctuary with inviting and warm energy; spacious rooms allow guests their own private retreat, but there are an array of communal spaces for family and friends to come together and enjoy each others company and the beautiful surrounding half acre compound.

name: Charming Walkable W Asheville Haven | DeckMtn View
description:
Completely renovated spacious 2-bedroom guest apartment in a historic 1925 Prairie style home in the heart of West Asheville. Charming and private!

Great location - walkable to restaurants, breweries and shops, 2 miles from the famous River Arts District and French Broad River for kayaking and tubing. Just 3 miles from Downtown Asheville (5 minute Uber ride).

Free private parking on site.

This apartment may be rented with Blue Star Guest Apt (downstairs) for large groups. Contact us.

name: 20 min. to Asheville | Hot Tub and Family Friendly
description: This ultimate getaway is situated just a few miles outside of Asheville and perfectly convenient. This home boasts outdoor amenities like a hot tub, a partially covered back deck with a gas grill, a private patio, and a gas fire pit. Inside, you'll find 6 flat-screen Smart TVs and a laptop-friendly workspace! Explore the nearby Blue Ridge Parkway, visit the historic Biltmore Estate, or indulge in the vibrant food and art scene of Asheville.

name: AVL Retreat w/ Stunning Patio
description: Located just 5 minutes from downtown Asheville, our cozy walkout basement offers a comfortable stay with a private entrance. Enjoy an amazing patio, a bedroom with a queen bed, a pull-out twin bed, and an additional air mattress if needed, accommodating up to 4 guests. Within walking distance to a charming French restaurant. Brand new house, in a perfect location for quick access to hiking, the Biltmore, and more. We live upstairs with our dog & cat, so you may see us in the beautiful yard!

name: Wooded Asheville, walk to park
description: Brand new lower level studio apartment attached to family home has a king memory foam bed, private entrance/parking, full kitchen, living room, and full bathroom with curbless shower.

name: Cozy & Private Apartment in West Asheville
description:
The lower half of a lovely duplex in the heart of West Asheville. Explore the fun of Haywood Rd (4 min), River Arts District (10 min), and Downtown Asheville (12 min). This listing includes 1 bed, 1 bath, a kitchen, and living room. It is entirely separated from the other unit and includes a small porch and 2 gravel parking spots.

The provided blow up mattress and couch can help to accommodate two more guests.

name: Modern Asheville Cottage Getaway
description:
Enjoy a tranquil getaway in the beautiful Asheville Mountains in this 2020 built cottage with tasteful Mid-Century Modern decor, a covered front porch, and a cozy back patio.

This perfect home base for exploring the Asheville area, and is only a few minutes drive to downtown, the infamous Grove Park Inn, Biltmore Estate, and Blue Ridge Parkway.

After a full day of exploring, kick back and enjoy the home's Hi-speed internet, 55" inch Roku TV, and fully equipped kitchen.

name: Modern Studio in Montford
description: Experience historic charm and modern comfort in this stylish studio in Montford. Built in 1908, this cozy, recently renovated, Griffin Award winning retreat offers a serene escape minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy a private entrance, full kitchen, comfortable living space, luxurious rainfall shower and easy access to local attractions, restaurants and shops. Ideal for solo travelers or couples seeking a unique and convenient stay. Close to everything for easy planning and endless adventure.

name: Hidden Creek Craftsman Retreat
description: Previously managed by a company for six years, we’re now hosting Hidden Creek Craftsman Retreat ourselves and look forward to welcoming you. This unique 7-bedroom, 6.5-bath escape in Chunns Cove, just minutes from downtown Asheville’s dining, shopping, and breweries, sleeps 16+ and blends mountain serenity with modern comforts, including spacious decks, a hot tub, and fire pit, all close to Asheville’s best attractions. Perfect for families, friend gatherings, and workplace retreats.

name: Vintage Camper @ Sharky's Hostel
description:
Adorable vintage camper at Bon Paul & Sharky's Hostel in West Asheville.

The camper comes ready with linen and blanket, as well as water, coffee maker, mini-fridge, and mini-microwave.

You will need to come inside for the bathroom and kitchen. This is a hostel with shared facilities.

There is a small work station and free wifi available inside the camper.

name: Quiet Hideaway | Private Entry
description: Welcome to your cozy Asheville retreat! You’ll have a private entrance and half bath, plus access to a shared full bath. The cozy room is a modern space with fast WiFi and a laid-back vibe, perfect for feeling at home. Step outside to the back deck with a pergola, or cozy up by the Solo Stove firepit under the stars. We’re in Oakley, 10 minutes from downtown and close to shops, restaurants, and scenic trails.

name: Under the Blue Ridge Mountains!
description: ASHEVILLE is OPEN! If convenience, yet peace and quiet are what you’re looking for, this is it. Less than 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway for hiking/biking. 10 minutes from the historic Biltmore Estate and iconic downtown Asheville with tons of BREWERIES! 15 minutes from the “front porch of WNC” is Black Mountain/Ridgecrest. Two fire pits, 2 fireplaces inside, hot tub, a pool table/air hockey table, home office. 1King, 2 Queens, 1 Full. 2 full baths, 2 half baths. We can’t wait to see you!

name: NEW! Asheville Bungalow | Fully fenced backyard
description: Discover the epitome of modern living in this newly renovated 2-bed, 1-bath bungalow nestled in the heart of vibrant West Asheville. With quick walk to trendy Haywood Road restaurant, shops, and bars, this home is convenient to so many amenities. This home welcomes you with fully fenced backyard, fresh paint, new flooring, new kitchen, and sleek quartz countertops. This cottage style home brings the charm of yesteryear while boasting the amenities of today.

name: Welcome to The Sage Nest!
description: Welcome to the Sage Nest! This 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment is approximately 12 minutes to downtown Asheville. Perfect for families and pets, it features modern amenities, high-speed Wi-Fi, and a fully equipped kitchen. Relax on the back deck and enjoy fresh herbs from our garden. Close to Asheville’s top attractions and scenic hiking trails, this retreat offers the ideal blend of relaxation and adventure for both you and your furry friends!

name: Charming Walkable W Asheville Apt | Multi. Porches
description:
STUNNING modern kitchen and guest apartment in a historic home in the heart of West Asheville. Spacious & charming! Amazing porch vibes!

GREAT LOCATION - walkable to restaurants, breweries and shops, minutes from art galleries in downtown Asheville and North RAD and 15 minutes from Biltmore Estate, NC Arboretum and Blue Ridge Parkway. Hiking, biking & scenic views!

Free parking on site.

This apartment may be rented with Blue Skye Guest Apt (upstairs) for large groups. Contact us for details.

name: Mins 2 Asheville/Fire Pit/Gameroom/Arcade/LRG Yard
description:
Whether you’re coming for a family gathering, a guys or girls weekend, or a reunion of friends, look no further than the Turnberry Adventures.
Our house has three levels, providing enough space for everyone to gather together or spend some time solo. If you're looking for a peaceful getaway in the Asheville area, Turnberry Adventure promises an unforgettable experience for families and friends.

name: Chic AVL Hideaway w/ Hot Tub, Fire Pit. Location!
description: Welcome to your launchpad for all things Asheville and beyond. Here, you'll find yourself a mere 6-minute drive from the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Biltmore entrance, and a 10 minute drive from the vibrant heart of downtown AVL. Whether you're here to explore the natural beauty of Western North Carolina or immerse yourself in Asheville’s rich culinary scene, local breweries, art galleries, and unique antique shops, everything is within easy reach from your doorstep.

name: Small House Big Forest retreat close to Asheville
description:
Discover a one-of-a-kind stay in a sleek, sustainable tiny house tucked into a lush Appalachian forest just minutes from Asheville.
Enjoy clean lines, cozy comfort, and thoughtful details — all elevated (literally) on piers to give you a treetop feel.

• 1 cozy BR with a queen bed+twin
• Full bath with walk-in shower
• Indoor-outdoor flow w large windows + private deck
• High-speed Wi-Fi + smart TV
• Heating & AC for comfort
• Nestled on a private mountain ridge — peaceful, yet close to town

name: Riverside Cottage
description:
Discover our cozy 1-bed, 1-bath tiny house near the airport, fairgrounds, Biltmore House, and river access. Ideal for solo travelers or couples. Enjoy a simple but clean and comfortable living space with serene surroundings and convenient location for a memorable retreat or a quick sleepover for an early flight. NO Cleaning fee.

Airport - 8 minutes
WNC Ag Center - 10 minutes
Siera Nevada - 13 minutes
Glenn Bridge River Park -1 mile
No TV but super fast Wifi so bring your devices.

name: NEW King, Stylish Mod and next to Downtown
description: Brand NEW interior in desirable Montford. This mid- century garden apartment invites guests that wish for a quiet and aesthetically inspiring space, central to downtown Asheville (1 mile) yet off the beaten path. Your private entrance is surrounded by a secluded green tree canopy. King-size bed, stocked kitchen including a savvy workspace at the island as well as dining table. Outdoor eating and day dreaming accommodated. Claw foot tub/shower, Roku, TV, Laundry, free parking.

name: The Cardinal Cottage near Asheville Airport/Hiking
description: Discover your perfect mountain getaway while not getting too far from the creature comforts of convenience!  Relax in this cozy and comfy home nestled in a charming and friendly neighborhood near top attractions in and around Asheville, NC. Minutes from the airport, this cottage is ideal for relaxation and exploration, and it's unique, eclectic charm promises to bring you a little closer to the magic you're looking for in your mountain stay. Book now and experience the best of western NC living!

name: The Wildwood Duplex / B
description:
This stylish, recently renovated apartment provides a modern, comfortable space in a peaceful neighborhood. You will enjoy a private entrance and all essential amenities.

Conveniently located just 5 minutes from Sierra Nevada Brewing and Asheville Airport, this unit is also close to nearby grocery stores and restaurants.

Book your stay today and experience tranquility and convenience. Discover Asheville and Western North Carolina while staying in this charming and affordable apartment.
