name: Zen Bungalow - Hot Tub, Fire Pit, Massage Chair
description: Welcome to Zen Bungalow, a newly renovated 2-bedroom unit nestled in the heart of vibrant West Asheville! As part of a triplex, this tranquil and peaceful vacation home offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. With its prime location, you'll be just 10 minutes away from the renowned River Arts District, bustling downtown Asheville, and the trendy Haywood Road.

name: Gamers Paradise - Game Room, Hot Tub, Fire Pit
description: Welcome to Gamer's Paradise, a recently renovated 2-bedroom unit that is part of a triplex located in the heart of vibrant West Asheville! This unique and retro vacation home offers an unforgettable experience for gamers and art enthusiasts alike. With its prime location, you'll be just 10 minutes away from the renowned River Arts District, bustling downtown Asheville, and the trendy Haywood Road.

name: Asheville Dream Stay | Designer Home + Hot Tub
description:
Available for 30+ day stays.

Welcome to Casa Hudzen, an award-winning designer retreat in the heart of Asheville. This modern 3bd/2ba home features soaring ceilings, a gourmet kitchen, luxe linens, and a dreamy hot tub under the stars. Thoughtfully designed with hammocks, firepits, and a peaceful private yard, it’s the perfect spot to relax, recharge, and live beautifully. Walk to Asheville’s best eats, then come home to pure mountain-chic magic.

name: Whole Dorm @ Sharky's Hostel
description:
Sleep up to 6 people in this dorm. The room has 3 twin bunks. The hostel will have guests from all over the world, however this room will only be for your group. There is plenty of common space to spread out, and we are located in the heart of West Asheville within walking distance of shops, cafes, restaurants, bars, bakery, and music.

Because this room may also be reserved by single reservations, please request to book and we'll need to manually approve the request if the whole dorm is open.

name: Blue Ridge Haven
description: This modern farmhouse inspired home built in 2019 and just 7 mins to downtown is perfect for your Asheville getaway. 5 beds, 3.5 baths, it’s great for families, girls/guys trips, or a couples getaway. A fenced in backyard off of the covered deck creates a peaceful retreat and the many windows let in ample sunlight. Come enjoy all the mountains and Asheville have to offer! Just 15 minutes to the Biltmore estate, countless hiking trails within 30 mins and countless restaurants and breweries.

name: Goldberry's Sanctuary | For Women Who Wander
description: Forest adjacent, fragrance free + for the girls! Rest in the charming guest room or explore Asheville from our lush neighborhood walkable to UNCA + urban trails. Just minutes by car to downtown, the Biltmore Estate, and West Asheville. Enjoy the well stocked kitchen, 100% cotton linens, dreamy outdoor spaces,  free parking, and private bathroom. Common areas shared with the host and their dog. Women + femmes only @goldberryssanctuary

name: Farm Suite, King bed, overlooking horse pasture!
description: Uncover the tranquil beauty of Asheville in our rustic yet modern farm suite, set amidst undulating horse pastures. Packed with charm and comfort, this enclave accommodates four guests, making it the ideal retreat for nature-loving families or couples. Immerse in North Carolina's vibrant culture with Asheville's prominent attractions such as Biltmore, River Arts District, or a bouquet of breweries nearby.

name: Cozy Mtn Retreat close to Downtown AVL & Trails!
description: Welcome to Hemphill Hideaway. This stone cottage is perfectly situated 8 minutes drive to downtown Avl and .25 mile from the Mountain-To-Sea hiking trial. Enjoy the best of both worlds with a private and quiet space nestled in the trees that’s a close and easy drive to downtown as well as great hiking.

name: Asheville Escape - Hot Tubs, Game Room, Fire Pit
description: Welcome to Asheville Escape, a combination of two newly renovated 2-bedroom units nestled in the heart of vibrant West Asheville! As part of a triplex, this tranquil and peaceful vacation home offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. With its prime location, you'll be just 10 minutes away from the renowned River Arts District, bustling downtown Asheville, and the trendy Haywood Road.

name: AVL Mountain View River Retreat I Hot Tub I Sauna
description:
Discover the ultimate Asheville retreat for your next getaway!

This spectacular cabin perched above the Swannanoa River and with stunning mountain views is ready for your next retreat.

Entertainment reigns with a private cinema featuring reclining seats, an epic game room along with a expansive outdoor spaces featuring a firepit, sauna and hot tub.

A short drive from downtown and AVL airport.

name: Mountain view cottage
description: Consider this studio your home away from home while you visit Asheville. This wonderful property offers a perfect retreat for guests. . Our studio provides  space to relax and unwind. Central AC/ heating. The studio is designed for longer stays with everything you'll need to prepare  an incredible meal and top it off with the mountain view. Designated parking space and high speed internet unique and tranquil getaway. Please message with questions, discounts and minimum night stay options.

name: Separate Living Area, Bi-Level House
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Your home away from home in Downtown Asheville
description: Experience the charm of Asheville during your stay at The Highline, a contemporary two-bedroom, two-bath home located in the lively downtown area. This delightful home offers everything you need for a comfortable stay, whether you're here for work, leisure, or a bit of both.

name: Experience the Asheville Vibe-Cozy Gem in West AVL
description: Experience the Asheville Vibe (AVL Vibe) at our cozy studio in the heart of Asheville (West Asheville), where the spirit of our vibrant community shines through, even as it recovers. Our home and studio were safe through Hurricane Helene. The city of Asheville and its businesses welcomes you and needs your support. Come experience the best of Asheville’s food, beer, arts, and music while supporting the community as we work together to bring this special place back stronger than ever.

name: West Asheville Central
description:
We are happy you are coming to Asheville. You are Welcome here.
There is music, shoping and our Artists arting and of course there is Beer!

There are a lot of changes here so plan accordingly. Many businesses are up and running and events back on track - while many places are still rebuilding so check out your favorite spots for their status.

We are centrally-located -
Walkable to all West Asheville shops, restaurants and cafes. Easy Interstate access and close to downtown.

Welcome

name: Live like a local | downtown Asheville
description: Minimum 30-Day Stay – Monthly Rental in Walkable Downtown Asheville Discover the Kanuga Suite, a fully furnished one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment in the heart of downtown Asheville. Perfect for extended stays, this monthly rental blends artistic charm with everyday comfort—ideal for business travelers, digital nomads, or anyone looking to soak up the local culture.

name: Sleeps 20! | Asheville Oasis | Theater | Sauna
description:
Welcome to your ultimate mountain escape near Asheville! Whether you're planning a family getaway, group retreat, or special celebration, this spacious, amenity-packed home has everything you need for a relaxing and unforgettable stay.

♨️ Hot Tub & Sauna – Relax and unwind after a day of adventure
🎥 Movie Theater – Enjoy a cinematic experience with a big screen & surround sound
🎱 Game Room – Play pool, ping pong shuffleboard, & arcade games
🔥 Fire Pit – Relax and roast s’mores at night

name: The Mural Room
description: Refresh your traveling spirit amidst the collaborative art of two daughters of Asheville. Located in a convenient and peaceful residential neighborhood just minutes from the area's finest attractions, this comfortable queen bedroom with detached private bath is a great choice for anyone looking for a simple, clean room with a touch of creativity when visiting the Asheville area.

name: Clean and simple
description: One room, very short term stays, very simple, quiet, close to everything, private, chill vibe. Must be LGBT friendly. There are stairs and an old dog.

name: Cozy Private Luxury Apartment - 15m to Downtown
description:
This is the perfect home base for your Asheville adventures. Conveniently located 10 minutes from vibrant West Asheville and 15 minutes from the heart of downtown, this sweet retreat is a short drive from great restaurants, bars, shopping, music venues, and roof tops.

The apartment is independent, so you’ll have complete privacy to relax and unwind after a day of exploration. Perfect for the outdoor enthusiast, city lover, or anything in-between.

name: The Lofts at Church St. #101/102
description: These 1st floor historic loft apartments put you in the heart of downtown Asheville, just two blocks from Pack Square. Specialty shops, restaurants, galleries, and theaters are all within walking distance. The Biltmore Estate is just 5 miles away and is nearby other attractions. *Rental Agreement Required*

name: *NEW* Private Gem in AVL!
description:
Welcome to your perfect escape! Just private enough to feel secluded but within close proximity of all things Asheville! Start your mornings with a brew from the Nespresso machine, and unwind in the evenings by the fire pit under the stars.

Supporting local Asheville is our mission so the property is stocked with locally made products throughout!

Furbabies welcome to accompany your AVL stay complete with a fully fenced in yard.

name: Walkable Downtown Asheville | Monthly 2BR Rental
description: 30 Day Rental  | Get ready to experience Langdon Hall, a charming 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home in downtown Asheville. This beautiful home is a perfect retreat, offering comfort and convenience for your stay. As you enter Langdon Hall, you’ll be greeted by an inviting living room that exudes warmth and style. Thoughtfully decorated, this space is perfect for relaxing or entertaining.

name: Asheville Red Gate
description:
Thank you for supporting us with your visit!

Located in the River Arts District, Red Gate is tucked away in the Chicken Hill neighborhood. The co-manager lives in a separate apartment on site.

The house is open, airy, and located a 15-minute walk to downtown and South Slope and one mile from West Asheville — restaurants, shopping, music venues, bars, and breweries!

We welcome dogs, but due to allergy issues, cannot host cats.

name: Mtn View, 3 miles to DT AVL, King Beds, Fire Pit
description: Brand new build (August 2024) located in the perfect location to enjoy an Asheville mountain getaway!  Located right between downtown Asheville (3 miles) and the Blue Ridge Parkway (3.5 miles).  In the mountains yet close enough for a quick drive or uber to enjoy the many restaurants and breweries of downtown. Thoughtfully designed and decorated with the vacationer in mind.  Relax on one of the two outdoor decks, fire pit, play cornhole, or stay cozy inside enjoying the view

name: Asheville Home-Hot Tub/Deck/Yard
description: The perfect place to enjoy the mountains with all the conveniences of Asheville. Hot tub, deck, fenced yard, fire pit, all the conveniences of home. Explore nearby West Asheville, the River Arts District, or make the short drive downtown.  Close to fantastic restaurants, breweries, coffee shops, and outdoor activities. Sleeps 6. One king, one queen, and one pullout couch. Dogs welcome. Fenced-in yard. No indoor fireplace use or guest access to garage for parking.

name: Blue Ridge Cottage | Fire Place |Hot Tub
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Experience the perfect blend of nature and luxury at this charming rustic cabin, nestled in a serene woodland setting. Perfect for a small family, a romantic getaway, or a friends’ retreat, this cozy cabin offers a warm and inviting interior that seamlessly connects with the surrounding outdoor beauty. Unwind in the hot tub, gather around the communal fire pit for s’mores, and let the calming sounds of nature enhance your stay!

name: Bent Creek Cottage-Hot Tub-Fireplace-Fire Pit
description:
Escape to tranquility at this delightful mountain cottage, designed with the modern traveler in mind. Recently updated, the home features spacious, welcoming interiors and a covered deck with a private hot tub. Enjoy shared amenities such as a cozy fire pit while you unwind and recharge in this scenic haven!

Biltmore Estate: 15 min
Downtown Asheville - 15-min drive
NC Arboretum - 5-min drive

name: Basement Studio Apt 1.7mi to Downtown
description:
Welcome to Realtor & Biz Owner Kitty Savage’s private basement apartment in Asheville, designed for music enthusiasts, free spirits, and hemp-friendly visitors.

This 800 sq ft space offers its own driveway, mini fridge, convection oven, large sink, and Keurig coffee maker, a standup shower. A king-size microfiber bed.

As a newly built home, we're constantly working on improvements, so you might see some ongoing projects. We welcome small pets.

name: SGL-LVL | Hot Tub | Fireplace | EV Charger | Grill
description:
Unwind in this peaceful 1BR retreat minutes from Asheville’s top sights. Enjoy a full kitchen, electric fireplace, private deck, hot tub, EV charger, & in-unit laundry. Tucked in a quiet wooded community with a private entrance, driveway (trailer-friendly), & shared fire pit. Ideal for couples, solo travelers, or extended stays.

Note: This is a side-by-side duplex with a private driveway & entrance

NC Arboretum – 5 min
Blue Ridge Parkway – 10 min
Downtown – 15 min
Biltmore Estate – 15 min

name: Min to AVL | Hot Tub | FirePit | EVCharger | Grill
description:
Unwind in this peaceful 1BR retreat minutes from Asheville’s top sights. Enjoy a full kitchen, electric fireplace, private deck, hot tub, EV charger, & in-unit laundry. Tucked in a quiet wooded community with a private entrance, driveway (trailer-friendly), & shared fire pit. Ideal for couples, solo travelers, or extended stays.

Note: This is a side-by-side duplex with a private driveway & entrance

NC Arboretum – 5 min
Blue Ridge Parkway – 10 min
Downtown – 15 min
Biltmore Estate– 15 min

name: 4-Cottage Retreat for Groups!
description: Escape to Rhododendron Retreat for your family reunion or group getaway! Our 4 charming cottages offer privacy and comfort in a prime Asheville location, close to all the city's attractions. Enjoy gourmet kitchens, open living areas, cozy fireplaces, and hot tubs on private decks. Gather in the outdoor space around the fire pit, breathe in the mountain air, and create unforgettable memories together. Perfect for a rejuvenating retreat!

name: 1Bed Apt Historic Montford (1/4)
description:
Spacious, pet-friendly downtown apartment in a 4-unit historic Montford home. Fully equipped kitchen & furnished; linens provided.
3 other units have other guests living in them. You won't share any common space with them besides the parking space in the gravel area in the back and the washer and dryer.
It's only a short walk to downtown, where you can find award-winning restaurants, entertainment, coffee shops, breweries, & shopping.

name: Asheville Downtown Stay #202
description:
Experience Downtown Asheville! Art galleries, museums, theaters, concerts, craft cocktails, gourmet dining, breweries, bakeries, bodegas, bookstores, spas, salons, myriad eclectic shops - all within walking distance of your chic urban stay! It includes a gated parking spot & building H2O filtration system - so fill your water bottle, hike/bike the Blue Ridge, park securely, walk to dinner & a show, then stop in downstairs for wine+snacks+live music!
Note: live music on site nightly until 10 pm

name: Asheville Downtown Stay #201
description:
Experience Downtown Asheville! Art galleries, museums, theaters, concerts, craft cocktails, gourmet dining, breweries, bakeries, bodegas, bookstores, spas, salons, myriad eclectic shops - all within walking distance of your chic urban stay! It has a water filtration system & includes a gated parking spot! Fill your H2O bottle, hike/bike the Blue Ridge, park securely, stroll to dinner & a show, then enjoy a nightcap & live music at 5 Walnut Wine Bar!
Note: live music on site nightly until 10 pm

name: Cozy Cork Cottage Private Secure Quaint
description:
Relax at our Cozy Cork Cottage. Our 850 sf, one story cottage will be your PERFECT respite!! Nestled in this quiet tree filled south Asheville mountain community of Royal Pines in Arden! Our Cozy Cottage will be PERFECT for your vacation home base.!

The cottage is BRIGHT and CHEERY with lots of windows furnished with 2" white Venetian Blinds throughout.

Quaint and cute, the cottage's brilliant floor plan gives it a much bigger feel and provides lots of privacy!

name: Historic Home With a Fresh Face!
description: Historic Home is in the heart of walkable West Asheville! This 100 year old home was just completely renovated with fresh touches to a charming home. This home is a short walk to Asheville institutions like Sunny Point Cafe and Haywood Commons. Work remotely or bring the family to this unique home in the hip city nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains.

name: Secluded Suite Near Biltmore
description: Guest suite located in a peaceful neighborhood. Located 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, 10 minutes from the Biltmore house and airport, and 15 minutes from downtown Asheville. House has a half acre of land in the backyard and is walkable to  several restaurants and a grocery stores. Pets are welcome, but please let us know in advance to provide couch covers *please no smoking of any kind.*

name: Modern Asheville Escape_Brand New!
description: Welcome to your contemporary home away from home!  Our thoughtfully designed space is just minutes from downtown, allowing you to easily explore all that Asheville has to offer while enjoying a tranquil, private haven.  Whether you’re here to hike, visit the historic Biltmore Estate, or experience the local craft breweries, you’ll be perfectly positioned to make the most of your stay.  We can’t wait to welcome you!

name: New Entire Home 5 minutes from Downtown Asheville
description: Experience your ideal getaway in this brand new, standalone home, just minutes from downtown Asheville. This charming retreat features high-end furnishings & a kitchen equipped for culinary enthusiasts and coffee lovers alike. Whether you're on a romantic escape, exploring Asheville's vibrant charm, or enjoying a remote work trip with fiber internet and ample workspace, this cozy cottage offers modern comforts and a perfect base for your adventure. Book now for the ultimate Asheville experience!

name: Apartment in quiet neighborhood
description:
Welcome to your home away from home in Asheville! Our delightful 1-bedroom upstairs apartment is part of a quaint duplex. Located just a 13-minute drive from downtown Asheville and 16 minutes from Mission Hospital, it's an ideal location for all visits.

Amenities:

- Free Parking: Convenient on-site parking for your use.
- Self-Check-In: Keyless entry system.

We’re excited to host you in our lovely apartment and make your stay in Asheville memorable. Feel free to reach out with any questions!

name: Rosemary House
description: Relax at this peaceful place to stay in a quiet neighborhood in Asheville.

name: Luxury Mountain Retreat for Adventure & Relaxation
description:
🏞️

Helene Update:
Our house was not damaged from the storm.

Step into your peaceful forest hideaway, a charming new-renovated brick home nestled amid towering trees just minutes from waterfalls and the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway. Here, you don’t just stay—you slow down, reconnect, and soak in the natural beauty of Western North Carolina.

PRIVATE KITCHEN
Pots/pans
Cooking/outdoor grill essentials
Coffee maker
Fully equipped kitchen
Laundry
Small Cooking Appliances
Seats six people

name: Solar & Eco-Friendly in Walkable Historic Montford
description:
Eco-friendlier 1-bedroom lower-level apartment with private access, located in the charming historic Montford neighborhood.

Walkable to Trader Joe’s, Harris Teeter, & Whole Foods; Visitor Center; downtown Asheville; South Slope brewery district; greenway. Montford also has wonderful neighborhood restaurants, cafes, & a cocktail bar.

Solar power, composting, organic cotton sheets and towels, and hard-to-recycle item recycling (e.g., snack wrappers, takeout containers, etc.) via Terracycle.

name: BLACK BEAR RIDGE: Charming Pet-Friendly Getaway
description: Nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains, just 7 miles from downtown Asheville, enjoy mountain views from the wrap-around porch, sip morning coffee to the sounds of nature, or unwind by the fire pit under a starry canopy. With spacious interiors, charming bay windows, and a welcoming atmosphere, it's the ideal spot to experience Asheville—close enough to explore vibrant downtown, yet secluded for peace. Book your stay today!

name: Asheville house with Nana
description:
Relax and recharge at our peaceful home with stunning sunset views.

Enjoy the company of Nana, our friendly cat, and take advantage of our prime location—minutes from downtown dining, Asheville Outlets, Biltmore House, UNCA, and hiking trails/waterfalls. Cataloochee Ski resort is just 45-60 min away.

Whether you're here to explore the local culture, indulge in outdoor adventures, or simply relax with Nana by your side, our home is your ideal base for an unforgettable Asheville experience.

name: NEW BUILD Blue Ridge Tree House 4 mi DT Asheville
description: BRAND NEW BUILD-Stay comfortably in Asheville at this 2-bedroom cottage. The cozy interior features 1 queen bed, 1 bunk bed ( full size below/ twin up top), perfect for a small group of guests. Enjoy the soothing atmosphere and unwind by the firepit after a long day of exploration. All the amenities of a brand new house, yet feels like your camping in the trees! Only 4 miles to DT Asheville!

name: Fully Loaded W.AVL Haven! Hot Tub & min to DT AVL
description:
Discover the perfect Asheville getaway in our stylish 2BR, 2.5BA retreat, steps from vibrant Haywood Road. Nestled in W. AVL, you’re minutes from the DT AVL and the historic Biltmore Estate.

Unwind in comfort and style in our well-appointed new construction home. Ideal for explorers and relaxation seekers who have an equal appreciation for sophisticated design, a relaxing hot tub, and proximity to some of the best food in town.

Owner lives on lowest level with private entrance.

name: Cozy Nature Nook w/ Yard - Walkable and Convenient
description:
Superbly located 1923 West Asheville bungalow, walkable to the best local shops, breweries, and restaurants on Haywood Rd. Just 10 minutes away from colorful, leafy views of the Blue Ridge Mtns, Downtown, Biltmore, hiking, and greenways!

This is truly an indoor/outdoor space, with lots of natural light, windows, fenced-in yard, deck, and front porch. Decorated w/ a blend of local and international goods, it's designed to promote comfort and peace. Retreat or adventure; the choice is yours!

name: Asheville Sunset | 10min to Asheville + Ping Pong
description: Welcome to Asheville Sunset—your perfect retreat just 10 minutes north of Downtown Asheville! Nestled in the serene beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains, Asheville Sunset offers the best of both worlds: the vibrant energy of Asheville's eclectic downtown and the tranquil embrace of nature.

name: Lamplighter House - Hot Tub, Firepit, Games, Movie
description: Discover Lamplighter House, a luxurious 4BR, 3BA retreat just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville. This mid-century modern gem sleeps 15 and offers endless entertainment with a game room, media room, sauna, hot tub, fire pit, and geo-dome. The fully stocked kitchen is a chef's dream. Pet-friendly with free parking and high-speed Wi-Fi, it's the perfect getaway. Close to Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, and local attractions.

name: Asheville Downtown Stay #302
description: Experience eclectic downtown Asheville! Stroll to art galleries/studios, museums, theater, drum circles, concerts, craft cocktails, epicurean dining, breweries, bakeries, patisseries, organic groceries, bookstores, spas, salons - myriad shops of amazing variety! This chic urban stay (1 of 3 onsite) has a tap filtration system and includes a parking - space-fill your water bottle, tour/hike/bike the majestic Blue Ridge Parkway, then step downstairs for a glass of wine+yummy snacks+live music! ! !

name: Asheville NC~30 plus day stays only~
description: Welcome to this newly constructed home in Asheville, NC! Located near the French Broad River Park and just a short drive to all the most popular things Asheville has to offer - shopping, restaurants, entertainment, and art. This home is available to rent on a 30 plus day basis and is a greta spot to call your home while you are working here temporarily or waiting on your home to be built. The home comes with two parking spaces, and overlooks a ravine at the back of the property.

name: 15 mins from Asheville
description:
Conveniently located for Asheville and the mountains.

Cozy comfortable bedroom with private bathroom available along with light use of the rest of the house and the covered front porch and the back deck, which looks out onto woods.

There's plenty of parking. It's a very quiet and very safe neighborhood that most people don't even know is here.
Lots of shops and restaurants within a couple of miles.

I have three indoor/outdoor cats so this isn't appropriate for anyone with cat allergies.

name: Modern Downtown Retreat - new, location, quiet!
description: Welcome to our brand-new one-bedroom apartment, conveniently located on the edge of Montford and downtown. This stylish space features ample living areas, a cozy bedroom, a private backyard, dedicated parking, and a fully equipped kitchen. You’ll be a short walk from downtown’s music venues, breweries, restaurants, and shops, and a short drive to the Biltmore or Blue Ridge Parkway. Whether you’re here to explore or relax, our apartment offers the perfect mix of comfort and convenience!

name: The Hiker’s Hideaway: No cleaning fee+pet-friendly
description:
The Hiker’s Hideaway is a cozy, pet-friendly basement suite beautifully nestled in the mountains. Our neighborhood is quiet, yet accessible— right on the Blue Ridge Parkway and less than 10 minutes to downtown for dining, drinks, and shopping. In the room you’ll find a hand painted mural, queen bed, full bath, kitchen + stocked coffee bar.

Perfect for solo travelers looking for a safe place to land or couples who need a place to rest after a full day. Look out for 🐻 sightings in our yard!

name: Chimney Crest
description:
Enjoy a memorable visit when you stay in this unique place.

Elegant. Sunsets supreme. Near downtown Asheville. Top of the mountain.

name: Asheville Cottage Retreat
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

name: House on the Hilltop
description: Enjoy an easy couple nights in Asheville in this charming studio style space in a home in Woodfin just a short distance from the many amenities Asheville has to offer.

name: Asheville Living
description:
Comfortable living minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy 3 bedrooms, fully stocked kitchen, laundry room, living room all to yourself. Each room features a king size bed, TV and full closet. Private entrance accessible with keypad lock.

Disclaimer: You will have the entire place to yourself. There is an attached upper section that is currently being renovated but it is closed off from the section you will be staying in.

name: Sweet West Asheville home
description: Immaculate and stylish house in a location that provides easy access to everything Asheville has to offer. Only 10 minutes from downtown, four minutes from the popular Haywood Rd. in West Asheville, and 15 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, this home has everything you’ll need to relax and unwind after whatever adventure you choose! The backyard is spacious and perfect for outdoor games and activities. Grill out under the covered patio or sit on the front porch and enjoy your morning coffee.

name: Private and suite
Cozy Bear Retreat
description:
Nestled in the scenic mountains of Asheville, our spacious getaway is the perfect place to relax, recharge, and have fun! With room to comfortably sleep 8, Cozy Bear Retreat is perfect for everyone!

Located near top attractions, breweries, restaurants, hiking trails, and more, you’ll have endless options for adventure. Whether you're here to hike, explore artsy downtown, or sip through the brewery scene, this is the place to be.

Book now and experience the magic of AVL with comfort and style!

name: ~Stylish Cottage in Asheville~
description: Escape to a whimsical haven where cottagecore charm meets modern luxury.  Nestled in a quiet Asheville neighborhood, our enchanting 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom cottage invites you to indulge in a serene getaway. With its fairy-tale ambiance and thoughtful amenities, this special space is perfect for couples, friends, or small families seeking both relaxation and adventure :)

name: Chic Downtown AVL Retreat 1BD/BA Apt
description: Welcome to your ideal home base in downtown Asheville! This stylish 1BD/1BA lower-level apartment in a renovated historic home is perfect for adventure seekers and digital nomads. Centrally located to award-winning dining, craft breweries, art galleries in downtown, the River Arts District, South Slope Brewing District, and Montford Historic District. Fast WiFi, modern comforts, and quiet location make it perfect for remote work while enjoying the vibrant culture of the Appalachian Mountains.

name: Wildwood Corner Cabin near AVL ~ Two King Beds
description: Beautiful mountain cabin, in a quiet wooded neighborhood is 5 minutes from the airport and in the middle of everything else.  20 minutes from downtown Asheville, Hendersonville, The Biltmore, and more. Updated kitchen and walk-in shower. Beautiful walking/biking neighborhood. Pet friendly! 2 King bedrooms, plus LOFT with two twins.

name: Walk Downtown, Grocery & Trails!
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Home. Walking distance to Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, Downtown, the Reed Creek Greenway, UNCA and Botanical Gardens! Recently updated and has a cozy, homey feel. The back deck off the bedroom gets direct southern light.

$250 Flat Fee for all Utilities (Water, Sewer, Trash, Electric, AT&T Fiber Internet, Lawn Care)

New stainless appliances, quartzite countertops, & mini splits for heating & cooling.

name: Master Suite #2 Upstairs w View
description:
Surrounded by Trees w a Mtn View. Peaceful Vibes & Folks. Warm Yoga Studio & Strength Training Rm, Jacuzzi, 4 Season Outdoor Dining, In Ground Firepit, Grill, Kid Friendly Home. 6 min frm Airport, 15 frm Downtown Hendersonville & Asheville. Walk through backyard to Fletcher Park w Trails/Creeks/Pickleball!

May share Home w other Guest-3 Dining areas to choose from inside. Retreat vibes. I hold Yoga Classes upon request.

This is the Spirit/Silver Room. 5 Bdrm Home & each is a diff Element.🌀🩶

name: Peaceful home close to downtown - Room 2
description:
My home is located 2 mi from downtown Asheville and Mission Health is a 6-minute drive away.

Your room has a dedicated bathroom, plenty of storage space, and a view of the pollinator garden. You’ll have access to the living room, full kitchen, and outdoor living areas.

name: Mountain East Retreat
description:
This is the quiet part of Asheville with lots of trees, peaceful wooded setting; yet only 7 miles to the Heart of Downtown. Walking areas near by. Most major food shopping 2-5 miles away and all other shopping. ( Whole Foods/ Ingles - 2miles which the closest/Target and so much more!
We are offer bottled water!
Just off a Plane and hungry? We have snacks!
Our place is air purified as well.

name: West Asheville tiny home
description: Carefully curated 325 sq ft of space that feels anything but small.  Five minute walk to all the restaurants and shops Haywood Road has to offer, 5-8 min drive to downtown.  Set back just off West Asheville's most beautiful street and behind a fence, this tiny home is private and an oasis in the city.

name: Master Bedroom Suite w/ Mtn View
description: Master Bdrm w Mountain View’s, full of Natural Lighting. This is an upstairs Suite w Private Entrance, also leading to Backyard Jacuzzi, in ground Fire-pit, & 4-Season Outdoor Dining. It is a Loft, noise carries, so we offer a cheaper price than other rooms. An elegant space w private Bathroom (Bidet, Jacuzzi Bathtub); Futon for extra guest/Kids. 6 min from AVL airport, Fletcher Park 10 min walk through backyard Path, 15 min to Dwntn Asheville/Hendersonville. Walk to new Auction House across st!

name: Chic Heritage Cabin: Privacy, Luxury & Adventure
description: Step into a 47-year-old log cabin, meticulously renovated to offer a fusion of historic charm and modern luxury nestled in Asheville. This secluded oasis is ideal for up to 8 guests craving a quintessential mountain retreat within just minutes of Asheville's attractions. Besides a captivating interior, relish alfresco dining, an entertaining game room and blazing fire pit evenings amidst 2 acres of lush woodland.

name: Asheville Walkable Modern Haven
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. The property is in the historic Albemarle neighborhood and provides you with access to walking and cycling on the beautiful tree lined streets as well as is walkable to several restaurants, a local butcher shop, a yoga studio, juice bar, and coffee shops. The property is also less than a mile walk or drive to downtown Asheville which offers amazing dining, art galleries, museums, a fine arts theatre, local shopping and more.

name: Creekside Mountain Getaway-5 Miles To Town-FirePit
description: Easy Times Cabin is a new rustic Appalachian home with plenty of modern amenities situated only 5 miles from Downtown Asheville and only 6.8 miles away from the beautiful Biltmore Estate. The cabin is also close to many other popular attractions in the area like the N.C. Arboretum, hiking/biking trails, many breweries and restaurants and the list goes on! Easy Times Cabin is unique because the host takes care of everything for you! You have no chores or pre-checkout list!! Just enjoy your stay.

name: New luxury guesthouse retreat
description: Brand new, green energy certified, guesthouse in the historic Norwood Park district - the heart of Asheville, NC. Enjoy simplicity, comfort, and cleanness. Walk iconic neighborhoods and greenways to UNCA (.7 miles), Grove Park Resort (.8 miles),  Charlotte Street restaurants (.9 miles), and downtown (1.5 miles).

name: Amazing Views-Hot Tub- Game Room-Asheville 12 min
description: Escape to Aster Ridge, an eclectic, artfully designed modern retreat just 10 minutes from Asheville's vibrant downtown. This epic sanctuary combines the city’s creative energy with stunning Blue Ridge Mountain views. Whether you are looking to relax in the hot tub, challenge friends in the game room, or explore Asheville's top attractions, Aster Ridge offers the perfect getaway for families, couples, tourists, friends, student groups, and pet-friendly stays.

name: Asheville Home 15m from Downtown w Hot Tub & Sauna
description: Welcome to Blue Ridge Mountaintop Oasis on Brisco, your luxurious escape in the heart of the Asheville mountains! This exceptional 4-bedroom, 3.5-bath retreat, uniquely designed to blend modern comfort with natural beauty, accommodates up to 16 guests with stunning mountain views, stylish mid-century modern decor, and exceptional amenities.

name: The Longview
description: Welcome to The Longview, a new offering from a longtime Superhost. The Longview is perched on a hill affording spectacular long range views from the side deck. With four bedrooms and an office featuring  three king and two queen beds, your party will enjoy room to themselves as well as ample public spaces to make memories together. The Longview comfortably sleeps up to 10 and has books, games, and many kitchen amenities for you to enjoy. Minutes from downtown Asheville, grocery walking distance.

name: NewConstruction, Walk to Haywood
description:
Welcome to a truly special find in the heart of West Asheville! This brand-new construction home, nestled on a quiet dead-end street, offers both tranquility and walkability. With ample parking, an open floor plan, crate and barrel furnishings, and high-end upgraded appliances, this residence is designed for modern living.
The layout features two bedrooms on the second floor and a bonus room in the basement, complete with a spacious bedroom and office. Each bedroom has its own private bathroom.

name: Enchanting Forest Guest Suite
description: Nestled in a centrally located mountain neighborhood, a cozy 1 bed & bath guest suite offering peace, privacy & forest charm just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville. Your private retreat includes a kitchenette, dining space & den on a fully separate, lower floor of a cabin. Outside sit round the fire, sway lazily in the hammock or corn hole it up on a secluded grassy lawn embraced by a lush tree canopy. In winter, distant mountain views & the creeks melody add a quiet magic to a natural haven.

name: Hot Tub~5 Mi DT AVL~Walk To West AVL
description:
Welcome to The Heart of AVL, a one-of-a-kind retreat in Asheville’s trendiest neighborhood! This stylish home offers the ultimate mix of relaxation and entertainment, just minutes from downtown and within walking distance to West Asheville’s best restaurants, breweries, and music venues. Whether you’re here to unwind, explore, or work remotely, this stay has it all.

Please Read More About The Space

name: Creekside Joy- Beautiful Home,20 Min to Asheville
description:
Welcome to Creekside Joy. Centrally located just 20 minutes from Asheville, you’ll enjoy some quiet creekside living while being just minutes from so many wonderful area attractions.

With a gorgeous horse farm across the way, soak in the picturesque views, as the sound of the creek babbles by.

Larger groups can book the adjacent property Creekside Delight, for a discount. Message us for details.

name: 5BD,3BA Private Pool | Hot Tub
description: Enjoy a truly wonderful experience near everything the Asheville area has to offer!  This 5-bed, 3-bath home is conveniently located in Arden, NC with everything you need for a peaceful getaway. Whether relaxing in the hot tub, sitting by the fire pit, cooling off in the private pool (Summer), or exploring all of Asheville’s restaurants and breweries, you’ll be sure to find what you are craving each day.  This centrally-located retreat is the perfect starting point for your Asheville adventures.

name: Stone’s Throw Cottage - 2 miles to downtown
description:
2 miles to downtown & fully back online from Helene
Fully furnished with onsite laundry and full kitchen. Open kitchen to living room floor plan with large walnut live edge bar top. Two bedrooms (beds have been removed at time of photos but will be in place with two queens). Less than a half mile to UNCA campus with access to both Woodfin and Merrimon Avenue corridors via Overlook Rd. Off street parking for two cars. Pleasant boulder garden yard space with fire pit. Pet friendly

name: Mountain Villa | Views | GameRoom | Hot Tub | Pool
description:
Discover the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure at this cozy Blue Ridge Mountain retreat! Ideal for families, friends, or work travelers, it features spacious rooms, modern comforts, and convenient access to local attractions.

Dive into the private pool, unwind in the game room, or simply enjoy the thoughtfully designed spaces. With everything you need for a memorable stay, this home is your ultimate getaway destination—where comfort meets unforgettable moments!

name: Broadway Apartment 201 in Downtown AVL
description:
11 Broadway Apartment 201 is brand new & never before lived in. Renovations were completed in September 2024 & the apartment is ready for its first guest! Be the first to sleep in the king-sized bed & relax in the living room featuring gallery walls, smart TV, and comfy seating. Kitchen includes new stainless-steel appliances & all necessities for a home cooked meal. High ceilings, in-unit washer & dryer, and spacious living areas. One off-street parking space.

We look forward to hosting you!

name: Broadway Apartment 203 in Downtown AVL
description:
11 Broadway Apartment 203 is a new apartment with full floor to ceiling renovations completed in September 2024.

Sleep in the king-sized bed & relax in the living room featuring gallery walls, smart TV, and plenty of comfy seating. Kitchen includes new stainless-steel appliances & all necessities for a great home cooked meal. Enjoy high ceilings, in-unit washer and dryer, and spacious living areas. One free off-street parking space.

We look forward to hosting you!

name: Heart of Asheville - RAD
description: Enjoy your private suite in the lower level of our beautiful 100-year-old house. We offer a clean, comfy stay convenient to: Downtown (1 mi), River Arts (.5 mi), West Asheville (1 mi), South Slope (1 mi), and Biltmore (2 mi). This is an urban area, next door to a housing authority (low income housing) on a street with historic homes. We live upstairs with our 2 small children, who are early risers. You will probably hear us, as we all share this big old house.

name: Modern A-Frame Cabin with Panoramic Views| Hot Tub
description: Escape to this serene A-frame cabin nestled in the woods of Asheville, NC. With breathtaking floor-to-ceiling windows, a fully stocked kitchen, and spacious living areas, this modern retreat is the perfect balance of luxury and comfort. Guests can enjoy the private deck, hot tub on the lower level back patio, a game room for fun nights in, and easy access to downtown Asheville's attractions. Ideal for couples, families, or a small group of friends looking for an unforgettable getaway.

name: Treetop Retreat in Hidden Cove
description:
Nestled in the hollow, this getaway immerses you in the forest with peace, quiet, and the sounds of nature. In a newly renovated home, the separate ensuite queen bedroom, bathroom, and lounge area (couch, dining table, etc.) has its own but opposite and lockable side within the home (est. 400 sq. ft.) giving ample space and privacy. Launch your urban and outdoor adventures here, 2.4 m. from downtown!
5-10 minutes from downtown Asheville.
NO TELEVISION provided.

name: Asheville Home: Hot Tub and Prime Location!
description: Discover Asheville from this inviting 4-bedroom retreat! Featuring a chef's kitchen, a private hot tub, and parking for 5 cars, it's ideally located near the Biltmore Estate, breweries, and more. Explore nearby hiking trails, restaurants, and the NC Arboretum, creating unforgettable memories in this perfect getaway.

name: 2 bedroom in Asheville.
description: 2 bedroom in Asheville.  Wanting to provide my spare bed to anyone from the Asheville area that has living arrangements impacted due to Helene . Must show proof that you are from the area. Have one room with a queen bed and the other room where you can store your things. Not your typical” vacation rental “ experience. But it is a new/ clean and safe space to recuperate. I have electric, well water , and service ( WiFi isn’t back on yet). I live here but it will be peaceful and comfortable.

name: Comfy Retreat: Asheville Haven!
Gorgeous & close to everything
description: Newly green home build in Historic St. Dunstans District, 2 miles south of Downtown, 10-minute walk into Biltmore Village.  This beautiful 2 BR apartment has a private front entrance and is fully furnished for short-term rental of 30+ days. Home has stained concrete floors, all new stainless appliances including dishwasher, induction stovetop, and stackable washer & dryer.  Bedroom 1 has a queen bed with large closet and empty dresser.  Living room has sleeper sofa and a 32” TV with Firestick.

name: The Beaucatcher Motel
description: The Beaucatcher Motel is a local 60's era motel modernized for today's traveler.  Our central location is ideal for any traveler looking to explore all that Asheville offers, within 1/2 mile from Downtown Asheville and 1 mile from  Biltmore Estate.  All rooms are equipped with a microwave, mini fridge, free wi-fi and either a private balcony or shared patio to enjoy our beautiful courtyard views.

name: Downtown Chic Condo 30 day rate
description: Stunning contemporary 5th floor condo in the heart of downtown Asheville - monthly rental. Steps from music venues, breweries, restaurants, and more, easily explore the vibe of Asheville. Enjoy views of downtown and mountain vistas from every room, or on your private balcony. Luxurious 2 bedroom/2 bath, open floor plan, and full kitchen - designed and accessorized with premium amenities to meet your needs. Free secure parking on site. For work or pleasure, you've found your home away from home!

name: Historic Log Cabin | Quiet Return to Simpler Days
description:
Step back in time.

This hand-hewn 1800s log cabin in Arden offers a rare kind of quiet — the kind that holds memory. Just 15 minutes from Asheville, yet rooted in stillness.

Inside, a wood-burning stove glows. A loft bedroom invites rest.

Here, the past isn’t preserved — it’s lived in.

Support local heritage and discover the beauty of Asheville’s mountains. Book Cane Creek Cabin today!

name: Charming Cottage Near Downtown Asheville
description: Welcome to Green Door Cottage, a warm and inviting retreat in the heart of Asheville. This thoughtfully designed 3-bedroom, 2-bath home is the perfect escape for families, remote workers, and small groups. Whether starting your day with coffee on the porch or unwinding after an adventure-filled afternoon, you’ll find comfort, relaxation, and a sense of home in this beautifully appointed cottage.

name: Luxurious 30+ day Rental in Asheville!
description: Welcome to Deja Blue Bungalow, the ideal two-bedroom retreat for an unforgettable extended stay in Asheville. Available for stays of 30 days or more, this welcoming home is pet-friendly and brimming with practical amenities, including a washer and dryer, to ensure your stay is as convenient and comfortable as possible.

name: Beer City and Biltmore!
description:
This spacious home has a wonderful location to everything you will want to do while in Asheville. Monthly discounts! Please message for inquiries.

The rental includes a private entrance, a large bedroom with a King size bed( New Zinus 12in Memory Foam King Mattress), walk in closet, modern kitchen with dining space that opens to living area, an outdoor patio with seating, a spacious bathroom with walk in shower, full size tub, and double vanity. Abundant off street parking and HiGH SPEED WIFI

name: 24-Sleeper, Hot Tub, Sauna, Game Rm, Near Biltmore
description:
Villa in Arden, NC · ★5.0★ · 7 BR · 12 Beds · 3.5 Baths

Unwind at this stunning villa, part of AshevilleCityRentals, nestled outside Asheville. As your host, I’m excited to share this picturesque haven that offers a perfect blend of peaceful natural surroundings and modern luxury. Discover why our guests love the ultimate relaxation and entertainment setup, from the private movie theater, game room to the at-home spa experience. Reserve your story today.

name: Cozy Log Cabin, Mountain View
description: This beautiful, true- wood log cabin has everything you are looking for when visiting Asheville and the surrounding area. Just 5 miles from the interstate and downtown Asheville, this log cabin is quintessential to anywhere you want to go. Giving you convenience to everything and the comfort and modern amenities with long- range.

name: Asheville Lake House by CM | Month-to-Month Rental
description: Escape to beautiful Lake Kenilworth for a rare opportunity to stay on the water in the city of Asheville, NC. Imagine boating across the lake at sunset and minutes later arriving at your dinner reservation downtown! Located just two miles from gourmet restaurants, celebrated art galleries, and the entrance to the Biltmore Estate, Asheville Lake House is the perfect lakefront vacation rental for unwinding in the Blue Ridge Mountains. Step out onto the deck with your morning coffee and see the

name: New,2 mi. to Downtown, LUX,HotTub,FirePit,Forest
description: 🌄Escape to our luxurious, secluded mountain retreat only 2 miles from downtown Asheville. The entire interior has been professionally designed and includes all new furniture and décor, dream kitchen with granite countertops, tile/stone fireplace, etc… Absolutely stunning! Enjoy the outdoor gas fireplace, BBQ, grounds fire pit and hot tub surrounded by the natural beauty and serenity of the Blue Ridge Mountains or experience the vibrant nightlife in downtown Asheville.

name: Mountain Cottage close to everything 3bdrm2bthWiFi
description: Discover serenity at this beautiful mountain cottage... modern luxury meets rustic charm.  Nestled in a peaceful enclave in the heart of the mountains, this newly remodeled 3 bedroom, 2 bath haven offers exquisite blend of tranquility and accessibility.  Moments away from the airport, Ag Center. DT Asheville, Hendersonville, Brevard + nearby attractions like Biltmore Estate. breweries and stunning waterfalls. After a day of adventures return to the comforts of your quiet home away from home.

name: Charming 2B2B furn. cabin home
description:
From December 1st through April 31st 2025 Must be 5 months $2,300 monthly. First month Plus security deposit
& Cleaning fee
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway cabin on over an acre of fenced Serenity Garden backyard. Enjoy a barbecue and firepit area, lovely pond and shed that can be an office.
Night time solar lights make the yard dazzle.
Ten minutes to downtown, Harris Teeter, Trader Joe’s, the historic Grove Park Resort and Golf club area plus adorable town of Weaverville.

name: Biltmore | Asheville Downtown
description:
This very spacious, renovated, historic Biltmore Village condo is perfect for your Asheville getaway. Located in the heart of Biltmore Village guests can walk to any one of the many local restaurants, galleries, and boutiques. It is also located a moment away from the entrance to the famed Biltmore Estate, a short ride into downtown Asheville, and close to the Blue Ridge Parkway. 6 beds total and sleep 10+
New owner of a very popular rental! Give us a try

name: Cozy apartment convenient location
description: Private and spacious basement apartment conveniently located to the interstate and 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate.

name: Family/Pet-Friendly, Hot Tub + Mins from Downtown!
description:
New management at this 5-star, newly constructed 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath home just minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy an open floor plan, fully equipped modern kitchen, game room in the basement, comfortable beds for the whole family, and cozy fire pit.

Relax on the covered porch, enjoy a game of cornhole outside in the fenced backyard, or explore downtown Asheville and nearby Weaverville in minutes. Pet-friendly and perfect for making unforgettable memories in the Blue Ridge Mountains!

name: Upscale, renovated AVL cottage
description: Exquisitely styled, fully furnished bungalow awaits its perfect residents:  seeking their oasis in Asheville. Unique architectural details include a stunning vaulted ceiling and original pine floors. New stainless steel appliances and high end furnishings make this a perfect living space/working environment.  Daytime natural light balanced by blackout curtains. Office nook includes a built in desk. Outdoor space: covered porch, large private side deck, and fully fenced yard.

name: Cozy 3BR Home in Asheville
description: Cozy Asheville home! 3BR/2BA home, fully furnished, with fully stocked kitchen, comfy living spaces, along with free parking. Quiet neighborhood, 10 min from downtown & Mission Hospital. Perfect for mid-term stays. Relax, unwind, and enjoy all Asheville has to offer!

name: Blue Jay Getaway - 5 Minutes to Downtown!
description: Welcome to the Blue Jay Getaway, nestled two miles from the thriving mountain city of Asheville, North Carolina, featuring a funky and eclectic downtown, known for its rich arts and music scene, historic architecture, dining, outdoor adventures and of course, the awe-inspiring scenery of the Blue Ridge Mountains. With its cheerful interior spaces, thoughtful amenities and central location, you’ll feel right at home! Let it be your landing place for exploration, fun and adventure.

name: Spacious 2BDRM condo S Asheville
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Vicky Lou's  Pad
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.

name: Creekside Delight-Lovely! 20 min to Asheville
description: Welcome to Creekside Delight! Centrally located just 20 minutes from Asheville, yet set in a serene location alongside a creek beside a horse farm. Enjoy the picturesque views while still being just minutes from so many wonderful area attractions.

name: Tiny in Big Heart of Asheville
description: Experience urban glamping in our designer tiny home on Asheville's greenway. This cozy retreat features shared modern amenities including a communal kitchen, showers, and mudroom. Steps from downtown's restaurants and breweries, yet your own peaceful sanctuary. A simple yet special basecamp for exploring Asheville's ecclectic and vibrant culture.  The tiny home trailer is delivered to AVL Urban Campground for your stay.

name: Huge 3 bedroom condo, central Downtown Asheville
description: Stunning downtown condo. Central location. Easy access to Western North Carolina. Floor to ceiling windows. Spacious condo - 3 bedrooms, 3 king beds, 4 full bathrooms and a sleeper sofa in living room. Two bathrooms in primary suite. Chef's kitchen, gourmet appliances & a 2nd pantry kitchen. Automated blinds. Two condos converted to one large space. Includes two parking spaces in the garage. Perfect if you need affordable accommodations and want to stay downtown to support #ashevilleforever.

name: Walk DT Asheville-Views-King Beds-Fireplace
description:
Tucked in one of Asheville’s most walkable neighborhoods—just minutes from downtown—this home checks every box.

Inside, you’ll find 2 dreamy king bedrooms (one with private porch access and ensuite bath), fireplace, fully stocked kitchen, and your own outdoor patio with city & mountain views. TVs in every room, fast Wi-Fi, in-unit laundry, and free parking make your stay effortless.

Come stay where comfort meets convenience—your home base for adventure, relaxation, and everything in between.

name: Asheville DT|GPI|RAD|Biltmore Estate|Sauna|Firepit
description:
Welcome to your private retreat where Scandinavian design meets spa-like luxury.

✔ Prime Location: 3 minutes from downtown’s restaurants, shops, and nightlife.
✔ Spa amenities: Sauna, robes, soft towels
✔Fully equipped kitchen, cozy living area, and plush, hotel-quality bedding.
✔ Outdoor firepit and grill with a view of the River Arts
✔ Bright, minimalist interiors with large windows and warm, cozy touches.
✔ Perfect for romantic getaways, work trips, or a peaceful retreat in any season.

name: Cozy Downtown Asheville Condo | Walk everywhere
description: Stunning condo with contemporary meets turn of the century design in downtown Asheville. Located in central downtown  on N. Market with walking access to all Asheville. Comfortable furniture and new appliances to make your stay relaxing and easy.  This 1st floor 2 bedroom features 2 king masters, each with private baths. The unit comes with one garage parking space for midsize vehicle (length cannot exceed 16 ft, no exceptions).  No pets please.

name: Walk DT Asheville-City/MTN View-FirePlace-King Bed
description: Welcome to your Asheville retreat! This charming home features king-sized beds, a cozy fireplace, a full kitchen, and two full bathrooms—one ensuite and one conveniently located in the hallway. Enjoy outdoor dining with stunning city and mountain views, all within walking distance of Downtown Asheville’s vibrant attractions. Explore nearby Pack Square Park, eclectic shops, and local dining. Perfect for relaxing after a day of adventure, with free parking and in-unit laundry for your convenience!

name: Homestead in West Asheville
description: This is an upstairs sunny bedroom with a lot of south facing windows. The queen size bed is 4 feet from the floor. A step stool is required to get up on the bed. This may be unsuitable for elderly folks. The house is medium sized and has three-bedrooms. It's located on a quiet street in West Asheville. We have many excellent cafes and eateries nearby. The River Arts District and Greenway are within walking distance, as well as Carrier Park. Downtown is a ten minute drive by car.

name: Luxe 5BR | Hot Tub, Sauna, Games & Lake Views!
description:
Welcome to Lakefront Lux, a stunning 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom luxury home with breathtaking views of Lake Julian. Whether you're relaxing in the hot tub, enjoying the private home theater, or having fun in the game room, this home is designed for comfort, entertainment, and relaxation.

✅ Perfect for families, groups, and retreats – Sleeps up to 16 guests
✅ Private and peaceful setting, just 5 minutes from town & local stores
✅ 20 minutes to downtown Asheville

name: Peaceful Guest Suite Close to Town
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. This is a lower level apartment of a home in the Sunset Mountain/Grove Park area of Asheville. It is a 7 minute drive to downtown Asheville, but it feels like a cabin in the woods. It has a huge deck among the trees, perfect for enjoying an evening cocktail or a morning cup of coffee.

name: Downtown Haven Paradise
description:
Stunning downtown condo with contemporary meets turn of the century design in this historic new-buildout building, sunny and walkable condo in downtown Asheville. This 2nd floor two-bedroom features 2 king masters, each with private baths. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away
​​​​​​​* Please note: This unit offers one nearby parking space.

name: Spacious Cabin w/ Hot Tub & Pool Table
description: Looking for cabin life with mountain views 15min from Asheville? The Asheville Getaway Cabin is for you! This 3 bed 2 bath with 2 full kitchens comfortably sleeps 8. The open kitchen/living room offers an excellent space to make a meal and memories with friends or family. If you need some “alone time”, there is plenty of space inside and out to find your own serenity. The full-size pool table and arcade table in the loft ensure you or your guest will not be bored.

name: Heated Pool + Hot Tub, Pickleball, 10 mins to DT
description:
Don’t want to jump to conclusions but I think you just found your next vacation rental!

The pool is open now till the end of October! Book your stay, and we’ll have the heated pool ready for you—at no extra charge!

Book the best AVL experience!

Sleeps up to 18 guests with free parking for 8 vehicles.

name: Downtown Asheville Condo-King Bed-Full Kitchen
description: Stay in a stunning 907 sq ft condo in Asheville’s historic S&W Building. Just an elevator ride to the S&W Market, home to top local restaurants and craft beer. This stylish space features exposed brick, high ceilings, a custom king bed, gourmet kitchen, leather recliner, 60” Smart TV, and  sunset views. Directly Downtown, walk to restaurants, breweries, and live music. Elevator access, secure entry, and managed by a WNC local for a seamless stay.

name: Romantic Cabin w/ Hot Tub | Perfect Couples Escape
description: Perfect for couples, Magnolia Cabin features a grand French-Antique style bed, a fully equipped kitchenette, and large windows with stunning forest views. Enjoy a spacious deck for morning coffee, an outdoor shower in warm weather, a luxurious hot tub, and a fire pit for s’mores and stargazing. Only 15 minutes from downtown Asheville yet nestled in nature's embrace, this is your ideal retreat for both relaxation and adventure. Book now for a tranquil and unforgettable experience!

name: Cozy Cabin w/ Hot Tub | Perfect Couples Escape
description: Forestwood Cabin, a charming couples retreat, features a comfy king bed, a luxurious hot tub, a fully equipped kitchenette, a warm weather outdoor shower, a 2 person soaking tub, and large windows showcasing the beautiful forest. Relax on the spacious deck, in the hot tub, or around the fire pit under the stars. Located only 15 minutes from downtown Asheville, it’s ideal for both relaxation and adventure. Book now for a tranquil and unforgettable experience!

name: Luxury Downtown walkable AVL condo w arcade 2BR2BA
description: Retreat to our upscale 2BR/2BA downtown Asheville condo—ideal for couples or families. Watch mountain sunsets, cook in the chef’s kitchen, or play shuffleboard and arcade games. Two king suites offer spa-like comfort. Walk to breweries, dining, and live music, then unwind in style. Use the two reserved parking spots to easily explore mountains, waterfalls, and small towns. Modern comfort meets mountain charm—book your Asheville escape now!

name: East Asheville Family Home
description: Family home located in East Asheville. Indoor and outdoor kids play areas, fenced in back yard with magical kids playhouse. Grill and fire pit for outdoor use. Outdoor cold plunge. Outdoor TV and lounge area. Front yard kids obstacle course. Walking distance to a park, library, restaurant with kids playground/creek, two coffee shops and a farmers market on Fridays from May to November. Two miles to downtown Asheville and a quick 5 minute drive to the Blue Ridge parkway for hiking adventures.

name: Large 3 bedroom 3.5 bath condo Downtown AVL
description:
Gorgeous downtown condo with contemporary meets turn of the century design in this historic building. Sunny and walkable condo in downtown Asheville. This spacious 1st floor condo features 3 spacious bedrooms each with a king bed and private baths, plus a powder room in the common area. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away. Easy access to all of Western North Carolina.
* Please note: This unit does not have a parking space included.*

name: New Downtown 1 /1 basement apartment
description: Great, centrally located 1/1 basement apartment but with plenty of windows for lots of natural light.  Separate, private entrance from main house and dedicated parking spot.  Brand new, and fully furnished.  Walk to downtown, coffee shops, restaurants, bakeries, shopping.  No washer/dryer, but laudromat is only 1.4 miles away.

name: Walkable East-West AVL House (30 night min)
description: (East) West Asheville location a walk from bakeries, breweries, taquerias, and coffeehouses. River Arts District and Carrier Park are nearby and joined by the French Broad River Greenway. Much has been damaged by Helene, but our sweet little corner is still going strong. If downtown, hiking or the Biltmore is your destination, you can take a bus or very short drive and access to the interstate is a breeze. Everything is close making it easy to plan your visit.

name: Eclectic Dntwn Asheville Vibe-Rooftop-Hot Tub-View
description: Welcome to The Luxury Asheville Affair, the ultimate escape for unforgettable times with friends or family! This lively retreat accommodates up to 19 guests and is designed for fun, luxury, and relaxation. Located minutes from Downtown Asheville, the Biltmore House, and West Asheville, this home also offers breathtaking French Broad River views from a private rooftop hot tub. Psst...here for a bachelorette/bachelor party? Ask about our secret adult-themed party room-available by request only.

name: Tiny House Rental in Asheville, NC - The Bat Shack
description:
🦇 Asheville’s Own Tiny House - Welcome to what is happily referred to as The Bat Shack! Discover this modern lair w/all the amenities you could hope for w/a super cozy yet modern & industrial vibe.

🛏️ 🍲📺 High ceilings, large kitchen, washer/dryer, super comfy queen size plush bed, central heating &
A/C and flatscreen TV.

🐕 AND you can bring your dog! *WOOF*!

⛰️Enjoy the beautiful porch complete w/swinging hammock & BBQ to relax the day away enjoying a Blue Ridge Mountain view.

name: Sanctuary in W Avl 2 units, pets OK, Biltmore pass
description: This West Asheville home has 2 sections, each with a living area, kitchen, laundry and outdoor spaces. Perched on the edge of West Asheville, this beautiful home is convenient to everything in Asheville. Come experience all our area has to offer with great access to downtown attractions as well as outdoor activities. FREE activities for stays under 29 nights, including Biltmore, Rock Wall, Zipline, Whitewater Rafting, Trampoline Park, Snow Tubing and Axe Throwing.

name: The News Condo 202 at ATB
description: Dog-friendly King BD + Pull-out sofa in the Epicenter + Private Outdoor Balcony

name: The Daily Condo 201 at ATB
description: Dog-friendly King BD Full Bath in the Epicenter + Private Outdoor Balcony, Fast WiFi, Easy Parking, Perfect for Groups, Antique-Chic DESIGN

name: The Gazette Condo 200 at ATB
description: Pet Friendly Modern  & Chic 2 bedroom 2.5 Bath  condo in  Epicenter of Asheville, North Carolina .

name: Craftsment: Modern West AVL Gem
description:
Craftsment is a modern apartment nestled in a 100+ year old Craftsman home in West Asheville.

This thoughtfully designed space offers a private entrance w/ deck, a fully equipped kitchen, a king-sized bed, and an office space for remote work.

Arrive early and sleep in - our check-in time is 11am and checkout is 3pm because we believe you deserve to get what you pay for.

Enjoy free on-street parking, local shops & restaurants, and a quick drive to downtown.

name: Mountain Cottage~MtnViews~5MiDt~
description: Nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains, this cozy retreat offers some of the best views in Western North Carolina. Located just 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 5 miles from downtown Asheville, you’ll enjoy both tranquility and convenience. Relax in the seasonal pool or unwind in the new hot tub (available starting January 20th). Whether you’re hiking the parkway or exploring Asheville, this home is the perfect base for your mountain getaway.

name: Mtn Views! Hot Tub, Sauna, GameRoom, Theatre, Golf
description:
Discover our extraordinary retreat in Asheville, NC! Situated so close to town, yet fully secluded. This spacious home sleeps 14 and is full of amenities:

*Hot Tub
*Sauna
*Outdoor Seating & Dining w/ Stunning Mountain Views
*Theatre Room
Game Room w/ Pool Table, Shuffleboard
*Arcade Games
*Putting Green
*Indoor Bar
*Fire Pit
~10 mins to Downtown Asheville & the River Arts District
~15 mins to West Asheville & Biltmore Estate
~20 mins to the Blue Ridge Parkway & The North Carolina Arboretum

name: Large home in North Asheville
description: Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for minutes from downtown.

name: The Woodfin Hideaway, 10min to DT-AVL
description:
**Cozy Creekside Cottage Near Asheville**

This charming Woodfin cottage offers the perfect mix of nature and city life. Just minutes from Beaver Lake and 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, it’s a peaceful retreat after a day of exploring. Relax on the screened front porch or unwind by your private creek. The serene backyard is perfect for quiet moments, and a storage building provides space for gear. Whether you're here for adventure or relaxation, this cozy getaway has everything you need!

name: Spacious home close to Downtown AVL
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

- Perfect for the minimalist
- Fully furnished
- spacious living room with sunroom attached
- lots of natural lighting
- luxury style high ceilings
- Granite countertops & stainless steel appliances
- quiet neighbors
- trash compactor located right beside the building for convenience
- I beautiful Mountain View
- centrally located
- quick 7-10 min drive to Patton Ave (a main rd that leads right into downtown Asheville)

name: Asheville-Candler NC "Art House"
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

name: Bent Creek/ NC Arboretum Trails AVL
description:
Cute neighborhood setting! Literally something for everyone with ample room to stretch out in front of the fireplace in the over sized den. Large wrap around porch with swing is a delight. Looking to get outside with the whole family, this is the place!
Literally around the corner from Bent Creek biking/walking trails, the NC Arboretum and 15 min from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore House. Roomy 3 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. Enjoy the convenience while enjoying the mountains.

name: Entire Farm-7 units, sleeps 20, hot tubs & firepit
description: This memorable place is anything but ordinary. Bring the whole family to enjoy this unique farm stay experience. This listing includes all 4 units in the main house, the tiny house, and both barndominiums built into the barn. So a total of 7 units, 8 bedrooms, 10 beds, 7.5 bathrooms between all the units

name: Heart of Asheville Lake House
description:
Lakeside Escape – Kayaks, Arcade & Fire Pit!

Experience the perfect getaway in Asheville, NC! Enjoy private lake access, kayaks, and a boat slip for endless water fun. Gather around the fire pit under the stars or challenge friends in the arcade. Kids will love the playroom & outdoor playground. Cook with ease using the BBQ grill, full kitchen & kitchenette. High-speed WiFi & dedicated workspace make it ideal for work and play. Book now for an unforgettable stay!

name: Centrally Located Private Oasis with Library
Cozy Retreat, King Bed, Fire Pit
description: Welcome to Base Camp AVL, a stylish and comfy retreat located minutes from Asheville’s top attractions! Our thoughtfully designed space offers all the comforts of home, including a full kitchen, plush beds, a spa-like shower and a charming fire pit. After a day of exploring the best of WNC, unwind here in style. Visit Biltmore Estate, the Blue Ridge Pkwy or the downtown vibrant arts, dining, and brewery scene. No matter what brings you to the area, this is the ideal spot to relax and recharge!

name: Spacious & Charming, Easy Walk Downtown w Parking
description: Hosted by dedicated Superhost/ owner Ania, this charming Five Points apartment has been a top-rated Airbnb for five years. The spacious ground-floor unit of a historic duplex offers a private entrance and curated interiors. Walkable and inside Asheville’s coveted grocery triangle (HT, TJs, Whole Foods), it’s perfectly located. Steps from Five Points diner and craft cocktails at Little Jumbo, this inviting retreat blends character, modern amenities, and convenience with all the comforts of home.

name: Merrill's Nest, Peaceful 3 BDR, Pets Welcome
description:
Welcome to Merrill's Nest!

Relax with the whole family at this peaceful oasis immersed in the treetops. Newly renovated 3bd/2 bath home in a beautiful country setting just 15 minutes from Asheville and 7 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy time reading books on the porch, playing sports and games in the yard, and listening to the birds.

Pets are welcome with a pet fee of $100 (per pet).

name: Modern Studio in Heart of W. AVL
description: Welcome to your cozy home away from home in vibrant West Asheville! This modern, light-filled studio offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Enjoy being steps away from some of the city's best restaurants, bars. Whether you're here to explore or simply take it easy, this quiet space is the perfect place to unwind and enjoy all Asheville has to offer.

name: Artist's Bungalow in Walkable N. AVL/Monthly Stays
description: Live like a local in this charming and vibrant bungalow, available for monthly stays just minutes from downtown Asheville! This 3 bedroom home, with a dedicated office and a chef's kitchen, captures the eclectic, artsy spirit of the city. Immerse yourself in the creative culture with unique decor and thoughtful touches throughout. Explore nearby shops, restaurants, and galleries, then unwind on the covered front porch in this family friendly urban neighborhood. Your home away from home!

name: Hemphill - Cozy Mtn Home
description: Welcome to Hemphill Hideaway. This stone cottage is perfectly situated 8 minutes drive to downtown Avl and .25 mile from the Mountain-To-Sea hiking trial. Enjoy the best of both worlds with a private and quiet space nestled in the trees that’s a close and easy drive to downtown as well as great hiking.

name: Test- Do Not Book
Skylight Condo by CM | Chef's Kitchen & City Views
description: Skylight Condo is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends!  If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight.  A Vacation Coordinator from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 24 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

name: Cozy Ridge | Pet Friendly, Views & Close to Town!
description:
Embrace ease and excitement at Cozy Ridge, an updated ranch-style home offering long-range mountain views just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville!

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (maximum of 2 dogs allowed). Please include the number of dogs when making your reservation.

name: $0 Cleaning Fee! Shared dorm in fun hostel
description:
This listing is for a single bed in an 8-bed coed dorm at The Lazy Tiger hostel. There's 2 shared bathrooms across the hall. We can host more than 1 adult but they have to be booked individually.

Like all guests, you'll also have access to all common areas, including our fully-stocked kitchen, front and back porches.

We're happy to help plan the best Asheville vacation possible.

All guests must be from out-of-area, book their own reservation, and have a credit card in their name.

name: Asheville River Cabins
description: Imagine your family reunion or group retreat set along the French Broad River, steeped in natural beauty, and just steps away from 30 private accommodations (many with private hot tubs) that can sleep up to 96 people! Our River Lodge and community fire pit is the perfect venue for the whole group to gather. Whether it's quality time as a family, a serene venue for your wellness retreat, or outdoor inspiration for your next big idea - Asheville River Cabins is the perfect river getaway!

name: #2 few steps to the orange peel
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. We are literally a few steps to the Orange peel and all that downtown Asheville has to offer! This location is unbeatable!

name: Downtown Asheville comfort #9
description: For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills and not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character & real people. Clean and comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with front porch, balcony and shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this second floor room has a queen-size bed, is air conditioned in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, sitting area, table & chair, wifi. Lockable and clean. Bathrooms are shared with others.

name: Downtown beauty, value 10
description: For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills and not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character & real people. Clean and comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with front porch, balcony and shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this second floor room has a queen-size bed, is air conditioned in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, sitting area, table & chair, wifi. Lockable and clean. Bathrooms are shared with others.

name: Renovated King Suite + 4 Queens.
description: Welcome to our tranquil retreat.  Nestled on a private acre lot, this fully renovated home offers a peaceful escape while remaining close to Downtown Asheville and Biltmore Village.  Enjoy stunning nature views a small creek and ample green space, where you'll find hammocks for a relaxing afternoon.  The expansive deck features a shaded sitting area, gas heater, and a gas grill, perfect for outdoor gatherings.  There's also a cozy fire pit and separate seating area for more outdoor relaxation.

name: Modern and Chic Green Built House
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located house in the walkable West Asheville area. Located on a dead-end street, two floors allow for multiple people to enjoy quiet time with lots of windows and gorgeous plants to make you feel at home. Your furry companions will be comfortable here too, with a fenced in yard and dog park just 100 yards from the front door!

name: Heart of Downtown, Luxe Loft
description: This apartment is perfect for families and groups of friends looking to experience the vibrant culture and lively atmosphere of Downtown Asheville.  Two Blocks from Harrahs Cherokee Center. Walkable to nearby restaurants, shops, and entertainment, or take a short drive to the famous Biltmore Estate. The unique loft style, modern amenities, and central location make this apartment the ideal choice for your Asheville getaway. Book now and make your stay in Asheville unforgettable!

name: City Views Montford/ 5 Points 2BR Walk DT/ Parking
description: Managed by Ania, homeowner and Airbnb Superhost, this newly relisted space has been a top-rated Airbnb for five years. Stylish, charming, and filled with character, this centrally located Five Points 2BR occupies the second story of a historic duplex. Enjoy city views, an easy walk downtown, and a prime spot inside the grocery triangle (HT, TJ’s, Whole Foods). Just steps from Five Points Restaurant and craft cocktail lounge Little Jumbo, this location offers both convenience and local flavor.

name: Historic 5 Points Duplex walk Downtown +parking
description: Entire historic duplexed home in Asheville's Five Points neighborhood. The home includes two private units, each with its own entrance, living space, kitchen, and outdoor area. Together, you'll enjoy 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, a fenced courtyard, a private porch, fast Wi-Fi, and parking. Diner next door, cocktails across the streets. Groceries a block away. Walk to downtown's restaurants, breweries, and shops, or explore Biltmore, Grove Park, and the Blue Ridge Parkway just minutes away.

name: Steps from the Orange peel apt 8
description: This budget friendly unit is ideal for the solo traveler or a couple that doesn’t mind sharing some space. The apartment is private. The bathroom is shared. We are literally steps from the orange peel and all downtown Asheville music scenes and eateries. This unique historic hundred plus year old inn has so much character and history. We know that you will absolutely love it! Can’t wait to host you soon.

name: Sunset view, cozy, affordable 13
description: This budget friendly unit is ideal for the solo traveler that doesn’t mind sharing some space. The apartment is private. The bathroom is shared.
