We are literally steps from the orange peel and all downtown Asheville music scenes and eateries. This unique historic hundred plus year old grooming house has so much character and history. We know that you will absolutely love it! Can’t wait to host you soon.

name: Best Downtown Asheville loft.
description: Welcome to this intimate, boutique loft experience located in the heart of downtown Asheville, North Carolina. This stunning condo is a unique blend of contemporary and turn-of-the-century design, located in a historic newly re-construction building. The bright and sunny 2rd floor unit is conveniently situated in the heart of the city. It features two bedrooms, both with private bathrooms and king-sized beds. This home is the perfect place to relax after a day exploring downtown Asheville NC!

name: NEW! Home+Tiny Home: Firepit-Hot Tub-Dog Friendly!
description: Escape to the perfect Asheville retreat with two charming homes on one property—complete with a hot tub, fire pit, and a fenced dog run! Just 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and The Biltmore, this amenity packed getaway sleeps 10 and offers fast WiFi, 5 Smart TVs, family & dog friendly perks, and well stocked kitchens. A recent design refresh added stylish touches throughout to make your stay even more memorable!

name: Bright Home with Sunroom in Heart of Asheville
description:
Sunny 1 BRr + Sunroom in Historic Montford (Queen + Twin DayBed)
+ Walkable to Neighborhood Faves
+Comfort! Organic 12 layer mattress, cozy sofa, and layers of blankets and pillows. Fully stocked kitchen and all linens provided.
+Perfectly unique, our home reflects our interests: cities, the unusual, and FUN. There is a lot to look at and read if you desire
+Enjoy the ease of a Montford location, walkable to 9Mile, All Day Darling, and Tall Johns. Downtown is a half mile.

name: Blue Ridge Creek Retreat
description: Beautiful creek side mountain home. 10 Min to Downtown!

name: Beautiful and spacious cottage in South Asheville
description: Welcome to our newly renovated cottage nestled in the cute & walkable neighborhood of Royal Pines in South Asheville.  2 miles from restaurants, breweries, and shopping;  4 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway; and only 10 miles from the historic downtown areas of Asheville & Hendersonville.  This spacious home is a single-level open concept design, completely renovated in 2024 with brand new everything.  Come enjoy your time in WNC while relaxing & spending time together in our lovely cottage.

name: Separate sitting area and downtown views
description: Our most spacious 2nd floor room in the Main House,  Vireo features a sitting area separate from the King bedroom. Revel in the downtown views from the comforts of your room before heading out to discover the Asheville nightlife.

name: Separate living area and warm afternoon light
description: Found on the second floor of our Main House, Kress features a king bed, walk-in shower, and a spacious living area separate from the bedroom. Unwind in your room's sitting area and take in a warming natural light from the afternoon sun.

name: Cozy 2nd floor retreat with bedside fireplace
description: A bedside fireplace makes Wedge one of our coziest retreats at Blind Tiger Asheville. Found on the 2nd floor of our Main House, Wedge's windows encompass the walls, creating an inviting space for sun throughout the room (fear not, our curtains have you covered).

name: Original primary bedroom in the main house
description: Found in our Main House, Bacoate  is the original primary bedroom of the home. Featuring a King bed, an original nineteenth-century fireplace, a modern clawfoot tub and walk-in shower.

name: Attic-like hideaway on top floor of the main house
description: One of two rooms at the top of our Main House, Albers welcomes you with a distinct and expertly designed layout.  This spacious room features  a plush king bed, walk-in shower and multiple seating areas.

name: Overlooks the mountain sunsets & downtown
description: Revel over the mountain-striking sunsets in the evening and views of downtown in Liberty. Expansive and  thoughtfully laid out, our top floor room welcomes you with a king bed,  sitting area, walk-in shower and great natural lighting for your Asheville retreat.

name: ADA room with private entrance, fireplace & patio
description: Room 9  begins with your own private entrance and patio. Cozy up in your plush king bed, fireplace nearby, and seating area featuring a daybed. An overly spacious bathroom is highlighted by a soaking tub and separate shower. Room 9 is an accessible room and provides handicapped parking, a ramp to the door, and grab bars in the bath area.

name: High ceilings, fireplace, jetted tub and daybed
description: Enter Cypress from your private entryway to be welcomed to high ceilings and meticulously designed furnishings. Enjoy your king bed, fireplace nearby, and daybed for an additional area of relaxation. An overly-spacious bathroom is highlighted by a soaking tub, separate shower and double vanity.

name: Vaulted ceilings, jetted tub &  stone fireplace
description: Five Points welcomes with its impressive vaulted ceilings, meticulously designed furnishings and stone-encased fireplace. Unwind in your king bed, kick up your feet in your room's sitting area, and revel at your expansive bathroom featuring a soaking tub, separate shower, and double vanity.

name: Jetted tub and ground-level private entry
description: Cúrate's ground-level private entry welcomes you to a thoughtfully-designed space, featuring a boundless bathroom with a soaking tub, and generous walk-in shower. Enjoy from the comforts of your king bed, a double-sided fireplace into bath/bed and wall along one side of room. Retreat your own private outdoor space for you and your dog if desired, as Room 7 is one of two pet-friendly rooms at Blind Tiger.

name: Private entrance, front porch and bay windows
description: Blue Ridge captivates you at first sight with its front porch that stretches the building facade. Newly constructed in 2023, step into your room from your private entrance and enjoy a thoughtfully designed and spacious living area with bay windows. Once your night comes to an end, retreat to your bedroom and its opulent king bed.

name: Private entrance and spacious living area
description: Citrine provides the ample space you seek when you break away from your home base. Your private entrance opens up to your spacious living area featuring a wet bar and space to kick up your feet.  When you are ready to call it a night (or day), move through your double doors to reset in your plush King bed.

name: Classy living space with wet bar & lounge area
description: A stay in the Proper room provides the amenities that you seek, surrounded by design elements you didn't know you needed. Discover the unique layout and space that is Proper, from the stately bedroom upstairs, to the wet bar, lounge area and bathroom downstairs.

name: Guest cottage with 2-sided fireplace & porch
description: A true retreat, Table stands alone at Blind Tiger Asheville as its own guest cottage. Enter your room through a striking Dutch door, leading into your spacious accommodations. Enjoy amenities such as a full kitchen, double-sided fireplace and private porch to kick up your feet after a day of exploration.

name: Near music venues & River Arts District
description: Our hotel rooms in Asheville NC give you extra space to relax with a living room area with sectional sofa, mini-refrigerator and flat-screen TV.

name: Asheville Escape | Free Parking & Pet-Friendly
description: Experience Asheville’s charm at Holiday Inn Asheville East-Blue Ridge Parkway, a pet-friendly mountain lodge hotel perfectly situated near Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy an on-site dining at Woodfire Grille & Bar and modern amenities like free WiFi, EV chargers, and a fitness center. Explore attractions, hiking trails, and scenic views, all just minutes away. Perfect for families, pets, and tour groups, offering comfort and convenience in a prime location.

description: Experience Asheville’s charm at Holiday Inn Asheville East-Blue Ridge Parkway, a pet-friendly mountain lodge hotel perfectly situated near Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy an on-site dining at Woodfire Grille & Bar and modern amenities like free WiFi, EV chargers, and a fitness center. Explore attractions, hiking trails, and scenic views, all just minutes away. Perfect for families, pets, and tour groups, offering comfort and convenience in a prime location.

description: Experience Asheville’s charm at Holiday Inn Asheville East-Blue Ridge Parkway, a pet-friendly mountain lodge hotel perfectly situated near Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy an on-site dining at Woodfire Grille & Bar and modern amenities like free WiFi, EV chargers, and a fitness center. Explore attractions, hiking trails, and scenic views, all just minutes away. Perfect for families, pets, and tour groups, offering comfort and convenience in a prime location.

description: Experience Asheville’s charm at Holiday Inn Asheville East-Blue Ridge Parkway, a pet-friendly mountain lodge hotel perfectly situated near Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy an on-site dining at Woodfire Grille & Bar and modern amenities like free WiFi, EV chargers, and a fitness center. Explore attractions, hiking trails, and scenic views, all just minutes away. Perfect for families, pets, and tour groups, offering comfort and convenience in a prime location.

name: Near Blue Ridge Parkway | Gym. Free Parking & Pool
description: Experience Asheville’s charm at Holiday Inn Asheville East-Blue Ridge Parkway, a pet-friendly mountain lodge hotel perfectly situated near Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy an on-site dining at Woodfire Grille & Bar and modern amenities like free WiFi, EV chargers, and a fitness center. Explore attractions, hiking trails, and scenic views, all just minutes away. Perfect for families, pets, and tour groups, offering comfort and convenience in a prime location.

name: Free made-to-order breakfast & evening reception
description: Each room features modern décor, plush bedding, and convenient amenities. Whether you're here for business or leisure, enjoy complimentary breakfast, and easy access to Asheville’s vibrant downtown. Relax and let us take care of the details for a seamless stay.

name: Tranquil Dog- Friendly Riverfront Home with WIFI
Downtown Dream Away-AVL-King Bed-5* Location!
description:
Welcome to your private corner unit in the heart of downtown Asheville! This ground-floor gem offers easy access and free parking right outside, so you can explore everything this vibrant city has to offer—breweries, wine bars, art venues, music spots, and incredible restaurants just steps away. Whether you're here to soak in the sights or unwind in cozy comfort, this space is designed to make your stay unforgettable.

💬 Message us to discover our favorite local spots within walking distance!

name: 2 Side by Side Homes!
description:
Welcome to Asheville!

We have two homes located right beside one another that are up for rent as a unit for larger groups coming to explore Asheville. Located less than 10 minutes from the Biltmore House, 8 minutes from downtown, and 15 minutes from the Blueridge Parkway you're guaranteed to have an amazing vacation!

name: LUX Condo in Downtown Asheville!
description: Located just steps from the vibrant South Slope and Biltmore Avenue, this one-bedroom condo features designer furnishings, work by local artists, and everything you need to have a comfortable stay. The unit has a king-sized bed in the bedroom along with a full-size sleeper sofa in the living room. The spacious bathroom has a double vanity and large shower to accommodate multiple guests. There's also a washer/dryer if you need to freshen up your wardrobe while you're here! See you soon!

name: Grand View Asheville NC
description: Our vacation home is the ideal getaway!  Immerse yourselves in the best of Asheville, with breathtaking views of downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, and majestic mountain landscapes.  The open floor plan features a fully equipped kitchen & cozy living spaces, perfect for relaxation and entertaining.  The 3 bedrooms include a master suite with an en-suite bathroom, the other 2 bedrooms share a full bathroom.  The property has an elevated platform complete with charming front porch.

name: #12 location and value downtown
description: For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills and not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character and real people. Clean and comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with a front porch, balcony and shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this single, second floor room has an air conditioner in the window in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, table and chair. High ceiling and wifi. Bathrooms are shared with other guests.

name: #11 value with a view downtown
description: For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills & not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character and real people. Clean and comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with a front porch, balcony and shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this second floor room has a queen-size bed, is air conditioned in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, upholstered chair, wifi. Lockable and clean. Bathrooms are shared with other guests.

name: Newly Built 6BR Net Zero Home 5 mins to Biltmore
description:
Bring the whole family to a peaceful, private, net-zero solar powered home with plenty of space!

-6 large bedrooms
-6 full bathrooms
-5 mins to Biltmore and Parkway
-10 mins to downtown AVL
-This is a duplex & you will have both units - each unit is 3 bed/3 bath.
-Inviting & relaxing living spaces
-2 full kitchens
-2 connected outdoor patios
-Parking for 6 vehicles w/ easy access
-2 EV chargers
-2 washer/dryers
-two 55” smart TVs

Your perfect base for Asheville & Biltmore. All are welcome!

name: #7 Solo traveler downtown value
description: Clean, comfortable, and convenient location to all amenities.  This historic landmark rooming house has a large front porch, a second floor balcony with chairs and tables, and shared bathrooms on the hallway. Room #7 is a single, 2nd floor room that has a window air conditioner in the summer and radiant heat in the winter. Complete with mini refrigerator, sink, mirror, desk, and sitting chair. Bathrooms are shared with other guests. Linens and towels are provided.

name: Tranquil Space in the Best Spot
description:
A comfortable, quiet space right between West Asheville and the River Arts District. Walk to everything both popular neighborhoods have to offer...hand-made doughnuts, dive bars, tubing, breweries, coffee, glass blowing, live music, and new restaurants. The apartment is also walk-able to downtown for the ambitious, otherwise it's a short ride.
When you're not exploring the city relax in the cozy living room or on the back porch perched in the trees.

name: MTN Views/Hot Tub/Firepit/Near AVL, Hiking & River
description:
Escape to this peaceful 4BR/3BA retreat in Arden, NC! Nestled on a quiet, forested dead-end road in a private residential neighborhood, this home offers long-range mountain and pasture views. Relax in the hot tub, gather around the fire pit, or unwind by the gas fireplace. Enjoy the spacious deck and backyard, perfect for stargazing. Just 20 minutes from downtown Asheville and near the French Broad River with bike paths and river access. A serene getaway
with nature at your doorstep!

name: Hacienda 27
description: Stylish 2BR/2BA modern home just 12 minutes east of downtown Asheville with gorgeous sunset views. Thoughtfully designed with bold, creative decor, a cozy gas fireplace, and warm, natural light from oversized windows. Enjoy a King bed, Queen bed, spa-like bath with soaker tub, and fans in every room. Lounge on the spacious deck or screened-in porch, surrounded by lush flower beds. Quiet, scenic, and close to everything—Uber from downtown is typically just $12. A perfect Asheville escape!

name: New Renovation Montford Studio
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated studio cottage, nestled in the historic and vibrant Montford neighborhood of Asheville, NC!
This studio is perfect for a single occupant or a couple. You will be surprised by how spacious the studio feels. The kitchen is the perfect size for someone who loves to cook. Lots of windows so the studio feels nice and lights while retaining the cozy feel of a cottage. Montford park is right across the street and you can walk to local favorite restaurants or downtown!

name: Luxe 5BR Mountainview | Fireplace | W/D
2BR sunlit dog-friendly condo w/ patio, yard & W/D
Cozy 6BR Near Asheville hiking and biking
Charming 1-Bed in West Asheville
description: Welcome to your Asheville retreat! This fully furnished rental offers everything you need for a comfortable stay. Unwind in the cozy living room, cook with ease in the well-stocked kitchen, and enjoy a spacious bedroom with a desk and walk-in closet with a washer/dryer. Off-street parking included. Just minutes from Haywood Road’s eclectic coffee shops, boutiques, vintage stores, and renowned restaurants. 60-day minimum stay. Managed by Asheville City Real Estate; a lease will be required.

name: Private and wooded forest floor. Close to it all.
description:
Relaxing calm new and stylish space. Comfortable with everything you need. Minutes drive to everything in Asheville. Sleep in a large Cal king bed with an additional pull out queen sofa in the living room. Huge covered porch with wooded nature views, bird watching, and comfortable seating.
Located on a 4 1/2 acre property with-in Asheville near the Blue Ridge Parkway, Arboretum, and Bent creek hiking! Great location to experience all Asheville life and also have a peaceful, wooded get away!

name: Pink House Walkable Wood Retreat
description: Welcome to the Pink House, nestled in the serene and wooded Kenilworth neighborhood! Situated on a .23-acre lot with neighboring vacant wooded lots, the property offers over an acre of private, peaceful surroundings. The home has been meticulously renovated and fully furnished, blending modern comforts with timeless character. All this and only a four minutes drive from downtown Asheville and walkable to mission hospital!

name: Modern Rustic Mountain Retreat!
description: FULLY FURNISHED! Unbeatable Mountain & Downtown Views! 5 Minutes to Downtown! This type of luxury and livability in town with these views is hard to come by. Enjoy a stylish modern farmhouse experience at this centrally-located spacious home. Also features a wonderful 3/4 acre flat yard for play and entertaining, plenty of parking, and multiple level decks to soak in the views. Flexible lease terms - pricing negotiable based on 30-day minimum rental.

name: Ashe & Ember: Luxe stay w/ Hot Tub, Sauna & Views
description: Welcome to "Ashe & Ember", where Asheville’s vibrant art scene merges seamlessly with the majestic draw of the Great Smoky Mountains. This 5-bed/3.5-bath features modern sophistication w/ stylish interiors, chandelier-lit rooms, and a fully equipped kitchen, game room, hot tub, cold plunge, sauna and fit pit. Located minutes from the Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, and downtown Asheville, “Ashe & Ember” offers a curated blend of creative energy and natural serenity.

name: Luxury Tiny House Hideaway Near Downtown
description: Enjoy an Amazing Experience at This Centrally Located Stylish Home on a private one acre lot - 15 minutes from Airport, The Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway and downtown Asheville  - King bed - Full kitchen - modern appliances - Hot tub for relaxation under the stars - fire pit - Outdoor grill - EV charger - Washer and dryer - Great for couples looking for a romantic getaway.  Experience luxury, privacy, and convenience in this stylish Asheville retreat. Book now for an unforgettable stay!

name: Charming retreat with Stunning Views and Wifi
Sunshine Cottage
description: Charming Secluded Asheville Retreat. Escape to this cozy home in Asheville, NC, offering peace and convenience. Enjoy the deck, hot tub, and gas fireplace for ultimate relaxation. Only 3 minutes from shops, dining, and a mile from the Outlet Mall. Explore nearby Bent Creek, Biltmore, Blue Ridge Parkway, and more. West Asheville and downtown are a short drive away. King and queen bed, central AC, and a fully equipped kitchen, this dog-friendly home is the perfect base for an Asheville adventure.

name: Woodhaven Cabin! Sauna & Hot tub
description: *New Listing* This 1969 cozy 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom cabin is the perfect getaway nestled in the scenic beauty of Asheville. It has lovingly been updated with a wonderful wrap around deck featuring a sauna and jacuzzi. Located in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains, the cabin offers a peaceful retreat with stunning views of the surrounding nature.  Whether you're seeking adventure or simply looking to relax, this cabin provides a perfect blend of comfort and nature's beauty.

name: The Eclectic Escape
description: Nestled in the heart of Arden, perfectly situated between Asheville and Hendersonville, this one-of-a-kind retreat is a dream stay for lovers of art, quirky charm, and cozy comforts. The Eclectic Escape is filled with personality, from its vintage touches to the thoughtfully curated artwork that fills every corner. With two bedrooms—a king-size bed in one and a queen-size bed in the other—plus two full bathrooms, this home is perfect for couples, small families, or friends looking for a unique g

name: Poplar Peak Retreat • Sauna • 15 to AVL
description: Perched in the treetops, the Poplar Peak Retreat provides a serene retreat just minutes from the vibrant offerings of Asheville. Relax in the barrel steam sauna, unwind in our cozy accommodations, and take advantage of a variety of carefully curated amenities to ensure a restful and memorable stay. Just to note: there are two other AirBnBs in the vicinity so you may run into other guests, the property manager lives on property so if you need anything just reach out!

name: Cabin, Hot Tub, 4 miles to Downtown AVL, Fire Pit
description: Surrounded by woods, yet perfectly situated 4 miles from Downtown Asheville or the River Arts District, 2 miles from New Belgium Brewery and 5 miles to the Biltmore, this rural setting allows you to be close to everything while feeling miles away. This brand new, light and lofty cabin offers a peaceful retreat with a large, covered deck overlooking the woods. Enjoy the hot tub, as well as a fire pit, picnic table and hammock.

name: The Grange at the Huntly Estate | Lux Mtn Getaway
description: Discover The Grange at The Huntly Estate, Asheville’s premier retreat, where elegance, comfort, and nature converge to create an unforgettable experience. This stunning 8-bedroom, 8-bath, 2-half-bath home is designed for those seeking a sophisticated yet welcoming getaway, perfect for milestone celebrations, friend and family reunions, and corporate retreats.

name: The Hard Times Hideaway
description: Reconnect with nature and get cozy at the Hard Times Hideaway.

name: Quiet, mtn views, 6 miles from downtown Asheville
description: Escape to this peaceful retreat atop a hill with stunning mountain views, nestled on a partially wooded acre lot. Enjoy al fresco dining on the deck, unwind by the outdoor fire pit, or explore the Mountains-to-Sea Trail (MST) and Blue Ridge Parkway (BRP) both just 5 min away. A fully equipped kitchen makes meals easy, while high-speed internet keeps you connected. Just an easy 6 mile drive to downtown Asheville. This getaway is perfect for adventure, relaxation or remote work.

name: Central & Serene Retreat
description: Tucked on half an acre of serene, wooded land, this property is perfect for gathering with family or reconnecting with friends. Enjoy the peaceful setting, while being minutes from everything Asheville has to offer. Explore the outdoors, discover Asheville’s vibrant food scene, and relax after a day of adventure in this beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home base.

name: Deep Porch, Walk Downtown/ UNCA
description: Mint juleps on the porch, anyone? The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything Asheville from this centrally located place. 1 mile from downtown and around the bed from UNCA, this charming craftsman home lets you easily explore breweries, James Bears award-winning restaurants, galleries, and  music venues. Then come relax on the quintessential southern porch with a cocktail and watch the fireflies or roast marshmallows in the back yard fire pit surrounded by fruit trees and flowers.

name: Brand New Mountain Retreat
description: Long range mountain views, tranquil, cozy.  If you like these words, then this is the place for you.  Sit on your own private deck with a cup of coffee or a glass of wine and enjoy the mountain views.  Only 2 miles to downtown, 8 minutes to Mission Hospital; and the Blue Ridge Parkway is at the end of the road.  This is a brand-new apartment with utilities included, black out shades for quality sleep, and a washer/dryer in the apartment.

name: Fully Furnished, New Rental!
description: FULLY FURNISHED MONTHLY RENTAL in a Great Asheville Location. Large Owner's Suite! Modern! Spacious! BRIGHT & CLEAN! This lower-level garden apartment was professionally decorated with private entrance, patio, and on-site covered parking. This space INCLUDES: All Utilities, Internet/TV. Ideal for one occupant! No smoking on premises. Walk to great restaurants and cafes. Longer stays are preferred! This space was a very successful Airbnb rental with a daily rent from $125-$140 per night.

name: Fur friendly Urban Retreat with large backyard
description:
Welcome to Asheville urban retreat. Steps from downtown and Mission Hospital. This completely remodeled urban oasis provides a stylish comfortable space with plenty of room and a fenced back yard.
Relax on the front deck swing or patio table with mountain and city views or in the backyard gathered around the fire pit with smores.
A perfect oasis after a long day of hiking or visiting the Biltmore Estate.

name: Cozy Cottage - Hot Tub, Fire Pit, King, 3BD
description:
Experience a refined and comfortable stay in our beautifully designed 3-bedroom home, just minutes from the Biltmore Estate and vibrant downtown Asheville.
* 8 min to Biltmore Estate
* 12 min to Downtown Asheville
* 14 min to River Arts District
* 13 min. to Mission Hospital
Perfect for families or friends, this bright and airy retreat offers a peaceful, private setting with all the upscale comforts of home. Enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, a fully equipped kitchen, and an infant-friendly setup.

name: 10 Minutes to Downtown Asheville, Pets Okay!
description:
New Listing! Charming 2-Bedroom Cottage – Available Monthly Through August 2025. Great nightly rates plus taxes and fees!
Looking for a peaceful retreat near Downtown Asheville? This remodeled 2-bedroom, 2-bath cottage is the perfect place to settle in for a few months or weeks. Enjoy the mountain view at sunrise!
2 dogs allowed with a pet fee of $100.00. Maximum weight of dog is 20 Lbs. each.

name: Spacious Relax in 4 BR Asheville
description: Welcome to the heart of Asheville ! Close to Sweeten Creek Road and I-40, you can get anywhere in the County quickly, yet get away from it all as well.  This stylish 4 BR 2 BA place to stay is perfect for group trips.  Vaulted and tall ceilings, newly renovated gorgeous home close to downtown and close to the Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village shops and restaurants.  Relax and unwind with a spacious and relaxing house to call your own, 3 bedrooms upstairs, one large bedroom playroom downstairs

name: Cozy studio near UNCA & DT
description: Cozy Fully Furnished Studio Near UNCA & Downtown Asheville. This charming studio is perfect for anyone looking for a convenient and comfortable stay in Asheville. Located within walking distance to UNCA, the greenway, and the beautiful Botanical Gardens.  This studio offers easy access to  Downtown Asheville, local restaurants, and vibrant city life. Tenants will also enjoy access to a fully fenced-in backyard, perfect for relaxing outdoors. Utilities and outside maintenance included.

name: Mountain home near downtown
description: This home has it all. Peaceful zen vibe, super cozy with all the trees and foliage Asheville is known for. Just a couple of minutes from the famous and fun downtown area. Huge porch to watch the sunsets and an occasional bear saunter by. Hiking trails you can walk to!

name: Asheville Jewel
description: Beautifully furnished condo lying in Asheville’s Blue Ridge Mountains - only 15 minutes to downtown Asheville. Open plan Kitchen, Dining and Living room w wood-burning fireplace leads thru French doors to the Terrace & views to river & mountains. Split bedrm design: Master King w en suite bathrm w large tub, Double bedroom (or Den) w 2nd full bathrm. Laundry room. Use of the Community Upscale Pool area, Fitness rm, Large lawns w BBQs, Walking trails along river, Playground, Dog park. Enjoy AVL!

name: Cozy rural living 10mins from Town
description:
You're welcome to spend a few nights in my little country house on half an acre (with a donkey and goat across the street), minutes from everything Asheville has to offer. I welcome travelers and travel nurses especially to come relax in the guest room, which has a twin bed (cot available for second guests), desk, couch, and exercise bike.

There are a front porch and soon to be screened in side porch, along with a sunny backyard and garden, for you to lounge in.

name: Cozy New Build in Asheville.
description:
Welcome to this relaxing and stylish retreat. This home offers a peaceful escape where nature abounds yet remains close to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Village , the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Mountain to the Sea Trail.

House features two bedrooms, two bath rooms, washer, dryer, and fully equipped kitchen.

Upper deck is perfect for relaxing and enjoying the beautiful outdoors whether you prefer sun or a little shade. We've got you covered. Deck Chairs and umbrella add to the ambiance.

name: The Huntly Estate | The Lodge + The Grange
description: Escape to The Huntly Estate, an exclusive, private retreat nestled in the breathtaking Blue Ridge Mountains. Combining the elegance of The Grange with the grand accommodations of The Lodge, this sprawling estate offers 17 bedrooms, 17 full baths, and 3 half baths, making it the perfect setting for weddings, corporate retreats, family reunions, and milestone celebrations.

name: Merrimon Manor Historic Remodel
description: This beautifully modernized historic home just north of Downtown Asheville is the perfect place to gather friends and family for the ideal North Carolina experience. Close to downtown, grocery stores and attractions, this home features six bedrooms, three baths, updated kitchen, two decks and plenty of room to gather together or in smaller groups. There is plenty of free parking, too! The historic details give the home true charm, while the modern remodel makes it comfortable and functional.

name: The Immobile Home
description: If you’re here in Asheville for the character and for the “vibe,” then this might be the right fit for you. While we can’t offer the perfectly curated, yet numbingly bland aesthetic of a typical short-term rental, we can offer a slice of authentic Appalachian Asheville. The home shares a ~8-acre wooded property with a campground that’s uniquely “Asheville” with artist-created structures and small winding trails. We only offer The Immobile Home between local renters to fill in schedule gaps.

name: Grove Park | Stylish Duplex
description: 2BR | Private Entry | Modern

name: Asheville Room in Shared house
description:
Room in shared 2 bedroom house in Asheville. The perfect place to enjoy the mountains with all amenities of Asheville. Quiet neighborhood nearby West Asheville, the River Arts District, or make the short drive downtown. Close to fantastic restaurants, breweries, coffee shops, and outdoor activities

Tv with Netflix, Max, Prime, Hulu, Apple Plus

name: Eagle View | Pets, Screened Porch & Stunning Views
description:
Nestled on 10 private acres above the Bee Tree Reservoir in Swannanoa, Eagle View is the epitome of a modern mountain-top oasis. With a kitchen fit for a chef, plenty of cozy outdoor space, and floor-to-ceiling windows to soak in the mountain views just outside, there is no better place to experience the charm, adventure, and beauty of every season in WNC!

This rental is pet friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per dog (max of 2). Please include the number of dogs when booking your stay.

name: Large Cabin w/ Hot Tub&PoolTable
description: Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.

name: Art House Guest Rooms
description:
Keep it simple at this creative, peaceful and centrally-located shared living space. Large shared spaces with fully furnished large rooms, plenty of parking and out door space. Safe neighborhood near gyms, grocery and highway access. 5 miles to downtown AVL, 20mins to airport.

Home Owner is a veteran focused on creative arts, wellness, organic gardens and mindful spiritual life style. This is a sober house. No smoking, drugs or drunkeness. we value a balanced healthy clean living.

name: Historic House On Beaver Lake
description: For the first time ever, visitors to Asheville can stay in this 4,000-sf historic Asheville home. With views overlooking Beaver Lake, the bird sanctuary and 2 mi walking path, the house is just minutes from UNC Asheville, the Botanical Gardens and downtown. There are 2 formal bedrooms and sleeping areas for up to 10 ppl. The base price of $475 per night covers up to 6 people with $50/person thereafter. We welcome families and friends to our home, but parties of any kind are prohibited.

name: Mountain Vista
description: 6 minutes from downtown Asheville, overlooking 50 acres of old-growth forest topped by mountain views. The entire home has been remodeled top to bottom with handicap access: no stairs, enlarged doorways, 5 head walk-in shower and bidet in Master. Reservations are a minimum 3 days but available for stays of a week to several months - corporate clients wecome. Bonus daybed in Sunroom perfect for traveling nurses to rent per room/extra guest. Very private, yet very urban all at once! Pet friendly.

name: Del-light-ful, Mtn Home Sanctuary.
description:
Spacious Asheville home, perfect for large groups. Open kitchen & bright living room provide a space to gather, while TV/game room w/ pool table offers plenty of entertainment. Plenty outdoor areas to enjoy peace and quiet +mtn views.

Located in Oakley, a charming and peaceful neighborhood that offers convenience and tranquility. Just a 10-min drive from dwtn Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, the WNC nature center, and the Arboretum. Walking distance to Mtn-to Sea Trail and Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: Lookout Below
description: Charming and quiet house.

name: Riverside (Accessible) Retreat
description: Escape to this spacious 4-bedroom home just outside Asheville—perfect for families seeking comfort and accessibility. This space features two king bedrooms, a queen bedroom (accessible), plus an upstairs bonus space perfect for working or yoga. The living area, kitchen, bedroom, and attached custom bathroom are wheelchair accessible, with ramp entry and a thoughtful coffee station. Enjoy a well-stocked kitchen, electric grill, and a large deck with a gas firepit for cozy nights under the stars!

name: 7 Mi to Dtwn Asheville: Apt w/ Sauna Access!
description:
BBQ Ready | Pets Welcome w/ Fee | 6 Mi to Biltmore

Even with Asheville's top sights moments from your door, you might never want to leave this 3-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental! Step onto the patio for coffee with a side of mountain views each morning, followed by a trip downtown or an afternoon visit to the iconic Biltmore Estate. Come home for a BBQ feast in the evening before retreating to the sauna to unwind. Your next great getaway is just a click away!

name: Location Location Location!
description: Discover your perfect mountain retreat with this home nestled in the serene beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Experience the closest whole-home rental to downtown Asheville! Nestled right on the city limits, this is the first spot where entire homes can legally be listed, offering you both the convenience of downtown access and the comfort of a private retreat.

name: Cozy Vintage Airstream
description:
This is it! The perfect spot to soak up the Asheville area and Blue Ridge Mountains. Located just 10 minutes from the Asheville airport and Sierra Nevada Brewery but on a mountain top.

This cozy blast from the past has been meticulously restored to create a one of a kind piece of artwork.

Sleeps 2
Queen - King size custom bed
Natural stone patio and fire pit
Charcoal grill
Induction stove
On demand hot water shower
Smart TV
AC/Heat
Refrigerator
One amazing time!!!

name: Brand New! Sleeps 6 • Hot Tub Fun
description: Your perfect Asheville escape awaits! This cosy 2-bedroom, 1-bath home is ideal for families, couples, or friends. Enjoy charming design, a relaxing hot tub, and a pet-friendly space. No steep hills—just minutes from Biltmore, downtown, and all your Asheville favourites. Clean, comfy, and made for making memories!

name: Asheville 2 Bedroom House
description:
2 bedroom house in Asheville. The perfect place to enjoy the mountains with all amenities of Asheville. Quiet neighborhood nearby West Asheville, the River Arts District, or make the short drive downtown. Close to fantastic restaurants, breweries, coffee shops, and outdoor activities


Tv in each room with Netflix, Max, Prime, Hulu, Apple Plus

name: Cozy 4BR near Asheville biking and hiking
2BR Dog Friendly | Gas Fireplace | Kitchenette
Historic house Apt #1
description: Located in historic Montford area of Asheville. House was built in 1910. Only 5-10 minute walk to downtown which is known for great restaurants, music and unique shopping. This is a neighborhood so one can live like the locals.

name: Mtn views . 5 mins DT . Priv, 30+days!
description:
Charming 2BD/2BA Condo in the Heart of Asheville!

Welcome to your cozy mountain retreat at 472 Windswept Dr! This stylish 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo offers comfort, convenience, and stunning views just minutes from downtown Asheville.

Relax on the private balcony, unwind in the spacious living area, and enjoy easy access to hiking, breweries, and all the charm Asheville has to offer. Perfect for a weekend getaway or a longer stay!

name: 1 BR Cottage less than 5mi to DT
description: Come stay with us at our cute one bedroom cottage just minutes to down town Asheville and is 4 minutes from Haywood road one of Ashevilles most unique areas! We are less than 15 minutes to the biltmore and less than 10 to downtown! Come relax in a newly renovated built space that is great for single or couple travelers! Our hot tub will be here by may 1st and professional photos will be uploaded soon! Cottage is inside city limits and is attached to another living space that has no access.

name: HotTub West AVL Garden apt
description: Come stay with us at our newly renovated garden apartment centralized in the heart of West Asheville, just 1 mile from Haywood Road and all the shops and restaurants that West Asheville has to offer the apartment is also less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville and 10 minutes to the Biltmore estate. Come soak in the hot tub that will be available May 1. There is another living space above that has zero access to the Airbnb lower level. The Airbnb has its own driveway & its own fenced in yard

name: Historic Home Apt #3
description: House is in historic Montford area of Asheville. House was built in 1910 and has 4 apartments. This ap[artment is located on 2nd level. There is a 5-10 minute walk to downtown. Asheville is a  delightful, friendly destination with great restaurants, music, unique shopping. There are plenty of craft and art venues. Lots of hiking trails close by.

name: Chic 1BR by Trails & Breweries
description:
Modern comfort meets natural beauty in the heart of West Asheville! This sleek, pet-friendly 1BR, 1BA apartment features stylish finishes and a private fenced yard. Walking distance from Haywood Road’s top restaurants, breweries, cafés, and boutiques, and across from scenic Hominy Creek Greenway. Enjoy walkability, nature, and local flavor—just an 8-minute drive to downtown Asheville. Perfect for travelers seeking a peaceful retreat or urban adventure!
1 BR: Queen bed
1 inflatable queen bed

name: Side Quest | Hot Tub Fire Pit Contemporary Funk
description:
A retreat for those who know the best memories come from the detours.

This renovated barn blends rustic charm with contemporary polish.

Upstairs: a sleek hotel-style bedroom with vaulted ceilings, a fireplace, and a spa-like bathroom.

Downstairs: cozy wood walls, retro accents, and bold design.

Outside: enjoy a fenced yard, fire pit, and hot tub. Whether it’s a romantic weekend or a break from the “main quest,” this is your cozy basecamp.

name: Big Moves | Pool Spa Game Room Tikibar Theatre 20+
description: This is The Move: The Key Collection's newest design and amenity driven piece in Asheville! Designed for those who know recovery produces quality. Renew in the heated pool, 2 hot tubs, sauna, and cold plunge. Sip elevated cocktails in the swanky tiki bar, challenge friends in the exotic billiards and poker lounge, and kick back in the movie lounge. This spot sleeps 20+ and promises a full sensory experience, next level recovery, and an unforgettable stay in Asheville. Book now to get locked in!

name: Luxurious Lakeside Retreat Near Downtown Asheville
description: Discover lakeside luxury at our 2-bedroom Asheville retreat. With space for 10, this historic home offers a balance of tranquility and city life. Just 4 miles to downtown, enjoy easy access to Biltmore and Beaver Lake. Ideal for groups seeking adventure and relaxation.

name: 1BD/1BA Condo Near Biltmore Estate and Downtown
description:
Nestled in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood, our one-bed/bath suite in one of Asheville's premier condo hotels is minutes from Biltmore Estate & Downtown Asheville.
Amenities including a seasonally open pool & hot tub; fitness facility; free WiFi; spa packages & in-room treatments by appointment; on-site security; & 24/7 concierge service. Most studios are equipped with a washer/dryer. Our location makes it the perfect "home base" to explore the art, history, nature, & culture of Asheville.

name: Studio Near Biltmore Estate and Downtown
description:
Nestled in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood, our one-bed/bath studio in one of Asheville's premier condo hotels is minutes from Biltmore Estate & Downtown Asheville.
Amenities including a seasonally open pool & hot tub; fitness facility; free WiFi; spa packages & in-room treatments by appointment; on-site security; & 24/7 concierge service. Most studios are equipped with a washer/dryer. Our location makes it the perfect "home base" to explore the art, history, nature, & culture of Asheville

name: 3BD/2BA Condo Near Biltmore Estate and Downtown
description:
Nestled in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood, our three-bed/two bath in one of Asheville's premier condo hotels is minutes from Biltmore Estate & Downtown Asheville.
Amenities including a seasonally open pool & hot tub; fitness facility; free WiFi; spa packages & in-room treatments by appointment; on-site security; & 24/7 concierge service. Most studios are equipped with a washer/dryer. Our location makes it the perfect "home base" to explore the art, history, nature, & culture of Asheville.

name: Pet Friendly - Cozy Nut Shell
description:
Escape to our serene 2BR/2BA apartment, your cozy Asheville haven! Bright, spacious, and designed for comfort.

Just minutes from the vibrant heart of downtown (6 min), the unique shops of West Asheville (8 min), and the breathtaking Blue Ridge Parkway (<30 min).

Enjoy the ease of two dedicated parking spots. Your relaxing home away from home awaits!

name: Peaceful & Central Studio
description: This stylish and cozy studio cottage is perfect for individual travelers looking to explore Asheville. Located in the peaceful Kenilworth neighborhood, the space is on a quiet street and beautiful, serene lot with lots of trees. Private, off-street parking is included. Centrally located, enjoy easy access to parks, restaurants, breweries, shopping, grocery stores, hiking trails, and more!

name: Charming Monthly Retreat -Walk to Biltmore Village
description: The Marigold, a bright, breezy retreat with mid-century modern charm and retro flair. Sunlight fills the space through oversized windows, highlighting original architecture and warm textures. The well appointed modern kitchen and king bed offer both function and comfort, while vibrant décor and natural light make this space as joyful as it is stylish. Perfect for monthly travelers, creatives, or remote workers looking for stays in Asheville that feels like a boutique hotel meets curated home.

name: Crestview Cottage, Asheville NC
description:
Pet friendly, fully renovated, private home, private yard with hot tub and gas firepit.
Plan your next visit to Asheville with this 3/2 ranch style home on a private road with only 12 other houses. You will feel like you're in the woods and yet only 12 minutes to downtown or West Asheville. The cottage has a fully appointed kitchen with many extras. The living room has a 65" smart tv and a newly installed gas fireplace. You can swing on the front porch, dine or just relax on the back deck.

name: Brand New & Walkable to West Asheville Hotspots
description: Spacious 2BR/2BA home just minutes from town and the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. Both bedrooms feature king beds, plus there’s a full size pull-out sofa and optional air mattress for extra guests. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, cozy living area, and a peaceful setting close to shops, dining, and outdoor adventures. Perfect for couples, families, or groups looking to relax and explore Asheville.

name: 7K+ sq ft Mansion! Backyard Oasis! sleeps 28
description:
Welcome to AVL Grand Getaway, a 7000sqft+ mansion with resort style backyard. Whether you are having a large family gathering, hosting guests for your event, or just looking to relax and rejuvenate, this home is designed so you never feel like you need to leave home. But if you do, it's conveniently located to all the attractions Asheville area offers.

> Sleeps 28.
> Resort Backyard with pickleball, Spa and outdoor kitchen.
> Peaceful wooded area only 20 min to Asheville.

name: Comfortable Quiet Home AVL/HVL
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.  Professionally decorated quaint little 3 bed/2bath with mountain views from the covered front porch and rear deck. This comfortable recently updated home is the perfect relaxing location conveniently located to right between Asheville, Hendersonville, Brevard, and Lake Lure.  Use it as a home base to explore the bike, beer, music, mountain scene!

name: Airstream in Art's District
description: Experience urban glamping in our vintage Airstream at Asheville Urban Campground. This stylish silver retreat offers retro charm with modern comfort, featuring access to shared kitchen, showers, and mudroom. Located on Asheville's greenway, you're steps from downtown's vibrant restaurants and breweries while enjoying your own peaceful sanctuary. The perfect unique basecamp for exploring Asheville's eclectic culture - where classic retro charm meets urban adventure.

name: Cozy Cottage, Minutes to Fun!
description:
This charming cottage offers the perfect blend of seclusion and convenience. Natural light floods the bright interior, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere with all the amenities you need for relaxing after a day of adventure.
Enjoy quiet mornings with coffee on the porch and peaceful evenings under the stars, while still having quick access to all the attractions that make this area special.

name: Historic 7BR - Walk to DT AVL
description:
Welcome to your home in the heart of Asheville — a beautifully restored historic inn (voted #1 in NC) now available as a full-house rental.

Located in the charming Chestnut Hill Historic District, and an easy 10-minute walk to downtown, this 4800 sq ft home is ideal for family gatherings, retreats, and small celebrations. Enjoy 8 restaurants and cafes within four blocks, Chestnut Street Inn's famous cookies upon arrival, luxury amenities and immaculate cleanliness with a 100 sanitation rating!

name: Lovely Walkable West Asheville
description: We are offering our lovely basement apartment our split level home. We are located on a quiet dead end street in a welcoming neighborhood. Enjoy easy access to everything that makes West Asheville unique from this perfectly located home base. We are a 10 min walk to Sunny Point Cafe and all that Haywood Rd has to offer. We are an 8 min drive to The River Arts District, and a 10 min drive to downtown Asheville. We love local, we love tourism, we love that you’re considering coming here!

name: Bright 1 Bed Below
description: No pet fee! This bright and sunny 1 bed studio apartment is newly renovated and has everything you need for a peaceful stay for 1 or 2.  On a quiet street just 10 min East if downtown Asheville you will enjoy birds chirping, trees swaying and maybe even a bear sighting! Tall ceilings and clever layout make this is an easy place to call home for a while.

name: 2 Bed Convenient in Country
description:
No pet fee! Welcome to your peaceful Asheville getaway! Nestled in a quiet, wooded setting, this charming 2-bedroom home offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience.
Fully equipped with a stocked full kitchen, washer/dryer, comfy living space, and high-speed Wi-Fi, it's ideal for couples, friends, or small families. Plus, bring your furry friends—pets are welcome! Just minutes from downtown Asheville, hiking trails, breweries, and the Blue Ridge parkway

name: Mountain View Summer Rental - close to town
description:
Special opportunity for a gorgeous summer rental! One month minimum. Inquire for more details!

Our mountain view home sets the stage for a true Asheville experience. Conveniently located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, steps to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountain to Sea Trail.

name: Pollinator Garden Home
Walkable West Asheville Cottage
Charming Mid-Century Sunny Home
description:
This bright and airy mid-century home is just 15 minutes from downtown, and RAD giving you easy access to all the city's best restaurants, shops, and breweries.

You'll love the large, sunny yard — perfect for relaxing, playing, or simply soaking in the fresh mountain air. Inside, natural light pours through big windows, creating a cheerful, inviting space to unwind after a day of exploring.

Currently set for 30 day travels but open to something less - just message me!

name: Serene Retreat | Hot Tub, Game Room, Near Biltmore
description:
- Furnished Deck
- Mountain Views

Book an exciting trip to this 5-bed, 3.5-bath vacation rental home in Asheville. Located minutes from the Biltmore Estate and the scenic trails of the Pisgah National Forest, this home can't be beat! Spend your days playing pool, grilling on the deck, or drinking your way through the area's many breweries.

name: Montford Oasis Near Downtown Asheville
description: Wonderful Oasis in the beautiful Montford Neighborhood just 1.3 miles from downtown Asheville. Available as a monthly rental only per city rules. Centrally located and convenient but  private with an amazing covered porch and renovated kitchen. Furnishings are as pictured - ask owner if you have specific additional needs. Since this is a monthly, it is not set up as much of a "vacation" rental as just a furnished place to stay in Asheville. Yard is fenced in so dogs are allowed with pet fee.

name: Pet-Friendly Modern Apt with Sauna
description:
Pet-friendly, modern basement apartment with tall ceilings in a quiet, wooded neighborhood—just 12 mins to downtown and 10 mins to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy a super comfy king bed, private sauna, and peaceful surroundings. Perfect for relaxing after exploring the city or mountains!

Please note: Not recommended for those with cat allergies.

name: test listing (mid risk)
description: You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay.

name: City View From Your Living Room!
description:
City views from your living room! 0.5 Miles to Whole Foods, 0.5 Miles to Trader Joe's, 0.5 Miles to Downtown Asheville, 0.1 Miles to the Reed Creek Greenway, and 0.3 Miles to UNCA trails. Recently updated kitchen and bathrooms.

High speed fiber internet.

No smoking. House can be rented furnished if needed.

We can accommodate shorter term leases (3-12 months) if needed.

name: Hidden gem: Country Setting in the City
description: This gem of a house is the best of both worlds- space, privacy, incredible location! This is a have your cake and eat it to kind of house!

name: Asheville A-Frame by CM | Cabin w/Mountain Views
description: Asheville A-Frame's prime location—just three miles from the North Carolina Arboretum and the Blue Ridge Parkway—makes it perfect for reconnecting with nature without needing a long trek to reach your Asheville vacation home.

name: 2bed/1bath Large Fenced Yard Close to Everything
description: Charming, light-filled 100-year-old bungalow with original hardwood floors and modern updates. Enjoy a cozy front porch and spacious fenced in yard. Easy access to downtown Asheville, the Biltmore, hiking, mountain biking and more. Minutes to I-40 and I-26. Perfect for a relaxing or action packed mountain getaway!

name: Birdy Bungalow
description: Cozy two bedroom home, modern kitchen and charming original hardwood floors, decorated with your comfort in mind. New queen size beds, plenty of pillows, and room darkening shades to ensure a good nights sleep. Plush towels and toiletries in the bathroom. kitchen is fully stocked for cooking. Enjoy the covered back deck, and a fully fenced in yard provides space for kids and pets to play.

name: Kozy Koala Cove: Mins from town!
description: Tucked at the base of our property, this cozy RV feels like a mountain escape, though you’re just minutes from Biltmore Village and local breweries. Relax by the fire pit, stargaze, or sip coffee at your own private picnic table. Inside, enjoy a queen bed, full bath, kitchen, heat and A/C. It’s the perfect blend of quiet, nature, and convenience — a private, romantic spot that feels a world away, yet close to everything.

name: Lux Nature Villa: Games & Spa!
description:
Welcome to The Wilderness Villa—a luxury 3-story villa just 15 minutes to downtown, this forest-inspired retreat offers the perfect mix of relaxation and play. From the private top-floor master suite with steam and balcony, to the lower-level Ashevillopoly game room and theater, you’ll find nature, comfort, and fun woven into every corner.
> 7BR, 4.5BA Villa – Sleeps up to 20 Guests
> Game Room, Movie Theater, Multiple Outdoor spaces and balconies
> Hot Tub, Sauna, Steam Room, Forest Bath

name: 550) Massive 4 bedroom home/Sleeps 19
description: Experience luxury and relaxation in this newly remodeled high-end mountain home. Just 12 minutes from Asheville, it offers privacy, stunning mountain views, and top-notch amenities. Unwind in the spa with a two-person Jacuzzi tub and steam shower, or have fun in the game room with pool, ping-pong, and Galaga. Entertain in the chef’s kitchen or relax by the indoor and outdoor fireplaces. With 3 kitchens and a huge deck, this home truly has it all!

name: Cozy Cottage AVL
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.minutes from downtown, on the bus line, just off a main road with many food options. If you want the space to relax after a fun day in town this is your best option. Less than 2 miles from downtown, easy access to HWY 240 & I40 and close to the Biltmore Estate. Newly refinished and ready to be your oasis away from home. Perfect location for access to downtown and all the hiking you can manage.

name: Mountains to Sea Treehouse
description:
Heaven’s View is a cozy, private escape tucked in the trees just off the Blue Ridge Parkway. Walk 2 minutes to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail or drive 8 minutes to downtown Asheville. The home is brand new, fully furnished, and thoughtfully styled for comfort. Unwind by the fire pit (wood included), take in glowing sunsets through the trees, and enjoy everything you need for a relaxing Asheville getaway.

30amp outlet and a 120volt outlet available next to driveway for EV charging needs.

name: Daydream Retreat by 5 Seasons Homestays
description: Welcome to your perfect Asheville getaway! Nestled just minutes from downtown, this spacious 6-bedroom, 5.5-bath home comfortably sleeps up to 15 guests — ideal for families, group getaways, or retreats. Whether you’re here to hike the Blue Ridge Mountains, explore local breweries, or simply unwind with loved ones by the pool, this home offers all the amenities you need for a memorable stay!

name: Spacious Asheville Getaway
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Exceptionally well updated traditional home. Two story, two-car garage with main level entrance.  Beautiful kitchen with center island open to dining room, and covered deck next to Crooked Creek - a Certified Wildlife Garden!  Close to Asheville (10-15 min), yet outside of the City Limits. This is PERFECT for anyone that wants the best of Nature in their backyard, yet CLOSE to EVERYTHING ASHEVILLE!!

name: Magic Earth House
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.

name: 5 Mi to Dtwn Asheville: Tranquil Cabin Retreat!
description:
Crest Center & Pavilion On-Site | Pet Friendly w/ Fee | Outdoor Living Space

Whether you plan to reconnect with nature or attend a wedding at the on-site event center, you'll find everything you need for a relaxing stay at this Asheville vacation rental! Step out of this 2-bedroom, 2-bath cabin in the mornings and sip coffee on the wraparound deck, then hike, bike, or discover the Biltmore's beautiful architecture and scenic grounds. A memorable mountain escape awaits!

name: Stylish & NEW Walk to Asheville's Best
description: Welcome to your home away from home in the heart of Asheville’s vibrant South Slope district! This stylish and modern 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo comfortably sleeps up to 6 guests with a sleeper sofa in the spacious living area. Whether you're here to explore the Blue Ridge Mountains or sample the city's thriving craft beer and food scene, this location can't be beat. Bring your furry friend along-we're pet friendly!

name: Short Lived Luxury
description:
Large furnished new studio apartment for month to month medical or corporate rental. This apartment is in a rural farm setting on a second level. There is an outdoor entrance up 30 stairs and an outdoor parking space.
The kitchen is stocked with all the basics to keep you cooking and there is a double fridge/freezer combo to accommodate plenty of food. No dishwasher or range. There are two decks with one fire pit on the larger deck.

name: Chic AVL Bungalow Retreat • 5 Min to DT & Biltmore
description:
Welcome to your stylish Asheville home away from home! This thoughtfully designed 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom bungalow blends modern comfort with cozy charm—perfectly located less than 5 minutes from Downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, and the iconic Biltmore Estate.

🗝️ Book your stay and live like a local in the heart of Asheville!

name: ArtCrib
description:
We’re opening our guest room for someone special to enjoy this soulful space before the DOT takes the house down this fall. Located in historic Montford, just 7 minutes from downtown Asheville
• Large, sun-filled guest room with hardwood floors and peaceful views of the trees
• A huge kitchen with a bar table — perfect for cooking, connecting, or quiet morning tea
• A mirror-walled lounge in the entryway, ideal for movement, yoga, dancing, and movie nights (projector included!)

name: The Summit Overlook
description: Soak in scenic mountain views from this stylish 2BR/2BA retreat at Dream Asheville Exchange. Enjoy a rustic-modern interior, private balcony, gourmet kitchen, in-unit laundry, and resort-style amenities like a saltwater pool, fitness center, clubhouse, and more—all minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Your elevated Asheville escape awaits!

name: The Asheville Hideaway
description: Escape to The Asheville Hideaway — a stylish 2BR/2BA retreat in the heart of Asheville Exchange. Enjoy rustic-chic interiors, modern comforts, and access to resort-style amenities including a saltwater pool, gym, and clubhouse. Just minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, breweries, and downtown charm. Perfect for families or friends seeking comfort, convenience, and a true Asheville experience.

name: Haw Creek Cottage
description: Enjoy a quiet stay that's within minutes of all that Asheville has to offer!

name: Playground•Fenced Yard•Arcade Room•Hot Tub•Sauna
description: Welcome to Crestview Meadows—6 BR/4 Full Bath-sleeps 18-ideal for families & groups who are ready to relax and reconnect. Nestled in a quiet cul-de-sac just 15 mins from downtown Asheville, this peaceful retreat offers something for everyone. Kids will love the playground & game room, adults can unwind in the hot tub or sauna, and pups can roam free in the large fenced-in yard.  Whether you're exploring the mountains or enjoying a night in, this home is your ideal base for unforgettable moments.

name: 8 Br~Sleeps 24~Hot Tub~Game Room~Dog Friendly!
description:
This 8-bedroom home is jam-packed with amenities & has EVERYTHING you need for an amazing vacation in Candler, NC!

• Expansive Deck
• Hot Tub
• Fire Pit
• Game Room: Basketball Hoops, Pool Table, Foosball & Ping Pong Table
• Outdoor Patio/Dining
• BBQ Grill
• Fully Stocked Kitchen
• Drip & Keurig Coffee Maker
• Dog Friendly
• Ample Parking
• WIFI
• Family/Kid Friendly
• Washer & Dryer

name: The sweet house in the mountains
description:
Welcome to The Sweet House of the Mountains—a cozy retreat in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Asheville, NC.

Whether you're planning a family vacation or getaway with friends, this warm and welcoming home offers the perfect setting to relax, recharge, and explore.

With 4 bedrooms, 3 full baths, a full kitchen, and laundry, it’s perfect for relaxing or exploring.

Just 7 min from the airport, 15 min to downtown and Sierra Nevada Brewery, and 25 min to Brevard’s waterfalls.

Unforgettable stay

name: Cozy WAVL home w/yard & porch
description: Stay in the heart of West Asheville! This cozy 3-bed, 2-bath home has a screened porch for fresh mountain air, a fenced yard, ping pong, a Blackstone grill, and a Solo Stove for marshmallow roasting. The kitchen is stocked with Ninja appliances and East Fork Pottery. Stroll to Haywood Road, soak up WAVL charm, and enjoy city life with style. This spot is perfect for friends and family looking to connect, relax, and play.

name: Brand New! 1.7m to Biltmore
description: Brand new and ready for you! Two to three miles to Biltmore, downtown Asheville, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Calling all foodies, mountain bikers, kayakers, hikers, brewery lovers, leaf peepers, Grove Park Inn... Finished in fall 2024. Nectar mattresses, Viking pots and pans, luxe sheets and towels. Two outdoor living areas both with fire features. Peek-A-Boo mountain views. We chose the best for this home because we stay here too! New to AirBnB! Monthly rentals. You will not be disappointed.

name: Renovated 2BR near downtown with central air
Home in Asheville, Pet Friendly
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated 5BR/4BA single family home with 2 fully furnished units on 3 private acres in a forest mountain setting. Perfect for family/friend gatherings. Both units have an open floor plan with a fully equipped kitchen, cozy living, and all the modern amenities you need for a relaxing visit. Located only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville.

Private and perfect for groups and families. Pets welcome.

NO parties or large gatherings are permitted on the property.

name: Historic 2BR near downtown with central air
Updated 1BR | Deck | W/D | Central AC
Remodeled 1BR | Deck | Washer/Dryer
Treetop Escape • A-Frame Chalet • Sauna • Game Roo
description:
Welcome to The Treetop Escape—an A-frame chalet nestled in the trees just minutes from downtown Asheville. This 4-bedroom mountain retreat features a private hot tub, 6-person cedar sauna, and a fully stocked game room. Enjoy peaceful forest seclusion with quick access to the city’s top restaurants, breweries, and attractions.

• 3.9 mi to Downtown
• 3.3 mi to Parkway
• 6.2 mi to Biltmore
• 16 mi to AVL Airport

name: Large 3 Bedroom 40 Foot Terrace
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this Downtown Art Deco building condo. The building itself features a food court, cafe, and popular local cocktail lounge. The neighborhood includes Asheville's top restaurants, museums, art galleries, bars, and music venues. You'll enjoy upscale, professionally managed accommodations while living like a local! Explore Asheville's famous Art Deco architecture, starting with your own building, then pop downstairs for an after-dinner drink!

name: Group Getaway Hot Tub Firepit
description: With room to spread out, this home offers something for everyone! Soak in the hot tub, lounge around the firepit, or enjoy shooting pool, fun is the only option in this sprawling south Asheville treasure. A gourmet kitchen with a huge island, family dining table, and sleeping options galore offer the perfect landing spot after a day on the town, exploring nature, or visiting the Biltmore Estate. You'll book this home year after year once you've had the pleasure of a visit, it's that special!

name: NEW! Stylish Cabin-Firepit-Hot Tub-Dog Friendly!
description: This charming home offers the ultimate blend of comfort and convenience, complete with a hot tub, fire pit, fenced dog run, and a fresh design update throughout! Located just 5 minutes from the Parkway and 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and The Biltmore, this amenity packed getaway sleeps 8 guests and features high-speed WiFi, 4 Smart TVs, and a well stocked kitchen—perfect for cozy nights in, streaming your favorite shows, or whipping up a delicious meal after a day of exploring.

name: 50% Off Bright Room ‘Til Home is Fully Furnished
description: Colorful, bright and sunny room currently majorly discounted while I finish furnishing the house! I just moved in, so the living room and a few shared areas are still in progress—but the bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen have everything you need. Enjoy a private room with fresh bedding, 300 Mbps fiber Wi-Fi, A/C, and mountain sunrises in a chill, quiet spot near West Asheville. It’s a “soft opening” stay at a special rate—comfortable, peaceful, and close to everything.

name: Karaoke VR Poker Sauna Hot Tub Gameroom Theatre
description: Find your Aura: Asheville’s newest luxury offer. Set in a premier neighborhood, this new build redefines escape with a lost-civilization poker & VR lounge, hotel-style ambient lighting, and a custom game room featuring karaoke, billiards, air hockey, and a private movie parlor. Relax in the spa nook with sauna, hot tub & fire pit, then recharge in the wellness suite—massage chair, workout equipment, yoga & meditation studio, and cocktail & juice bar. Sleeps 20.

name: Townhouse in quiet community
description: Centrally located between Asheville and Hendersonville, just 7 minutes from Asheville Airport. Enjoy a comfortable stay close to top attractions, outdoor adventures, and local charm—perfect for experiencing the best of Western North Carolina.

name: Mtn Cabana: Hot tub, Fire Pit, Walk to Breweries!
description: Experience the Village lifestyle in this custom modern mountain home boasting an elevated bohemian design, a highly central location, and full on cabana style outdoor patio complete with high end therapeutic hot tub, hammock chairs, fire pit, and wrap around privacy curtains. The Biltmore Suite Homestay is your one of a kind in-the-city getaway that is nearly impossible to replicate inside Asheville city limits. Walk to 5 different breweries, distilleries, and restaurants right down the street!

name: Cozy room near Mission Hospital
The tiny footprint house
description:
Welcome to your dream getaway at our tiny footprint house! This Tinyhome is nested in nature, just minutes from vibrant Asheville!
Perfect for adventures, romantics or anyone craving a peaceful retreat. Live simple, live tiny and live outside. For anyone wanting to try something new while exploring this beautiful city.
